[03] 76-77^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^V1.0113^ea^ brāhmaṇo ``kasi''nti yuganaṅgalādikasisambhārasamāyogaṃ vadati. bhagavā pana yasmā pubbadhammasabhāgena ropetvā kathanaṃ nāma buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo, tasmā buddhānubhāvaṃ dīpento pubbadhammasabhāgena ropento āha -- ``saddhā bīja''nti. ko panettha pubbadhammasabhāgo, nanu brāhmaṇena bhagavā yuganaṅgalādikasisambhārasamāyogaṃ pucchito atha ca pana apucchitassa bījassa sabhāgena ropento āha -- ``saddhā bīja''nti, evañca sati ananusandhikāva ayaṃ kathā hotīti? vuccate -- na buddhānaṃ ^a^M1.0129^ea^ ananusandhikā nāma kathā atthi, nāpi buddhā pubbadhammasabhāgaṃ anāropetvā kathenti. evañcettha ^a^P1.0143^ea^ anusandhi veditabbā -- anena hi brāhmaṇena bhagavā yuganaṅgalādikasisambhāravasena kasiṃ pucchito. so tassa anukampāya ``idaṃ apucchita''nti aparihāpetvā samūlaṃ saupakāraṃ sasambhāraṃ saphalaṃ kasiṃ ñāpetuṃ mūlato paṭṭhāya kasiṃ dassento āha -- ``saddhā bīja''nti. bījañhi kasiyā mūlaṃ tasmiṃ sati kattabbato, asati akattabbato, tappamāṇena ca kattabbato. bīje hi sati kasiṃ karonti, asati na karonti. bījappamāṇena ca kusalā kassakā khettaṃ kasanti, na ūnaṃ ``mā no sassaṃ parihāyī''ti, na adhikaṃ ``mā no mogho vāyāmo ahosī''ti. yasmā ca bījameva mūlaṃ, tasmā bhagavā mūlato paṭṭhāya kasiṃ dassento tassa brāhmaṇassa kasiyā pubbadhammassa bījassa sabhāgena attano kasiyā pubbadhammaṃ ropento āha -- ``saddhā bīja''nti. evamettha pubbadhammasabhāgo veditabbo.

[03] pucchitaṃyeva vatvā apucchitaṃ pacchā kiṃ na vuttanti ce? tassa upakārabhāvato dhammasambandhasamatthabhāvato ca. ayañhi brāhmaṇo paññavā, micchādiṭṭhikule pana jātattā saddhāvirahito. saddhāvirahito ca paññavā paresaṃ saddhāya attano visaye apaṭipajjamāno visesaṃ nādhigacchati, kilesakālussiyabhāvāpagamappasādamattalakkhaṇāpi cassa dubbalā saddhā balavatiyā paññāya saha vattamānā atthasiddhiṃ na karoti, hatthinā saha ekadhure yuttagoṇo viya. tasmā tassa saddhā upakārikā. evaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa saupakārabhāvato taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ saddhāya patiṭṭhāpentena pacchāpi vattabbo ayamattho pubbe vutto desanākusalatāya yathā aññatrāpi ``saddhā bandhati pātheyya''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.79) ca, ``saddhā dutiyā purisassa hotī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.59) ca, ``saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.73, 246; su0 ni0 184) ca, ``saddhāya tarati ogha''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.246) ca, ``saddhāhattho mahānāgo''ti (a0 ni0 6.43; theragā0 694) ca, ``saddhesiko kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakoti cā''ti (a0 ni0 7.67). bījassa ca upakārikā ^a^V1.0114^ea^ vuṭṭhi, sā tadanantaraññeva vuccamānā samatthā hoti ^a^P1.0144^ea^. evaṃ dhammasambandhasamatthabhāvato ^a^M1.0130^ea^ pacchāpi vattabbo ayamattho pubbe vutto, añño ca evaṃvidho īsāyottādi.

[03] tattha sampasādanalakkhaṇā saddhā, okappanalakkhaṇā vā, pakkhandanarasā, adhimuttipaccupaṭṭhānā, akālussiyapaccupaṭṭhānā vā, sotāpattiyaṅgapadaṭṭhānā, saddahitabbadhammapadaṭṭhānā vā, ādāsajalatalādīnaṃ pasādo viya cetaso pasādabhūtā, udakappasādakamaṇi viya udakassa, sampayuttadhammānaṃ pasādikā. ^b^bīja^eb^nti pañcavidhaṃ -- mūlabījaṃ, khandhabījaṃ, phalubījaṃ, aggabījaṃ, bījabījameva pañcamanti. taṃ sabbampi viruhanaṭṭhena bījaṃtveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati. yathāha -- ``bījañcetaṃ viruhanaṭṭhenā''ti.

[03] tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa kasiyā mūlabhūtaṃ bījaṃ dve kiccāni karoti, heṭṭhā mūlena patiṭṭhāti, upari aṅkuraṃ uṭṭhāpeti; evaṃ bhagavato kasiyā mūlabhūtā saddhā heṭṭhā sīlamūlena patiṭṭhāti, upari samathavipassanaṅkuraṃ uṭṭhāpeti. yathā ca taṃ mūlena pathavirasaṃ āporasaṃ gahetvā nāḷena dhaññaparipākagahaṇatthaṃ vaḍḍhati; evamayaṃ sīlamūlena samathavipassanārasaṃ gahetvā ariyamagganāḷena ariyaphaladhaññaparipākagahaṇatthaṃ vaḍḍhati. yathā ca taṃ subhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā mūlaṅkurapaṇṇanāḷakaṇḍappasavehi vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ patvā, khīraṃ janetvā, anekasāliphalabharitaṃ sālisīsaṃ nipphādeti; evamayaṃ cittasantāne patiṭṭhahitvā sīlacittadiṭṭhikaṅkhāvitaraṇamaggāmaggañāṇadassanapaṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhīhi vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ patvā ñāṇadassanavisuddhikhīraṃ janetvā anekapaṭisambhidābhiññābharitaṃ arahattaphalaṃ nipphādeti. tenāha bhagavā -- ``saddhā bīja''nti.

[03] tattha siyā ``paropaññāsakusaladhammesu ekato uppajjamānesu kasmā saddhāva bījanti vuttā''ti? vuccate -- bījakiccakaraṇato. yathā hi tesu viññāṇaṃyeva vijānanakiccaṃ karoti, evaṃ saddhā bījakiccaṃ, sā ca sabbakusalānaṃ mūlabhūtā. yathāha --

[02] ``saddhājāto upasaṅkamati, upasaṅkamanto payirupāsati, payirupāsanto sotaṃ odahati ^a^P1.0145^ea^, ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, sutvā dhammaṃ dhāreti, dhatānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhati ^a^M1.0131^ea^, atthaṃ upaparikkhato dhammā nijjhānaṃ khamanti, dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā sati chando jāyati, chandajāto ussahati, ussāhetvā tulayati, tulayitvā padahati, pahitatto ^a^V1.0115^ea^ samāno kāyena ceva paramasaccaṃ sacchikaroti, paññāya ca naṃ ativijjhapassatī''ti (ma0 ni0 2.183, 432).

[03] tapati akusale dhamme kāyañcāti ^b^tapo;^eb^ indriyasaṃvaravīriyadhutaṅgadukkarakārikānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. idha pana indriyasaṃvaro adhippeto. ^b^vuṭṭhī^eb^ti vassavuṭṭhivātavuṭṭhītiādinā anekavidhā. idha vassavuṭṭhi adhippetā. yathā hi brāhmaṇassa vassavuṭṭhisamanuggahitaṃ bījaṃ bījamūlakañca sassaṃ viruhati na milāyati nipphattiṃ gacchati, evaṃ bhagavato indriyasaṃvarasamanuggahitā saddhā saddhāmūlā ca sīlādayo dhammā viruhanti na milāyanti nipphattiṃ gacchanti. tenāha -- ``tapo vuṭṭhī''ti. ``paññā me''ti ettha ca vutto me-saddo imesupi padesu yojetabbo ``saddhā me bījaṃ, tapo me vuṭṭhī''ti. tena kiṃ dīpeti? yathā, brāhmaṇa, tayā vapite bīje sace vuṭṭhi atthi, sādhu, no ce atthi, udakampi dātabbaṃ hoti, tathā mayā hiri-īse paññāyuganaṅgale manoyottena ekābaddhe kate vīriyabalibadde yojetvā satipācanena vijjhitvā attano cittasantānakhette saddhābīje vapite vuṭṭhi-abhāvo nāma natthi. ayaṃ pana me satataṃ samitaṃ tapo vuṭṭhīti.

[03] pajānāti etāya puggalo, sayaṃ vā pajānātīti ^b^paññā,^eb^ sā kāmāvacarādibhedato anekavidhā. idha pana saha vipassanāya maggapaññā adhippetā. ^b^yuganaṅgala^eb^nti yugañca naṅgalañca. yathā hi brāhmaṇassa yuganaṅgalaṃ, evaṃ ^a^P1.0146^ea^ bhagavato duvidhāpi paññā. tattha yathā yugaṃ īsāya upanissayaṃ hoti, purato hoti, īsābaddhaṃ hoti, yottānaṃ nissayaṃ hoti, balibaddānaṃ ekato gamanaṃ dhāreti, evaṃ paññā hiripamukhānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayā hoti. yathāha -- ``paññuttarā sabbe kusalā dhammā''ti (a0 ni0 8.83) ca, ``paññā hi seṭṭhā kusalā vadanti, nakkhattarājāriva tārakāna''nti (jā0 2.17.81) ca. kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena purato ca hoti. yathāha -- ``sīlaṃ hirī cāpi satañca dhammo, anvāyikā paññavato bhavantī''ti. hirivippayogena ^a^M1.0132^ea^ anuppattito īsābaddhā hoti, manosaṅkhātassa samādhiyottassa nissayapaccayato yottānaṃ nissayo hoti, accāraddhātilīnabhāvapaṭisedhanato vīriyabalibaddānaṃ ekato gamanaṃ dhāreti. yathā ca naṅgalaṃ phālayuttaṃ kasanakāle pathavighanaṃ bhindati, mūlasantānakāni padāleti, evaṃ satiyuttā paññā vipassanākāle dhammānaṃ santatisamūhakiccārammaṇaghanaṃ bhindati, sabbakilesamūlasantānakāni padāleti. sā ca kho lokuttarāva itarā pana lokiyāpi siyā. tenāha -- ``paññā me yuganaṅgala''nti.

[03] hirīyati ^a^V1.0116^ea^ etāya puggalo, sayaṃ vā hirīyati akusalappavattiṃ jigucchatīti ^b^hirī^eb^. taggahaṇena sahacaraṇabhāvato ottappaṃ gahitaṃyeva hoti. ^b^īsā^eb^ti yuganaṅgalasandhārikā dāruyaṭṭhi. yathā hi brāhmaṇassa īsā yuganaṅgalaṃ sandhāreti, evaṃ bhagavatopi hirī lokiyalokuttarapaññāsaṅkhātaṃ yuganaṅgalaṃ sandhāreti hiriyā asati paññāya abhāvato. yathā ca īsāpaṭibaddhaṃ yuganaṅgalaṃ kiccakaraṃ hoti acalaṃ asithilaṃ, evaṃ hiripaṭibaddhā ca paññā kiccakārī hoti acalā asithilā abbokiṇṇā ahirikena. tenāha ``hirī īsā''ti.

[03] munātīti ^b^mano,^eb^ cittassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. idha pana manosīsena ^a^P1.0147^ea^ taṃsampayutto samādhi adhippeto. ^b^yotta^eb^nti rajjubandhanaṃ. taṃ tividhaṃ īsāya saha yugassa bandhanaṃ, yugena saha balibaddānaṃ bandhanaṃ, sārathinā saha balibaddānaṃ bandhananti. tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa yottaṃ īsāyugabalibadde ekābaddhe katvā sakakicce paṭipādeti, evaṃ bhagavato samādhi sabbeva te hiripaññāvīriyadhamme ekārammaṇe avikkhepabhāvena bandhitvā sakakicce paṭipādeti. tenāha -- ``mano yotta''nti.

[03] sarati etāya cirakatādimatthaṃ puggalo, sayaṃ vā saratīti ^b^sati,^eb^ sā asammussanalakkhaṇā. phāletīti ^b^phālo^eb^. pājeti etenāti ^b^pājanaṃ^eb^. taṃ idha ``pācana''nti vuccati, patodassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. phālo ca pācanañca ^b^phālapācanaṃ^eb^. yathā hi brāhmaṇassa phālapācanaṃ, evaṃ bhagavato vipassanāyuttā maggayuttā ca sati. tattha yathā phālo naṅgalamanurakkhati, purato cassa gacchati, evaṃ sati kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamānā ārammaṇe vā upaṭṭhāpayamānā paññānaṅgalaṃ rakkhati, tathā hi ``satārakkhena ^a^M1.0133^ea^ cetasā viharatī''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 10.20) ``ārakkhā''ti vuttā. asammussanavasena cassa purato hoti. satiparicite hi dhamme paññā pajānāti, no sammuṭṭhe. yathā ca pācanaṃ balibaddānaṃ vijjhanabhayaṃ dassentaṃ saṃsīdanaṃ na deti, uppathagamanañca vāreti, evaṃ sati vīriyabalibaddānaṃ apāyabhayaṃ dassentī kosajjasaṃsīdanaṃ na deti, kāmaguṇasaṅkhāte agocare cāraṃ nivāretvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojentī uppathagamanañca vāreti. tenāha -- ``sati me phālapācana''nti.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ ^b^kāyagutto^eb^ti tividhena kāyasucaritena gutto. ^b^vacīgutto^eb^ti catubbidhena vacīsucaritena gutto. ettāvatā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^āhāre udare yato^eb^ti ettha āhāramukhena sabbapaccayānaṃ saṅgahitattā catubbidhepi paccaye ^a^P1.0148^ea^ yato saṃyato nirupakkilesoti attho. iminā ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^udare yato^eb^ti udare yato saṃyato mitabhojī, āhāre ^a^V1.0117^ea^ mattaññūti vuttaṃ hoti. iminā bhojane mattaññutāmukhena paccayapaṭisevanasīlaṃ vuttaṃ. tena kiṃ dīpeti? yathā tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, bījaṃ vapitvā sassaparipālanatthaṃ kaṇṭakavatiṃ vā rukkhavatiṃ vā pākāraparikkhepaṃ vā karosi, tena te gomahiṃsamigagaṇā pavesaṃ alabhantā sassaṃ na vilumpanti, evamahampi saddhābījaṃ vapitvā nānappakārakusalasassaparipālanatthaṃ kāyavacīāhāraguttimayaṃ tividhaparikkhepaṃ karomi. tena me rāgādiakusaladhammagomahiṃsamigagaṇā pavesaṃ alabhantā nānappakārakusalasassaṃ na vilumpantīti.

[03] ^b^saccaṃ karomi niddāna^eb^nti ettha dvīhi dvārehi avisaṃvādanaṃ ^b^saccaṃ. niddāna^eb^nti chedanaṃ lunanaṃ uppāṭanaṃ, karaṇatthe cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ. ayañhi ettha attho ``saccena karomi niddāna''nti. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? yathā tvaṃ bāhiraṃ kasiṃ kasitvā sassadūsakānaṃ tiṇānaṃ hatthena vā asitena vā niddānaṃ karosi; evamahampi ajjhattikaṃ kasiṃ kasitvā kusalasassadūsakānaṃ visaṃvādanatiṇānaṃ saccena niddānaṃ karomi. ñāṇasaccaṃ vā ettha saccanti veditabbaṃ, yaṃ taṃ yathābhūtañāṇanti vuccati. tena attasaññādīnaṃ tiṇānaṃ niddānaṃ karomīti evaṃ yojetabbaṃ. atha vā ^b^niddāna^eb^nti chedakaṃ lāvakaṃ, uppāṭakanti attho. evaṃ sante yathā tvaṃ dāsaṃ vā kammakaraṃ ^a^M1.0134^ea^ vā niddānaṃ karosi, ``niddehi tiṇānī''ti tiṇānaṃ chedakaṃ lāvakaṃ uppāṭakaṃ karosi; evamahaṃ saccaṃ karomīti upayogavacaneneva vattuṃ yujjati. atha vā ^b^sacca^eb^nti diṭṭhisaccaṃ. tamahaṃ niddānaṃ karomi, chinditabbaṃ lunitabbaṃ uppāṭetabbaṃ karomīti evampi upayogavacaneneva vattuṃ yujjati.

[03] ^b^soraccaṃ me pamocana^eb^nti ettha yaṃ taṃ ``kāyiko avītikkamo, vācasiko avītikkamo''ti, evaṃ ^a^P1.0149^ea^ sīlameva ``soracca''nti vuttaṃ, na taṃ idha adhippetaṃ, vuttameva etaṃ ``kāyagutto''tiādinā nayena, arahattaphalaṃ pana adhippetaṃ. tampi hi sundare nibbāne ratabhāvato ``soracca''nti vuccati. ^b^pamocana^eb^nti yoggavissajjanaṃ. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? yathā tava pamocanaṃ punapi sāyanhe vā dutiyadivase vā anāgatasaṃvacchare vā yojetabbato appamocanameva hoti, na mama evaṃ. na hi mama antarā mocanaṃ nāma atthi. ahañhi dīpaṅkaradasabalakālato pabhuti paññānaṅgale vīriyabalibadde yojetvā cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca mahākasiṃ kasanto tāva na muñciṃ, yāva na sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhi. yadā ca me sabbaṃ taṃ kālaṃ khepetvā bodhirukkhamūle aparājitapallaṅke nisinnassa sabbaguṇaparivāraṃ arahattaphalaṃ udapādi, tadā mayā taṃ sabbussukkapaṭippassaddhippattiyā ^a^V1.0118^ea^ pamuttaṃ, na dāni puna yojetabbaṃ bhavissatīti. etamatthaṃ sandhāyāha bhagavā -- ``soraccaṃ me pamocana''nti.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ ^b^vīriyaṃ me dhuradhorayha^eb^nti ettha ^b^vīriya^eb^nti ``kāyiko vā, cetasiko vā vīriyārambho''tiādinā nayena vuttapadhānaṃ. dhurāyaṃ dhorayhaṃ ^b^dhuradhorayhaṃ,^eb^ dhuraṃ vahatīti attho. yathā hi brāhmaṇassa dhurāyaṃ dhorayhākaḍḍhitaṃ naṅgalaṃ bhūmighanaṃ bhindati, mūlasantānakāni ca padāleti, evaṃ bhagavato vīriyākaḍḍhitaṃ paññānaṅgalaṃ yathāvuttaṃ ghanaṃ bhindati, kilesasantānakāni ca padāleti. tenāha -- ``vīriyaṃ me dhuradhorayha''nti. atha vā purimadhuraṃ vahantā dhurā, mūladhuraṃ vahantā dhorayhā; dhurā ca dhorayhā ca ^b^dhuradhorayhā^eb^. tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa ekamekasmiṃ naṅgale catubalibaddappabhedaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ vahantaṃ uppannānuppannatiṇamūlaghātaṃ sassasampattiñca sādheti, evaṃ bhagavato catusammappadhānavīriyappabhedaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ vahantaṃ uppannānuppannākusalamūlaghātaṃ kusalasampattiñca ^a^P1.0150^ea^ sādheti. tenāha -- ``vīriyaṃ me dhuradhorayha''nti.

[03] ^b^yogakkhemādhivāhana^eb^nti ^a^M1.0135^ea^ ettha yogehi khemattā ``yogakkhema''nti nibbānaṃ vuccati, taṃ adhikatvā vāhīyati, abhimukhaṃ vā vāhīyatīti adhivāhanaṃ. yogakkhemassa adhivāhanaṃ yogakkhemādhivāhanaṃ. tena kiṃ dīpeti? yathā tava dhuradhorayhaṃ puratthimaṃ disaṃ pacchimādīsu vā aññataraṃ abhimukhaṃ vāhīyati, tathā mama dhuradhorayhaṃ nibbānābhimukhaṃ vāhīyati.

[03] evaṃ vāhiyamānañca ^b^gacchati anivattantaṃ^eb^. yathā tava naṅgalaṃ vahantaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ khettakoṭiṃ patvā puna nivattati, evaṃ anivattantaṃ dīpaṅkarakālato pabhuti gacchateva. yasmā vā tena tena maggena pahīnā kilesā punappunaṃ pahātabbā na honti, yathā tava naṅgalena chinnāni tiṇāni punapi aparasmiṃ samaye chinditabbāni honti, tasmāpi etaṃ paṭhamamaggavasena diṭṭhekaṭṭhe kilese, dutiyavasena oḷārike, tatiyavasena anusahagate kilese, catutthavasena sabbakilese pajahantaṃ ^b^gacchati anivattantaṃ^eb^. atha vā ^b^gacchati anivatta^eb^nti nivattanarahitaṃ hutvā gacchatīti attho. nti taṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ. evampettha padacchedo veditabbo. evaṃ gacchantañca yathā tava dhuradhorayhaṃ na taṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati, yattha gantvā kassako asoko nissoko virajo hutvā na socati, etaṃ pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati, ^b^yattha gantvā na socati^eb^. yattha satipācanena etaṃ vīriyadhuradhorayhaṃ codento gantvā mādiso kassako asoko nissoko virajo hutvā na socati, taṃ sabbasokasallasamugghātabhūtaṃ nibbānāmatasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchatīti.
[03] 80^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^V1.0119^ea^ nigamanaṃ karonto bhagavā imaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``evamesā kasī kaṭṭhā, sā hoti amatapphalā.
[22] etaṃ kasiṃ kasitvāna, sabbadukkhā pamuccatī''ti..

[03] tassāyaṃ saṅkhepattho -- mayā brāhmaṇa ^b^esā^eb^ saddhābījā tapovuṭṭhiyā anuggahitā ^b^kasi,^eb^ paññāmayaṃ yuganaṅgalaṃ, hirimayañca īsaṃ, manomayena yottena, ekābaddhaṃ ^a^P1.0151^ea^ katvā, paññānaṅgale satiphālaṃ ākoṭetvā, satipācanaṃ gahetvā, kāyavacīāhāraguttiyā gopetvā, saccaṃ niddānaṃ katvā, soraccaṃ pamocanaṃ vīriyaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ yogakkhemābhimukhaṃ anivattantaṃ vāhentena ^b^kaṭṭhā,^eb^ kasikammapariyosānaṃ catubbidhaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ pāpitā, ^b^sā^eb^ ^a^M1.0136^ea^ ^b^hoti amatapphalā,^eb^ sā esā kasi amatapphalā hoti. amataṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, nibbānānisaṃsā hotīti attho. sā kho panesā kasi na mamevekassa amatapphalā hoti, apica, kho, pana yo koci khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā etaṃ kasiṃ kasati, so sabbopi ^b^etaṃ kasiṃ kasitvāna, sabbadukkhā pamuccati,^eb^ sabbasmā vaṭṭadukkhadukkhadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhavipariṇāmadukkhā pamuccatīti. evaṃ bhagavā brāhmaṇassa arahattanikūṭena nibbānapariyosānaṃ katvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.

[03] tato brāhmaṇo gambhīratthaṃ desanaṃ sutvā ``mama kasiphalaṃ bhuñjitvā aparajju eva chāto hoti, imassa pana kasi amatapphalā, tassā phalaṃ bhuñjitvā sabbadukkhā pamuccatī''ti ca viditvā pasanno pasannākāraṃ kātuṃ pāyāsaṃ dātumāraddho. tenāha ^b^``atha kho kasibhāradvājo''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^mahatiyā^eb^ti mahatiyanti attho. ^b^kaṃsapātiyā^eb^ti suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ, satasahassagghanake attano suvaṇṇathāle. ^b^vaḍḍhetvā^eb^ti chupitvā, ākiritvāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^bhagavato upanāmesī^eb^ti sappimadhuphāṇitādīhi vicitraṃ katvā, dukūlavitānena paṭicchādetvā, ukkhipitvā, sakkaccaṃ tathāgatassa abhihari. kinti? ^b^``bhuñjatu bhavaṃ gotamo pāyāsaṃ, kassako bhava''^eb^nti. tato kassakabhāvasādhakaṃ kāraṇamāha ^b^``yañhi...pe0... kasatī''^eb^ti, yasmā bhavaṃ...pe0... kasatīti vuttaṃ hoti. atha bhagavā ^b^``gāthābhigītaṃ me''^eb^ti āha.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^gāthābhigīta^eb^nti gāthāhi abhigītaṃ, gāthāyo bhāsitvā laddhanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^me^eb^ti mayā. ^b^abhojaneyya^eb^nti bhuñjanārahaṃ na hoti. ^b^sampassata^eb^nti sammā ājīvasuddhiṃ passataṃ ^a^P1.0152^ea^, samantā vā passataṃ sampassataṃ, buddhānanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^nesa dhammo^eb^ti ``gāthābhigītaṃ bhuñjitabba''nti ^a^V1.0120^ea^ esa dhammo etaṃ cārittaṃ na hoti, tasmā ^b^gāthābhigītaṃ panudanti buddhā^eb^ paṭikkhipanti na bhuñjantīti. kiṃ pana bhagavatā pāyāsatthaṃ gāthā abhigītā, yena evamāhāti? na etadatthaṃ abhigītā, apica, kho, pana pāto paṭṭhāya khettasamīpe ṭhatvā kaṭacchubhikkhampi alabhitvā puna sakalabuddhaguṇe pakāsetvā laddhaṃ tadetaṃ naṭanaccakādīhi naccitvā gāyitvā ca laddhasadisaṃ hoti, tena ``gāthābhigīta''nti vuttaṃ. tādisañca yasmā ^a^M1.0137^ea^ buddhānaṃ na kappati, tasmā ``abhojaneyya''nti vuttaṃ. appicchatānurūpañcetaṃ na hoti, tasmāpi pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampamānena ca evaṃ vuttaṃ. yatra ca nāma parappakāsitenāpi attano guṇena uppannaṃ lābhaṃ paṭikkhipanti seyyathāpi appiccho ghaṭikāro kumbhakāro, tatra kathaṃ koṭippattāya appicchatāya samannāgato bhagavā attanāva attano guṇappakāsanena uppannaṃ lābhaṃ sādiyissati, yato yuttameva etaṃ bhagavato vattunti.

[03] ettāvatā ``appasannaṃ adātukāmaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gāthāgāyanena dātukāmaṃ katvā, samaṇo gotamo bhojanaṃ paṭiggahesi, āmisakāraṇā imassa desanā''ti imamhā lokāpavādā attānaṃ mocento desanāpārisuddhiṃ dīpetvā, idāni ājīvapārisuddhiṃ dīpento āha ^b^``dhamme satī brāhmaṇa vuttiresā''^eb^ti tassattho -- ājīvapārisuddhidhamme vā dasavidhasucaritadhamme vā buddhānaṃ cārittadhamme vā ^b^sati^eb^ saṃvijjamāne anupahate vattamāne ^b^vuttiresā^eb^ ekantavodātā ākāse pāṇippasāraṇakappā esanā pariyesanā jīvitavutti buddhānaṃ ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ti.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vutte brāhmaṇo ``pāyāsaṃ me paṭikkhipati, akappiyaṃ kiretaṃ bhojanaṃ, adhañño vatasmiṃ, dānaṃ dātuṃ ^a^P1.0153^ea^ na labhāmī''ti domanassaṃ uppādetvā ``appeva nāma aññaṃ paṭiggaṇheyyā''ti ca cintesi. taṃ ñatvā bhagavā ``ahaṃ bhikkhācāravelaṃ paricchinditvā āgato -- `ettakena kālena imaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ pasādessāmī'ti, brāhmaṇo ca domanassaṃ akāsi. idāni tena domanassena mayi cittaṃ pakopetvā amatavaradhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkhissatī''ti brāhmaṇassa pasādajananatthaṃ tena patthitamanorathaṃ pūrento āha ^b^``aññena ca kevalina''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^kevalina^eb^nti sabbaguṇaparipuṇṇaṃ, sabbayogavisaṃyuttaṃ vāti attho. mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ esanato ^b^mahesiṃ^eb^. parikkhīṇasabbāsavattā ^b^khīṇāsavaṃ^eb^. hatthapādakukkuccamādiṃ katvā vūpasantasabbakukkuccattā ^b^kukkuccavūpasantaṃ^eb^. ^b^upaṭṭhahassū^eb^ti parivisassu paṭimānayassu. evaṃ brāhmaṇena citte uppāditepi pariyāyameva bhaṇati, na tu bhaṇati ``dehi, āharāhī''ti. sesamettha uttānameva.

[03] atha ^a^V1.0121^ea^ ^a^M1.0138^ea^ brāhmaṇo ``ayaṃ pāyāso bhagavato ānīto nāhaṃ arahāmi taṃ attano chandena kassaci dātu''nti cintetvā āha ^b^``atha kassa cāha''^eb^nti. tato bhagavā ``taṃ pāyāsaṃ ṭhapetvā tathāgataṃ tathāgatasāvakañca aññassa ajīraṇadhammo''ti ñatvā āha -- ^b^``na khvāhaṃ ta''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^sadevaka^eb^vacanena pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ, ^b^samāraka^eb^vacanena chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ, ^b^sabrahmaka^eb^vacanena rūpāvacarabrahmaggahaṇaṃ arūpāvacarā pana bhuñjeyyunti asambhāvaneyyā. ^b^sassamaṇabrāhmaṇi^eb^vacanena sāsanapaccatthikapaccāmittasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇaṃ samitapāpabāhitapāpasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇañca. ^b^pajā^eb^vacanena sattalokaggahaṇaṃ, ^b^sadevamanussa^eb^vacanena sammutidevāvasesamanussaggahaṇaṃ. evamettha tīhi vacanehi okāsaloko, dvīhi pajāvasena sattaloko gahitoti veditabbo. esa saṅkhepo, vitthāraṃ pana āḷavakasutte ^a^P1.0154^ea^ vaṇṇayissāma.

[03] kasmā pana sadevakādīsu kassaci na sammā pariṇāmaṃ gaccheyyāti? oḷārike sukhumojāpakkhipanato. imasmiñhi pāyāse bhagavantaṃ uddissa gahitamatteyeva devatāhi ojā pakkhittā yathā sujātāya pāyāse, cundassa ca sūkaramaddave paccamāne, verañjāyañca bhagavatā gahitagahitālope, bhesajjakkhandhake ca kaccānassa guḷhakumbhasmiṃ avasiṭṭhaguḷhe. so oḷārike sukhumojāpakkhipanato devānaṃ na pariṇamati. devā hi sukhumasarīrā, tesaṃ oḷāriko manussāhāro na sammā pariṇamati. manussānampi na pariṇamati. manussā hi oḷārikasarīrā, tesaṃ sukhumā dibbojā na sammā pariṇamati. tathāgatassa pana pakatiaggināva pariṇamati, sammā jīrati. kāyabalañāṇabalappabhāvenāti eke tathāgatasāvakassa khīṇāsavassetaṃ samādhibalena mattaññutāya ca pariṇamati, itaresaṃ iddhimantānampi na pariṇamati. acintanīyaṃ vā ettha kāraṇaṃ, buddhavisayo esoti.

[03] ^b^tena hi tva^eb^nti yasmā aññaṃ na passāmi, mama na kappati, mama akappantaṃ sāvakassāpi me na kappati, tasmā tvaṃ brāhmaṇāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^appaharite^eb^ti parittaharitatiṇe, apparuḷharitatiṇe vā pāsāṇapiṭṭhisadise. ^b^appāṇake^eb^ti nippāṇake, pāyāsajjhottharaṇakāraṇena maritabbapāṇarahite vā mahāudakakkhandhe. saha tiṇanissitehi pāṇehi tiṇānaṃ pāṇakānañca anurakkhaṇatthāya etaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyatī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0139^ea^ evaṃ saddaṃ karoti. ^b^saṃdhūpāyatī^eb^ti samantā dhūpāyati. ^b^sampadhūpāyatī^eb^ti tatheva adhimattaṃ dhūpāyati. kasmā evaṃ ahosīti? bhagavato ānubhāvena, na udakassa, na pāyāsassa, na brāhmaṇassa, na aññesaṃ devayakkhādīnaṃ. bhagavā hi brāhmaṇassa dhammasaṃvegatthaṃ tathā adhiṭṭhāsi. ^b^seyyathāpi nāmā^eb^ti opammanidassanamattametaṃ, yathā phāloti ettakameva ^a^P1.0155^ea^ vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^saṃviggo^eb^ cittena, ^b^lomahaṭṭhajāto^eb^ ^a^V1.0122^ea^ sarīrena. sarīre kirassa navanavutilomakūpasahassāni suvaṇṇabhittiyā āhatamaṇināgadantā viya uddhaggā ahesuṃ. sesaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03] pādesu pana nipatitvā bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ abbhanumodamāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ^b^``abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotamā''^eb^ti. abbhanumodane hi ayamidha ^b^abhikkanta^eb^ saddo. vitthārato panassa maṅgalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā āvi bhavissati. yasmā ca abbhanumodanatthe, tasmā sādhu sādhu bho gotamāti vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
[21] ``bhaye kodhe pasaṃsāyaṃ, turite kotūhalacchare.
[22] hāse soke pasāde ca, kare āmeḍitaṃ budho''ti.. --
[25] iminā ca lakkhaṇena idha pasādavasena pasaṃsāvasena cāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti veditabbo. atha vā ^b^abhikkanta^eb^nti abhikantaṃ atīṭṭhaṃ, atimanāpaṃ, atisundaranti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] tattha ekena abhikkantasaddena desanaṃ thometi, ekena attano pasādaṃ. ayañhi ettha adhippāyo -- abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanā, abhikkantaṃ yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādoti. bhagavato eva vā vacanaṃ dve dve atthe sandhāya thometi -- bhoto gotamassa vacanaṃ abhikkantaṃ dosanāsanato, abhikkantaṃ guṇādhigamanato, tathā saddhājananato, paññājananato, sātthato, sabyañjanato, uttānapadato, gambhīratthato, kaṇṇasukhato, hadayaṅgamato, anattukkaṃsanato, aparavambhanato, karuṇāsītalato, paññāvadātato, āpātharamaṇīyato, vimaddakkhamato, suyyamānasukhato, vīmaṃsiyamānahitatoti evamādīhi yojetabbaṃ.

[03] tato ^a^M1.0140^ea^ parampi catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi. tattha ^b^nikkujjita^eb^nti adhomukhaṭṭhapitaṃ, heṭṭhā mukhajātaṃ vā. ^b^ukkujjeyyā^eb^ti uparimukhaṃ kareyya. ^b^paṭicchanna^eb^nti tiṇapaṇṇādicchāditaṃ. ^b^vivareyyā^eb^ti ugghāṭeyya. ^b^mūḷhassā^eb^ti disāmūḷhassa. ^b^maggaṃ ācikkheyyā^eb^ti hatthe gahetvā ^a^P1.0156^ea^ ``esa maggo''ti vadeyya. ^b^andhakāre^eb^ti kāḷapakkhacātuddasīaḍḍharattaghanavanasaṇḍameghapaṭalehi caturaṅge tamasi. ayaṃ tāva padattho.

[03] ayaṃ pana adhippāyayojanā -- yathā koci nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyya, evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ ^a^V1.0123^ea^ asaddhammapatitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena, yathā paṭicchannaṃ vivareyya; evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānā pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantena, yathā mūḷhassa maggaṃ ācikkheyya, evaṃ kummaggamicchāmaggapaṭipannassa me saggamokkhamaggaṃ ācikkhantena, yathā andhakāre telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya, evaṃ mohandhakāranimuggassa me buddhādiratanarūpāni apassato tappaṭicchādakamohandhakāraviddhaṃsakadesanāpajjotadhāraṇena mayhaṃ bhotā gotamena etehi pariyāyehi desitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.

[03] atha vā ekacciyena mattena yasmā ayaṃ dhammo dukkhadassanena asubhe ``subha''nti vipallāsappahānena ca nikkujjitukkujjitasadiso, samudayadassanena dukkhe ``sukha''nti vipallāsappahānena ca paṭicchannavivaraṇasadiso, nirodhadassanena anicce ``nicca''nti vipallāsappahānena ca mūḷhassa maggācikkhaṇasadiso, maggadassanena anattani ``attā''ti vipallāsappahānena ca andhakāre pajjotasadiso, tasmā seyyathāpi nāma nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya...pe0... pajjotaṃ dhāreyya ``cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī''ti, evaṃ pakāsito hoti.

[03] yasmā panettha saddhātapakāyaguttatādīhi sīlakkhandho pakāsito hoti, paññāya paññākkhandho, hirimanādīhi samādhikkhandho, yogakkhemena nirodhoti evaṃ tikkhandho ariyamaggo nirodho cāti sarūpeneva dve ariyasaccāni pakāsitāni. tattha maggo paṭipakkho samudayassa, nirodho dukkhassāti paṭipakkhena dve. iti iminā pariyāyena cattāri saccāni pakāsitāni. tasmā anekapariyāyena pakāsito hotīti veditabbo ^a^P1.0157^ea^.

[03] ^b^esāha^eb^ntiādīsu ^a^M1.0141^ea^ eso ahanti esāhaṃ. ^b^saraṇaṃ gacchāmī^eb^ti pādesu nipatitvā paṇipātena saraṇagamanena gatopi idāni vācāya samādiyanto āha. atha vā paṇipātena buddhaṃyeva saraṇaṃ gatoti idāni taṃ ādiṃ katvā sese dhammasaṅghepi gantuṃ āha. ^b^ajjatagge^eb^ti ajjataṃ ādiṃ katvā, ajjadaggeti vā pāṭho, da-kāro padasandhikaro, ajja aggaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti. pāṇehi upetaṃ ^b^pāṇupetaṃ,^eb^ yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattati, tāva upetaṃ, anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu jānātūti vuttaṃ hoti. ettāvatā anena sutānurūpā paṭipatti dassitā hoti. nikkujjitādīhi vā satthusampattiṃ dassetvā iminā ``esāha''ntiādinā sissasampatti dassitā. tena vā paññāpaṭilābhaṃ dassetvā iminā saddhāpaṭilābho dassito. idāni evaṃ paṭiladdhasaddhena paññavatā yaṃ ^a^V1.0124^ea^ kattabbaṃ, taṃ kattukāmo bhagavantaṃ yācati ^b^``labheyyāha''^eb^nti. tattha bhagavato iddhiyādīhi abhippasāditacitto ``bhagavāpi cakkavattirajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito, kimaṅgaṃ panāha''nti saddhāya pabbajjaṃ yācati, tattha paripūrakāritaṃ patthento paññāya upasampadaṃ. sesaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03] ^b^eko vūpakaṭṭho^eb^tiādīsu pana ^b^eko^eb^ kāyavivekena, ^b^vūpakaṭṭho^eb^ cittavivekena, ^b^appamatto^eb^ kammaṭṭhāne satiavijahanena, ^b^ātāpī^eb^ kāyikacetasikavīriyasaṅkhātena ātāpena, ^b^pahitatto^eb^ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhatāya ^b^viharanto^eb^ aññatarairiyāpathavihārena. ^b^na cirassevā^eb^ti pabbajjaṃ upādāya vuccati. ^b^kulaputtā^eb^ti duvidhā kulaputtā, jātikulaputtā, ācārakulaputtā ca. ayaṃ pana ubhayathāpi kulaputto. ^b^agārasmā^eb^ti gharā. agārānaṃ hitaṃ agāriyaṃ kasigorakkhādikuṭumbaposanakammaṃ vuccati. natthi ettha agāriyanti ^b^anagāriyaṃ,^eb^ pabbajjāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ ^b^pabbajantī^eb^ti upagacchanti upasaṅkamanti. ^b^tadanuttara^eb^nti taṃ anuttaraṃ. ^b^brahmacariyapariyosāna^eb^nti maggabrahmacariyassa pariyosānaṃ, arahattaphalanti ^a^P1.0158^ea^ vuttaṃ hoti. tassa hi atthāya kulaputtā pabbajanti. ^b^diṭṭheva dhamme^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva attabhāve. ^b^sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā^eb^ti attanāyeva paññāya paccakkhaṃ katvā, aparappaccayaṃ ñatvāti attho. ^b^upasampajja vihāsī^eb^ti pāpuṇitvā sampādetvā vā vihāsi. evaṃ viharanto ca ^b^khīṇā jāti...pe0... abbhaññāsi^eb^. etenassa paccavekkhaṇabhūmiṃ dasseti.

[03] katamā ^a^M1.0142^ea^ panassa jāti khīṇā, kathañca naṃ abbhaññāsīti? vuccate -- na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva khīṇattā, na anāgatā anāgate vāyāmābhāvato, na paccuppannā vijjamānattā. yā pana maggassa abhāvitattā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti, sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā. taṃ so maggabhāvanāya pahīnakilese paccavekkhitvā kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ apaṭisandhikaṃ hotīti jānanto jānāti.

[03] ^b^vusita^eb^nti vutthaṃ parivutthaṃ, kataṃ caritaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti maggabrahmacariyaṃ. ^b^kataṃ karaṇīya^eb^nti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho. ^b^nāparaṃ itthattāyā^eb^ti idāni puna itthabhāvāya evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāya kilesakkhayāya vā maggabhāvanā natthīti. atha vā ^b^itthattāyā^eb^ti itthabhāvato, imasmā evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ natthi. ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlako rukkho viyāti abbhaññāsi. ^b^aññataro^eb^ti ^a^V1.0125^ea^ eko. ^b^arahata^eb^nti arahantānaṃ. mahāsāvakānaṃ abbhantaro āyasmā bhāradvājo ahosīti ayaṃ kirettha adhippāyoti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya kasibhāradvājasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ ^b^pucchāmi^eb^ ^a^V1.0126^ea^ ^a^P1.0159^ea^ ^b^muniṃ pahūtapañña^eb^nti cundasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? saṅkhepato tāva attajjhāsayaparajjhāsayāṭṭhuppattipucchāvasikabhedato catūsu uppattīsu imassa suttassa pucchāvasikā uppatti. vitthārato pana ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā mallesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ yena pāvā tadavasari. tatra sudaṃ bhagavā pāvāyaṃ viharati cundassa kammāraputtassa ambavane. ito pabhuti yāva ``atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena yena cundassa ^a^M1.0143^ea^ kammāraputtassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdī''ti (dī0 ni0 2.189), tāva sutte āgatanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03] evaṃ bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ nisinne bhagavati cundo kammāraputto buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisanto byañjanasūpādigahaṇatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ suvaṇṇabhājanāni upanāmesi. apaññatte sikkhāpade keci bhikkhū suvaṇṇabhājanāni paṭicchiṃsu keci na paṭicchiṃsu. bhagavato pana ekameva bhājanaṃ attano selamayaṃ pattaṃ, dutiyabhājanaṃ buddhā na gaṇhanti. tattha aññataro pāpabhikkhu sahassagghanakaṃ suvaṇṇabhājanaṃ attano bhojanatthāya sampattaṃ theyyacittena kuñcikatthavikāya pakkhipi. cundo parivisitvā hatthapādaṃ dhovitvā bhagavantaṃ namassamāno bhikkhusaṅghaṃ olokento taṃ bhikkhuṃ addasa, disvā ca pana apassamāno viya hutvā na naṃ kiñci abhaṇi bhagavati theresu ca gāravena, apica ``micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ vacanapatho mā ahosī''ti. so ``kiṃ nu kho saṃvarayuttāyeva samaṇā, udāhu bhinnasaṃvarā īdisāpi samaṇā''ti ñātukāmo sāyanhasamaye bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha ^b^``pucchāmi muni''^eb^nti.

[03] tattha ^b^pucchāmī^eb^ti idaṃ ``tisso pucchā adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā''tiādinā ^a^P1.0160^ea^ (cūḷani0 puṇṇakamāṇavapucchāniddesa 12) nayena niddese vuttanayameva. ^b^muni^eb^nti etampi ``monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ. yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... sammādiṭṭhi, tena ñāṇena samannāgato muni, monappattoti, tīṇi moneyyāni kāyamoneyya''ntiādinā (mahāni0 14) nayena tattheva vuttanayameva ^a^V1.0127^ea^. ayampanettha saṅkhepo. ^b^pucchāmī^eb^ti okāsaṃ kārento ^b^muni^eb^nti munimuniṃ bhagavantaṃ ālapati. ^b^pahūtapañña^eb^ntiādīni thutivacanāni, tehi taṃ muniṃ thunāti. tattha ^b^pahūtapañña^eb^nti vipulapaññaṃ. ñeyyapariyantikattā cassa vipulatā veditabbā. ^b^iti cundo kammāraputto^eb^ti idaṃ dvayaṃ dhaniyasutte vuttanayameva. ito paraṃ pana ettakampi avatvā sabbaṃ vuttanayaṃ chaḍḍetvā avuttanayameva vaṇṇayissāma.

[03] ^b^buddha^eb^nti tīsu buddhesu tatiyabuddhaṃ. ^b^dhammassāmi^eb^nti maggadhammassa janakattā puttasseva pitaraṃ attanā uppāditasippāyatanādīnaṃ viya ca ācariyaṃ dhammassa sāmiṃ, dhammissaraṃ dhammarājaṃ dhammavasavattinti attho. vuttampi cetaṃ --

[02] ``so ^a^M1.0144^ea^ hi, brāhmaṇa, bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā, asañjātassa maggassa sañjanetā, anakkhātassa maggassa akkhātā, maggaññū, maggavidū, maggakovido. maggānugā ca pana etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.79).

[03] ^b^vītataṇha^eb^nti vigatakāmabhavavibhavataṇhaṃ. ^b^dvipaduttama^eb^nti dvipadānaṃ uttamaṃ. tattha kiñcāpi bhagavā na kevalaṃ dvipaduttamo eva, atha kho yāvatā sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā...pe0... nevasaññīnāsaññino vā, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ uttamo. atha kho ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena dvipaduttamotveva vuccati. dvipadā hi sabbasattānaṃ ukkaṭṭhā cakkavattimahāsāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ tattha uppattito, tesañca uttamoti vutte sabbasattuttamoti ^a^P1.0161^ea^ vuttoyeva hoti. ^b^sārathīnaṃ pavara^eb^nti sāretīti ^b^sārathi,^eb^ hatthidamakādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. tesañca bhagavā ^b^pavaro^eb^ anuttarena damanena purisadamme dametuṃ samatthabhāvato. yathāha --

[02] ``hatthidamakena, bhikkhave, hatthidammo sārito ekaṃ eva disaṃ dhāvati puratthimaṃ vā pacchimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā dakkhiṇaṃ vā. assadamakena, bhikkhave, assadammo...pe0... godamakena, bhikkhave, godammo...pe0... dakkhiṇaṃ vā. tathāgatena hi, bhikkhave, arahatā sammāsambuddhena purisadammo sārito aṭṭha disā vidhāvati, rūpī rūpāni passati, ayamekā disā...pe0... saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati, ayaṃ aṭṭhamī disā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.312).

[02] ^b^katī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0128^ea^ atthappabhedapucchā. ^b^loke^eb^ti sattaloke. ^b^samaṇā^eb^ti pucchitabbātthanidassanaṃ. ^b^iṅghā^eb^ti yācanatthe nipāto. ^b^tadiṅghā^eb^ti te iṅgha. ^b^brūhī^eb^ti ācikkha kathayassūti.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vutte bhagavā cundaṃ kammāraputtaṃ ``kiṃ, bhante, kusalaṃ, kiṃ akusala''ntiādinā (ma0 ni0 3.296) nayena gihipañhaṃ apucchitvā samaṇapañhaṃ pucchantaṃ disvā āvajjento ``taṃ pāpabhikkhuṃ sandhāya ayaṃ pucchatī''ti ñatvā tassa aññatra vohāramattā assamaṇabhāvaṃ dīpento āha ^b^``caturo samaṇā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^caturo^eb^ti saṅkhyāparicchedo. ^b^samaṇā^eb^ti kadāci ^a^M1.0145^ea^ bhagavā titthiye samaṇavādena vadati; yathāha -- ``yāni tāni puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vatakotūhalamaṅgalānī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.407). kadāci puthujjane; yathāha -- ``samaṇā samaṇāti kho, bhikkhave, jano sañjānātī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.435). kadāci sekkhe; yathāha -- ``idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo''ti (ma0 ni0 1.139; dī0 ni0 2.214; a0 ni0 4.241). kadāci khīṇāsave; yathāha -- ``āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.438). kadāci attānaṃyeva; yathāha -- ``samaṇoti kho, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana''nti (a0 ni0 8.85). idha pana tīhi padehi sabbepi ariye sīlavantaṃ puthujjanañca ^a^P1.0162^ea^, catutthena itaraṃ assamaṇampi bhaṇḍuṃ kāsāvakaṇṭhaṃ kevalaṃ vohāramattakena samaṇoti saṅgaṇhitvā ``caturo samaṇā''ti āha. ^b^na pañcamatthī^eb^ti imasmiṃ dhammavinaye vohāramattakena paṭiññāmattakenāpi pañcamo samaṇo nāma natthi.

[03] ^b^te te āvikaromī^eb^ti te caturo samaṇe tava pākaṭe karomi. ^b^sakkhipuṭṭho^eb^ti sammukhā pucchito. ^b^maggajino^eb^ti maggena sabbakilese vijitāvīti attho. ^b^maggadesako^eb^ti paresaṃ maggaṃ desetā. ^b^magge jīvatī^eb^ti sattasu sekkhesu yo koci sekkho apariyositamaggavāsattā lokuttare, sīlavantaputhujjano ca lokiye magge jīvati nāma, sīlavantaputhujjano vā lokuttaramagganimittaṃ jīvanatopi magge jīvatīti veditabbo. ^b^yo ca maggadūsī^eb^ti yo ca dussīlo micchādiṭṭhi maggapaṭilomāya paṭipattiyā maggadūsakoti attho.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ ``ime te caturo samaṇā''ti evaṃ bhagavatā saṅkhepena uddiṭṭhe caturo samaṇe ``ayaṃ nāmettha maggajino, ayaṃ maggadesako, ayaṃ magge jīvati, ayaṃ maggadūsī''ti evaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ asakkonto puna pucchituṃ cundo āha ^b^``kaṃ maggajina''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^magge jīvati me^eb^ti yo so magge jīvati, taṃ me brūhi puṭṭhoti. sesaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ idānissa bhagavā ^a^V1.0129^ea^ caturopi samaṇe catūhi gāthāhi niddisanto āha ^b^``yo tiṇṇakathaṃkatho visallo''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^tiṇṇakathaṃkatho visallo^eb^ti etaṃ uragasutte vuttanayameva. ayaṃ pana viseso. yasmā imāya gāthāya maggajinoti buddhasamaṇo adhippeto, tasmā sabbaññutaññāṇena ^a^M1.0146^ea^ kathaṃkathāpatirūpakassa sabbadhammesu aññāṇassa tiṇṇattāpi ``tiṇṇakathaṃkatho''ti veditabbo. pubbe vuttanayena hi tiṇṇakathaṃkathāpi sotāpannādayo paccekabuddhapariyosānā sakadāgāmivisayādīsu buddhavisayapariyosānesu paṭihatañāṇappabhāvattā pariyāyena atiṇṇakathaṃkathāva ^a^P1.0163^ea^ honti. bhagavā pana sabbappakārena tiṇṇakathaṃkathoti. ^b^nibbānābhirato^eb^ti nibbāne abhirato, phalasamāpattivasena sadā nibbānaninnacittoti attho. tādiso ca bhagavā. yathāha --
[02] ``so kho ahaṃ, aggivessana, tassā eva kathāya pariyosāne, tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi, sannisādemi, ekodiṃ karomi, samādahāmī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.387).

[03] ^b^anānugiddho^eb^ti kañci dhammaṃ taṇhāgedhena ananugijjhanto. ^b^lokassa sadevakassa netā^eb^ti āsayānusayānulomena dhammaṃ desetvā pārāyanamahāsamayādīsu anekesu suttantesu aparimāṇānaṃ devamanussānaṃ saccapaṭivedhasampādanena sadevakassa lokassa netā, gamayitā, tāretā, pāraṃ sampāpetāti attho. ^b^tādi^eb^nti tādisaṃ yathāvuttappakāralokadhammehi nibbikāranti attho. sesamettha pākaṭameva.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ evaṃ bhagavā imāya gāthāya ``maggajina''nti buddhasamaṇaṃ niddisitvā idāni khīṇāsavasamaṇaṃ niddisanto āha ^b^``paramaṃ paramantī''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^paramaṃ^eb^ nāma nibbānaṃ, sabbadhammānaṃ aggaṃ uttamanti attho. ^b^paramanti yodha ñatvā^eb^ti taṃ paramaṃ paramamicceva yo idha sāsane ñatvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena. ^b^akkhāti vibhajate idheva dhamma^eb^nti nibbānadhammaṃ akkhāti, attanā paṭividdhattā paresaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti ``idaṃ nibbāna''nti, maggadhammaṃ vibhajati ``ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā...pe0... ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo''ti. ubhayampi vā ugghaṭitaññūnaṃ saṅkhepadesanāya ācikkhati, vipañcitaññūnaṃ vitthāradesanāya vibhajati. evaṃ ācikkhanto vibhajanto ca ``idheva sāsane ayaṃ dhammo, na ito bahiddhā''ti sīhanādaṃ nadanto akkhāti ca vibhajati ca. tena vuttaṃ ``akkhāti vibhajate idheva dhamma''nti. ^b^taṃ kaṅkhachidaṃ muniṃ aneja^eb^nti taṃ evarūpaṃ catusaccapaṭivedhena ^a^P1.0164^ea^ attano, desanāya ca paresaṃ kaṅkhacchedanena kaṅkhacchidaṃ ^a^M1.0147^ea^, moneyyasamannāgamena muniṃ, ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya abhāvato anejaṃ ^b^dutiyaṃ bhikkhunamāhu maggadesi^eb^nti.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^V1.0130^ea^ imāya gāthāya sayaṃ anuttaraṃ maggaṃ uppādetvā desanāya anuttaro maggadesī samānopi dūtamiva lekhavācakamiva ca rañño attano sāsanaharaṃ sāsanajotakañca ``maggadesi''nti khīṇāsavasamaṇaṃ niddisitvā idāni sekkhasamaṇañca sīlavantaputhujjanasamaṇañca niddisanto āha ^b^``yo dhammapade''^eb^ti. tattha padavaṇṇanā pākaṭāyeva. ayaṃ panettha atthavaṇṇanā -- yo nibbānadhammassa padattā ^b^dhammapade,^eb^ ubho ante anupagamma desitattā āsayānurūpato vā satipaṭṭhānādinānappakārehi desitattā ^b^sudesite,^eb^ maggasamaṅgīpi anavasitamaggakiccattā ^b^magge jīvati,^eb^ sīlasaṃyamena ^b^saññato,^eb^ kāyādīsu sūpaṭṭhitāya cirakatādisaraṇāya vā satiyā ^b^satimā,^eb^ aṇumattassāpi vajjassa abhāvato anavajjattā, koṭṭhāsabhāvena ca padattā sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhātāni ^b^anavajjapadāni^eb^ bhaṅgañāṇato pabhuti bhāvanāsevanāya ^b^sevamāno,^eb^ taṃ ^b^bhikkhunaṃ tatiyaṃ maggajīvi^eb^nti ^b^āhū^eb^ti.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ evaṃ bhagavā imāya gāthāya ``maggajīvi''nti sekkhasamaṇaṃ sīlavantaputhujjanasamaṇañca niddisitvā idāni taṃ bhaṇḍuṃ kāsāvakaṇṭhaṃ kevalaṃ vohāramattasamaṇaṃ niddisanto āha ^b^``chadanaṃ katvānā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^chadanaṃ katvānā^eb^ti patirūpaṃ karitvā, vesaṃ gahetvā, liṅgaṃ dhāretvāti attho. ^b^subbatāna^eb^nti buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ. tesañhi sundarāni vatāni, tasmā te subbatāti vuccanti. ^b^pakkhandī^eb^ti pakkhandako, anto pavisakoti attho. dussīlo hi gūthapaṭicchādanatthaṃ tiṇapaṇṇādicchadanaṃ viya attano dussīlabhāvaṃ paṭicchādanatthaṃ subbatānaṃ chadanaṃ ^a^P1.0165^ea^ katvā ``ahampi bhikkhū''ti bhikkhumajjhe pakkhandati, ``ettakavassena bhikkhunā gahetabbaṃ eta''nti lābhe dīyamāne ``ahaṃ ettakavasso''ti gaṇhituṃ pakkhandati, tena vuccati ``chadanaṃ katvāna subbatānaṃ pakkhandī''ti. catunnampi khattiyādikulānaṃ uppannaṃ pasādaṃ ananurūpapaṭipattiyā dūsetīti ^b^kuladūsako. pagabbho^eb^ti aṭṭhaṭṭhānena kāyapāgabbhiyena, catuṭṭhānena vacīpāgabbhiyena, anekaṭṭhānena manopāgabbhiyena ca samannāgatoti attho. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāraṃ pana mettasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vakkhāma.

[03] katapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya ^a^M1.0148^ea^ māyāya samannāgatattā ^b^māyāvī^eb^. sīlasaṃyamābhāvena ^b^asaññato^eb^. palāpasadisattā ^b^palāpo^eb^. yathā hi palāpo anto taṇḍularahitopi bahi thusena vīhi viya dissati, evamidhekacco anto sīlādiguṇasāravirahitopi bahi subbatacchadanena samaṇavesena samaṇo viya dissati. so evaṃ palāpasadisattā ``palāpo''ti vuccati. ānāpānassatisutte pana ``apalāpāyaṃ, bhikkhave, parisā, nippalāpāyaṃ, bhikkhave, parisā, suddhā sāre patiṭṭhitā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.146) evaṃ puthujjanakalyāṇopi ``palāpo''ti vutto ^a^V1.0131^ea^. idha pana kapilasutte ca ``tato palāpe vāhetha, assamaṇe samaṇamānine''ti (su0 ni0 284) evaṃ parājitako ``palāpo''ti vutto. ^b^patirūpena caraṃ samaggadūsī^eb^ti taṃ subbatānaṃ chadanaṃ katvā yathā carantaṃ ``āraññiko ayaṃ rukkhamūliko, paṃsukūliko, piṇḍapātiko, appiccho, santuṭṭho''ti jano jānāti, evaṃ patirūpena yuttarūpena bāhiramaṭṭhena ācārena caranto puggalo attano lokuttaramaggassa, paresaṃ sugatimaggassa ca dūsanato ``maggadūsī''ti veditabbo.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ evaṃ imāya gāthāya ``maggadūsī''ti dussīlaṃ vohāramattakasamaṇaṃ niddisitvā idāni tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ abyāmissībhāvaṃ dīpento āha ^b^``ete ca paṭivijjhī''^eb^ti. tassattho -- ete caturo samaṇe yathāvuttena ^a^P1.0166^ea^ lakkhaṇena ^b^paṭivijjhi^eb^ aññāsi sacchākāsi ^b^yo gahaṭṭho^eb^ khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā añño vā koci, imesaṃ catunnaṃ samaṇānaṃ lakkhaṇassavanamattena ^b^sutavā,^eb^ tasseva lakkhaṇassa ariyānaṃ santike sutattā ^b^ariyasāvako,^eb^ teyeva samaṇe ``ayañca ayañca evaṃlakkhaṇo''ti pajānanamattena ^b^sappañño,^eb^ yādiso ayaṃ pacchā vutto maggadūsī, itarepi ^b^sabbe netādisāti ñatvā iti disvā^eb^ evaṃ pāpaṃ karontampi etaṃ pāpabhikkhuṃ disvā. tatthāyaṃ yojanā -- ete ca paṭivijjhi yo gahaṭṭho sutavā ariyasāvako sappañño, tassa tāya paññāya sabbe ``netādisā''ti ñatvā viharato iti disvā na hāpeti saddhā, evaṃ pāpakammaṃ karontaṃ pāpabhikkhuṃ disvāpi na hāpeti, na hāyati, na nassati saddhāti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M1.0149^ea^ imāya gāthāya tesaṃ abyāmissībhāvaṃ dīpetvā idāni iti disvāpi ``sabbe netādisā''ti jānantaṃ ariyasāvakaṃ pasaṃsanto āha ^b^``kathañhi duṭṭhenā''^eb^ti. tassa sambandho -- etadeva ca yuttaṃ sutavato ariyasāvakassa, yadidaṃ ekaccaṃ pāpaṃ karontaṃ iti disvāpi sabbe ``netādisā''ti jānanaṃ. kiṃ kāraṇā? kathañhi duṭṭhena asampaduṭṭhaṃ, suddhaṃ asuddhena samaṃ kareyyāti? tassattho -- kathañhi sutavā ariyasāvako sappañño, sīlavipattiyā duṭṭhena maggadūsinā aduṭṭhaṃ itaraṃ samaṇattayaṃ, suddhaṃ samaṇattayamevaṃ aparisuddhakāyasamācāratādīhi asuddhena pacchimena vohāramattakasamaṇena samaṃ kareyya sadisanti jāneyyāti. suttapariyosāne upāsakassa maggo vā phalaṃ vā na kathitaṃ. kaṅkhāmattameva hi tassa pahīnanti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya cundasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0132^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti parābhavasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? maṅgalasuttaṃ kira sutvā devānaṃ etadahosi -- ``bhagavatā maṅgalasutte sattānaṃ vuḍḍhiñca sotthiñca kathayamānena ekaṃsena bhavo eva kathito, no parābhavo. handa dāni yena sattā parihāyanti vinassanti, taṃ nesaṃ parābhavampi ^a^P1.0167^ea^ pucchāmā''ti. atha maṅgalasuttaṃ kathitadivasato dutiyadivase dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatāyo parābhavasuttaṃ sotukāmā imasmiṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipatitvā ekavālaggakoṭiokāsamatte dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi saṭṭhipi sattatipi asītipi sukhumattabhāve nimminitvā sabbadevamārabrahmāno siriyā ca tejena ca adhigayha virocamānaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu. tato sakkena devānamindena āṇatto aññataro devaputto bhagavantaṃ parābhavapañhaṃ pucchi. atha bhagavā pucchāvasena imaṃ suttamabhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0150^ea^ ``evaṃ me suta''ntiādi āyasmatā ānandena vuttaṃ. ``parābhavantaṃ purisa''ntiādinā nayena ekantarikā gāthā devaputtena vuttā, ``suvijāno bhavaṃ hotī''tiādinā nayena ekantarikā eva avasānagāthā ca bhagavatā vuttā, tadetaṃ sabbampi samodhānetvā ``parābhavasutta''nti vuccati. tattha ``evaṃ me suta''ntiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ maṅgalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vakkhāma.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ ^b^parābhavantaṃ purisa^eb^ntiādīsu pana ^b^parābhavanta^eb^nti parihāyantaṃ vinassantaṃ. ^b^purisa^eb^nti yaṃkiñci sattaṃ jantuṃ. ^b^mayaṃ pucchāma^eb^ ^b^gotamā^eb^ti sesadevehi saddhiṃ attānaṃ nidassetvā okāsaṃ kārento so devaputto gottena bhagavantaṃ ālapati. ^b^bhavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgammā^eb^ti mayañhi bhavantaṃ pucchissāmāti tato tato cakkavāḷā āgatāti attho. etena ādaraṃ dasseti. ^b^kiṃ parābhavato mukha^eb^nti evaṃ āgatānaṃ amhākaṃ brūhi parābhavato purisassa kiṃ mukhaṃ, kiṃ dvāraṃ, kā yoni, kiṃ kāraṇaṃ, yena mayaṃ parābhavantaṃ purisaṃ jāneyyāmāti attho. etena ``parābhavantaṃ purisa''nti ettha vuttassa parābhavato purisassa parābhavakāraṇaṃ pucchati. parābhavakāraṇe hi ñāte tena kāraṇasāmaññena sakkā yo koci parābhavapuriso jānitunti ^a^P1.0168^ea^.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ athassa ^a^V1.0133^ea^ bhagavā suṭṭhu pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ dassetvā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya parābhavamukhaṃ dīpento āha ^b^``suvijāno bhava''^eb^nti. tassattho -- yvāyaṃ ^b^bhavaṃ^eb^ vaḍḍhanto aparihāyanto puriso, so ^b^suvijāno hoti,^eb^ sukhena akasirena akicchena sakkā vijānituṃ. yopāyaṃ parābhavatīti ^b^parābhavo,^eb^ parihāyati vinassati, yassa tumhe parābhavato purisassa mukhaṃ maṃ pucchatha, sopi ^b^suvijāno^eb^. kathaṃ? ayañhi ^b^dhammakāmo bhavaṃ hoti^eb^ dasakusalakammapathadhammaṃ kāmeti, piheti, pattheti, suṇāti, paṭipajjati, so taṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā sutvā ca jānitabbato suvijāno hoti. itaropi ^b^dhammadessī parābhavo,^eb^ tameva dhammaṃ dessati, na kāmeti, na piheti, na pattheti, na suṇāti, na paṭipajjati, so taṃ vippaṭipattiṃ disvā sutvā ca jānitabbato suvijāno hotīti. evamettha bhagavā paṭipakkhaṃ dassento atthato dhammakāmataṃ bhavato mukhaṃ dassetvā dhammadessitaṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^M1.0151^ea^ sā devatā bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandamānā āha ^b^``iti heta''^eb^nti. tassattho -- iti hi yathā vutto bhagavatā, tatheva etaṃ vijānāma, gaṇhāma, dhārema, ^b^paṭhamo so parābhavo^eb^ so dhammadessitālakkhaṇo paṭhamo parābhavo. yāni mayaṃ parābhavamukhāni vijānituṃ āgatamhā, tesu idaṃ tāva ekaṃ parābhavamukhanti vuttaṃ hoti. tattha viggaho, parābhavanti etenāti parābhavo. kena ca parābhavanti? yaṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ, kāraṇaṃ, tena. byañjanamattena eva hi ettha nānākaraṇaṃ, atthato pana parābhavoti vā parābhavato mukhanti vā nānākaraṇaṃ natthi. evamekaṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ vijānāmāti abhinanditvā tato paraṃ ñātukāmatāyāha ^b^``dutiyaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukha''^eb^nti. ito parañca ^b^tatiyaṃ catuttha^eb^ntiādīsupi imināva nayenattho veditabbo.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ byākaraṇapakkhepi ca yasmā ^a^P1.0169^ea^ te te sattā tehi tehi parābhavamukhehi samannāgatā, na ekoyeva sabbehi, na ca sabbe ekeneva, tasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ tāni tāni parābhavamukhāni dassetuṃ ^b^``asantassa piyā hontī''^eb^tiādinā nayena puggalādhiṭṭhānāya eva desanāya nānāvidhāni parābhavamukhāni byākāsīti veditabbā.

[03] tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepato atthavaṇṇanā -- ^b^asanto^eb^ nāma cha satthāro, ye vā panaññepi avūpasantena kāyavacīmanokammena samannāgatā, te asanto assapiyā honti sunakkhattādīnaṃ acelakakorakhattiyādayo viya. ^b^santo^eb^ nāma buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakā. ye vā panaññepi vūpasantena ^a^V1.0134^ea^ kāyavacīmanokammena samannāgatā, te ^b^sante na kurute piyaṃ,^eb^ attano piye iṭṭhe kante manāpe na kuruteti attho. veneyyavasena hettha vacanabhedo katoti veditabbo. atha vā ^b^sante na kurute^eb^ti sante na sevatīti attho, yathā ``rājānaṃ sevatī''ti etasmiñhi atthe rājānaṃ piyaṃ kuruteti saddavidū mantenti. ^b^piya^eb^nti piyamāno, tussamāno, modamānoti attho. ^b^asataṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0152^ea^ ^b^dhammo^eb^ nāma dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni, dasākusalakammapathā vā. taṃ asataṃ dhammaṃ ^b^roceti,^eb^ piheti, pattheti, sevati. evametāya gāthāya asantapiyatā, santāppiyatā, asaddhammarocanañcāti tividhaṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ vuttaṃ. etena hi samannāgato puriso parābhavati parihāyati, neva idha na huraṃ vuḍḍhiṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmā ``parābhavato mukha''nti vuccati. vitthāraṃ panettha ``asevanā ca bālānaṃ, paṇḍitānañca sevanā''ti gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vakkhāma.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ ^b^niddāsīlī^eb^ nāma yo gacchantopi, nisīdantopi, tiṭṭhantopi, sayānopi niddāyatiyeva. ^b^sabhāsīlī^eb^ nāma saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ, bhassārāmatamanuyutto. ^b^anuṭṭhātā^eb^ti vīriyatejavirahito uṭṭhānasīlo na hoti, aññehi codiyamāno gahaṭṭho vā samāno gahaṭṭhakammaṃ ^a^P1.0170^ea^, pabbajito vā pabbajitakammaṃ ārabhati. ^b^alaso^eb^ti jātialaso, accantābhibhūto thinena ṭhitaṭṭhāne ṭhito eva hoti, nisinnaṭṭhāne nisinno eva hoti, attano ussāhena aññaṃ iriyāpathaṃ na kappeti. atīte araññe aggimhi uṭṭhite apalāyanālasā cettha nidassanaṃ. ayamettha ukkaṭṭhaparicchedo, tato lāmakaparicchedenāpi pana alaso alasotveva veditabbo. dhajova rathassa, dhūmova aggino, kodho paññāṇamassāti ^b^kodhapaññāṇo^eb^. dosacarito khippakopī arukūpamacitto puggalo evarūpo hoti. imāya gāthāya niddāsīlatā, sabhāsīlatā, anuṭṭhānatā, alasatā, kodhapaññāṇatāti pañcavidhaṃ parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ. etena hi samannāgato neva gahaṭṭho gahaṭṭhavuḍḍhiṃ, na pabbajito pabbajitavuḍḍhiṃ pāpuṇāti, aññadatthu parihāyatiyeva parābhavatiyeva, tasmā ``parābhavato mukha''nti vuccati.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ ^b^mātā^eb^ti janikā veditabbā. ^b^pitā^eb^ti janakoyeva. ^b^jiṇṇakaṃ^eb^ sarīrasithilatāya. ^b^gatayobbanaṃ^eb^ yobbanātikkamena āsītikaṃ vā nāvutikaṃ vā sayaṃ kammāni kātumasamatthaṃ. ^b^pahu santo^eb^ti samattho samāno sukhaṃ jīvamāno. ^b^na bharatī^eb^ti na poseti. imāya gāthāya mātāpitūnaṃ abharaṇaṃ, aposanaṃ, anupaṭṭhānaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ. etena hi samannāgato yaṃ taṃ --
[21] ``tāya ^a^M1.0153^ea^ ^a^V1.0135^ea^ naṃ pāricariyāya, mātāpitūsu paṇḍitā.
[22] idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodatī''ti.. (itivu0 106; a0 ni0 4.63) --

[25] mātāpitubharaṇe ānisaṃsaṃ vuttaṃ. taṃ na pāpuṇāti, aññadatthu ``mātāpitaropi na bharati, kaṃ aññaṃ bharissatī''ti nindañca vajjanīyatañca duggatiñca pāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva, tasmā ``parābhavato mukha''nti vuccati.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ pāpānaṃ bāhitattā ^b^brāhmaṇaṃ,^eb^ samitattā ^b^samaṇaṃ^eb^. brāhmaṇakulappabhavampi vā brāhmaṇaṃ, pabbajjupagataṃ ^a^P1.0171^ea^ samaṇaṃ, tato ^b^aññaṃ vāpi^eb^ yaṃkiñci yācanakaṃ. ^b^musāvādena vañcetī^eb^ti ``vada, bhante, paccayenā''ti pavāretvā yācito vā paṭijānitvā pacchā appadānena tassa taṃ āsaṃ visaṃvādeti. imāya gāthāya brāhmaṇādīnaṃ musāvādena vañcanaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ. etena hi samannāgato idha nindaṃ, samparāye duggatiṃ sugatiyampi adhippāyavipattiñca pāpuṇāti. vuttañhetaṃ --
[02] ``dussīlassa sīlavipannassa pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī''ti (dī0 ni0 2.149; a0 ni0 5.213; mahāva0 285).
[03] tathā --
[02] ``catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye. katamehi catūhi? musāvādī hotī''tiādi (a0 ni0 4.82).
[03] tathā --

[02] ``idha, sāriputta, ekacco samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā pavāreti, `vada, bhante, paccayenā'ti, so yena pavāreti, taṃ na deti. so ce tato cuto itthattaṃ āgacchati. so yaṃ yadeva vaṇijjaṃ payojeti, sāssa hoti chedagāminī. idha pana sāriputta...pe0... so yena pavāreti, na taṃ yathādhippāyaṃ deti. so ce tato cuto ^a^V1.0136^ea^ itthattaṃ āgacchati. so yaṃ yadeva vaṇijjaṃ payojeti, sāssa na hoti yathādhippāyā''ti (a0 ni0 4.79).
[03] evamimāni ^a^M1.0154^ea^ nindādīni pāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva, tasmā ``parābhavato mukha''nti vuttaṃ.

[03] 102^b^.^eb^ ^b^pahūtavitto^eb^ti pahūtajātarūparajatamaṇiratano. ^b^sahirañño^eb^ti sakahāpaṇo. ^b^sabhojano^eb^ti anekasūpabyañjanabhojanasampanno. ^b^eko bhuñjati sādūnī^eb^ti sādūni bhojanāni attano puttānampi adatvā paṭicchannokāse bhuñjatīti eko bhuñjati sādūni. imāya gāthāya bhojanagiddhatāya bhojanamacchariyaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ. etena hi samannāgato nindaṃ vajjanīyaṃ duggatinti evamādīni pāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva, tasmā ``parābhavato mukha''nti vuttaṃ. vuttanayeneva sabbaṃ suttānusārena yojetabbaṃ, ativitthārabhayena pana idāni yojanānayaṃ adassetvā atthamattameva bhaṇāma.

[03] 104^b^.^eb^ ^b^jātitthaddho^eb^ nāma yo ``ahaṃ jātisampanno''ti mānaṃ janetvā tena thaddho vātapūritabhastā viya uddhumāto hutvā na kassaci ^a^P1.0172^ea^ onamati. esa nayo dhanagottatthaddhesu. ^b^saññātiṃ atimaññetī^eb^ti attano ñātimpi jātiyā atimaññati sakyā viya viṭaṭūbhaṃ. dhanenāpi ca ``kapaṇo ayaṃ daliddo''ti atimaññati, sāmīcimattampi na karoti, tassa te ñātayo parābhavameva icchanti. imāya gāthāya vatthuto catubbidhaṃ, lakkhaṇato ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ ^b^itthidhutto^eb^ti itthīsu sāratto, yaṃkiñci atthi, taṃ sabbampi datvā aparāparaṃ itthiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. tathā sabbampi attano santakaṃ nikkhipitvā surāpānapayutto ^b^surādhutto^eb^. nivatthasāṭakampi nikkhipitvā jūtakīḷanamanuyutto ^b^akkhadhutto^eb^. etehi tīhi ṭhānehi yaṃkiñcipi laddhaṃ hoti, tassa vināsanato laddhaṃ laddhaṃ vināsetīti veditabbo. evaṃvidho parābhavatiyeva, tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya tividhaṃ parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ ^b^sehi dārehī^eb^ti attano dārehi. yo attano dārehi asantuṭṭho hutvā ^b^vesiyāsu padussati,^eb^ tathā ^b^paradāresu,^eb^ so ^a^M1.0155^ea^ yasmā vesīnaṃ dhanappadānena paradārasevanena ca rājadaṇḍādīhi parābhavatiyeva, tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya duvidhaṃ parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ ^b^atītayobbano^eb^ti ^a^V1.0137^ea^ yobbanamaticca āsītiko vā nāvutiko vā hutvā ^b^āneti^eb^ pariggaṇhāti. ^b^timbarutthani^eb^nti timbaruphalasadisatthaniṃ taruṇadārikaṃ. ^b^tassā issā na supatī^eb^ti ``daharāya mahallakena saddhiṃ rati ca saṃvāso ca amanāpo, mā heva kho taruṇaṃ pattheyyā''ti issāya taṃ rakkhanto na supati. so yasmā kāmarāgena ca issāya ca ḍayhanto bahiddhā kammante ca appayojento parābhavatiyeva, tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya imaṃ issāya asupanaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ ^b^soṇḍi^eb^nti macchamaṃsādīsu lolaṃ gedhajātikaṃ. ^b^vikiraṇi^eb^nti tesaṃ atthāya dhanaṃ paṃsukaṃ viya vikiritvā nāsanasīlaṃ. ^b^purisaṃ vāpi tādisa^eb^nti puriso vāpi yo evarūpo hoti, taṃ yo issariyasmiṃ ^b^ṭhapeti,^eb^ lañchanamuddikādīni datvā gharāvāse kammante ^a^P1.0173^ea^ vā vaṇijjādivohāresu vā tadeva vāvaṭaṃ kāreti. so yasmā tassa dosena dhanakkhayaṃ pāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva, tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya tathāvidhassa issariyasmiṃ ṭhapanaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ ^b^appabhogo^eb^ nāma sannicitānañca bhogānaṃ āyamukhassa ca abhāvato. ^b^mahātaṇho^eb^ti mahatiyā bhogataṇhāya samannāgato, yaṃ laddhaṃ, tena asantuṭṭho. ^b^khattiye jāyate kule^eb^ti khattiyānaṃ kule jāyati. ^b^so ca rajjaṃ patthayatī^eb^ti so etāya mahātaṇhatāya anupāyena uppaṭipāṭiyā attano dāyajjabhūtaṃ alabbhaneyyaṃ vā parasantakaṃ rajjaṃ pattheti, so evaṃ patthento yasmā tampi appakaṃ bhogaṃ yodhājīvādīnaṃ datvā rajjaṃ apāpuṇanto parābhavatiyeva, tenassetaṃ imāya gāthāya rajjapatthanaṃ ekaṃyeva parābhavamukhaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ ito ^a^M1.0156^ea^ paraṃ yadi sā devatā ``terasamaṃ bhagavā brūhi...pe0... satasahassimaṃ bhagavā brūhī''ti puccheyya, tampi bhagavā katheyya. yasmā pana sā devatā ``kiṃ imehi pucchitehi, ekamettha vuḍḍhikaraṃ natthī''ti tāni parābhavamukhāni asuyyamānā ettakampi pucchitvā vippaṭisārī hutvā tuṇhī ahosi, tasmā bhagavā tassāsayaṃ viditvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpento imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi ^b^``ete parābhave loke''^eb^ti.

[03] tattha ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ti parivīmaṃsāya samannāgato. ^b^samavekkhiyā^eb^ti paññācakkhunā upaparikkhitvā. ^b^ariyo^eb^ti na maggena, na phalena, apica kho, pana etasmiṃ parābhavasaṅkhāte anaye na iriyatīti ariyo. yena dassanena yāya paññāya parābhave disvā vivajjeti, tena ^a^V1.0138^ea^ sampannattā ^b^dassanasampanno^eb^. ^b^sa lokaṃ bhajate siva^eb^nti so evarūpo sivaṃ khemamuttamamanupaddavaṃ devalokaṃ bhajati, allīyati, upagacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti. desanāpariyosāne parābhavamukhāni sutvā uppannasaṃvegānurūpaṃ yoniso padahitvā sotāpattisakadāgāmianāgāmiphalāni pattā devatā gaṇanaṃ vītivattā. yathāha --
[21] ``mahāsamayasutte ^a^P1.0174^ea^ ca, atho maṅgalasuttake.
[22] samacitte rāhulovāde, dhammacakke parābhave..
[21] ``devatāsamitī tattha, appameyyā asaṅkhiyā.
[22] dhammābhisamayo cettha, gaṇanāto asaṅkhiyo''ti..
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya parābhavasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0139^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti aggikabhāradvājasuttaṃ, ``vasalasutta''ntipi vuccati. kā uppatti? bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. kasibhāradvājasutte vuttanayena pacchābhattakiccāvasāne buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ ^a^M1.0157^ea^ volokento aggikabhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ saraṇasikkhāpadānaṃ upanissayasampannaṃ disvā ``tattha mayi gate kathā pavattissati, tato kathāvasāne dhammadesanaṃ sutvā esa brāhmaṇo saraṇaṃ gantvā sikkhāpadāni samādiyissatī''ti ñatvā, tattha gantvā, pavattāya kathāya brāhmaṇena dhammadesanaṃ yācito imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi. tattha ``evaṃ me suta''ntiādiṃ maṅgalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vaṇṇayissāma, ``atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamaya''ntiādi kasibhāradvājasutte vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^tena kho pana samayena aggikabhāradvājassā^eb^ti yaṃ yaṃ avuttapubbaṃ, taṃ tadeva vaṇṇayissāma. seyyathidaṃ -- so hi brāhmaṇo aggiṃ juhati paricaratīti katvā aggikoti nāmena pākaṭo ahosi, bhāradvājoti gottena. tasmā vuttaṃ ``aggikabhāradvājassā''ti. ^b^nivesane^eb^ti ghare. tassa kira brāhmaṇassa nivesanadvāre antaravīthiyaṃ aggihutasālā ahosi. tato ``nivesanadvāre''ti vattabbe tassapi padesassa nivesaneyeva pariyāpannattā ``nivesane''ti vuttaṃ. samīpatthe vā bhummavacanaṃ, nivesanasamīpeti attho. ^b^aggi pajjalito hotī^eb^ti aggiyādhāne ṭhito aggi katabbhuddharaṇo samidhāpakkhepaṃ bījanavātañca labhitvā ^a^P1.0175^ea^ jalito uddhaṃ samuggataccisamākulo hoti. ^b^āhuti paggahitā^eb^ti sasīsaṃ nhāyitvā mahatā sakkārena pāyāsasappimadhuphāṇitādīni abhisaṅkhatāni hontīti attho. yañhi kiñci aggimhi juhitabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ ``āhutī''ti vuccati. ^b^sapadāna^eb^nti anugharaṃ. bhagavā hi sabbajanānuggahatthāya āhārasantuṭṭhiyā ca uccanīcakulaṃ avokkamma piṇḍāya carati. tena vuttaṃ ``sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno''ti.

[03] atha kimatthaṃ sabbākārasampannaṃ samantapāsādikaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā brāhmaṇassa cittaṃ nappasīdati? kasmā ca evaṃ pharusena vacanena bhagavantaṃ samudācaratīti? vuccate -- ayaṃ kira ^a^V1.0140^ea^ brāhmaṇo ``maṅgalakiccesu samaṇadassanaṃ avamaṅgala''nti evaṃdiṭṭhiko, tato ``mahābrahmuno bhuñjanavelāya kāḷakaṇṇī muṇḍakasamaṇako mama nivesanaṃ upasaṅkamatī''ti mantvā cittaṃ nappasādesi, aññadatthu dosavasaṃyeva agamāsi. atha kuddho anattamano anattamanavācaṃ nicchāresi ^b^``tatreva muṇḍakā''^eb^tiādi. tatrāpi ^a^M1.0158^ea^ ca yasmā ``muṇḍo asuddho hotī''ti brāhmaṇānaṃ diṭṭhi, tasmā ``ayaṃ asuddho, tena devabrāhmaṇapūjako na hotī''ti jigucchanto ``muṇḍakā''ti āha. muṇḍakattā vā ucchiṭṭho esa, na imaṃ padesaṃ arahati āgacchitunti samaṇo hutvāpi īdisaṃ kāyakilesaṃ na vaṇṇetīti ca samaṇabhāvaṃ jigucchanto ^b^``samaṇakā''^eb^ti āha. na kevalaṃ dosavaseneva, vasale vā pabbājetvā tehi saddhiṃ ekato sambhogaparibhogakaraṇena patito ayaṃ vasalatopi pāpataroti jigucchanto ^b^``vasalakā''^eb^ti āha -- ``vasalajātikānaṃ vā āhutidassanamattasavanena pāpaṃ hotī''ti maññamānopi evamāha.

[03] bhagavā tathā vuttopi vippasanneneva mukhavaṇṇena madhurena sarena brāhmaṇassa upari anukampāsītalena cittena attano sabbasattehi asādhāraṇatādibhāvaṃ pakāsento āha ^b^``jānāsi pana, tvaṃ brāhmaṇā''^eb^ti. atha brāhmaṇo bhagavato ^a^P1.0176^ea^ mukhappasādasūcitaṃ tādibhāvaṃ ñatvā anukampāsītalena cittena nicchāritaṃ madhurassaraṃ sutvā amateneva abhisittahadayo attamano vippasannindriyo nihatamāno hutvā taṃ jātisabhāvaṃ visauggirasadisaṃ samudācāravacanaṃ pahāya ``nūna yamahaṃ hīnajaccaṃ vasalanti paccemi, na so paramatthato vasalo, na ca hīnajaccatā eva vasalakaraṇo dhammo''ti maññamāno ^b^``na khvāhaṃ, bho gotamā''^eb^ti āha. dhammatā hesā, yaṃ hetusampanno paccayālābhena pharusopi samāno laddhamatte paccaye muduko hotīti.

[03] tattha ^b^sādhū^eb^ti ayaṃ saddo āyācanasampaṭicchanasampahaṃsanasundaradaḷhīkammādīsu dissati. ``sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū''tiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 4.95; a0 ni0 7.83) hi āyācane. ``sādhu, bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 3.86) sampaṭicchane. ``sādhu, sādhu, sāriputtā''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 3.349) sampahaṃsane.
[21] ``sādhu dhammarucī rājā, sādhu paññāṇavā naro.
[22] sādhu mittānamaddubbho, pāpassākaraṇaṃ sukha''nti.. (jā0 2.18.101) --
[25] ādīsu ^a^M1.0159^ea^ ^a^V1.0141^ea^ sundare. ``taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karothā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.1) daḷhīkamme. idha pana āyācane.

[03] ^b^tena hī^eb^ti tassādhippāyanidassanaṃ, sace ñātukāmosīti vuttaṃ hoti. kāraṇavacanaṃ vā, tassa yasmā ñātukāmosi, tasmā, brāhmaṇa, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi, tathā te bhāsissāmi, yathā tvaṃ jānissasīti evaṃ parapadehi saddhiṃ sambandho veditabbo. tatra ca ^b^suṇāhī^eb^ti sotindriyavikkhepavāraṇaṃ, ^b^sādhukaṃ manasi karohī^eb^ti manasikāre daḷhīkammaniyojanena manindriyavikkhepavāraṇaṃ. purimañcettha byañjanavipallāsaggāhavāraṇaṃ, pacchimaṃ atthavipallāsaggāhavāraṇaṃ ^a^P1.0177^ea^. purimena ca dhammassavane niyojeti, pacchimena sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ dhāraṇatthūpaparikkhādīsu. purimena ca ``sabyañjano ayaṃ dhammo, tasmā savanīyo''ti dīpeti, pacchimena ``sāttho, tasmā manasi kātabbo''ti. sādhukapadaṃ vā ubhayapadehi yojetvā ``yasmā ayaṃ dhammo dhammagambhīro ca desanāgambhīro ca, tasmā suṇāhi sādhukaṃ. yasmā atthagambhīro paṭivedhagambhīro ca, tasmā sādhukaṃ manasi karohī''ti etamatthaṃ dīpento āha -- ``suṇāhi sādhukaṃ manasi karohī''ti.

[03] tato ``evaṃ gambhīre kathamahaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ labhissāmī''ti visīdantamiva taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ samussāhento āha -- ``bhāsissāmī''ti. tattha ``yathā tvaṃ ñassasi, tathā parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi uttānena nayena bhāsissāmī''ti evamadhippāyo veditabbo. tato ussāhajāto hutvā ^b^``evaṃ bho''ti kho aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi,^eb^ sampaṭicchi paṭiggahesīti vuttaṃ hoti, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ vā paṭipajjanena abhimukho assosīti. athassa ^b^``bhagavā etadavocā''^eb^ti idāni vattabbaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``kodhano upanāhī''ti evamādikaṃ.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^kodhano^eb^ti kujjhanasīlo. ^b^upanāhī^eb^ti tasseva kodhassa daḷhīkammena upanāhena samannāgato. paresaṃ guṇe makkheti puñchatīti makkhī, pāpo ca so makkhī cāti ^b^pāpamakkhī^eb^. ^b^vipannadiṭṭhī^eb^ti vinaṭṭhasammādiṭṭhi, vipannāya vā virūpaṃ gatāya dasavatthukāya micchādiṭṭhiyā samannāgato. ^b^māyāvī^eb^ti attani vijjamānadosapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇāya māyāya ^a^M1.0160^ea^ samannāgato. ^b^taṃ jaññā vasalo itī^eb^ti taṃ evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ etesaṃ hīnadhammānaṃ vassanato siñcanato anvāssavanato ``vasalo''ti jāneyyāti, etehi sabbehi brāhmaṇamatthake jāto. ayañhi paramatthato vasalo eva, attano ^a^P1.0178^ea^ hadayatuṭṭhimattaṃ, na paranti. evamettha bhagavā ādipadeneva tassa brāhmaṇassa kodhaniggahaṃ katvā ``kodhādidhammo hīnapuggalo''ti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya ^a^V1.0142^ea^ ca desanāya kodhādidhamme desento ekena tāva pariyāyena vasalañca vasalakaraṇe ca dhamme desesi. evaṃ desento ca ``tvaṃ aha''nti paravambhanaṃ attukkaṃsanañca akatvā dhammeneva samena ñāyena taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vasalabhāve, attānañca brāhmaṇabhāve ṭhapesi.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ idāni yāyaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ diṭṭhi ``kadāci pāṇātipātādinnādānādīni karontopi brāhmaṇo evā''ti. taṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭisedhento, ye ca sattavihiṃsādīsu akusaladhammesu tehi tehi samannāgatā ādīnavaṃ apassantā te dhamme uppādenti, tesaṃ ``hīnā ete dhammā vasalakaraṇā''ti tattha ādīnavañca dassento aparehipi pariyāyehi vasalañca vasalakaraṇe ca dhamme desetuṃ ``ekajaṃ vā dvijaṃ vā''ti evamādigāthāyo abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^ekajo^eb^ti ṭhapetvā aṇḍajaṃ avasesayonijo. so hi ekadā eva jāyati. ^b^dvijo^eb^ti aṇḍajo. so hi mātukucchito aṇḍakosato cāti dvikkhattuṃ jāyati. taṃ ekajaṃ vā dvijaṃ vāpi. ^b^yodha pāṇa^eb^nti yo idha sattaṃ. ^b^vihiṃsatī^eb^ti kāyadvārikacetanāsamuṭṭhitena vā vacīdvārikacetanāsamuṭṭhitena vā payogena jīvitā voropeti. ``pāṇāni hiṃsatī''tipi pāṭho. tattha ekajaṃ vā dvijaṃ vāti evaṃpabhedāni yodha pāṇāni hiṃsatīti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo. ^b^yassa pāṇe dayā natthī^eb^ti etena manasā anukampāya abhāvaṃ āha. sesamettha vuttanayameva. ito parāsu ca gāthāsu, yato ettakampi avatvā ito paraṃ uttānatthāni padāni pariharantā avaṇṇitapadavaṇṇanāmattameva karissāma.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ ^b^hantī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0161^ea^ hanati vināseti. ^b^parirundhatī^eb^ti senāya parivāretvā tiṭṭhati. ^b^gāmāni nigamāni cā^eb^ti ettha ca-saddena nagarānītipi vattabbaṃ. ^b^niggāhako samaññāto^eb^ti iminā hananaparirundhanena gāmanigamanagaraghātakoti loke vidito.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ ^b^gāme vā yadi vāraññe^eb^ti ^a^P1.0179^ea^ gāmopi nigamopi nagarampi sabbova idha gāmo saddhiṃ upacārena, taṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ araññaṃ. tasmiṃ gāme vā yadi vāraññe ^b^yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ,^eb^ yaṃ parasattānaṃ pariggahitamapariccattaṃ satto vā saṅkhāro vā. ^b^theyyā adinnamādetī^eb^ti tehi adinnaṃ ananuññātaṃ theyyacittena ādiyati, yena kenaci payogena yena kenaci avahārena attano gahaṇaṃ sādheti.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ ^b^iṇamādāyā^eb^ti attano santakaṃ kiñci nikkhipitvā nikkhepaggahaṇena vā, kiñci ^a^V1.0143^ea^ anikkhipitvā ``ettakena kālena ettakaṃ vaḍḍhiṃ dassāmī''ti vaḍḍhiggahaṇena vā, ``yaṃ ito udayaṃ bhavissati, taṃ mayhaṃ mūlaṃ taveva bhavissatī''ti vā ``udayaṃ ubhinnampi sādhāraṇa''nti vā evaṃ taṃtaṃāyogaggahaṇena vā iṇaṃ gahetvā. ^b^cujjamāno palāyati na hi te iṇamatthī^eb^ti tena iṇāyikena ``dehi me iṇa''nti codiyamāno ``na hi te iṇamatthi, mayā gahitanti ko sakkhī''ti evaṃ bhaṇanena ghare vasantopi palāyati.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ ^b^kiñcikkhakamyatā^eb^ti appamattakepi kismiñcideva icchāya. ^b^panthasmiṃ vajantaṃ jana^eb^nti magge gacchantaṃ yaṃkiñci itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā. ^b^hantvā kiñcikkhamādetī^eb^ti māretvā koṭṭetvā taṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ gaṇhāti.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ ^b^attahetū^eb^ti attano jīvitakāraṇā, tathā ^b^parahetu. dhanahetū^eb^ti sakadhanassa vā paradhanassa vā kāraṇā. ca-kāro sabbattha vikappanattho. ^b^sakkhipuṭṭho^eb^ti yaṃ jānāsi, taṃ vadehīti pucchito. ^b^musā brūtī^eb^ti jānanto vā ``na jānāmī''ti ajānanto vā ``jānāmī''ti bhaṇati, sāmike asāmike, asāmike ca sāmike karoti.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ ^b^ñātīna^eb^nti ^a^M1.0162^ea^ sambandhīnaṃ. ^b^sakhīna^eb^nti vayassānaṃ ^b^dāresū^eb^ti parapariggahitesu. ^b^paṭidissatī^eb^ti paṭikūlena dissati, aticaranto dissatīti attho. ^b^sāhasā^eb^ti balakkārena anicchaṃ. ^b^sampiyenā^eb^ti tehi tesaṃ dārehi patthiyamāno sayañca patthayamāno, ubhayasinehavasenāpīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ ^b^mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā^eb^ti evaṃ mettāya padaṭṭhānabhūtampi, ^b^jiṇṇakaṃ gatayobbana^eb^nti evaṃ karuṇāya padaṭṭhānabhūtampi ^a^P1.0180^ea^. ^b^pahu santo na bharatī^eb^ti atthasampanno upakaraṇasampanno hutvāpi na poseti.
[03] 125^b^.^eb^ ^b^sasu^eb^nti sassuṃ. ^b^hantī^eb^ti pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā aññena vā kenaci paharati. ^b^rosetī^eb^ti kodhamassa sañjaneti ^b^vācāya^eb^ pharusavacanena.

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ ^b^attha^eb^nti sandiṭṭhikasamparāyikaparamatthesu yaṃkiñci. ^b^pucchito santo^eb^ti puṭṭho samāno. ^b^anatthamanusāsatī^eb^ti tassa ahitameva ācikkhati. ^b^paṭicchannena mantetī^eb^ti atthaṃ ācikkhantopi ^a^V1.0144^ea^ yathā so na jānāti, tathā apākaṭehi padabyañjanehi paṭicchannena vacanena manteti, ācariyamuṭṭhiṃ vā katvā dīgharattaṃ vasāpetvā sāvasesameva manteti.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo katvā^eb^ti ettha mayā pubbabhāge pāpicchatā vuttā. yā sā ``idhekacco kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā, vācāya duccaritaṃ caritvā, manasā duccaritaṃ caritvā, tassa paṭicchādanahetu pāpikaṃ icchaṃ paṇidahati, mā maṃ jaññāti icchatī''ti evaṃ āgatā. yathā aññe na jānanti, tathā karaṇena katānañca avivaraṇena paṭicchannā assa kammantāti ^b^paṭicchannakammanto^eb^.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ ^b^parakula^eb^nti ñātikulaṃ vā mittakulaṃ vā. ^b^āgata^eb^nti yassa tena kule bhuttaṃ, taṃ attano gehamāgataṃ pānabhojanādīhi ^b^nappaṭipūjeti,^eb^ na vā deti, avabhuttaṃ vā detīti adhippāyo.
[03] 129^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo brāhmaṇaṃ vā^eb^ti parābhavasutte vuttanayameva.

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhattakāle^eb^ ^a^M1.0163^ea^ ^b^upaṭṭhite^eb^ti bhojanakāle jāte. upaṭṭhitantipi pāṭho, bhattakāle āgatanti attho. ^b^roseti vācā na ca detī^eb^ti ``atthakāmo me ayaṃ balakkārena maṃ puññaṃ kārāpetuṃ āgato''ti acintetvā appatirūpena pharusavacanena roseti, antamaso sammukhabhāvamattampi cassa na deti, pageva bhojananti adhippāyo.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ ^b^asataṃ yodha pabrūtī^eb^ti yo idha yathā nimittāni dissanti ``asukadivase idañcidañca te bhavissatī''ti evaṃ asajjanānaṃ vacanaṃ pabrūti. ``asanta''ntipi pāṭho, abhūtanti attho. ^b^pabrūtī^eb^ti bhaṇati ``amukasmiṃ nāma gāme mayhaṃ īdiso gharavibhavo, ehi tattha gacchāma, gharaṇī ^a^P1.0181^ea^ me bhavissasi, idañcidañca te dassāmī''ti parabhariyaṃ paradāsiṃ vā vañcento dhutto viya. ^b^nijigīsāno^eb^ti nijigīsamāno maggamāno, taṃ vañcetvā yaṃkiñci gahetvā palāyitukāmoti adhippāyo.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo cattāna^eb^nti yo ca attānaṃ. ^b^samukkaṃseti^eb^ jātiādīhi samukkaṃsati uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapeti. ^b^pare ca mavajānātī^eb^ti tehiyeva pare avajānāti, nīcaṃ karoti. ma-kāro padasandhikaro ^a^V1.0145^ea^. ^b^nihīno^eb^ti guṇavuḍḍhito parihīno, adhamabhāvaṃ vā gato. ^b^sena mānenā^eb^ti tena ukkaṃsanāvajānanasaṅkhātena attano mānena.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ ^b^rosako^eb^ti kāyavācāhi paresaṃ rosajanako. ^b^kadariyo^eb^ti thaddhamaccharī, yo pare paresaṃ dente aññaṃ vā puññaṃ karonte vāreti, tassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^pāpiccho^eb^ti asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya samannāgato. ^b^maccharī^eb^ti āvāsādimacchariyayutto. ^b^saṭho^eb^ti asantaguṇappakāsanalakkhaṇena sāṭheyyena samannāgato, asammābhāsī vā akātukāmopi ``karomī''tiādivacanena. nāssa pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī, nāssa uttāsanato ubbegalakkhaṇaṃ ottappanti ^b^ahiriko anottappī^eb^.

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ ^b^buddha^eb^nti sammāsambuddhaṃ. ^b^paribhāsatī^eb^ti ``asabbaññū''tiādīhi apavadati, ^b^sāvakañca^eb^ ``duppaṭipanno''tiādīhi. ^b^paribbājaṃ gahaṭṭhaṃ vā^eb^ti sāvakavisesanamevetaṃ ^a^M1.0164^ea^ pabbajitaṃ vā tassa sāvakaṃ, gahaṭṭhaṃ vā paccayadāyakanti attho. bāhirakaṃ vā paribbājakaṃ yaṃkiñci gahaṭṭhaṃ vā abhūtena dosena paribhāsatīti evampettha atthaṃ icchanti porāṇā.

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ ^b^anarahaṃ santo^eb^ti akhīṇāsavo samāno. ^b^arahaṃ paṭijānātī^eb^ti ``ahaṃ arahā''ti paṭijānāti, yathā naṃ ``arahā aya''nti jānanti, tathā vācaṃ nicchāreti, kāyena parakkamati, cittena icchati adhivāseti. ^b^coro^eb^ti theno. ^b^sabrahmake loke^eb^ti ukkaṭṭhavasena āha -- sabbaloketi vuttaṃ hoti ^a^P1.0182^ea^. loke hi sandhicchedananillopaharaṇaekāgārikakaraṇaparipanthatiṭṭhanādīhi paresaṃ dhanaṃ vilumpantā corāti vuccanti. sāsane pana parisasampattiādīhi paccayādīni vilumpantā. yathāha --

[02] ``pañcime, bhikkhave, mahācorā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. katame pañca? idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa mahācorassa evaṃ hoti `kudāssu nāmāhaṃ satena vā sahassena vā parivuto gāmanigamarājadhānīsu āhiṇḍissāmi hananto, ghātento, chindanto, chedāpento, pacanto pācentoti, so aparena samayena satena vā sahassena vā parivuto gāmanigamarājadhānīsu āhiṇḍati hananto...pe0... pācento. evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekaccassa pāpabhikkhuno evaṃ hoti `kudāssu nāmāhaṃ satena vā...pe0... rājadhānīsu cārikaṃ carissāmi sakkato, garukato, mānito, pūjito, apacito, gahaṭṭhānañceva pabbajitānañca lābhī cīvara...pe0... parikkhārāna'nti. so aparena ^a^V1.0146^ea^ samayena satena vā sahassena vā parivuto gāmanigamarājadhānīsu cārikaṃ carati sakkato...pe0... parikkhārānaṃ. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo mahācoro santo saṃvijjamāno lokasmiṃ.
[02] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahati, ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo...pe0... lokasmiṃ.

[02] ``puna ^a^M1.0165^ea^ caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco pāpabhikkhu suddhaṃ brahmacāriṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carantaṃ amūlakena abrahmacariyena anuddhaṃseti. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo...pe0... lokasmiṃ.

[02] ``puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco, pāpabhikkhu yāni tāni saṅghassa garubhaṇḍāni garuparikkhārāni, seyyathidaṃ -- ārāmo, ārāmavatthu, vihāro, vihāravatthu, mañco, pīṭhaṃ, bhisi, bimbohanaṃ, lohakumbhī, lohabhāṇakaṃ, lohavārako, lohakaṭāhaṃ, vāsi, pharasu, kuṭhārī, kudālo, nikhādanaṃ, valli, veḷu, muñjaṃ, pabbajaṃ, tiṇaṃ, mattikā, dārubhaṇḍaṃ, mattikābhaṇḍaṃ, tehi gihiṃ saṅgaṇhāti upalāpeti. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho...pe0... lokasmiṃ.
[02] ``sadevake, bhikkhave, loke...pe0... sadevamanussāya ayaṃ aggo mahācoro, yo asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapatī''ti (pārā0 195).

[03] tattha lokiyacorā lokiyameva dhanadhaññādiṃ thenenti. sāsane vuttacoresu paṭhamo tathārūpameva cīvarādipaccayamattaṃ, dutiyo pariyattidhammaṃ, tatiyo parassa brahmacariyaṃ, catuttho saṅghikagarubhaṇḍaṃ, pañcamo jhānasamādhisamāpattimaggaphalappabhedaṃ lokiyalokuttaraguṇadhanaṃ, lokiyañca cīvarādipaccayajātaṃ. yathāha -- ``theyyāya vo, bhikkhave, raṭṭhapiṇḍo bhutto''ti. tattha yvāyaṃ pañcamo mahācoro, taṃ sandhāyāha bhagavā ``coro sabrahmake loke''ti. so hi ``sadevake, bhikkhave, loke...pe0... sadevamanussāya ayaṃ aggo mahācoro, yo asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapatī''ti (pārā0 195) evaṃ lokiyalokuttaradhanathenanato aggo mahācoroti vutto, tasmā taṃ idhāpi ``sabrahmake loke''ti iminā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena pakāsesi.

[03] ^b^eso kho vasalādhamo^eb^ti. ettha ^b^kho^eb^ti avadhāraṇattho, tena eso eva vasalādhamo. vasalānaṃ ^a^V1.0147^ea^ hīno sabbapacchimakoti avadhāreti. kasmā? visiṭṭhavatthumhi theyyadhammavassanato, yāva taṃ paṭiññaṃ na vissajjeti, tāva avigatavasalakaraṇadhammato cāti.

[03] ^b^ete^eb^ ^a^M1.0166^ea^ ^b^kho vasalā^eb^ti. idāni ye te paṭhamagāthāya āsayavipattivasena ^a^P1.0183^ea^ kodhanādayo pañca, pāpamakkhiṃ vā dvidhā katvā cha, dutiyagāthāya payogavipattivasena pāṇahiṃsako eko, tatiyāya payogavipattivaseneva gāmanigamaniggāhako eko, catutthāya theyyāvahāravasena eko, pañcamāya iṇavañcanavasena eko, chaṭṭhāya pasayhāvahāravasena panthadūsako eko, sattamāya kūṭasakkhivasena eko, aṭṭhamāya mittadubbhivasena eko, navamāya akataññuvasena eko, dasamāya katanāsanavihesanavasena eko, ekādasamāya hadayavañcanavasena eko, dvādasamāya paṭicchannakammantavasena dve, terasamāya akataññuvasena eko, cuddasamāya vañcanavasena eko, pannarasamāya vihesanavasena eko, soḷasamāya vañcanavasena eko, sattarasamāya attukkaṃsanaparavambhanavasena dve, aṭṭhārasamāya payogāsayavipattivasena rosakādayo satta, ekūnavīsatimāya paribhāsanavasena dve, vīsatimāya aggamahācoravasena ekoti evaṃ tettiṃsa catuttiṃsa vā vasalā vuttā. te niddisanto āha ^b^``ete kho vasalā vuttā, mayā ye te pakāsitā''^eb^ti. tassattho -- ye te mayā pubbe ``jānāsi pana tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, vasala''nti evaṃ saṅkhepato vasalā vuttā, te vitthārato ete kho pakāsitāti. atha vā ye te mayā puggalavasena vuttā, te dhammavasenāpi ete kho pakāsitā. atha vā ete kho vasalā vuttā ariyehi kammavasena, na jātivasena, mayā ye te pakāsitā ``kodhano upanāhī''tiādinā nayena.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ evaṃ bhagavā vasalaṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā brāhmaṇo sakāya diṭṭhiyā atīva abhiniviṭṭho hoti, tasmā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ paṭisedhento āha ^b^``na jaccā vasalo hotī^eb^''ti. tassattho -- paramatthato hi na jaccā vasalo hoti, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo, apica kho kammunā vasalo hoti, kammunā hoti brāhmaṇo, aparisuddhakammavassanato vasalo hoti, parisuddhena kammunā aparisuddhavāhanato brāhmaṇo hoti. yasmā vā tumhe hīnaṃ vasalaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ ^a^M1.0167^ea^ brāhmaṇaṃ ^a^P1.0184^ea^ maññittha, tasmā hīnena kammunā vasalo hoti, ukkaṭṭhena kammunā brāhmaṇo hotīti evampi atthaṃ ñāpento evamāha.

[03] 137-139^b^.^eb^ idāni tamevatthaṃ nidassanena sādhetuṃ ^b^``tadamināpi jānāthā''^eb^tiādikā tisso gāthāyo āha. tāsu dve catuppādā, ekā chappādā, tāsaṃ attho -- yaṃ mayā vuttaṃ ``na jaccā vasalo hotī''tiādi, ^b^tadamināpi jānātha, yathā medaṃ nidassanaṃ,^eb^ taṃ imināpi pakārena ^a^V1.0148^ea^ jānātha, yena me pakārena yena sāmaññena idaṃ nidassananti vuttaṃ hoti. katamaṃ nidassananti ce? ^b^caṇḍālaputto sopāko...pe0... brahmalokūpapattiyā^eb^ti.
[03] caṇḍālassa putto ^b^caṇḍālaputto^eb^. attano khādanatthāya mate sunakhe labhitvā pacatīti ^b^sopāko. mātaṅgo^eb^ti evaṃnāmo ^b^vissuto^eb^ti evaṃ hīnāya jātiyā ca jīvikāya ca nāmena ca pākaṭo.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ti purimapadena sambandhitvā so mātaṅgo ^b^yasaṃ paramaṃ patto,^eb^ abbhutaṃ uttamaṃ ativisiṭṭhaṃ yasaṃ kittiṃ pasaṃsaṃ patto. ^b^yaṃ sudullabha^eb^nti yaṃ uḷārakulūpapannenāpi dullabhaṃ, hīnakulūpapannena sudullabhaṃ. evaṃ yasappattassa ca ^b^āgacchuṃ tassupaṭṭhānaṃ, khattiyā brāhmaṇā bahū,^eb^ tassa mātaṅgassa pāricariyatthaṃ khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca aññe ca bahū vessasuddādayo jambudīpamanussā yebhuyyena upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamiṃsūti attho.

[03] evaṃ upaṭṭhānasampanno so mātaṅgo vigatakilesarajattā ^b^virajaṃ,^eb^ mahantehi buddhādīhi paṭipannattā ^b^mahāpathaṃ,^eb^ brahmalokasaṅkhātaṃ devalokaṃ yāpetuṃ samatthattā devalokayānasaññitaṃ aṭṭhasamāpattiyānaṃ ^b^abhiruyha,^eb^ tāya paṭipattiyā ^b^kāmarāgaṃ virājetvā,^eb^ kāyassa bhedā ^b^brahmalokūpago ahu,^eb^ sā tathā hīnāpi ^b^na naṃ jāti nivāresi brahmalokūpapattiyā,^eb^ brahmalokūpapattitoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ayaṃ panattho evaṃ veditabbo -- atīte kira mahāpuriso tena tenupāyena sattahitaṃ karonto sopākajīvike caṇḍālakule uppajji. so nāmena mātaṅgo ^a^P1.0185^ea^, rūpena duddasiko hutvā bahinagare cammakuṭikāya vasati, antonagare bhikkhaṃ caritvā jīvikaṃ kappeti. athekadivasaṃ ^a^M1.0168^ea^ tasmiṃ nagare surānakkhatte ghosite dhuttā yathāsakena parivārena kīḷanti. aññatarāpi brāhmaṇamahāsāladhītā pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikā devakaññā viya rūpena dassanīyā pāsādikā ``attano kulavaṃsānurūpaṃ kīḷissāmī''ti pahūtaṃ khajjabhojjādikīḷanasambhāraṃ sakaṭesu āropetvā sabbasetavaḷavayuttaṃ yānamāruyha mahāparivārena uyyānabhūmiṃ gacchati ^b^diṭṭhamaṅgalikā^eb^ti nāmena. sā kira ``dussaṇṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ avamaṅgala''nti daṭṭhuṃ na icchati, tenassā diṭṭhamaṅgalikātveva saṅkhā udapādi.

[03] tadā so mātaṅgo kālasseva vuṭṭhāya paṭapilotikaṃ nivāsetvā, kaṃsatāḷaṃ hatthe bandhitvā, bhājanahattho ^a^V1.0149^ea^ nagaraṃ pavisati, manusse disvā dūrato eva kaṃsatāḷaṃ ākoṭento. atha diṭṭhamaṅgalikā ``ussaratha, ussarathā''ti purato purato hīnajanaṃ apanentehi purisehi nīyamānā nagaradvāramajjhe mātaṅgaṃ disvā ``ko eso''ti āha. ahaṃ mātaṅgacaṇḍāloti. sā ``īdisaṃ disvā gatānaṃ kuto vuḍḍhī''ti yānaṃ nivattāpesi. manussā ``yaṃ mayaṃ uyyānaṃ gantvā khajjabhojjādiṃ labheyyāma, tassa no mātaṅgena antarāyo kato''ti kupitā ``gaṇhatha caṇḍāla''nti leḍḍūhi paharitvā ``mato''ti pāde gahetvā ekamante chaḍḍetvā kacavarena paṭicchādetvā agamaṃsu. so satiṃ paṭilabhitvā uṭṭhāya manusse pucchi -- ``kiṃ, ayyā, dvāraṃ nāma sabbasādhāraṇaṃ, udāhu brāhmaṇānaṃyeva kata''nti? manussā āhaṃsu -- ``sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇa''nti. ``evaṃ sabbasādhāraṇadvārena pavisitvā bhikkhāhārena yāpentaṃ maṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya manussā imaṃ anayabyasanaṃ pāpesu''nti rathikāya rathikaṃ āhiṇḍanto manussānaṃ ārocetvā brāhmaṇassa gharadvāre nipajji -- ``diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ aladdhā na vuṭṭhahissāmī''ti.

[03] brāhmaṇo ``gharadvāre mātaṅgo nipanno''ti sutvā ``tassa kākaṇikaṃ detha, telena aṅgaṃ makkhetvā gacchatū''ti āha. so taṃ na icchati, ``diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ ^a^P1.0186^ea^ aladdhā na vuṭṭhahissāmi''cceva āha. tato brāhmaṇo ``dve kākaṇikāyo detha, kākaṇikāya pūvaṃ khādatu, kākaṇikāya ^a^M1.0169^ea^ telena aṅgaṃ makkhetvā gacchatū''ti āha. so taṃ na icchati, tatheva vadati. brāhmaṇo sutvā ``māsakaṃ detha, pādaṃ, upaḍḍhakahāpaṇaṃ, kahāpaṇaṃ dve tīṇī''ti yāva sataṃ āṇāpesi. so na icchati, tatheva vadati. evaṃ yācantānaṃyeva sūriyo atthaṅgato. atha brāhmaṇī pāsādā oruyha sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā taṃ upasaṅkamitvā yāci -- ``tāta mātaṅga, diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya aparādhaṃ khama, sahassaṃ gaṇhāhi, dve tīṇī''ti yāva ``satasahassaṃ gaṇhāhī''ti āha. so tuṇhībhūto nipajjiyeva.
