[03] atthavaṇṇanā pana evaṃ veditabbā -- ^b^mātā^eb^ nāma janikā vuccati, tathā ^b^pitā^eb^. ^b^upaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ nāma pādadhovanasambāhanaucchādananhāpanehi catupaccayasampadānena ca upakārakaraṇaṃ. tattha yasmā mātāpitaro bahūpakārā puttānaṃ atthakāmā anukampakā, yaṃ puttake bahi kīḷitvā paṃsumakkhitasarīrake āgate disvā paṃsukaṃ puñchitvā matthakaṃ upasiṅghāyantā paricumbantā ca sinehaṃ uppādenti, vassasatampi mātāpitaro sīsena pariharantā puttā tesaṃ paṭikāraṃ kātuṃ asamatthā. yasmā ca te āpādakā posakā imassa lokassa dassetāro brahmasammatā pubbācariyasammatā, tasmā tesaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ idha pasaṃsaṃ pecca saggasukhañca āvahati, tena ``maṅgala''nti vuccati. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --
[21] ``brahmāti mātāpitaro, pubbācariyāti vuccare.
[22] āhuneyyā ca puttānaṃ, pajāya anukampakā..
[21] ``tasmā hi ne namasseyya, sakkareyya ca paṇḍito.
[22] annena atha pānena, vatthena sayanena ca..
[21] ``ucchādanena ^a^M2.0021^ea^ nhāpanena, pādānaṃ dhovanena ca.
[27] tāya naṃ pāricariyāya, mātāpitūsu paṇḍitā.
[22] idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodatī''ti.. (a0 ni0 3.31; itivu0 106; jā0 2.20.181-183).
[03] aparo nayo -- upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma bharaṇakiccakaraṇakulavaṃsaṭṭhapanādipañcavidhaṃ, taṃ pāpanivāraṇādipañcavidhadiṭṭhadhammikahitahetuto ``maṅgala''nti veditabbaṃ. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --

[02] ``pañcahi kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi puttena puratthimā disā mātāpitaro paccupaṭṭhātabbā `bhato ne bharissāmi, kiccaṃ nesaṃ karissāmi, kulavaṃsaṃ ṭhapessāmi, dāyajjaṃ paṭipajjissāmi, atha vā pana petānaṃ kālakatānaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ anuppadassāmī'ti ^a^V2.0019^ea^. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi puttena puratthimā disā mātāpitaro paccupaṭṭhitā pañcahi ṭhānehi puttaṃ anukampanti, pāpā nivārenti, kalyāṇe nivesenti, sippaṃ sikkhāpenti, patirūpena dārena saṃyojenti, samaye dāyajjaṃ niyyādentī''ti (dī0 ni0 3.267).

[03] apica yo mātāpitaro tīsu vatthūsu pasāduppādanena sīlasamādāpanena pabbajjāya vā upaṭṭhahati, ayaṃ mātāpitūpaṭṭhākānaṃ aggo, tassa taṃ mātāpitūpaṭṭhānaṃ mātāpitūhi katassa upakārassa paccupakārabhūtaṃ anekesaṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ samparāyikānañca atthānaṃ padaṭṭhānato ``maṅgala''nti vuccati.

[03] ^b^puttadārassā^eb^ti ettha attanā janitā puttāpi dhītaropi ``puttā'' tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti. ^b^dārā^eb^ti vīsatiyā bhariyānaṃ yā kāci bhariyā. puttā ca dārā ca puttadāraṃ, tassa puttadārassa. ^b^saṅgaho^eb^ti sammānanādīhi upakārakaraṇaṃ. taṃ susaṃvihitakammantatādidiṭṭhadhammikahitahetuto ``maṅgala''nti veditabbaṃ. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``pacchimā disā puttadārā veditabbā''ti (dī0 ni0 3.266) ettha uddiṭṭhaṃ puttadāraṃ bhariyāsaddena saṅgaṇhitvā --

[02] ``pañcahi ^a^M2.0022^ea^ kho, gahapatiputta, ṭhānehi sāmikena pacchimā disā bhariyā paccupaṭṭhātabbā, sammānanāya anavamānanāya anaticariyāya issariyavossaggena alaṅkārānuppadānena. imehi kho, gahapatiputta, pañcahi ṭhānehi sāmikena pacchimā disā bhariyā paccupaṭṭhitā pañcahi ṭhānehi sāmikaṃ anukampati, susaṃvihitakammantā ca hoti, saṅgahitaparijanā ca, anaticārinī ca, sambhatañca anurakkhati, dakkhā ca hoti analasā sabbakiccesū''ti (dī0 ni0 3.269).

[03] ayaṃ vā aparo nayo -- ^b^saṅgaho^eb^ti dhammikāhi dānapiyavācātthacariyāhi saṅgaṇhanaṃ. seyyathidaṃ -- uposathadivasesu paribbayadānaṃ, nakkhattadivasesu nakkhattadassāpanaṃ, maṅgaladivasesu maṅgalakaraṇaṃ, diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikesu atthesu ovādānusāsananti. taṃ vuttanayeneva diṭṭhadhammikahitahetuto samparāyikahitahetuto devatāhipi namassanīyabhāvahetuto ca ``maṅgala''nti veditabbaṃ. yathāha sakko devānamindo --
[21] ``ye gahaṭṭhā puññakarā, sīlavanto upāsakā.
[22] dhammena dāraṃ posenti, te namassāmi mātalī''ti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.264).

[03] ^b^anākulā^eb^ ^a^V2.0020^ea^ ^b^kammantā^eb^ nāma kālaññutāya patirūpakāritāya analasatāya uṭṭhānavīriyasampadāya abyasanīyatāya ca kālātikkamanāppatirūpakaraṇākaraṇasithilakaraṇādiākulabhāvavirahitā kasigorakkhavaṇijjādayo kammantā. ete attano vā puttadārassa vā dāsakammakarānaṃ vā byattatāya evaṃ payojitā diṭṭheva dhamme dhanadhaññavuḍḍhipaṭilābhahetuto ``maṅgala''nti vuttā. vuttañcetaṃ bhagavatā --
[21] ``patirūpakārī dhuravā, uṭṭhātā vindate dhana''nti.. (su0 ni0 189; saṃ0 ni0 1.246) ca.
[27] ``na divā soppasīlena, rattimuṭṭhānadessinā.
[22] niccaṃ mattena soṇḍena, sakkā āvasituṃ gharaṃ..
[21] ``atisītaṃ atiuṇhaṃ, atisāyamidaṃ ahu.
[22] iti vissaṭṭhakammante, atthā accenti māṇave..
[21] ``yodha ^a^M2.0023^ea^ sītañca uṇhañca, tiṇā bhiyyo na maññati.
[22] karaṃ purisakiccāni, so sukhā na vihāyatī''ti.. ca (dī0 ni0 3.253).
[21] ``bhoge saṃharamānassa, bhamarasseva irīyato.
[22] bhogā sannicayaṃ yanti, vammikovūpacīyatī''ti.. (dī0 ni0 3.265) --
[25] ca evamādi.

[03] evaṃ imissāpi gāthāya mātupaṭṭhānaṃ, pitupaṭṭhānaṃ, puttadārassa saṅgaho, anākulā ca kammantāti cattāri maṅgalāni vuttāni, puttadārassa saṅgahaṃ vā dvidhā katvā pañca, mātāpitūpaṭṭhānaṃ vā ekameva katvā tīṇi. maṅgalattañca nesaṃ tattha tattha vibhāvitamevāti.
[03] niṭṭhitā mātāpitūpaṭṭhānanti imissā gāthāya atthavaṇṇanā.

[03] 266^b^.^eb^ idāni ^b^dānañcā^eb^ti ettha dīyate imināti dānaṃ, attano santakaṃ parassa paṭipādīyatīti vuttaṃ hoti. dhammassa cariyā, dhammā vā anapetā cariyā ^b^dhammacariyā^eb^. ñāyante ^a^V2.0021^ea^ ``amhākaṃ ime''ti ^b^ñātakā^eb^. na avajjāni ^b^anavajjāni,^eb^ aninditāni agarahitānīti vuttaṃ hoti. sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti ayaṃ padavaṇṇanā.

[03] atthavaṇṇanā pana evaṃ veditabbā -- ^b^dānaṃ^eb^ nāma paraṃ uddissa subuddhipubbikā annādidasadānavatthupariccāgacetanā taṃsampayutto vā alobho. alobhena hi taṃ vatthuṃ parassa paṭipādeti. tena vuttaṃ ``dīyate imināti dāna''nti. taṃ bahujanapiyamanāpatādīnaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ phalavisesānaṃ adhigamahetuto ``maṅgala''nti vuttaṃ. ``dāyako sīha dānapati bahuno janassa piyo hoti manāpo''ti evamādīni cettha suttāni (a0 ni0 5.34) anussaritabbāni.

[03] aparo nayo -- dānaṃ nāma duvidhaṃ āmisadānañca, dhammadānañca. tattha āmisadānaṃ vuttappakārameva. idhalokaparalokadukkhakkhayasukhāvahassa pana sammāsambuddhappaveditassa dhammassa paresaṃ hitakāmatāya desanā dhammadānaṃ. imesañca dvinnaṃ dānānaṃ etadeva aggaṃ. yathāha --
[21] ``sabbadānaṃ ^a^M2.0024^ea^ dhammadānaṃ jināti,
[27] sabbarasaṃ dhammaraso jināti.
[26] sabbaratiṃ dhammaratī jināti,
[22] taṇhakkhayo sabbadukkhaṃ jinātī''ti.. (dha0 pa0 354).
[03] tattha āmisadānassa maṅgalattaṃ vuttameva. dhammadānaṃ pana yasmā atthapaṭisaṃveditādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ, tasmā ``maṅgala''nti vuccati. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā --

[02] ``yathā yathā, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathāsutaṃ yathāpariyattaṃ dhammaṃ vitthārena paresaṃ deseti, tathā tathā so tasmiṃ dhamme atthapaṭisaṃvedī ca hoti dhammapaṭisaṃvedī cā''ti evamādi (dī0 ni0 3.355; a0 ni0 5.26).

[03] ^b^dhammacariyā^eb^ nāma dasakusalakammapathacariyā. yathāha -- ``tividhaṃ kho, gahapatayo, kāyena dhammacariyāsamacariyā hotī''ti evamādi. sā panesā dhammacariyā saggalokūpapattihetuto ``maṅgala''nti veditabbā. vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā -- ``dhammacariyāsamacariyāhetu kho, gahapatayo, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.441).

[03] ^b^ñātakā^eb^ ^a^V2.0022^ea^ nāma mātito vā pitito vā yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā sambandhā. tesaṃ bhogapārijuññena vā byādhipārijuññena vā abhihatānaṃ attano samīpaṃ āgatānaṃ yathābalaṃ ghāsacchādanadhanadhaññādīhi saṅgaho pasaṃsādīnaṃ diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ sugatigamanādīnañca samparāyikānaṃ visesādhigamānaṃ hetuto ``maṅgala''nti vuccati.

[03] ^b^anavajjāni kammāni^eb^ nāma uposathaṅgasamādānaveyyāvaccakaraṇāarāmavanaropanasetukaraṇādīni kāyavacīmanosucaritakammāni. tāni hi nānappakārahitasukhādhigamahetuto ``maṅgala''nti vuccati. ``ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ, visākhe, vijjati yaṃ idhekacco itthī vā puriso vā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavasitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā cātumahārājikānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyā''ti evamādīni cettha suttāni (a0 ni0 8.43) anussaritabbāni.
[03] evaṃ ^a^M2.0025^ea^ imissā gāthāya dānaṃ, dhammacariyā, ñātakānaṃ saṅgaho, anavajjāni kammānīti cattāri maṅgalāni vuttāni, maṅgalattañca nesaṃ tattha tattha vibhāvitamevāti.
[03] niṭṭhitā dānañcāti imissā gāthāya atthavaṇṇanā.

[03] 267^b^.^eb^ idāni ^b^āratī viratī^eb^ti ettha ^b^āratī^eb^ti āramaṇaṃ. ^b^viratī^eb^ti viramaṇaṃ, viramanti vā etāya sattāti virati. ^b^pāpā^eb^ti akusalā. madanīyaṭṭhena majjaṃ, majjassa pānaṃ majjapānaṃ, tato ^b^majjapānā^eb^. saṃyamanaṃ ^b^saṃyamo^eb^. appamajjanaṃ ^b^appamādo^eb^. ^b^dhammesū^eb^ti kusalesu. sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti ayaṃ padavaṇṇanā.

[03] atthavaṇṇanā pana evaṃ veditabbā -- ārati nāma pāpe ādīnavadassāvino manasā eva anabhirati. ^b^virati^eb^ nāma kammadvāravasena kāyavācāhi viramaṇaṃ. sā cesā virati nāma sampattavirati samādānavirati samucchedaviratīti tividhā hoti. tattha yā kulaputtassa attano jātiṃ vā kulaṃ vā gottaṃ vā paṭicca ``na me etaṃ patirūpaṃ, yvāhaṃ imaṃ pāṇaṃ haneyyaṃ, adinnaṃ ādiyeyya''ntiādinā nayena sampattavatthuto virati, ayaṃ ^b^sampattavirati^eb^ nāma. sikkhāpadasamādānavasena pana pavattā ^b^samādānavirati^eb^ nāma, yassā pavattito pabhuti kulaputto pāṇātipātādīni na samācarati. ariyamaggasampayuttā ^b^samucchedavirati^eb^ nāma, yassā pavattito pabhuti ariyasāvakassa pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti. ^b^pāpaṃ^eb^ nāma yaṃ taṃ ``pāṇātipāto kho, gahapatiputta, kammakileso adinnādānaṃ...pe0... kāmesumicchācāro...pe0... musāvādo''ti evaṃ vitthāretvā --
[21] ``pāṇātipāto ^a^V2.0023^ea^ adinnādānaṃ, musāvādo ca vuccati.
[22] paradāragamanañceva, nappasaṃsanti paṇḍitā''ti.. (dī0 ni0 3.245) --

[25] evaṃ gāthāya saṅgahitaṃ kammakilesasaṅkhātaṃ catubbidhaṃ akusalaṃ, tato pāpā. sabbāpesā ārati ca virati ca diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikabhayaverappahānādinānappakāravisesādhigamahetuto ``maṅgala''nti vuccati. ``pāṇātipātā paṭivirato kho, gahapatiputta, ariyasāvako''tiādīni cettha suttāni anussaritabbāni.

[03] ^b^majjapānā^eb^ ^a^M2.0026^ea^ ^b^ca saṃyamo^eb^ nāma pubbe vuttasurāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇiyāvetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. yasmā pana majjapāyī atthaṃ na jānāti, dhammaṃ na jānāti, mātupi antarāyaṃ karoti, pitu buddhapaccekabuddhatathāgatasāvakānampi antarāyaṃ karoti, diṭṭheva dhamme garahaṃ, samparāye duggatiṃ, aparāpariyāye ummādañca pāpuṇāti. majjapānā pana saṃyato tesaṃ dosānaṃ vūpasamaṃ tabbiparītaguṇasampadañca pāpuṇāti. tasmā ayaṃ majjapānā saṃyamo ``maṅgala''nti veditabbo.

[03] kusalesu ^b^dhammesu appamādo^eb^ nāma ``kusalānaṃ vā dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya asakkaccakiriyatā asātaccakiriyatā anaṭṭhitakiriyatā olīnavuttitā nikkhittachandatā nikkhittadhuratā anāsevanā abhāvanā abahulīkammaṃ anadhiṭṭhānaṃ ananuyogo pamādo. yo evarūpo pamādo pamajjanā pamajjitattaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati pamādo''ti (vibha0 846) ettha vuttassa pamādassa paṭipakkhanayena atthato kusalesu dhammesu satiyā avippavāso veditabbo. so nānappakārakusalādhigamahetuto amatādhigamahetuto ca ``maṅgala''nti vuccati. tattha ``appamattassa ātāpino''ti (ma0 ni0 2.18-19; a0 ni0 5.26) ca ``appamādo amatapada''nti (dha0 pa0 21) ca evamādi satthusāsanaṃ anussaritabbaṃ.
[03] evaṃ imissā gāthāya pāpā virati, majjapānā saṃyamo, kusalesu dhammesu appamādoti tīṇi maṅgalāni vuttāni, maṅgalattañca nesaṃ tattha tattha vibhāvitamevāti.
[03] niṭṭhitā āratī viratīti imissā gāthāya atthavaṇṇanā.

[03] 268^b^.^eb^ idāni ^b^gāravo cā^eb^ti ettha ^b^gāravo^eb^ti garubhāvo. ^b^nivāto^eb^ti nīcavuttitā. ^b^santuṭṭhī^eb^ti santoso. katassa jānanatā ^b^kataññutā^eb^. ^b^kālenā^eb^ti khaṇena samayena. dhammassa savanaṃ ^b^dhammassavanaṃ^eb^. sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti ayaṃ padavaṇṇanā.

[03] atthavaṇṇanā ^a^V2.0024^ea^ pana evaṃ veditabbā -- ^b^gāravo^eb^ nāma garukārapayogārahesu buddhapaccekabuddhatathāgatasāvakāacariyupajjhāyamātāpitujeṭṭhabhātikabhaginiādīsu yathānurūpaṃ garukāro garukaraṇaṃ sagāravatā. svāyaṃ gāravo yasmā sugatigamanādīnaṃ hetu. yathāha --

[02] ``garukātabbaṃ ^a^M2.0027^ea^ garuṃ karoti, mānetabbaṃ māneti, pūjetabbaṃ pūjeti. so tena kammena evaṃ samattena evaṃ samādinnena kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati. no ce kāyassa bhedā...pe0... upapajjati, sace manussattaṃ āgacchati, yattha yattha paccājāyati, uccākulīno hotī''ti (ma0 ni0 3.295).
[03] yathā cāha -- ``sattime, bhikkhave, aparihāniyā dhammā. katame satta? satthugāravatā''tiādi (a0 ni0 7.32-33). tasmā ``maṅgala''nti vuccati.

[03] ^b^nivāto^eb^ nāma nīcamanatā nivātavuttitā, yāya samannāgato puggalo nihatamāno nihatadappo pādapuñchanacoḷakasamo chinnavisāṇusabhasamo uddhaṭadāṭhasappasamo ca hutvā saṇho sakhilo sukhasambhāso hoti, ayaṃ nivāto. svāyaṃ yasādiguṇapaṭilābhahetuto ``maṅgala''nti vuccati. āha ca -- ``nivātavutti atthaddho, tādiso labhate yasa''nti evamādi (dī0 ni0 3.273).
[03] ^b^santuṭṭhi^eb^ nāma itarītarapaccayasantoso, so dvādasavidho hoti. seyyathidaṃ -- cīvare yathālābhasantoso, yathābalasantoso, yathāsāruppasantosoti tividho. evaṃ piṇḍapātādīsu.

[03] tassāyaṃ pabhedavaṇṇanā -- idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti, ayamassa cīvare ^b^yathālābhasantoso^eb^. atha pana ābādhiko hoti, garuṃ cīvaraṃ pārupanto oṇamati vā kilamati vā. so sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa cīvare ^b^yathābalasantoso^eb^. aparo bhikkhu paṇītapaccayalābhī hoti, so paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghaṃ cīvaraṃ labhitvā ``idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ bahussutānañca anurūpa''nti tesaṃ datvā attanā saṅkārakūṭā vā aññato vā kutoci nantakāni uccinitvā saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa cīvare ^b^yathāsāruppasantoso^eb^.

[03] idha ^a^M2.0028^ea^ pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti, ayamassa piṇḍapāte ^b^yathālābhasantoso^eb^. atha pana ābādhiko ^a^V2.0025^ea^ hoti, lūkhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā bāḷhaṃ rogātaṅkaṃ pāpuṇāti, so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappimadhukhīrādīni bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa piṇḍapāte ^b^yathābalasantoso^eb^. aparo bhikkhu paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, so ``ayaṃ piṇḍapāto therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ aññesañca paṇītapiṇḍapātaṃ vinā ayāpentānaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ anurūpo''ti tesaṃ datvā attanā piṇḍāya caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa piṇḍapāte ^b^yathāsāruppasantoso^eb^.

[03] idha pana bhikkhuno senāsanaṃ pāpuṇāti, so teneva santussati, puna aññaṃ sundaratarampi pāpuṇantaṃ na gaṇhāti, ayamassa senāsane ^b^yathālābhasantoso^eb^. atha pana ābādhiko hoti, nivātasenāsane vasanto ativiya pittarogādīhi āturīyati, so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa pāpuṇanake savātasītalasenāsane vasitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa senāsane ^b^yathābalasantoso^eb^. aparo bhikkhu sundaraṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati ``sundarasenāsanaṃ pamādaṭṭhānaṃ, tatra nisinnassa thinamiddhaṃ okkamati, niddābhibhūtassa ca puna paṭibujjhato kāmavitakkā samudācarantī''ti, so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlapaṇṇakuṭīsu yattha katthaci nivasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa senāsane ^b^yathāsāruppasantoso^eb^.

[03] idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati harītakaṃ vā āmalakaṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti, aññehi laddhaṃ sappimadhuphāṇitādimpi na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti, ayamassa gilānapaccaye ^b^yathālābhasantoso^eb^. atha pana ābādhiko telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato telena bhesajjaṃ katvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa gilānapaccaye ^b^yathābalasantoso^eb^. aparo bhikkhu ekasmiṃ bhājane pūtimuttaharītakaṃ ^a^M2.0029^ea^ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ ``gaṇhatha, bhante, yadicchasī''ti vuccamāno sacassa tesaṃ dvinnaṃ aññatarenapi byādhi vūpasammati, atha ``pūtimuttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇitaṃ, ayañca pūtimuttabhesajjaṃ nissāya pabbajjā, tattha te yāvajīvaṃ ussāho karaṇīyo''ti (mahāva0 128) vuttanti cintento catumadhurabhesajjaṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakena bhesajjaṃ karontopi paramasantuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa gilānapaccaye ^b^yathāsāruppasantoso^eb^.

[03] evaṃ pabhedo sabbopeso santoso santuṭṭhīti vuccati. sā atricchatāpāpicchatāmahicchatādīnaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahānādhigamahetuto sugatihetuto ariyamaggasambhārabhāvato cātuddisādibhāvahetuto ca ``maṅgala''nti veditabbā. āha ca --
[21] ``cātuddiso ^a^V2.0026^ea^ appaṭigho ca hoti,
[22] santussamāno itarītarenā''ti.. (su0 ni0 42; cūḷani0 khaggavisāṇasuttaniddesa 128) evamādi.

[03] ^b^kataññutā^eb^ nāma appassa vā bahussa vā yena kenaci katassa upakārassa punappunaṃ anussaraṇabhāvena jānanatā. apica nerayikādidukkhaparittāṇato puññāni eva pāṇīnaṃ bahūpakārāni, tato tesampi upakārānussaraṇatā ``kataññutā''ti veditabbā. sā sappurisehi pasaṃsanīyatādinānappakāravisesādhigamahetuto ``maṅgala''nti vuttā. āha ca -- ``dveme, bhikkhave, puggalā dullabhā lokasmiṃ. katame dve? yo ca pubbakārī, yo ca kataññū katavedī''ti (a0 ni0 2.120).

[03] ^b^kālena dhammassavanaṃ^eb^ nāma yasmiṃ kāle uddhaccasahagataṃ cittaṃ hoti, kāmavitakkādīnaṃ vā aññatarena abhibhūtaṃ, tasmiṃ kāle tesaṃ vinodanatthaṃ dhammassavanaṃ. apare āhu -- pañcame pañcame divase dhammassavanaṃ kālena dhammassavanaṃ nāma. yathāha āyasmā anuruddho ``pañcāhikaṃ kho pana mayaṃ, bhante, sabbarattiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sannisīdāmā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.327; mahāva0 466).

[03] apica yasmiṃ kāle kalyāṇamitte upasaṅkamitvā sakkā hoti attano kaṅkhāpaṭivinodakaṃ dhammaṃ sotuṃ, tasmiṃ kālepi dhammassavanaṃ ``kālena dhammassavana''nti veditabbaṃ. yathāha -- ``te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ^a^M2.0030^ea^ paripucchati paripañhatī''tiādi (dī0 ni0 3.358). tadetaṃ kālena dhammassavanaṃ nīvaraṇappahānacaturānisaṃsāasavakkhayādinānappakāravisesādhigamahetuto ``maṅgala''nti veditabbaṃ. vuttañhetaṃ --
[02] ``yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetaso samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, pañcassa nīvaraṇāni tasmiṃ samaye na hontī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.219) ca.
[02] ``sotānugatānaṃ, bhikkhave, dhammānaṃ...pe0... suppaṭividdhānaṃ cattāro ānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā''ti (a0 ni0 4.191) ca.

[02] ``cattārome, bhikkhave, dhammā kālena kālaṃ sammā bhāviyamānā sammā anuparivattiyamānā ^a^V2.0027^ea^ anupubbena āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pāpenti. katame cattāro? kālena dhammassavana''nti ca evamādīni (a0 ni0 4.147).
[03] evaṃ imissā gāthāya gāravo, nivāto, santuṭṭhi, kataññutā, kālena dhammassavananti pañca maṅgalāni vuttāni, maṅgalattañca nesaṃ tattha tattha vibhāvitamevāti.
[03] niṭṭhitā gāravo ca nivāto cāti imissā gāthāya atthavaṇṇanā.

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ idāni ^b^khantī cā^eb^ti ettha khamanaṃ khanti. padakkhiṇaggāhitāya sukhaṃ vaco asminti suvaco, suvacassa kammaṃ sovacassaṃ, sovacassassa bhāvo sovacassatā. kilesānaṃ samitattā ^b^samaṇā. dassana^eb^nti pekkhanaṃ. dhammassa sākacchā ^b^dhammasākacchā^eb^. sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti ayaṃ padavaṇṇanā.

[03] atthavaṇṇanā pana evaṃ veditabbā ^b^khanti^eb^ nāma adhivāsanakkhanti, yāya samannāgato bhikkhu dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosante, vadhabandhādīhi vā vihiṃsante puggale asuṇanto viya ca apassanto viya ca nibbikāro hoti khantivādī viya. yathāha --
[21] ``ahū atītamaddhānaṃ, samaṇo khantidīpano.
[22] taṃ khantiyāyeva ṭhitaṃ, kāsirājā achedayī''ti.. (jā0 1.4.51).
[01] bhaddakato ^a^M2.0031^ea^ vā manasi karoti tato uttari aparādhābhāvena āyasmā puṇṇatthero viya. yathāha --

[02] ``sace maṃ, bhante, sunāparantakā manussā akkosissanti paribhāsissanti, tattha me evaṃ bhavissati `bhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, subhaddakā vatime sunāparantakā manussā, yaṃ me nayime pāṇinā pahāraṃ dentī'''tiādi (ma0 ni0 3.396; saṃ0 ni0 4.88).
[03] yāya ca samannāgato isīnampi pasaṃsanīyo hoti. yathāha sarabhaṅgo isi --
[21] ``kodhaṃ vadhitvā na kadāci socati,
[27] makkhappahānaṃ isayo vaṇṇayanti.
[26] sabbesaṃ ^a^V2.0028^ea^ vuttaṃ pharusaṃ khametha,
[22] etaṃ khantiṃ uttamamāhu santo''ti.. (jā0 2.17.64).
[03] devatānampi pasaṃsanīyo hoti. yathāha sakko devānamindo --
[21] ``yo have balavā santo, dubbalassa titikkhati.
[22] tamāhu paramaṃ khantiṃ, niccaṃ khamati dubbalo''ti.. (saṃ0 ni0 1.250-251).
[03] buddhānampi pasaṃsanīyo hoti. yathāha bhagavā --
[21] ``akkosaṃ vadhabandhañca, aduṭṭho yo titikkhati.
[22] khantībalaṃ balānīkaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa''nti.. (dha0 pa0 399).
[03] sā panesā khanti etesañca idha vaṇṇitānaṃ aññesañca guṇānaṃ adhigamahetuto ``maṅgala''nti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^sovacassatā^eb^ nāma sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāne vikkhepaṃ vā tuṇhībhāvaṃ vā guṇadosacintanaṃ vā anāpajjitvā ativiya ādarañca gāravañca nīcamanatañca purakkhatvā ``sādhū''ti vacanakaraṇatā. sā sabrahmacārīnaṃ santikā ovādānusāsanīpaṭilābhahetuto dosappahānaguṇādhigamahetuto ca ``maṅgala''nti vuccati.

[03] ^b^samaṇānaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0032^ea^ ^b^dassanaṃ^eb^ nāma upasamitakilesānaṃ bhāvitakāyavacīcittapaññānaṃ uttamadamathasamathasamannāgatānaṃ pabbajitānaṃ upasaṅkamanupaṭṭhānānussaraṇasavanadassanaṃ, sabbampi omakadesanāya ``dassana''nti vuttaṃ. taṃ ``maṅgala''nti veditabbaṃ. kasmā? bahūpakārattā. āha ca -- ``dassanampahaṃ, bhikkhave, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakāraṃ vadāmī''tiādi (itivu0 104). yato hitakāmena kulaputtena sīlavante bhikkhū gharadvāraṃ sampatte disvā yadi deyyadhammo atthi, yathābalaṃ deyyadhammena patimānetabbā. yadi natthi, pañcapatiṭṭhitaṃ katvā vanditabbā. tasmiṃ asampajjamāne añjaliṃ paggahetvā namassitabbā, tasmimpi asampajjamāne pasannacittena piyacakkhūhi sampassitabbā. evaṃ dassanamūlakenāpi hi puññena anekāni jātisahassāni cakkhumhi rogo vā dāho vā ussadā vā piḷakā vā na honti, vippasannapañcavaṇṇasassirikāni honti cakkhūni ratanavimāne ugghāṭitamaṇikavāṭasadisāni ^a^V2.0029^ea^, satasahassakappamattaṃ devesu ca manussesu ca sabbasampattīnaṃ lābhī hoti. anacchariyañcetaṃ, yaṃ manussabhūto sappaññajātiko sammā pavattitena samaṇadassanamayena puññena evarūpaṃ vipākasampattiṃ anubhaveyya, yattha tiracchānagatānampi kevalaṃ saddhāmattakajanitassa samaṇadassanassa evaṃ vipākasampattiṃ vaṇṇayanti --
[21] ``ulūko maṇḍalakkhiko,
[27] vediyake ciradīghavāsiko.
[26] sukhito vata kosiyo ayaṃ,
[22] kāluṭṭhitaṃ passati buddhavaraṃ..
[21] ``mayi cittaṃ pasādetvā, bhikkhusaṅghe anuttare.
[22] kappānaṃ satasahassāni, duggatiṃ so na gacchati..
[21] ``devalokā cavitvāna, kusalakammena codito.
[22] bhavissati anantañāṇo, somanassoti vissuto''ti.. (ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.144; khu0 pā0 aṭṭha0 5.10).

[03] ^b^kālena dhammasākacchā^eb^ nāma padose vā paccūse vā dve suttantikā bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ suttantaṃ sākacchanti, vinayadharā vinayaṃ, ābhidhammikā abhidhammaṃ ^a^M2.0033^ea^, jātakabhāṇakā jātakaṃ, aṭṭhakathikā aṭṭhakathaṃ, līnuddhatavicikicchāparetacittavisodhanatthaṃ vā tamhi tamhi kāle sākacchanti, ayaṃ kālena dhammasākacchā. sā āgamabyattiādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ hetuto ``maṅgala''nti vuccatīti.
[03] evaṃ imissā gāthāya khanti, sovacassatā, samaṇadassanaṃ, kālena dhammasākacchāti cattāri maṅgalāni vuttāni, maṅgalattañca nesaṃ tattha tattha vibhāvitamevāti.
[03] niṭṭhitā khantī cāti imissā gāthāya atthavaṇṇanā.

[03] 270^b^.^eb^ idāni ^b^tapo cā^eb^ti ettha pāpake akusale dhamme tapatīti ^b^tapo^eb^. brahmaṃ cariyaṃ, brahmānaṃ vā cariyaṃ ^b^brahmacariyaṃ,^eb^ seṭṭhacariyanti vuttaṃ hoti. ariyasaccānaṃ dassanaṃ ^b^ariyasaccāna dassanaṃ^eb^. ariyasaccāni dassanantipi eke, taṃ na sundaraṃ. nikkhantaṃ vānatoti nibbānaṃ, sacchikaraṇaṃ ^a^V2.0030^ea^ sacchikiriyā, nibbānassa sacchikiriyā ^b^nibbānasacchikiriyā^eb^. sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti ayaṃ padavaṇṇanā.

[03] atthavaṇṇanā pana evaṃ veditabbā -- ^b^tapo^eb^ nāma abhijjhādomanassādīnaṃ tapanato indriyasaṃvaro, kosajjassa vā tapanato vīriyaṃ. tena hi samannāgato puggalo ātāpīti vuccati. svāyaṃ abhijjhādippahānajhānādipaṭilābhahetuto ``maṅgala''nti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^brahmacariyaṃ^eb^ nāma methunaviratisamaṇadhammasāsanamaggānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. tathā hi ``abrahmacariyaṃ pahāya brahmacārī hotī''ti (dī0 ni0 1.194; ma0 ni0 1.292) evamādīsu methunavirati brahmacariyanti vuccati. ``bhagavati no, āvuso, brahmacariyaṃ vussatī''ti evamādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.257) samaṇadhammo. ``na tāvāhaṃ, pāpima, parinibbāyissāmi, yāva me idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ na iddhañceva bhavissati phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujañña''nti evamādīsu (dī0 ni0 2.168; saṃ0 ni0 5.822; udā0 51) sāsanaṃ. ``ayameva kho, bhikkhu, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo brahmacariyaṃ. seyyathidaṃ, sammādiṭṭhī''ti evamādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 5.6) maggo. idha pana ariyasaccadassanena parato maggassa gahitattā avasesaṃ sabbampi vaṭṭati. tañcetaṃ uparūpari nānappakāravisesādhigamahetuto ``maṅgala''nti veditabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^ariyasaccāna^eb^ ^a^M2.0034^ea^ ^b^dassanaṃ^eb^ nāma kumārapañhe vuttatthānaṃ catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ abhisamayavasena maggadassanaṃ. taṃ saṃsāradukkhavītikkamahetuto ``maṅgala''nti vuccati.

[03] ^b^nibbānasacchikiriyā^eb^ nāma idha arahattaphalaṃ ``nibbāna''nti adhippetaṃ. tampi hi pañcagativānanena vānasaññitāya taṇhāya nikkhantattā ``nibbāna''nti vuccati. tassa patti vā paccavekkhaṇā vā ``sacchikiriyā''ti vuccati. itarassa pana nibbānassa ariyasaccānaṃ dassaneneva sacchikiriyā siddhā, tenetaṃ idha na adhippetaṃ. evamesā nibbānasacchikiriyā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārādihetuto ``maṅgala''nti veditabbā.
[03] evaṃ imissāpi gāthāya tapo, brahmacariyaṃ, ariyasaccāna dassanaṃ, nibbānasacchikiriyāti cattāri maṅgalāni vuttāni, maṅgalattañca nesaṃ tattha tattha vibhāvitamevāti.
[03] niṭṭhitā tapo cāti imissā gāthāya atthavaṇṇanā.

[03] 271^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^V2.0031^ea^ ^b^phuṭṭhassa lokadhammehī^eb^ti ettha ^b^phuṭṭhassā^eb^ti phusitassa chupitassa sampattassa. loke dhammā ^b^lokadhammā,^eb^ yāva lokappavatti, tāva anivattakā dhammāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^citta^eb^nti mano mānasaṃ. ^b^yassā^eb^ti navassa vā majjhimassa vā therassa vā. na ^b^kampatī^eb^ti na calati, na vedhati. ^b^asoka^eb^nti nissokaṃ abbūḷhasokasallaṃ. ^b^viraja^eb^nti vigatarajaṃ viddhaṃsitarajaṃ. ^b^khema^eb^nti abhayaṃ nirupaddavaṃ. sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti ayaṃ tāva padavaṇṇanā.

[03] atthavaṇṇanā pana evaṃ veditabbā -- ^b^phuṭṭhassa lokadhammehi yassa cittaṃ na kampati,^eb^ yassa lābhālābhādīhi aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi phuṭṭhassa ajjhotthaṭassa cittaṃ na kampati, na calati, na vedhati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ kenaci akampanīyalokuttarabhāvāvahanato ``maṅgala''nti veditabbaṃ.
[03] kassa pana etehi phuṭṭhassa cittaṃ na kampati? arahato khīṇāsavassa, na aññassa kassaci. vuttañhetaṃ --
[21] ``selo yathā ekagghano, vātena na samīrati.
[22] evaṃ rūpā rasā saddā, gandhā phassā ca kevalā..
[21] ``iṭṭhā ^a^M2.0035^ea^ dhammā aniṭṭhā ca, na pavedhenti tādino.
[22] ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ vippamuttaṃ, vayañcassānupassatī''ti.. (a0 ni0 6.55; mahāva0 244).

[03] ^b^asokaṃ^eb^ nāma khīṇāsavasseva cittaṃ. tañhi yo ``soko socanā socitattaṃ antosoko antoparisoko cetaso parinijjhāyitatta''ntiādinā (vibha0 237) nayena vuccati soko, tassa abhāvato asokaṃ. keci nibbānaṃ vadanti, taṃ purimapadena nānusandhiyati. yathā ca asokaṃ, evaṃ virajaṃ khemantipi khīṇāsavasseva cittaṃ. tañhi rāgadosamoharajānaṃ vigatattā ^b^virajaṃ,^eb^ catūhi ca yogehi khemattā ^b^khemaṃ^eb^. yato etaṃ tena tenākārena tamhi tamhi pavattikkhaṇe gahetvā niddiṭṭhavasena tividhampi appavattakkhandhatādilokuttamabhāvāvahanato āhuneyyādibhāvāvahanato ca ``maṅgala''nti veditabbaṃ.
[03] evaṃ imissā gāthāya aṭṭhalokadhammehi akampitacittaṃ, asokacittaṃ, virajacittaṃ, khemacittanti cattāri maṅgalāni vuttāni, maṅgalattañca nesaṃ tattha tattha vibhāvitamevāti.
[03] niṭṭhitā phuṭṭhassa lokadhammehīti imissā gāthāya atthavaṇṇanā.

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^V2.0032^ea^ bhagavā ``asevanā ca bālāna''ntiādīhi dasahi gāthāhi aṭṭhatiṃsa maṅgalāni kathetvā idāni etāneva attanā vuttamaṅgalāni thunanto ^b^``etādisāni katvānā''^eb^ti imaṃ avasānagāthamabhāsi.

[03] tassāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā -- ^b^etādisānī^eb^ti etāni īdisāni mayā vuttappakārāni bālānaṃ asevanādīni. ^b^katvānā^eb^ti katvā. katvāna katvā karitvāti hi atthato anaññaṃ. ^b^sabbatthamaparājitā^eb^ti sabbattha khandhakilesābhisaṅkhāradevaputtamārappabhedesu catūsu paccatthikesu ekenapi aparājitā hutvā, sayameva te cattāro māre parājetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. makāro cettha padasandhikaraṇamattoti viññātabbo.

[03] ^b^sabbattha sotthiṃ gacchantī^eb^ti etādisāni maṅgalāni katvā catūhi mārehi aparājitā hutvā sabbattha idhalokaparalokesu ṭhānacaṅkamanādīsu ca sotthiṃ gacchanti, bālasevanādīhi ye uppajjeyyuṃ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā ^a^M2.0036^ea^, tesaṃ abhāvā sotthiṃ gacchanti, anupaddutā anupasaṭṭhā khemino appaṭibhayā gacchantīti vuttaṃ hoti. anunāsiko cettha gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ vuttoti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^taṃ tesaṃ maṅgalamuttama^eb^nti iminā gāthāpādena bhagavā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. kathaṃ? evaṃ devaputta ye etādisāni karonti, te yasmā sabbattha sotthiṃ gacchanti, tasmā taṃ bālānaṃ asevanādi aṭṭhatiṃsavidhampi tesaṃ etādisakārakānaṃ maṅgalaṃ uttamaṃ seṭṭhaṃ pavaranti gaṇhāhīti.

[03] evañca bhagavatā niṭṭhāpitāya desanāya pariyosāne koṭisatasahassadevatā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, sotāpattisakadāgāmianāgāmiphalappattānaṃ gaṇanā asaṅkhyeyyā ahosi. atha bhagavā dutiyadivase ānandattheraṃ āmantesi -- ``imaṃ, ānanda, rattiṃ aññatarā devatā maṃ upasaṅkamitvā maṅgalapañhaṃ pucchi. athassāhaṃ aṭṭhatiṃsa maṅgalāni abhāsiṃ, uggaṇha, ānanda, imaṃ maṅgalapariyāyaṃ, uggahetvā bhikkhū vācehī''ti. thero uggahetvā bhikkhū vācesi. tayidaṃ ācariyaparamparābhataṃ yāvajjatanā pavattati, evamidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] idāni etesveva maṅgalesu ñāṇaparicayapāṭavatthaṃ ayaṃ ādito pabhuti yojanā -- evamime idhalokaparalokalokuttarasukhakāmā sattā bālajanasevanaṃ pahāya, paṇḍite nissāya, pūjaneyye pūjentā, patirūpadesavāsena pubbe katapuññatāya ca kusalappavattiyaṃ codiyamānā, attānaṃ sammā paṇidhāya, bāhusaccasippavinayehi alaṅkatattabhāvā, vinayānurūpaṃ subhāsitaṃ bhāsamānā ^a^V2.0033^ea^, yāva gihibhāvaṃ na vijahanti, tāva mātāpitūpaṭṭhānena porāṇaṃ iṇamūlaṃ visodhayamānā, puttadārasaṅgahena navaṃ iṇamūlaṃ payojayamānā, anākulakammantatāya dhanadhaññādisamiddhiṃ pāpuṇantā, dānena bhogasāraṃ dhammacariyāya jīvitasārañca gahetvā, ñātisaṅgahena sakajanahitaṃ anavajjakammantatāya parajanahitañca karontā, pāpaviratiyā parūpaghātaṃ majjapānasaṃyamena attūpaghātañca vivajjetvā, dhammesu appamādena kusalapakkhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā, vaḍḍhitakusalatāya gihibyañjanaṃ ohāya pabbajitabhāve ṭhitāpi buddhabuddhasāvakupajjhācariyādīsu gāravena nivātena ca vattasampadaṃ ārādhetvā, santuṭṭhiyā paccayagedhaṃ ^a^M2.0037^ea^ pahāya, kataññutāya sappurisabhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā, dhammassavanena cittalīnataṃ pahāya, khantiyā sabbaparissaye abhibhavitvā, sovacassatāya sanāthamattānaṃ katvā, samaṇadassanena paṭipattipayogaṃ passantā, dhammasākacchāya kaṅkhāṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodetvā, indriyasaṃvaratapena sīlavisuddhiṃ samaṇadhammabrahmacariyena cittavisuddhiṃ tato parā ca catasso visuddhiyo sampādentā, imāya paṭipadāya ariyasaccadassanapariyāyaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ patvā arahattaphalasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikaronti. yaṃ sacchikatvā sinerupabbato viya vātavuṭṭhīhi aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi avikampamānacittā asokā virajā khemino honti. ye ca khemino, te sabbattha ekenāpi aparājitā honti, sabbattha ca sotthiṃ gacchanti. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``etādisāni katvāna, sabbatthamaparājitā.
[22] sabbattha sotthiṃ gacchanti, taṃ tesaṃ maṅgalamuttama''nti..
[06] iti paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya maṅgalasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0034^ea^ ^a^P1.0301^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti sūcilomasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? atthavaṇṇanānayenevassa uppatti āvi bhavissati. atthavaṇṇanāyañca ``evaṃ me suta''ntiādi vuttatthameva. ^b^gayāyaṃ viharati ṭaṅkitamañce sūcilomassa yakkhassa bhavane^eb^ti ettha pana kā gayā, ko ṭaṅkitamañco, kasmā ca bhagavā tassa yakkhassa bhavane viharatīti? vuccate -- ^b^gayā^eb^ti gāmopi titthampi vuccati, tadubhayampi idha vaṭṭati. gayāgāmassa hi avidūre dese viharantopi ``gayāyaṃ viharatī''ti vuccati, tassa ca gāmassa samīpe avidūre dvārasantike so ṭaṅkitamañco. gayātitthe viharantopi ``gayāyaṃ viharatī''ti vuccati, gayātitthe ca so ṭaṅkitamañco. ^b^ṭaṅkitamañco^eb^ti catunnaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ upari vitthataṃ pāsāṇaṃ āropetvā kato pāsāṇamañco ^a^M2.0038^ea^. taṃ nissāya yakkhassa bhavanaṃ āḷavakassa bhavanaṃ viya. yasmā vā pana bhagavā taṃ divasaṃ paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento sūcilomassa ca kharalomassa cāti dvinnampi yakkhānaṃ sotāpattiphalūpanissayaṃ addasa, tasmā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya antoaruṇeyeva nānādisāhi sannipatitassa janassa kheḷasiṅghāṇikādinānappakārāsucinissandakilinnabhūmibhāgampi taṃ titthappadesaṃ āgantvā tasmiṃ ṭaṅkitamañce nisīdi sūcilomassa yakkhassa bhavane. tena vuttaṃ ``ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā gayāyaṃ viharati ṭaṅkitamañce sūcilomassa yakkhassa bhavane''ti.

[03] ^b^tena kho pana samayenā^eb^ti yaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā tattha viharati, tena samayena. ^b^kharo ca yakkho sūcilomo ca yakkho bhagavato avidūre atikkamantī^eb^ti. ke te yakkhā, kasmā ca atikkamantīti? vuccate -- tesu tāva eko atīte saṅghassa telaṃ anāpucchā gahetvā attano sarīraṃ makkhesi. so tena kammena niraye paccitvā gayāpokkharaṇitīre yakkhayoniyaṃ nibbatto. tasseva cassa kammassa vipākāvasesena virūpāni aṅgapaccaṅgāni ahesuṃ ^a^P1.0302^ea^, iṭṭhakacchadanasadisañca kharasamphassaṃ cammaṃ. so kira yadā paraṃ bhiṃsāpetukāmo hoti, tadā chadaniṭṭhakasadisāni cammakapālāni ukkhipitvā bhiṃsāpeti. evaṃ so kharasamphassattā ^b^kharo yakkho^eb^tveva nāmaṃ labhi.

[03] itaro ^a^V2.0035^ea^ kassapassa bhagavato kāle upāsako hutvā māsassa aṭṭha divase vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇāti. so ekadivasaṃ dhammassavane ghosite saṅghārāmadvāre attano khettaṃ kelāyanto ugghosanaṃ sutvā ``sace nhāyāmi, ciraṃ bhavissatī''ti kiliṭṭhagattova uposathāgāraṃ pavisitvā mahagghe bhummattharaṇe anādarena nipajjitvā supi. bhikkhu evāyaṃ, na upāsakoti saṃyuttabhāṇakā. so tena ca aññena kammena ca niraye paccitvā gayāpokkharaṇiyā tīre yakkhayoniyaṃ nibbatto. so tassa kammassa vipākāvasesena duddasiko ahosi, sarīre cassa sūcisadisāni lomāni ahesuṃ. so hi bhiṃsāpetabbake satte sūcīhi vijjhanto viya bhiṃsāpeti. evaṃ so sūcisadisalomattā ^b^sūcilomo yakkho^eb^tveva nāmaṃ labhi. te attano gocaratthāya bhavanato ^a^M2.0039^ea^ nikkhamitvā muhuttaṃ gantvā gatamaggeneva nivattitvā itaraṃ disābhāgaṃ gacchantā bhagavato avidūre atikkamanti.

[03] ^b^atha kho kharo^eb^ti kasmā te evamāhaṃsu? kharo samaṇakappaṃ disvā āha. sūcilomo pana ``yo bhāyati na so samaṇo, samaṇapaṭirūpakattā pana samaṇako hotī''ti evaṃladdhiko. tasmā tādisaṃ bhagavantaṃ maññamāno ^b^``neso samaṇo, samaṇako eso''^eb^ti sahasāva vatvāpi puna vīmaṃsitukāmo āha -- ^b^``yāvāhaṃ jānāmī''^eb^ti. ``atha kho''ti evaṃ vatvā tato. ^b^sūcilomo yakkho^eb^ti ito pabhuti yāva ^b^apica kho te samphasso pāpakoti,^eb^ tāva uttānatthameva kevalañcettha ^b^bhagavato kāya^eb^nti attano kāyaṃ bhagavato upanāmesīti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo.

[03] tato abhāyantaṃ bhagavantaṃ ^a^P1.0303^ea^ disvā ^b^``pañhaṃ taṃ samaṇā''^eb^tiādimāha. kiṃ kāraṇā? so hi cintesi -- ``imināpi nāma me evaṃ kharena amanussasamphassena manusso samāno ayaṃ na bhāyati, handāhaṃ etaṃ buddhavisaye pañhaṃ pucchāmi, addhā ayaṃ tattha na sampāyissati, tato naṃ evaṃ viheṭhessāmī''ti. bhagavā taṃ sutvā ``na khvāhaṃ taṃ āvuso''tiādimāha. taṃ sabbaṃ āḷavakasutte vuttanayeneva sabbākārehi veditabbaṃ.

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ ^b^atha kho sūcilomo yakkho bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi ``rāgo ca doso cā''^eb^ti. tattha rāgadosā vuttanayā eva. ^b^kutonidānā^eb^ti kiṃnidānā kiṃhetukā. ^b^kuto^eb^ti paccattavacanassa to-ādeso veditabbo, samāse cassa lopābhāvo. atha vā ^b^nidānā^eb^ti jātā uppannāti attho, tasmā kutonidānā, kutojātā, kutouppannāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^aratī ratī lomahaṃso kutojā^eb^ti yāyaṃ ``pantesu vā senāsanesu aññataraññataresu vā adhikusalesu dhammesu arati ^a^V2.0036^ea^ aratitā anabhirati anabhiramaṇā ukkaṇṭhitā paritassitā''ti (vibha0 856) evaṃ vibhattā arati, yā ca pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rati, yo ca lomahaṃsasamuṭṭhāpanato ``lomahaṃso''tveva saṅkhyaṃ gato cittutrāso. ime tayo dhammā kutojā kutojātāti pucchati ^a^M2.0040^ea^. ^b^kuto samuṭṭhāyā^eb^ti kuto uppajjitvā. ^b^mano^eb^ti kusalacittaṃ, ^b^vitakkā^eb^ti uragasutte vuttā nava kāmavitakkādayo. ^b^kumārakā dhaṅkamivossajantī^eb^ti yathā gāmadārakā kīḷantā kākaṃ suttena pāde bandhitvā ossajanti khipanti, evaṃ kusalamanaṃ akusalavitakkā kuto samuṭṭhāya ossajantīti pucchati.

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ athassa bhagavā te pañhe vissajjento ^b^``rāgo cā''^eb^ti dutiyagāthamabhāsi. tattha ^b^ito^eb^ti attabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha. attabhāvanidānā hi rāgadosā. aratiratilomahaṃsā ca attabhāvato jātā, kāmavitakkādiakusalavitakkā ca attabhāvatoyeva ^a^P1.0304^ea^ samuṭṭhāya kusalamano ossajanti, tena tadaññaṃ pakatiādikāraṇaṃ paṭikkhipanto āha -- ^b^``itonidānā itojā ito samuṭṭhāyā''^eb^ti. saddasiddhi cettha purimagāthāya vuttanayeneva veditabbā.

[03] 275-6^b^.^eb^ evaṃ te pañhe vissajjetvā idāni yvāyaṃ ``itonidānā''tiādīsu ``attabhāvanidānā attabhāvato jātā attabhāvato samuṭṭhāyā''ti attho vutto, taṃ sādhento āha -- ^b^``snehajā attasambhūtā''^eb^ti. ete hi sabbepi rāgādayo vitakkapariyosānā taṇhāsnehena jātā, tathā jāyantā ca pañcupādānakkhandhabhede attabhāvapariyāye attani sambhūtā. tenāha -- ``snehajā attasambhūtā''ti. idāni tadatthajotikaṃ upamaṃ karoti ^b^``nigrodhasseva khandhajā''^eb^ti. tattha khandhesu jātā ^b^khandhajā,^eb^ pārohānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? yathā nigrodhassa khandhajā nāma pārohā āporasasinehe sati jāyanti, jāyantā ca tasmiṃyeva nigrodhe tesu tesu sākhappabhedesu sambhavanti, evametepi rāgādayo ajjhattataṇhāsnehe sati jāyanti, jāyantā ca tasmiṃyeva attabhāve tesu tesu cakkhādibhedesu dvārārammaṇavatthūsu sambhavanti. tasmā veditabbametaṃ ``attabhāvanidānā attabhāvajā attabhāvasamuṭṭhānā ca ete''ti.

[03] avasesadiyaḍḍhagāthāya pana ayaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikā atthavaṇṇanā -- evaṃ attasambhūtā ca ete ^b^puthū visattā kāmesu^eb^. rāgopi hi pañcakāmaguṇikādivasena, dosopi āghātavatthādivasena, aratiādayopi tassa tasseva bhedassa vasenāti sabbathā sabbepime kilesā puthū anekappakārā ^a^M2.0041^ea^ hutvā vatthudvārārammaṇādivasena tesu tesu vatthukāmesu tathā tathā visattā laggā laggitā ^a^V2.0037^ea^ saṃsibbitvā ṭhitā. kimiva? ^b^māluvāva vitatā vane,^eb^ yathā vane vitatā māluvā tesu tesu rukkhassa sākhapasākhādibhedesu visattā hoti laggā laggitā saṃsibbitvā ṭhitā, evaṃ puthuppabhedesu vatthukāmesu visattaṃ kilesagaṇaṃ ^b^ye naṃ pajānanti yatonidānaṃ, te naṃ vinodenti suṇohi yakkha^eb^ ^a^P1.0305^ea^.

[03] tattha ^b^yatonidāna^eb^nti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, tena kiṃ dīpeti? ye sattā naṃ kilesagaṇaṃ ``yatonidānaṃ uppajjatī''ti evaṃ jānanti, te naṃ ``taṇhāsnehasnehite attabhāve uppajjatī''ti ñatvā taṃ taṇhāsnehaṃ ādīnavānupassanādibhāvanāñāṇagginā visosentā vinodenti pajahanti byantīkaronti ca, etaṃ amhākaṃ subhāsitaṃ suṇohi yakkhāti. evamettha attabhāvajānanena dukkhapariññaṃ taṇhāsneharāgādikilesagaṇavinodanena samudayappahānañca dīpeti.

[03] ye ca naṃ vinodenti, ^b^te duttaraṃ oghamimaṃ taranti atiṇṇapubbaṃ apunabbhavāya^eb^. etena maggabhāvanaṃ nirodhasacchikiriyañca dīpeti. ye hi naṃ kilesagaṇaṃ vinodenti, te avassaṃ maggaṃ bhāventi. na hi maggabhāvanaṃ vinā kilesavinodanaṃ atthi. ye ca maggaṃ bhāventi, te duttaraṃ pakatiñāṇena kāmoghādiṃ catubbidhampi oghamimaṃ taranti. maggabhāvanā hi oghataraṇaṃ. ^b^atiṇṇapubba^eb^nti iminā dīghena addhunā supinantenapi avītikkantapubbaṃ. ^b^apunabbhavāyā^eb^ti nibbānāya. evamimaṃ catusaccadīpikaṃ gāthaṃ suṇantā ``sutvā dhammaṃ dhārenti, dhatānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthamupaparikkhantī''tiādikaṃ kathaṃ subhāviniyā paññāya anukkamamānā te dvepi sahāyakā yakkhā gāthāpariyosāneyeva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, pāsādikā ca ahesuṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇā dibbālaṅkāravibhūsitāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya sūcilomasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^dhammacariya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0038^ea^ ^a^M2.0042^ea^ kapilasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? hemavatasutte vuttanayeneva parinibbute kassape bhagavati dve kulaputtā bhātaro nikkhamitvā sāvakānaṃ santike pabbajiṃsu. jeṭṭho sodhano nāma, kaniṭṭho kapilo nāma. tesaṃ mātā sādhanī nāma, kaniṭṭhabhaginī tāpanā nāma. tāpi bhikkhunīsu ^a^P1.0306^ea^ pabbajiṃsu. tato te dvepi hemavatasutte vuttanayeneva ``sāsane kati dhurānī''ti pucchitvā sutvā ca jeṭṭho ``vāsadhuraṃ pūressāmī''ti pañca vassāni ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike vasitvā pañcavasso hutvā yāva arahattaṃ, tāva kammaṭṭhānaṃ sutvā araññaṃ pavisitvā vāyamanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. kapilo ``ahaṃ tāva taruṇo, vuḍḍhakāle vāsadhuraṃ paripūressāmī''ti ganthadhuraṃ ārabhitvā tepiṭako ahosi. tassa pariyattiṃ nissāya parivāro, parivāraṃ nissāya lābho ca udapādi.

[03] so bāhusaccamadena matto paṇḍitamānī anaññātepi aññātamānī hutvā parehi vuttaṃ kappiyampi akappiyaṃ, akappiyampi kappiyaṃ, sāvajjampi anavajjaṃ, anavajjampi sāvajjanti bhaṇati. so pesalehi bhikkhūhi, ``mā, āvuso kapila, evaṃ avacā''tiādinā nayena ovadiyamāno ``tumhe kiṃ jānātha rittamuṭṭhisadisā''tiādīhi vacanehi khuṃsento vambhentoyeva carati. bhikkhū tassa bhātuno sodhanattherassāpi etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. sopi naṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha -- ``āvuso kapila, sāsanassa āyu nāma tumhādisānaṃ sammāpaṭipatti. mā, āvuso kapila, kappiyampi akappiyaṃ, akappiyampi kappiyaṃ, sāvajjampi anavajjaṃ, anavajjampi sāvajjanti vadehī''ti. so tassapi vacanaṃ nādiyi. tato naṃ sodhanatthero dvattikkhattuṃ vatvā --
[21] ``ekavācampi dvivācaṃ, bhaṇeyya anukampako.
[22] tatuttariṃ na bhāseyya, dāsovayyassa santike''ti.. (jā0 2.19.34) --
[25] parivajjetvā ``tvameva, āvuso, sakena kammena paññāyissasī''ti pakkāmi. tato pabhuti naṃ pesalā bhikkhū chaḍḍesuṃ.

[03] so ^a^V2.0039^ea^ ^a^M2.0043^ea^ durācāro hutvā durācāraparivuto viharanto ekadivasaṃ ``uposathaṃ osāressāmī''ti sīhāsanaṃ abhiruyha citrabījaniṃ gahetvā nisinno ``vattati, āvuso, ettha bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkho''ti tikkhattuṃ āha. atheko bhikkhupi ``mayhaṃ ^a^P1.0307^ea^ vattatī''ti na avoca. na ca tassa tesaṃ vā pātimokkho vattati. tato so ``pātimokkhe sutepi asutepi vinayo nāma natthī''ti āsanā vuṭṭhāsi. evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ osakkāpesi vināsesi. atha sodhanatthero tadaheva parinibbāyi. sopi kapilo evaṃ taṃ sāsanaṃ osakkāpetvā kālakato avīcimahāniraye nibbatti, sāpissa mātā ca bhaginī ca tasseva diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjitvā pesale bhikkhū akkosamānā paribhāsamānā kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbattiṃsu.

[03] tasmiṃyeva ca kāle pañcasatā purisā gāmaghātādīni katvā corikāya jīvantā janapadamanussehi anubaddhā palāyamānā araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha kiñci gahanaṃ vā paṭisaraṇaṃ vā apassantā avidūre pāsāṇe vasantaṃ aññataraṃ āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā vanditvā ``amhākaṃ, bhante, paṭisaraṇaṃ hothā''ti bhaṇiṃsu. thero ``tumhākaṃ sīlasadisaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ natthi, sabbe pañca sīlāni samādiyathā''ti āha. te ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchitvā sīlāni samādiyiṃsu. thero ``tumhe sīlavanto, idāni attano jīvitaṃ vināsentesupi mā mano padūsayitthā''ti āha. te ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchiṃsu. atha te jānapadā sampattā ito cito ca maggamānā te core disvā sabbeva jīvitā voropesuṃ. te kālaṃ katvā kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbattiṃsu. tesu jeṭṭhakacoro jeṭṭhakadevaputto ahosi, itare tasseva parivārā.

[03] te anulomapaṭilomaṃ saṃsarantā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke khepetvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle devalokato cavitvā jeṭṭhakadevaputto sāvatthidvāre kevaṭṭagāmo atthi, tattha pañcasatakulajeṭṭhassa kevaṭṭassa pajāpatiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi, itare avasesakevaṭṭapajāpatīnaṃ. evaṃ tesaṃ ekadivasaṃyeva paṭisandhiggahaṇañca gabbhavuṭṭhānañca ahosi. atha kevaṭṭajeṭṭho ``atthi nu kho imasmiṃ gāme aññepi dārakā ajja jātā''ti vicinanto te dārake disvā ``ime me ^a^P1.0308^ea^ puttassa sahāyakā bhavissantī''ti sabbesaṃ posāvanikaṃ adāsi. te sabbe sahāyakā ^a^M2.0044^ea^ sahapaṃsuṃ kīḷantā anupubbena vayappattā ahesuṃ. yasojo tesaṃ aggo ahosi.

[03] kapilopi ^a^V2.0040^ea^ tadā niraye pakkāvasesena aciravatiyā suvaṇṇavaṇṇo duggandhamukho maccho hutvā nibbatti. athekadivasaṃ sabbepi kevaṭṭadārakā jālāni gahetvā ``macche bandhissāmā''ti nadiṃ gantvā jālāni pakkhipiṃsu. tesaṃ jālaṃ so maccho pāvisi. taṃ disvā sabbo kevaṭṭagāmo uccāsaddamahāsaddo ahosi -- ``amhākaṃ puttā paṭhamaṃ macche bandhantā suvaṇṇamacchaṃ bandhiṃsu, vuḍḍhi nesaṃ dārakānaṃ, idāni ca no rājā pahūtaṃ dhanaṃ dassatī''ti. atha te pañcasatāpi dārakasahāyakā macchaṃ nāvāya pakkhipitvā nāvaṃ ukkhipitvā rañño santikaṃ agamaṃsu. rājā disvā ``kiṃ etaṃ bhaṇe''ti āha. ``maccho devā''ti. rājā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ macchaṃ disvā ``bhagavā etassa vaṇṇakāraṇaṃ jānissatī''ti macchaṃ gāhāpetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi. macchassa mukhavivaraṇakāle jetavanaṃ ativiya duggandhaṃ hoti.

[03] rājā bhagavantaṃ pucchi -- ``kasmā, bhante, maccho suvaṇṇavaṇṇo jāto, kasmā cassa mukhato duggandho vāyatī''ti? ayaṃ, mahārāja, kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane kapilo nāma bhikkhu ahosi, bahussuto āgatāgamo. attano vacanaṃ agaṇhantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ akkosakaparibhāsako. tassa ca bhagavato sāsanavināsako. yaṃ so tassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ vināsesi, tena kammena avīcimahāniraye nibbatti, vipākāvasesena ca idāni maccho jāto. yaṃ dīgharattaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vācesi, buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ kathesi, tassa nissandena īdisaṃ vaṇṇaṃ paṭilabhi. yaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ akkosakaparibhāsako ahosi, tenassa mukhato duggandho vāyati. ``ullapāpemi naṃ mahārājā''ti? ``āma bhagavā''ti. atha bhagavā ^a^P1.0309^ea^ macchaṃ ālapi -- ``tvaṃsi kapilo''ti? ``āma bhagavā, ahaṃ kapilo''ti. ``kuto āgatosī''ti? ``avīcimahānirayato bhagavā''ti. ``sodhano kuhiṃ gato''ti? ``parinibbuto bhagavā''ti. ``sādhanī kuhiṃ gatā''ti? ``mahāniraye nibbattā bhagavā''ti. ``tāpanā kuhiṃ gatā''ti? ``mahāniraye nibbattā bhagavā''ti. ``idāni tvaṃ kuhiṃ gamissasī''ti? ``mahānirayaṃ bhagavā''ti. tāvadeva vippaṭisārābhibhūto nāvaṃ sīsena paharitvā kālakato mahāniraye nibbatti. mahājano saṃviggo ahosi lomahaṭṭhajāto. atha ^a^M2.0045^ea^ bhagavā tattha sampattagahaṭṭhapabbajitaparisāya taṅkhaṇānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desento imaṃ suttamabhāsi.

[03] 277-8^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^dhammacariya^eb^nti kāyasucaritādi dhammacariyaṃ. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti maggabrahmacariyaṃ. ^b^etadāhu vasuttama^eb^nti etaṃ ubhayampi lokiyalokuttaraṃ sucaritaṃ saggamokkhasukhasampāpakattā vasuttamanti āhu ariyā. vasuttamaṃ nāma uttamaratanaṃ, anugāmikaṃ attādhīnaṃ rājādīnaṃ asādhāraṇanti adhippāyo.

[03] ettāvatā ^a^V2.0041^ea^ ``gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā sammāpaṭipattiyeva paṭisaraṇa''nti dassetvā idāni paṭipattivirahitāya pabbajjāya asārakattadassanena kapilaṃ aññe ca tathārūpe garahanto ^b^``pabbajitopi ce hotī''^eb^ti evamādimāha.

[03] tatrāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā -- yo hi koci gihibyañjanāni apanetvā bhaṇḍukāsāvādigahaṇamattaṃ upasaṅkamanena ^b^pabbajitopi ce^eb^ ^b^hoti^eb^ pubbe vuttatthaṃ ^b^agārasmā anagāriyaṃ, so ce mukharajātiko^eb^ hoti pharusavacano, nānappakārāya vihesāya abhiratattā ^b^vihesābhirato,^eb^ hirottappābhāvena magasadisattā ^b^mago, jīvitaṃ tassa pāpiyo,^eb^ tassa evarūpassa jīvitaṃ atipāpaṃ atihīnaṃ. kasmā? yasmā imāya micchāpaṭipattiyā rāgādimanekappakāraṃ ^b^rajaṃ vaḍḍheti attano^eb^.

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ na kevalañca imināva kāraṇenassa jīvitaṃ pāpiyo, apica kho pana ayaṃ evarūpo mukharajātikattā ^b^kalahābhirato bhikkhu^eb^ subhāsitassa atthavijānanasammohanena ^a^P1.0310^ea^ ^b^mohadhammena āvuto,^eb^ ``mā, āvuso kapila, evaṃ avaca, imināpi pariyāyena taṃ gaṇhāhī''ti evamādinā nayena pesalehi bhikkhūhi ^b^akkhātampi na jānāti dhammaṃ buddhena desitaṃ^eb^. yo dhammo buddhena desito, taṃ nānappakārena attano vuccamānampi na jānāti. evampissa jīvitaṃ pāpiyo.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ tathā so evarūpo vihesābhiratattā ^b^vihesaṃ bhāvitattānaṃ^eb^ bhāvitatte khīṇāsavabhikkhū sodhanattherapabhutike ``na tumhe vinayaṃ jānātha, na suttaṃ na abhidhammaṃ, vuḍḍhapabbajitā''tiādinā nayena vihesanto ^a^M2.0046^ea^. upayogappavattiyañhi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. atha vā yathāvutteneva nayena ``vihesaṃ bhāvitattānaṃ karonto''ti pāṭhaseso veditabbo. evaṃ nippariyāyameva sāmivacanaṃ sijjhati. ^b^avijjāya purakkhato^eb^ti bhāvitattavihesane ādīnavadassanapaṭicchādikāya avijjāya purakkhato pesito payojito sesapabbajitānaṃ bhāvitattānaṃ vihesabhāvena pavattaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme cittavibādhanena ^b^saṅkilesaṃ,^eb^ āyatiñca nirayasampāpanena ^b^maggaṃ nirayagāminaṃ^eb^ na jānāti.

[03] 281^b^.^eb^ ajānanto ca tena maggena catubbidhāpāyabhedaṃ ^b^vinipātaṃ samāpanno^eb^. tattha ca vinipāte ^b^gabbhā gabbhaṃ tamā tamaṃ^eb^ ekekanikāye satakkhattuṃ sahassakkhattumpi mātukucchito mātukucchiṃ candimasūriyehipi aviddhaṃsanīyā asurakāyatamā tamañca samāpanno. ^b^sa ve tādisako^eb^ ^a^V2.0042^ea^ ^b^bhikkhu pecca^eb^ ito paralokaṃ gantvā ayaṃ kapilamaccho viya nānappakāraṃ ^b^dukkhaṃ nigacchati.^eb^

[03] 282^b^.^eb^ kiṃ kāraṇā?^b^ gūthakūpo yathā assa, sampuṇṇo gaṇavassiko,^eb^yathā vaccakuṭigūthakūpo gaṇavassiko anekavassiko bahūni vassāni mukhato gūthena pūriyamāno sampuṇṇo assa, so udakakumbhasatehi ^a^P1.0311^ea^ udakakumbhasahassehi dhoviyamānopi duggandhadubbaṇṇiyānapagamā dubbisodho hoti, evameva ^b^yo evarūpo assa^eb^ dīgharattaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhakammanto gūthakūpo viya gūthena pāpena sampuṇṇattā sampuṇṇo puggalo, so ^b^dubbisodho hi sāṅgaṇo^eb^, cirakālaṃ tassa aṅgaṇassa vipākaṃ paccanubhontopi na sujjhati. tasmā vassagaṇanāya aparimāṇampi kālaṃ sa ve tādisako bhikkhu pecca dukkhaṃ nigacchatīti. atha vā ayaṃ imissā gāthāya sambandho -- yaṃ vuttaṃ ``sa ve tādisako bhikkhu, pecca dukkhaṃ nigacchatī''ti, tatra siyā tumhākaṃ ``sakkā panāyaṃ tathā kātuṃ, yathā pecca dukkhaṃ na nigaccheyyā''ti. na sakkā. kasmā? yasmā ^b^gūthakūpo...pe0... sāṅgaṇo^eb^ti.

[03] 283-4^b^.^eb^ yato ^a^M2.0047^ea^ paṭikacceva ^b^yaṃ evarūpaṃ jānātha, bhikkhavo gehanissitaṃ,^eb^ yaṃ evarūpaṃ pañcakāmaguṇanissitaṃ jāneyyātha abhūtaguṇapatthanākārappavattāya pāpikāya icchāya samannāgatattā ^b^pāpicchaṃ,^eb^ kāmavitakkādīhi samannāgatattā ^b^pāpasaṅkappaṃ,^eb^ kāyikavītikkamādinā veḷudānādibhedena ca pāpācārena samannāgatattā ^b^pāpācāraṃ,^eb^ vesiyādipāpagocarato ^b^pāpagocaraṃ, sabbe samaggā hutvāna abhinibbajjiyātha naṃ^eb^. tattha ^b^abhinibbajjiyāthā^eb^ti vivajjeyyātha mā bhajeyyātha, mā cassa abhinibbajjanamatteneva appossukkataṃ āpajjeyyātha, apica kho pana ^b^kāraṇḍavaṃ niddhamatha, kasambuṃ apakassatha,^eb^ taṃ kacavarabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ kacavaramiva anapekkhā niddhamatha, kasaṭabhūtañca naṃ khattiyādīnaṃ majjhe paviṭṭhaṃ pabhinnapaggharitakuṭṭhaṃ caṇḍālaṃ viya apakassatha, hatthe vā sīse vā gahetvā nikkaḍḍhatha. seyyathāpi ^a^P1.0312^ea^ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ puggalaṃ pāpadhammaṃ bāhāya gahetvā bahidvārakoṭṭhakā nikkhāmetvā sūcighaṭikaṃ adāsi, evaṃ apakassathāti dasseti. kiṃ kāraṇā? saṅghārāmo nāma sīlavantānaṃ kato, na dussīlānaṃ.

[03] 285-6^b^.^eb^ yato etadeva ^b^tato palāpe vāhetha, assamaṇe samaṇamānine,^eb^ yathā hi palāpā anto taṇḍularahitāpi bahi thusehi vīhī viya dissanti, evaṃ pāpabhikkhū anto sīlādivirahitāpi bahi kāsāvādiparikkhārena bhikkhū viya dissanti. tasmā ``palāpā''ti vuccanti. te palāpe vāhetha, opunātha, vidhamatha paramatthato assamaṇe vesamattena samaṇamānine ^a^V2.0043^ea^. evaṃ ^b^niddhamitvāna...pe0... patissatā^eb^. tattha ^b^kappayavho^eb^ti kappetha, karothāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^patissatā^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ sagāravā sappatissā. ^b^tato samaggā nipakā, dukkhassantaṃ karissathā^eb^ti athevaṃ tumhe suddhā suddhehi saṃvāsaṃ kappentā, diṭṭhisīlasāmaññatāya samaggā, anupubbena paripākagatāya paññāya nipakā, sabbassevimassa vaṭṭadukkhādino dukkhassa antaṃ karissathāti arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.

[03] desanāpariyosāne te pañcasatā kevaṭṭaputtā saṃvegamāpajjitvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ patthayamānā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva dukkhassantaṃ ^a^M2.0048^ea^ katvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ āneñjavihārasamāpattidhammaparibhogena ekaparibhogā ahesuṃ. sā ca nesaṃ evaṃ bhagavatā saddhiṃ ekaparibhogatā udāne vuttayasojasuttavaseneva veditabbāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya kapilasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0044^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti brāhmaṇadhammikasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? ayameva yāssa nidāne ``atha kho sambahulā''tiādinā nayena vuttā. tattha ^a^P1.0313^ea^ ^b^sambahulā^eb^ti bahū aneke. ^b^kosalakā^eb^ti kosalaraṭṭhavāsino. ^b^brāhmaṇamahāsālā^eb^ti jātiyā brāhmaṇā mahāsāratāya mahāsālā. yesaṃ kira nidahitvā ṭhapitaṃyeva asītikoṭisaṅkhyaṃ dhanamatthi, te ``brāhmaṇamahāsālā''ti vuccanti. ime ca tādisā, tena vuttaṃ ``brāhmaṇamahāsālā''ti. ^b^jiṇṇā^eb^ti jajjarībhūtā jarāya khaṇḍiccādibhāvamāpāditā. ^b^vuḍḍhā^eb^ti aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ vuḍḍhimariyādaṃ pattā. ^b^mahallakā^eb^ti jātimahallakatāya samannāgatā, cirakālappasutāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^addhagatā^eb^ti addhānaṃ gatā, dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe atītāti adhippāyo. ^b^vayo anuppattā^eb^ti pacchimavayaṃ sampattā. apica ^b^jiṇṇā^eb^ti porāṇā, cirakālappavattakulanvayāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^vuḍḍhā^eb^ti sīlācārādiguṇavuḍḍhiyuttā. ^b^mahallakā^eb^ti vibhavamahantatāya samannāgatā mahaddhanā mahābhogā. ^b^addhagatā^eb^ti maggapaṭipannā brāhmaṇānaṃ vatacariyādimariyādaṃ avītikkamma caramānā. ^b^vayo anuppattā^eb^ti jātivuḍḍhabhāvampi antimavayaṃ anuppattāti evampettha yojanā veditabbā. sesamettha pākaṭameva.

[03] ^b^bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodiṃsū^eb^ti khamanīyādīni pucchantā aññamaññaṃ samappavattamodā ahesuṃ. yāya ca ``kacci bhoto gotamassa khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, appābādhaṃ, appātaṅkaṃ, balaṃ, lahuṭṭhānaṃ, phāsuvihāro''tiādikāya kathāya sammodiṃsu, taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātasammodajananato sammodituṃ arahato ca ^b^sammodanīyaṃ,^eb^ atthabyañjanamadhuratāya sucirampi ^a^M2.0049^ea^ kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ arahato saritabbabhāvato ca ^b^sāraṇīyaṃ^eb^. suyyamānasukhato ca sammodanīyaṃ, anussariyamānasukhato sāraṇīyaṃ, tathā byañjanaparisuddhatāya sammodanīyaṃ, atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyanti evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ ^b^kathaṃ^eb^ sāraṇīyaṃ ^a^P1.0314^ea^ ^b^vītisāretvā^eb^ pariyosāpetvā niṭṭhāpetvā yenatthena āgatā, taṃ pucchitukāmā ^b^ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu^eb^. taṃ --
[21] ``na pacchato na purato, nāpi āsannadūrato.
[22] na passe nāpi paṭivāte, na cāpi oṇatuṇṇate''ti.. --
[25] ādinā ^a^V2.0045^ea^ nayena maṅgalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttameva.

[03] evaṃ ^b^ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te brāhmaṇamahāsālā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ^eb^ -- ``kiṃ ta''nti? ^b^``sandissanti nu kho''^eb^tiādi. taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthameva. kevalañhettha ^b^brāhmaṇānaṃ brāhmaṇadhamme^eb^ti desakālādidhamme chaḍḍetvā yo brāhmaṇadhammo, tasmiṃyeva. ^b^tena hi brāhmaṇā^eb^ti yasmā maṃ tumhe yācittha, tasmā brāhmaṇā suṇātha, sotaṃ odahatha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, yoniso manasi karotha. tathā payogasuddhiyā suṇātha, āsayasuddhiyā sādhukaṃ manasi karotha. avikkhepena suṇātha, paggahena sādhukaṃ manasi karothātiādinā nayena etesaṃ padānaṃ pubbe avuttopi adhippāyo veditabbo. atha bhagavatā vuttaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchantā ^b^``evaṃ bho''ti kho te brāhmaṇamahāsālā bhagavato paccassosuṃ,^eb^ bhagavato vacanaṃ abhimukhā hutvā assosuṃ. atha vā paṭissuṇiṃsu. ``suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karothā''ti vuttamatthaṃ kattukāmatāya paṭijāniṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti. atha tesaṃ evaṃ paṭissutavataṃ bhagavā etadavoca -- ``kiṃ ta''nti? ^b^``isayo pubbakā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] 287^b^.^eb^ tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva ^b^saññatattā^eb^ti sīlasaṃyamena saṃyatacittā. ^b^tapassino^eb^ti indriyasaṃvaratapayuttā. ^b^attadatthamacārisu^eb^nti mantajjhenabrahmavihārabhāvanādiṃ attano atthaṃ akaṃsu. sesaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03] 288^b^.^eb^ dutiyagāthādīsupi ayaṃ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā -- ^b^na pasū brāhmaṇānāsu^eb^nti porāṇānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ pasū na āsuṃ, na te pasupariggahamakaṃsu. ^b^na hiraññaṃ na dhāniya^eb^nti hiraññañca ^a^P1.0315^ea^ brāhmaṇānaṃ antamaso jatumāsakopi nāhosi ^a^M2.0050^ea^, tathā vīhisāliyavagodhūmādi pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇabhedaṃ dhāniyampi tesaṃ nāhosi. te hi nikkhittajātarūparajatā asannidhikārakāva hutvā kevalaṃ ^b^sajjhāyadhanadhaññā^eb^ attano mantajjhenasaṅkhāteneva dhanena dhaññena ca samannāgatā ahesuṃ. yo cāyaṃ mettādivihāro seṭṭhattā anugāmikattā ca brahmanidhīti vuccati, tañca ^b^brahmaṃ nidhimapālayuṃ^eb^ sadā tassa bhāvanānuyogena.

[03] 289^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vihārīnaṃ ^b^yaṃ nesaṃ pakataṃ āsi,^eb^ yaṃ etesaṃ pakataṃ ete brāhmaṇe uddissa kataṃ ahosi. ^b^dvārabhattaṃ upaṭṭhita^eb^nti ``brāhmaṇānaṃ dassāmā''ti sajjetvā tehi tehi dāyakehi attano attano gharadvāre ṭhapitabhattaṃ. ^b^saddhāpakata^eb^nti saddhāya pakataṃ, saddhādeyyanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^esāna^eb^nti esantīti esā, tesaṃ esānaṃ, esamānānaṃ pariyesamānānanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^dātave^eb^ti ^a^V2.0046^ea^ dātabbaṃ. ^b^tadamaññisu^eb^nti taṃ amaññiṃsu, taṃ dvāre sajjetvā ṭhapitaṃ bhattaṃ saddhādeyyaṃ pariyesamānānaṃ etesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ dātabbaṃ amaññiṃsu dāyakā janā, na tato paraṃ. anatthikā hi te aññena ahesuṃ, kevalaṃ ghāsacchādanaparamatāya santuṭṭhāti adhippāyo.

[03] 290^b^.^eb^ ^b^nānārattehī^eb^ti nānāvidharāgarattehi vatthehi vicitrattharaṇatthatehi, ^b^sayanehi^eb^ ekabhūmikadvibhūmikādipāsādavarehi. ^b^āvasathehī^eb^ti evarūpehi upakaraṇehi. ^b^phītā janapadā raṭṭhā^eb^ ekekappadesabhūtā janapadā ca keci keci sakalaraṭṭhā ca ``namo brāhmaṇāna''nti sāyaṃ pātaṃ brāhmaṇe deve viya namassiṃsu.

[03] 291^b^.^eb^ te evaṃ namassiyamānā lokena ^b^avajjhā brāhmaṇā^eb^ āsuṃ, na kevalañca avajjhā, ^b^ajeyyā^eb^ vihiṃsitumpi anabhibhavanīyattā ajeyyā ca ahesuṃ. kiṃ kāraṇā? ^b^dhammarakkhitā,^eb^ yasmā dhammena rakkhitā. te hi pañca varasīladhamme rakkhiṃsu, ``dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāri''nti (jā0 1.10.102; 1.15.385) dhammarakkhitā hutvā avajjhā ajeyyā ca ahesunti ^a^P1.0316^ea^ adhippāyo. ^b^na ne koci nivāresī^eb^ti te brāhmaṇe kulānaṃ dvāresu sabbaso bāhiresu ca abbhantaresu ca sabbadvāresu yasmā tesu piyasammatesu varasīlasamannāgatesu ^a^M2.0051^ea^ mātāpitūsu viya ativissatthā manussā ahesuṃ, tasmā ``idaṃ nāma ṭhānaṃ tayā na pavisitabba''nti na koci nivāresi.

[03] 292^b^.^eb^ evaṃ dhammarakkhitā kuladvāresu anivāritā carantā aṭṭha ca cattālīsañcāti ^b^aṭṭhacattālīsaṃ vassāni^eb^ kumārabhāvato pabhuti caraṇena ^b^komāraṃ brahmacariyaṃ cariṃsu te^eb^. yepi brāhmaṇacaṇḍālā ahesuṃ, ko pana vādo brahmasamādīsūti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo. evaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carantā eva hi ^b^vijjācaraṇapariyeṭṭhiṃ acaruṃ brāhmaṇā pure,^eb^ na abrahmacārino hutvā. tattha ^b^vijjāpariyeṭṭhī^eb^ti mantajjhenaṃ. vuttañcetaṃ ``so aṭṭhacattālīsa vassāni komāraṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati mante adhīyamāno''ti (a0 ni0 5.192). ^b^caraṇapariyeṭṭhī^eb^ti sīlarakkhaṇaṃ. ``vijjācaraṇapariyeṭṭhu''ntipi pāṭho, vijjācaraṇaṃ pariyesituṃ acarunti attho.

[03] 293^b^.^eb^ yathāvuttañca kālaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritvā tato paraṃ gharāvāsaṃ kappentāpi ^b^na brāhmaṇā aññamagamuṃ^eb^ khattiyaṃ vā vessādīsu aññataraṃ vā, ye ahesuṃ devasamā vā mariyādā vāti adhippāyo. tathā sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā datvā ^b^napi bhariyaṃ kiṇiṃsu te,^eb^ seyyathāpi etarahi ekacce kiṇanti. te hi dhammena dāraṃ pariyesanti. kathaṃ? aṭṭhacattālīsaṃ vassāni brahmacariyaṃ ^a^V2.0047^ea^ caritvā brāhmaṇā kaññābhikkhaṃ āhiṇḍanti -- ``ahaṃ aṭṭhacattālīsa vassāni ciṇṇabrahmacariyo, yadi vayappattā dārikā atthi, detha me''ti. tato yassa vayappattā dārikā hoti, so taṃ alaṅkaritvā nīharitvā dvāre ṭhitasseva brāhmaṇassa hatthe udakaṃ āsiñcanto ``imaṃ te, brāhmaṇa, bhariyaṃ posāvanatthāya dammī''ti ^a^P1.0317^ea^ vatvā deti.

[03] kasmā pana te evaṃ ciraṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritvāpi dāraṃ pariyesanti, na yāvajīvaṃ brahmacārino hontīti? micchādiṭṭhivasena. tesañhi evaṃdiṭṭhi hoti -- ``yo puttaṃ na uppādeti, so kulavaṃsacchedakaro hoti, tato niraye paccatī''ti. cattāro kira abhāyitabbaṃ bhāyanti gaṇḍuppādo kikī kuntanī brāhmaṇāti. gaṇḍuppādā kira mahāpathaviyā khayabhayena ^a^M2.0052^ea^ mattabhojino honti, na bahuṃ mattikaṃ khādanti. kikī sakuṇikā ākāsapatanabhayena aṇḍassa upari uttānā seti. kuntanī sakuṇikā pathavikampanabhayena pādehi bhūmiṃ na suṭṭhu akkamati. brāhmaṇā kulavaṃsūpacchedabhayena dāraṃ pariyesanti. āha cettha --
[21] ``gaṇḍuppādo kikī ceva, kuntī brāhmaṇadhammiko.
[22] ete abhayaṃ bhāyanti, sammūḷhā caturo janā''ti..

[03] evaṃ dhammena dāraṃ pariyesitvāpi ca ^b^sampiyeneva saṃvāsaṃ saṅgantvā samarocayuṃ,^eb^ sampiyeneva aññamaññaṃ pemeneva kāyena ca cittena ca missībhūtā saṅghaṭitā saṃsaṭṭhā hutvā saṃvāsaṃ samarocayuṃ, na appiyena na niggahena cāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 294^b^.^eb^ evaṃ sampiyeneva saṃvāsaṃ karontāpi ca ^b^aññatra tamhā^eb^ti, yo so utusamayo, yamhi samaye brāhmaṇī brāhmaṇena upagantabbā, aññatra tamhā samayā ṭhapetvā taṃ samayaṃ ututo virataṃ ^b^utuveramaṇiṃ pati^eb^ bhariyaṃ, yāva puna so samayo āgacchati, tāva aṭṭhatvā antarāyeva. ^b^methunaṃ dhamma^eb^nti methunāya dhammāya. sampadānavacanapattiyā kiretaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^nāssu gacchantī^eb^ti neva gacchanti. ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ti ye honti devasamā ca mariyādā cāti adhippāyo.

[03] 295^b^.^eb^ avisesena pana sabbepi brahmacariyañca...pe0... avaṇṇayuṃ. tattha ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti methunavirati. ^b^sīla^eb^nti sesāni cattāri sikkhāpadāni. ^b^ajjava^eb^nti ujubhāvo, atthato asaṭhatā ^a^V2.0048^ea^ amāyāvitā ca. ^b^maddava^eb^nti ^a^P1.0318^ea^ mudubhāvo, atthato atthaddhatā anatimānitā ca. ^b^tapo^eb^ti indriyasaṃvaro. ^b^soracca^eb^nti suratabhāvo sukhasīlatā appaṭikūlasamācāratā. ^b^avihiṃsā^eb^ti pāṇiādīhi avihesikajātikatā sakaruṇabhāvo. ^b^khantī^eb^ti adhivāsanakkhanti. iccete guṇe avaṇṇayuṃ. yepi nāsakkhiṃsu sabbaso paṭipattiyā ārādhetuṃ, tepi tattha sāradassino hutvā vācāya vaṇṇayiṃsu pasaṃsiṃsu.

[03] 296^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vaṇṇentānañca ^b^yo nesaṃ...pe0... nāgamā,^eb^ yo etesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ ^b^paramo brahmā ahosi,^eb^ brahmasamo nāma uttamo brāhmaṇo ^a^M2.0053^ea^ ahosi, daḷhena parakkamena samannāgatattā ^b^daḷhaparakkamo^eb^. ^b^sa vā^eb^ti vibhāvane vā-saddo, tena so evarūpo brāhmaṇoti tameva vibhāveti. ^b^methunaṃ dhamma^eb^nti methunasamāpattiṃ. ^b^supinantepi nāgamā^eb^ti supinepi na agamāsi.

[03] 297^b^.^eb^ tato ^b^tassa vattaṃ...pe0... avaṇṇayuṃ^eb^. imāya gāthāya navamagāthāya vuttaguṇeyeva ādiantavasena niddisanto devasame brāhmaṇe pakāseti. te hi viññujātikā paṇḍitā tassa brahmasamassa brāhmaṇassa vattaṃ anusikkhanti pabbajjāya jhānabhāvanāya ca, te ca ime brahmacariyādiguṇe paṭipattiyā eva vaṇṇayantīti. te sabbepi brāhmaṇā pañcakanipāte doṇasutte (a0 ni0 5.192) vuttanayeneva veditabbā.

[03] 298^b^.^eb^ idāni mariyāde brāhmaṇe dassento āha -- ^b^``taṇḍulaṃ sayana''^eb^nti. tassattho -- tesu ye honti mariyādā, te brāhmaṇā sace yaññaṃ kappetukāmā honti, atha āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇā paṭiviratattā nānappakārakaṃ ^b^taṇḍulañca,^eb^ mañcapīṭhādibhedaṃ ^b^sayanañca,^eb^ khomādibhedaṃ ^b^vatthañca,^eb^ gosappitilatelādibhedaṃ ^b^sappitelañca yāciya dhammena,^eb^ ``uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhanti, esā ariyāna yācanā''ti evaṃ vuttena uddissaṭhānasaṅkhātena dhammena yācitvā, atha yo yaṃ icchati dātuṃ, tena taṃ dinnataṇḍulādiṃ ^b^samodhānetvā^eb^ saṃkaḍḍhitvā. ``samudānetvā''tipi pāṭho, ekoyevattho. ^b^tato yaññamakappayu^eb^nti tato gahetvā dānamakaṃsu ^a^P1.0319^ea^.

[03] 299^b^.^eb^ karontā ca evametasmiṃ ^b^upaṭṭhitasmiṃ^eb^ dānasaṅkhāte ^b^yaññasmiṃ nāssu gāvo haniṃsu^eb^ te, na te gāviyo haniṃsu. gāvīmukhena cettha sabbapāṇā vuttāti veditabbā. kiṃkāraṇā na haniṃsūti? brahmacariyādiguṇayuttattā. apica visesato ^b^yathā mātā...pe0... nāssu gāvo haniṃsu te^eb^. tattha ^b^yāsu jāyanti osadhā^eb^ti yāsu pittādīnaṃ bhesajjabhūtā pañca gorasā jāyanti.

[03] 300^b^.^eb^ ^b^annadā^eb^tiādīsu ^a^V2.0049^ea^ yasmā pañca gorase paribhuñjantānaṃ khudā vūpasammati, balaṃ vaḍḍhati, chavivaṇṇo vippasīdati, kāyikamānasikaṃ sukhaṃ uppajjati ^a^M2.0054^ea^, tasmā annadā baladā vaṇṇadā sukhadā cetāti veditabbā. sesamettha uttānatthameva.

[03] 301^b^.^eb^ evaṃ te yaññesu gāvo ahanantā puññappabhāvānuggahitasarīrā ^b^sukhumālā...pe0... sukhamedhittha yaṃ pajā^eb^. tattha ^b^sukhumālā^eb^ mudutaluṇahatthapādāditāya, ^b^mahākāyā^eb^ ārohapariṇāhasampattiyā, ^b^vaṇṇavanto^eb^ suvaṇṇavaṇṇatāya saṇṭhānayuttatāya ca, ^b^yasassino^eb^ lābhaparivārasampadāya. ^b^sehi dhammehī^eb^ti sakehi cārittehi. ^b^kiccākiccesu ussukā^eb^ti kiccesu ``idaṃ kātabbaṃ'', akiccesu ``idaṃ na kātabba''nti ussukkamāpannā hutvāti attho. evaṃ te porāṇā brāhmaṇā evarūpā hutvā dassanīyā pasādanīyā lokassa paramadakkhiṇeyyā imāya paṭipattiyā ^b^yāva loke avattiṃsu,^eb^ tāva vigataītibhayupaddavā hutvā nānappakārakaṃ ^b^sukhaṃ edhittha^eb^ pāpuṇi, sukhaṃ vā edhittha sukhaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ agamāsi. ^b^ayaṃ pajā^eb^ti sattalokaṃ nidasseti.

[03] 302-3^b^.^eb^ kālaccayena pana sambhinnamariyādabhāvaṃ āpajjitukāmānaṃ ^b^tesaṃ āsi vipallāso...pe0... bhāgaso mite^eb^. tattha ^b^vipallāso^eb^ti viparītasaññā. ^b^aṇuto aṇu^eb^nti lāmakaṭṭhena parittaṭṭhena appassādaṭṭhena aṇubhūtato kāmaguṇato uppannaṃ jhānasāmaññanibbānasukhāni upanidhāya saṅkhyampi anupagamanena aṇuṃ kāmasukhaṃ, lokuttarasukhaṃ vā upanidhāya aṇubhūtato attanā paṭiladdhalokiyasamāpattisukhato aṇuṃ appakatopi appakaṃ kāmasukhaṃ disvāti adhippāyo. ^b^rājino cā^eb^ti rañño ca. ^b^viyākāra^eb^nti sampattiṃ. ^b^ājaññasaṃyutte^eb^ti assājānīyasaṃyutte. ^b^sukate^eb^ti dārukammalohakammena suniṭṭhite. ^b^cittasibbane^eb^ti sīhacammādīhi alaṅkaraṇavasena ^a^P1.0320^ea^ citrasibbane. ^b^nivesane^eb^ti gharavatthūni. ^b^nivese^eb^ti tattha patiṭṭhāpitagharāni. ^b^vibhatte^eb^ti āyāmavitthāravasena vibhattāni. ^b^bhāgaso mite^eb^ti aṅgaṇadvārapāsādakūṭāgārādivasena koṭṭhāsaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā mitāni. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ aṇuto aṇusaññitaṃ kāmasukhañca rañño byākārañca alaṅkatanāriyo ca vuttappakāre rathe ca nivesane nivese ca disvā dukkhesuyeva etesu vatthūsu ``sukha''nti pavattattā pubbe pavattanekkhammasaññāvipallāsasaṅkhātā viparītasaññā āsi.

[03] 304^b^.^eb^ te ^a^M2.0055^ea^ evaṃ viparītasaññā hutvā ^b^gomaṇḍalaparibyūḷhaṃ...pe0... brāhmaṇā^eb^. tattha ^b^gomaṇḍalaparibyūḷha^eb^nti goyūthehi parikiṇṇaṃ. ^b^nārīvaragaṇāyuta^eb^nti varanārīgaṇasaṃyuttaṃ. ^b^uḷāra^eb^nti vipulaṃ ^a^V2.0050^ea^. ^b^mānusaṃ bhoga^eb^nti manussānaṃ nivesanādibhogavatthuṃ. ^b^abhijjhāyiṃsū^eb^ti ``aho vatidaṃ amhākaṃ assā''ti taṇhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā abhipatthayamānā jhāyiṃsu.

[03] 305^b^.^eb^ evaṃ abhijjhāyantā ca ``ete manussā sunhātā suvilittā kappitakesamassū āmuttamaṇiābharaṇā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi paricārenti, mayaṃ pana evaṃ tehi namassiyamānāpi sedamalakiliṭṭhagattā parūḷhakacchanakhalomā bhogarahitā paramakāruññataṃ pattā viharāma. ete ca hatthikkhandhāssapiṭṭhisivikāsuvaṇṇarathādīhi vicaranti, mayaṃ pādehi. ete dvibhūmikādipāsādatalesu vasanti, mayaṃ araññarukkhamūlādīsu. ete ca gonakādīhi attharaṇehi atthatāsu varaseyyāsu sayanti, mayaṃ taṭṭikācammakhaṇḍādīni attharitvā bhūmiyaṃ. ete nānārasāni bhojanāni bhuñjanti, mayaṃ uñchācariyāya yāpema. kathaṃ nu kho mayampi etehi sadisā bhaveyyāmā''ti cintetvā ``dhanaṃ icchitabbaṃ, na sakkā dhanarahitehi ayaṃ sampatti pāpuṇitu''nti ca avadhāretvā vede bhinditvā dhammayutte purāṇamante nāsetvā adhammayutte kūṭamante ganthetvā dhanatthikā okkākarājānamupasaṅkamma sotthivacanādīni payuñjitvā ``amhākaṃ, mahārāja, brāhmaṇavaṃse paveṇiyā āgataṃ porāṇamantapadaṃ atthi, taṃ mayaṃ ācariyamuṭṭhitāya ^a^P1.0321^ea^ na kassaci bhaṇimhā, taṃ mahārājā sotumarahatī''ti ca vatvā assamedhādiyaññaṃ vaṇṇayiṃsu. vaṇṇayitvā ca rājānaṃ ussāhentā ``yaja, mahārāja, evaṃ pahūtadhanadhañño tvaṃ, natthi te yaññasambhāravekallaṃ, evañhi te yajato sattakulaparivaṭṭā sagge uppajjissantī''ti avocuṃ. tena nesaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ dassento āha bhagavā ^b^``te tattha mante...pe0... bahu te dhana''nti^eb^.

[03] tattha ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ, yaṃ bhogamabhijjhāyiṃsu, tannimittanti vuttaṃ hoti. nimittatthe hi etaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. ^b^tadupāgamu^eb^nti tadā upāgamuṃ. ^b^pahūtadhanadhaññosī^eb^ti pahūtadhanadhañño bhavissasi, abhisamparāyanti adhippāyo. āsaṃsāyañhi anāgatepi vattamānavacanaṃ icchanti saddakovidā. ^b^yajassū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0056^ea^ yajāhi. ^b^vittaṃ dhana^eb^nti jātarūpādiratanameva vittikāraṇato vittaṃ, samiddhikāraṇato dhananti vuttaṃ. atha vā ^b^vitta^eb^nti vittikāraṇabhūtameva ābharaṇādi upakaraṇaṃ, yaṃ ``pahūtavittūpakaraṇo''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 1.331) āgacchati. ^b^dhana^eb^nti hiraññasuvaṇṇādi. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? te brāhmaṇā mante ganthetvā tadā okkākaṃ upāgamuṃ. kinti? ``mahārāja, bahū te vittañca dhanañca, yajassu, āyatimpi pahūtadhanadhañño bhavissasī''ti.

[03] 306^b^.^eb^ evaṃ kāraṇaṃ vatvā saññāpentehi ^b^tato ca rājā...pe0... adā dhanaṃ^eb^. tattha ^b^saññatto^eb^ti ^a^V2.0051^ea^ ñāpito. ^b^rathesabho^eb^ti mahārathesu khattiyesu akampiyaṭṭhena usabhasadiso. ^b^``assamedha''^eb^ntiādīsu assamettha medhantīti ^b^assamedho,^eb^ dvīhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa ekavīsatiyūpassa ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. purisamettha medhantīti ^b^purisamedho,^eb^ catūhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. sammamettha pāsantīti ^b^sammāpāso,^eb^ divase divase sammaṃ khipitvā tassa patitokāse vediṃ katvā saṃhārimehi yūpādīhi sarassatinadiyā nimuggokāsato pabhuti paṭilomaṃ gacchantena ^a^P1.0322^ea^ yajitabbassa satrayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. vājamettha pivantīti ^b^vājapeyyo^eb^. ekena pariyaññena sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beluvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. natthi ettha aggaḷāti ^b^niraggaḷo,^eb^ navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā ca purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa assamedhavikappassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. sesamettha pākaṭameva.

[03] 307-8^b^.^eb^ idāni yaṃ vuttaṃ ``brāhmaṇānamadā dhana''nti, taṃ dassento ^b^``gāvo sayanañcā''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. so hi rājā ``dīgharattaṃ lūkhāhārena kilantā pañca gorase paribhuñjantū''ti nesaṃ sapuṅgavāni goyūthāneva adāsi, tathā ``dīgharattaṃ thaṇḍilasāyitāya thūlasāṭakanivāsanena ^a^M2.0057^ea^ ekaseyyāya pādacārena rukkhamūlādivāsena ca kilantā gonakādiatthatavarasayanādīsu sukhaṃ anubhontū''ti nesaṃ mahagghāni sayanādīni ca adāsi. evametaṃ nānappakārakaṃ aññañca hiraññasuvaṇṇādidhanaṃ adāsi. tenāha bhagavā -- ``gāvo sayanañca vatthañca...pe0... brāhmaṇānamadā dhana''nti.

[03] 309-10^b^.^eb^ evaṃ tassa rañño santikā ^b^te ca tattha...pe0... puna mupāgamuṃ^eb^. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? tassa rañño santikā ^b^te^eb^ brāhmaṇā tesu yāgesu ^b^dhanaṃ^eb^ labhitvā dīgharattaṃ divase divase evameva ghāsacchādanaṃ pariyesitvā nānappakārakaṃ vatthukāma ^b^sannidhiṃ^eb^ ^b^samarocayuṃ^eb^. tato ^b^tesaṃ icchāvatiṇṇānaṃ^eb^ khīrādipañcagorasassādavasena rasataṇhāya otiṇṇacittānaṃ ``khīrādīnipi tāva gunnaṃ sādūni, addhā imāsaṃ maṃsaṃ sādutaraṃ bhavissatī''ti evaṃ maṃsaṃ paṭicca ^b^bhiyyo taṇhā pavaḍḍhatha^eb^. tato cintesuṃ -- ``sace mayaṃ māretvā khādissāma, gārayhā bhavissāma, yaṃnūna mante gantheyyāmā''ti. atha punapi vedaṃ bhinditvā tadanurūpe ^b^te tattha mante ganthetvā^eb^ te brāhmaṇā tannimittaṃ ^a^P1.0323^ea^ kūṭamante ganthetvā okkākarājānaṃ puna upāgamiṃsu. imamatthaṃ bhāsamānā ^b^``yathā āpo ca...pe0... bahu te dhana''^eb^nti.

[03] kiṃ ^a^V2.0052^ea^ vuttaṃ hoti? amhākaṃ, mahārāja, mantesu etadāgataṃ ^b^yathā āpo^eb^ hatthadhovanādisabbakiccesu pāṇīnaṃ upayogaṃ gacchati, natthi tesaṃ tatonidānaṃ pāpaṃ. kasmā? yasmā ^b^parikkhāro so hi pāṇinaṃ,^eb^ upakaraṇatthāya uppannoti adhippāyo. yathā cāyaṃ mahāpathavī gamanaṭṭhānādisabbakiccesu kahāpaṇasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^hiraññaṃ^eb^ suvaṇṇarajatādibhedaṃ ^b^dhanaṃ,^eb^ yavagodhūmādibhedaṃ ^b^dhāniyañca,^eb^ saṃvohārādisabbakiccesu upayogaṃ gacchati, ^b^evaṃ gāvo manussānaṃ^eb^ sabbakiccesu upayogagamanatthāya uppannā. tasmā etā hanitvā nānappakārake yāge ^b^yajassu bahu te vittaṃ, yajassu bahu te dhana^eb^nti.

[03] 311-12^b^.^eb^ evaṃ purimanayeneva ^b^tato ca rājā...pe0... aghātayi,^eb^ yaṃ tato pubbe kañci sattaṃ ^b^na pādā...pe0... ghātayi^eb^. tadā kira brāhmaṇā yaññāvāṭaṃ gāvīnaṃ pūretvā maṅgalausabhaṃ bandhitvā rañño mūlaṃ netvā ``mahārāja, gomedhayaññaṃ yajassu, evaṃ te brahmalokassa maggo visuddho bhavissatī''ti ^a^M2.0058^ea^ āhaṃsu. rājā katamaṅgalakicco khaggaṃ gahetvā puṅgavena saha anekasatasahassā gāvo māresi. brāhmaṇā yaññāvāṭe maṃsāni chinditvā khādiṃsu, pītakodātarattakambale ca pārupitvā māresuṃ. tadupādāya kira gāvo pārute disvā ubbijjanti. tenāha bhagavā -- ``na pādā...pe0... ghātayī''ti.

[03] 313^b^.^eb^ ^b^tato devā^eb^ti evaṃ tasmiṃ rājini gāviyo ghātetumāraddhe atha tadanantarameva taṃ goghātakaṃ disvā ete cātumahārājikādayo ^b^devā^eb^ ca, ^b^pitaro^eb^ti brāhmaṇesu laddhavohārā brahmāno ca, sakko ^b^devānamindo^eb^ ca, pabbatapādanivāsino dānavayakkhasaññitā ^b^asurarakkhasā^eb^ ca ^b^``adhammo adhammo''^eb^ti evaṃ vācaṃ nicchārentā ``dhi manussā, dhi manussā''ti ca vadantā ^b^pakkanduṃ^eb^. evaṃ bhūmito pabhuti so saddo muhuttena yāva brahmalokā agamāsi, ekadhikkāraparipuṇṇo loko ahosi. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^yaṃ satthaṃ nipatī gave,^eb^ yasmā gāvimhi satthaṃ nipatīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 314^b^.^eb^ na kevalañca devādayo pakkanduṃ, ayamaññopi loke anattho ^a^P1.0324^ea^ udapādi -- ye hi te ^b^tayo rogā pure āsuṃ, icchā anasanaṃ jarā,^eb^ kiñci kiñcideva patthanataṇhā ca khudā ca paripākajarā cāti vuttaṃ hoti. te ^b^pasūnañca samārambhā, aṭṭhānavutimāgamuṃ,^eb^ cakkhurogādinā bhedena aṭṭhanavutibhāvaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti attho.

[03] 315^b^.^eb^ idāni bhagavā taṃ pasusamārambhaṃ nindanto āha ^b^``eso adhammo''^eb^ti. tassattho ^b^eso^eb^ ^a^V2.0053^ea^ pasusamārambhasaṅkhāto kāyadaṇḍādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ^b^daṇḍānaṃ^eb^ aññataradaṇḍabhūto dhammato apetattā ^b^adhammo okkanto ahu,^eb^ pavatto āsi, so ca kho tato pabhuti pavattattā ^b^purāṇo,^eb^ yassa okkamanato pabhuti kenaci pādādinā ahiṃsanato ^b^adūsikāyo^eb^ gāvo ^b^haññanti^eb^. yā ghātentā ^b^dhammā dhaṃsanti^eb^ cavanti parihāyanti ^b^yājakā^eb^ yaññayājino janāti.

[03] 316^b^.^eb^ ^b^evameso aṇudhammo^eb^ti evaṃ eso lāmakadhammo hīnadhammo, adhammoti vuttaṃ hoti. yasmā vā ettha dānadhammopi appako atthi ^a^M2.0059^ea^, tasmā taṃ sandhāyāha ``aṇudhammo''ti. ^b^porāṇo^eb^ti tāva cirakālato pabhuti pavattattā porāṇo. viññūhi pana garahitattā ^b^viññūgarahito^eb^ti veditabbo. yasmā ca viññugarahito, tasmā ^b^yattha edisakaṃ passati, yājakaṃ garahatī jano^eb^. kathaṃ? ``abbudaṃ brāhmaṇehi uppāditaṃ, gāvo vadhitvā maṃsaṃ khādantī''ti evamādīni vatvāti ayamettha anussavo.

[03] 317^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ dhamme viyāpanne^eb^ti evaṃ porāṇe brāhmaṇadhamme naṭṭhe. ``viyāvatte''tipi pāṭho, viparivattitvā aññathā bhūteti attho. ^b^vibhinnā suddavessikā^eb^ti pubbe samaggā viharantā suddā ca vessā ca te vibhinnā. ^b^puthū vibhinnā khattiyā^eb^ti khattiyāpi bahū aññamaññaṃ bhinnā. ^b^patiṃ bhariyāvamaññathā^eb^ti bhariyā ca gharāvāsatthaṃ issariyabale ṭhapitā puttabalādīhi upetā hutvā patiṃ avamaññatha, paribhavi avamaññi na sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhāsi.

[03] 318^b^.^eb^ evaṃ aññamaññaṃ vibhinnā samānā ^b^khattiyā brahmabandhū ca...pe0... kāmānaṃ vasamanvagu^eb^nti. khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca ye caññe vessasuddā yathā saṅkaraṃ nāpajjanti, evaṃ attano attano gottena rakkhitattā ^b^gottarakkhitā^eb^. te sabbepi taṃ ^b^jātivādaṃ niraṃkatvā,^eb^ ``ahaṃ khattiyo, ahaṃ brāhmaṇo''ti etaṃ sabbampi nāsetvā ^a^P1.0325^ea^ pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhātānaṃ ^b^kāmānaṃ vasaṃ anvaguṃ^eb^ āsattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, kāmahetu na kiñci akattabbaṃ nākaṃsūti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] evamettha bhagavā ``isayo pubbakā''tiādīhi navahi gāthāhi porāṇānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitvā ``yo nesaṃ paramo''ti gāthāya brahmasamaṃ, ``tassa vattamanusikkhantā''ti gāthāya devasamaṃ, ``taṇḍulaṃ sayana''ntiādikāhi catūhi gāthāhi mariyādaṃ, ``tesaṃ āsi vipallāso''tiādīhi sattarasahi gāthāhi sambhinnamariyādaṃ, tassa vippaṭipattiyā devādīnaṃ pakkandanādidīpanatthañca dassetvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. brāhmaṇacaṇḍālo pana idha avuttoyeva. kasmā? yasmā vipattiyā akāraṇaṃ. brāhmaṇadhammasampattiyā hi brahmasamadevasamamariyādā kāraṇaṃ ^a^V2.0054^ea^ ^a^M2.0060^ea^ honti, vipattiyā sambhinnamariyādo. ayaṃ pana doṇasutte (a0 ni0 5.192) vuttappakāro brāhmaṇacaṇḍālo brāhmaṇadhammavipattiyāpi akāraṇaṃ. kasmā? vipanne dhamme uppannattā. tasmā taṃ adassetvāva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. etarahi pana sopi brāhmaṇacaṇḍālo dullabho. evamayaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ dhammo vinaṭṭho. tenevāha doṇo brāhmaṇo -- ``evaṃ sante mayaṃ, bho gotama, brāhmaṇacaṇḍālampi na pūremā''ti. sesamettha vuttanayameva.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya brāhmaṇadhammikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 319^b^.^eb^ ^b^yasmā^eb^ ^a^V2.0055^ea^ ^b^hi dhamma^eb^nti dhammasuttaṃ, ``nāvāsutta''ntipi vuccati. kā uppatti? idaṃ suttaṃ āyasmantaṃ sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha vuttaṃ. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ uppattito pabhuti veditabbo. seyyathidaṃ -- anuppanne ^a^P1.0326^ea^ kira bhagavati dve aggasāvakā ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo pūretvā devaloke nibbattā. tesaṃ paṭhamo cavitvā rājagahassa avidūre upatissagāmo nāma brāhmaṇānaṃ bhogagāmo atthi, tattha saṭṭhiadhikapañcakoṭisatadhanavibhavassa gāmasāmino brāhmaṇassa rūpasārī nāma brāhmaṇī, tassā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. dutiyo tassevāvidūre kolitagāmo nāma brāhmaṇānaṃ bhogagāmo atthi. tattha tathārūpavibhavasseva gāmasāmino brāhmaṇassa moggallānī nāma brāhmaṇī, tassā kucchiyaṃ taṃ divasameva paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. evaṃ tesaṃ ekadivasameva paṭisandhiggahaṇañca gabbhavuṭṭhānañca ahosi. ekadivaseyeva ca nesaṃ ekassa upatissagāme jātattā ^b^upatisso,^eb^ ekassa kolitagāme jātattā ^b^kolito^eb^ti nāmamakaṃsu.

[03] te ^a^M2.0061^ea^ sahapaṃsuṃ kīḷantā sahāyakā anupubbena vuḍḍhiṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, ekamekassa ca pañcapañcamāṇavakasatāni parivārā ahesuṃ. te uyyānaṃ vā nadītitthaṃ vā gacchantā saparivārāyeva gacchanti. eko pañcahi suvaṇṇasivikāsatehi, dutiyo pañcahi ājaññarathasatehi. tadā ca rājagahe kālānukālaṃ giraggasamajjo nāma hoti. sāyanhasamaye nagaravemajjhe yattha sakalāṅgamagadhavāsino abhiññātā khattiyakumārādayo sannipatitvā supaññattesu mañcapīṭhādīsu nisinnā samajjavibhūtiṃ passanti. atha te sahāyakā tena parivārena saddhiṃ tattha gantvā paññattāsanesu nisīdiṃsu. tato upatisso samajjavibhūtiṃ passanto mahājanakāyaṃ sannipatitaṃ disvā ``ettako janakāyo vassasataṃ appatvāva marissatī''ti cintesi. tassa maraṇaṃ āgantvā nalāṭante patiṭṭhitaṃ viya ahosi, tathā kolitassa. tesaṃ anekappakāresu naṭesu naccantesu dassanamattepi cittaṃ na nami, aññadatthu saṃvegoyeva udapādi.

[03] atha vuṭṭhite samajje pakkantāya parisāya sakaparivārena pakkantesu tesu sahāyesu kolito ^a^V2.0056^ea^ upatissaṃ pucchi -- ``kiṃ, samma, nāṭakādidassanena tava pamodanamattampi ^a^P1.0327^ea^ nāhosī''ti? so tassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā tampi tatheva paṭipucchi. sopi tassa attano pavattiṃ ārocetvā ``ehi, samma, pabbajitvā amataṃ gavesāmā''ti āha. ``sādhu sammā''ti upatisso taṃ sampaṭicchi. tato dvepi janā taṃ sampattiṃ chaḍḍetvā punadeva rājagahamanuppattā. tena ca samayena rājagahe sañcayo nāma paribbājako paṭivasati. te tassa santike pañcahi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ pabbajitvā katipāheneva tayo vede sabbañca paribbājakasamayaṃ uggahesuṃ. te tesaṃ satthānaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ upaparikkhantā pariyosānaṃ adisvā ācariyaṃ pucchiṃsu -- ``imesaṃ satthānaṃ ādimajjhaṃ dissati, pariyosānaṃ pana na dissati `idaṃ nāma imehi satthehi pāpuṇeyyāti, yato uttari pāpuṇitabbaṃ natthī'''ti. sopi āha -- ``ahampi tesaṃ tathāvidhaṃ pariyosānaṃ na passāmī''ti. te āhaṃsu -- ``tena hi mayaṃ imesaṃ pariyosānaṃ gavesāmā''ti. te ācariyo ``yathāsukhaṃ gavesathā''ti āha. evaṃ te tena anuññātā amataṃ gavesamānā āhiṇḍantā jambudīpe pākaṭā ahesuṃ. tehi khattiyapaṇḍitādayo pañhaṃ puṭṭhā uttaruttariṃ na sampāyanti. ``upatisso ^a^M2.0062^ea^ kolito''ti vutte pana ``ke ete, na kho mayaṃ jānāmā''ti bhaṇantā natthi, evaṃ vissutā ahesuṃ.

[03] evaṃ tesu amatapariyesanaṃ caramānesu amhākaṃ bhagavā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahamanuppatto. te ca paribbājakā sakalajambudīpaṃ caritvā tiṭṭhatu amataṃ, antamaso pariyosānapañhavissajjanamattampi alabhantā punadeva rājagahaṃ agamaṃsu. atha kho āyasmā assaji pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvāti yāva tesaṃ pabbajjā, tāva sabbaṃ pabbajjākkhandhake (mahāva0 60) āgatanayeneva vitthārato daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] evaṃ pabbajitesu tesu dvīsu sahāyakesu āyasmā sāriputto aḍḍhamāsena ^a^P1.0328^ea^ sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ sacchākāsi. so yadā assajittherena saddhiṃ ekavihāre vasati, tadā bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā anantaraṃ therassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati ``pubbācariyo me ayamāyasmā, etamahaṃ nissāya bhagavato sāsanaṃ aññāsi''nti gāravena. yadā pana assajittherena saddhiṃ ekavihāre na vasati, tadā yassaṃ disāyaṃ thero vasati, taṃ disaṃ oloketvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha namassati. taṃ disvā keci bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ -- ``sāriputto aggasāvako hutvā disaṃ namassati, ajjāpi maññe brāhmaṇadiṭṭhi appahīnā''ti. atha bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā taṃ kathāsallāpaṃ sutvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinnaṃyeva attānaṃ dassento bhikkhū āmantesi -- ``kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā''ti ^a^V2.0057^ea^? te taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhiṃsu. tato bhagavā ``na, bhikkhave, sāriputto disaṃ namassati, yaṃ nissāya sāsanaṃ aññāsi, taṃ attano ācariyaṃ vandati namassati sammāneti, ācariyapūjako, bhikkhave, sāriputto''ti vatvā tattha sannipatitānaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
