[03] tattha ^b^yasmā hi dhammaṃ puriso vijaññā^eb^ti yato puggalā piṭakattayappabhedaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ vā, pariyattiṃ sutvā adhigantabbaṃ navalokuttarappabhedaṃ paṭivedhadhammaṃ vā puriso vijaññā jāneyya vedeyya. ``yassā''tipi pāṭho, so evattho. ^b^indaṃva naṃ devatā pūjayeyyā^eb^ti yathā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ dvīsu devalokesu devatā pūjenti, evaṃ so puggalo taṃ puggalaṃ kālasseva vuṭṭhāya upāhanaomuñcanādiṃ sabbaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ karonto ^a^M2.0063^ea^ pūjeyya sakkareyya garukareyya. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^so pūjito...pe0... pātukaroti dhammaṃ,^eb^ so ācariyo evaṃ pūjito tasmiṃ antevāsimhi pasannacitto pariyattipaṭivedhavasena bahussuto desanāvaseneva pariyattidhammañca, desanaṃ sutvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā adhigantabbaṃ paṭivedhadhammañca ^a^P1.0329^ea^ pātukaroti deseti, desanāya vā pariyattidhammaṃ, upamāvasena attanā adhigatapaṭivedhadhammaṃ pātukaroti.

[03] 320^b^.^eb^ ^b^tadaṭṭhikatvāna nisamma dhīro^eb^ti evaṃ pasannena ācariyena pātukataṃ dhammaṃ aṭṭhikatvāna suṇitvā upadhāraṇasamatthatāya dhīro puriso. ^b^dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjamāno^eb^ti lokuttaradhammassa anulomattā anudhammabhūtaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayamāno. ^b^viññū vibhāvī nipuṇo ca hotī^eb^ti viññutāsaṅkhātāya paññāya adhigamena viññū, vibhāvetvā paresampi pākaṭaṃ katvā ñāpanasamatthatāya vibhāvī, paramasukhumatthapaṭivedhatāya nipuṇo ca hoti. ^b^yo tādisaṃ bhajati appamatto^eb^ti yo tādisaṃ pubbe vuttappakāraṃ bahussutaṃ appamatto tappasādanaparo hutvā bhajati.

[03] 321^b^.^eb^ evaṃ paṇḍitācariyasevanaṃ pasaṃsitvā idāni bālācariyasevanaṃ nindanto ^b^``khuddañca bāla''^eb^nti imaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^khudda^eb^nti khuddena kāyakammādinā samannāgataṃ, paññābhāvato bālaṃ. ^b^anāgatattha^eb^nti anadhigatapariyattipaṭivedhatthaṃ. ^b^usūyaka^eb^nti issāmanakatāya antevāsikassa vuḍḍhiṃ asahamānaṃ. sesamettha pākaṭameva padato. adhippāyato pana yo bahucīvarādilābhī ācariyo antevāsikānaṃ cīvarādīni na sakkoti dātuṃ, dhammadāne pana aniccadukkhānattavacanamattampi na sakkoti. etehi khuddatādidhammehi samannāgatattā taṃ khuddaṃ bālaṃ anāgatatthaṃ usūyakaṃ ācariyaṃ upasevamāno ``pūtimacchaṃ kusaggenā''ti (itivu0 76; jā0 1.15.183) vuttanayena sayampi bālo hoti. tasmā idha sāsane kiñci appamattakampi ^a^V2.0058^ea^ pariyattidhammaṃ paṭivedhadhammaṃ vā avibhāvayitvā ca avijānitvā ca yassa dhammesu kaṅkhā, taṃ ataritvā maraṇaṃ upetīti evamassa attho veditabbo.

[03] 322-3^b^.^eb^ idāni tassevatthassa pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ ^b^``yathā naro''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^āpaga^eb^nti nadiṃ. ^b^mahodaka^eb^nti bahūdakaṃ. ^b^salila^eb^nti ito ^a^M2.0064^ea^ cito ca gataṃ, vitthiṇṇanti vuttaṃ ^a^P1.0330^ea^ hoti. ``sarita''ntipi pāṭho, so evattho. ^b^sīghasota^eb^nti hārahārikaṃ, vegavatinti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^kiṃ so^eb^ti ettha ``so vuyhamāno''ti iminā ca sokārena tassa narassa niddiṭṭhattā nipātamatto sokāro. kiṃ sūti vuttaṃ hoti yathā ``na bhavissāmi nāma so, vinassissāmi nāma so''ti. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti pubbe vuttaṃ duvidhameva. ^b^anisāmayattha^eb^nti anisāmetvā atthaṃ. sesamettha pākaṭameva padato.

[03] adhippāyato pana yathā yo kocideva naro vuttappakāraṃ nadiṃ otaritvā tāya nadiyā vuyhamāno anusotagāmī sotameva anugacchanto pare pāratthike kiṃ sakkhati pāraṃ netuṃ. ``sakkatī''tipi pāṭho. tatheva duvidhampi dhammaṃ attano paññāya avibhāvayitvā bahussutānañca santike atthaṃ anisāmetvā sayaṃ avibhāvitattā ajānanto anisāmitattā ca avitiṇṇakaṅkho pare kiṃ sakkhati nijjhāpetuṃ pekkhāpetunti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ``so vata, cunda, attanā palipapalipanno''tiādikañcettha (ma0 ni0 1.87) suttapadaṃ anussaritabbaṃ.

[03] 324-5^b^.^eb^ evaṃ bālasevanāya bālassa paraṃ nijjhāpetuṃ asamatthatāya pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ upamaṃ vatvā idāni ``yo tādisaṃ bhajati appamatto''ti ettha vuttassa paṇḍitassa pare nijjhāpetuṃ samatthatāya pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ ^b^``yathāpi nāva''^eb^nti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^phiyenā^eb^ti dabbipadarena. ^b^rittenā^eb^ti veḷudaṇḍena. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tassaṃ nāvāyaṃ. ^b^tatrūpayaññū^eb^ti tassā nāvāya āharaṇapaṭiharaṇādiupāyajānanena maggapaṭipādanena upāyaññū. sikkhitasikkhatāya sukusalahatthatāya ca ^b^kusalo^eb^. uppannupaddavapaṭikārasamatthatāya ^b^mutīmā^eb^. ^b^vedagū^eb^ti vedasaṅkhātehi catūhi maggañāṇehi gato. ^b^bhāvitatto^eb^ti tāyeva maggabhāvanāya bhāvitacitto. ^b^bahussuto^eb^ti pubbe vuttanayeneva. ^b^avedhadhammo^eb^ti aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi ^a^P1.0331^ea^ akampaniyasabhāvo. ^b^sotāvadhānūpanisūpapanne^eb^ti sotaodahanena ca maggaphalānaṃ upanissayena ca upapanne. sesaṃ uttānapadatthameva. adhippāyayojanāpi sakkā purimanayeneva jānitunti na vitthāritā.

[03] 326^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^V2.0059^ea^ ^a^M2.0065^ea^ paṇḍitassa pare nijjhāpetuṃ samatthabhāvapākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ upamaṃ vatvā tassā paṇḍitasevanāya niyojento ^b^``tasmā have''^eb^ti imaṃ avasānagāthamāha. tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho -- yasmā upanissayasampannā paṇḍitasevanena visesaṃ pāpuṇanti, ^b^tasmā have sappurisaṃ bhajetha^eb^. kīdisaṃ sappurisaṃ bhajetha? ^b^medhāvinañceva bahussutañca,^eb^ paññāsampattiyā ca medhāvinaṃ vuttappakārasutadvayena ca bahussutaṃ. tādisañhi bhajamāno tena bhāsitassa dhammassa ^b^aññāya atthaṃ^eb^ evaṃ ñatvā ca yathānusiṭṭhaṃ ^b^paṭipajjamāno^eb^ tāya paṭipattiyā paṭivedhavasena ^b^viññātadhammo^eb^ so maggaphalanibbānappabhedaṃ lokuttara^b^sukhaṃ labhetha^eb^ adhigaccheyya pāpuṇeyyāti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ samāpesīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya dhammasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 327^b^.^eb^ ^b^kiṃsīlo^eb^ti ^a^V2.0060^ea^ kiṃsīlasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? āyasmato sāriputtassa gihisahāyako eko therasseva pituno vaṅgantabrāhmaṇassa sahāyassa brāhmaṇassa putto saṭṭhikoṭiadhikaṃ pañcasatakoṭidhanaṃ pariccajitvā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa santike pabbajitvā sabbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇi. tassa thero bahuso ovaditvā kammaṭṭhānamadāsi, so tena visesaṃ nādhigacchati. tato thero ``buddhaveneyyo eso''ti ñatvā taṃ ādāya bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha puggalaṃ aniyametvā ``kiṃsīlo''ti pucchi. athassa bhagavā tato paraṃ abhāsi. tattha ^b^kiṃsīlo^eb^ti kīdisena vārittasīlena samannāgato, kīdisapakatiko vā. ^b^kiṃsamācāro^eb^ti kīdisena cārittena yutto. ^b^kāni kammāni^eb^ ^a^P1.0332^ea^ ^b^brūhaya^eb^nti kāni kāyakammādīni vaḍḍhento. ^b^naro sammā niviṭṭhassā^eb^ti abhirato naro sāsane sammā patiṭṭhito bhaveyya. ^b^uttamatthañca pāpuṇe^eb^ti sabbatthānaṃ uttamaṃ arahattañca pāpuṇeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ tato ^a^M2.0066^ea^ bhagavā ``sāriputto aḍḍhamāsūpasampanno sāvakapāramippatto, kasmā ādikammikaputhujjanapañhaṃ pucchatī''ti āvajjento ``saddhivihārikaṃ ārabbhā''ti ñatvā pucchāya vuttaṃ cārittasīlaṃ avibhajitvāva tassa sappāyavasena dhammaṃ desento ^b^``vuḍḍhāpacāyī''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha paññāvuḍḍho, guṇavuḍḍho, jātivuḍḍho, vayovuḍḍhoti cattāro vuḍḍhā. jātiyā hi daharopi bahussuto bhikkhu appassutamahallakabhikkhūnamantare bāhusaccapaññāya vuḍḍhattā ^b^paññāvuḍḍho^eb^. tassa hi santike mahallakabhikkhūpi buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇanti, ovādavinicchayapañhavissajjanāni ca paccāsīsanti. tathā daharopi bhikkhu adhigamasampanno ^b^guṇavuḍḍho^eb^ nāma. tassa hi ovāde patiṭṭhāya mahallakāpi vipassanāgabbhaṃ gahetvā arahattaphalaṃ pāpuṇanti. tathā daharopi rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto brāhmaṇo vā sesajanassa vandanārahato ^b^jātivuḍḍho^eb^ nāma. sabbo pana paṭhamajāto ^b^vayovuḍḍho^eb^ nāma. tattha yasmā paññāya sāriputtattherassa sadiso natthi ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ, tathā guṇenapi aḍḍhamāsena sabbasāvakapāramīñāṇassa paṭividdhattā. jātiyāpi so brāhmaṇamahāsālakule uppanno, tasmā tassa bhikkhuno vayena samānopi so imehi ^a^V2.0061^ea^ tīhi kāraṇehi vuḍḍho. imasmiṃ panatthe paññāguṇehi eva vuḍḍhabhāvaṃ sandhāya bhagavā āha -- ``vuḍḍhāpacāyī''ti. tasmā tādisānaṃ vuḍḍhānaṃ apacitikaraṇena vuḍḍhāpacāyī, tesameva vuḍḍhānaṃ lābhādīsu usūyavigamena anusūyako ca siyāti ayamādipādassa attho.

[03] ^b^kālaññū cassā^eb^ti ettha pana rāge uppanne tassa vinodanatthāya garūnaṃ dassanaṃ gacchantopi kālaññū, dose... mohe... kosajje uppanne tassa vinodanatthāya garūnaṃ dassanaṃ gacchantopi kālaññū, yato evaṃ kālaññū ca assa garūnaṃ ^a^P1.0333^ea^ dassanāya. ^b^dhammiṃ katha^eb^nti samathavipassanāyuttaṃ. ^b^erayita^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^khaṇaññū^eb^ti tassā kathāya khaṇavedī, dullabho vā ayaṃ īdisāya kathāya savanakkhaṇoti jānanto. ^b^suṇeyya sakkaccā^eb^ti taṃ kathaṃ sakkaccaṃ suṇeyya. na kevalañca tameva, aññānipi buddhaguṇādipaṭisaṃyuttāni subhāsitāni sakkaccameva suṇeyyāti attho.

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ ``kālaññū cassa garūnaṃ dassanāyā''ti ettha vuttanayañca attano uppannarāgādivinodanakālaṃ ñatvāpi garūnaṃ santikaṃ gacchanto ^b^kālena gacche garūnaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0067^ea^ ^b^sakāsaṃ,^eb^ ``ahaṃ kammaṭṭhāniko dhutaṅgadharo cā''ti katvā na cetiyavandanabodhiyaṅgaṇabhikkhācāramaggātimajjhanhikavelādīsu yattha katthaci ṭhitamācariyaṃ disvā paripucchanatthāya upasaṅkameyya, sakasenāsane pana attano āsane nisinnaṃ vūpasantadarathaṃ sallakkhetvā kammaṭṭhānādividhipucchanatthaṃ upasaṅkameyyāti attho. evaṃ upasaṅkamantopi ca ^b^thambhaṃ niraṃkatvā nivātavutti^eb^ thaddhabhāvakaraṃ mānaṃ vināsetvā nīcavutti pādapuñchanacoḷakachinnavisāṇusabhauddhatadāṭhasappasadiso hutvā upasaṅkameyya. ^b^atha^eb^ tena garunā vuttaṃ ^b^atthaṃ dhammaṃ...pe0... samācare ca. attha^eb^nti bhāsitatthaṃ. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti pāḷidhammaṃ. ^b^saṃyama^eb^nti sīlaṃ. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti avasesasāsanabrahmacariyaṃ. ^b^anussare ceva samācare cā^eb^ti atthaṃ kathitokāse anussareyya, dhammaṃ saṃyamaṃ brahmacariyaṃ kathitokāse anussareyya, anussaraṇamatteneva ca atussanto taṃ sabbampi samācare samācareyya samādāya vatteyya. tāsaṃ kathānaṃ attani pavattane ussukkaṃ kareyyāti attho. evaṃ karonto hi kiccakaro hoti.

[03] 330^b^.^eb^ tato parañca ^b^dhammārāmo dhammarato dhamme ṭhito dhammavinicchayaññū^eb^ bhaveyya. sabbapadesu cettha ^b^dhammo^eb^ti samathavipassanā, ārāmo ratīti ekova attho, dhamme ārāmo assāti ^b^dhammārāmo^eb^. dhamme rato, na ^a^P1.0334^ea^ aññaṃ pihetīti ^b^dhammarato^eb^. ^b^dhamme ṭhito^eb^ dhammaṃ vattanato. dhammavinicchayaṃ jānāti ``idaṃ udayañāṇaṃ idaṃ vayañāṇa''nti ^b^dhammavinicchayaññū,^eb^ evarūpo ^a^V2.0062^ea^ assa. atha yāyaṃ rājakathāditiracchānakathā taruṇavipassakassa bahiddhārūpādīsu abhinandanuppādanena taṃ samathavipassanādhammaṃ sandūseti, tasmā ``dhammasandosavādo''ti vuccati, taṃ ^b^nevācare dhammasandosavādaṃ,^eb^ aññadatthu āvāsagocarādisappāyāni sevanto ^b^tacchehi nīyetha subhāsitehi^eb^. samathavipassanāpaṭisaṃyuttānevettha tacchāni, tathārūpehi subhāsitehi nīyetha nīyeyya, kālaṃ khepeyyāti attho.

[03] 331^b^.^eb^ idāni ``dhammasandosavāda''nti ettha atisaṅkhepena vuttaṃ samathavipassanāyuttassa bhikkhuno upakkilesaṃ pākaṭaṃ karonto tadaññenapi upakkilesena saddhiṃ ^b^``hassaṃ jappa''^eb^nti imaṃ gāthamāha. hāsantipi pāṭho. vipassakena ^a^M2.0068^ea^ hi bhikkhunā hasanīyasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ sitamattameva kātabbaṃ, niratthakakathājappo na bhāsitabbo, ñātibyasanādīsu paridevo na kātabbo, khāṇukaṇṭakādimhi manopadoso na uppādetabbo. ^b^māyākata^eb^nti vuttā ^b^māyā,^eb^ tividhaṃ ^b^kuhanaṃ,^eb^ paccayesu ^b^giddhi,^eb^ jātiādīhi ^b^māno,^eb^ paccanīkasātatāsaṅkhāto ^b^sārambho,^eb^ pharusavacanalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^kakkasaṃ,^eb^ rāgādayo ^b^kasāvā,^eb^ adhimattataṇhālakkhaṇā ^b^mucchā^eb^ti ime ca dosā sukhakāmena aṅgārakāsu viya, sucikāmena gūthaṭhānaṃ viya, jīvitukāmena āsivisādayo viya ca pahātabbā. hitvā ca ārogyamadādivigamā vītamadena cittavikkhepābhāvā ṭhitattena caritabbaṃ. evaṃ paṭipanno hi sabbupakkilesaparisuddhāya bhāvanāya na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti. tenāha bhagavā -- ``hassaṃ jappaṃ...pe0... ṭhitatto''ti.

[03] 332^b^.^eb^ idāni yvāyaṃ ``hassaṃ jappa''ntiādinā nayena upakkileso vutto, tena samannāgato bhikkhu yasmā sāhaso hoti avīmaṃsakārī, ratto rāgavasena ^a^P1.0335^ea^ duṭṭho dosavasena gacchati, pamatto ca hoti kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya asātaccakārī, tathārūpassa ca ``suṇeyya sakkacca subhāsitānī''tiādinā nayena vutto ovādo niratthako, tasmā imassa saṃkilesassa puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya sutādivuddhipaṭipakkhabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^``viññātasārānī''^eb^ti imaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] tassattho -- yāni hetāni samathavipassanāpaṭisaṃyuttāni ^b^subhāsitāni,^eb^ tesaṃ vijānanaṃ sāro. yadi viññātāni sādhu, atha saddamattameva gahitaṃ, na kiñci kataṃ hoti, yena etāni sutamayena ñāṇena viññāyanti, taṃ ^b^sutaṃ,^eb^ etañca sutamayañāṇaṃ ^b^viññātasamādhisāraṃ,^eb^ tesu viññātesu dhammesu yo samādhi cittassāvikkhepo tathattāya paṭipatti, ayamassa sāro. na hi vijānanamatteneva koci attho sijjhati. yo panāyaṃ naro rāgādivasena vattanato ^b^sāhaso^eb^ ^a^V2.0063^ea^, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya asātaccakāritāya ^b^pamatto,^eb^ so saddamattaggāhīyeva hoti. tena tassa atthavijānanābhāvato sā subhāsitavijānanapaññā ca, tathattāya paṭipattiyā abhāvato sutañca na vaḍḍhatīti.

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^M2.0069^ea^ pamattānaṃ sattānaṃ paññāparihāniṃ sutaparihāniñca dassetvā idāni appamattānaṃ tadubhayasārādhigamaṃ dassento āha -- ^b^``dhamme ca ye...pe0... sāramajjhagū''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^ariyappavedito dhammo^eb^ nāma samathavipassanādhammo. ekopi hi buddho samathavipassanādhammaṃ adesetvā parinibbuto nāma natthi. tasmā etasmiṃ ^b^dhamme ca ye ariyappavedite^eb^ ^b^ratā^eb^ niratā appamattā sātaccānuyogino, ^b^anuttarā te vacasā manasā kammunā ca,^eb^ te catubbidhena vacīsucaritena tividhena manosucaritena tividhena kāyasucaritena ca samannāgatattā vacasā manasā kammunā ca anuttarā, avasesasattehi asamā aggāvisiṭṭhā. ettāvatā saddhiṃ pubbabhāgasīlena ariyamaggasampayuttaṃ sīlaṃ dasseti. evaṃ parisuddhasīlā ^b^te santisoraccasamādhisaṇṭhitā, sutassa paññāya ca sāramajjhagū,^eb^ ye ariyappavedite dhamme ratā, te na kevalaṃ vācādīhi anuttarā honti, apica kho pana santisoracce samādhimhi ca saṇṭhitā hutvā sutassa ^a^P1.0336^ea^ paññāya ca sāramajjhagū adhigatā icceva veditabbā. āsaṃsāyaṃ bhūtavacanaṃ. tattha ^b^santī^eb^ti nibbānaṃ, ^b^soracca^eb^nti sundare ratabhāvena yathābhūtapaṭivedhikā paññā, santiyā soraccanti ^b^santisoraccaṃ,^eb^ nibbānārammaṇāya maggapaññāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^samādhī^eb^ti taṃsampayuttova maggasamādhi. ^b^saṇṭhitā^eb^ti tadubhaye patiṭṭhitā. sutapaññānaṃ sāraṃ nāma arahattaphalavimutti. vimuttisārañhi idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ.

[01] evamettha bhagavā dhammena pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ, ``anuttarā vacasā''tiādīhi sīlakkhandhaṃ, santisoraccasamādhīhi paññākkhandhasamādhikkhandheti tīhipi imehi khandhehi aparabhāgapaṭipadañca dassetvā sutapaññāsārena akuppavimuttiṃ dassento arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ samāpesi. desanāpariyosāne ca so bhikkhu sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā puna na cirasseva aggaphale arahatte patiṭṭhāsīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya kiṃsīlasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ ^b^uṭṭhahathā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0064^ea^ ^a^M2.0070^ea^ uṭṭhānasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto rattiṃ jetavanavihāre vasitvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pācīnadvārena nagarā nikkhamitvā migāramātupāsādaṃ agamāsi divāvihāratthāya. āciṇṇaṃ kiretaṃ bhagavato rattiṃ jetavanavihāre vasitvā migāramātupāsāde divāvihārūpagamanaṃ, rattiñca migāramātupāsāde vasitvā jetavane divāvihārūpagamanaṃ. kasmā? dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ anuggahatthāya mahāpariccāgaguṇaparidīpanatthāya ca. migāramātupāsādassa ca heṭṭhā pañca kūṭāgāragabbhasatāni honti, yesu pañcasatā bhikkhū vasanti. tattha yadā bhagavā heṭṭhāpāsāde vasati, tadā bhikkhū bhagavato gāravena uparipāsādaṃ nāruhanti. taṃ divasaṃ pana bhagavā uparipāsāde kūṭāgāragabbhaṃ pāvisi, tena heṭṭhāpāsāde pañcapi gabbhasatāni pañcasatā bhikkhū pavisiṃsu. te ca sabbeva navā honti adhunāgatā imaṃ ^a^P1.0337^ea^ dhammavinayaṃ uddhatā unnaḷā pākatindriyā. te pavisitvā divāseyyaṃ supitvā sāyaṃ uṭṭhāya mahātale sannipatitvā ``ajja bhattagge tuyhaṃ kiṃ ahosi, tvaṃ kattha agamāsi, ahaṃ āvuso kosalarañño gharaṃ, ahaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa, tattha evarūpo ca evarūpo ca bhojanavidhi ahosī''ti nānappakāraṃ āmisakathaṃ kathentā uccāsaddamahāsaddā ahesuṃ.

[03] bhagavā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā ``ime mayā saddhiṃ vasantāpi evaṃ pamattā, aho ayuttakārino''ti mahāmoggallānattherassa āgamanaṃ cintesi. tāvadeva āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavato cittaṃ ñatvā iddhiyā āgamma pādamūle vandamānoyeva ahosi. tato naṃ bhagavā āmantesi -- ``ete te, moggallāna, sabrahmacārino pamattā, sādhu ne saṃvejehī''ti. ``evaṃ bhante''ti kho so āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā tāvadeva āpokasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā karīsabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ mahāpāsādaṃ nāvaṃ viya mahāvāto pādaṅguṭṭhakena kampesi saddhiṃ patiṭṭhitapathavippadesena. atha te bhikkhū bhītā vissaraṃ karontā sakasakacīvarāni chaḍḍetvā catūhi dvārehi nikkhamiṃsu. bhagavā tesaṃ attānaṃ dassento aññena dvārena gandhakuṭiṃ pavisanto viya ahosi, te bhagavantaṃ disvā vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu ^a^M2.0071^ea^. bhagavā ``kiṃ, bhikkhave, bhītatthā''ti pucchi, te ``ayaṃ, bhante, migāramātupāsādo kampito''ti āhaṃsu ^a^V2.0065^ea^. ``jānātha, bhikkhave, kenā''ti? ``na jānāma, bhante''ti. atha bhagavā ``tumhādisānaṃ, bhikkhave, muṭṭhassatīnaṃ asampajānānaṃ pamādavihārīnaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ moggallānena kampito''ti vatvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ suttamabhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^uṭṭhahathā^eb^ti āsanā uṭṭhahatha ghaṭatha vāyamatha, mā kusītā hotha. ^b^nisīdathā^eb^ti pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā kammaṭṭhānānuyogatthāya nisīdatha. ^b^ko attho supitena vo^eb^ti ko tumhākaṃ anupādāparinibbānatthāya pabbajitānaṃ ^a^P1.0338^ea^ supitena attho. na hi sakkā supantena koci attho pāpuṇituṃ. ^b^āturānañhi kā niddā, sallaviddhāna ruppata^eb^nti yatra ca nāma appakepi sarīrappadese uṭṭhitena cakkhurogādinā rogena āturānaṃ ekadvaṅgulamattampi paviṭṭhena ayasallāṭṭhisalladantasallavisāṇasallakaṭṭhasallānaṃ aññatarena sallena ruppamānānaṃ manussānaṃ niddā natthi, tattha tumhākaṃ sakalacittasarīrasantānaṃ bhañjitvā uppannehi nānappakārakilesarogehi āturānañhi kā niddā rāgasallādīhi ca pañcahi sallehi antohadayaṃ pavisiya viddhattā sallaviddhānaṃ ruppataṃ.

[03] 335^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vatvā puna bhagavā bhiyyosomattāya te bhikkhū ussāhento saṃvejento ca āha -- ^b^``uṭṭhahatha...pe0... vasānuge''^eb^ti. tatrāyaṃ sādhippāyayojanā atthavaṇṇanā -- evaṃ kilesasallaviddhānañhi vo, bhikkhave, kālo pabujjhituṃ. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? maṇḍapeyyamidaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ, satthā sammukhībhūto, ito pubbe pana vo dīgharattaṃ suttaṃ, girīsu suttaṃ, nadīsu suttaṃ, samesu suttaṃ, visamesu suttaṃ, rukkhaggesupi suttaṃ adassanā ariyasaccānaṃ, tasmā tassā niddāya antakiriyatthaṃ uṭṭhahatha nisīdatha daḷhaṃ sikkhatha santiyā.

[03] tattha purimapādassattho vuttanayo eva. dutiyapāde pana ^b^santī^eb^ti tisso santiyo -- accantasanti, tadaṅgasanti, sammutisantīti, nibbānavipassanādiṭṭhigatānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. idha pana accantasanti nibbānamadhippetaṃ, tasmā nibbānatthaṃ daḷhaṃ sikkhatha, asithilaparakkamā hutvā sikkhathāti vuttaṃ hoti. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^mā vo pamatte viññāya, maccurājā amohayittha vasānuge^eb^ ^a^M2.0072^ea^, mā tumhe ``pamattā ete''ti evaṃ ñatvā maccurājapariyāyanāmo māro vasānuge amohayittha, yathā tassa vasaṃ gacchatha, evaṃ vasānuge karonto mā amohayitthāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ yato tassa vasaṃ anupagacchantā ^b^yāya devā manussā ca...pe0... samappitā,^eb^ yāya devā ca manussā ca atthikā rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbatthikā, taṃ rūpādiṃ sitā nissitā allīnā ^a^V2.0066^ea^ hutvā tiṭṭhanti, taratha samatikkamatha etaṃ nānappakāresu visayesu visaṭavitthiṇṇavisālattā ^a^P1.0339^ea^ visattikaṃ bhavabhogataṇhaṃ. ^b^khaṇo vo mā upaccagā,^eb^ ayaṃ tumhākaṃ samaṇadhammakaraṇakkhaṇo mā atikkami. yesañhi ayamevarūpo khaṇo atikkamati, ye ca imaṃ khaṇaṃ atikkamanti, te ^b^khaṇātītā hi socanti nirayamhi samappitā,^eb^ nirassādaṭṭhena nirayasaññite catubbidhepi apāye patiṭṭhitā ``akataṃ vata no kalyāṇa''ntiādinā nayena socanti.

[03] 337^b^.^eb^ evaṃ bhagavā te bhikkhū ussāhetvā saṃvejetvā ca idāni tesaṃ taṃ pamādavihāraṃ vigarahitvā sabbeva te appamāde niyojento ^b^``pamādo rajo''^eb^ti imaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^pamādo^eb^ti saṅkhepato sativippavāso, so cittamalinaṭṭhena ^b^rajo^eb^. taṃ pamādamanupatito ^b^pamādānupatito,^eb^ pamādānupatitattā aparāparuppanno pamādo eva, sopi rajo. na hi kadāci pamādo nāma arajo atthi. tena kiṃ dīpeti? mā tumhe ``daharā tāva mayaṃ pacchā jānissāmā''ti vissāsamāpajjittha. daharakālepi hi pamādo rajo, majjhimakālepi therakālepi pamādānupatitattā mahārajo saṅkārakūṭo eva hoti, yathā ghare ekadvedivasiko rajo rajo eva, vaḍḍhamāno pana gaṇavassiko saṅkārakūṭo eva hoti. evaṃ santepi pana paṭhamavaye buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā itaravayesu samaṇadhammaṃ karonto, paṭhamavaye vā pariyāpuṇitvā majjhimavaye suṇitvā pacchimavaye samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi bhikkhu pamādavihārī na hoti appamādānulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannattā. yo pana sabbavayesu pamādavihārī divāseyyaṃ āmisakathañca anuyutto, seyyathāpi tumhe, tasseva so paṭhamavaye pamādo rajo, itaravayesu pamādānupatito mahāpamādo ca mahārajo evāti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M2.0073^ea^ tesaṃ pamādavihāraṃ vigarahitvā appamāde niyojento āha -- ^b^``appamādena vijjāya, abbahe sallamattano''^eb^ti, tassattho -- yasmā evameso sabbadāpi pamādo rajo, tasmā satiavippavāsasaṅkhātena appamādena āsavānaṃ khayañāṇasaṅkhātāya ca vijjāya paṇḍito kulaputto uddhare attano hadayanissitaṃ rāgādipañcavidhaṃ sallanti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ samāpesi. desanāpariyosāne saṃvegamāpajjitvā tameva dhammadesanaṃ manasi karitvā paccavekkhamānā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā pañcasatāpi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya uṭṭhānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 338^b^.^eb^ ^b^kacci^eb^ ^a^V2.0067^ea^ ^a^P1.0340^ea^ ^b^abhiṇhasaṃvāsā^eb^ti rāhulasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? bhagavā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā bodhimaṇḍato anupubbena kapilavatthuṃ gantvā tattha rāhulakumārena ``dāyajjaṃ me samaṇa dehī''ti dāyajjaṃ yācito sāriputtattheraṃ āṇāpesi -- ``rāhulakumāraṃ pabbājehī''ti. taṃ sabbaṃ khandhakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ (mahāva0 aṭṭha0 105) vuttanayeneva gahetabbaṃ. evaṃ pabbajitaṃ pana rāhulakumāraṃ vuḍḍhippattaṃ sāriputtattherova upasampādesi, mahāmoggallānatthero assa kammavācācariyo ahosi. taṃ bhagavā ``ayaṃ kumāro jātiādisampanno, so jātigottakulavaṇṇapokkharatādīni nissāya mānaṃ vā madaṃ vā mā akāsī''ti daharakālato pabhuti yāva na ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇi, tāva ovadanto abhiṇhaṃ imaṃ suttamabhāsi. tasmā cetaṃ suttapariyosānepi vuttaṃ ``itthaṃ sudaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ imāhi gāthāhi abhiṇhaṃ ovadatī''ti. tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ ayaṃ saṅkhepattho ``kacci tvaṃ, rāhula, abhiṇhaṃ saṃvāsahetu jātiādīnaṃ aññatarena vatthunā na paribhavasi paṇḍitaṃ, ñāṇapadīpassa dhammadesanāpadīpassa ca dhāraṇato ^b^ukkādhāro manussānaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0074^ea^ ^b^kacci apacito tayā^eb^, kacci niccaṃ pūjito tayā''ti āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ sandhāya bhaṇati.
[03] 339^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vutte āyasmā rāhulo ``nāhaṃ bhagavā nīcapuriso viya saṃvāsahetu mānaṃ vā madaṃ vā karomī''ti dīpento imaṃ paṭigāthamāha ^b^``nāhaṃ abhiṇhasaṃvāsā''^eb^ti. sā uttānatthā eva.

[03] 340^b^.^eb^ tato naṃ bhagavā uttariṃ ovadanto ^b^pañca kāmaguṇe^eb^tiādikā avasesagāthāyo āha. tattha yasmā pañca kāmaguṇā sattānaṃ piyarūpā piyajātikā ativiya sattehi icchitā patthitā ^a^P1.0341^ea^, mano ca nesaṃ ramayanti, te cāyasmā rāhulo hitvā saddhāya gharā nikkhanto, na rājābhinīto, na corābhinīto, na iṇaṭṭo, na bhayaṭṭo, na jīvikāpakato, tasmā naṃ bhagavā ^b^``pañca kāmaguṇe hitvā, piyarūpe manorame, saddhāya gharā nikkhammā''^eb^ti samuttejetvā imassa nekkhammassa patirūpāya paṭipattiyā niyojento āha -- ^b^``dukkhassantakaro bhavā''^eb^ti.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0068^ea^ siyā ``nanu cāyasmā dāyajjaṃ patthento balakkārena pabbājito, atha kasmā bhagavā āha -- `saddhāya gharā nikkhammā'''ti vuccate -- nekkhammādhimuttattā. ayañhi āyasmā dīgharattaṃ nekkhammādhimutto padumuttarasammāsambuddhassa puttaṃ uparevataṃ nāma sāmaṇeraṃ disvā saṅkho nāma nāgarājā hutvā satta divase dānaṃ datvā tathābhāvaṃ patthetvā tato pabhuti patthanāsampanno abhinīhārasampanno satasahassakappe pāramiyo pūretvā antimabhavaṃ upapanno. evaṃ nekkhammādhimuttatañcassa bhagavā jānāti. tathāgatabalaññatarañhi etaṃ ñāṇaṃ. tasmā āha -- ``saddhāya gharā nikkhammā''ti. atha vā dīgharattaṃ saddhāyeva gharā nikkhamma idāni dukkhassantakaro bhavāti ayamettha adhippāyo.

[03] 341^b^.^eb^ idānissa ādito pabhuti vaṭṭadukkhassa antakiriyāya paṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``mitte bhajassu kalyāṇe''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha sīlādīhi adhikā kalyāṇamittā nāma, te bhajanto himavantaṃ nissāya mahāsālā mūlādīhi viya sīlādīhi vaḍḍhati. tenāha -- ``mitte bhajassu kalyāṇe''ti. ^b^pantañca sayanāsanaṃ, vivittaṃ appanigghosa^eb^nti yañca sayanāsanaṃ pantaṃ dūraṃ vivittaṃ appākiṇṇaṃ appanigghosaṃ, yattha migasūkarādisaddena araññasaññā ^a^M2.0075^ea^ uppajjati, tathārūpaṃ sayanāsanañca bhajassu. ^b^mattaññū hohi bhojane^eb^ti pamāṇaññū hohi, paṭiggahaṇamattaṃ paribhogamattañca jānāhīti attho. tattha paṭiggahaṇamattaññunā deyyadhammepi appe dāyakepi appaṃ dātukāme appameva gahetabbaṃ, deyyadhamme appe dāyake pana bahuṃ dātukāmepi appameva gahetabbaṃ, deyyadhamme pana bahutare ^a^P1.0342^ea^ dāyakepi appaṃ dātukāme appameva gahetabbaṃ, deyyadhammepi bahutare dāyakepi bahuṃ dātukāme attano balaṃ jānitvā gahetabbaṃ. apica mattāyeva vaṇṇitā bhagavatāti paribhogamattaññunā puttamaṃsaṃ viya akkhabbhañjanamiva ca yoniso manasi karitvā bhojanaṃ paribhuñjitabbanti.

[03] 342^b^.^eb^ evamimāya gāthāya brahmacariyassa upakārabhūtāya kalyāṇamittasevanāya niyojetvā senāsanabhojanamukhena ca paccayaparibhogapārisuddhisīle samādapetvā idāni yasmā cīvarādīsu taṇhāya micchāājīvo hoti, tasmā taṃ paṭisedhetvā ājīvapārisuddhisīle samādapento ^b^``cīvare piṇḍapāte cā''^eb^ti imaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^paccaye^eb^ti gilānappaccaye. ^b^etesū^eb^ti etesu catūsu cīvarādīsu bhikkhūnaṃ taṇhuppādavatthūsu. ^b^taṇhaṃ mākāsī^eb^ti ``hirikopīnapaṭicchādanādiatthameva te cattāro paccayā niccāturānaṃ purisānaṃ paṭikārabhūtā jajjaragharassevimassa atidubbalassa kāyassa upatthambhabhūtā''tiādinā nayena ādīnavaṃ passanto taṇhaṃ mā janesi, ajanento anuppādento viharāhīti vuttaṃ hoti. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^mā^eb^ ^a^V2.0069^ea^ ^b^lokaṃ punarāgami^eb^. etesu hi taṇhaṃ karonto taṇhāya ākaḍḍhiyamāno punapi imaṃ lokaṃ āgacchati. so tvaṃ etesu taṇhaṃ mākāsi, evaṃ sante na puna imaṃ lokaṃ āgamissasīti.

[03] evaṃ vutte āyasmā rāhulo ``cīvare taṇhaṃ mākāsīti maṃ bhagavā āhā''ti cīvarapaṭisaṃyuttāni dve dhutaṅgāni samādiyi paṃsukūlikaṅgañca, tecīvarikaṅgañca. ``piṇḍapāte taṇhaṃ mākāsīti maṃ bhagavā āhā''ti piṇḍapātapaṭisaṃyuttāni pañca dhutaṅgāni samādiyi -- piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ, sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ, ekāsanikaṅgaṃ, pattapiṇḍikaṅgaṃ, khalupacchābhattikaṅganti. ``senāsane taṇhaṃ mākāsīti maṃ bhagavā āhā''ti senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttāni ^a^M2.0076^ea^ cha dhutaṅgāni samādiyi -- āraññikaṅgaṃ, abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ, rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ, yathāsanthatikaṅgaṃ, sosānikaṅgaṃ, nesajjikaṅganti. ``gilānappaccaye taṇhaṃ mākāsīti maṃ bhagavā āhā''ti sabbappaccayesu yathālābhaṃ yathābalaṃ yathāsāruppanti tīhi ^a^P1.0343^ea^ santosehi santuṭṭho ahosi, yathā taṃ subbaco kulaputto padakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsaninti.

[03] 343^b^.^eb^ evaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīle samādapetvā idāni avasesasīle samathavipassanāsu ca samādapetuṃ ^b^``saṃvuto pātimokkhasmi''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^saṃvuto pātimokkhasmi^eb^nti ettha bhavassūti pāṭhaseso. ^b^bhavā^eb^ti antimapadena vā sambandho veditabbo, tathā dutiyapade. evametehi dvīhi vacanehi pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle, indriyasaṃvarasīle ca samādapesi. pākaṭavasena cettha pañcindriyāni vuttāni. lakkhaṇato pana chaṭṭhampi vuttaṃyeva hotīti veditabbaṃ. ^b^sati kāyagatā tyatthū^eb^ti evaṃ catupārisuddhisīle patiṭṭhitassa tuyhaṃ catudhātuvavatthānacatubbidhasampajaññānāpānassatiāhārepaṭikūlasaññābhāvanādibhedā kāyagatā sati atthu bhavatu, bhāvehi nanti attho. ^b^nibbidābahulo bhavā^eb^ti saṃsāravaṭṭe ukkaṇṭhanabahulo sabbaloke anabhiratasaññī hohīti attho.

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ ettāvatā nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ upacārabhūmiṃ dassetvā idāni appanābhūmiṃ dassento ^b^``nimittaṃ parivajjehī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^nimitta^eb^nti rāgaṭṭhāniyaṃ subhanimittaṃ. teneva naṃ parato visesento āha -- ^b^``subhaṃ rāgūpasañhita''^eb^nti. ^b^parivajjehī^eb^ti amanasikārena pariccajāhi. ^b^asubhāya cittaṃ bhāvehī^eb^ti yathā saviññāṇake aviññāṇake vā kāye asubhabhāvanā sampajjati, evaṃ cittaṃ bhāvehi. ^b^ekaggaṃ susamāhita^eb^nti upacārasamādhinā ekaggaṃ, appanāsamādhinā susamāhitaṃ. yathā te īdisaṃ cittaṃ hoti, tathā naṃ bhāvehīti attho.

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ evamassa ^a^V2.0070^ea^ appanābhūmiṃ dassetvā vipassanaṃ dassento ^b^``animitta''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^animittañca bhāvehī^eb^ti evaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyena samādhinā samāhitacitto vipassanaṃ bhāvehīti vuttaṃ hoti. vipassanā hi ``aniccānupassanāñāṇaṃ niccanimittato vimuccatīti animitto vimokkho''tiādinā ^a^M2.0077^ea^ nayena rāganimittādīnaṃ vā aggahaṇena animittavohāraṃ labhati. yathāha --

[02] ``so khvāhaṃ, āvuso, sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā animittaṃ cetosamādhiṃ upasampajja ^a^P1.0344^ea^ viharāmi. tassa mayhaṃ, āvuso, iminā vihārena viharato nimittānusāri viññāṇaṃ hotī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.340).

[03] ^b^mānānusayamujjahā^eb^ti imāya animittabhāvanāya aniccasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā ``aniccasaññino, meghiya, anattasaññā saṇṭhāti, anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ pāpuṇātī''ti evamādinā (a0 ni0 9.3; udā0 31) anukkamena mānānusayaṃ ujjaha pajaha pariccajāhīti attho. ^b^tato mānābhisamayā, upasanto carissasī^eb^ti athevaṃ ariyamaggena mānassa abhisamayā khayā vayā pahānā paṭinissaggā upasanto nibbuto sītibhūto sabbadarathapariḷāhavirahito yāva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāsi, tāva suññatānimittāppaṇihitānaṃ aññataraññatarena phalasamāpattivihārena carissasi viharissasīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.

[03] tato paraṃ ``itthaṃ sudaṃ bhagavā''tiādi saṅgītikārakānaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^tattha itthaṃ suda^eb^nti itthaṃ su idaṃ, evamevāti vuttaṃ hoti. sesamettha uttānatthameva. evaṃ ovadiyamāno cāyasmā rāhulo paripākagatesu vimuttiparipācaniyesu dhammesu cūḷarāhulovādasuttapariyosāne anekehi devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ arahatte patiṭṭhāsīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya rāhulasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0071^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti nigrodhakappasuttaṃ, ``vaṅgīsasutta''ntipi vuccati. kā uppatti? ayameva yāssa nidāne vuttā. tattha ^b^evaṃ me^eb^tiādīni vuttatthāneva, yato ^a^M2.0078^ea^ tāni aññāni ca tathāvidhāni chaḍḍetvā avuttanayameva vaṇṇayissāma. ^b^aggāḷave cetiye^eb^ti āḷaviyaṃ aggacetiye. anuppanne hi bhagavati aggāḷavagotamakādīni anekāni cetiyāni ahesuṃ yakkhanāgādīnaṃ bhavanāni. tāni uppanne bhagavati manussā vināsetvā vihāre akaṃsu, teneva ca nāmena vohariṃsu. tato ^a^P1.0345^ea^ aggāḷavacetiyasaṅkhāte vihāre viharatīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^āyasmato vaṅgīsassā^eb^ti ettha ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanaṃ, ^b^vaṅgīso^eb^ti tassa therassa nāmaṃ. so jātito pabhuti evaṃ veditabbo -- so kira paribbājakassa putto paribbājikāya kucchimhi jāto aññataraṃ vijjaṃ jānāti, yassānubhāvena chavasīsaṃ ākoṭetvā sattānaṃ gatiṃ jānāti. manussāpi sudaṃ attano ñātīnaṃ kālakatānaṃ susānato sīsāni ānetvā taṃ tesaṃ gatiṃ pucchanti. so ``asukaniraye nibbatto, asukamanussaloke''ti vadati. te tena vimhitā tassa bahuṃ dhanaṃ denti. evaṃ so sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo ahosi.

[03] so satasahassakappaṃ pūritapāramī abhinīhārasampanno pañcahi purisasahassehi parivuto gāmanigamajanapadarājadhānīsu vicaranto sāvatthiṃ anuppatto. tena ca samayena bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati, sāvatthivāsino purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ sunivatthā supārutā pupphagandhādīni gahetvā dhammassavanatthāya jetavanaṃ gacchanti. so te disvā ``mahājanakāyo kuhiṃ gacchatī''ti pucchi. athassa te ācikkhiṃsu -- ``buddho loke uppanno, so bahujanahitāya dhammaṃ deseti, tattha gacchāmā''ti. sopi tehi saddhiṃ saparivāro gantvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammoditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. atha naṃ bhagavā āmantesi -- ``kiṃ, vaṅgīsa, jānāsi kira tādisaṃ vijjaṃ, yāya sattānaṃ chavasīsāni ākoṭetvā gatiṃ pavedesī''ti? ``evaṃ, bho gotama, jānāmī''ti. bhagavā niraye nibbattassa sīsaṃ āharāpetvā dassesi, so nakhena ākoṭetvā ``niraye nibbattassa sīsaṃ bho gotamā''ti āha. evaṃ sabbagatinibbattānaṃ sīsāni dassesi, sopi tatheva ñatvā ārocesi. athassa bhagavā khīṇāsavasīsaṃ dassesi, so punappunaṃ ākoṭetvā ^a^V2.0072^ea^ na aññāsi. tato bhagavā ``avisayo ^a^M2.0079^ea^ te ettha vaṅgīsa, mameveso ^a^P1.0346^ea^ visayo, khīṇāsavasīsa''nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamabhāsi --
[21] ``gatī migānaṃ pavanaṃ, ākāso pakkhinaṃ gati.
[22] vibhavo gati dhammānaṃ, nibbānaṃ arahato gatī''ti.. (pari0 339).

[03] vaṅgīso gāthaṃ sutvā ``imaṃ me, bho gotama, vijjaṃ dehī''ti āha. bhagavā ``nāyaṃ vijjā apabbajitānaṃ sampajjatī''ti āha. so ``pabbājetvā vā maṃ, bho gotama, yaṃ vā icchasi, taṃ katvā imaṃ vijjaṃ dehī''ti āha. tadā ca bhagavato nigrodhakappatthero samīpe hoti, taṃ bhagavā āṇāpesi -- ``tena hi, nigrodhakappa, imaṃ pabbājehī''ti. so taṃ pabbājetvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. vaṅgīso anupubbena paṭisambhidāppatto arahā ahosi. etadagge ca bhagavatā niddiṭṭho ``etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭibhānavantānaṃ yadidaṃ vaṅgīso''ti (a0 ni0 1.212).

[03] evaṃ samudāgatassa āyasmato vaṅgīsassa ^b^upajjhāyo^eb^ vajjāvajjādiupanijjhāyanena evaṃ laddhavohāro ^b^nigrodhakappo^eb^ nāma thero. ^b^kappo^eb^ti tassa therassa nāmaṃ, nigrodhamūle pana arahattaṃ adhigatattā ^b^``nigrodhakappo''^eb^ti bhagavatā vutto. tato naṃ bhikkhūpi evaṃ voharanti. sāsane thirabhāvaṃ pattoti ^b^thero^eb^. ^b^aggāḷave cetiye aciraparinibbuto hotī^eb^ti tasmiṃ cetiye aciraparinibbuto hoti. ^b^rahogatassa paṭisallīnassā^eb^ti gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭhattā rahogatassa kāyena, paṭisallīnassa cittena tehi tehi visayehi paṭinivattitvā sallīnassa. ^b^evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādī^eb^ti iminā ākārena vitakko uppajji. kasmā pana udapādīti. asammukhattā diṭṭhāsevanattā ca. ayañhi tassa parinibbānakāle na sammukhā ahosi, diṭṭhapubbañcānena assa hatthakukkuccādipubbāsevanaṃ, tādisañca akhīṇāsavānampi hoti khīṇāsavānampi pubbaparicayena.

[03] tathā hi piṇḍolabhāradvājo pacchābhattaṃ divāvihāratthāya udenassa uyyānameva gacchati ^a^P1.0347^ea^ pubbe rājā hutvā tattha paricāresīti iminā pubbaparicayena, gavampatitthero tāvatiṃsabhavane suññaṃ devavimānaṃ gacchati devaputto hutvā tattha paricāresīti iminā pubbaparicayena. pilindavaccho bhikkhū vasalavādena samudācarati abbokiṇṇāni pañca jātisatāni ^a^M2.0080^ea^ brāhmaṇo hutvā tathā abhāsīti iminā pubbaparicayena. tasmā asammukhattā diṭṭhāsevanattā cassa evaṃ cetaso ^a^V2.0073^ea^ parivitakko udapādi ^b^``parinibbuto nu kho me upajjhāyo, udāhu no parinibbuto''^eb^ti. tato paraṃ uttānatthameva. ^b^ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā^eb^ti ettha pana puna saṇṭhāpanena evaṃ vuttaṃ. ekaṃsanti ca vāmaṃsaṃ pārupitvā ṭhitassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. yato yathā vāmaṃsaṃ pārupitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti, tathā cīvaraṃ katvāti evamassattho veditabbo. sesaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03] 346^b^.^eb^ ^b^anomapañña^eb^nti omaṃ vuccati parittaṃ lāmakaṃ, na omapaññaṃ, anomapaññaṃ, mahāpaññanti attho. ^b^diṭṭheva dhamme^eb^ti paccakkhameva, imasmiṃyeva attabhāveti vā attho. ^b^vicikicchāna^eb^nti evarūpānaṃ parivitakkānaṃ. ^b^ñāto^eb^ti pākaṭo. ^b^yasassī^eb^ti lābhaparivārasampanno ^b^abhinibbutatto^eb^ti guttacitto apariḍayhamānacitto vā.

[03] 347^b^.^eb^ ^b^tayā kata^eb^nti nigrodhamūle nisinnattā ``nigrodhakappo''ti vadatā tayā katanti yathā attanā upalakkheti, tathā bhaṇati. bhagavā pana na nisinnattā eva taṃ tathā ālapi, apica kho tattha arahattaṃ pattattā. ^b^brāhmaṇassā^eb^ti jātiṃ sandhāya bhaṇati. so kira brāhmaṇamahāsālakulā pabbajito. ^b^namassaṃ acarī^eb^ti namassamāno vihāsi. ^b^mutyapekkho^eb^ti nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ vimuttiṃ apekkhamāno, nibbānaṃ patthentoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^daḷhadhammadassī^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ ālapati. daḷhadhammo hi nibbānaṃ abhijjanaṭṭhena, tañca bhagavā dasseti. tasmā taṃ ``daḷhadhammadassī''ti āha.

[03] 348^b^.^eb^ ^b^sakyā^eb^tipi bhagavantameva kulanāmena ālapati. ^b^mayampi sabbe^eb^ti niravasesaparisaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā attānaṃ dassento bhaṇati. ^b^samantacakkhū^eb^tipi bhagavantameva sabbaññutaññāṇena ālapati. ^b^samavaṭṭhitā^eb^ti sammā avaṭṭhitā ābhogaṃ katvā ṭhitā. ^b^no^eb^ti amhākaṃ. ^b^savanāyā^eb^ti ^a^P1.0348^ea^ imassa pañhassa veyyākaraṇassavanatthāya. ^b^sotā^eb^ti sotindriyāni. ^b^tuvaṃ no satthā tvamanuttarosī^eb^ti thutivacanamattamevetaṃ.

[03] 349^b^.^eb^ ^b^chindeva^eb^ ^a^M2.0081^ea^ ^b^no vicikiccha^eb^nti akusalavicikicchāya nibbicikiccho so, vicikicchāpatirūpakaṃ pana taṃ parivitakkaṃ sandhāyevamāha. ^b^brūhi meta^eb^nti brūhi me etaṃ, yaṃ mayā yācitosi ``taṃ sāvakaṃ sakya, mayampi sabbe aññātumicchāmā''ti, brūvanto ca taṃ ^b^brāhmaṇaṃ parinibbutaṃ vedaya bhūripañña majjheva no bhāsa,^eb^ parinibbutaṃ ñatvā mahāpaññaṃ bhagavā majjheva amhākaṃ sabbesaṃ bhāsa, yathā sabbeva mayaṃ jāneyyāma. ^b^sakkova devāna sahassanetto^eb^ti idaṃ pana thutivacanameva. apicassa ayaṃ adhippāyo -- yathā sakko sahassanetto devānaṃ majjhe ^a^V2.0074^ea^ tehi sakkaccaṃ sampaṭicchitavacano bhāsati, evaṃ amhākaṃ majjhe amhehi sampaṭicchitavacano bhāsāti.

[03] 350^b^.^eb^ ^b^ye kecī^eb^ti imampi gāthaṃ bhagavantaṃ thunantoyeva vattukāmataṃ janetuṃ bhaṇati. tassattho ^b^ye keci^eb^ abhijjhādayo ^b^ganthā^eb^ tesaṃ appahāne mohavicikicchānaṃ pahānābhāvato ^b^``mohamaggā''^eb^ti ^b^ca ``aññāṇapakkhā''^eb^ti ca ^b^``vicikicchaṭṭhānā''^eb^ti ca vuccanti. sabbe te ^b^tathāgataṃ patvā^eb^ tathāgatassa desanābalena viddhaṃsitā na bhavanti nassanti. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? cakkhuñhi ^b^etaṃ paramaṃ narānaṃ,^eb^ yasmā tathāgato sabbaganthavidhamanapaññācakkhujananato narānaṃ paramaṃ cakkhunti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 351^b^.^eb^ ^b^no ce hi jātū^eb^ti imampi gāthaṃ thunantoyeva vattukāmataṃ janentova bhaṇati. tattha ^b^jātū^eb^ti ekaṃsavacanaṃ. ^b^puriso^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^jotimanto^eb^ti paññājotisamannāgatā sāriputtādayo. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yadi bhagavā yathā puratthimādibhedo vāto abbhaghanaṃ vihanati, evaṃ desanāvegena kilese na vihaneyya ^a^P1.0349^ea^. tathā yathā abbhaghanena nivuto loko tamova hoti ekandhakāro, evaṃ aññāṇanivutopi tamovassa. yepi ime dāni jotimanto khāyanti sāriputtādayo, tepi narā na tapeyyunti.

[03] 352^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhīrā cā^eb^ti imampi gāthaṃ purimanayeneva bhaṇati. tassattho ^b^dhīrā^eb^ ca paṇḍitā purisā ^b^pajjotakarā bhavanti,^eb^ paññāpajjotaṃ uppādenti. tasmā ahaṃ taṃ ^b^vīra^eb^ padhānavīriyasamannāgato bhagavā ^b^tatheva maññe^eb^ dhīroti ca ^a^M2.0082^ea^ pajjotakarotveva ca maññāmi. mayañhi vipassinaṃ sabbadhamme yathābhūtaṃ passantaṃ bhagavantaṃ jānantā eva upāgamumhā, tasmā ^b^parisāsu no āvikarohi kappaṃ,^eb^ nigrodhakappaṃ ācikkha pakāsehīti.

[03] 353^b^.^eb^ ^b^khippa^eb^nti imampi gāthaṃ purimanayeneva bhaṇati. tassattho ^b^khippaṃ giraṃ eraya^eb^ lahuṃ acirāyamāno vacanaṃ bhāsa, ^b^vagguṃ^eb^ manoramaṃ bhagavā. yathā suvaṇṇahaṃso gocarapaṭikkanto jātassaravanasaṇḍaṃ disvā gīvaṃ ^b^paggayha^eb^ uccāretvā rattatuṇḍena saṇikaṃ ataramāno vagguṃ giraṃ nikūjati nicchāreti, evameva tvampi ^b^saṇikaṃ nikūja,^eb^ iminā mahāpurisalakkhaṇaññatarena ^b^bindussarena suvikappitena^eb^ suṭṭhuvikappitena abhisaṅkhatena. ete mayaṃ ^b^sabbeva ujugatā^eb^ avikkhittamānasā hutvā tava nikūjitaṃ ^b^suṇomā^eb^ti.

[03] 354^b^.^eb^ ^b^pahīnajātimaraṇa^eb^nti ^a^V2.0075^ea^ imampi gāthaṃ purimanayeneva bhaṇati. tattha na sesetīti aseso, taṃ ^b^asesaṃ^eb^. sotāpannādayo viya kiñci asesetvā pahīnajātimaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^niggayhā^eb^ti suṭṭhu yācitvā nibandhitvā. ^b^dhona^eb^nti dhutasabbapāpaṃ. ^b^vadessāmī^eb^ti kathāpessāmi dhammaṃ. ^b^na kāmakāro hi puthujjanāna^eb^nti puthujjanānameva hi kāmakāro natthi, yaṃ patthenti ñātuṃ vā vattuṃ vā, taṃ na sakkonti. ^b^saṅkheyyakāro ca tathāgatāna^eb^nti tathāgatānaṃ pana vīmaṃsakāro paññāpubbaṅgamā kiriyā. te yaṃ patthenti ñātuṃ vā vattuṃ vā, taṃ sakkontīti adhippāyo.

[03] 355^b^.^eb^ idāni taṃ saṅkheyyakāraṃ ^a^P1.0350^ea^ pakāsento ^b^``sampannaveyyākaraṇa''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tassattho -- tathā hi tava bhagavā idaṃ ^b^samujjupaññassa^eb^ tattha tattha samuggahītaṃ vuttaṃ pavattitaṃ sampannaveyyākaraṇaṃ, ``santatimahāmatto sattatālamattaṃ abbhuggantvā parinibbāyissati, suppabuddho sakko sattame divase pathaviṃ pavisissatī''ti evamādīsu aviparītaṃ diṭṭhaṃ. tato pana suṭṭhutaraṃ añjaliṃ paṇāmetvā āha -- ayamañjalī pacchimo suppaṇāmito, ayamaparopi añjalī suṭṭhutaraṃ paṇāmito. ^b^mā mohayī^eb^ti mā no akathanena mohayi jānaṃ jānanto kappassa gatiṃ. ^b^anomapaññā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ ālapati.

[03] 356^b^.^eb^ ^b^parovara^eb^nti ^a^M2.0083^ea^ imaṃ pana gāthaṃ aparenapi pariyāyena amohanameva yācanto āha. tattha ^b^parovara^eb^nti lokiyalokuttaravasena sundarāsundaraṃ dūresantikaṃ vā. ^b^ariyadhamma^eb^nti catusaccadhammaṃ. ^b^viditvā^eb^ti paṭivijjhitvā. ^b^jāna^eb^nti sabbaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ jānanto. ^b^vācābhikaṅkhāmī^eb^ti yathā ghammani ghammatatto puriso kilanto tasito vāriṃ, evaṃ te vācaṃ abhikaṅkhāmi. ^b^sutaṃ pavassā^eb^ti sutasaṅkhātaṃ saddāyatanaṃ pavassa pagghara muñca pavattehi. ``sutassa vassā''tipi pāṭho, vuttappakārassa saddāyatanassa vuṭṭhiṃ vassāti attho.
[03] 357^b^.^eb^ idāni yādisaṃ vācaṃ abhikaṅkhati, taṃ pakāsento --
[21] ``yadatthikaṃ brahmacariyaṃ acarī,
[27] kappāyano kaccissa taṃ amoghaṃ.
[26] nibbāyi so ādu saupādiseso,
[22] yathā vimutto ahu taṃ suṇomā''ti.. --

[25] gāthamāha ^a^V2.0076^ea^. tattha ^b^kappāyano^eb^ti kappameva pūjāvasena bhaṇati. ^b^yathā vimutto^eb^ti ``kiṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā yathā asekkhā, udāhu upādisesāya yathā sekkhā''ti pucchati. sesamettha pākaṭameva.
[03] 358^b^.^eb^ evaṃ dvādasahi gāthāhi yācito bhagavā taṃ viyākaronto --
[21] ``acchecchi taṇhaṃ idha nāmarūpe, (iti bhagavā)
[27] kaṇhassa sotaṃ dīgharattānusayitaṃ.
[26] atāri jātiṃ maraṇaṃ asesaṃ,
[22] iccabravī bhagavā pañcaseṭṭho''ti.. --

[25] gāthamāha. tattha purimapadassa tāva attho -- yāpi imasmiṃ nāmarūpe kāmataṇhādibhedā taṇhādīgharattaṃ appahīnaṭṭhena anusayitā kaṇhanāmakassa mārassa ``sota''ntipi vuccati, taṃ kaṇhassa sotabhūtaṃ dīgharattānusayitaṃ ^a^P1.0351^ea^ idha nāmarūpe taṇhaṃ kappāyano chindīti. ^b^iti bhagavā^eb^ti idaṃ panettha saṅgītikārānaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^atāri jātiṃ maraṇaṃ asesa^eb^nti so ^a^M2.0084^ea^ taṃ taṇhaṃ chetvā asesaṃ jātimaraṇaṃ atāri, anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyīti dasseti. ^b^iccabravī bhagavā pañcaseṭṭho^eb^ti vaṅgīsena puṭṭho bhagavā etadavoca pañcannaṃ paṭhamasissānaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ seṭṭho, pañcahi vā saddhādīhi indriyehi, sīlādīhi vā dhammakkhandhehi ativisiṭṭhehi cakkhūhi ca seṭṭhoti saṅgītikārānamevidaṃ vacanaṃ.

[03] 359^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vutte bhagavato bhāsitamabhinandamānaso vaṅgīso ^b^``esa sutvā''^eb^tiādigāthāyo āha. tattha paṭhamagāthāya ^b^isisattamā^eb^ti bhagavā isi ca sattamo ca uttamaṭṭhena vipassīsikhīvessabhūkakusandhakoṇāgamanakassapanāmake cha isayo attanā saha satta karonto pātubhūtotipi isisattamo, taṃ ālapanto āha. ^b^na maṃ vañcesī^eb^ti yasmā parinibbuto, tasmā tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ icchantaṃ maṃ na vañcesi, na visaṃvādesīti attho. sesamettha pākaṭameva.

[03] 360^b^.^eb^ dutiyagāthāya yasmā mutyapekkho vihāsi, tasmā taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``yathāvādī tathākārī, ahu buddhassa sāvako''^eb^ti. ^b^maccuno jālaṃ tata^eb^nti tebhūmakavaṭṭe vitthataṃ mārassa taṇhājālaṃ. ^b^māyāvino^eb^ti bahumāyassa. ``tathā māyāvino''tipi keci paṭhanti, tesaṃ yo anekāhi ^a^V2.0077^ea^ māyāhi anekakkhattumpi bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami, tassa tathā māyāvinoti adhippāyo.

[03] 361^b^.^eb^ tatiyagāthāya ^b^ādī^eb^ti kāraṇaṃ. ^b^upādānassā^eb^ti vaṭṭassa. vaṭṭañhi upādātabbaṭṭhena idha ``upādāna''nti vuttaṃ, tasseva upādānassa ādiṃ avijjātaṇhādibhedaṃ kāraṇaṃ addasa kappoti evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati bhagavāti adhippāyena vadati. ^b^accagā vatā^eb^ti atikkanto vata. ^b^maccudheyya^eb^nti maccu ettha dhiyatīti maccudheyyaṃ, tebhūmakavaṭṭassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. taṃ suduttaraṃ maccudheyyaṃ accagā vatāti vedajāto bhaṇati. sesamettha pākaṭamevāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya nigrodhakappasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 362^b^.^eb^ ^b^pucchāmi^eb^ ^a^V2.0078^ea^ ^a^M2.0085^ea^ ^a^P1.0352^ea^ ^b^muniṃ pahūtapañña^eb^nti sammāparibbājanīyasuttaṃ, ``mahāsamayasutta''ntipi vuccati mahāsamayadivase kathitattā. kā uppatti? pucchāvasikā uppatti. nimmitabuddhena hi puṭṭho bhagavā imaṃ suttamabhāsi, taṃ saddhiṃ pucchāya ``sammāparibbājanīyasutta''nti vuccati. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana sākiyakoliyānaṃ uppattito pabhuti porāṇehi vaṇṇīyati.

[03] tatrāyaṃ uddesamaggavaṇṇanā -- paṭhamakappikānaṃ kira rañño mahāsammatassa rojo nāma putto ahosi. rojassa vararojo, vararojassa kalyāṇo, kalyāṇassa varakalyāṇo, varakalyāṇassa mandhātā, mandhātussa varamandhātā, varamandhātussa uposatho, uposathassa varo, varassa upavaro, upavarassa maghadevo, maghadevassa paramparā caturāsīti khattiyasahassāni ahesuṃ. tesaṃ parato tayo okkākavaṃsā ahesuṃ. tesu tatiyaokkākassa pañca mahesiyo ahesuṃ -- hatthā, cittā, jantu, jālinī, visākhāti. ekekissā pañca pañca itthisatāni parivārā. sabbajeṭṭhāya cattāro puttā -- okkāmukho, karakaṇḍu, hatthiniko, sinipuroti; pañca dhītaro -- piyā, suppiyā, ānandā, vijitā, vijitasenāti. evaṃ sā nava putte labhitvā kālamakāsi.

[03] atha rājā aññaṃ daharaṃ abhirūpaṃ rājadhītaraṃ ānetvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. sāpi jantuṃ nāma ekaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi. taṃ jantukumāraṃ pañcamadivase alaṅkaritvā rañño dassesi. rājā tuṭṭho mahesiyā varaṃ adāsi. sā ñātakehi saddhiṃ mantetvā puttassa rajjaṃ yāci. rājā ``nassa vasali, mama puttānaṃ antarāyamicchasī''ti nādāsi. sā punappunaṃ ^a^P1.0353^ea^ raho rājānaṃ paritosetvā ``na, mahārāja, musāvādo vaṭṭatī''tiādīni vatvā yācati eva. atha rājā putte āmantesi -- ``ahaṃ, tātā, tumhākaṃ kaniṭṭhaṃ jantukumāraṃ disvā tassa mātuyā sahasā varaṃ adāsiṃ. sā ^a^M2.0086^ea^ puttassa rajjaṃ pariṇāmetuṃ icchati. tumhe mamaccayena āgantvā rajjaṃ kāreyyāthā''ti aṭṭhahi amaccehi saddhiṃ uyyojesi. te bhaginiyo ādāya caturaṅginiyā senāya nagarā nikkhamiṃsu. ``kumārā pituaccayena āgantvā rajjaṃ kāressanti, gacchāma ne upaṭṭhahāmā''ti cintetvā bahū manussā anubandhiṃsu. paṭhamadivase yojanamattā ^a^V2.0079^ea^ senā ahosi, dutiyadivase dviyojanamattā, tatiyadivase tiyojanamattā. kumārā cintesuṃ -- ``mahā ayaṃ balakāyo, sace mayaṃ kañci sāmantarājānaṃ akkamitvā janapadaṃ gaṇhissāma, sopi no na pahossati, kiṃ paresaṃ pīḷaṃ katvā laddharajjena, mahā jambudīpo, araññe nagaraṃ māpessāmā''ti himavantābhimukhā agamiṃsu.

[03] tattha nagaramāpanokāsaṃ pariyesamānā himavati kapilo nāma ghoratapo tāpaso paṭivasati pokkharaṇitīre mahāsākasaṇḍe, tassa vasanokāsaṃ gatā. so te disvā pucchitvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ sutvā tesu anukampaṃ akāsi. so kira bhummajālaṃ nāma vijjaṃ jānāti, yāya uddhaṃ asītihatthe ākāse ca heṭṭhā bhūmiyañca guṇadose passati. athekasmiṃ padese sūkaramigā sīhabyagghādayo tāsetvā paripātenti, maṇḍūkamūsikā sappe bhiṃsāpenti. so te disvā ``ayaṃ bhūmippadeso pathavīagga''nti tasmiṃ padese assamaṃ māpesi. tato so rājakumāre āha -- ``sace mama nāmena nagaraṃ karotha, demi vo imaṃ okāsa''nti. te tathā paṭijāniṃsu. tāpaso ``imasmiṃ okāse ṭhatvā caṇḍālaputtopi cakkavattiṃ balena atisetī''ti vatvā ``assame rañño gharaṃ māpetvā nagaraṃ māpethā''ti taṃ okāsaṃ datvā sayaṃ avidūre pabbatapāde assamaṃ katvā vasi. tato ^a^P1.0354^ea^ kumārā tattha nagaraṃ māpetvā kapilassa vutthokāse katattā ^b^``kapilavatthū''^eb^ti nāmaṃ āropetvā tattha nivāsaṃ kappesuṃ.

[03] atha amaccā ``ime kumārā vayappattā, yadi nesaṃ pitā santike bhaveyya, so āvāhavivāhaṃ kāreyya. idāni pana amhākaṃ bhāro''ti cintetvā kumārehi saddhiṃ mantesuṃ. kumārā ``amhākaṃ sadisā khattiyadhītaro na passāma, tāsampi bhaginīnaṃ sadise khattiyakumāre, jātisambhedañca ^a^M2.0087^ea^ na karomā''ti. te jātisambhedabhayena jeṭṭhabhaginiṃ mātuṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā avasesāhi saṃvāsaṃ kappesuṃ. tesaṃ pitā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā ``sakyā vata, bho kumārā, paramasakyā vata, bho kumārā''ti udānaṃ udānesi. ayaṃ tāva sakyānaṃ uppatti. vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā --

[02] ``atha kho, ambaṭṭha, rājā okkāko amacce pārisajje āmantesi -- `kahaṃ nu kho, bho, etarahi kumārā sammantī'ti. atthi, deva, himavantapasse pokkharaṇiyā tīre mahāsākasaṇḍo, tatthetarahi kumārā sammanti. te jātisambhedabhayā sakāhi bhaginīhi saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappentīti. atha kho, ambaṭṭha, rājā okkāko udānaṃ udānesi -- `sakyā vata, bho kumārā, paramasakyā vata, bho kumārā'ti, tadagge kho pana ^a^V2.0080^ea^, ambaṭṭha, sakyā paññāyanti, so ca sakyānaṃ pubbapuriso''ti (dī0 ni0 1.267).

[03] tato nesaṃ jeṭṭhabhaginiyā kuṭṭharogo udapādi, koviḷārapupphasadisāni gattāni ahesuṃ. rājakumārā ``imāya saddhiṃ ekato nisajjaṭṭhānabhojanādīni karontānampi upari esa rogo saṅkamatī''ti cintetvā uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchantā viya taṃ yāne āropetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇāpetvā ^a^P1.0355^ea^ taṃ tattha khādanīyabhojanīyehi saddhiṃ pakkhipitvā upari padaraṃ paṭicchādāpetvā paṃsuṃ datvā pakkamiṃsu. tena ca samayena rāmo nāma rājā kuṭṭharogī orodhehi ca nāṭakehi ca jigucchiyamāno tena saṃvegena jeṭṭhaputtassa rajjaṃ datvā araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha paṇṇamūlaphalāni paribhuñjanto nacirasseva arogo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo hutvā, ito cito ca vicaranto mahantaṃ susirarukkhaṃ disvā tassabbhantare soḷasahatthappamāṇaṃ taṃ kolāpaṃ sodhetvā, dvārañca vātapānañca katvā nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā tattha vāsaṃ kappesi. so aṅgārakaṭāhe aggiṃ katvā rattiṃ vissarañca sussarañca suṇanto sayati. so ``asukasmiṃ padese sīho saddamakāsi, asukasmiṃ byaggho''ti sallakkhetvā pabhāte tattha gantvā vighāsamaṃsaṃ ādāya pacitvā khādati.

[03] athekadivasaṃ so paccūsasamaye aggiṃ jāletvā nisīdi. tena ca samayena tassā rājadhītāya gandhaṃ ghāyitvā byaggho taṃ padesaṃ khaṇitvā ^a^M2.0088^ea^ padaratthare vivaramakāsi. tena vivarena sā byagghaṃ disvā bhītā vissaramakāsi. so taṃ saddaṃ sutvā ``itthisaddo eso''ti ca sallakkhetvā pātova tattha gantvā ``ko etthā''ti āha. ``mātugāmo sāmī''ti. ``nikkhamā''ti. ``na nikkhamāmī''ti. ``kiṃ kāraṇā''ti? ``khattiyakaññā aha''nti. evaṃ sobbhe nikhātāpi mānameva karoti. so sabbaṃ pucchitvā ``ahampi khattiyo''ti jātiṃ ācikkhitvā ``ehi dāni khīre pakkhittasappi viya jāta''nti āha. sā ``kuṭṭharoginīmhi sāmi, na sakkā nikkhamitu''nti āha. so ``katakammo dāni ahaṃ sakkā tikicchitu''nti nisseṇiṃ datvā taṃ uddharitvā attano vasanokāsaṃ netvā sayaṃ paribhuttabhesajjāni eva datvā nacirasseva arogaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇamakāsi. so tāya saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappesi. sā paṭhamasaṃvāseneva gabbhaṃ gaṇhitvā dve putte vijāyi, punapi dveti evaṃ soḷasakkhattuṃ vijāyi. evaṃ te dvattiṃsa bhātaro ahesuṃ. te anupubbena vuḍḍhippatte pitā sabbasippāni sikkhāpesi.

[03] athekadivasaṃ ^a^V2.0081^ea^ ^a^P1.0356^ea^ eko rāmarañño nagaravāsī pabbate ratanāni gavesanto taṃ padesaṃ āgato rājānaṃ disvā aññāsi. ``jānāmahaṃ, deva, tumhe''ti āha. ``kuto tvaṃ āgatosī''ti ca tena puṭṭho ``nagarato devā''ti āha. tato naṃ rājā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ pucchi. evaṃ tesu samullapamānesu te dārakā āgamiṃsu. so te disvā ``ime ke devā''ti pucchi. ``puttā me bhaṇe''ti. ``imehi dāni, deva, dvattiṃsakumārehi parivuto vane kiṃ karissasi, ehi rajjamanusāsā''ti? ``alaṃ, bhaṇe, idheva sukha''nti. so ``laddhaṃ dāni me kathāpābhata''nti nagaraṃ gantvā rañño puttassārocesi. rañño putto ``pitaraṃ ānessāmī''ti caturaṅginiyā senāya tattha gantvā nānappakārehi pitaraṃ yāci. sopi ``alaṃ, tāta kumāra, idheva sukha''nti neva icchi. tato rājaputto ``na dāni rājā āgantuṃ icchati, handassa idheva nagaraṃ māpemī''ti cintetvā taṃ kolarukkhaṃ uddharitvā gharaṃ katvā nagaraṃ māpetvā kolarukkhaṃ apanetvā katattā ``kolanagara''nti ca byagghapathe katattā ``byagghapajja''nti cāti dve nāmāni āropetvā agamāsi.

[03] tato ^a^M2.0089^ea^ vayappatte kumāre mātā āṇāpesi -- ``tātā, tumhākaṃ kapilavatthuvāsino sakyā mātulā honti, dhītaro nesaṃ gaṇhathā''ti. te yaṃ divasaṃ khattiyakaññāyo nadīkīḷanaṃ gacchanti, taṃ divasaṃ gantvā nadītitthaṃ uparundhitvā nāmāni sāvetvā patthitā patthitā rājadhītaro gahetvā agamaṃsu. sakyarājāno sutvā ``hotu bhaṇe, amhākaṃ ñātakā evā''ti tuṇhī ahesuṃ. ayaṃ koliyānaṃ uppatti.

[03] evaṃ tesaṃ sākiyakoliyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āvāhavivāhaṃ karontānaṃ āgato vaṃso yāva sīhahanurājā, tāva vitthārato veditabbo -- sīhahanurañño kira pañca puttā ahesuṃ ^a^P1.0357^ea^ -- suddhodano, amitodano, dhotodano, sakkodano, sukkodanoti. tesu suddhodane rajjaṃ kārayamāne tassa pajāpatiyā añjanarañño dhītāya mahāmāyādeviyā kucchimhi pūritapāramī mahāpuriso jātakanidāne vuttanayena tusitapurā cavitvā paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā anupubbena katamahābhinikkhamano sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anukkamena kapilavatthuṃ gantvā suddhodanamahārājādayo ariyaphale patiṭṭhāpetvā janapadacārikaṃ pakkamitvā punapi aparena samayena paccāgantvā pannarasahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ kapilavatthusmiṃ viharati nigrodhārāme.

[03] tattha viharante ca bhagavati sākiyakoliyānaṃ udakaṃ paṭicca kalaho ahosi. kathaṃ? nesaṃ ^a^V2.0082^ea^ kira ubhinnampi kapilapurakoliyapurānaṃ antare rohiṇī nāma nadī pavattati. sā kadāci appodakā hoti, kadāci mahodakā. appodakakāle setuṃ katvā sākiyāpi koliyāpi attano attano sassapāyanatthaṃ udakaṃ ānenti. tesaṃ manussā ekadivasaṃ setuṃ karontā aññamaññaṃ bhaṇḍantā ``are tumhākaṃ rājakulaṃ bhaginīhi saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappesi kukkuṭasoṇasiṅgālāditiracchānā viya, tumhākaṃ rājakulaṃ susirarukkhe vāsaṃ kappesi pisācillikā viyā''ti evaṃ jātivādena khuṃsetvā attano attano rājūnaṃ ārocesuṃ. te kuddhā yuddhasajjā hutvā rohiṇīnadītīraṃ sampattā. evaṃ sāgarasadisaṃ balaṃ aṭṭhāsi.

[03] atha ^a^M2.0090^ea^ bhagavā ``ñātakā kalahaṃ karonti, handa, ne vāressāmī''ti ākāsenāgantvā dvinnaṃ senānaṃ majjhe aṭṭhāsi. tampi āvajjetvā sāvatthito āgatoti eke. evaṃ ṭhatvā ca pana ^a^P1.0358^ea^ ^b^attadaṇḍasuttaṃ^eb^ (su0 ni0 941 ādayo) abhāsi. taṃ sutvā sabbe saṃvegappattā āvudhāni chaḍḍetvā bhagavantaṃ namassamānā aṭṭhaṃsu, mahagghañca āsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ. bhagavā oruyha paññattāsane nisīditvā ``kuṭhārīhattho puriso''tiādikaṃ ^b^phandanajātakaṃ^eb^ (jā0 1.13.14), ``vandāmi taṃ kuñjarā''tiādikaṃ ^b^laṭukikajātakaṃ^eb^ (jā0 1.5.39).
[21] ``sammodamānā gacchanti, jālamādāya pakkhino.
[22] yadā te vivadissanti, tadā ehinti me vasa''nti.. (jā0 1.1.33) --

[25] imaṃ ^b^vaṭṭakajātakañca^eb^ kathetvā puna tesaṃ cirakālappavattaṃ ñātibhāvaṃ dassento imaṃ mahāvaṃsaṃ kathesi. te ``pubbe kira mayaṃ ñātakā evā''ti ativiya pasīdiṃsu. tato sakyā aḍḍhateyyakumārasate, koliyā aḍḍhateyyakumārasateti pañca kumārasate bhagavato parivāratthāya adaṃsu. bhagavā tesaṃ pubbahetuṃ disvā ``etha bhikkhavo''ti āha. te sabbe iddhiyā nibbattāṭṭhaparikkhārayuttā ākāse abbhuggantvā āgamma bhagavantaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu. bhagavā te ādāya mahāvanaṃ agamāsi. tesaṃ pajāpatiyo dūte pāhesuṃ, te tāhi nānappakārehi palobhiyamānā ukkaṇṭhiṃsu. bhagavā tesaṃ ukkaṇṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā himavantaṃ dassetvā tattha ^b^kuṇālajātakakathāya^eb^ (jā0 2.21.289 kuṇālajātakaṃ) tesaṃ anabhiratiṃ vinodetukāmo āha -- ``diṭṭhapubbo vo, bhikkhave, himavā''ti? ``na bhagavā''ti. ``etha, bhikkhave, pekkhathā''ti attano iddhiyā te ākāsena nento ``ayaṃ suvaṇṇapabbato, ayaṃ rajatapabbato, ayaṃ maṇipabbato''ti nānappakāre pabbate dassetvā kuṇāladahe manosilātale paccuṭṭhāsi. tato ``himavante sabbe catuppadabahuppadādibhedā tiracchānagatā pāṇā āgacchantu, sabbesañca pacchato ^a^V2.0083^ea^ kuṇālasakuṇo''ti adhiṭṭhāsi. āgacchante ca te jātināmaniruttivasena vaṇṇento ``ete, bhikkhave, haṃsā, ete koñcā ^a^P1.0359^ea^, ete cakkavākā, karavīkā, hatthisoṇḍakā, pokkharasātakā''ti tesaṃ dassesi.

[03] te ^a^M2.0091^ea^ vimhitahadayā passantā sabbapacchato āgacchantaṃ dvīhi dijakaññāhi mukhatuṇḍakena ḍaṃsitvā gahitakaṭṭhavemajjhe nisinnaṃ sahassadijakaññāparivāraṃ kuṇālasakuṇaṃ disvā acchariyabbhutacittajātā bhagavantaṃ āhaṃsu -- ``kacci, bhante, bhagavāpi idha kuṇālarājā bhūtapubbo''ti? ``āma, bhikkhave, mayāvesa kuṇālavaṃso kato. atīte hi mayaṃ cattāro janā idha vasimhā -- nārado devilo isi, ānando gijjharājā, puṇṇamukho phussakokilo, ahaṃ kuṇālo sakuṇo''ti sabbaṃ mahākuṇālajātakaṃ kathesi. taṃ sutvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ purāṇadutiyikāyo ārabbha uppannā anabhirati vūpasantā. tato tesaṃ bhagavā saccakathaṃ kathesi, kathāpariyosāne sabbapacchimako sotāpanno, sabbauparimo anāgāmī ahosi, ekopi puthujjano vā arahā vā natthi. tato bhagavā te ādāya punadeva mahāvane oruhi. āgacchamānā ca te bhikkhū attanova iddhiyā āgacchiṃsu.

[03] atha nesaṃ bhagavā uparimaggatthāya puna dhammaṃ desesi. te pañcasatāpi vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu. paṭhamaṃ patto paṭhamameva agamāsi ``bhagavato ārocessāmī''ti. āgantvā ca ``abhiramāmahaṃ bhagavā, na ukkaṇṭhāmī''ti vatvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. evaṃ te sabbepi anukkamena āgantvā bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu jeṭṭhamāsauposathadivase sāyanhasamaye. tato pañcasatakhīṇāsavaparivutaṃ varabuddhāsane nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā asaññasatte ca arūpabrahmāno ca sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷe avasesadevatādayo maṅgalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena sukhumattabhāve nimminitvā samparivāresuṃ ``vicitrapaṭibhānaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sossāmā''ti. tattha cattāro khīṇāsavabrahmāno samāpattito ^a^P1.0360^ea^ vuṭṭhāya brahmagaṇaṃ apassantā ``kuhiṃ gatā''ti āvajjetvā tamatthaṃ ñatvā pacchā āgantvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā cakkavāḷamuddhani ṭhatvā paccekagāthāyo abhāsiṃsu. yathāha --

[02] ``atha kho catunnaṃ suddhāvāsakāyikānaṃ devatānaṃ etadahosi -- `ayaṃ, kho, bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ mahāvane mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi sabbeheva arahantehi. dasahi ca lokadhātūhi devatā yebhuyyena sannipatitā honti bhagavantaṃ dassanāya bhikkhusaṅghañca ^a^M2.0092^ea^. yaṃnūna mayampi yena bhagavā ^a^V2.0084^ea^ tenupasaṅkameyyāma, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato santike paccekaṃ gāthaṃ bhāseyyāmā'''ti (dī0 ni0 2.331; saṃ0 ni0 1.37).
[03] sabbaṃ sagāthāvagge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. evaṃ gantvā ca tattha eko brahmā puratthimacakkavāḷamuddhani okāsaṃ labhitvā tattha ṭhito imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi --
[21] ``mahāsamayo pavanasmiṃ...pe0...
[22] dakkhitāye aparājitasaṅgha''nti.. (dī0 ni0 2.332; saṃ0 ni0 1.37).
[03] imañcassa gāthaṃ bhāsamānassa pacchimacakkavāḷapabbate ṭhito saddaṃ assosi.
[03] dutiyo pacchimacakkavāḷamuddhani okāsaṃ labhitvā tattha ṭhito taṃ gāthaṃ sutvā imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi --
[21] ``tatra bhikkhavo samādahaṃsu...pe0...
[22] indriyāni rakkhanti paṇḍitā''ti.. (dī0 ni0 2.332; saṃ0 ni0 1.37).
[03] tatiyo dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamuddhani okāsaṃ labhitvā tattha ṭhito taṃ gāthaṃ sutvā imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi --
[22] ``chetvā khīlaṃ chetvā palighaṃ...pe0... susunāgā''ti.. (dī0 ni0 2.332; saṃ0 ni0 1.37).
[03] catuttho uttaracakkavāḷamuddhani okāsaṃ labhitvā tattha ṭhito taṃ gāthaṃ sutvā imaṃ gāthamabhāsi --
[21] ``ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse...pe0...
[22] devakāyaṃ paripūressantī''ti.. (dī0 ni0 2.332; saṃ0 ni0 1.37).
[03] tassapi ^a^V2.0085^ea^ taṃ saddaṃ dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamuddhani ṭhito assosi. evaṃ tadā ime cattāro brahmāno parisaṃ thometvā ṭhitā ahesuṃ, mahābrahmāno ekacakkavāḷaṃ chādetvā aṭṭhaṃsu.

[03] atha bhagavā devaparisaṃ oloketvā bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi ^a^P1.0361^ea^ -- ``yepi te, bhikkhave, ahesuṃ atītamaddhānaṃ arahanto sammāsambuddhā, tesampi bhagavantānaṃ etapparamāyeva devatā sannipatitā ahesuṃ. seyyathāpi mayhaṃ ^a^M2.0093^ea^ etarahi, yepi te, bhikkhave, bhavissanti anāgatamaddhānaṃ arahanto sammāsambuddhā, tesampi bhagavantānaṃ etapparamāyeva devatā sannipatitā bhavissanti seyyathāpi mayhaṃ etarahī''ti. tato taṃ devaparisaṃ bhabbābhabbavasena dvidhā vibhaji ``ettakā bhabbā, ettakā abhabbā''ti. tattha ``abhabbaparisā buddhasatepi dhammaṃ desente na bujjhati, bhabbaparisā sakkā bodhetu''nti ñatvā puna bhabbapuggale cariyavasena chadhā vibhaji ``ettakā rāgacaritā, ettakā dosa-moha-vitakka-saddhā-buddhicaritā''ti. evaṃ cariyavasena pariggahetvā ``assā parisāya kīdisā dhammadesanā sappāyā''ti dhammakathaṃ vicinitvā puna taṃ parisaṃ manasākāsi -- ``attajjhāsayena nu kho jāneyya, parajjhāsayena, aṭṭhuppattivasena, pucchāvasenā''ti. tato ``pucchāvasena jāneyyā''ti ñatvā ``pañhaṃ pucchituṃ samattho atthi, natthī''ti puna sakalaparisaṃ āvajjetvā ``natthi kocī''ti ñatvā ``sace ahameva pucchitvā ahameva vissajjeyyaṃ, evamassā parisāya sappāyaṃ na hoti. yaṃnūnāhaṃ nimmitabuddhaṃ māpeyyanti pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya manomayiddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā nimmitabuddhaṃ māpesi. sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī lakkhaṇasampanno pattacīvaradharo ālokitavilokitādisampanno hotū''ti adhiṭṭhānacittena saha pāturahosi. so pācīnalokadhātuto āgantvā bhagavato samasame āsane nisinno evaṃ āgantvā yāni bhagavatā imamhi samāgame cariyavasena cha suttāni (su0 ni0 854 ādayo, 868 ādayo, 884 ādayo, 901 ādayo, 921 ādayo) kathitāni. seyyathidaṃ -- purābhedasuttaṃ kalahavivādasuttaṃ cūḷabyūhaṃ mahābyūhaṃ tuvaṭakaṃ idameva sammāparibbājanīyanti. tesu rāgacaritadevatānaṃ sappāyavasena kathetabbassa imassa suttassa pavattanatthaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanto ^b^``pucchāmi muniṃ pahūtapañña''^eb^nti ^a^P1.0362^ea^ imaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] tattha ^b^pahūtapañña^eb^nti mahāpaññaṃ. ^b^tiṇṇa^eb^nti caturoghatiṇṇaṃ. ^b^pāraṅgata^eb^nti nibbānappattaṃ. ^b^parinibbuta^eb^nti saupādisesanibbānavasena parinibbutaṃ. ^b^ṭhitatta^eb^nti lokadhammehi akampanīyacittaṃ. ^b^nikkhamma gharā panujja kāme^eb^ti vatthukāme panuditvā gharāvāsā nikkhamma. ^b^kathaṃ bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyyā^eb^ti so bhikkhu kathaṃ loke sammā paribbajeyya vihareyya anupalitto lokena hutvā, lokaṃ atikkameyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. sesamettha vuttanayameva.

[03] 363^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0086^ea^ ^a^M2.0094^ea^ bhagavā yasmā āsavakkhayaṃ appatvā loke sammā paribbajanto nāma natthi, tasmā tasmiṃ rāgacaritādivasena pariggahite sabbapuggalasamūhe taṃ taṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ samānadosānaṃ devatāgaṇānaṃ āciṇṇadosappahānatthaṃ ^b^``yassa maṅgalā''^eb^ti ārabhitvā arahattanikūṭeneva khīṇāsavapaṭipadaṃ pakāsento pannarasa gāthāyo abhāsi.

[03] tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva ^b^maṅgalā^eb^ti maṅgalasutte vuttānaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalādīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^samūhatā^eb^ti suṭṭhu ūhatā paññāsatthena samucchinnā. ^b^uppātā^eb^ti ``ukkāpātadisāḍāhādayo evaṃ vipākā hontī''ti evaṃ pavattā uppātābhinivesā. ^b^supinā^eb^ti ``pubbaṇhasamaye supinaṃ disvā idaṃ nāma hoti, majjhanhikādīsu idaṃ, vāmapassena sayatā diṭṭhe idaṃ nāma hoti, dakkhiṇapassādīhi idaṃ, supinante candaṃ disvā idaṃ nāma hoti, sūriyādayo disvā ida''nti evaṃ pavattā supinābhinivesā. ^b^lakkhaṇā^eb^ti daṇḍalakkhaṇavatthalakkhaṇādipāṭhaṃ paṭhitvā ``iminā idaṃ nāma hotī''ti evaṃ pavattā lakkhaṇābhinivesā. te sabbepi brahmajāle vuttanayeneva veditabbā. ^b^so maṅgaladosavippahīno^eb^ti aṭṭhatiṃsa mahāmaṅgalāni ṭhapetvā avasesā maṅgaladosā ^a^P1.0363^ea^ nāma. yassa panete maṅgalādayo samūhatā, so maṅgaladosavippahīno hoti. atha vā maṅgalānañca uppātādidosānañca pahīnattā maṅgaladosavippahīno hoti, na maṅgalādīhi suddhiṃ pacceti ariyamaggassa adhigatattā. tasmā ^b^sammā so loke paribbajeyya,^eb^ so khīṇāsavo sammā loke paribbajeyya anupalitto lokenāti.

[03] 364^b^.^eb^ dutiyagāthāya ^b^rāgaṃ vinayetha mānusesu, dibbesu kāmesu cāpi bhikkhū^eb^ti mānusesu ca dibbesu ca kāmaguṇesu anāgāmimaggena anuppattidhammataṃ nento rāgaṃ vinayetha. ^b^atikkamma bhavaṃ samecca dhamma^eb^nti evaṃ rāgaṃ vinetvā tato paraṃ arahattamaggena sabbappakārato pariññābhisamayādayo sādhento catusaccabhedampi samecca dhammaṃ imāya paṭipadāya tividhampi atikkamma bhavaṃ. ^b^sammā so^eb^ti sopi bhikkhu sammā loke paribbajeyya.

[03] 365^b^.^eb^ tatiyagāthāya ^b^``anurodhavirodhavippahīno''^eb^ti sabbavatthūsu pahīnarāgadoso. sesaṃ vuttanayameva sabbagāthāsu ca ``sopi bhikkhu sammā ^a^M2.0095^ea^ loke paribbajeyyā''ti yojetabbaṃ. ito parañhi yojanampi avatvā avuttanayameva vaṇṇayissāma.

[03] 366^b^.^eb^ catutthagāthāya sattasaṅkhāravasena duvidhaṃ ^b^piyañca appiyañca^eb^ veditabbaṃ, tattha chandarāgapaṭighappahānena ^b^hitvā. anupādāyā^eb^ti catūhi upādānehi kañci dhammaṃ aggahetvā. ^b^anissito^eb^ ^a^V2.0087^ea^ ^b^kuhiñcī^eb^ti aṭṭhasatabhedena taṇhānissayena dvāsaṭṭhibhedena diṭṭhinissayena ca kuhiñci rūpādidhamme bhave vā anissito. ^b^saṃyojaniyehi vippamutto^eb^ti sabbepi tebhūmakadhammā dasavidhasaṃyojanassa visayattā saṃyojaniyā, tehi sabbappakārato maggabhāvanāya pariññātattā ca vippamuttoti attho. paṭhamapādena cettha rāgadosappahānaṃ vuttaṃ, dutiyena upādānanissayābhāvo, tatiyena sesākusalehi akusalavatthūhi ca vippamokkho. paṭhamena vā rāgadosappahānaṃ, dutiyena tadupāyo, tatiyena tesaṃ pahīnattā saṃyojaniyehi vippamokkhoti veditabbo.

[03] 367^b^.^eb^ pañcamagāthāya ^b^upadhīsū^eb^ti khandhupadhīsu. ^b^ādāna^eb^nti ādātabbaṭṭhena ^a^P1.0364^ea^ teyeva vuccanti. ^b^anaññaneyyo^eb^ti aniccādīnaṃ sudiṭṭhattā ``idaṃ seyyo''ti kenaci anetabbo. sesaṃ uttānapadatthameva. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ādānesu catutthamaggena sabbaso chandarāgaṃ vinetvā so vinītachandarāgo, tesu upadhīsu na sārameti, sabbe upadhī asārakatteneva passati. tato tesu duvidhenapi nissayena anissito aññena vā kenaci ``idaṃ seyyo''ti anetabbo khīṇāsavo bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyya.

[03] 368^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhagāthāya ^b^aviruddho^eb^ti etesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ duccaritānaṃ pahīnattā sucaritehi saddhiṃ aviruddho. ^b^viditvā dhamma^eb^nti maggena catusaccadhammaṃ ñatvā. ^b^nibbānapadābhipatthayāno^eb^ti anupādisesaṃ khandhaparinibbānapadaṃ patthayamāno. sesaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 369^b^.^eb^ sattamagāthāya ^b^akkuṭṭho^eb^ti dasahi akkosavatthūhi abhisatto. ^b^na sandhiyethā^eb^ti na upanayhetha na kuppeyya. ^b^laddhā parabhojanaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0096^ea^ ^b^na majje^eb^ti parehi dinnaṃ saddhādeyyaṃ labhitvā ``ahaṃ ñāto yasassī lābhī''ti na majjeyya. sesaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 370^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamagāthāya ^b^lobha^eb^nti visamalobhaṃ. ^b^bhava^eb^nti kāmabhavādibhavaṃ. evaṃ dvīhi padehi bhavabhogataṇhā vuttā. purimena vā sabbāpi taṇhā, pacchimena kammabhavo. ^b^virato chedanabandhanā cā^eb^ti evametesaṃ kammakilesānaṃ pahīnattā parasattachedanabandhanā ca viratoti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] 371^b^.^eb^ navamagāthāya ^b^sāruppaṃ attano viditvā^eb^ti attano bhikkhubhāvassa patirūpaṃ anesanādiṃ pahāya sammāesanādiājīvasuddhiṃ aññañca sammāpaṭipattiṃ tattha patiṭṭhahanena viditvā. na hi ñātamatteneva kiñci hoti. ^b^yathātathiya^eb^nti yathātathaṃ yathābhūtaṃ. ^b^dhamma^eb^nti khandhāyatanādibhedaṃ ^a^P1.0365^ea^ yathābhūtañāṇena, catusaccadhammaṃ vā maggena viditvā. sesaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 372^b^.^eb^ dasamagāthāya ^a^V2.0088^ea^ ^b^so nirāso anāsisāno^eb^ti yassa ariyamaggena vināsitattā anusayā ca na santi, akusalamūlā ca samūhatā, so nirāso nittaṇho hoti. tato āsāya abhāvena kañci rūpādidhammaṃ nāsīsati. tenāha ``nirāso anāsisāno''ti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] 373^b^.^eb^ ekādasamagāthāya ^b^āsavakhīṇo^eb^ti khīṇacaturāsavo. ^b^pahīnamāno^eb^ti pahīnanavavidhamāno. ^b^rāgapatha^eb^nti rāgavisayabhūtaṃ tebhūmakadhammajātaṃ. ^b^upātivatto^eb^ti pariññāpahānehi atikkanto. ^b^danto^eb^ti sabbadvāravisevanaṃ hitvā ariyena damathena dantabhūmiṃ patto. ^b^parinibbuto^eb^ti kilesaggivūpasamena sītibhūto. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] 374^b^.^eb^ dvādasamagāthāya ^b^saddho^eb^ti buddhādiguṇesu parappaccayavirahitattā sabbākārasampannena aveccappasādena samannāgato, na parassa saddhāya paṭipattiyaṃ gamanabhāvena. yathāha -- ``na khvāhaṃ ettha bhante bhagavato saddhāya ^a^M2.0097^ea^ gacchāmī''ti (a0 ni0 5.34). ^b^sutavā^eb^ti vositasutakiccattā paramatthikasutasamannāgato. ^b^niyāmadassī^eb^ti saṃsārakantāramūḷhe loke amatapuragāmino sammattaniyāmabhūtassa maggassa dassāvī, diṭṭhamaggoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^vaggagatesu na vaggasārī^eb^ti vaggagatā nāma dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatikā aññamaññaṃ paṭilomattā, evaṃ vaggāhi diṭṭhīhi gatesu sattesu na vaggasārī -- ``idaṃ ucchijjissati, idaṃ tatheva bhavissatī''ti evaṃ diṭṭhivasena agamanato. ^b^paṭigha^eb^nti paṭighātakaṃ, cittavighātakanti vuttaṃ hoti. dosavisesanamevetaṃ. ^b^vineyyā^eb^ti vinetvā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] 375^b^.^eb^ terasamagāthāya ^b^saṃsuddhajino^eb^ti saṃsuddhena arahattamaggena vijitakileso. ^b^vivaṭṭacchado^eb^ti vivaṭarāgadosamohachadano. ^b^dhammesu vasī^eb^ti catusaccadhammesu ^a^P1.0366^ea^ vasippatto. na hissa sakkā te dhammā yathā ñātā kenaci aññathā kātuṃ, tena khīṇāsavo ``dhammesu vasī''ti vuccati. ^b^pāragū^eb^ti pāraṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, taṃ gato, saupādisesavasena adhigatoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^anejo^eb^ti apagatataṇhācalano. ^b^saṅkhāranirodhañāṇakusalo^eb^ti saṅkhāranirodho vuccati nibbānaṃ, tamhi ñāṇaṃ ariyamaggapaññā, tattha kusalo, catukkhattuṃ bhāvitattā chekoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 376^b^.^eb^ cuddasamagāthāya ^b^atītesū^eb^ti pavattiṃ patvā atikkantesu pañcakkhandhesu. ^b^anāgatesū^eb^ti pavattiṃ appattesu pañcakkhandhesu eva. ^b^kappātīto^eb^ti ``ahaṃ mama''nti kappanaṃ sabbampi vā taṇhādiṭṭhikappaṃ atīto. ^b^aticca suddhipañño^eb^ti atīva suddhipañño, atikkamitvā ^a^V2.0089^ea^ vā suddhipañño. kiṃ atikkamitvā? addhattayaṃ. arahā hi yvāyaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārasaṅkhāto atīto addhā, jātijarāmaraṇasaṅkhāto anāgato addhā, viññāṇādibhavapariyanto paccuppanno ca addhā, taṃ sabbampi atikkamma kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā paramasuddhippattapañño hutvā ṭhito. tena vuccati ``aticca suddhipañño''ti. ^b^sabbāyatanehī^eb^ti dvādasahāyatanehi. arahā hi evaṃ kappātīto. kappātītattā aticca suddhipaññattā ca āyatiṃ na kiñci āyatanaṃ upeti. tenāha -- ``sabbāyatanehi vippamutto''ti.

[03] 377^b^.^eb^ pannarasamagāthāya ^a^M2.0098^ea^ ^b^aññāya pada^eb^nti ye te ``saccānaṃ caturo padā''ti vuttā, tesu ekekapadaṃ pubbabhāgasaccavavatthāpanapaññāya ñatvā. ^b^samecca dhamma^eb^nti tato paraṃ catūhi ariyamaggehi catusaccadhammaṃ samecca. ^b^vivaṭaṃ disvāna pahānamāsavāna^eb^nti atha paccavekkhaṇañāṇena āsavakkhayasaññitaṃ nibbānaṃ vivaṭaṃ pākaṭamanāvaṭaṃ disvā. ^b^sabbupadhīnaṃ parikkhayā^eb^ti sabbesaṃ khandhakāmaguṇakilesābhisaṅkhārabhedānaṃ upadhīnaṃ parikkhīṇattā katthaci asajjamāno bhikkhu ^b^sammā so loke paribbajeyya^eb^ vihareyya, anallīyanto lokaṃ gaccheyyāti desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.

[03] 378^b^.^eb^ tato ^a^P1.0367^ea^ so nimmito dhammadesanaṃ thomento ^b^``addhā hi bhagavā''^eb^ti imaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^yo so evaṃ vihārī^eb^ti yo so maṅgalādīni samūhanitvā sabbamaṅgaladosappahānavihārī, yopi so dibbamānusakesu kāmesu rāgaṃ vineyya bhavātikkamma dhammābhisamayavihārīti evaṃ tāya tāya gāthāya niddiṭṭhabhikkhuṃ dassento āha. sesaṃ uttānameva. ayaṃ pana yojanā -- addhā hi bhagavā tatheva etaṃ yaṃ tvaṃ ``yassa maṅgalā samūhatā''tiādīni vatvā tassā tassā gāthāya pariyosāne ``sammā so loke paribbajeyyā''ti avaca. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? yo so evaṃvihārī bhikkhu, so uttamena damathena danto, sabbāni ca dasapi saṃyojanāni caturo ca yoge vītivatto hoti. tasmā sammā so loke paribbajeyya, natthi me ettha vicikicchāti iti desanāthomanagāthampi vatvā arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. suttapariyosāne koṭisatasahassadevatānaṃ aggaphalappatti ahosi, sotāpattisakadāgāmianāgāmiphalappattā pana gaṇanato asaṅkhyeyyāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya sammāparibbājanīyasuttavaṇṇanā
[03] niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0090^ea^ ^a^M2.0099^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti dhammikasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? tiṭṭhamāne kira bhagavati lokanāthe dhammiko nāma upāsako ahosi nāmena ca paṭipattiyā ca. so kira saraṇasampanno sīlasampanno bahussuto piṭakattayadharo anāgāmī abhiññālābhī ākāsacārī ahosi. tassa parivārā pañcasatā upāsakā, tepi tādisā eva ahesuṃ. tassekadivasaṃ uposathikassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa majjhimayāmāvasānasamaye evaṃ parivitakko udapādi -- ``yaṃnūnāhaṃ agāriyānagāriyānaṃ paṭipadaṃ puccheyya''nti. so pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ pucchi, bhagavā cassa byākāsi. tattha ^a^P1.0368^ea^ pubbe vaṇṇitasadisaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, apubbaṃ vaṇṇayissāma.

[03] 379^b^.^eb^ tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva ^b^kathaṃkaro^eb^ti kathaṃ karonto kathaṃ paṭipajjanto. ^b^sādhu hotī^eb^ti sundaro anavajjo atthasādhano hoti. ^b^upāsakāse^eb^ti upāsakāicceva vuttaṃ hoti. sesamatthato pākaṭameva. ayaṃ pana yojanā -- yo vā agārā anagārameti pabbajati, ye vā agārino upāsakā, etesu duvidhesu sāvakesu kathaṃkaro sāvako sādhu hotīti.

[03] 380-1^b^.^eb^ idāni evaṃ puṭṭhassa bhagavato byākaraṇasamatthataṃ dīpento ^b^``tuvañhī''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^gati^eb^nti ajjhāsayagatiṃ. ^b^parāyaṇa^eb^nti nipphattiṃ. atha vā ^b^gati^eb^nti nirayādipañcappabhedaṃ. ^b^parāyaṇa^eb^nti gatito paraṃ ayanaṃ gativippamokkhaṃ parinibbānaṃ, ^b^na catthi tulyo^eb^ti tayā sadiso natthi. ^b^sabbaṃ tuvaṃ ñāṇamavecca dhammaṃ, pakāsesi satte anukampamāno^eb^ti tvaṃ bhagavā yadatthi ñeyyaṃ nāma, taṃ anavasesaṃ avecca paṭivijjhitvā satte anukampamāno sabbaṃ ñāṇañca dhammañca pakāsesi. yaṃ yaṃ yassa hitaṃ hoti, taṃ taṃ tassa āvikāsiyeva desesiyeva, na te atthi ācariyamuṭṭhīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^virocasi vimalo^eb^ti dhūmarajādivirahito viya cando, rāgādimalābhāvena vimalo virocasi. sesamettha uttānatthameva.

[03] 382^b^.^eb^ idāni yesaṃ tadā bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi, te devaputte kittetvā bhagavantaṃ pasaṃsanto ^b^``āgañchī te santike''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^a^M2.0100^ea^ ^b^nāgarājā erāvaṇo nāmā^eb^ti ayaṃ kira ^a^V2.0091^ea^ erāvaṇo nāma devaputto kāmarūpī dibbe vimāne vasati. so yadā sakko uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchati, tadā diyaḍḍhasatayojanaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimminitvā tettiṃsa kumbhe māpetvā erāvaṇo nāma hatthī hoti. tassa ekekasmiṃ kumbhe dve dve dantā honti, ekekasmiṃ dante satta satta ^a^P1.0369^ea^ pokkharaṇiyo, ekekissā pokkharaṇiyā satta satta paduminiyo, ekekissā paduminiyā satta satta pupphāni, ekekasmiṃ pupphe satta satta pattāni, ekekasmiṃ patte satta satta accharāyo naccanti padumaccharāyotveva vissutā sakkassa nāṭakitthiyo, yā ca vimānavatthusmimpi ``bhamanti kaññā padumesu sikkhitā''ti (vi0 va0 1034) āgatā. tesaṃ pana tettisaṃkumbhānaṃ majjhe sudassanakumbho nāma tiṃsayojanamatto hoti, tattha yojanappamāṇo maṇipallaṅko tiyojanubbedhe pupphamaṇḍape attharīyati. tattha sakko devānamindo accharāsaṅghaparivuto dibbasampattiṃ paccanubhoti. sakke pana devānaminde uyyānakīḷāto paṭinivatte puna taṃ rūpaṃ saṃharitvāna devaputtova hoti. taṃ sandhāyāha -- ``āgañchi te santike nāgarājā erāvaṇo nāmā''ti. ^b^jinoti sutvā^eb^ti ``vijitapāpadhammo esa bhagavā''ti evaṃ sutvā. ^b^sopi tayā mantayitvā^eb^ti tayā saddhiṃ mantayitvā, pañhaṃ pucchitvāti adhippāyo. ^b^ajjhagamā^eb^ti adhiagamā, gatoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^sādhūti sutvāna patītarūpo^eb^ti taṃ pañhaṃ sutvā ``sādhu bhante''ti abhinanditvā tuṭṭharūpo gatoti attho.

[03] 383^b^.^eb^ ^b^rājāpi taṃ vessavaṇo kuvero^eb^ti ettha so yakkho rañjanaṭṭhena ^b^rājā,^eb^ visāṇāya rājadhāniyā rajjaṃ kāretīti ^b^vessavaṇo,^eb^ purimanāmena ^b^kuvero^eb^ti veditabbo. so kira kuvero nāma brāhmaṇamahāsālo hutvā dānādīni puññāni katvā visāṇāya rājadhāniyā adhipati hutvā nibbatto. tasmā ``kuvero vessavaṇo''ti vuccati. vuttañcetaṃ āṭānāṭiyasutte --
[02] ``kuverassa kho pana, mārisa, mahārājassa visāṇā nāma rājadhānī, tasmā kuvero mahārājā `vessavaṇo'ti pavuccatī''ti (dī0 ni0 3.291) --
[25] sesamettha pākaṭameva.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0101^ea^ siyā -- kasmā pana dūratare tāvatiṃsabhavane vasanto erāvaṇo paṭhamaṃ āgato, vessavaṇo pacchā, ekanagareva ^a^P1.0370^ea^ vasanto ayaṃ upāsako sabbapacchā, kathañca so tesaṃ āgamanaṃ aññāsi, yena evamāhāti? vuccate -- vessavaṇo kira tadā anekasahassapavāḷapallaṅkaṃ dvādasayojanaṃ nārivāhanaṃ abhiruyha pavāḷakuntaṃ uccāretvā dasasahassakoṭiyakkhehi ^a^V2.0092^ea^ parivuto ``bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmī''ti ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni pariharitvā maggena maggaṃ āgacchanto veḷukaṇḍakanagare nandamātāya upāsikāya nivesanassa uparibhāgaṃ sampatto. upāsikāya ayamānubhāvo -- parisuddhasīlā hoti, niccaṃ vikālabhojanā paṭiviratā, piṭakattayadhārinī, anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhitā. sā tamhi samaye sīhapañjaraṃ ugghāṭetvā utuggahaṇatthāya māluteritokāse ṭhatvā aṭṭhakapārāyanavagge parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi madhurena sarena bhāsati. vessavaṇo tattheva yānāni ṭhapetvā yāva upāsikā ``idamavoca bhagavā magadhesu viharanto pāsāṇake cetiye paricārakasoḷasannaṃ brāhmaṇāna''nti nigamanaṃ abhāsi, tāva sabbaṃ sutvā vaggapariyosāne suvaṇṇamurajasadisaṃ mahantaṃ gīvaṃ paggahetvā ``sādhu sādhu bhaginī''ti sādhukāramadāsi. sā ``ko etthā''ti āha. ``ahaṃ bhagini vessavaṇo''ti. upāsikā kira paṭhamaṃ sotāpannā ahosi, pacchā vessavaṇo. taṃ so dhammato sahodarabhāvaṃ sandhāya upāsikaṃ bhaginivādena samudācarati. upāsikāya ca ``vikālo, bhātika bhadramukha, yassa dāni kālaṃ maññasī''ti vutto ``ahaṃ bhagini tayi pasanno pasannākāraṃ karomī''ti āha. tena hi bhadramukha, mama khette nipphannaṃ sāliṃ kammakarā āharituṃ na sakkonti, taṃ tava parisāya āṇāpehīti. so ``sādhu bhaginī''ti yakkhe āṇāpesi. te aḍḍhaterasa koṭṭhāgārasatāni pūresuṃ. tato pabhuti koṭṭhāgāraṃ ^a^P1.0371^ea^ ūnaṃ nāma nāhosi, ``nandamātu koṭṭhāgāraṃ viyā''ti loke nidassanaṃ ahosi. vessavaṇo koṭṭhāgārāni pūretvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami. bhagavā ``vikāle āgatosī''ti āha. atha bhagavato sabbaṃ ārocesi. iminā kāraṇena āsannatarepi cātumahārājikabhavane vasanto vessavaṇo pacchā āgato. erāvaṇassa pana na kiñci antarā karaṇīyaṃ ahosi, tena so paṭhamataraṃ āgato.

[03] ayaṃ ^a^M2.0102^ea^ pana upāsako kiñcāpi anāgāmī pakatiyāva ekabhattiko, tathāpi tadā uposathadivasoti katvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya sāyanhasamayaṃ sunivattho supāruto pañcasataupāsakaparivuto jetavanaṃ gantvā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā attano gharaṃ āgamma tesaṃ upāsakānaṃ saraṇasīlauposathānisaṃsādibhedaṃ upāsakadhammaṃ kathetvā te upāsake uyyojesi. tesañca tasseva ghare muṭṭhihatthappamāṇapādakāni pañca kappiyamañcasatāni pāṭekkovarakesu paññattāni honti. te attano attano ovarakaṃ pavisitvā samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdiṃsu, upāsakopi tathevākāsi. tena ca samayena sāvatthinagare sattapaññāsa kulasatasahassāni vasanti, manussagaṇanāya aṭṭhārasakoṭimanussā. tena paṭhamayāme hatthiassamanussabherisaddādīhi sāvatthinagaraṃ mahāsamuddo viya ekasaddaṃ hoti. majjhimayāmasamanantare so saddo paṭippassambhati ^a^V2.0093^ea^. tamhi kāle upāsako samāpattito vuṭṭhāya attano guṇe āvajjetvā ``yenāhaṃ maggasukhena phalasukhena sukhito viharāmi, idaṃ sukhaṃ kaṃ nissāya laddha''nti cintetvā ``bhagavantaṃ nissāyā''ti bhagavati cittaṃ pasādetvā ``bhagavā etarahi katamena vihārena viharatī''ti āvajjento dibbena cakkhunā erāvaṇavessavaṇe disvā dibbāya sotadhātuyā dhammadesanaṃ sutvā cetopariyañāṇena tesaṃ pasannacittataṃ ^a^P1.0372^ea^ ñatvā ``yaṃnūnāhampi bhagavantaṃ ubhayahitaṃ paṭipadaṃ puccheyya''nti cintesi. tasmā so ekanagare vasantopi sabbapacchā āgato, evañca nesaṃ āgamanaṃ aññāsi. tenāha -- ``āgañchi te santike nāgarājā...pe0... so cāpi sutvāna patītarūpo''ti.

[03] 384^b^.^eb^ idāni ito bahiddhā lokasammatehi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi ukkaṭṭhabhāvena bhagavantaṃ pasaṃsanto ^b^``ye kecime''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^titthiyā^eb^ti nandavacchasaṃkiccehi ādipuggalehi tīhi titthakarehi kate diṭṭhititthe jātā, tesaṃ sāsane pabbajitā pūraṇādayo cha satthāro. tattha nāṭaputto nigaṇṭho, avasesā ājīvakāti te sabbe dassento āha ^b^``ye kecime titthiyā vādasīlā''^eb^ti, ``mayaṃ sammā paṭipannā, aññe micchā paṭipannā''ti evaṃ vādakaraṇasīlā lokaṃ mukhasattīhi vitudantā vicaranti. ^b^ājīvakā vā^eb^ti te ekajjhamuddiṭṭhe bhinditvā dasseti. ^b^nātitarantī^eb^ti nātikkamanti. ^b^sabbe^eb^ti aññepi ye ^a^M2.0103^ea^ keci titthiyasāvakādayo, tepi pariggaṇhanto āha. ^b^``ṭhito vajantaṃ viyā''^eb^ti yathā koci ṭhito gativikalo sīghagāminaṃ purisaṃ gacchantaṃ nātitareyya, evaṃ te paññāgatiyā abhāvena te te atthappabhede bujjhituṃ asakkontā ṭhitā, atijavanapaññaṃ bhagavantaṃ nātitarantīti attho.

[03] 385^b^.^eb^ ^b^brāhmaṇā vādasīlā vuddhā cā^eb^ti ettāvatā caṅkītārukkhapokkharasātijāṇussoṇiādayo dasseti, ^b^api brāhmaṇā santi kecī^eb^ti iminā majjhimāpi daharāpi kevalaṃ brāhmaṇā santi atthi upalabbhanti kecīti evaṃ assalāyanavāseṭṭhāmbaṭṭhauttaramāṇavakādayo dasseti. ^b^atthabaddhā^eb^ti ``api nu kho imaṃ pañhaṃ byākareyya, imaṃ kaṅkhaṃ chindeyyā''ti evaṃ atthabaddhā bhavanti. ^b^ye cāpi^eb^ aññeti aññepi ye ``mayaṃ vādino''ti evaṃ maññamānā ^a^P1.0373^ea^ vicaranti khattiyapaṇḍitabrāhmaṇabrahmadevayakkhādayo aparimāṇā. tepi sabbe tayi atthabaddhā bhavantīti dasseti.

[03] 386-7^b^.^eb^ evaṃ nānappakārehi bhagavantaṃ pasaṃsitvā idāni dhammeneva taṃ pasaṃsitvā dhammakathaṃ yācanto ^b^``ayañhi dhammo''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^ayañhi dhammo^eb^ti sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme ^a^V2.0094^ea^ sandhāyāha. ^b^nipuṇo^eb^ti saṇho duppaṭivijjho. ^b^sukho^eb^ti paṭividdho samāno lokuttarasukhamāvahati, tasmā sukhāvahattā ``sukho''ti vuccati. ^b^suppavutto^eb^ti sudesito. ^b^sussūsamānā^eb^ti sotukāmamhāti attho. ^b^taṃ no vadā^eb^ti taṃ dhammaṃ amhākaṃ vada. ``tvaṃ no''tipi pāṭho, tvaṃ amhākaṃ vadāti attho. ^b^sabbepime bhikkhavo^eb^ti taṅkhaṇaṃ nisinnāni kira pañca bhikkhusatāni honti, tāni dassento yācati. ^b^upāsakā cāpī^eb^ti attano parivāre aññe ca dasseti. sesamettha pākaṭameva.

[03] 388^b^.^eb^ atha bhagavā anagāriyapaṭipadaṃ tāva dassetuṃ bhikkhū āmantetvā ^b^``suṇātha me bhikkhavo''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^dhammaṃ dhutaṃ tañca carātha sabbe^eb^ti kilese dhunātīti dhuto, evarūpaṃ kilesadhunanakaṃ paṭipadādhammaṃ sāvayāmi vo, tañca mayā sāvitaṃ sabbe caratha paṭipajjatha, mā pamāditthāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^iriyāpatha^eb^nti gamanādicatubbidhaṃ. ^b^pabbajitānulomika^eb^nti samaṇasāruppaṃ satisampajaññayuttaṃ. araññe kammaṭṭhānānuyogavasena pavattamevāti apare. ^b^sevetha na^eb^nti taṃ iriyāpathaṃ bhajeyya ^a^M2.0104^ea^. ^b^atthadaso^eb^ti hitānupassī. ^b^mutīmā^eb^ti buddhimā. sesamettha gāthāya pākaṭameva.
