[03] 389^b^.^eb^ ^b^no ve vikāle^eb^ti evaṃ pabbajitānulomikaṃ iriyāpathaṃ sevamāno ca divāmajjhanhikavītikkamaṃ upādāya vikāle na careyya bhikkhu, yuttakāle eva pana gāmaṃ piṇḍāya careyya. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^akālacāriñhi sajanti saṅgā,^eb^ akālacāriṃ puggalaṃ rāgasaṅgādayo aneke saṅgā sajanti parissajanti upaguhanti allīyanti. ^b^tasmā vikāle na^eb^ ^a^P1.0374^ea^ ^b^caranti buddhā,^eb^ tasmā ye catusaccabuddhā ariyapuggalā, na te vikāle piṇḍāya carantīti. tena kira samayena vikālabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ appaññattaṃ hoti, tasmā dhammadesanāvasenevettha puthujjanānaṃ ādīnavaṃ dassento imaṃ gāthamāha. ariyā pana saha maggapaṭilābhā eva tato paṭiviratā honti, esā dhammatā.

[03] 390^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vikālacariyaṃ paṭisedhetvā ``kāle carantenapi evaṃ caritabba''nti dassento āha ^b^``rūpā ca saddā cā''^eb^ti. tassattho -- ye te rūpādayo nānappakārakaṃ madaṃ janentā satte sammadayanti, tesu piṇḍapātapārisuddhisuttādīsu (ma0 ni0 3.438 ādayo) vuttanayena chandaṃ vinodetvā yuttakāleneva pātarāsaṃ paviseyyāti. ettha ca pāto asitabboti ^b^pātarāso,^eb^ piṇḍapātassetaṃ nāmaṃ. yo yattha labbhati, so padesopi taṃ yogena ``pātarāso''ti idha vutto. yato piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, taṃ okāsaṃ gaccheyyāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
[03] 391^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^V2.0095^ea^ paviṭṭho --
[21] ``piṇḍañca bhikkhu samayena laddhā,
[27] eko paṭikkamma raho nisīde.
[26] ajjhattacintī na mano bahiddhā,
[22] nicchāraye saṅgahitattabhāvo''..

[03] tattha ^b^piṇḍa^eb^nti missakabhikkhaṃ, sā hi tato tato samodhānetvā sampiṇḍitaṭṭhena ``piṇḍo''ti vuccati. ^b^samayenā^eb^ti antomajjhanhikakāle. ^b^eko paṭikkammā^eb^ti kāyavivekaṃ sampādento adutiyo nivattitvā. ^b^ajjhattacintī^eb^ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā khandhasantānaṃ cintento. ^b^na mano bahiddhā^eb^ ^a^M2.0105^ea^ ^b^nicchāraye^eb^ti bahiddhā rūpādīsu rāgavasena cittaṃ na nīhare. ^b^saṅgahitattabhāvo^eb^ti suṭṭhu gahitacitto.
[03] 392^b^.^eb^ evaṃ viharanto ca --
[21] ``sacepi so sallape sāvakena,
[27] aññena vā kenaci bhikkhunā vā.
[26] dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ tamudāhareyya,
[22] na pesuṇaṃ nopi parūpavādaṃ''..

[03] kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? so yogāvacaro kiñcideva sotukāmatāya upagatena sāvakena vā kenaci aññatitthiyagahaṭṭhādinā vā idheva pabbajitena bhikkhunā vā saddhiṃ sacepi sallape, atha yvāyaṃ maggaphalādipaṭisaṃyutto ^a^P1.0375^ea^ dasakathāvatthubhedo vā atappakaṭṭhena paṇīto dhammo. taṃ dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ udāhareyya, aññaṃ pana pisuṇavacanaṃ vā parūpavādaṃ vā appamattakampi na udāhareyyāti.

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ idāni tasmiṃ parūpavāde dosaṃ dassento āha ^b^``vādañhi eke''^eb^ti. tassattho -- idhekacce moghapurisā parūpavādasañhitaṃ nānappakāraṃ viggāhikakathābhedaṃ ^b^vādaṃ paṭiseniya^eb^nti virujjhanti, yujjhitukāmā hutvā senāya paṭimukhaṃ gacchantā viya honti, ^b^te^eb^ mayaṃ lāmakapaññe na ^b^pasaṃsāma^eb^. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^tato tato ne pasajanti saṅgā,^eb^ yasmā te tādisake puggale ^a^V2.0096^ea^ tato tato vacanapathato samuṭṭhāya vivādasaṅgā sajanti allīyanti. kiṃ kāraṇā sajantīti? ^b^cittañhi te tattha gamenti dūre,^eb^ yasmā te paṭiseniyantā cittaṃ tattha gamenti, yattha gataṃ samathavipassanānaṃ dūre hotīti.

[03] 394-5^b^.^eb^ evaṃ parittapaññānaṃ pavattiṃ dassetvā idāni mahāpaññānaṃ pavattiṃ dassento āha ^b^``piṇḍaṃ vihāraṃ...pe0... sāvako''^eb^ti. tattha vihārena patissayo, sayanāsanena mañcapīṭhanti tīhipi padehi senāsanameva vuttaṃ. ^b^āpa^eb^nti udakaṃ. ^b^saṅghāṭirajūpavāhana^eb^nti paṃsumalādino saṅghāṭirajassa dhovanaṃ. ^b^sutvāna dhammaṃ sugatena desita^eb^nti sabbāsavasaṃvarādīsu ``paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevati sītassa paṭighātāyā''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.23; a0 ni0 6.58) nayena bhagavatā desitaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā. ^b^saṅkhāya seve^eb^ ^a^M2.0106^ea^ ^b^varapaññasāvako^eb^ti etaṃ idha piṇḍanti vuttaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ, vihārādīhi vuttaṃ senāsanaṃ, āpamukhena dassitaṃ gilānapaccayaṃ, saṅghāṭiyā cīvaranti catubbidhampi paccayaṃ saṅkhāya ``yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.23; a0 ni0 6.58) nayena paccavekkhitvā seve varapaññasāvako, sevituṃ sakkuṇeyya varapaññassa tathāgatassa sāvako sekkho vā puthujjano vā, nippariyāyena ca arahā. so hi caturāpasseno ``saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati, saṅkhāyekaṃ ^a^P1.0376^ea^ adhivāseti, saṅkhāyekaṃ parivajjeti, saṅkhāyekaṃ vinodetī''ti (dī0 ni0 3.308; ma0 ni0 2.168; a0 ni0 10.20) vutto. yassā ca saṅkhāya seve varapaññasāvako, ^b^tasmā hi piṇḍe...pe0... yathā pokkhare vāribindu,^eb^ tathā hotīti veditabbo.

[03] 396^b^.^eb^ evaṃ khīṇāsavapaṭipattiṃ dassento arahattanikūṭena anagāriyapaṭipadaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā idāni agāriyapaṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``gahaṭṭhavattaṃ pana vo''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva ^b^sāvako^eb^ti agāriyasāvako. sesaṃ uttānatthameva. ayaṃ pana yojanā -- yo mayā ito pubbe kevalo abyāmisso sakalo paripuṇṇo bhikkhudhammo kathito. esa khettavatthuādipariggahehi sapariggahena na labbhā phassetuṃ na sakkā adhigantunti.

[03] 397^b^.^eb^ evaṃ tassa bhikkhudhammaṃ paṭisedhetvā gahaṭṭhadhammameva dassento āha ^b^``pāṇaṃ na hane''^eb^ti. tattha purimaḍḍhena tikoṭiparisuddhā pāṇātipātāveramaṇi vuttā, pacchimaḍḍhena sattesu hitapaṭipatti. tatiyapādo cettha khaggavisāṇasutte (su0 ni0 35 ādayo) catutthapāde thāvaratasabhedo mettasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ (su0 ni0 143 ādayo) sabbappakārato vaṇṇito. sesaṃ uttānatthameva. uppaṭipāṭiyā pana yojanā kātabbā -- tasathāvaresu sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ ^a^V2.0097^ea^ na hane na ghātayeyya nānujaññāti. ``nidhāya daṇḍa''nti ito vā paraṃ ``vatteyyā''ti pāṭhaseso āharitabbo. itarathā hi na pubbenāparaṃ sandhiyati.

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ evaṃ paṭhamasikkhāpadaṃ dassetvā idāni dutiyasikkhāpadaṃ dassento āha ^b^``tato adinna''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^kiñcī^eb^ti appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā. ^b^kvacī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0107^ea^ gāme vā araññe vā. ^b^sāvako^eb^ti agāriyasāvako. ^b^bujjhamāno^eb^ti ``parasantakamida''nti jānamāno. ^b^sabbaṃ adinnaṃ parivajjayeyyā^eb^ti evañhi paṭipajjamāno sabbaṃ adinnaṃ parivajjeyya, no aññathāti dīpeti. sesamettha vuttanayañca pākaṭañcāti.
[03] 399^b^.^eb^ evaṃ dutiyasikkhāpadampi tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ dassetvā ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato pabhuti tatiyaṃ dassento āha ^b^``abrahmacariya''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^asambhuṇanto^eb^ti asakkonto.

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ idāni catutthasikkhāpadaṃ dassento ^a^P1.0377^ea^ āha ^b^``sabhaggato vā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^sabhaggato^eb^ti santhāgārādigato. ^b^parisaggato^eb^ti pūgamajjagato. sesamettha vuttanayañca pākaṭañcāti.

[03] 401^b^.^eb^ evaṃ catutthasikkhāpadampi tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ dassetvā pañcamaṃ dassento āha ^b^``majjañca pāna''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^majjañca pāna^eb^nti gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ. ayaṃ panattho ``majjapānañca na samācareyyā''ti. ^b^dhammaṃ ima^eb^nti imaṃ majjapānaveramaṇīdhammaṃ. ^b^ummādananta^eb^nti ummādanapariyosānaṃ. yo hi sabbalahuko majjapānassa vipāko, so manussabhūtassa ummattakasaṃvattaniko hoti. ^b^iti naṃ viditvā^eb^ti iti naṃ majjapānaṃ ñatvā. sesamettha vuttanayañca pākaṭañcāti.

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ evaṃ pañcamasikkhāpadampi tikoṭiparisuddhaṃ dassetvā idāni purimasikkhāpadānampi majjapānameva saṃkilesakarañca bhedakarañca dassetvā daḷhataraṃ tato veramaṇiyaṃ niyojento āha ^b^``madā hi pāpāni karontī''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^madā^eb^ti madahetu. ^b^hi^eb^kāro padapūraṇamatte nipāto. ^b^pāpāni karontī^eb^ti pāṇātipātādīni sabbākusalāni karonti. ^b^ummādanaṃ mohana^eb^nti paraloke ummādanaṃ ihaloke mohanaṃ. sesaṃ uttānatthameva.

[03] 403-4^b^.^eb^ ettāvatā agāriyasāvakassa niccasīlaṃ dassetvā idāni uposathaṅgāni dassento ^a^V2.0098^ea^ ^b^``pāṇaṃ na hane''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^abrahmacariyā^eb^ti aseṭṭhacariyabhūtā. ^b^methunā^eb^ti methunadhammasamāpattito. ^b^rattiṃ na bhuñjeyya vikālabhojana^eb^nti rattimpi na bhuñjeyya, divāpi kālātikkantabhojanaṃ ^a^M2.0108^ea^ na bhuñjeyya. ^b^na ca gandha^eb^nti ettha gandhaggahaṇena vilepanacuṇṇādīnipi gahitānevāti veditabbāni. ^b^mañce^eb^ti kappiyamañce. ^b^santhate^eb^ti taṭṭikādīhi kappiyattharaṇehi atthate. chamāyaṃ pana gonakādisanthatāyapi vaṭṭati. ^b^aṭṭhaṅgika^eb^nti pañcaṅgikaṃ viya tūriyaṃ, na aṅgavinimuttaṃ. ^b^dukkhantagunā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa antagatena. sesamettha pākaṭameva. pacchimaḍḍhuṃ pana saṅgītikārakehi vuttantipi āhu.

[03] 405^b^.^eb^ evaṃ uposathaṅgāni dassetvā idāni uposathakālaṃ dassento āha ^b^``tato ca pakkhassā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^tato^eb^ti ^a^P1.0378^ea^ padapūraṇamatte nipāto. ^b^pakkhassupavassuposatha^eb^nti evaṃ parapadena yojetabbaṃ ``pakkhassa cātuddasiṃ pañcadasiṃ aṭṭhaminti ete tayo divase upavassa uposathaṃ, etaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikauposathaṃ upagamma vasitvā''ti. ^b^pāṭihāriyapakkhañcā^eb^ti ettha pana vassūpanāyikāya purimabhāge āsāḷhamāso, antovassaṃ tayo māsā, kattikamāsoti ime pañca māsā ``pāṭihāriyapakkho''ti vuccanti. āsāḷhakattikaphagguṇamāsā tayo evāti apare. pakkhuposathadivasānaṃ purimapacchimadivasavasena pakkhe pakkhe terasīpāṭipadasattamīnavamīsaṅkhātā cattāro cattāro divasāti apare. yaṃ ruccati, taṃ gahetabbaṃ. sabbaṃ vā pana puññakāmīnaṃ bhāsitabbaṃ. evametaṃ pāṭihāriyapakkhañca pasannamānaso susamattarūpaṃ suparipuṇṇarūpaṃ ekampi divasaṃ apariccajanto aṭṭhaṅgupetaṃ uposathaṃ upavassāti sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03] 406^b^.^eb^ evaṃ uposathakālaṃ dassetvā idāni tesu kālesu etaṃ uposathaṃ upavassa yaṃ kātabbaṃ, taṃ dassento āha ^b^``tato ca pāto''^eb^ti. etthāpi ^b^tato^eb^ti padapūraṇamatte nipāto, anantaratthe vā, athāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^pāto^eb^ti aparajjudivasapubbabhāge. ^b^upavutthuposatho^eb^ti upavasitauposatho. ^b^annenā^eb^ti yāgubhattādinā. ^b^pānenā^eb^ti aṭṭhavidhapānena. ^b^anumodamāno^eb^ti anupamodamāno, nirantaraṃ modamānoti attho. ^b^yathāraha^eb^nti attano anurūpena, yathāsatti yathābalanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^saṃvibhajethā^eb^ti bhājeyya patimāneyya. sesaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03] 407^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^M2.0109^ea^ upavutthuposathassa kiccaṃ vatvā idāni yāvajīvikaṃ garuvattaṃ ājīvapārisuddhiñca kathetvā tāya paṭipadāya adhigantabbaṭṭhānaṃ dassento āha ^b^``dhammena mātāpitaro''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^dhammenā^eb^ti dhammaladdhena bhogena ^a^P1.0379^ea^. ^b^bhareyyā^eb^ti poseyya. ^b^dhammikaṃ so vaṇijja^eb^nti sattavaṇijjā, satthavaṇijjā, visavaṇijjā, maṃsavaṇijjā, surāvaṇijjāti imā pañca ^a^V2.0099^ea^ adhammavaṇijjā vajjetvā avasesā dhammikavaṇijjā. vaṇijjāmukhena cettha kasigorakkhādi aparopi dhammiko vohāro saṅgahito. sesamuttānatthameva. ayaṃ pana yojanā -- so niccasīlauposathasīladānadhammasamannāgato ariyasāvako payojaye dhammikaṃ vaṇijjaṃ, tato laddhena ca dhammato anapetattā dhammena bhogena mātāpitaro bhareyya. atha so gihī evaṃ appamatto ādito pabhuti vuttaṃ imaṃ vattaṃ vattayanto kāyassa bhedā ye te attano ābhāya andhakāraṃ vidhametvā ālokakaraṇena sayampabhāti laddhanāmā cha kāmāvacaradevā, te sayampabhe nāma deve upeti bhajati allīyati, tesaṃ nibbattaṭṭhāne nibbattatīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya dhammikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] niṭṭhito ca dutiyo vaggo atthavaṇṇanānayato, nāmena
[03] cūḷavaggoti.

[03] 408^b^.^eb^ ^b^pabbajjaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0100^ea^ ^a^M2.0110^ea^ ^a^P2.0381^ea^ ^b^kittayissāmī^eb^ti pabbajjāsuttaṃ. kā uppatti? bhagavati kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante āyasmato ānandassa parivitakko udapādi -- ``sāriputtādīnaṃ mahāsāvakānaṃ pabbajjā kittitā, taṃ bhikkhū ca upāsakā ca jānanti. bhagavato pana akittitā, yaṃnūnāhaṃ kitteyya''nti. so jetavanavihāre āsane nisīditvā cittabījaniṃ gahetvā bhikkhūnaṃ bhagavato pabbajjaṃ kittento imaṃ suttamabhāsi.

[03] tattha yasmā pabbajjaṃ kittentena yathā pabbaji, taṃ kittetabbaṃ. yathā ca pabbaji, taṃ kittentena yathā vīmaṃsamāno pabbajjaṃ rocesi, taṃ kittetabbaṃ. tasmā ``pabbajjaṃ kittayissāmī''ti vatvā ^b^``yathā pabbajī''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^cakkhumā^eb^ti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā cakkhusampannoti attho. sesamādigāthāya uttānameva.

[03] 409^b^.^eb^ idāni ``yathā vīmaṃsamāno''ti tamatthaṃ pakāsento āha ^b^``sambādhoya''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^sambādho^eb^ti puttadārādisampīḷanena kilesasampīḷanena ca kusalakiriyāya okāsarahito. ^b^rajassāyatana^eb^nti kambojādayo viya assādīnaṃ, rāgādirajassa uppattideso. ^b^abbhokāso^eb^ti vuttasambādhapaṭipakkhabhāvena ākāso viya vivaṭā. ^b^iti disvāna pabbajī^eb^ti iti gharāvāsapabbajjāsu byādhijarāmaraṇehi suṭṭhutaraṃ codiyamānahadayo ādīnavamānisaṃsañca vīmaṃsitvā, mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā ^a^P2.0382^ea^, anomānadītīre khaggena kese chinditvā, tāvadeva ca dvaṅgulamattasaṇṭhitasamaṇasāruppakesamassu hutvā ghaṭikārena brahmunā upanīte aṭṭha parikkhāre gahetvā ``evaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ pārupitabba''nti kenaci ananusiṭṭho anekajātisahassapavattitena attano pabbajjāciṇṇeneva sikkhāpiyamāno pabbaji. ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ekaṃ cīvaraṃ khandhe karitvā mattikāpattaṃ aṃse ālaggetvā pabbajitavesaṃ adhiṭṭhāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. sesamettha uttānameva.

[03] 410^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^V2.0101^ea^ bhagavato pabbajjaṃ kittetvā tato paraṃ pabbajitapaṭipattiṃ anomānadītīraṃ hitvā padhānāya gamanañca pakāsetuṃ ^b^``pabbajitvāna kāyenā''^eb^tiādiṃ ^a^M2.0111^ea^ sabbamabhāsi. tattha ^b^kāyena pāpakammaṃ vivajjayī^eb^ti tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ vajjesi. ^b^vacīduccarita^eb^nti catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ. ^b^ājīvaṃ parisodhayī^eb^ti micchājīvaṃ hitvā sammājīvameva pavattayi.

[03] 411^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ sodhetvā anomānadītīrato tiṃsayojanappamāṇaṃ sattāhena ^b^agamā rājagahaṃ buddho^eb^. tattha kiñcāpi yadā rājagahaṃ agamāsi, tadā buddho na hoti, tathāpi buddhassa pubbacariyāti katvā evaṃ vattuṃ labbhati -- ``idha rājā jāto, idha rajjaṃ aggahesī''tiādi lokiyavohāravacanaṃ viya. ^b^magadhāna^eb^nti magadhānaṃ janapadassa nagaranti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^giribbaja^eb^nti idampi tassa nāmaṃ. tañhi paṇḍavagijjhakūṭavebhāraisigilivepullanāmakānaṃ pañcannaṃ girīnaṃ majjhe vajo viya ṭhitaṃ, tasmā ``giribbaja''nti vuccati. ^b^piṇḍāya abhihāresī^eb^ti bhikkhatthāya tasmiṃ nagare cari. so kira nagaradvāre ṭhatvā cintesi -- ``sacāhaṃ rañño bimbisārassa attano āgamanaṃ nivedeyyaṃ, `suddhodanassa putto siddhattho nāma kumāro āgato'ti bahumpi me paccayaṃ abhihareyya. na kho pana me taṃ patirūpaṃ pabbajitassa ārocetvā paccayagahaṇaṃ, handāhaṃ piṇḍāya carāmī''ti devadattiyaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā mattikāpattaṃ gahetvā pācīnadvārena ^a^P2.0383^ea^ nagaraṃ pavisitvā anugharaṃ piṇḍāya acari. tenāha āyasmā ānando -- ``piṇḍāya abhihāresī''ti. ^b^ākiṇṇavaralakkhaṇo^eb^ti sarīre ākiritvā viya ṭhapitavaralakkhaṇo vipulavaralakkhaṇo vā. vipulampi hi ``ākiṇṇa''nti vuccati. yathāha -- ``ākiṇṇaluddo puriso, dhāticelaṃva makkhito''ti (jā0 1.6.118; 1.9.106). vipulaluddoti attho.

[03] 412^b^.^eb^ ^b^tamaddasā^eb^ti tato kira purimāni satta divasāni nagare nakkhattaṃ ghositaṃ ahosi. taṃ divasaṃ pana ``nakkhattaṃ vītivattaṃ, kammantā payojetabbā''ti bheri cari. atha mahājano rājaṅgaṇe sannipati. rājāpi ``kammantaṃ saṃvidahissāmī''ti sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā balakāyaṃ passanto taṃ piṇḍāya abhihārentaṃ mahāsattaṃ addasa. tenāha āyasmā ānando -- ``tamaddasā bimbisāro, pāsādasmiṃ patiṭṭhito''ti. ^b^imamatthaṃ abhāsathā^eb^ti imaṃ atthaṃ amaccānaṃ abhāsi.

[03] 413^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^M2.0112^ea^ taṃ tesaṃ amaccānaṃ bhāsitamatthaṃ dassento āha -- ^b^``imaṃ bhonto''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^ima^eb^nti so rājā bodhisattaṃ dasseti, ^b^bhonto^eb^ti amacce ālapati. ^b^nisāmethā^eb^ti passatha. ^b^abhirūpo^eb^ti dassanīyaṅgapaccaṅgo. ^b^brahmā^eb^ti ārohapariṇāhasampanno. ^b^sucī^eb^ti parisuddhachavivaṇṇo. ^b^caraṇenā^eb^ti gamanena.

[03] 414-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^nīcakulāmivā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0102^ea^ nīcakulā iva pabbajito na hotīti attho. makāro padasandhikaro. ^b^kuhiṃ bhikkhu gamissatī^eb^ti ayaṃ bhikkhu kuhiṃ gamissati, ajja kattha vasissatīti jānituṃ rājadūtā sīghaṃ gacchantu. dassanakāmā hi mayaṃ assāti iminā adhippāyena āha. ^b^guttadvāro^eb^ okkhittacakkhutāya, ^b^susaṃvuto^eb^ satiyā. guttadvāro vā satiyā, susaṃvuto pāsādikena saṅghāṭicīvaradhāraṇena.

[03] 416^b^.^eb^ ^b^khippaṃ pattaṃ apūresī^eb^ti sampajānattā patissatattā ca adhikaṃ agaṇhanto ``alaṃ ettāvatā''ti ajjhāsayapūraṇena khippaṃ pattaṃ apūresi. ^b^munī^eb^ti monatthāya paṭipannattā appattamunibhāvopi munīcceva vutto, lokavohārena vā. lokiyā hi amonasampattampi pabbajitaṃ ``munī''ti bhaṇanti. ^b^paṇḍavaṃ abhihāresī^eb^ti taṃ pabbataṃ abhiruhi. so kira manusse pucchi ``imasmiṃ nagare pabbajitā kattha vasantī''ti. athassa ^a^P2.0384^ea^ te ``paṇḍavassa upari puratthābhimukhapabbhāre''ti ārocesuṃ. tasmā tameva paṇḍavaṃ abhihāresi ``ettha vāso bhavissatī''ti evaṃ cintetvā.

[03] 419-23^b^.^eb^ ^b^byagghusabhova sīhova girigabbhare^eb^ti giriguhāyaṃ byaggho viya usabho viya sīho viya ca nisinnoti attho. ete hi tayo seṭṭhā vigatabhayabheravā girigabbhare nisīdanti, tasmā evaṃ upamaṃ akāsi. ^b^bhaddayānenā^eb^ti hatthiassarathasivikādinā uttamayānena. ^b^sayānabhūmiṃ yāyitvā^eb^ti yāvatikā bhūmi hatthiassādinā yānena sakkā gantuṃ, taṃ gantvā. ^b^āsajjā^eb^ti patvā, samīpamassa gantvāti attho. ^b^upāvisī^eb^ti nisīdi. ^b^yuvā^eb^ti yobbanasampanno. ^b^daharo^eb^ti jātiyā taruṇo. ^b^paṭhamuppattiko susū^eb^ti tadubhayavisesanameva. ^b^yuvā susū^eb^ti atiyobbano. ^b^paṭhamuppattiko^eb^ti paṭhameneva yobbanavesena uṭṭhito. ^b^daharo cāsī^eb^ti sati ca daharatte susu bālako viya khāyasīti.

[03] 424-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^anīkagga^eb^nti ^a^M2.0113^ea^ balakāyaṃ senāmukhaṃ. ^b^dadāmi bhoge bhuñjassū^eb^ti ettha ``ahaṃ te aṅgamagadhesu yāvicchasi, tāva dadāmi bhoge. taṃ tvaṃ sobhayanto anīkaggaṃ nāgasaṅghapurakkhato bhuñjassū''ti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo. ^b^ujuṃ janapado rājā^eb^ti ``dadāmi bhoge bhuñjassu, jātiṃ akkhāhi pucchito''ti evaṃ kira vutto mahāpuriso cintesi -- ``sace ahaṃ rajjena atthiko assaṃ, cātumahārājikādayopi maṃ attano attano rajjena nimanteyyuṃ, gehe ṭhito eva vā cakkavattirajjaṃ kāreyyaṃ. ayaṃ pana rājā ajānanto evamāha -- `handāhaṃ, taṃ jānāpemī'''ti bāhaṃ uccāretvā attano āgatadisābhāgaṃ niddisanto ``ujuṃ janapado rājā''tiādimāha. tattha ^b^himavantassa^eb^ ^a^V2.0103^ea^ ^b^passato^eb^ti bhaṇanto sassasampattivekallābhāvaṃ dasseti. himavantañhi nissāya pāsāṇavivarasambhavā mahāsālāpi pañcahi vuddhīhi vaḍḍhanti, kimaṅgaṃ ^a^P2.0385^ea^ pana khette vuttāni sassāni. ^b^dhanavīriyena sampanno^eb^ti bhaṇanto sattahi ratanehi avekallattaṃ, pararājūhi atakkanīyaṃ vīrapurisādhiṭṭhitabhāvañcassa dasseti. ^b^kosalesu niketino^eb^ti bhaṇanto navakarājabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. navakarājā hi niketīti na vuccati. yassa pana ādikālato pabhuti anvayavasena so eva janapado nivāso, so niketīti vuccati. tathārūpo ca rājā suddhodano, yaṃ sandhāyāha ``kosalesu niketino''ti. tena anvayāgatampi bhogasampattiṃ dīpeti.

[03] 426^b^.^eb^ ettāvatā attano bhogasampattiṃ dīpetvā ``ādiccā nāma gottena, sākiyā nāma jātiyā''ti iminā jātisampattiñca ācikkhitvā yaṃ vuttaṃ raññā ``dadāmi bhoge bhuñjassū''ti, taṃ paṭikkhipanto āha -- ^b^``tamhā kulā pabbajitomhi, na kāme abhipatthaya''^eb^nti. yadi hi ahaṃ kāme abhipatthayeyyaṃ, na īdisaṃ dhanavīriyasampannaṃ dvāsītisahassavīrapurisasamākulaṃ kulaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajeyyanti ayaṃ kirettha adhippāyo.

[03] 427^b^.^eb^ evaṃ rañño vacanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā tato paraṃ attano pabbajjāhetuṃ dassento āha -- ^b^``kāmesvādīnavaṃ disvā, nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato''^eb^ti. etaṃ ``pabbajitomhī''ti iminā sambandhitabbaṃ. tattha ^b^daṭṭhū^eb^ti disvā ^a^M2.0114^ea^. sesamettha ito purimagāthāsu ca yaṃ yaṃ na vicāritaṃ, taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ uttānatthattā eva na vicāritanti veditabbaṃ. evaṃ attano pabbajjāhetuṃ vatvā padhānatthāya gantukāmo rājānaṃ āmantento āha -- ^b^``padhānāya gamissāmi, ettha me rañjatī mano''^eb^ti. tassattho -- yasmāhaṃ, mahārāja, nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato pabbajito, tasmā taṃ paramatthanekkhammaṃ nibbānāmataṃ sabbadhammānaṃ aggaṭṭhena padhānaṃ patthento padhānatthāya gamissāmi, ettha me padhāne rañjati mano, na kāmesūti. evaṃ vutte kira rājā bodhisattaṃ āha -- ``pubbeva metaṃ, bhante, sutaṃ `suddhodanarañño kira putto siddhatthakumāro ^a^P2.0386^ea^ cattāri pubbanimittāni disvā pabbajitvā buddho bhavissatī'ti, sohaṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ adhimuttiṃ disvā evaṃpasanno `addhā buddhattaṃ pāpuṇissathā'ti. sādhu, bhante, buddhattaṃ patvā paṭhamaṃ mama vijitaṃ okkameyyāthā''ti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya pabbajjāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 428^b^.^eb^ ^b^taṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0104^ea^ ^b^maṃ padhānapahitatta^eb^nti padhānasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? ``padhānāya gamissāmi, ettha me rañjatī mano''ti āyasmā ānando pabbajjāsuttaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. bhagavā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinno cintesi -- ``mayā chabbassāni padhānaṃ patthayamānena dukkarakārikā katā, taṃ ajja bhikkhūnaṃ kathessāmī''ti. atha gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā buddhāsane nisinno ``taṃ maṃ padhānapahitatta''nti ārabhitvā imaṃ suttamabhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^taṃ ma^eb^nti dvīhipi vacanehi attānameva niddisati. ^b^padhānapahitatta^eb^nti nibbānatthāya pesitacittaṃ pariccattāttabhāvaṃ vā. ^b^nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ patī^eb^ti lakkhaṇaṃ niddisati. lakkhaṇañhi padhānapahitattāya nerañjarā nadī. teneva cettha upayogavacanaṃ. ayaṃ panattho ``nadiyā nerañjarāyā''ti, nerañjarāya tīreti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^viparakkammā^eb^ti atīva parakkamitvā. ^b^jhāyanta^eb^nti appāṇakajjhānamanuyuñjantaṃ ^a^M2.0115^ea^. ^b^yogakkhemassa pattiyā^eb^ti catūhi yogehi khemassa nibbānassa adhigamatthaṃ.

[03] 429^b^.^eb^ ^b^namucī^eb^ti māro. so hi attano visayā nikkhamitukāme devamanusse na muñcati, antarāyaṃ nesaṃ karoti, tasmā ``namucī''ti vuccati. ^b^karuṇaṃ vāca^eb^nti anuddayāyuttaṃ vācaṃ. ^b^bhāsamāno upāgamī^eb^ti idaṃ uttānameva. kasmā pana upāgato? mahāpuriso kira ekadivasaṃ cintesi -- ``sabbadā āhāraṃ pariyesamāno jīvite sāpekkho hoti, na ca sakkā jīvite sāpekkhena amataṃ adhigantu''nti ^a^P2.0387^ea^. tato āhārupacchedāya paṭipajji, tena kiso dubbaṇṇo ca ahosi. atha māro ``ayaṃ sambodhāya maggo hoti, na hotīti ajānanto atighoraṃ tapaṃ karoti, kadāci mama visayaṃ atikkameyyā''ti bhīto ``idañcidañca vatvā vāressāmī''ti āgato. tenevāha -- ^b^``kiso tvamasi dubbaṇṇo, santike maraṇaṃ tavā''^eb^ti.

[03] 430^b^.^eb^ evañca pana vatvā athassa maraṇasantikabhāvaṃ sāvento āha -- ^b^``sahassabhāgo maraṇassa, ekaṃso tava jīvita''^eb^nti. tassattho -- sahassaṃ bhāgānaṃ assāti sahassabhāgo. ko so ^a^V2.0105^ea^? maraṇassa paccayoti pāṭhaseso. eko aṃsoti ekaṃso. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ayaṃ appāṇakajjhānādisahassabhāgo tava maraṇassa paccayo, tato pana te eko eva bhāgo jīvitaṃ, evaṃ santike maraṇaṃ tavāti. evaṃ maraṇassa santikabhāvaṃ sāvetvā atha naṃ jīvite samussāhento āha ^b^``jīva bho jīvitaṃ seyyo''^eb^ti. kathaṃ seyyoti ce. ^b^jīvaṃ puññāni kāhasī^eb^ti.

[03] 431^b^.^eb^ atha attanā sammatāni puññāni dassento āha -- ``carato ca te brahmacariya''nti. tattha ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti kālena kālaṃ methunaviratiṃ sandhāyāha, yaṃ tāpasā karonti. ^b^jūhato^eb^ti juhantassa. sesamettha pākaṭameva.

[03] 432^b^.^eb^ ^b^duggo maggo^eb^ti imaṃ pana aḍḍhagāthaṃ padhānavicchandaṃ janento āha. tattha appāṇakajjhānādigahanattā dukkhena gantabboti ^b^duggo,^eb^ dukkhitakāyacittena ^a^M2.0116^ea^ kattabbattā ^b^dukkaro,^eb^ santikamaraṇena tādisenāpi pāpuṇituṃ asakkuṇeyyato ^b^durabhisambhavo^eb^ti evamattho veditabbo. ito paraṃ ^b^imā gāthā bhaṇaṃ māro, aṭṭhā buddhassa santike^eb^ti ayamupaḍḍhagāthā saṅgītikārehi vuttā. sakalagāthāpīti eke. bhagavatā eva pana paraṃ viya attānaṃ niddisantena sabbamettha evaṃjātikaṃ vuttanti ayamamhākaṃ khanti. tattha ^b^aṭṭhā^eb^ti aṭṭhāsi. sesaṃ uttānameva.
[03] 433^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhagāthāya ^b^yenatthenā^eb^ti ettha paresaṃ antarāyakaraṇena attano atthena tvaṃ, pāpima, āgatosīti ayamadhippāyo ^a^P2.0388^ea^. sesaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 434^b^.^eb^ ``jīvaṃ puññāni kāhasī''ti idaṃ pana vacanaṃ paṭikkhipanto ^b^``aṇumattopī''^eb^ti imaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^puññenā^eb^ti vaṭṭagāmiṃ mārena vuttaṃ puññaṃ sandhāya bhaṇati. sesaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 435^b^.^eb^ idāni ``ekaṃso tava jīvita''nti idaṃ vacanaṃ ārabbha māraṃ santajjento ^b^``atthi saddhā''^eb^ti imaṃ gāthamāha. tatrāyamadhippāyo -- are, māra, yo anuttare santivarapade assaddho bhaveyya, saddhopi vā kusīto, saddho āraddhavīriyo samānopi vā duppañño, taṃ tvaṃ jīvitamanupucchamāno sobheyyāsi, mayhaṃ pana anuttare santivarapade okappanasaddhā atthi, tathā kāyikacetasikamasithilaparakkamatāsaṅkhātaṃ vīriyaṃ, vajirūpamā paññā ca mama vijjati, so tvaṃ evaṃ maṃ pahitattaṃ uttamajjhāsayaṃ kiṃ jīvamanupucchasi, kasmā jīvitaṃ pucchasi. ^b^paññā^eb^ ^a^V2.0106^ea^ ^b^ca mamā^eb^ti ettha ca saddena sati samādhi ca. evaṃ sante yehi pañcahi indriyehi samannāgatā nibbānaṃ pāpuṇanti, tesu ekenāpi avirahitaṃ evaṃ maṃ pahitattaṃ kiṃ jīvamanupucchasi? nanu -- ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, vīriyamārabhato daḷhaṃ (dha0 pa0 112). paññavantassa jhāyino, passato udayabbayanti (dha0 pa0 111, 113).

[03] 436-8^b^.^eb^ evaṃ māraṃ santajjetvā attano dehacittappavattiṃ dassento ^b^``nadīnamapī''^eb^pi gāthāttayamāha. tamatthato pākaṭameva. ayaṃ pana adhippāyavaṇṇanā ^a^M2.0117^ea^ -- yvāyaṃ mama sarīre appāṇakajjhānavīriyavegasamuṭṭhito vāto vattati, loke gaṅgāyamunādīnaṃ nadīnampi sotāni ayaṃ visosaye, kiñca me evaṃ pahitattassa catunāḷimattaṃ lohitaṃ na upasoseyya. na kevalañca me lohitameva sussati, apica kho pana tamhi lohite sussamānamhi baddhābaddhabhedaṃ sarīrānugataṃ ^a^P2.0389^ea^ pittaṃ, asitapītādipaṭicchādakaṃ catunāḷimattameva semhañca, kiñcāparaṃ tattakameva muttañca ojañca sussati, tesu ca sussamānesu maṃsānipi khīyanti, tassa me evaṃ anupubbena ^b^maṃsesu khīyamānesu bhiyyo cittaṃ pasīdati,^eb^ na tveva tappaccayā saṃsīdati. so tvaṃ īdisaṃ cittamajānanto sarīramattameva disvā bhaṇasi ``kiso tvamasi dubbaṇṇo, santike maraṇaṃ tavā''ti. na kevalañca me cittameva pasīdati, apica kho pana ^b^bhiyyo sati ca paññā ca samādhi mama tiṭṭhati,^eb^ aṇumattopi pamādo vā sammoho vā cittavikkhepo vā natthi, tassa mayhaṃ evaṃ viharato ye keci samaṇabrāhmaṇā atītaṃ vā addhānaṃ anāgataṃ vā etarahi vā opakkamikā vedanā vedayanti, tāsaṃ nidassanabhūtaṃ ^b^pattassa uttamavedanaṃ^eb^. yathā aññesaṃ dukkhena phuṭṭhānaṃ sukhaṃ, sītena uṇhaṃ, uṇhena sītaṃ, khudāya bhojanaṃ, pipāsāya phuṭṭhānaṃ udakaṃ apekkhate cittaṃ, evaṃ pañcasu kāmaguṇesu ekakāmampi ^b^nāpekkhake^eb^ cittaṃ. ``aho vatāhaṃ subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā sukhaseyyaṃ sayeyya''nti īdisenākārena mama cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, ^b^passa,^eb^ tvaṃ māra, ^b^sattassa suddhata^eb^nti.

[03] 439-41^b^.^eb^ evaṃ attano suddhataṃ dassetvā ``nivāressāmi ta''nti āgatassa mārassa manorathabhañjanatthaṃ mārasenaṃ kittetvā tāya aparājitabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^``kāmā te paṭhamā senā''^eb^tiādikā cha gāthāyo āha.

[03] tattha yasmā āditova agāriyabhūte satte vatthukāmesu kilesakāmā mohayanti, te abhibhuyya anagāriyabhāvaṃ upagatānaṃ pantesu vā senāsanesu aññataraññataresu vā adhikusalesu dhammesu ^b^arati^eb^ uppajjati. vuttañcetaṃ ``pabbajitena kho, āvuso, abhirati dukkarā''ti ^a^V2.0107^ea^ (saṃ0 ni0 4.331). tato te parapaṭibaddhajīvikattā ^b^khuppipāsā^eb^ bādheti, tāya bādhitānaṃ ^a^M2.0118^ea^ pariyesana^b^taṇhā^eb^ cittaṃ kilamayati, atha nesaṃ ^a^P2.0390^ea^ kilantacittānaṃ ^b^thinamiddhaṃ^eb^ okkamati. tato visesamanadhigacchantānaṃ durabhisambhavesu araññavanapatthesu senāsanesu viharataṃ utrāsasaññitā ^b^bhīru^eb^ jāyati, tesaṃ ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitānaṃ dīgharattaṃ vivekarasamanassādayamānānaṃ viharataṃ ``na siyā nu kho esa maggo''ti paṭipattiyaṃ ^b^vicikicchā^eb^ uppajjati, taṃ vinodetvā viharataṃ appamattakena visesādhigamena ^b^mānamakkhathambhā^eb^ jāyanti, tepi vinodetvā viharataṃ tato adhikataraṃ visesādhigamaṃ nissāya ^b^lābhasakkārasilokā^eb^ uppajjanti, lābhādimucchitā dhammapatirūpakāni pakāsentā ^b^micchāyasaṃ^eb^ adhigantvā tattha ṭhitā jātiādīhi ^b^attānaṃ ukkaṃsenti, paraṃ vambhenti,^eb^ tasmā kāmādīnaṃ paṭhamasenādibhāvo veditabbo.

[03] 442-3^b^.^eb^ evametaṃ dasavidhaṃ senaṃ uddisitvā yasmā sā kaṇhadhammasamannāgatattā kaṇhassa namucino upakārāya saṃvattati, tasmā naṃ tava senāti niddisanto āha -- ^b^``esā namuci te senā, kaṇhassābhippahārinī''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^abhippahārinī^eb^ti samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ghātanī nippothanī, antarāyakarīti attho. ^b^na naṃ asūro jināti, jetvā ca labhate sukha^eb^nti evaṃ tava senaṃ asūro kāye ca jīvite ca sāpekkho puriso na jināti, sūro pana jināti, jetvā ca maggasukhaṃ phalasukhañca adhigacchati. yasmā ca labhate sukhaṃ, tasmā sukhaṃ patthayamāno ahampi ^b^esa muñjaṃ parihare^eb^ti. saṅgāmāvacarā anivattino purisā attano anivattanakabhāvaviññāpanatthaṃ sīse vā dhaje vā āvudhe vā muñjatiṇaṃ bandhanti, taṃ ayampi pariharaticceva maṃ dhārehi. tava senāya parājitassa ^b^dhiratthu mama jīvitaṃ,^eb^ tasmā evaṃ dhārehi -- ^b^saṅgāme me mataṃ seyyo, yañce jīve parājito,^eb^ yena jīvitena parājito jīve, tasmā jīvitā tayā sammāpaṭipannānaṃ antarāyakarena saddhiṃ saṅgāme mataṃ mama seyyoti attho.

[03] 444^b^.^eb^ kasmā mataṃ seyyoti ce? yasmā ^b^pagāḷhettha...pe0... subbatā,^eb^ ettha kāmādikāya attukkaṃsanaparavambhanapariyosānāya tava senāya pagāḷhā nimuggā anupaviṭṭhā eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā na ^a^P2.0391^ea^ dissanti, sīlādīhi guṇehi nappakāsanti, andhakāraṃ paviṭṭhā viya honti. ete evaṃ pagāḷhā samānā ^a^M2.0119^ea^ sacepi kadāci ummujjitvā nimujjanapuriso viya ``sāhu saddhā''tiādinā nayena ummujjanti, tathāpi tāya senāya ajjhotthaṭattā ^b^tañca maggaṃ na jānanti^eb^ khemaṃ nibbānagāmīnaṃ, sabbepi buddhapaccekabuddhādayo ^b^yena gacchanti subbatā^eb^ti. imaṃ pana gāthaṃ sutvā māro puna kiñci avatvā eva pakkāmi.

[03] 445-6^b^.^eb^ pakkante ^a^V2.0108^ea^ pana tasmiṃ mahāsatto tāya dukkarakārikāya kiñcipi visesaṃ anadhigacchanto anukkamena ``siyā nu kho añño maggo bodhāyā''tiādīni cintetvā oḷārikāhāraṃ āhāretvā, balaṃ gahetvā, visākhapuṇṇamadivase pageva sujātāya pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā, bhadravanasaṇḍe divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā, tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattento divasaṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye mahābodhimaṇḍābhimukho gantvā sotthiyena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo bodhimūle vikiritvā dasasahassalokadhātudevatāhi katasakkārabahumāno --
[21] ``kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca, aṭṭhi ca avasissatu.
[22] upasussatu nissesaṃ, sarīre maṃsalohita''nti.. --

[25] caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā ``na dāni buddhattaṃ apāpuṇitvā pallaṅkaṃ bhindissāmī''ti paṭiññaṃ katvā aparājitapallaṅke nisīdi. taṃ ñatvā māro pāpimā ``ajja siddhattho paṭiññaṃ katvā nisinno, ajjeva dānissa sā paṭiññā paṭibāhitabbā''ti bodhimaṇḍato yāva cakkavāḷamāyataṃ dvādasayojanavitthāraṃ uddhaṃ navayojanamuggataṃ mārasenaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatappamāṇaṃ girimekhalaṃ hatthirājānaṃ āruyha bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā nānāvudhāni gahetvā ``gaṇhatha, hanatha, paharathā''ti bhaṇanto āḷavakasutte vuttappakārā vuṭṭhiyo māpesi, tā mahāpurisaṃ patvā tattha vuttappakārā eva sampajjiṃsu. tato vajiraṅkusena hatthiṃ kumbhe paharitvā mahāpurisassa samīpaṃ netvā ``uṭṭhehi, bho siddhattha, pallaṅkā''ti āha. mahāpuriso ``na uṭṭhahāmi mārā''ti ^a^P2.0392^ea^ vatvā taṃ dhajiniṃ samantā vilokento imā gāthāyo abhāsi ^b^``samantā dhajini''^eb^nti.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0120^ea^ ^b^dhajini^eb^nti senaṃ. ^b^yutta^eb^nti uyyuttaṃ. ^b^savāhana^eb^nti girimekhalanāgarājasahitaṃ. ^b^paccuggacchāmī^eb^ti abhimukho upari gamissāmi, so ca kho tejeneva, na kāyena. kasmā? ^b^mā maṃ ṭhānā acāvayi,^eb^ maṃ etasmā ṭhānā aparājitapallaṅkā māro mā cālesīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^nappasahatī^eb^ti sahituṃ na sakkoti, nābhibhavati vā. ^b^āmaṃ patta^eb^nti kācajātaṃ mattikābhājanaṃ. ^b^asmanā^eb^ti pāsāṇena. sesamettha pākaṭameva.

[03] 447-8^b^.^eb^ idāni ``etaṃ te mārasenaṃ bhinditvā tato paraṃ vijitasaṅgāmo sampattadhammarājābhiseko idaṃ karissāmī''ti dassento āha ^b^``vasīkaritvā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^vasīkaritvā saṅkappa^eb^nti maggabhāvanāya sabbaṃ micchāsaṅkappaṃ pahāya sammāsaṅkappasseva pavattanena vasīkaritvā ^a^V2.0109^ea^ saṅkappaṃ. ^b^satiñca sūpatiṭṭhita^eb^nti kāyādīsu catūsu ṭhānesu attano satiñca suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ karitvā evaṃ vasīkatasaṅkappo suppatiṭṭhitassati ^b^raṭṭhā raṭṭhaṃ vicarissāmi^eb^ devamanussabhede ^b^puthū sāvake vinayanto^eb^. atha mayā vinīyamānā ^b^te appamattā...pe0... na socare,^eb^ taṃ nibbānāmatamevāti adhippāyo.

[03] 449-51^b^.^eb^ atha māro imā gāthāyo sutvā āha -- ``evarūpaṃ pakkhaṃ disvā na bhāyasi bhikkhū''ti? ``āma, māra, na bhāyāmī''ti. ``kasmā na bhāyasī''ti? ``dānādīnaṃ pāramipuññānaṃ katattā''ti. ``ko etaṃ jānāti dānādīni tvamakāsī''ti? ``kiṃ ettha pāpima sakkhikiccena, apica ekasmiṃyeva bhave vessantaro hutvā yaṃ dānamadāsiṃ, tassānubhāvena sattakkhattuṃ chahi pakārehi sañjātakampā ayaṃ mahāpathavīyeva sakkhī''ti. evaṃ vutte udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī kampi bheravasaddaṃ muñcamānā, yaṃ sutvā māro asanihato viya bhīto dhajaṃ paṇāmetvā palāyi saddhiṃ parisāya. atha mahāpuriso tīhi yāmehi tisso vijjā sacchikatvā aruṇuggamane ``anekajātisaṃsāraṃ...pe0... taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā''ti ^a^P2.0393^ea^ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi. māro udānasaddena āgantvā ``ayaṃ`buddho aha'nti paṭijānāti, handa naṃ anubandhāmi ābhisamācārikaṃ passituṃ. sacassa kiñci kāyena vā vācāya vā khalitaṃ bhavissati, viheṭhessāmi na''nti pubbe bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ ^a^M2.0121^ea^ chabbassāni anubandhitvā buddhattaṃ pattaṃ ekaṃ vassaṃ anubandhi. tato bhagavato kiñci khalitaṃ apassanto ^b^``satta vassānī''^eb^ti imā nibbejanīyagāthāyo abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^otāra^eb^nti randhaṃ vivaraṃ. ^b^nādhigacchissa^eb^nti nādhigamiṃ. ^b^medavaṇṇa^eb^nti medapiṇḍasadisaṃ. ^b^anupariyagā^eb^ti parito parito agamāsi. ^b^mudu^eb^nti mudukaṃ. ^b^vindemā^eb^ti adhigaccheyyāma. ^b^assādanā^eb^ti sādubhāvo. ^b^vāyasetto^eb^ti vāyaso etto. sesamettha pākaṭameva.

[03] ayaṃ pana yojanā -- satta vassāni bhagavantaṃ otārāpekkho anubandhiṃ katthaci avijahanto padāpadaṃ, evaṃ anubandhitvāpi ca otāraṃ nādhigamiṃ. sohaṃ yathā nāma medavaṇṇaṃ pāsāṇaṃ medasaññī vāyaso ekasmiṃ passe mukhatuṇḍakena vijjhitvā assādaṃ avindamāno ``appeva nāma ettha mudu vindema, api ito assādanā siyā''ti samantā tatheva vijjhanto anupariyāyitvā katthaci assādaṃ aladdhā ``pāsāṇovāya''nti nibbijja pakkameyya, evamevāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ kāyakammādīsu attano parittapaññāmukhatuṇḍakena vijjhanto samantā anupariyagā ``appeva nāma katthaci aparisuddhakāyasamācārādimudubhāvaṃ vindema, kutoci assādanā ^a^V2.0110^ea^ siyā''ti, te dāni mayaṃ assādaṃ alabhamānā ^b^kākova selamāsajja nibbijjāpema gotamaṃ^eb^ āsajja tato gotamā nibbijja apemāti. evaṃ vadato kira mārassa satta vassāni nipphalaparissamaṃ nissāya balavasoko udapādi. tenassa visīdamānaṅgapaccaṅgassa beluvapaṇḍu nāma vīṇā kacchato patitā. yā ^a^P2.0394^ea^ sakiṃ kusalehi vāditā cattāro māse madhurassaraṃ muñcati, yaṃ gahetvā sakko pañcasikhassa adāsi. taṃ so patamānampi na bujjhi. tenāha bhagavā --
[21] ``tassa sokaparetassa, vīṇā kacchā abhassatha.
[22] tato so dummano yakkho, tatthevantaradhāyathā''ti..
[03] saṅgītikārakā āhaṃsūti eke, amhākaṃ panetaṃ nakkhamatīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya padhānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0111^ea^ ^a^M2.0122^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti subhāsitasuttaṃ. attajjhāsayato cassa uppatti. bhagavā hi subhāsitappiyo, so attano subhāsitasamudācārappakāsanena sattānaṃ dubbhāsitasamudācāraṃ paṭisedhento imaṃ suttamabhāsi. tattha ^b^evaṃ me suta^eb^ntiādi saṅgītikāravacanaṃ. tattha ^b^tatra kho bhagavā...pe0... bhadanteti te bhikkhū^eb^ti etaṃ apubbaṃ, sesaṃ vuttanayameva. tasmā apubbapadavaṇṇanatthamidaṃ vuccati -- ^b^tatrā^eb^ti desakālaparidīpanaṃ. tañhi yaṃ samayaṃ viharati, tatra samaye, yasmiñca ārāme viharati, tatra ārāmeti dīpeti. bhāsitabbayutte vā desakāle dīpeti. na hi bhagavā ayutte dese kāle vā dhammaṃ bhāsati. ``akālo kho, tāva, bāhiyā''tiādi (udā0 10) cettha sādhakaṃ. ^b^kho^eb^ti padapūraṇamatte avadhāraṇādikālatthe vā nipāto. ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti lokagaruparidīpanaṃ. bhikkhūti kathāsavanayuttapuggalaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^āmantesī^eb^ti ālapi abhāsi sambodhesi.

[03] ^b^bhikkhavo^eb^ti āmantanākāraparidīpanaṃ. tañca bhikkhanasīlatādiguṇayogasiddhattā vuttaṃ. tena nesaṃ hīnādhikajanasevitaṃ ^a^P2.0395^ea^ vuttiṃ pakāsento uddhatadīnabhāvaniggahaṃ karoti. ``bhikkhavo''ti iminā ca karuṇāvipphārasommahadayanayananipātapubbaṅgamena vacanena te attano mukhābhimukhe karitvā teneva kathetukamyatādīpakena vacanena tesaṃ sotukamyataṃ janeti, teneva ca sambodhanatthena vacanena sādhukasavanamanasikārepi te niyojeti. sādhukasavanamanasikārāyattā hi sāsanasampatti. aparesupi devamanussesu vijjamānesu kasmā bhikkhū eva āmantesīti ce? jeṭṭhaseṭṭhāsannasadāsannihitabhāvato. sabbaparisasādhāraṇā hi ayaṃ dhammadesanā, na pāṭipuggalikā. parisāya ca jeṭṭhā bhikkhū paṭhamuppannattā, seṭṭhā anagāriyabhāvaṃ ādiṃ katvā satthu cariyānuvidhāyakattā sakalasāsanapaṭiggāhakattā ca. āsannā tattha nisinnesu satthu santikattā, sadā sannihitā satthu santikāvacarattā. tena bhagavā sabbaparisasādhāraṇaṃ dhammaṃ desento bhikkhū eva āmantesi. apica bhājanaṃ te imāya kathāya yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattisabbhāvatotipi te eva ^a^M2.0123^ea^ āmantesi. ^b^bhadante^eb^ti gāravādhivacanametaṃ. ^b^te bhikkhū^eb^ti ye bhagavā āmantesi, te evaṃ bhagavantaṃ ālapantā bhagavato paccassosunti.

[03] ^b^catūhi^eb^ ^a^V2.0112^ea^ ^b^aṅgehī^eb^ti catūhi kāraṇehi avayavehi vā. musāvādāveramaṇiādīni hi cattāri subhāsitavācāya kāraṇāni. saccavacanādayo cattāro avayavā, kāraṇatthe ca aṅgasaddo. ^b^catūhī^eb^ti nissakkavacanaṃ hoti, avayavatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^samannāgatā^eb^ti samanuāgatā pavattā yuttā ca. ^b^vācā^eb^ti samullapanavācā. yā sā ``vācā girā byappatho''ti (dha0 sa0 636) ca, ``nelā kaṇṇasukhā''ti (dī0 ni0 1.9; ma0 ni0 3.14) ca evamādīsu āgacchati. yā pana ``vācāya ce kataṃ kamma''nti (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 1 kāyakammadvāra) evaṃ viññatti ca, ``yā catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati virati...pe0... ayaṃ vuccati sammāvācā''ti ^a^P2.0396^ea^ (dha0 sa0 299; vibha0 206) evaṃ virati ca, ``pharusavācā, bhikkhave, āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkatā nirayasaṃvattanikā hotī''ti (a0 ni0 8.40) evaṃ cetanā ca vācāti āgacchati, sā idha na adhippetā. kasmā? abhāsitabbato. ^b^subhāsitā hotī^eb^ti suṭṭhu bhāsitā hoti. tenassā atthāvahanataṃ dīpeti. ^b^na dubbhāsitā^eb^ti na duṭṭhu bhāsitā. tenassā anatthānāvahanataṃ dīpeti. ^b^anavajjā^eb^ti vajjasaṅkhātarāgādidosavirahitā. tenassā kāraṇasuddhiṃ vuttadosābhāvañca dīpeti. ^b^ananuvajjā cā^eb^ti anuvādavimuttā. tenassā sabbākārasampattiṃ dīpeti. ^b^viññūna^eb^nti paṇḍitānaṃ. tena nindāpasaṃsāsu bālā appamāṇāti dīpeti.

[03] ^b^katamehi catūhī^eb^ti kathetukamyatāpucchā. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane. ^b^bhikkhave^eb^ti yesaṃ kathetukāmo, tadālapanaṃ. ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti vuttappakāravācābhāsanakapuggalanidassanaṃ. ^b^subhāsitaṃyeva bhāsatī^eb^ti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya catūsu vācaṅgesu aññataraṅganiddesavacanaṃ. ^b^no dubbhāsita^eb^nti tasseva vācaṅgassa paṭipakkhabhāsananivāraṇaṃ. tena ``musāvādādayopi kadāci vattabbā''ti diṭṭhiṃ nisedheti. ``no dubbhāsita''nti iminā vā micchāvācappahānaṃ dīpeti, ``subhāsita''nti iminā pahīnamicchāvācena satā bhāsitabbavacanalakkhaṇaṃ. tathā pāpassa akaraṇaṃ, kusalassa upasampadaṃ ^a^M2.0124^ea^. aṅgaparidīpanatthaṃ pana abhāsitabbaṃ pubbe avatvā bhāsitabbamevāha. esa nayo ^b^dhammaṃyevā^eb^tiādīsupi.

[03] ettha ca ``subhāsitaṃyeva bhāsati no dubbhāsita''nti iminā pisuṇadosarahitaṃ samaggakaraṇavacanaṃ vuttaṃ, ``dhammaṃyeva bhāsati no adhamma''nti iminā samphadosarahitaṃ dhammato anapetaṃ mantāvacanaṃ vuttaṃ, itarehi dvīhi pharusālikarahitāni piyasaccavacanāni vuttāni. ^b^imehi kho^eb^tiādinā pana tāni aṅgāni paccakkhato dassento taṃ vācaṃ nigameti. visesato cettha ``imehi kho, bhikkhave ^a^P2.0397^ea^, catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā subhāsitā hotī''ti bhaṇanto ^a^V2.0113^ea^ yadaññe paṭiññādīhi avayavehi nāmādīhi padehi liṅgavacanavibhattikālakārakādīhi sampattīhi ca samannāgataṃ vācaṃ ``subhāsita''nti maññanti, taṃ dhammato paṭisedheti. avayavādisampannāpi hi pesuññādisamannāgatā vācā dubbhāsitāva hoti attano paresañca anatthāvahattā. imehi pana catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā sacepi milakkhubhāsāpariyāpannā ghaṭaceṭikāgītikapariyāpannā vā hoti, tathāpi subhāsitā eva lokiyalokuttarahitasukhāvahattā. sīhaḷadīpe maggapasse sassaṃ rakkhantiyā sīhaḷaceṭikāya sīhaḷakeneva jātijarāmaraṇapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ gītaṃ gāyantiyā sutvā maggaṃ gacchantā saṭṭhimattā vipassakabhikkhū cettha arahattaṃ pattā nidassanaṃ. tathā tisso nāma āraddhavipassako bhikkhu padumasarasamīpena gacchanto padumasare padumāni bhañjitvā bhañjitvā --
[21] ``pāto phullaṃ kokanadaṃ, sūriyālokena bhajjiyate.
[22] evaṃ manussattagatā sattā, jarābhivegena maddīyantī''ti.. --
[25] imaṃ gītaṃ gāyantiyā ceṭikāya sutvā arahattaṃ patto, buddhantare ca aññataro puriso sattahi puttehi saddhiṃ vanā āgamma aññatarāya itthiyā musalena taṇḍule koṭṭentiyā --
[21] ``jarāya ^a^M2.0125^ea^ parimadditaṃ etaṃ, milātachavicammanissitaṃ.
[22] maraṇena bhijjati etaṃ, maccussa ghasamāmisaṃ..
[21] ``kimīnaṃ ālayaṃ etaṃ, nānākuṇapena pūritaṃ.
[22] asucissa bhājanaṃ etaṃ, kadalikkhandhasamaṃ ida''nti.. --

[25] imaṃ ^a^P2.0398^ea^ gītikaṃ sutvā saha puttehi paccekabodhiṃ patto, aññe ca īdisehi upāyehi ariyabhūmiṃ pattā nidassanaṃ. anacchariyaṃ panetaṃ, yaṃ bhagavatā āsayānusayakusalena ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''tiādinā nayena vuttā gāthāyo sutvā pañcasatā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, aññe ca khandhāyatanādipaṭisaṃyuttā kathā sutvā aneke devamanussāti. evaṃ imehi catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā sacepi milakkhubhāsāpariyāpannā, ghaṭaceṭikāgītikapariyāpannā vā hoti, tathāpi ``subhāsitā''ti veditabbā. subhāsitattā eva ca anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnaṃ atthatthikānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ atthapaṭisaraṇānaṃ, no byañjanapaṭisaraṇānanti.

[03] ^b^idamavoca^eb^ ^a^V2.0114^ea^ ^b^bhagavā^eb^ti idaṃ subhāsitalakkhaṇaṃ bhagavā avoca. ^b^idaṃ vatvāna sugato, athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā^eb^ti idañca lakkhaṇaṃ vatvā atha aññampi etaṃ avoca satthā. idāni vattabbagāthaṃ dassetvā sabbametaṃ saṅgītikārakā āhaṃsu. tattha ^b^apara^eb^nti gāthābandhavacanaṃ sandhāya vuccati. taṃ duvidhaṃ hoti -- pacchā āgataparisaṃ assavanasussavanāadhāraṇadaḷhīkaraṇādīni vā sandhāya tadatthadīpakameva ca. pubbe kenaci kāraṇena parihāpitassa atthassa dīpanena atthavisesadīpakañca ``purisassa hi jātassa, kuṭhārī jāyate mukhe''tiādīsu (su0 ni0 662) viya. idha pana tadatthadīpakameva.

[03] 453^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^santo^eb^ti buddhādayo. te hi subhāsitaṃ ``uttamaṃ seṭṭha''nti vaṇṇayanti. ^b^dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catuttha^eb^nti idaṃ pana pubbe niddiṭṭhakkamaṃ upādāya vuttaṃ. gāthāpariyosāne pana vaṅgīsatthero bhagavato subhāsite pasīdi.

[03] so yaṃ pasannākāraṃ akāsi, yañca vacanaṃ bhagavā abhāsi, taṃ dassentā saṅgītikārakā ^b^``atha kho āyasmā''^eb^tiādimāhaṃsu. tattha ^a^M2.0126^ea^ ^b^paṭibhāti ma^eb^nti mama bhāgo pakāsati ^a^P2.0399^ea^. ^b^paṭibhātu ta^eb^nti tava bhāgo pakāsatu. ^b^sāruppāhī^eb^ti anucchavikāhi. ^b^abhitthavī^eb^ti pasaṃsi.

[03] 454^b^.^eb^ ^b^na tāpaye^eb^ti vippaṭisārena na tāpeyya. ^b^na vihiṃseyyā^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ bhindanto na bādheyya. ^b^sā ve vācā^eb^ti sā vācā ekaṃseneva subhāsitā. ettāvatā apisuṇavācāya bhagavantaṃ thometi.

[03] 455^b^.^eb^ ^b^paṭinanditā^eb^ti haṭṭhena hadayena paṭimukhaṃ gantvā nanditā sampiyāyitā. ^b^yaṃ anādāya pāpāni, paresaṃ bhāsate piya^eb^nti yaṃ vācaṃ bhāsanto paresaṃ pāpāni appiyāni paṭikkūlāni pharusavacanāni anādāya atthabyañjanamadhuraṃ piyameva vacanaṃ bhāsati, taṃ piyavācameva bhāseyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. imāya gāthāya piyavacanena bhagavantaṃ abhitthavi.

[03] 456^b^.^eb^ ^b^amatā^eb^ti amatasadisā sādubhāvena. vuttampi cetaṃ ``saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ rasāna''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.73; su0 ni0 184). nibbānāmatapaccayattā vā amatā. ^b^esa dhammo sanantano^eb^ti yāyaṃ saccavācā nāma, esa porāṇo dhammo cariyā paveṇī, idameva hi porāṇānaṃ āciṇṇaṃ, na te alikaṃ bhāsiṃsu. tenevāha -- ^b^``sacce atthe ca dhamme ca, ahu ^a^V2.0115^ea^ santo patiṭṭhitā''^eb^ti. tattha sacce patiṭṭhitattā eva attano ca paresañca atthe patiṭṭhitā. atthe patiṭṭhitattā eva ca dhamme patiṭṭhitā hontīti veditabbā. paraṃ vā dvayaṃ saccavisesanamicceva veditabbaṃ. sacce patiṭṭhitā. kīdise? ^b^atthe ca dhamme ca,^eb^ yaṃ paresaṃ atthato anapetattā atthaṃ anuparodhaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti. satipi ca anuparodhakaratte dhammato anapetattā dhammaṃ, yaṃ dhammikameva atthaṃ sādhetīti vuttaṃ hoti. imāya gāthāya saccavacanena bhagavantaṃ abhitthavi.

[03] 457^b^.^eb^ ^b^khema^eb^nti abhayaṃ nirupaddavaṃ. kena kāraṇenāti ce? ^b^nibbānappattiyā dukkhassantakiriyāya,^eb^ yasmā kilesanibbānaṃ pāpeti, vaṭṭadukkhassa ca antakiriyāya saṃvattatīti attho. atha vā yaṃ buddho nibbānappattiyā dukkhassantakiriyāyāti dvinnaṃ nibbānadhātūnamatthāya khemamaggappakāsanato khemaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, ^b^sā ve vācānamuttamā^eb^ti sā vācā sabbavācānaṃ ^a^P2.0400^ea^ seṭṭhāti ^a^M2.0127^ea^ evamettha attho veditabbo. imāya gāthāya mantāvacanena bhagavantaṃ abhitthavanto arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti ayamettha apubbapadavaṇṇanā. sesaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya subhāsitasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0116^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti pūraḷāsasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? bhagavā pacchābhattakiccāvasāne buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento sundarikabhāradvājabrāhmaṇaṃ arahattassa upanissayasampannaṃ disvā ``tattha mayi gate kathā pavattissati, tato kathāvasāne dhammadesanaṃ sutvā esa brāhmaṇo pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī''ti ca ñatvā tattha gantvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā imaṃ suttamabhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^evaṃ me suta^eb^ntiādi saṅgītikārakānaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^kiṃjacco bhava^eb^ntiādi tassa brāhmaṇassa, ^b^na brāhmaṇo nomhī^eb^tiādi bhagavato. taṃ sabbampi samodhānetvā ``pūraḷāsasutta''nti vuccati. tattha vuttasadisaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, avuttaṃ vaṇṇayissāma, tañca kho uttānatthāni padāni anāmasantā. ^b^kosalesū^eb^ti kosalā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā. tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhisaddena ``kosalā''ti vuccati. tasmiṃ kosalesu janapade. keci pana ``yasmā pubbe mahāpanādaṃ rājakumāraṃ nānānāṭakādīni disvā sitamattampi akarontaṃ sutvā rājā āṇāpesi `yo mama puttaṃ hasāpeti, sabbābharaṇehi naṃ alaṅkaromī'ti. tato naṅgalāni chaḍḍetvā mahājanakāyo sannipati. te ca manussā atirekasattavassāni nānākīḷikādayo dassentāpi taṃ nāsakkhiṃsu hasāpetuṃ. tato sakko devanaṭaṃ pesesi, so dibbanāṭakaṃ ^a^P2.0401^ea^ dassetvā hasāpesi. atha te manussā attano attano vasanokāsābhimukhā pakkamiṃsu. te paṭipathe mittasuhajjādayo disvā paṭisanthāramakaṃsu `kacci bho kusalaṃ, kacci bho kusala'nti ^a^M2.0128^ea^. tasmā taṃ `kusala'nti saddaṃ upādāya so padeso `kosalo'ti vuccatī''ti vaṇṇayanti. ^b^sundarikāya nadiyā tīre^eb^ti sundarikāti evaṃnāmikāya nadiyā tīre.

[03] ^b^tena kho panā^eb^ti yena samayena bhagavā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vinetukāmo gantvā tassā nadiyā tīre sasīsaṃ pārupitvā rukkhamūle nisajjāsaṅkhātena iriyāpathavihārena viharati. ^b^sundarikabhāradvājo^eb^ti so brāhmaṇo tassā nadiyā tīre vasati aggiñca juhati, bhāradvājoti cassa gottaṃ, tasmā evaṃ vuccati. ^b^aggiṃ juhatī^eb^ti āhutipakkhipanena jāleti. ^b^aggihuttaṃ paricaratī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0117^ea^ agyāyatanaṃ sammajjanūpalepanabalikammādinā payirupāsati. ^b^ko nu kho imaṃ habyasesaṃ bhuñjeyyā^eb^ti so kira brāhmaṇo aggimhi juhitvā avasesaṃ pāyāsaṃ disvā cintesi -- ``aggimhi tāva pakkhittapāyāso mahābrahmunā bhutto, ayaṃ pana avaseso atthi. taṃ yadi brahmuno mukhato jātassa brāhmaṇasseva dadeyyaṃ, evaṃ me pitarā saha puttopi santappito bhaveyya, suvisodhito ca brahmalokagāmimaggo assa, handāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ gavesāmī''ti. tato brāhmaṇadassanatthaṃ uṭṭhāyāsanā catuddisā anuvilokesi -- ``ko nu kho imaṃ habyasesaṃ bhuñjeyyā''ti.

[03] ^b^aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle^eb^ti tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe seṭṭharukkhamūle. ^b^sasīsaṃ pāruta^eb^nti saha sīsena pārutakāyaṃ. kasmā pana bhagavā evamakāsi, kiṃ nārāyanasaṅkhātabalopi hutvā nāsakkhi himapātaṃ sītavātañca paṭibāhitunti? atthetaṃ kāraṇaṃ. na hi buddhā sabbaso kāyapaṭijagganaṃ karonti eva, apica bhagavā ``āgate brāhmaṇe sīsaṃ vivarissāmi, maṃ disvā brāhmaṇo kathaṃ pavattessati, athassa kathānusārena dhammaṃ desessāmī''ti kathāpavattanatthaṃ evamakāsi. ^b^disvāna vāmena...pe0... tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0402^ea^ so kira bhagavantaṃ disvā brāhmaṇo ``ayaṃ sasīsaṃ pārupitvā sabbarattiṃ padhānamanuyutto, imassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā imaṃ habyasesaṃ dassāmī''ti brāhmaṇasaññī hutvā eva upasaṅkami. ^b^muṇḍo ayaṃ bhavaṃ, muṇḍako ayaṃ bhava^eb^nti sīse vivaritamatteva kesantaṃ disvā ``muṇḍo''ti āha. tato suṭṭhutaraṃ olokento parittampi sikhaṃ adisvā ^a^M2.0129^ea^ hīḷento ``muṇḍako''ti āha. evarūpā hi nesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ diṭṭhi. ^b^tato vā^eb^ti yattha ṭhito addasa, tamhā padesā ^b^muṇḍāpī^eb^ti kenaci kāraṇena muṇḍitasīsāpi honti.

[03] 458^b^.^eb^ ^b^na brāhmaṇo nomhī^eb^ti ettha ^b^na^eb^kāro paṭisedhe, ^b^no^eb^kāro avadhāraṇe ``na no sama''ntiādīsu (khu0 pā0 6.3; su0 ni0 226) viya. tena nevamhi brāhmaṇoti dasseti. ^b^na rājaputto^eb^ti khattiyo namhi. ^b^na vessāyano^eb^ti vessopi namhi. ^b^udakoci nomhī^eb^ti aññopi suddo vā caṇḍālo vā koci na homīti evaṃ ekaṃseneva jātivādasamudācāraṃ paṭikkhipati. kasmā? mahāsamuddaṃ pattā viya hi nadiyo pabbajjūpagatā kulaputtā jahanti purimāni nāmagottāni. pahārādasuttañcettha (a0 ni0 8.19) sādhakaṃ. evaṃ jātivādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā yathābhūtamattānaṃ āvikaronto āha -- ^b^``gottaṃ pariññāya puthujjanānaṃ, akiñcano manta carāmi loke''^eb^ti. kathaṃ gottaṃ pariññāsīti ce? bhagavā hi tīhi pariññāhi pañcakkhandhe pariññāsi, tesu ca pariññātesu gottaṃ pariññātameva hoti. rāgādikiñcanānaṃ pana abhāvena so akiñcano mantā jānitvā ñāṇānuparivattīhi kāyakammādīhi ^a^V2.0118^ea^ carati. tenāha -- ``gottaṃ...pe0... loke''ti. mantā vuccati paññā, tāya cesa carati. tenevāha -- ``mantaṃ carāmi loke''ti chandavasena rassaṃ katvā.

[03] 459-60^b^.^eb^ evaṃ attānaṃ āvikatvā idāni ``evaṃ oḷārikaṃ liṅgampi disvā pucchitabbāpucchitabbaṃ na jānāsī''ti brāhmaṇassa upārambhaṃ āropento āha -- ``saṅghāṭivāsī...pe0... gottapañha''nti. ettha ca chinnasaṅghaṭitaṭṭhena tīṇipi cīvarāni ``saṅghāṭī''ti adhippetāni, tāni nivāseti paridahatīti ^a^P2.0403^ea^ ^b^saṅghāṭivāsī. agaho^eb^ti ageho, nittaṇhoti adhippāyo. nivāsāgāraṃ pana bhagavato jetavane mahāgandhakuṭikarerimaṇḍalamāḷakosambakuṭicandanamālādianekappakāraṃ, taṃ sandhāya na yujjati. ^b^nivuttakeso^eb^ti apanītakeso, ohāritakesamassūti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^abhinibbutatto^eb^ti atīva vūpasantapariḷāhacitto, guttacitto vā. ^b^alippamāno idha māṇavehī^eb^ti upakaraṇasinehassa pahīnattā manussehi alitto asaṃsaṭṭho ekantavivitto. ^b^akallaṃ maṃ brāhmaṇā^eb^ti yvāhaṃ ^a^M2.0130^ea^ evaṃ saṅghāṭivāsī...pe0... alippamāno idha māṇavehi, taṃ maṃ tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, pākatikāni nāmagottāni atītaṃ pabbajitaṃ samānaṃ appatirūpaṃ gottapañhaṃ pucchasīti.

[03] evaṃ vutte upārambhaṃ mocento brāhmaṇo āha -- ^b^pucchanti ve, bho brāhmaṇā, brāhmaṇebhi saha ``brāhmaṇo no bhava''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^brāhmaṇo no^eb^ti brāhmaṇo nūti attho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- nāhaṃ bho akallaṃ pucchāmi. amhākañhi brāhmaṇasamaye brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇehi saha samāgantvā ``brāhmaṇo nu bhavaṃ, bhāradvājo nu bhava''nti evaṃ jātimpi gottampi pucchanti evāti.

[03] 461-2^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vutte bhagavā brāhmaṇassa cittamudubhāvakaraṇatthaṃ mantesu attano pakataññutaṃ pakāsento āha -- ^b^``brāhmaṇo hi ce tvaṃ brūsi...pe0... catuvīsatakkhara''^eb^nti. tassattho -- sace tvaṃ ``brāhmaṇo ahaṃ''ti brūsi, mañca abrāhmaṇaṃ brūsi, tasmā bhavantaṃ sāvittiṃ pucchāmi tipadaṃ catuvīsatakkharaṃ, taṃ me brūhīti. ettha ca bhagavā paramatthavedānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ ādibhūtaṃ paramatthabrāhmaṇehi sabbabuddhehi pakāsitaṃ atthasampannaṃ byañjanasampannañca ``buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī''ti imaṃ ariyasāvittiṃ sandhāya pucchati. yadipi hi brāhmaṇo aññaṃ vadeyya, addhā naṃ bhagavā ``nāyaṃ, brāhmaṇa, ariyassa vinaye sāvittīti vuccatī''ti tassa asārakattaṃ dassetvā idheva patiṭṭhāpeyya. brāhmaṇo pana ``sāvittiṃ pucchāmi tipadaṃ ^a^P2.0404^ea^ catuvīsatakkhara''nti idaṃ attano samayasiddhaṃ sāvittilakkhaṇabyañjanakaṃ brahmassarena nicchāritavacanaṃ sutvāva ``addhāyaṃ samaṇo brāhmaṇasamaye ^a^V2.0119^ea^ niṭṭhaṃ gato, ahaṃ pana aññāṇena `abrāhmaṇo aya'nti paribhaviṃ, sādhurūpo mantapāragū brāhmaṇova eso''ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā ``handa naṃ yaññavidhiṃ dakkhiṇeyyavidhiñca pucchāmī''ti tamatthaṃ pucchanto ^b^``kiṃnissitā...pe0... loke''^eb^ti imaṃ visamagāthāpadattayamāha. tassattho -- kiṃnissitā kimadhippāyā kiṃ patthentā isayo ca khattiyā ca brāhmaṇā ca aññe ca manujā devatānaṃ atthāya yaññaṃ akappayiṃsu. ^b^yaññamakappayiṃsū^eb^ti makāro padasandhikaro. ^b^akappayiṃsū^eb^ti saṃvidahiṃsu akaṃsu. ^b^puthū^eb^ti bahū annapānadānādinā bhedena anekappakāre puthū vā isayo manujā khattiyā brāhmaṇā ca kiṃnissitā ^a^M2.0131^ea^ yaññamakappayiṃsu. kathaṃ nesaṃ taṃ kammaṃ samijjhatīti iminādhippāyena pucchati.

[03] 463^b^.^eb^ athassa bhagavā tamatthaṃ byākaronto ^b^``yadantagū vedagū yaññakāle^eb^. ^b^yassāhutiṃ labhe tassijjheti brūmī''^eb^ti idaṃ sesapadadvayamāha. tattha ^b^yadantagū^eb^ti yo antagū, okārassa akāro, dakāro ca padasandhikaro ``asādhāraṇamaññesa''ntiādīsu (khu0 pā0 8.9) makāro viya. ayaṃ pana attho -- yo vaṭṭadukkhassa tīhi pariññāhi antagatattā ^b^antagū,^eb^ catūhi ca maggañāṇavedehi kilese vijjhitvā gatattā ^b^vedagū,^eb^ so ^b^yassa^eb^ isimanujakhattiyabrāhmaṇānaṃ aññatarassa yaññakāle yasmiṃ kismiñci āhāre paccupaṭṭhite antamaso vanapaṇṇamūlaphalādimhipi ^b^āhutiṃ labhe,^eb^ tato kiñci deyyadhammaṃ labheyya, ^b^tassa^eb^ taṃ yaññakammaṃ ^b^ijjhe^eb^ samijjheyya, mahapphalaṃ bhaveyyāti ^b^brūmī^eb^ti.

[03] 464^b^.^eb^ atha brāhmaṇo taṃ bhagavato paramatthayogagambhīraṃ atimadhuragiranibbikārasarasampannaṃ desanaṃ sutvā ^a^P2.0405^ea^ sarīrasampattisūcitañcassa sabbaguṇasampattiṃ sambhāvayamāno pītisomanassajāto ^b^``addhā hi tassā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^iti brāhmaṇo^eb^ti saṅgītikārānaṃ vacanaṃ, sesaṃ brāhmaṇassa. tassattho -- ^b^addhā hi tassa^eb^ mayhaṃ ^b^hutamijjhe,^eb^ ayaṃ ajja deyyadhammo ijjhissati samijjhissati mahapphalo bhavissati ^b^yaṃ tādisaṃ vedagumaddasāma,^eb^ yasmā tādisaṃ bhavantarūpaṃ vedaguṃ addasāma. tvaññeva hi so vedagū, na añño. ito pubbe pana ^b^tumhādisānaṃ^eb^ vedagūnaṃ antagūnañca ^b^adassanena^eb^ amhādisānaṃ yaññe paṭiyattaṃ ^b^añño jano bhuñjati pūraḷāsaṃ^eb^ carukañca pūvañcāti.

[03] 465^b^.^eb^ tato bhagavā attani pasannaṃ vacanapaṭiggahaṇasajjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ viditvā yathāssa suṭṭhu pākaṭā honti, evaṃ nānappakārehi dakkhiṇeyye pakāsetukāmo ^b^``tasmātiha tva''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tassattho -- yasmā mayi pasannosi, ^b^tasmā^eb^ pana ^b^iha tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, upasaṅkamma pucchā^eb^ti attānaṃ ^a^V2.0120^ea^ dassento āha. idāni ito pubbaṃ atthenātthikapadaṃ parapadena sambandhitabbaṃ -- atthena atthiko tassa atthatthikabhāvassa anurūpaṃ kilesaggivūpasamena ^b^santaṃ,^eb^ kodhadhūmavigamena ^b^vidhūmaṃ,^eb^ dukkhābhāvena ^a^M2.0132^ea^ ^b^anīghaṃ,^eb^ anekavidhāasābhāvena ^b^nirāsaṃ appevidha^eb^ ekaṃsena idha ṭhitova idha vā sāsane ^b^abhivinde^eb^ lacchasi adhigacchissasi ^b^sumedhaṃ^eb^ varapaññaṃ khīṇāsavadakkhiṇeyyanti. atha vā yasmā mayi pasannosi, tasmātiha, tvaṃ brāhmaṇa, atthena atthiko samāno upasaṅkamma puccha santaṃ vidhūmaṃ anīghaṃ nirāsanti attānaṃ dassento āha. evaṃ pucchanto appevidha abhivinde sumedhaṃ khīṇāsavadakkhiṇeyyanti evampettha yojanā veditabbā.

[03] 466^b^.^eb^ atha brāhmaṇo yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno bhagavantaṃ āha -- ^b^``yaññe ratohaṃ...pe0... brūhi meta''^eb^nti. tattha yañño yāgo dānanti atthato ekaṃ. tasmā ^a^P2.0406^ea^ dānarato ahaṃ, tāya eva dānārāmatāya dānaṃ dātukāmo, na pana jānāmi, evaṃ ajānantaṃ anusāsatu maṃ bhavaṃ. anusāsanto ca uttāneneva nayena yattha hutaṃ ijjhate brūhi metanti evamettha atthayojanā veditabbā. ``yathāhuta''ntipi pāṭho.

[03] 467^b^.^eb^ athassa bhagavā vattukāmo āha -- ^b^``tena hi...pe0... desessāmī''^eb^ti. ohitasotassa cassa anusāsanatthaṃ tāva ``mā jātiṃ pucchī''ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^mā jātiṃ pucchī^eb^ti yadi hutasamiddhiṃ dānamahapphalataṃ paccāsīsasi, jātiṃ mā puccha. akāraṇañhi dakkhiṇeyyavicāraṇāya jāti. ^b^caraṇañca pucchā^eb^ti apica kho sīlādiguṇabhedaṃ caraṇaṃ puccha. etañhi dakkhiṇeyyavicāraṇāya kāraṇaṃ.

[03] idānissa tamatthaṃ vibhāvento nidassanamāha -- ^b^``kaṭṭhā have jāyati jātavedo''^eb^tiādi. tatrāyamadhippāyo -- idha kaṭṭhā aggi jāyati, na ca so sālādikaṭṭhā jāto eva aggikiccaṃ karoti, sāpānadoṇiādikaṭṭhā jāto na karoti, apica kho attano acciādiguṇasampannattā eva karoti. evaṃ na brāhmaṇakulādīsu jāto eva dakkhiṇeyyo hoti, caṇḍālakulādīsu jāto na hoti, apica kho ^b^nīcākulīnopi^eb^ uccākulīnopi khīṇāsava^b^muni dhitimā hirīnisedho ājāniyo hoti,^eb^ imāya dhitihiripamukhāya guṇasampattiyā jātimā uttamadakkhiṇeyyo hoti. so hi dhitiyā guṇe dhārayati, hiriyā dose nisedheti. vuttañcetaṃ ``hiriyā hi santo na karonti pāpa''nti. tena te brūmi --
[21] ``mā ^a^V2.0121^ea^ ^a^M2.0133^ea^ jātiṃ pucchī caraṇañca puccha,
[27] kaṭṭhā have jāyati jātavedo.
[26] nīcākulīnopi munī dhitīmā,
[22] ājāniyo hoti hirīnisedho''ti.. --
[25] esa saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana assalāyanasuttānusārena (ma0 ni0 2.401 ādayo) veditabbo.

[03] 468^b^.^eb^ evametaṃ ^a^P2.0407^ea^ bhagavā cātuvaṇṇisuddhiyā anusāsitvā idāni yattha hutaṃ ijjhate, yathā ca hutaṃ ijjhate, tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``saccena danto''^eb^tiādigāthamāha. tattha ^b^saccenā^eb^ti paramatthasaccena. tañhi patto danto hoti. tenāha -- ``saccena danto''ti. ^b^damasā upeto^eb^ti indriyadamena samannāgato. ^b^vedantagū^eb^ti vedehi vā kilesānaṃ antaṃ gato, vedānaṃ vā antaṃ catutthamaggañāṇaṃ gato. ^b^vūsitabrahmacariyo^eb^ti puna vasitabbābhāvato vutthamaggabrahmacariyo. ^b^kālena tamhi habyaṃ pavecche^eb^ti attano deyyadhammaṭṭhitakālaṃ tassa sammukhībhāvakālañca upalakkhetvā tena kālena tādise dakkhiṇeyye deyyadhammaṃ paveccheyya, paveseyya paṭipādeyya.

[03] 469-71^b^.^eb^ ^b^kāme^eb^ti vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca. ^b^susamāhitindriyā^eb^ti suṭṭhu samāhitaindriyā, avikkhittaindriyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^candova rāhuggahaṇā pamuttā^eb^ti yathā cando rāhuggahaṇā, evaṃ kilesaggahaṇā pamuttā ye atīva bhāsanti ceva tapanti ca. ^b^satā^eb^ti satisampannā. ^b^mamāyitānī^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhimamāyitāni.

[03] 472^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo kāme hitvā^eb^ti ito pabhuti attānaṃ sandhāya vadati. tattha ^b^kāme hitvā^eb^ti kilesakāme pahāya. ^b^abhibhuyyacārī^eb^ti tesaṃ pahīnattā vatthukāme abhibhuyyacārī. ^b^jātimaraṇassa antaṃ^eb^ nāma nibbānaṃ vuccati, tañca ^b^yo vedi^eb^ attano paññābalena aññāsi. ^b^udakarahado vā^eb^ti ye ime anotattadaho kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinidaho sīhappapātadahoti himavati satta mahārahadā aggisūriyasantāpehi asamphuṭṭhattā ^a^M2.0134^ea^ niccaṃ sītalā, tesaṃ aññataro udakarahadova sīto parinibbutakilesapariḷāhattā.

[03] 473^b^.^eb^ ^b^samo^eb^ti tulyo. ^b^samehī^eb^ti vipassiādīhi buddhehi. te hi paṭivedhasamattā ``samā''ti vuccanti. natthi tesaṃ paṭivedhenādhigantabbesu guṇesu, pahātabbesu vā dosesu vemattatā ^a^V2.0122^ea^, addhānāayukulappamāṇābhinikkhamanapadhānabodhirasmīhi pana nesaṃ vemattatā hoti. tathā hi te heṭṭhimaparicchedena ^a^P2.0408^ea^ catūhi asaṅkhyeyyehi kappasatasahassena ca pāramiyo pūrenti, uparimaparicchedena soḷasahi asaṅkhyeyyehi kappasatasahassena ca. ayaṃ nesaṃ ^b^addhānavemattatā^eb^. heṭṭhimaparicchedena ca vassasatāyukakāle uppajjanti, uparimaparicchedena vassasatasahassāyukakāle. ayaṃ nesaṃ ^b^āyuvemattatā^eb^. khattiyakule vā brāhmaṇakule vā uppajjanti. ayaṃ ^b^kulavemattatā^eb^. uccā vā honti aṭṭhāsītihatthappamāṇā, nīcā vā pannarasāṭṭhārasahatthappamāṇā. ayaṃ ^b^pamāṇavemattatā^eb^. hatthiassarathasivikādīhi nikkhamanti vehāsena vā. tathā hi vipassikakusandhā assarathena nikkhamiṃsu, sikhīkoṇāgamanā hatthikkhandhena, vessabhū sivikāya, kassapo vehāsena, sakyamuni assapiṭṭhiyā. ayaṃ ^b^nekkhammavemattatā^eb^. sattāhaṃ vā padhānamanuyuñjanti, aḍḍhamāsaṃ, māsaṃ, dvemāsaṃ, temāsaṃ, catumāsaṃ, pañcamāsaṃ, chamāsaṃ, ekavassaṃ dviticatupañcachavassāni vā. ayaṃ ^b^padhānavemattatā^eb^. assattho vā bodhirukkho hoti nigrodhādīnaṃ vā aññataro. ayaṃ ^b^bodhivemattatā^eb^. byāmāsītianantapabhāyuttā honti. tattha byāmappabhā vā asītippabhā vā sabbesaṃ samānā, anantappabhā pana dūrampi gacchati āsannampi, ekagāvutaṃ dvigāvutaṃ yojanaṃ anekayojanaṃ cakkavāḷapariyantampi, maṅgalassa buddhassa sarīrappabhā dasasahassacakkavāḷaṃ agamāsi. evaṃ santepi manasā cintāyattāva sabbabuddhānaṃ, yo yattakamicchati, tassa tattakaṃ gacchati. ayaṃ ^b^rasmivemattatā^eb^. imā aṭṭha vemattatā ṭhapetvā avasesesu paṭivedhenādhigantabbesu guṇesu, pahātabbesu vā dosesu natthi nesaṃ viseso, tasmā ``samā''ti vuccanti. evametehi samo samehi.

[03] ^b^visamehi^eb^ ^a^M2.0135^ea^ ^b^dūre^eb^ti na samā visamā, paccekabuddhādayo avasesasabbasattā. tehi visamehi asadisatāya dūre. sakalajambudīpaṃ pūretvā pallaṅkena pallaṅkaṃ saṅghaṭṭetvā nisinnā paccekabuddhāpi hi guṇehi ekassa sammāsambuddhassa kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasiṃ ^a^P2.0409^ea^, ko pana vādo sāvakādīsu. tenāha -- ``visamehi dūre''ti. ^b^tathāgato hotī^eb^ti ubhayapadehi dūreti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^anantapañño^eb^ti aparimitapañño. lokiyamanussānañhi paññaṃ upanidhāya aṭṭhamakassa paññā adhikā, tassa paññaṃ upanidhāya sotāpannassa. evaṃ yāva arahato paññaṃ upanidhāya paccekabuddhassa paññā adhikā, paccekabuddhassa paññaṃ pana upanidhāya tathāgatassa paññā adhikāti na vattabbā, anantā icceva pana vattabbā. tenāha -- ``anantapañño''ti. ^b^anūpalitto^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhilepehi alitto. ^b^idha vā huraṃ vā^eb^ti idhaloke vā paraloke vā. yojanā panettha -- samo samehi visamehi dūre tathāgato hoti. kasmā? yasmā anantapañño anupalitto idha vā huraṃ vā, tena tathāgato arahati pūraḷāsanti.

[03] 474^b^.^eb^ ^b^yamhi^eb^ ^a^V2.0123^ea^ ^b^na māyā^eb^ti ayaṃ pana gāthā aññā ca īdisā māyādidosayuttesu brāhmaṇesu dakkhiṇeyyasaññāpahānatthaṃ vuttāti veditabbā. tattha ^b^amamo^eb^ti sattasaṅkhāresu ``idaṃ mamā''ti pahīnamamāyitabhāvo.

[03] 475^b^.^eb^ ^b^nivesana^eb^nti taṇhādiṭṭhinivesanaṃ. tena hi mano tīsu bhavesu nivisati, tena taṃ ``nivesanaṃ manaso''ti vuccati. tattheva vā nivisati taṃ hitvā gantuṃ asamatthatāya. tenapi ``nivesana''nti vuccati. ^b^pariggahā^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhiyo eva, tāhi pariggahitadhammā vā. ^b^kecī^eb^ti appamattakāpi. ^b^anupādiyāno^eb^ti tesaṃ nivesanapariggahānaṃ abhāvā kañci dhammaṃ anupādiyamāno.
[03] 476^b^.^eb^ ^b^samāhito^eb^ maggasamādhinā. ^b^udatārī^eb^ti uttiṇṇo. ^b^dhammaṃ caññāsī^eb^ti sabbañca ñeyyadhammaṃ aññāsi. ^b^paramāya diṭṭhiyā^eb^ti sabbaññutaññāṇena.

[03] 477^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhavāsavā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0136^ea^ bhavataṇhājhānanikantisassatadiṭṭhisahagatā rāgā. ^b^vacī^eb^ti vācā. ^b^kharā^eb^ti kakkhaḷā pharusā. ^b^vidhūpitā^eb^ti daḍḍhā. ^b^atthagatā^eb^ti atthaṅgatā. ^b^na santī^eb^ti vidhūpitattā atthaṅgatattā ca. ubhayehi pana ubhayaṃ yojetabbaṃ ^b^sabbadhī^eb^ti sabbesu khandhāyatanādīsu.
[03] 478^b^.^eb^ ^b^mānasattesū^eb^ti mānena laggesu. ^b^dukkhaṃ pariññāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā. ^b^sakhettavatthu^eb^nti sahetupaccayaṃ, saddhiṃ kammakilesehīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 479^b^.^eb^ ^b^āsaṃ anissāyā^eb^ti taṇhaṃ anallīyitvā. ^b^vivekadassī^eb^ti ^a^P2.0410^ea^ nibbānadassī. ^b^paravediya^eb^nti parehi ñāpetabbaṃ. ^b^diṭṭhimupātivatto^eb^ti dvāsaṭṭhibhedampi micchādiṭṭhiṃ atikkanto. ^b^ārammaṇā^eb^ti paccayā, punabbhavakāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 480^b^.^eb^ ^b^paroparā^eb^ti varāvarā sundarāsundarā. parā vā bāhirā, aparā ajjhattikā. ^b^sameccā^eb^ti ñāṇena paṭivijjhitvā. ^b^dhammā^eb^ti khandhāyatanādayo dhammā. ^b^upādānakhaye vimutto^eb^ti nibbāne nibbānārammaṇato vimutto, nibbānārammaṇavimuttilābhīti attho.

[03] 481^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṃyojanaṃjātikhayantadassī^eb^ti saṃyojanakkhayantadassī jātikkhayantadassī ca. saṃyojanakkhayantena cettha saupādisesā nibbānadhātu, jātikkhayantena anupādisesā vuttā. khayantoti hi accantakhayassa samucchedappahānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. anunāsikalopo cettha ``vivekajaṃ ^a^V2.0124^ea^ pītisukha''ntiādīsu viya na kato. ^b^yopānudī^eb^ti yo apanudi. ^b^rāgapatha^eb^nti rāgārammaṇaṃ, rāgameva vā. rāgopi hi duggatīnaṃ pathattā ``rāgapatho''ti vuccati kammapatho viya. ^b^suddho nidoso vimalo akāco^eb^ti parisuddhakāyasamācārāditāya ^b^suddho^eb^. yehi ``rāgadosā ayaṃ pajā, dosadosā, mohadosā''ti vuccati. tesaṃ abhāvā ^b^nidoso^eb^. aṭṭhapurisamalavigamā ^b^vimalo,^eb^ upakkilesābhāvato akāco. upakkiliṭṭho hi upakkilesena ``sakāco''ti vuccati. suddho vā yasmā niddoso, niddosatāya vimalo, bāhiramalābhāvena vimalattā akāco. samalo hi ^a^M2.0137^ea^ ``sakāco''ti vuccati. vimalattā vā āguṃ na karoti, tena akāco. āgukiriyā hi upaghātakaraṇato ``kāco''ti vuccati.

[03] 482^b^.^eb^ ^b^attano attānaṃ nānupassatī^eb^ti ñāṇasampayuttena cittena vipassanto attano khandhesu aññaṃ attānaṃ nāma na passati, khandhamattameva passati. yā cāyaṃ ``attanāva attānaṃ sañjānāmī''ti tassa saccato thetato diṭṭhi uppajjati, tassā abhāvā attano attānaṃ nānupassati, aññadatthu paññāya ^a^P2.0411^ea^ khandhe passati. maggasamādhinā ^b^samāhito,^eb^ kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ abhāvā ^b^ujjugato,^eb^ lokadhammehi akampanīyato ^b^ṭhitatto,^eb^ taṇhāsaṅkhātāya ejāya pañcannaṃ cetokhilānañca aṭṭhaṭṭhānāya kaṅkhāya ca abhāvā ^b^anejo akhilo akaṅkho^eb^.

[03] 483^b^.^eb^ ^b^mohantarā^eb^ti mohakāraṇā mohapaccayā, sabbakilesānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^sabbesu dhammesu ca ñāṇadassī^eb^ti sacchikatasabbaññutaññāṇo. tañhi sabbesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ, tañca bhagavā passi, ``adhigataṃ me''ti sacchikatvā vihāsi. tena vuccati ``sabbesu dhammesu ca ñāṇadassī''ti. ^b^sambodhi^eb^nti arahattaṃ. ^b^anuttara^eb^nti paccekabuddhasāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ. ^b^siva^eb^nti khemaṃ nirupaddavaṃ sassirikaṃ vā. ^b^yakkhassā^eb^ti purisassa. ^b^suddhī^eb^ti vodānatā. ettha hi mohantarābhāvena sabbadosābhāvo, tena saṃsārakāraṇasamucchedo antimasarīradhāritā, ñāṇadassitāya sabbaguṇasambhavo. tena anuttarā sambodhipatti, ito parañca pahātabbamadhigantabbaṃ vā natthi. tenāha -- ``ettāvatā yakkhassa suddhī''ti.

[03] 484^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vutte brāhmaṇo bhiyyosomattāya bhagavati pasanno pasannākāraṃ karonto āha ^b^``hutañca mayha''^eb^nti. tassattho -- yamahaṃ ito pubbe brahmānaṃ ārabbha aggimhi ajuhaṃ, taṃ me hutaṃ saccaṃ vā hoti, alikaṃ vāti na jānāmi. ajja pana idaṃ ^b^hutañca mayhaṃ hutamatthu saccaṃ,^eb^ saccahutameva atthūti yācanto bhaṇati. ^b^yaṃ tādisaṃ vedagunaṃ alatthaṃ,^eb^ yasmā idheva ṭhito bhavantarūpaṃ ^a^V2.0125^ea^ vedaguṃ alatthaṃ. ^b^brahmā hi sakkhi,^eb^ paccakkhameva hi tvaṃ brahmā, yato ^b^paṭiggaṇhātu me bhagavā,^eb^ paṭiggahetvā ^a^M2.0138^ea^ ca ^b^bhuñjatu me bhagavā pūraḷāsa^eb^nti taṃ habyasesaṃ upanāmento āha.

[03] 487^b^.^eb^ atha bhagavā kasibhāradvājasutte vuttanayena gāthādvayamabhāsi. tato brāhmaṇo ``ayaṃ attanā na icchati, kampi caññaṃ sandhāya `kevalinaṃ mahesiṃ khīṇāsavaṃ kukkuccavūpasantaṃ annena pānena upaṭṭhahassū'ti bhaṇatī''ti evaṃ gāthāya atthaṃ asallakkhetvā taṃ ñātukāmo ^a^P2.0412^ea^ āha ^b^``sādhāhaṃ bhagavā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^sādhū^eb^ti āyācanatthe nipāto. ^b^tathā^eb^ti yena tvamāha, tena pakārena. ^b^vijañña^eb^nti jāneyyaṃ. ^b^ya^eb^nti yaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ yaññakāle pariyesamāno upaṭṭhaheyyanti pāṭhaseso. ^b^pappuyyā^eb^ti patvā. ^b^tava sāsana^eb^nti tava ovādaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. sādhāhaṃ bhagavā tava ovādaṃ āgamma tathā vijaññaṃ ārocehi me taṃ kevalinanti adhippāyo. yo dakkhiṇaṃ bhuñjeyya mādisassa, yaṃ cāhaṃ yaññakāle pariyesamāno upaṭṭhaheyyaṃ, tathārūpaṃ me dakkhiṇeyyaṃ dassehi, sace tvaṃ na bhuñjasīti.

[03] 488-90^b^.^eb^ athassa bhagavā pākaṭena nayena tathārūpaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ dassento ^b^``sārambhā yassā''^eb^ti gāthāttayamāha. tattha ^b^sīmantānaṃ vinetāra^eb^nti ^b^sīmā^eb^ti mariyādā sādhujanavutti, tassā antā pariyosānā aparabhāgāti katvā sīmantā vuccanti kilesā, tesaṃ vinetāranti attho. sīmantāti buddhaveneyyā sekkhā ca puthujjanā ca, tesaṃ vinetārantipi eke. ^b^jātimaraṇakovida^eb^nti ``evaṃ jāti evaṃ maraṇa''nti ettha kusalaṃ. ^b^moneyyasampanna^eb^nti paññāsampannaṃ, kāyamoneyyādisampannaṃ vā. ^b^bhakuṭiṃ vinayitvānā^eb^ti yaṃ ekacce dubbuddhino yācakaṃ disvā bhakuṭiṃ karonti, taṃ vinayitvā, pasannamukhā hutvāti attho. ^b^pañjalikā^eb^ti paggahitāñjalino hutvā.

[03] 491^b^.^eb^ atha brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ thomayamāno ^b^``buddho bhava''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^āyāgo^eb^ti āyajitabbo, tato tato āgamma vā yajitabbametthātipi āyāgo, deyyadhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhūtoti vuttaṃ hoti ^a^M2.0139^ea^. sesamettha ito purimagāthāsu ca yaṃ na vaṇṇitaṃ, taṃ sakkā avaṇṇitampi jānitunti uttānatthattāyeva na vaṇṇitaṃ. ito paraṃ pana kasibhāradvājasutte vuttanayamevāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya pūraḷāsasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0126^ea^ ^a^P2.0413^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti māghasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? ayameva yāssa nidāne vuttā. ayañhi māgho māṇavo dāyako ahosi dānapati. tassetadahosi -- ``sampattakapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ dānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti, udāhu noti samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ etamatthaṃ pucchissāmi, samaṇo kira gotamo atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ jānātī''ti. so bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi. bhagavā cassa pucchānurūpaṃ byākāsi. tayidaṃ saṅgītikārānaṃ brāhmaṇassa bhagavatoti tiṇṇampi vacanaṃ samodhānetvā ``māghasutta''nti vuccati.

[03] tattha ^b^rājagahe^eb^ti evaṃnāmake nagare. tañhi mandhātumahāgovindādīhi pariggahitattā ``rājagaha''nti vuccati. aññepettha pakāre vaṇṇayanti. kiṃ tehi, nāmametaṃ tassa nagarassa? taṃ panetaṃ buddhakāle ca cakkavattikāle ca nagaraṃ hoti, sesakāle suññaṃ hoti yakkhapariggahitaṃ, tesaṃ vasantavanaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati. evaṃ gocaragāmaṃ dassetvā nivāsaṭṭhānamāha -- ^b^``gijjhakūṭe pabbate''^eb^ti. so ca gijjhā tassa kūṭesu vasiṃsu, gijjhasadisāni vāssa kūṭāni, tasmā ``gijjhakūṭo''ti vuccatīti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^atha kho...pe0... avocā^eb^ti ettha ^b^māgho^eb^ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṃ. ^b^māṇavo^eb^ti antevāsivāsaṃ anatītabhāvena vuccati, jātiyā pana mahallako. ``pubbāciṇṇavasenā''ti eke piṅgiyo māṇavo viya. so hi vīsavassasatikopi pubbāciṇṇavasena ``piṅgiyo māṇavo'' tveva saṅkhaṃ agamāsi. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] ^b^ahañhi^eb^ ^a^M2.0140^ea^, ^b^bho gotama...pe0... pasavāmī^eb^ti ettha ^b^dāyako dānapatī^eb^ti dāyako ceva dānapati ca. yo hi aññassa santakaṃ tenāṇatto deti, sopi dāyako hoti, tasmiṃ pana dāne issariyābhāvato na dānapati. ayaṃ pana attano santakaṃyeva deti. tenāha -- ``ahañhi, bho gotama ^a^P2.0414^ea^, dāyako dānapatī''ti. ayameva hi ettha attho, aññatra pana antarantarā maccherena abhibhuyyamāno dāyako anabhibhūto dānapatītiādināpi nayena vattuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^vadaññū^eb^ti yācakānaṃ vacanaṃ jānāmi vuttamatteyeva ``ayamidamarahati ayamida''nti purisavisesāvadhāraṇena ^a^V2.0127^ea^ bahūpakārabhāvagahaṇena vā. ^b^yācayogo^eb^ti yācituṃ yutto. yo hi yācake disvāva bhakuṭiṃ katvā pharusavacanādīni bhaṇati, so na yācayogo hoti. ahaṃ pana na tādisoti dīpeti. ^b^dhammenā^eb^ti adinnādānanikativañcanādīni vajjetvā bhikkhācariyāya, yācanāyāti attho. yācanā hi brāhmaṇānaṃ bhogapariyesane dhammo, yācamānānañca nesaṃ parehi anuggahakāmehi dinnā bhogā dhammaladdhā nāma dhammādhigatā ca honti, so ca tathā pariyesitvā labhi. tenāha -- ^b^``dhammena bhoge pariyesāmi...pe0... dhammādhigatehī''^eb^ti. ^b^bhiyyopi dadāmī^eb^ti tato uttaripi dadāmi, pamāṇaṃ natthi, ettha laddhabhogappamāṇena dadāmīti dasseti.

[03] ^b^tagghā^eb^ti ekaṃsavacane nipāto. ekaṃseneva hi sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhasāvakehi pasatthaṃ dānaṃ antamaso tiracchānagatānampi dīyamānaṃ. vuttañcetaṃ ``sabbattha vaṇṇitaṃ dānaṃ, na dānaṃ garahitaṃ kvacī''ti. tasmā bhagavāpi ekaṃseneva taṃ pasaṃsanto āha -- ^b^``taggha tvaṃ māṇava...pe0... pasavasī''^eb^ti. sesaṃ uttānatthameva. evaṃ bhagavatā ``bahuṃ so puññaṃ pasavatī''ti vuttepi dakkhiṇeyyato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṃ sotukāmo brāhmaṇo uttari bhagavantaṃ pucchi. tenāhu saṅgītikārā -- ^b^``atha kho māgho māṇavo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsī''^eb^ti. taṃ atthato vuttanayameva.

[03] 492^b^.^eb^ ^b^pucchāmaha^eb^ntiādigāthāsu ^a^P2.0415^ea^ pana ^b^vadaññu^eb^nti vacanaviduṃ, sabbākārena sattānaṃ vuttavacanādhippāyaññunti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^sujjhe^eb^ti dakkhiṇeyyavasena suddhaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhaveyya. yojanā panettha -- yo yācayogo dānapati ^a^M2.0141^ea^ gahaṭṭho puññatthiko hutvā paresaṃ annapānaṃ dadaṃ yajati, na aggimhi āhutimattaṃ pakkhipanto, tañca kho puññapekkhova na paccupakārakalyāṇakittisaddādiapekkho, tassa evarūpassa yajamānassa hutaṃ kathaṃ sujjheyyāti?

[03] 493^b^.^eb^ ^b^ārādhaye dakkhiṇeyyebhi tādī^eb^ti tādiso yācayogo dakkhiṇeyyehi ārādhaye sampādaye sodhaye, mahapphalaṃ taṃ hutaṃ kareyya, na aññathāti attho. imināssa ``kathaṃ hutaṃ yajamānassa sujjhe'' iccetaṃ byākataṃ hoti.
[03] 494^b^.^eb^ ^b^akkhāhi me bhagavā dakkhiṇeyye^eb^ti ettha yo yācayogo dadaṃ paresaṃ yajati, tassa me bhagavā dakkhiṇeyye akkhāhīti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.

[03] 495^b^.^eb^ athassa ^a^V2.0128^ea^ bhagavā nānappakārehi nayehi dakkhiṇeyye pakāsento ^b^``ye ve asattā''^eb^tiādikā gāthāyo abhāsi. tattha ^b^asattā^eb^ti rāgādisaṅgavasena alaggā. ^b^kevalino^eb^ti pariniṭṭhitakiccā. ^b^yatattā^eb^ti guttacittā.

[03] 496-7^b^.^eb^ ^b^dantā^eb^ anuttarena damathena, ^b^vimuttā^eb^ paññācetovimuttīhi, ^b^anīghā^eb^ āyatiṃ vaṭṭadukkhābhāvena, ^b^nirāsā^eb^ sampati kilesābhāvena. imissā pana gāthāya dutiyagāthā bhāvanānubhāvappakāsananayena vuttāti veditabbā. ``bhāvanānuyogamanuyuttassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viharato kiñcāpi na evaṃ icchā uppajjeyya `aho vata me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimucceyyā'ti (a0 ni0 7.71), atha khvāssa anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimuccatī''ti idaṃ cettha suttaṃ sādhakaṃ.

[03] 498-502^b^.^eb^ ^b^rāgañca...pe0... yesu na māyā...pe0... na taṇhāsu upātipannā^eb^ti kāmataṇhādīsu nādhimuttā. ^b^vitareyyā^eb^ti vitaritvā. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti rūpataṇhādichabbidhā ^a^P2.0416^ea^. ^b^bhavābhavāyā^eb^ti sassatāya vā ucchedāya vā. atha vā bhavassa abhavāya bhavābhavāya, punabbhavābhinibbattiyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^idha vā huraṃ vā^eb^ti idaṃ pana ^b^``kuhiñci loke''^eb^ti imassa vitthāravacanaṃ.

[03] 504^b^.^eb^ ^b^ye^eb^ ^a^M2.0142^ea^ ^b^vītarāgā...pe0... samitāvino^eb^ti samitavanto, kilesavūpasamakārinoti attho. samitāvitattā ca ^b^vītarāgā akopā. idha vippahāyā^eb^ti idhaloke vattamāne khandhe vihāya, tato paraṃ yesaṃ gamanaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. ito paraṃ ^b^``ye kāme hitvā agahā caranti, susaññatattā tasaraṃva ujju''^eb^nti imampi gāthaṃ keci paṭhanti.

[03] 506-8^b^.^eb^ ^b^jahitvā^eb^ti hitvā. ``jahitvānā''tipi pāṭho, ayamevattho. ^b^attadīpā^eb^ti attano guṇe eva attano dīpaṃ katvā vicarantā khīṇāsavā vuccanti. ^b^ye hetthā^eb^ti hakāro nipāto padapūraṇamatte. ayaṃ panattho -- ye ettha khandhāyatanādisantāne yathā idaṃ khandhāyatanādi tathā jānanti, yaṃsabhāvaṃ taṃsabhāvaṃyeva sañjānanti aniccādivasena jānantā. ^b^ayamantimā natthi punabbhavo^eb^ti ayaṃ no antimā jāti, idāni natthi punabbhavoti evañca ye jānantīti.

[03] 509^b^.^eb^ yo ^b^vedagū^eb^ti idāni attānaṃ sandhāya bhagavā imaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^satimā^eb^ti chasatatavihārasatiyā ^a^V2.0129^ea^ samannāgato. ^b^sambodhipatto^eb^ti sabbaññutaṃ patto. ^b^saraṇaṃ bahūna^eb^nti bahūnaṃ devamanussānaṃ bhayavihiṃsanena saraṇabhūto.

[03] 510^b^.^eb^ evaṃ dakkhiṇeyye sutvā attamano brāhmaṇo āha -- ^b^``addhā amoghā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^tvañhettha jānāsi yathā tathā ida^eb^nti tvañhi ettha loke idaṃ sabbampi ñeyyaṃ yathā tathā jānāsi yāthāvato jānāsi, yādisaṃ taṃ tādisameva jānāsīti ^a^P2.0417^ea^ vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo^eb^ti tathā hi te esā dhammadhātu suppaṭividdhā, yassā suppaṭividdhatā yaṃ yaṃ icchasi, taṃ taṃ jānāsīti adhippāyo.

[03] 511^b^.^eb^ evaṃ so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ pasaṃsitvā dakkhiṇeyyasampadāya yaññasampadaṃ ñatvā dāyakasampadāyapi taṃ chaḷaṅgaparipūraṃ yaññasampadaṃ sotukāmo ^b^``yo yācayogo''^eb^ti uttaripañhaṃ pucchi. tatrāyaṃ yojanā -- yo yācayogo dadaṃ paresaṃ yajati, tassa akkhāhi me bhagavā yaññasampadanti.

[03] 512^b^.^eb^ athassa ^a^M2.0143^ea^ bhagavā dvīhi gāthāhi akkhāsi. tatthāyaṃ atthayojanā -- yajassu māgha, yajamāno ca sabbattha vippasādehi cittaṃ, tīsupi kālesu cittaṃ pasādehi. evaṃ te yāyaṃ --
[21] ``pubbeva dānā sumano, dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādaye.
[22] datvā attamano hoti, esā yaññassa sampadā''ti.. (a0 ni0 6.37; pe0 va0 305) --

[25] yaññasampadā vuttā, tāya sampanno yañño bhavissati. tattha siyā ``kathaṃ cittaṃ pasādetabba''nti? dosappahānena. kathaṃ dosappahānaṃ hoti? yaññārammaṇatāya. ayañhi ^b^ārammaṇaṃ yajamānassa yañño ettha patiṭṭhāya jahāti dosaṃ,^eb^ ayañhi sattesu mettāpubbaṅgamena sammādiṭṭhipadīpavihatamohandhakārena cittena yajamānassa deyyadhammasaṅkhāto yañño ārammaṇaṃ hoti, so ettha yaññe ārammaṇavasena pavattiyā patiṭṭhāya deyyadhammapaccayaṃ lobhaṃ, paṭiggāhakapaccayaṃ kodhaṃ, tadubhayanidānaṃ mohanti evaṃ tividhampi jahāti dosaṃ. so evaṃ bhogesu ^b^vītarāgo,^eb^ sattesu ca ^b^pavineyya dosaṃ^eb^ tappahāneneva pahīnapañcanīvaraṇo anukkamena upacārappanābhedaṃ aparimāṇasattapharaṇena ekasatte vā anavasesapharaṇena appamāṇaṃ ^b^mettaṃ cittaṃ^eb^ bhāvento ^a^V2.0130^ea^ puna bhāvanāvepullatthaṃ, ^b^rattindivaṃ satataṃ^eb^ sabbairiyāpathesu appamatto hutvā tameva mettajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^sabbā disā pharate appamañña^eb^nti.

[03] 514^b^.^eb^ atha brāhmaṇo taṃ mettaṃ ``brahmalokamaggo aya''nti ajānanto kevalaṃ attano visayātītaṃ mettābhāvanaṃ sutvā ^a^P2.0418^ea^ suṭṭhutaraṃ sañjātasabbaññusambhāvano bhagavati attanā brahmalokādhimuttattā brahmalokūpapattimeva ca suddhiṃ muttiñca maññamāno brahmalokamaggaṃ pucchanto ^b^``ko sujjhatī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tatra ca brahmalokagāmiṃ puññaṃ karontaṃ sandhāyāha -- ^b^``ko sujjhati muccatī''^eb^ti, akarontaṃ sandhāya ^b^``bajjhatī cā''^eb^ti. ^b^kenattanā^eb^ti kena kāraṇena. ^b^sakkhi brahmajjadiṭṭho^eb^ti brahmā ajja sakkhi diṭṭho. ^b^sacca^eb^nti bhagavato brahmasamattaṃ ārabbha accādarena sapathaṃ karoti. ^b^kathaṃ upapajjatī^eb^ti accādareneva punapi pucchati. ^b^jutimā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ ālapati.

[03] tattha ^a^M2.0144^ea^ yasmā yo bhikkhu mettāya tikacatukkajjhānaṃ uppādetvā tameva pādakaṃ katvā vipassanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, so sujjhati muccati ca, tathārūpo ca brahmalokaṃ na gacchati. yo pana mettāya tikacatukkajjhānaṃ uppādetvā ``santā esā samāpattī''tiādinā nayena taṃ assādeti, so bajjhati. aparihīnajjhāno ca teneva jhānena brahmalokaṃ gacchati, tasmā bhagavā yo sujjhati muccati ca, tassa brahmalokagamanaṃ ananujānanto anāmasitvāva taṃ puggalaṃ yo bajjhati. tassa tena jhānena brahmalokagamanaṃ dassento brāhmaṇassa sappāyena nayena ^b^``yo yajatī''^eb^ti imaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] 515^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^tividha^eb^nti tikālappasādaṃ sandhāyāha. tena dāyakato aṅgattayaṃ dasseti. ^b^ārādhaye dakkhiṇeyyebhi tādī^eb^ti tañca so tādiso tividhasampattisādhako puggalo tividhaṃ yaññasampadaṃ dakkhiṇeyyehi khīṇāsavehi sādheyya sampādeyya. iminā paṭiggāhakato aṅgattayaṃ dasseti. ^b^evaṃ yajitvā sammā yācayogo^eb^ti evaṃ mettajjhānapadaṭṭhānabhāvena chaḷaṅgasamannāgataṃ yaññaṃ sammā yajitvā so yācayogo tena chaḷaṅgayaññūpanissayena mettajjhānena ^b^upapajjati brahmalokanti^eb^ ^a^P2.0419^ea^ ^b^brūmī^eb^ti brāhmaṇaṃ samussāhento desanaṃ samāpesi. sesaṃ sabbagāthāsu uttānatthameva. ito parañca pubbe vuttanayamevāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya māghasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0131^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti sabhiyasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? ayameva yāssa nidāne vuttā. atthavaṇṇanākkamepi cassa pubbasadisaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. yaṃ pana apubbaṃ, taṃ uttānatthāni padāni pariharantā vaṇṇayissāma. ^b^veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe^eb^ti ^b^veḷuvana^eb^nti tassa uyyānassa nāmaṃ. taṃ kira veḷūhi ca parikkhittaṃ ahosi aṭṭhārasahatthena ca pākārena, gopuradvāraṭṭālakayuttaṃ ^a^M2.0145^ea^ nīlobhāsaṃ manoramaṃ, tena ``veḷuvana''nti vuccati. kalandakānañcettha nivāpaṃ adaṃsu, tena ``kalandakanivāpo''ti vuccati. kalandakā nāma kāḷakā vuccanti. pubbe kira aññataro rājā tattha uyyānakīḷanatthaṃ āgato surāmadena matto divāseyyaṃ supi. parijanopissa ``sutto rājā''ti pupphaphalādīhi palobhiyamāno ito cito ca pakkāmi. atha surāgandhena aññatarasmā susirarukkhā kaṇhasappo nikkhamitvā rañño abhimukho āgacchati. taṃ disvā rukkhadevatā ``rañño jīvitaṃ dassāmī''ti kāḷakavesena āgantvā kaṇṇamūle saddamakāsi. rājā paṭibujjhi, kaṇhasappo nivatto. so taṃ disvā ``imāya mama kāḷakāya jīvitaṃ dinna''nti kāḷakānaṃ tattha nivāpaṃ paṭṭhapesi, abhayaghosanañca ^a^P2.0420^ea^ ghosāpesi. tasmā taṃ tato pabhuti ``kalandakanivāpo''ti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ.

[03] ^b^sabhiyassa paribbājakassā^eb^ti ^b^sabhiyo^eb^ti tassa nāmaṃ, ^b^paribbājako^eb^ti bāhira pabbajjaṃ upādāya vuccati. ^b^purāṇasālohitāya devatāyā^eb^ti na mātā na pitā, apica kho panassa mātā viya pitā viya ca hitajjhāsayattā so devaputto ``purāṇasālohitā devatā''ti vutto. parinibbute kira kassape bhagavati patiṭṭhite suvaṇṇacetiye tayo kulaputtā sammukhasāvakānaṃ santike pabbajitvā cariyānurūpāni kammaṭṭhānāni gahetvā paccantajanapadaṃ gantvā araññāyatane samaṇadhammaṃ karonti, antarantarā ca cetiyavandanatthāya dhammassavanatthāya ca nagaraṃ gacchanti. aparena ca samayena tāvatakampi araññe vippavāsaṃ arocayamānā tattheva appamattā vihariṃsu, evaṃ viharantāpi na ca kiñci visesaṃ adhigamiṃsu. tato nesaṃ ahosi -- ``mayaṃ piṇḍāya gacchantā jīvite sāpekkhā homa, jīvite sāpekkhena ca na sakkā lokuttaradhammo adhigantuṃ, puthujjanakālakiriyāpi dukkhā, handa mayaṃ nisseṇiṃ bandhitvā pabbataṃ ^a^V2.0132^ea^ abhiruyha kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhā samaṇadhammaṃ karomā''ti. te tathā akaṃsu.
