[03] atha nesaṃ mahāthero upanissayasampannattā tadaheva chaḷabhiññāparivāraṃ arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. so iddhiyā himavantaṃ gantvā anotatte mukhaṃ dhovitvā uttarakurūsu piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco puna aññampi padesaṃ gantvā pattaṃ pūretvā anotattaudakañca nāgalatādantapoṇañca gahetvā ^a^M2.0146^ea^ tesaṃ santikaṃ āgantvā āha -- ``passathāvuso mamānubhāvaṃ, ayaṃ uttarakuruto piṇḍapāto, idaṃ himavantato udakadantapoṇaṃ ābhataṃ, imaṃ bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karotha, evāhaṃ tumhe sadā upaṭṭhahissāmī''ti. te taṃ sutvā āhaṃsu -- ``tumhe, bhante, katakiccā, tumhehi saha sallāpamattampi amhākaṃ papañco, mā dāni tumhe puna amhākaṃ ^a^P2.0421^ea^ santikaṃ āgamitthā''ti. so kenaci pariyāyena te sampaṭicchāpetuṃ asakkonto pakkāmi.

[03] tato tesaṃ eko dvīhatīhaccayena pañcābhiñño anāgāmī ahosi. sopi tatheva akāsi, itarena ca paṭikkhitto tatheva agamāsi. so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā vāyamanto pabbataṃ āruhanadivasato sattame divase kiñci visesaṃ anadhigantvāva kālakato devaloke nibbatti. khīṇāsavattheropi taṃ divasameva parinibbāyi, anāgāmī suddhāvāsesu uppajji. devaputto chasu kāmāvacaradevalokesu anulomapaṭilomena dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle devalokā cavitvā aññatarissā paribbājikāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi. sā kira aññatarassa khattiyassa dhītā, taṃ mātāpitaro ``amhākaṃ dhītā samayantaraṃ jānātū''ti ekassa paribbājakassa niyyātesuṃ. tasseko antevāsiko paribbājako tāya saddhiṃ vippaṭipajji. sā tena gabbhaṃ gaṇhi. taṃ gabbhiniṃ disvā paribbājikā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu. sā aññattha gacchantī antarāmagge sabhāyaṃ vijāyi, tenassa ^b^``sabhiyo''^eb^tveva nāmaṃ akāsi. sopi sabhiyo vaḍḍhitvā paribbājakapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā nānāsatthāni uggahetvā mahāvādī hutvā vādakkhittatāya sakalajambudīpe vicaranto attano sadisaṃ vādiṃ adisvā nagaradvāre assamaṃ kārāpetvā khattiyakumārādayo sippaṃ sikkhāpento tattha vasati.

[03] atha bhagavā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṃ āgantvā veḷuvane viharati kalandakanivāpe. sabhiyo pana buddhuppādaṃ na jānāti. atha so suddhāvāsabrahmā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ``imāhaṃ visesaṃ kassānubhāvena patto''ti āvajjento kassapassa bhagavato sāsane samaṇadhammakiriyaṃ te ca sahāye anussaritvā ``tesu eko ^a^M2.0147^ea^ parinibbuto, eko idāni katthā''ti ^a^V2.0133^ea^ āvajjento ``devalokā cavitvā jambudīpe uppanno buddhuppādampi na jānātī''ti ñatvā ``handa naṃ buddhupasevanāya niyojemī''ti vīsati pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā rattibhāge tassa assamamāgamma ^a^P2.0422^ea^ ākāse ṭhatvā ``sabhiya, sabhiyā''ti pakkosi. so niddāyamāno tikkhattuṃ taṃ saddaṃ sutvā nikkhamma obhāsaṃ disvā pañjaliko aṭṭhāsi. tato taṃ brahmā āha -- ``ahaṃ sabhiya tavatthāya vīsati pañhe āhariṃ, te tvaṃ uggaṇha. yo ca te samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime pañhe puṭṭho byākaroti, tassa santike brahmacariyaṃ careyyāsī''ti. imaṃ devaputtaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ ``purāṇasālohitāya devatāya pañhā uddiṭṭhā hontī''ti. ^b^uddiṭṭhā^eb^ti uddesamatteneva vuttā, na vibhaṅgena.

[03] evaṃ vutte ca ne sabhiyo ekavacaneneva padapaṭipāṭiyā uggahesi. atha so brahmā jānantopi tassa buddhuppādaṃ nācikkhi. ``atthaṃ gavesamāno paribbājako sayameva satthāraṃ ñassati. ito bahiddhā ca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ tucchabhāva''nti iminā panādhippāyena evamāha -- ``yo te sabhiya...pe0... careyyāsī''ti. theragāthāsu pana catukkanipāte sabhiyattherāpadānaṃ vaṇṇentā bhaṇanti ``sā cassa mātā attano vippaṭipattiṃ cintetvā taṃ jigucchamānā jhānaṃ uppādetvā brahmaloke uppannā, tāya brahmadevatāya te pañhā uddiṭṭhā''ti.

[03] ^b^ye te^eb^ti idāni vattabbānaṃ uddesapaccuddeso. ^b^samaṇabrāhmaṇā^eb^ti pabbajjūpagamanena lokasammutiyā ca samaṇā ceva brāhmaṇā ca. ^b^saṅghino^eb^ti gaṇavanto. ^b^gaṇino^eb^ti satthāro, ``sabbaññuno maya''nti evaṃ paṭiññātāro. ^b^gaṇācariyā^eb^ti uddesaparipucchādivasena pabbajitagahaṭṭhagaṇassa ācariyā. ^b^ñātā^eb^ti abhiññātā, vissutā pākaṭāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^yasassino^eb^ti lābhaparivārasampannā. ^b^titthakarā^eb^ti tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantehi otaritabbānaṃ ogāhitabbānaṃ diṭṭhititthānaṃ kattāro. ^b^sādhusammatā bahujanassā^eb^ti ``sādhavo ete santo sappurisā''ti evaṃ bahujanassa sammatā.

[03] ^b^seyyathida^eb^nti ^a^M2.0148^ea^ katame teti ce-iccetasmiṃ atthe nipāto. ^b^pūraṇo^eb^ti nāmaṃ, ^b^kassapo^eb^ti gottaṃ. so kira jātiyā dāso, dāsasataṃ ^a^P2.0423^ea^ pūrento jāto. tenassa ``pūraṇo''ti nāmamakaṃsu. palāyitvā pana naggesu pabbajitvā ``kassapo aha''nti gottaṃ uddisi, sabbaññutañca paccaññāsi. ^b^makkhalī^eb^ti nāmaṃ, gosālāya jātattā ^b^gosālo^eb^tipi vuccati. sopi kira jātiyā dāso eva, palāyitvā pabbaji, sabbaññutañca paccaññāsi. ^b^ajito^eb^ti nāmaṃ, appicchatāya kesakambalaṃ dhāreti, tena ^b^kesakambalo^eb^tipi vuccati, sopi sabbaññutaṃ paccaññāsi ^a^V2.0134^ea^. ^b^pakudho^eb^ti nāmaṃ, ^b^kaccāyano^eb^ti gottaṃ. appicchavasena udake jīvasaññāya ca nhānamukhadhovanādi paṭikkhitto, sopi sabbaññutaṃ paccaññāsi. ^b^sañcayo^eb^ti nāmaṃ, belaṭṭho panassa pitā, tasmā ^b^belaṭṭhaputto^eb^ti vuccati, sopi sabbaññutaṃ paccaññāsi. ^b^nigaṇṭho^eb^ti pabbajjānāmena, ^b^nāṭaputto^eb^ti pitunāmena vuccati. nāṭoti kira nāmassa pitā, tassa puttoti nāṭaputto, sopi sabbaññutaṃ paccaññāsi. sabbepi pañcasatapañcasatasissaparivārā ahesuṃ. ^b^te^eb^ti te cha satthāro. ^b^te pañhe^eb^ti te vīsati pañhe. ^b^te^eb^ti te cha satthāro. ^b^na sampāyantī^eb^ti na sampādenti. ^b^kopa^eb^nti cittacetasikānaṃ āvilabhāvaṃ. ^b^dosa^eb^nti paduṭṭhacittataṃ, tadubhayampetaṃ mandatikkhabhedassa kodhassevādhivacanaṃ. ^b^appaccaya^eb^nti appatītatā, domanassanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^pātukarontī^eb^ti kāyavacīvikārena pakāsenti, pākaṭaṃ karonti.

[03] ^b^hīnāyā^eb^ti gahaṭṭhabhāvāya. gahaṭṭhabhāvo hi pabbajjaṃ upanidhāya sīlādiguṇahīnato hīnakāmasukhapaṭisevanato vā ``hīno''ti vuccati. uccā pabbajjā. ^b^āvattitvā^eb^ti osakkitvā. ^b^kāme paribhuñjeyya^eb^nti kāme paṭiseveyyaṃ. iti kirassa sabbaññupaṭiññānampi pabbajitānaṃ tucchakattaṃ disvā ahosi. uppannaparivitakkavaseneva ca āgantvā punappunaṃ vīmaṃsamānassa ^b^atha kho sabhiyassa paribbājakassa etadahosi -- ``ayampi kho samaṇo''^eb^ti ca ^b^``yepi kho te bhonto''^eb^ti ca ^b^``samaṇo kho daharoti na uññātabbo''^eb^ti cāti evamādi. tattha ^b^jiṇṇā^eb^tiādīni padāni vuttanayāneva. ^b^therā^eb^ti attano samaṇadhamme thirabhāvappattā. ^b^rattaññū^eb^ti ^a^P2.0424^ea^ ratanaññū, ``nibbānaratanaṃ jānāma maya''nti evaṃ sakāya paṭiññāya lokenāpi sammatā, bahurattividū vā. ciraṃ pabbajitānaṃ etesanti ^b^cirapabbajitā^eb^. ^b^na uññātabbo^eb^ti na avajānitabbo, na nīcaṃ katvā jānitabboti vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0149^ea^ hoti. ^b^na paribhotabbo^eb^ti na paribhavitabbo, ``kimesa ñassatī''ti evaṃ na gahetabboti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 516^b^.^eb^ ^b^kaṅkhī vecikicchī^eb^ti sabhiyo bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodamāno evaṃ bhagavato rūpasampattidamūpasamasūcitaṃ sabbaññutaṃ sambhāvayamāno vigatuddhacco hutvā āha -- ``kaṅkhī vecikicchī''ti. tattha ``labheyyaṃ nu kho imesaṃ byākaraṇa''nti evaṃ pañhānaṃ byākaraṇakaṅkhāya ^b^kaṅkhī^eb^. ``ko nu kho imassimassa ca pañhassa attho''ti evaṃ vicikicchāya ^b^vecikicchī^eb^. dubbalavicikicchāya vā tesaṃ pañhānaṃ atthe kaṅkhanato kaṅkhī, balavatiyā vicinanto kicchatiyeva, na sakkoti sanniṭṭhātunti vecikicchī. ^b^abhikaṅkhamāno^eb^ti ativiya patthayamāno. ^b^tesantakaro^eb^ti tesaṃ pañhānaṃ antakaro. bhavantova evaṃ bhavāhīti dassento āha ^b^``pañhe me puṭṭho...pe0... byākarohi me''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^pañhe me^eb^ti pañhe mayā. ^b^puṭṭho^eb^ti pucchito. ^b^anupubba^eb^nti ^a^V2.0135^ea^ pañhapaṭipāṭiyā ^b^anudhamma^eb^nti atthānurūpaṃ pāḷiṃ āropento. ^b^byākarohi me^eb^ti mayhaṃ byākarohi.

[03] 517^b^.^eb^ ^b^dūrato^eb^ti so kira ito cito cāhiṇḍanto sattayojanasatamaggato āgato. tenāha -- bhagavā ^b^``dūrato āgatosī''^eb^ti, kassapassa bhagavato vā sāsanato āgatattā ``dūrato āgatosī''ti naṃ āha.
[03] 518^b^.^eb^ ^b^puccha ma^eb^nti imāya panassa gāthāya sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāreti. tattha ^b^manasicchasī^eb^ti manasā icchasi.

[03] ^b^yaṃ vatāha^eb^nti yaṃ vata ahaṃ. ^b^attamano^eb^ti pītipāmojjasomanassehi phuṭacitto. ^b^udaggo^eb^ti kāyena cittena ca abbhunnato ^a^P2.0425^ea^. idaṃ pana padaṃ na sabbapāṭhesu atthi. idāni yehi dhammehi attamano, te dassento āha -- ^b^``pamudito pītisomanassajāto''^eb^ti.

[03] 519^b^.^eb^ ^b^kiṃ pattina^eb^nti kiṃ pattaṃ kimadhigataṃ. ^b^sorata^eb^nti suvūpasantaṃ. ``surata''ntipi pāṭho, suṭṭhu uparatanti attho. ^b^danta^eb^nti damitaṃ. ^b^buddho^eb^ti vibuddho, buddhaboddhabbo vā. evaṃ sabhiyo ekekāya gāthāya cattāro cattāro katvā pañcahi gāthāhi vīsati pañhe pucchi. bhagavā panassa ekamekaṃ ^a^M2.0150^ea^ pañhaṃ ekamekāya gāthāya katvā arahattanikūṭeneva vīsatiyā gāthāhi byākāsi.

[03] 520^b^.^eb^ tattha yasmā bhinnakileso paramatthabhikkhu, so ca nibbānappatto hoti, tasmā assa ``kiṃ pattinamāhu bhikkhuna''nti imaṃ pañhaṃ byākaronto ^b^``pajjenā''^eb^tiādimāha. tassattho -- yo attanā bhāvitena maggena ^b^parinibbānagato^eb^ kilesaparinibbānaṃ patto, parinibbānagatattā eva ca ^b^vitiṇṇakaṅkho^eb^ vipattisampattihānibuddhiucchedasassatāpuññapuññabhedaṃ ^b^vibhavañca bhavañca vippahāya,^eb^ maggavāsaṃ ^b^vusitavā khīṇapunabbhavo^eb^ti ca etesaṃ thutivacanānaṃ araho, so bhikkhūti.

[03] 521^b^.^eb^ yasmā pana vippaṭipattito suṭṭhu uparatabhāvena nānappakārakilesavūpasamena ca sorato hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``sabbattha upekkhako''^eb^tiādinā nayena dutiyapañhabyākaraṇamāha. tassattho -- yo ^b^sabbattha^eb^ rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu ``cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano ^a^V2.0136^ea^ hoti, na dummano''ti evaṃ pavattāya chaḷaṅgupekkhāya ^b^upekkhako,^eb^ vepullappattāya satiyā ^b^satimā, na so hiṃsati^eb^ neva hiṃsati ^b^kañci^eb^ tasathāvarādibhedaṃ sattaṃ ^b^sabbaloke^eb^ sabbasmimpi loke, tiṇṇoghattā ^b^tiṇṇo,^eb^ samitapāpattā ^b^samaṇo,^eb^ āvilasaṅkappappahānā ^b^anāvilo^eb^. ^b^yassa^eb^ cime rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesaduccaritasaṅkhātā ^b^sattussadā^eb^ keci oḷārikā vā sukhumā vā ^b^na santi, so^eb^ imāya upekkhāvihāritāya sativepullatāya ahiṃsakatāya ca vippaṭipattito suṭṭhu uparatabhāvena iminā oghādinānappakārakilesavūpasamena ^a^P2.0426^ea^ ca ^b^sorato^eb^ti.

[03] 522^b^.^eb^ yasmā ca bhāvitindriyo nibbhayo nibbikāro danto hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``yassindriyānī''^eb^ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṃ byākāsi. tassattho -- ^b^yassa cakkhādīni chaḷindriyāni^eb^ gocarabhāvanāya aniccāditilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vāsanābhāvanāya satisampajaññagandhaṃ gāhāpetvā ^b^ca bhāvitāni,^eb^ tāni ca kho yathā ^b^ajjhattaṃ^eb^ gocarabhāvanāya, evaṃ pana ^b^bahiddhā ca sabbaloke^eb^ti yattha yattha indriyānaṃ vekallatā vekallatāya vā sambhavo, tattha tattha nābhijjhādivasena ^b^bhāvitānī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0151^ea^ evaṃ ^b^nibbijjha^eb^ ñatvā paṭivijjhitvā ^b^imaṃ parañca lokaṃ^eb^ sakasantatikkhandhalokaṃ parasantatikkhandhalokañca adandhamaraṇaṃ maritukāmo ^b^kālaṃ kaṅkhati,^eb^ jīvitakkhayakālaṃ āgameti patimāneti, na bhāyati maraṇassa. yathāha thero --
[21] ``maraṇe me bhayaṃ natthi, nikanti natthi jīvite''. (theragā0 20).
[27] ``nābhikaṅkhāmi maraṇaṃ, nābhikaṅkhāmi jīvitaṃ.
[22] kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmi, nibbisaṃ bhatako yathā''ti.. (theragā0 606).
[03] ^b^bhāvito sa danto^eb^ti evaṃ bhāvitindriyo so dantoti.

[03] 523^b^.^eb^ yasmā pana buddho nāma buddhisampanno kilesaniddā vibuddho ca, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``kappānī''^eb^ti gāthāya catutthapañhaṃ byākāsi. tattha ^b^kappānī^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhiyo. tā hi tathā tathā vikappanato ``kappānī''ti vuccanti. ^b^viceyyā^eb^ti aniccādibhāvena sammasitvā. ^b^kevalānī^eb^ti sakalāni. ^b^saṃsāra^eb^nti yo cāyaṃ --
[21] ``khandhānañca paṭipāṭi, dhātuāyatanāna ca.
[22] abbocchinnaṃ vattamānā, saṃsāroti pavuccatī''ti.. --

[25] evaṃ ^a^V2.0137^ea^ khandhādipaṭipāṭisaṅkhāto saṃsāro, taṃ saṃsārañca kevalaṃ viceyya. ettāvatā khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtesu kammakilesesu khandhesu cāti evaṃ tīsupi vaṭṭesu vipassanaṃ āha. ^b^dubhayaṃ cutūpapāta^eb^nti sattānaṃ cutiṃ upapātanti imañca ^a^P2.0427^ea^ ubhayaṃ viceyya ñatvāti attho. etena cutūpapātañāṇaṃ āha. ^b^vigatarajamanaṅgaṇaṃ visuddha^eb^nti rāgādirajānaṃ vigamā aṅgaṇānaṃ abhāvā malānañca vigamā vigatarajamanaṅgaṇaṃ visuddhaṃ. ^b^pattaṃ jātikhaya^eb^nti nibbānaṃ pattaṃ. ^b^tamāhu buddha^eb^nti taṃ imāya lokuttaravipassanāya cutūpapātañāṇabhedāya buddhiyā sampannattā imāya ca vigatarajāditāya kilesaniddā vibuddhattā tāya paṭipadāya jātikkhayaṃ pattaṃ buddhamāhu.

[03] atha vā ^b^kappāni viceyya kevalānī^eb^ti ``anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe amutrāsi''ntiādinā (itivu0 99; pārā0 12) nayena vicinitvāti attho. etena paṭhamavijjamāha. ^b^saṃsāraṃ dubhayaṃ cutūpapāta^eb^nti sattānaṃ cutiṃ upapātanti imañca ubhayaṃ saṃsāraṃ ^a^M2.0152^ea^ ``ime vata bhonto sattā''tiādinā nayena vicinitvāti attho. etena dutiyavijjamāha. avasesena tatiyavijjamāha. āsavakkhayañāṇena hi vigatarajāditā ca nibbānappatti ca hotīti. ^b^tamāhu buddha^eb^nti evaṃ vijjattayabhedabuddhisampannaṃ taṃ buddhamāhūti.

[03] 525^b^.^eb^ evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā dutiyagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā brahmabhāvaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ patto paramatthabrāhmaṇo bāhitasabbapāpo hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``bāhitvā''^eb^ti gāthāya paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ byākāsi. tassattho -- yo catutthamaggena ^b^bāhitvā sabbapāpakāni ṭhitatto,^eb^ ṭhito icceva vuttaṃ hoti. bāhitapāpattā eva ca ^b^vimalo,^eb^ vimalabhāvaṃ brahmabhāvaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ patto, paṭippassaddhasamādhivikkhepakarakilesamalena aggaphalasamādhinā ^b^sādhusamāhito,^eb^ saṃsārahetusamatikkamena ^b^saṃsāramaticca^eb^ pariniṭṭhitakiccatāya ^b^kevalī, so^eb^ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi anissitattā ^b^asito,^eb^ lokadhammehi nibbikārattā ^b^``tādī''^eb^ti ca pavuccati. evaṃ thutiraho ^b^sa brahmā^eb^ so brāhmaṇoti.

[03] 526^b^.^eb^ yasmā pana samitapāpatāya samaṇo, nhātapāpatāya ^a^P2.0428^ea^ nhātako, āgūnaṃ akaraṇena ca nāgoti pavuccati, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento tato aparāhi tīhi gāthāhi tayo pañhe byākāsi. tattha ^b^samitāvī^eb^ti ariyamaggena kilese sametvā ṭhito. ^b^samaṇo pavuccate tathattā^eb^ti tathārūpo samaṇo pavuccatīti. ettāvatā pañho byākato hoti, sesaṃ tasmiṃ samaṇe sabhiyassa bahumānajananatthaṃ thutivacanaṃ. yo hi samitāvī, so puññapāpānaṃ apaṭisandhikaraṇena ^a^V2.0138^ea^ pahāya puññapāpaṃ rajānaṃ vigamena virajo, aniccādivasena ñatvā imaṃ parañca lokaṃ jātimaraṇaṃ upātivatto tādi ca hoti.

[03] 527^b^.^eb^ ^b^ninhāya...pe0... nhātako^eb^ti ettha pana yo ajjhattabahiddhāsaṅkhāte sabbasmimpi āyatanaloke ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇavasena uppattirahāni sabbapāpakāni maggañāṇena ninhāya dhovitvā tāya ninhātapāpakatāya taṇhādiṭṭhikappehi kappiyesu devamanussesu kappaṃ na eti, taṃ nhātakamāhūti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] 528^b^.^eb^ catutthagāthāyapi ^b^āguṃ na karoti kiñci loke^eb^ti yo loke appamattakampi pāpasaṅkhātaṃ āguṃ na karoti, nāgo pavuccate tathattāti ^a^M2.0153^ea^. ettāvatā pañho byākato hoti, sesaṃ pubbanayeneva thutivacanaṃ. yo hi maggena pahīnāaguttā āguṃ na karoti, so kāmayogādike sabbayoge dasasaññojanabhedāni ca sabbabandhanāni visajja jahitvā sabbattha khandhādīsu kenaci saṅgena na sajjati, dvīhi ca vimuttīhi vimutto, tādi ca hotīti.

[03] 530^b^.^eb^ evaṃ dutiyagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā tatiyagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā ``khettānī''ti āyatanāni vuccanti. yathāha -- ``cakkhupetaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃpetaṃ...pe0... khettampetaṃ vatthupeta''nti (dha0 sa0 596-598). tāni vijeyya vijetvā abhibhavitvā, ^b^viceyya^eb^ vā aniccādibhāvena vicinitvā upaparikkhitvā ^b^kevalāni^eb^ anavasesāni, visesato pana saṅgahetubhūtaṃ ^b^dibbaṃ mānusakañca brahmakhettaṃ,^eb^ yaṃ dibbaṃ ^a^P2.0429^ea^ dvādasāyatanabhedaṃ tathā mānusakañca, yañca brahmakhettaṃ chaḷāyatane cakkhāyatanādidvādasāyatanabhedaṃ, taṃ sabbampi vijeyya viceyya vā. yato yadetaṃ sabbesaṃ khettānaṃ mūlabandhanaṃ avijjābhavataṇhādi, tasmā ^b^sabbakhettamūlabandhanā pamutto^eb^. evametesaṃ khettānaṃ vijitattā vicinitattā vā ^b^khettajino^eb^ nāma hoti, tasmā ^b^``khettānī''^eb^ti imāya gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṃ byākāsi. tattha keci ``kammaṃ khettaṃ, viññāṇaṃ bījaṃ, taṇhā sneho''ti (a0 ni0 3.77) vacanato kammāni khettānīti vadanti. ^b^dibbaṃ mānusakañca brahmakhetta^eb^nti ettha ca devūpagaṃ kammaṃ dibbaṃ, manussūpagaṃ kammaṃ mānusakaṃ, brahmūpagaṃ kammaṃ brahmakhettanti vaṇṇayanti. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] 531^b^.^eb^ yasmā pana sakaṭṭhena kosasadisattā ``kosānī''ti kammāni vuccanti, tesañca lunanā samucchedanā kusalo hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``kosānī''^eb^ti gāthāya dutiyapañhaṃ byākāsi. tassattho -- lokiyalokuttaravipassanāya visayato kiccato ca aniccādibhāvena kusalākusalakammasaṅkhātāni ^a^V2.0139^ea^ ^b^kosāni viceyya kevalāni,^eb^ visesato pana saṅgahetubhūtaṃ aṭṭhakāmāvacarakusalacetanābhedaṃ ^b^dibbaṃ mānusakañca^eb^ navamahaggatakusalacetanābhedañca ^b^brahmakosaṃ^eb^ viceyya. tato imāya maggabhāvanāya avijjābhavataṇhādibhedā sabbakosānaṃ mūlabandhanā pamutto, evametesaṃ kosānaṃ lunanā ^b^``kusalo''^eb^ti pavuccati, ^b^tathattā tādī^eb^ ca hotīti. atha vā sattānaṃ ^a^M2.0154^ea^ dhammānañca nivāsaṭṭhena asikosasadisattā ``kosānī''ti tayo bhavā dvādasāyatanāni ca veditabbāni. evamettha yojanā kātabbā.

[03] 532^b^.^eb^ yasmā ca na kevalaṃ paṇḍatīti imināva ``paṇḍito''ti vuccati, apica kho pana paṇḍarāni ito upagato pavicayapaññāya allīnotipi ``paṇḍito''ti vuccati, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``dubhayānī''^eb^ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṃ byākāsi ^a^P2.0430^ea^. tassattho -- ^b^ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā cā^eb^ti evaṃ ^b^ubhayāni^eb^ aniccādibhāvena ^b^viceyya. paṇḍarānī^eb^ti āyatanāni. tāni hi pakatiparisuddhattā ruḷhiyā ca evaṃ vuccanti, tāni viceyya imāya paṭipattiyā niddhantamalattā ^b^suddhipañño paṇḍito^eb^ti ^b^pavuccati tathattā,^eb^ yasmā tāni paṇḍarāni paññāya ito hoti, sesamassa thutivacanaṃ. so hi pāpapuññasaṅkhātaṃ kaṇhasukkaṃ upātivatto tādī ca hoti, tasmā evaṃ thuto.

[03] 533^b^.^eb^ yasmā pana ``monaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ, yā paññā pajānanā...pe0... sammādiṭṭhi, tena ñāṇena samannāgato munī''ti vuttaṃ, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``asatañcā''^eb^ti gāthāya catutthapañhaṃ byākāsi. tassattho -- yvāyaṃ akusalakusalappabhedo asatañca satañca dhammo, taṃ ^b^ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ ^b^sabbaloke^eb^ pavicayañāṇena ^b^asatañca satañca ñatvā dhammaṃ^eb^ tassa ñātattā eva rāgādibhedato sattavidhaṃ ^b^saṅgaṃ^eb^ taṇhādiṭṭhibhedato duvidhaṃ ^b^jālañca aticca^eb^ atikkamitvā ṭhito. so tena monasaṅkhātena pavicayañāṇena samannāgatattā ^b^muni. devamanussehi pūjanīyo^eb^ti idaṃ panassa thutivacanaṃ. so hi khīṇāsavamunittā devamanussānaṃ pūjāraho hoti, tasmā evaṃ thuto.

[03] 535^b^.^eb^ evaṃ tatiyagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā catutthagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā yo catūhi maggañāṇavedehi kilesakkhayaṃ karonto gato, so paramatthato ^b^vedagū^eb^ nāma hoti. yo ca sabbasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ satthasaññitāni ^b^vedāni,^eb^ tāyeva maggabhāvanāya kiccato aniccādivasena ^b^viceyya^eb^. tattha chandarāgappahānena tameva ^a^M2.0155^ea^ ^b^sabbaṃ vedamaticca^eb^ yā vedapaccayā vā aññathā vā uppajjanti vedanā ^a^P2.0431^ea^, tāsu ^b^sabbavedanāsu vītarāgo^eb^ hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento ``idaṃ ^a^V2.0140^ea^ pattina''nti avatvā ^b^``vedānī''^eb^ti gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṃ byākāsi. yasmā vā yo pavicayapaññāya vedāni viceyya, tattha chandarāgappahānena sabbaṃ vedamaticca vattati, so satthasaññitāni vedāni gato ñāto atikkanto ca hoti. yo vedanāsu vītarāgo, sopi vedanāsaññitāni vedāni gato atikkanto ca hoti. vedāni gatotipi vedagū, tasmā tampi atthaṃ dassento ``idaṃ pattina''nti avatvā imāya gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṃ byākāsi.

[03] 536^b^.^eb^ yasmā pana dutiyapañhe ^b^``anuvidito''^eb^ti anubuddho vuccati, so ca ^b^anuvicca papañcanāmarūpaṃ ajjhattaṃ^eb^ attano santāne taṇhāmānadiṭṭhibhedaṃ papañcaṃ tappaccayā nāmarūpañca aniccānupassanādīhi anuvicca anuviditvā, na kevalañca ^b^ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhā ca rogamūlaṃ,^eb^ parasantāne ca imassa nāmarūparogassa mūlaṃ avijjābhavataṇhādiṃ, tameva vā papañcaṃ anuvicca tāya bhāvanāya sabbesaṃ rogānaṃ mūlabandhanā, sabbasmā vā rogānaṃ mūlabandhanā, avijjābhavataṇhādibhedā, tasmā eva vā papañcā pamutto hoti, tasmā taṃ dassento ``anuviccā''ti gāthāya dutiyapañhaṃ byākāsi.

[03] 537^b^.^eb^ ``kathañca vīriyavā''ti ettha pana yasmā yo ariyamaggena sabbapāpakehi virato, tathā viratattā ca āyatiṃ apaṭisandhitāya ^b^nirayadukkhaṃ aticca^eb^ ṭhito vīriyavāso vīriyaniketo, so khīṇāsavo ``vīriyavā''ti vattabbataṃ arahati, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``virato''^eb^ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṃ byākāsi. ^b^padhānavā dhīro tādī^eb^ti imāni panassa thutivacanāni. so hi padhānavā maggajhānapadhānena, dhīro kilesārividdhaṃsanasamatthatāya, tādī nibbikāratāya, tasmā evaṃ thuto. sesaṃ yojetvā vattabbaṃ.

[03] 538^b^.^eb^ ``ājāniyo kinti nāma hotī''ti ettha pana yasmā ^a^P2.0432^ea^ pahīnasabbavaṅkadoso kāraṇākāraṇaññū asso vā hatthī vā ``ājāniyo hotī''ti ^a^M2.0156^ea^ loke vuccati, na ca tassa sabbaso te dosā pahīnā eva, khīṇāsavassa pana te pahīnā, tasmā so ``ājāniyo''ti paramatthato vattabbataṃ arahatīti dassento ^b^``yassā''^eb^ti gāthāya catutthapañhaṃ byākāsi. tassattho -- ^b^ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā cā^eb^ti evaṃ ajjhattabahiddhāsaññojanasaṅkhātāni ^b^yassa assu lunāni bandhanāni^eb^ paññāsatthena chinnāni padālitāni. ^b^saṅgamūla^eb^nti yāni tesu tesu vatthūsu saṅgassa sajjanāya anatikkamanāya mūlaṃ honti, atha vā yassa assu lunāni rāgādīni bandhanāni yāni ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ca saṅgamūlāni honti, so sabbasmā saṅgānaṃ mūlabhūtā sabbasaṅgānaṃ vā mūlabhūtā bandhanā pamutto ^b^``ājāniyo''^eb^ti vuccati, tathattā tādi ca hotīti.

[03] 540^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^V2.0141^ea^ catutthagāthāya vuttapañhe vissajjetvā pañcamagāthāya vuttapañhesupi yasmā yaṃ chandajjhenamattena akkharacintakā sottiyaṃ vaṇṇayanti, vohāramattasottiyo so. ariyo pana bāhusaccena nissutapāpatāya ca paramatthasottiyo hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento ``idaṃ pattina''nti avatvā ^b^``sutvā''^eb^ti gāthāya paṭhamapañhaṃ byākāsi. tassattho -- yo imasmiṃ loke sutamayapaññākiccavasena ^b^sutvā^eb^ kātabbakiccavasena vā sutvā vipassanūpagaṃ ^b^sabbadhammaṃ^eb^ aniccādivasena ^b^abhiññāya sāvajjānavajjaṃ yadatthi kiñci,^eb^ imāya paṭipadāya kilese kilesaṭṭhāniye ca dhamme abhibhavitvā abhibhūti saṅkhaṃ gato, taṃ sutvā sabbadhammaṃ abhiññāya loke sāvajjānavajjaṃ yadatthi kiñci, ^b^abhibhuṃ^eb^ sutavattā ^b^sottiyoti āhu^eb^. yasmā ca yo akathaṃkathī kilesabandhanehi vimutto, rāgādīhi īghehi anīgho ca hoti sabbadhi sabbesu dhammesu khandhāyatanādīsu, tasmā taṃ ^b^akathaṃkathiṃ vimuttaṃ anīghaṃ sabbadhi^eb^ nissutapāpakattāpi ``sottiyo''ti āhūti.

[03] 541^b^.^eb^ yasmā pana hitakāmena janena ^a^P2.0433^ea^ araṇīyato ariyo hoti, abhigamanīyatoti attho. tasmā yehi guṇehi so araṇīyo hoti, te dassentā ^b^``chetvā''^eb^ti gāthāya dutiyapañhaṃ byākāsi. tassattho -- cattāri ^b^āsavāni^eb^ dve ca^b^ ālayāni^eb^ paññāsatthena ^b^chetvā vidvā^eb^ viññū vibhāvī catumaggañāṇī ^b^so^eb^ punabbhavavasena ^b^na upeti^eb^ ^a^M2.0157^ea^ ^b^gabbhaseyyaṃ,^eb^ kañci yoniṃ na upagacchati, kāmādibhedañca ^b^saññaṃ tividhaṃ^eb^. kāmaguṇasaṅkhātañca ^b^paṅkaṃ panujja^eb^ panuditvā taṇhādiṭṭhikappānaṃ aññatarampi ^b^kappaṃ na eti,^eb^ evaṃ āsavacchedādiguṇasamannāgataṃ ^b^tamāhu ariyo^eb^ti. yasmā vā pāpakehi ārakattā ariyo hoti anaye ca anirīyanā, tasmā tampi atthaṃ dassento imāya gāthāya dutiyapañhaṃ byākāsi. āsavādayo hi pāpakā dhammā anayasammatā, te cānena chinnā panunnā, na ca tehi kampati, iccassa te ārakā honti, na ca tesu irīyati tasmā ārakāssa honti pāpakā dhammāti imināpatthena. anaye na irīyatīti imināpatthena tamāhu ariyoti ca evampettha yojanā veditabbā. ``vidvā so na upeti gabbhaseyya''nti idaṃ pana imasmiṃ atthavikappe thutivacanameva hoti.

[03] 542^b^.^eb^ ``kathaṃ caraṇavā''ti ettha pana yasmā caraṇehi pattabbaṃ patto ``caraṇavā''ti vattabbataṃ arahati, tasmā taṃ dassento ^b^``yo idhā''^eb^ti gāthāya tatiyapañhaṃ byākāsi. tattha ^b^yo idhā^eb^ti yo imasmiṃ sāsane. ^b^caraṇesū^eb^ti sīlādīsu hemavatasutte (su0 ni0 153 ādayo) vuttapannarasadhammesu. nimittatthe bhummavacanaṃ. ^b^pattipatto^eb^ti pattabbaṃ patto. yo caraṇanimittaṃ caraṇahetu caraṇapaccayā pattabbaṃ arahattaṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^caraṇavā so^eb^ti so ^a^V2.0142^ea^ imāya caraṇehi pattabbapattiyā caraṇavā hotīti. ettāvatā pañho byākato hoti, sesamassa thutivacanaṃ. yo hi caraṇehi pattipatto, so ^b^kusalo^eb^ ca hoti cheko, ^b^sabbadā^eb^ ca ^b^ājānāti nibbānadhammaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0434^ea^, niccaṃ nibbānaninnacittatāya ^b^sabbattha^eb^ ca khandhādīsu ^b^na sajjati^eb^. dvīhi ca vimuttīhi ^b^vimuttacitto^eb^ hoti, ^b^paṭighā yassa na santī^eb^ti.

[03] 543^b^.^eb^ yasmā pana kammādīnaṃ paribbājanena paribbājako nāma hoti, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``dukkhavepakka''^eb^nti gāthāya catutthapañhaṃ byākāsi. tattha vipāko eva vepakkaṃ, dukkhaṃ vepakkamassāti ^b^dukkhavepakkaṃ^eb^. pavattidukkhajananato sabbampi tedhātukakammaṃ vuccati. ^b^uddha^eb^nti atītaṃ. ^b^adho^eb^ti anāgataṃ. ^b^tiriyaṃ vāpi majjhe^eb^ti paccuppannaṃ. tañhi na uddhaṃ na adho, tiriyaṃ ubhinnañca antarā, tena ``majjhe''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^paribbājayitvā^eb^ti nikkhāmetvā niddhametvā ^a^M2.0158^ea^. ^b^pariññacārī^eb^ti paññāya paricchinditvā caranto. ayaṃ tāva apubbapadavaṇṇanā. ayaṃ pana adhippāyayojanā -- yo tiyaddhapariyāpannampi dukkhajanakaṃ yadatthi kiñci kammaṃ, taṃ sabbampi ariyamaggena taṇhāvijjāsinehe sosento apaṭisandhijanakabhāvakaraṇena paribbājayitvā tathā paribbājitattā eva ca taṃ kammaṃ pariññāya caraṇato pariññacārī. na kevalañca kammameva, māyaṃ mānamathopi lobhakodhaṃ imepi dhamme pahānapariññāya pariññacārī, pariyantamakāsi nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpassa ca pariyantamakāsi paribbājesi iccevattho. imesaṃ kammādīnaṃ paribbājanena taṃ paribbājakamāhu. pattipattanti idaṃ panassa thutivacanaṃ.

[03] 544^b^.^eb^ evaṃ pañhabyākaraṇena tuṭṭhassa pana sabhiyassa ^b^``yāni ca tīṇī''^eb^tiādīsu abhitthavanagāthāsu ^b^osaraṇānī^eb^ti ogahaṇāni titthāni, diṭṭhiyoti attho. tāni yasmā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā saha brahmajāle vuttadvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatāni gahetvā tesaṭṭhi honti, yasmā ca tāni aññatitthiyasamaṇānaṃ pavādabhūtāni satthāni sitāni upadisitabbavasena, na uppattivasena. uppattivasena pana yadetaṃ ``itthī puriso''ti saññakkharaṃ ^a^P2.0435^ea^ vohāranāmaṃ, yā cāyaṃ micchāparivitakkānussavādivasena ``evarūpena attanā bhavitabba''nti bālānaṃ viparītasaññā uppajjati, tadubhayanissitāni tesaṃ vasena uppajjanti, na attapaccakkhāni. tāni ca bhagavā ^b^vineyya^eb^ vinayitvā ^b^oghatamagā^eb^ oghatamaṃ oghandhakāraṃ agā atikkanto. ``oghantamagā''tipi pāṭho, oghānaṃ antaṃ agā, tasmā āha ``yāni ca tīṇi...pe0... tamagā''ti.

[03] 545^b^.^eb^ tato paraṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ pārañca nibbānaṃ tappattiyā dukkhābhāvato tappaṭipakkhato ^a^V2.0143^ea^ ca taṃ sandhāyāha, ``antagūsi pāragū dukkhassā''ti. atha vā pāragū bhagavā nibbānaṃ gatattā, taṃ ālapanto āha, ``pāragū antagūsi dukkhassā''ti ayamettha sambandho. sammā ca buddho sāmañca buddhoti ^b^sammāsambuddho. taṃ maññe^eb^ti tameva maññāmi, na aññanti accādarena bhaṇati. ^b^jutimā^eb^ti paresampi andhakāravidhamanena jutisampanno. ^b^mutimā^eb^ti aparappaccayañeyyañāṇasamatthāya mutiyā paññāya ^a^M2.0159^ea^ sampanno. ^b^pahūtapañño^eb^ti anantapañño. idha sabbaññutaññāṇamadhippetaṃ. ^b^dukkhassantakarā^eb^ti āmantento āha. ^b^atāresi ma^eb^nti kaṅkhāto maṃ tāresi.

[03] 546-9^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃ me^eb^tiādigāthāya namakkārakaraṇaṃ bhaṇati. tattha ^b^kaṅkhitta^eb^nti vīsatipañhanissitaṃ atthaṃ sandhāyāha. so hi tena kaṅkhito ahosi. ^b^monapathesū^eb^ti ñāṇapathesu. ^b^vinaḷīkatā^eb^ti vigatanaḷā katā, ucchinnāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^nāga nāgassā^eb^ti ekaṃ āmantanavacanaṃ, ekassa ``bhāsato anumodantī''ti iminā sambandho. ``dhammadesana''nti pāṭhaseso. ^b^sabbe devā^eb^ti ākāsaṭṭhā ca bhūmaṭṭhā ca. ^b^nāradapabbatā^eb^ti tepi kira dve devagaṇā paññavanto, tepi anumodantīti sabbaṃ pasādena ca namakkārakaraṇaṃ bhaṇati ^a^P2.0436^ea^.

[03] 550-53^b^.^eb^ anumodanārahaṃ byākaraṇasampadaṃ sutvā ^b^``namo te''^eb^ti añjaliṃ paggahetvā āha. ^b^purisājaññā^eb^ti purisesu jātisampannaṃ. ^b^paṭipuggalo^eb^ti paṭibhāgo puggalo tuvaṃ buddho catusaccapaṭivedhena, ^b^satthā^eb^ anusāsaniyā satthavāhatāya ca, ^b^mārābhibhū^eb^ catumārābhibhavena, ^b^muni^eb^ buddhamuni. ^b^upadhī^eb^ti khandhakilesakāmaguṇābhisaṅkhārabhedā cattāro. ^b^vaggū^eb^ti abhirūpaṃ. ^b^puññe cā^eb^ti lokiye ^b^na limpasi^eb^ tesaṃ akaraṇena, pubbe katānampi vā āyatiṃ phalūpabhogābhāvena. taṃnimittena vā taṇhādiṭṭhilepena. ^b^vandati satthuno^eb^ti evaṃ bhaṇanto gopphakesu pariggahetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitaṃ vandi.

[03] ^b^aññatitthiyapubbo^eb^ti aññatitthiyo eva. ^b^ākaṅkhatī^eb^ti icchati. ^b^āraddhacittā^eb^ti abhirādhitacittā. ^b^apica mettha puggalavemattatā viditā^eb^ti apica mayā ettha aññatitthiyānaṃ parivāse puggalanānattaṃ viditaṃ, na sabbeneva parivasitabbanti. kena pana na parivasitabbaṃ? aggiyehi jaṭilehi, sākiyena jātiyā, liṅgaṃ vijahitvā āgatena. avijahitvā āgatopi ca yo maggaphalapaṭilābhāya hetusampanno hoti, tādisova sabhiyo paribbājako. tasmā bhagavā ``tava pana, sabhiya, titthiyavattapūraṇatthāya parivāsakāraṇaṃ natthi, atthatthiko tvaṃ `maggaphalapaṭilābhāya hetusampanno'ti viditametaṃ mayā''ti tassa pabbajjaṃ anujānanto ^a^M2.0160^ea^ āha -- ``apica ^a^V2.0144^ea^ mettha puggalavemattatā viditā''ti. sabhiyo pana attano ādaraṃ dassento āha ^b^``sace bhante''^eb^ti. taṃ sabbaṃ aññañca tathārūpaṃ uttānatthattā pubbe vuttanayattā ca idha na vaṇṇitaṃ, yato pubbe vaṇṇitānusārena veditabbanti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya sabhiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0145^ea^ ^a^P2.0437^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti selasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? ayameva yāssa nidāne vuttā. atthavaṇṇanākkamepi cassa pubbasadisaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. yaṃ pana apubbaṃ, taṃ uttānatthāni padāni pariharantā vaṇṇayissāma. ^b^aṅguttarāpesū^eb^ti aṅgā eva so janapado, gaṅgāya pana yā uttarena āpo, tāsaṃ avidūrattā ``uttarāpo''tipi vuccati. kataragaṅgāya uttarena yā āpoti? mahāmahīgaṅgāya.

[03] tatrāyaṃ tassā nadiyā āvibhāvatthaṃ ādito pabhuti vaṇṇanā -- ayaṃ kira jambudīpo dasasahassayojanaparimāṇo. tattha catusahassayojanaparimāṇo padeso udakena ajjhotthaṭo ``samuddo''ti saṅkhaṃ gato. tisahassayojanapamāṇe manussā vasanti. tisahassayojanapamāṇe himavā patiṭṭhito ubbedhena pañcayojanasatiko caturāsītisahassakūṭehi paṭimaṇḍito samantato sandamānapañcasatanadīvicitto. yattha āyāmavitthārena gambhīratāya ca paññāsapaññāsayojanā diyaḍḍhayojanasataparimaṇḍalā pūraḷāsasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttā anotattādayo satta mahāsarā patiṭṭhitā.

[03] tesu ^b^anotatto^eb^ sudassanakūṭaṃ, citrakūṭaṃ, kāḷakūṭaṃ, gandhamādanakūṭaṃ, kelāsakūṭanti imehi pañcahi pabbatehi parikkhitto. tattha sudassanakūṭaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ dviyojanasatubbedhaṃ antovaṅkaṃ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ tameva ^a^M2.0161^ea^ saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ, citrakūṭaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ, kāḷakūṭaṃ añjanamayaṃ, gandhamādanakūṭaṃ sānumayaṃ abbhantare muggavaṇṇaṃ ^a^P2.0438^ea^ nānappakāraosadhasañchannaṃ kāḷapakkhuposathadivase ādittamiva aṅgāraṃ jalantaṃ tiṭṭhati, kelāsakūṭaṃ rajatamayaṃ. sabbāni sudassanena samānubbedhasaṇṭhānāni tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni. sabbāni devānubhāvena nāgānubhāvena ca vassanti, nadiyo ca tesu sandanti. taṃ sabbampi udakaṃ anotattameva pavisati. candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena taṃ obhāsenti, ujuṃ gacchantā na obhāsenti. tenevassa ``anotatta''nti saṅkhā udapādi.

[03] tattha manoharasilātalāni nimmacchakacchapāni phalikasadisanimmalūdakāni nahānatitthāni suppaṭiyattāni ^a^V2.0146^ea^ honti, yesu buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā isigaṇā ca nhāyanti, devayakkhādayo ca uyyānakīḷikaṃ kīḷanti.

[03] catūsu cassa passesu sīhamukhaṃ, hatthimukhaṃ, assamukhaṃ, usabhamukhanti cattāri mukhāni honti, yehi catasso nadiyo sandanti. sīhamukhena nikkhantanadītīre sīhā bahutarā honti, hatthimukhādīhi hatthiassausabhā. puratthimadisato nikkhantanadī anotattaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma pācīnahimavanteneva amanussapathaṃ gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisati. pacchimadisato ca uttaradisato ca nikkhantanadiyopi tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva ca amanussapathaṃ gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisanti. dakkhiṇadisato nikkhantanadī pana taṃ tikkhattuṃ ^a^P2.0439^ea^ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dakkhiṇena ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva saṭṭhiyojanāni gantvā pabbataṃ paharitvā vuṭṭhāya pariṇāhena tigāvutapamāṇā udakadhārā hutvā ākāsena saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā, pāsāṇo udakadhārāvegena bhinno. tatra paññāsayojanapamāṇā tiyaggaḷā nāma pokkharaṇī jātā. pokkharaṇiyā kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisiya saṭṭhi yojanāni gatā. tato ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā umaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā hatthatale pañcaṅgulisadisā pañcadhārā hutvā pavattati. sā tikkhattuṃ anotattaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne ^b^``āvaṭṭagaṅgā''^eb^ti vuccati ^a^M2.0162^ea^. ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne ^b^``kaṇhagaṅgā''^eb^ti vuccati. ākāsena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne ^b^``ākāsagaṅgā''^eb^ti vuccati. tiyaggaḷapāsāṇe paññāsayojanokāse ^b^``tiyaggaḷapokkharaṇī''^eb^ti vuccati. kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisiya saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne ^b^``bahalagaṅgā''^eb^ti vuccati. pathaviṃ bhinditvā umaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne ^b^``umaṅgagaṅgā''^eb^ti vuccati. viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā pañcadhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne ``gaṅgā, yamunā, aciravatī, sarabhū, mahī''ti pañcadhā vuccati. evametā pañca mahāgaṅgā himavatā sambhavanti. tāsu yā ayaṃ pañcamī mahī nāma, sā idha ``mahāmahīgaṅgā''ti adhippetā. tassā gaṅgāya uttarena yā āpo, tāsaṃ avidūrattā so janapado ``aṅguttarāpo''ti veditabbo. tasmiṃ janapade aṅguttarāpesu.

[03] ^b^cārikaṃ caramāno^eb^ti addhānagamanaṃ kurumāno ^a^P2.0440^ea^. tattha bhagavato duvidhā cārikā turitacārikā, aturitacārikā ca. tattha dūrepi bhabbapuggale disvā sahasā gamanaṃ turitacārikā. sā mahākassapapaccuggamanādīsu daṭṭhabbā. taṃ paccuggacchanto hi bhagavā muhutteneva tigāvutaṃ agamāsi, āḷavakadamanatthaṃ tiṃsayojanaṃ, tathā aṅgulimālassatthāya. pukkusātissa ^a^V2.0147^ea^ pana pañcattālīsayojanaṃ, mahākappinassa vīsayojanasataṃ, dhaniyassatthāya sattayojanasataṃ addhānaṃ agamāsi. ayaṃ ^b^turitacārikā^eb^ nāma. gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭiyā pana piṇḍapātacariyādīhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhantassa gamanaṃ ^b^aturitacārikā^eb^ nāma. ayaṃ idha adhippetā. evaṃ cārikaṃ caramāno. ^b^mahatā^eb^ti saṅkhyāmahatā guṇamahatā ca. ^b^bhikkhusaṅghenā^eb^ti samaṇagaṇena. ^b^aḍḍhateḷasehī^eb^ti aḍḍhena teḷasahi, dvādasahi satehi paññāsāya ca bhikkhūhi saddhinti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^yena...pe0... tadavasarī^eb^ti āpaṇabahulatāya so nigamo ``āpaṇo'' tveva nāmaṃ labhi. tasmiṃ kira vīsatiāpaṇamukhasahassāni vibhattāni ahesuṃ. yena disābhāgena maggena vā so aṅguttarāpānaṃ raṭṭhassa nigamo osaritabbo, tena avasari tadavasari agamāsi, taṃ nigamaṃ anupāpuṇīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^keṇiyo jaṭilo^eb^ti keṇiyoti nāmena, jaṭiloti tāpaso. so kira brāhmaṇamahāsālo, dhanarakkhaṇatthāya pana tāpasapabbajjaṃ samādāya rañño paṇṇākāraṃ datvā bhūmibhāgaṃ gahetvā tattha assamaṃ kāretvā vasati kulasahassassa nissayo hutvā. assamepi cassa eko ^a^M2.0163^ea^ tālarukkho divase divase ekaṃ suvaṇṇaphalaṃ muñcatīti vadanti. so divā kāsāyāni dhāreti jaṭā ca bandhati, rattiṃ yathāsukhaṃ pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto paricāreti. ^b^sakyaputto^eb^ti uccākulaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^sakyakulā pabbajito^eb^ti saddhāya pabbajitabhāvaparidīpanaṃ, kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūto aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ ^a^P2.0441^ea^ kulaṃ pahāya saddhāya pabbajitoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^taṃ kho panā^eb^ti itthambhūtākhyānatthe upayogavacanaṃ, tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho. ^b^kalyāṇo^eb^ti kalyāṇaguṇasamannāgato, seṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^kittisaddo^eb^ti kittiyeva thutighoso vā.

[03] ^b^itipi so bhagavā^eb^ti ādimhi pana ayaṃ tāva yojanā -- so bhagavā itipi arahaṃ, itipi sammāsambuddho...pe0... itipi bhagavāti, iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti. tattha ārakattā, arīnaṃ arānañca hatattā paccayādīnaṃ arahattā, pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvāti imehi tāva kāraṇehi so bhagavā ^b^araha^eb^nti veditabbo. ārakā hi so sabbakilesehi maggena savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattāti ārakattā arahaṃ. te cānena kilesārayo maggena hatāti arīnaṃ hatattāpi arahaṃ. yañcetaṃ avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhi, puññādiabhisaṅkhārānaṃ jarāmaraṇanemi, āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā tibhavarathe samāyojitaṃ anādikālapavattaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ. tassānena bodhimaṇḍe vīriyapādehi sīlapathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya saddhāhatthena kammakkhayakarañāṇapharasuṃ gahetvā sabbe arā hatāti arānaṃ hatattātipi arahaṃ ^a^V2.0148^ea^. aggadakkhiṇeyyattā ca cīvarādipaccaye sakkāragarukārādīni ca arahatīti paccayādīnaṃ arahattāpi arahaṃ. yathā ca loke keci paṇḍitamānino bālā asilokabhayena raho pāpaṃ karonti, evaṃ nāyaṃ kadāci karotīti pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvatopi arahaṃ. hoti cettha --
[21] ``ārakattā hatattā ca, kilesārīna so muni.
[27] hatasaṃsāracakkāro, paccayādīna cāraho.
[22] na raho karoti pāpāni, arahaṃ tena pavuccatī''ti..

[03] sammā sāmañca saccānaṃ buddhattā ^b^sammāsambuddho^eb^. atisayavisuddhāhi vijjāhi abbhuttamena caraṇena ca samannāgatattā ^a^P2.0442^ea^ ^b^vijjācaraṇasampanno^eb^. sobhanagamanattā ^a^M2.0164^ea^ sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ gatattā suṭṭhu gatattā sammā gadattā ca ^b^sugato^eb^. sabbathāpi viditalokattā ^b^lokavidū^eb^. so hi bhagavā sabhāvato samudayato nirodhato nirodhūpāyatoti sabbathā khandhāyatanādibhedaṃ saṅkhāralokaṃ avedi, ``eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā. dve lokā nāmañca rūpañca. tayo lokā tisso vedanā. cattāro lokā cattāro āhārā. pañca lokā pañcupādānakkhandhā. cha lokā cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni. satta lokā satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo. aṭṭha lokā aṭṭha lokadhammā. nava lokā nava sattāvāsā. dasa lokā dasāyatanāni. dvādasa lokā dvādasāyatanāni. aṭṭhārasa lokā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.112) evaṃ sabbathā saṅkhāralokaṃ avedi. sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti, anusayaṃ jānāti, caritaṃ jānāti, adhimuttiṃ jānāti, apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye bhabbe abhabbe satte jānātīti sabbathā sattalokaṃ avedi. tathā ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ āyāmato vitthārato ca yojanānaṃ dvādasa satasahassāni tīṇi sahassāni aḍḍhapañcamāni ca satāni, parikkhepato chattiṃsa satasahassāni dasa sahassāni aḍḍhuḍḍhāni ca satāni.
[03] tattha --
[21] duve satasahassāni, cattāri nahutāni ca.
[22] ettakaṃ bahalattena, saṅkhātāyaṃ vasundharā..
[21] cattāri ^a^V2.0149^ea^ satasahassāni, aṭṭheva nahutāni ca.
[22] ettakaṃ bahalattena, jalaṃ vāte patiṭṭhitaṃ..
[21] nava satasahassāni, māluto nabhamuggato.
[22] saṭṭhi ceva sahassāni, esā lokassa saṇṭhiti''..
[03] evaṃ saṇṭhite cettha yojanānaṃ --
[21] caturāsīti sahassāni, ajjhogāḷho mahaṇṇave.
[22] accuggato ^a^P2.0443^ea^ tāvadeva, sineru pabbatuttamo..
[21] tato ^a^M2.0165^ea^ upaḍḍhupaḍḍhena, pamāṇena yathākkamaṃ.
[22] ajjhogāḷhuggatā dibbā, nānāratanacittitā..
[21] yugandharo īsadharo, karavīko sudassano.
[22] nemindharo vinatako, assakaṇṇo giri brahā..
[21] ete satta mahāselā, sinerussa samantato.
[22] mahārājānamāvāsā, devayakkhanisevitā..
[21] yojanānaṃ satānucco, himavā pañca pabbato.
[22] yojanānaṃ sahassāni, tīṇi āyatavitthato..
[21] caturāsītisahassehi, kūṭehi paṭimaṇḍito.
[22] tipañcayojanakkhandha-parikkhepā nagavhayā..
[21] paññāsayojanakkhandha-sākhāyāmā samantato.
[22] sattayojanavitthiṇṇā, tāvadeva ca uggatā..
[21] jambū ^a^V2.0150^ea^ yassānubhāvena, jambudīpo pakāsito.
[22] dve asītisahassāni, ajjhogāḷho mahaṇṇave..
[21] accuggato tāvadeva, cakkavāḷasiluccayo.
[22] parikkhipitvā taṃ sabbaṃ, cakkavāḷamayaṃ ṭhito''..

[03] tattha candamaṇḍalaṃ ekūnapaññāsayojanaṃ, sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāsayojanaṃ, tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ dasasahassayojanaṃ, tathā asurabhavanaṃ avīcimahānirayo jambudīpo ca. aparagoyānaṃ sattasahassayojanaṃ, tathā pubbavideho, uttarakuru aṭṭhasahassayojano. ekameko cettha mahādīpo pañcasatapañcasataparittadīpaparivāro. taṃ sabbampi ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ ekā lokadhātu. cakkavāḷantaresu lokantarikanirayā. evaṃ anantāni cakkavāḷāni anantā lokadhātuyo, anantena buddhañāṇena aññāsīti sabbathā okāsalokaṃ avedi. evaṃ so bhagavā sabbathā. viditalokattā lokavidūti veditabbo.

[03] attano pana guṇehi visiṭṭhatarassa kassaci abhāvā ^b^anuttaro^eb^. vicittehi vinayanūpāyehi purisadamme sāretīti ^b^purisadammasārathi^eb^. diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi ^a^M2.0166^ea^ ^a^P2.0444^ea^ yathārahaṃ anusāsati nitthāreti cāti ^b^satthā^eb^. devamanussaggahaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena bhabbapuggalapariggahavasena ca kataṃ, nāgādikepi pana esa lokiyatthena anusāsati. yadatthi neyyaṃ nāma, sabbassa buddhattā vimokkhantikañāṇavasena ^b^buddho^eb^. yato pana so --
[21] ``bhagyavā bhaggavā yutto, bhagehi ca vibhattavā.
[22] bhattavā vantagamano, bhavesu bhagavā tato''ti..
[03] ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panetāni padāni visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.124-125) vuttāni.

[03] ^b^so imaṃ loka^eb^nti so bhagavā imaṃ lokaṃ. idāni vattabbaṃ nidasseti. ^b^sadevaka^eb^ntiādīni kasibhāradvājāaḷavakasuttesu vuttanayāneva. ^b^saya^eb^nti sāmaṃ aparaneyyo hutvā. ^b^abhiññā^eb^ti abhiññāya. ^b^sacchikatvā^eb^ti paccakkhaṃ katvā. ^b^pavedetī^eb^ti bodheti ñāpeti pakāseti. ^b^so dhammaṃ deseti...pe0... pariyosānakalyāṇa^eb^nti so bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca ^a^V2.0151^ea^ anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ hitvāpi dhammaṃ deseti. tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva deseti. kathaṃ? ekagāthāpi hi samantabhaddakattā dhammassa paṭhamapādena ādikalyāṇā, dutiyatatiyapādehi majjhekalyāṇā, pacchimapādena pariyosānakalyāṇā. ekānusandhikaṃ suttaṃ nidānena ādikalyāṇaṃ, nigamanena pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, sesena majjhekalyāṇaṃ. nānānusandhikaṃ paṭhamānusandhinā ādikalyāṇaṃ, pacchimena pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ, sesehi majjhekalyāṇaṃ. sakalopi sāsanadhammo attano atthabhūtena sīlena ādikalyāṇo, samathavipassanāmaggaphalehi majjhekalyāṇo, nibbānena pariyosānakalyāṇo. sīlasamādhīhi vā ādikalyāṇo, vipassanāmaggehi majjhekalyāṇo, phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo. buddhasubodhitāya vā ādikalyāṇo, dhammasudhammatāya majjhekalyāṇo, saṅghasuppaṭipattiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo ^a^P2.0445^ea^. taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipannena adhigantabbāya abhisambodhiyā vā ādikalyāṇo, paccekabodhiyā majjhekalyāṇo, sāvakabodhiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo ^a^M2.0167^ea^. suyyamāno cesa nīvaraṇādivikkhambhanato savanenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti ādikalyāṇo, paṭipajjamāno samathavipassanāsukhāvahanato paṭipattiyāpi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti majjhekalyāṇo, tathā paṭipanno ca paṭipattiphale niṭṭhite tādibhāvāvahanato paṭipattiphalenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti pariyosānakalyāṇo. nāthappabhavattā ca pabhavasuddhiyā ādikalyāṇo, atthasuddhiyā majjhekalyāṇo, kiccasuddhiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo. yato appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desento ādikalyāṇādippakārameva desetīti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^sātthaṃ sabyañjana^eb^nti evamādīsu pana yasmā imaṃ dhammaṃ desento sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti, nānānayehi dīpeti, tañca yathāsambhavaṃ atthasampattiyā ^b^sātthaṃ,^eb^ byañjanasampattiyā ^b^sabyañjanaṃ^eb^. saṅkāsanapakāsanavivaraṇavibhajanauttānīkaraṇapaññattiatthapadasamāyogato sātthaṃ, akkharapadabyañjanākāraniruttiniddesasampattiyā sabyañjanaṃ. atthagambhīratāpaṭivedhagambhīratāhi sātthaṃ, dhammagambhīratādesanāgambhīratāhi sabyañjanaṃ. atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāvisayato sātthaṃ, dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāvisayato sabyañjanaṃ. paṇḍitavedanīyato sarikkhakajanappasādakanti sātthaṃ, saddheyyato lokiyajanappasādakanti sabyañjanaṃ. gambhīrādhippāyato sātthaṃ, uttānapadato sabyañjanaṃ. upanetabbassābhāvato sakalaparipuṇṇabhāvena ^b^kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ,^eb^ apanetabbassa abhāvato niddosabhāvena ^b^parisuddhaṃ^eb^. sikkhattayapariggahitattā brahmabhūtehi seṭṭhehi caritabbato tesañca cariyabhāvato ^b^brahmacariyaṃ^eb^. tasmā ``sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ...pe0... brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī''ti vuccati.

[03] apica ^a^V2.0152^ea^ yasmā sanidānaṃ sauppattikañca desento ādikalyāṇaṃ deseti, vineyyānaṃ anurūpato atthassa aviparītatāya hetudāharaṇayogato ca majjhekalyāṇaṃ ^a^P2.0446^ea^, sotūnaṃ saddhāpaṭilābhena nigamanena ca pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ. evaṃ desento ca brahmacariyaṃ pakāseti. tañca paṭipattiyā adhigamabyattito sātthaṃ, pariyattiyā āgamabyattito sabyañjanaṃ, sīlādipañcadhammakkhandhayuttato kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ, nirupakkilesato nittharaṇatthāya pavattito lokāmisanirapekkhato ca ^a^M2.0168^ea^ parisuddhaṃ, seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūtānaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ cariyato brahmacariyanti vuccati, tasmāpi ``so dhammaṃ deseti...pe0... brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī''ti vuccati.

[03] ^b^sādhu kho panā^eb^ti sundaraṃ kho pana, atthāvahaṃ sukhāvahanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^dhammiyā kathāyā^eb^ti pānakānisaṃsapaṭisaṃyuttāya. ayañhi keṇiyo sāyanhasamaye bhagavato āgamanaṃ assosi. ``tucchahattho bhagavantaṃ dassanāya gantuṃ lajjamāno vikālabhojanā viratānampi pānakaṃ kappatī''ti cintetvā pañcahi kājasatehi susaṅkhataṃ badarapānaṃ gāhāpetvā agamāsi. yathāha bhesajjakkhandhake ``atha kho keṇiyassa jaṭilassa etadahosi, kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa harāpeyya''nti (mahāva0 300) sabbaṃ veditabbaṃ. tato naṃ bhagavā yathā sekkhasutte (ma0 ni0 2.22 ādayo) sākiye āvasathānisaṃsapaṭisaṃyuttāya kathāya, gosiṅgasālavane (ma0 ni0 1.325 ādayo) tayo kulaputte sāmaggirasānisaṃsapaṭisaṃyuttāya, rathavinīte (ma0 ni0 1.252 ādayo) jātibhūmake bhikkhū dasakathāvatthupaṭisaṃyuttāya, evaṃ taṅkhaṇānurūpāya pānakānisaṃsapaṭisaṃyuttāya kathāya pānakadānānisaṃsaṃ sandassesi, tathārūpānaṃ puññānaṃ punapi kattabbatāya niyojento samādapesi, abbhussāhaṃ janento samuttejesi, sandiṭṭhikasamparāyikena phalavisesena pahaṃsento sampahaṃsesi. tenāha ^b^``dhammiyā kathāya...pe0... sampahaṃsesī''^eb^ti. so bhiyyosomattāya bhagavati pasanno bhagavantaṃ nimantesi, bhagavā cassa tikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā adhivāsesi. tenāha ^b^``atha kho keṇiyo jaṭilo...pe0... adhivāsesi^eb^ ^a^P2.0447^ea^ bhagavā tuṇhībhāvenā''ti.

[03] kimatthaṃ pana paṭikkhipi bhagavāti? punappunaṃ yācanāya cassa puññavuḍḍhi bhavissati, bahutarañca paṭiyādessati, tato aḍḍhatelasānaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ paṭiyattaṃ aḍḍhasoḷasannaṃ pāpuṇissatīti. kuto aparāni tīṇi satānīti ce? appaṭiyatteyeva hi bhatte selo brāhmaṇo tīhi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ pabbajissati, taṃ disvā bhagavā evamāhāti. ^b^mittāmacce^eb^ti mitte ca kammakare ca. ^b^ñātisālohite^eb^ti samānalohite ekayonisambandhe puttadhītādayo ^a^V2.0153^ea^ avasesabandhave ca. yenāti ^a^M2.0169^ea^ yasmā. ^b^me^eb^ti mayhaṃ. ^b^kāyaveyyāvaṭika^eb^nti kāyena veyyāvaccaṃ. ^b^maṇḍalamāḷaṃ paṭiyādetī^eb^ti setavitānamaṇḍapaṃ karoti.

[03] ^b^tiṇṇaṃ vedāna^eb^nti irubbedayajubbedasāmavedānaṃ. saha nighaṇḍunā ca keṭubhena ca ^b^sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ^eb^. ^b^nighaṇḍū^eb^ti nāmanighaṇḍurukkhādīnaṃ vevacanappakāsakaṃ satthaṃ. ^b^keṭubha^eb^nti kiriyākappavikappo kavīnaṃ upakārāya satthaṃ. saha akkharappabhedena ^b^sākkharappabhedānaṃ^eb^. ^b^akkharappabhedo^eb^ti sikkhā ca nirutti ca. ^b^itihāsapañcamāna^eb^nti athabbanavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā ``itiha āsa itiha āsā''ti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto purāṇakathāsaṅkhāto itihāso pañcamo etesanti itihāsapañcamā. tesaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ. padaṃ tadavasesañca byākaraṇaṃ ajjheti vedeti cāti ^b^padako veyyākaraṇo^eb^. lokāyate vitaṇḍavādasatthe mahāpurisalakkhaṇādhikāre ca dvādasasahasse mahāpurisalakkhaṇasatthe anūno paripūrakārīti ^b^lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo,^eb^ avayo na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. avayo nāma yo tāni atthato ca ganthato ca sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti.

[03] jaṅghāya hitaṃ vihāraṃ ^a^P2.0448^ea^ ^b^jaṅghāvihāraṃ,^eb^ cirāsanādijanitaṃ parissamaṃ vinodetuṃ jaṅghāpasāraṇatthaṃ adīghacārikanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^anucaṅkamamāno^eb^ti caṅkamamāno eva. ^b^anuvicaramāno^eb^ti ito cito ca caramāno. ^b^keṇiyassa jaṭilassa assamo^eb^ti keṇiyassa assamaṃ nivesanaṃ. ^b^āvāho^eb^ti kaññāgahaṇaṃ. ^b^vivāho^eb^ti kaññādānaṃ. ^b^mahāyañño^eb^ti mahāyajanaṃ. ^b^māgadho^eb^ti magadhānaṃ issaro. mahatiyā senāya samannāgatattā ^b^seniyo^eb^. bimbīti suvaṇṇaṃ, tasmā sārasuvaṇṇasadisavaṇṇatāya ^b^bimbisāro. so me nimantito^eb^ti so mayā nimantito.

[01] atha brāhmaṇo pubbe katādhikārattā buddhasaddaṃ sutvāva amatenevābhisitto vimhayarūpattā āha -- ^b^``buddhoti, bho keṇiya, vadesī''^eb^ti. itaro yathābhūtaṃ ācikkhanto āha -- ^b^``buddhoti, bho sela, vadāmī''^eb^ti. tato naṃ punapi daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ pucchi, itaropi tatheva ārocesi. atha kappasatasahassehipi buddhasaddassa dullabhabhāvaṃ dassento ^a^M2.0170^ea^ āha -- ^b^``ghosopi kho eso dullabho lokasmiṃ yadidaṃ buddho''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^yadida^eb^nti nipāto, yo esoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] atha brāhmaṇo buddhasaddaṃ sutvā ``kiṃ nu kho so saccameva buddho, udāhu nāmamattamevassa buddho''ti vīmaṃsitukāmo cintesi, abhāsi eva vā ^b^``āgatāni kho pana...pe0... vivaṭṭacchado''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^``mantesū''^eb^ti vedesu. ``tathāgato kira uppajjissatī''ti paṭikacceva ^a^V2.0154^ea^ suddhāvāsadevā brāhmaṇavesena lakkhaṇāni pakkhipitvā vede vācenti ``tadanusārena mahesakkhā sattā tathāgataṃ jānissantī''ti. tena pubbe vedesu mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni āgacchanti. parinibbute pana tathāgate kamena antaradhāyanti, tena etarahi natthi. ^b^mahāpurisassā^eb^ti paṇidhisamādānañāṇasamādānakaruṇādiguṇamahato purisassa ^a^P2.0449^ea^. ^b^dveva gatiyo^eb^ti dve eva niṭṭhā. kāmañcāyaṃ gatisaddo ``pañca kho imā, sāriputta, gatiyo''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.153) bhavabhede, ``gatī migānaṃ pavana''ntiādīsu (pari0 339) nivāsaṭṭhāne, ``evaṃ adhimattagatimanto''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.161) paññāyaṃ, ``gatigata''ntiādīsu (cūḷava0 204) visaṭabhāve vattati, idha pana niṭṭhāyaṃ veditabbo. tattha kiñcāpi yehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgato rājā hoti cakkavatti, na tehi eva buddho. jātisāmaññato pana tāniyeva tānīti vuccanti. tasmā vuttaṃ ``yehi samannāgatassā''ti.

[03] ^b^sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasatī^eb^ti yadi agāre vasati. ^b^rājā hoti cakkavattī^eb^ti catūhi acchariyadhammehi saṅgahavatthūhi ca lokaṃ rañjanato rājā. cakkaratanaṃ vatteti, catūhi sampatticakkehi, vattati, tehi ca paraṃ vatteti, parahitāya ca iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto etasmiṃ atthīti cakkavatti. ettha ca rājāti sāmaññaṃ, cakkavattīti visesanaṃ. dhammena caratīti ^b^dhammiko,^eb^ ñāyena samena vattatīti attho. dhammena rajjaṃ labhitvā rājā jātoti ^b^dhammarājā^eb^. parahitadhammakaraṇena vā dhammiko, attahitadhammakaraṇena ^b^dhammarājā^eb^. caturantāya issaroti ^b^cāturanto,^eb^ catusamuddantāya cattubbidhadīpavibhūsitāya ca pathaviyā issaroti attho. ajjhattaṃ kodhādipaccatthike bahiddhā ca sabbarājāno vijesīti ^b^vijitāvī. janapadatthāvariyappatto^eb^ti janapade dhuvabhāvaṃ thāvarabhāvaṃ patto, na sakkā kenaci ^a^M2.0171^ea^ cāletuṃ, janapado vā tamhi thāvariyappatto anussukko sakammanirato acalo asampavedhītipi janapadatthāvariyappatto.

[03] ^b^seyyathida^eb^nti nipāto, tassa ^a^P2.0450^ea^ etāni katamānīti attho. ^b^cakkaratanaṃ...pe0... pariṇāyakaratanameva sattama^eb^nti tāni sabbappakārato ratanasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttāni. tesu ayaṃ cakkavattirājā cakkaratanena ajitaṃ jināti, hatthiassaratanehi vijite yathāsukhamanuvicarati, pariṇāyakaratanena vijitamanurakkhati, sesehi upabhogasukhamanubhavati. paṭhamena cassa ussāhasattiyogo, hatthiassagahapatiratanehi pabhusattiyogo, pariṇāyakaratanena mantasattiyogo suparipuṇṇo hoti, itthimaṇiratanehi ca tividhasattiyogaphalaṃ. so itthimaṇiratanehi bhogasukhamanubhoti, sesehi issariyasukhaṃ. visesato cassa purimāni tīṇi adosakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvena ^a^V2.0155^ea^ sampajjanti, majjhimāni alobhakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvena, pacchimamekaṃ amohakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvenāti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^parosahassa^eb^nti atirekasahassaṃ. ^b^sūrā^eb^ti abhīrukajātikā. ^b^vīraṅgarūpā^eb^ti devaputtasadisakāyā, evaṃ tāveke. ayaṃ panettha sabhāvo ^b^vīrā^eb^ti uttamasūrā vuccanti, vīrānaṃ aṅgaṃ vīraṅgaṃ, vīrakāraṇaṃ vīriyanti vuttaṃ hoti. vīraṅgaṃ rūpaṃ etesanti ^b^vīraṅgarūpā,^eb^ vīriyamayasarīrā viyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^parasenappamaddanā^eb^ti sace paṭimukhaṃ tiṭṭheyya parasenā, taṃ pamaddituṃ samatthāti adhippāyo. ^b^dhammenā^eb^ti ``pāṇo na hantabbo''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 2.244; ma0 ni0 3.257) pañcasīladhammena. ^b^arahaṃ hoti sammāsambuddho loke vivaṭṭacchado^eb^ti ettha rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhiavijjāduccaritachadanehi sattahi paṭicchanne kilesandhakāre loke taṃ chadanaṃ vivaṭṭetvā samantato sañjātāloko hutvā ṭhitoti vivaṭṭacchado. tattha paṭhamena padena pūjārahatā, dutiyena tassā hetu yasmā sammāsambuddhoti. tatiyena buddhattahetu vivaṭṭacchadatā vuttāti ^a^P2.0451^ea^ veditabbā. atha vā vivaṭṭo ca vicchado cāti vivaṭṭacchado, vaṭṭarahito chadanarahito cāti vuttaṃ hoti. tena arahaṃ vaṭṭābhāvena sammāsambuddho chadanābhāvenāti evaṃ purimapadadvayasseva hetudvayaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. dutiyena vesārajjena cettha purimasiddhi, paṭhamena dutiyasiddhi, tatiyacatutthehi ^a^M2.0172^ea^ tatiyasiddhi hoti. purimañca dhammacakkhuṃ, dutiyaṃ buddhacakkhuṃ, tatiyaṃ samantacakkhuṃ sādhetīti veditabbaṃ.

[01] idāni bhagavato santikaṃ gantukāmo āha -- ^b^``kahaṃ pana bho...pe0... sammāsambuddho''^eb^ti. ^b^evaṃ vutte^eb^tiādīsu ^b^yenesā^eb^ti yena disābhāgena esā. ^b^nīlavanarājī^eb^ti nīlavaṇṇarukkhapanti. vanaṃ kira meghapantisadisaṃ. yattha bhagavā tadā vihāsi, taṃ niddisanto āha -- ``yenesā bho, sela, nīlavanarājī''ti. tattha ``so viharatī''ti ayaṃ panettha pāṭhaseso, bhummatthe vā karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^pade pada^eb^nti padasamīpe padaṃ. tena turitagamanaṃ paṭisedheti. ^b^durāsadā hī^eb^ti kāraṇaṃ āha, yasmā te durāsadā, tasmā evaṃ bhonto āgacchantūti. kiṃ pana kāraṇā durāsadāti ce? ^b^sīhāva ekacarā^eb^. ^b^yathā^eb^ hi sīhā sahāyakiccābhāvato ekacarā, evaṃ tepi vivekakāmatāya. ^b^``yadā cāha''^eb^ntiādinā pana te māṇavake upacāraṃ sikkhāpeti. tattha ^b^mā opātethā^eb^ti mā pavesetha, mā kathethāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^āgamentū^eb^ti paṭimānentu, yāva kathā pariyosānaṃ gacchati, tāva tuṇhī bhavantūti attho.

[03] ^b^samannesī^eb^ti gavesi. ^b^yebhuyyenā^eb^ti bahukāni addasa, appakāni nāddasa. tato yāni na addasa ^a^V2.0156^ea^, tāni dīpento āha ^b^``ṭhapetvā dve''^eb^ti. ^b^kaṅkhatī^eb^ti kaṅkhaṃ uppādeti patthanaṃ ``aho vata passeyya''nti. ^b^vicikicchatī^eb^ti tato tato tāni vicinanto kicchati na sakkoti daṭṭhuṃ. ^b^nādhimuccatī^eb^ti tāya vicikicchāya sanniṭṭhānaṃ na gacchati. ^b^na sampasīdatī^eb^ti tato ``paripuṇṇalakkhaṇo aya''nti bhagavati pasādaṃ ^a^P2.0452^ea^ nāpajjati. kaṅkhāya vā sudubbalavimati vuttā, vicikicchāya majjhimā, anadhimuccanatāya balavatī, asampasādena tehi tīhi dhammehi cittassa kālussiyabhāvo.

[03] ^b^kosohite^eb^ti vatthikosena paṭicchanne. ^b^vatthaguyhe^eb^ti aṅgajāte. bhagavato hi varavāraṇasseva kosohitaṃ vatthaguyhaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ padumagabbhasamānaṃ. taṃ so vatthapaṭicchannattā apassanto antomukhagatāya ca jivhāya pahūtabhāvaṃ asallakkhento tesu dvīsu lakkhaṇesu kaṅkhī ahosi ^a^M2.0173^ea^ vicikicchī. ^b^tathārūpa^eb^nti kathaṃ rūpaṃ? kimettha amhehi vattabbaṃ, vuttametaṃ nāgasenatthereneva milindaraññā puṭṭhena (mi0 pa0 4.3.3) --

[02] ``dukkaraṃ, bhante nāgasena, bhagavatā katanti. kiṃ, mahārājāti? mahājanena hirikaraṇokāsaṃ brahmāyubrāhmaṇassa ca antevāsiuttarassa ca bāvarissa antevāsīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ brāhmaṇānañca selassa brāhmaṇassa antevāsīnaṃ tisatamāṇavānañca dassesi, bhanteti. na, mahārāja, bhagavā guyhaṃ dasseti, chāyaṃ bhagavā dasseti, iddhiyā abhisaṅkharitvā nivāsananivatthaṃ kāyabandhanabaddhaṃ cīvarapārutaṃ chāyārūpakamattaṃ dasseti, mahārājāti. chāyārūpe diṭṭhe sati diṭṭho eva nanu, bhanteti. tiṭṭhatetaṃ, mahārāja, hadayarūpaṃ disvā bujjhanakasatto bhaveyya, hadayamaṃsaṃ nīharitvā dasseyya sammāsambuddhoti. kallosi, bhante, nāgasenā''ti (mi0 pa0 4.3.3).

[03] ^b^ninnāmetvā^eb^ti nīharitvā. kaṇṇasotānumasanena cettha dīghabhāvo, nāsikāsotānumasanena tanubhāvo, nalāṭacchādanena puthulabhāvo pakāsitoti veditabbo. ^b^ācariyapācariyāna^eb^nti ācariyānañceva ācariyācariyānañca. ^b^sake vaṇṇe^eb^ti attano guṇe.

[03] 554^b^.^eb^ ^b^paripuṇṇakāyo^eb^ti lakkhaṇehi paripuṇṇatāya ahīnaṅgapaccaṅgatāya ca paripuṇṇasarīro ^a^P2.0453^ea^. ^b^surucī^eb^ti sundarasarīrappabho. ^b^sujāto^eb^ti ārohapariṇāhasampattiyā saṇṭhānasampattiyā ca sunibbatto. ^b^cārudassano^eb^ti sucirampi passantānaṃ atittijanakaṃ appaṭikūlaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ cāru eva dassanaṃ assāti cārudassano. keci pana bhaṇanti ``cārudassanoti ^a^V2.0157^ea^ sundaranetto''ti. ^b^suvaṇṇavaṇṇo^eb^ti suvaṇṇasadisavaṇṇo. ^b^asī^eb^ti bhavasi. etaṃ sabbapadehi yojetabbaṃ. ^b^susukkadāṭho^eb^ti suṭṭhu sukkadāṭho. bhagavato hi dāṭhāhi candakiraṇā viya ativiya paṇḍararaṃsiyo niccharanti. tenāha -- ``susukkadāṭhosī''ti.
[03] 555^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahāpurisalakkhaṇā^eb^ti pubbe vuttabyañjanāneva vacanantarena nigamento āha.

[03] 556^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^M2.0174^ea^ tesu lakkhaṇesu attano abhirucitehi lakkhaṇehi bhagavantaṃ thunanto āha -- ^b^``pasannanetto''^eb^tiādi. bhagavā hi pañcavaṇṇapasādasampattiyā ^b^pasannanetto,^eb^ paripuṇṇacandamaṇḍalasadisamukhattā ^b^sumukho,^eb^ ārohapariṇāhasampattiyā ^b^brahā,^eb^ bahmujugattatāya ^b^uju,^eb^ jutimantatāya patāpavā. yampi cettha pubbe vuttaṃ, taṃ ^b^``majjhe samaṇasaṅghassā''^eb^ti iminā pariyāyena thunatā puna vuttaṃ. īdiso hi evaṃ virocati. esa nayo uttaragāthāyapi.
[03] 557-8^b^.^eb^ ^b^uttamavaṇṇino^eb^ti uttamavaṇṇasampannassa. ^b^jambusaṇḍassā^eb^ti jambudīpassa. pākaṭena issariyaṃ vaṇṇayanto āha, apica cakkavatti catunnampi dīpānaṃ issaro hoti.

[03] 559^b^.^eb^ ^b^khattiyā^eb^ti jātikhattiyā. ^b^bhojā^eb^ti bhogiyā. ^b^rājāno^eb^ti ye keci rajjaṃ kārentā. ^b^anuyantā^eb^ti anugāmino sevakā. ^b^rājābhirājā^eb^ti rājūnaṃ pūjaniyo rājā hutvā, cakkavattīti adhippāyo. ^b^manujindo^eb^ti manussādhipati paramissaro hutvā.

[03] 560^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vutte bhagavā ``ye te bhavanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā, te sake vaṇṇe bhaññamāne attānaṃ pātukarontī''ti imaṃ selassa manorathaṃ pūrento āha ^b^``rājāhamasmī''^eb^ti. tatrāyamadhippāyo -- yaṃ kho maṃ tvaṃ sela yācasi ``rājā arahasi bhavituṃ cakkavattī''ti, ettha appossukko hoti, ^b^rājāhamasmi,^eb^ sati ca rājatte yathā añño rājā samānopi yojanasataṃ vā anusāsati, dve tīṇi vā cattāri vā pañca vā yojanasatāni yojanasahassaṃ vā cakkavatti hutvāpi ^a^P2.0454^ea^ catudīpapariyantamattaṃ vā, nāhamevaṃ paricchinnavisayo. ahañhi ^b^dhammarājā anuttaro bhavaggato^eb^ avīcipariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ appameyyā lokadhātuyo anusāsāmi. yāvatā hi apadadvipadādibhedā sattā, ahaṃ tesaṃ aggo. na hi me koci sīlena vā...pe0... vimuttiñāṇadassanena vā paṭibhāgo atthi. svāhaṃ evaṃ dhammarājā anuttaro anuttareneva catusatipaṭṭhānādibhedabodhipakkhiyasaṅkhātena ^b^dhammena cakkaṃ vattemi^eb^ ``idaṃ pajahatha, idaṃ upasampajja viharathā''tiādinā āṇācakkaṃ, ``idaṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ ariyasacca''ntiādinā ^a^V2.0158^ea^ (saṃ0 ni0 5.1081; mahāva0 14) pariyattidhammena dhammacakkameva vā. ^b^cakkaṃ appaṭivattiya^eb^nti ^a^M2.0175^ea^ yaṃ cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ hoti samaṇena vā...pe0... kenaci lokasminti.

[03] 561-2^b^.^eb^ evaṃ attānaṃ āvikarontaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā pītisomanassajāto selo daḷhikaraṇatthaṃ ^b^``sambuddho paṭijānāsī''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^ko nu senāpatī^eb^ti dhammarañño bhoto, dhammena pavattitassa dhammacakkassa anuppavattako senāpati koti pucchi.

[03] 563^b^.^eb^ tena ca samayena bhagavato dakkhiṇapasse āyasmā sāriputto nisinno hoti suvaṇṇapuñjo viya siriyā sobhamāno, taṃ dassento bhagavā ^b^``mayā pavattita''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^anujāto tathāgata^eb^nti tathāgatahetu anujāto, tathāgatena hetunā jātoti attho.

[03] 564^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ``ko nu senāpatī''ti pañhaṃ byākaritvā yaṃ selo āha -- ``sambuddho paṭijānāsī''ti, tatra naṃ nikkaṅkhaṃ kātukāmo ``nāhaṃ paṭiññāmatteneva paṭijānāmi, apicāhaṃ iminā kāraṇena buddho''ti ñāpetuṃ ^b^``abhiññeyya''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^abhiññeyya^eb^nti vijjā ca vimutti ca. maggasaccasamudayasaccāni pana bhāvetabbapahātabbāni, hetuvacanena pana phalasiddhito tesaṃ phalāni nirodhasaccadukkhasaccānipi vuttāneva bhavanti. yato sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātanti evampettha vuttameva hoti. evaṃ ^a^P2.0455^ea^ catusaccabhāvanāphalañca vijjāvimuttiṃ dassento ``bujjhitabbaṃ bujjhitvā buddho jātosmī''ti yuttena hetunā buddhattaṃ sādheti.

[03] 565-7^b^.^eb^ evaṃ nippariyāyena attānaṃ pātukatvā attani kaṅkhāvitaraṇatthaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ abhittharayamāno ^b^``vinayassū''^eb^ti gāthāttayamāha. tattha ^b^sallakatto^eb^ti rāgasallādisattasallakattano. ^b^brahmabhūto^eb^ti seṭṭhabhūto. ^b^atitulo^eb^ti tulaṃ atīto upamaṃ atīto, nirūpamoti attho. ^b^mārasenappamaddano^eb^ti ``kāmā te paṭhamā senā''tiādikāya ``pare ca avajānātī''ti (su0 ni0 440; mahāni0 28; cūḷani0 nandamāṇavapucchāniddesa 47) evaṃ vuttāya māraparisasaṅkhātāya mārasenāya ^a^M2.0176^ea^ pamaddano. ^b^sabbāmitte^eb^ti khandhakilesābhisaṅkhāramaccudevaputtamārādike sabbapaccatthike. ^b^vasīkatvā^eb^ti attano vase vattetvā. ^b^akutobhayo^eb^ti kutoci abhayo.

[03] 568-70^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vutte selo brāhmaṇo tāvadeva bhagavati sañjātappasādo pabbajjāpekkho ^a^V2.0159^ea^ hutvā ^b^``imaṃ bhavanto''^eb^ti gāthāttayamāha yathā taṃ paripākagatāya upanissayasampattiyā sammā codiyamāno. tattha ^b^kaṇhābhijātiko^eb^ti caṇḍālādinīcakule jāto.
[03] 571^b^.^eb^ tato tepi māṇavakā tatheva pabbajjāpekkhā hutvā ^b^``etañce ruccati bhoto''^eb^ti gāthamāhaṃsu yathā taṃ tena saddhiṃ katādhikārā kulaputtā.
[03] 572^b^.^eb^ atha selo tesu māṇavakesu tuṭṭhacitto te dassento pabbajjaṃ yācamāno ^b^``brāhmaṇā''^eb^ti gāthamāha.

[03] 573^b^.^eb^ tato bhagavā yasmā selo atīte padumuttarassa bhagavato sāsane tesaṃyeva tiṇṇaṃ purisasatānaṃ gaṇaseṭṭho hutvā tehi saddhiṃ pariveṇaṃ kārāpetvā dānādīni puññāni ca katvā kamena devamanussasampattiṃ anubhavamāno pacchime bhave tesaṃyeva ācariyo hutvā nibbatto, tañca nesaṃ kammaṃ vimuttiparipākāya paripakkaṃ ehibhikkhubhāvassa ^a^P2.0456^ea^ ca upanissayabhūtaṃ, tasmā te sabbeva ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājento ^b^``svākkhāta''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^sandiṭṭhika^eb^nti paccakkhaṃ. ^b^akālika^eb^nti maggānantaraphaluppattito na kālantare pattabbaphalaṃ. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yannimittā. maggabrahmacariyanimittā hi pabbajjā appamattassa sativippavāsavirahitassa tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhato amoghā hoti. tenāha -- ``svākkhātaṃ...pe0... sikkhato''ti.

[03] evañca vatvā ``etha bhikkhavo''ti bhagavā avoca. te sabbe pattacīvaradharā hutvā ākāsenāgamma bhagavantaṃ abhivādesuṃ. evamimaṃ tesaṃ ehibhikkhubhāvaṃ sandhāya saṅgītikārā ^b^``alattha kho selo...pe0... upasampada''^eb^nti āhaṃsu.

[03] ^b^bhuttāvi^eb^nti ^a^M2.0177^ea^ bhuttavantaṃ. ^b^onītapattapāṇi^eb^nti pattato onītapāṇiṃ, apanītahatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. tattha ``upagantvā''ti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo. itarathā hi bhagavantaṃ ekamantaṃ nisīdīti na yujjati.

[03] 574^b^.^eb^ ^b^aggihuttamukhā^eb^ti bhagavā keṇiyassa cittānukūlavasena anumodanto evamāha. tattha aggiparicariyaṃ vinā brāhmaṇānaṃ yaññābhāvato ``aggihuttamukhā yaññā''ti vuttaṃ. aggihuttaseṭṭhā ^a^V2.0160^ea^ aggihuttapadhānāti attho. vede sajjhāyantehi paṭhamaṃ sajjhāyitabbato sāvittī ``chandaso mukha''nti vuttā. manussānaṃ seṭṭhato rājā ``mukha''nti vutto. nadīnaṃ ādhārato paṭisaraṇato ca sāgaro ``mukha''nti vutto. candayogavasena ``ajja kattikā ajja rohinī''ti sañjānanato ālokakaraṇato sommabhāvato ca ``nakkhattānaṃ mukhaṃ cando''ti vutto. tapantānaṃ aggattā ādicco ``tapataṃ mukha''nti vutto. dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ pana aggattā visesena tasmiṃ samaye buddhappamukhaṃ saṅghaṃ sandhāya ``puññaṃ ākaṅkhamānānaṃ, saṅgho ve yajataṃ mukha''nti vutto. tena saṅgho puññassa āyamukhanti dasseti.

[03] 576^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃ taṃ saraṇa^eb^nti aññabyākaraṇagāthamāha. tassattho ^a^P2.0457^ea^ -- pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā bhagavā, yasmā mayaṃ ito aṭṭhame divase taṃ saraṇaṃ agamamha, tasmā sattarattena tava sāsane anuttarena damathena dantamha. aho te saraṇassa ānubhāvoti.
[03] 577-8^b^.^eb^ tato paraṃ bhagavantaṃ dvīhi gāthāhi thunitvā tatiyāya vandanaṃ yācati --
[21] ``bhikkhavo tisatā ime, tiṭṭhanti pañjalīkatā.
[22] pāde vīra pasārehi, nāgā vandantu satthuno''ti..
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya selasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 580^b^.^eb^ ^b^animitta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0161^ea^ ^a^M2.0178^ea^ sallasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? bhagavato kira upaṭṭhāko eko upāsako, tassa putto kālamakāsi. so puttasokābhibhūto sattāhaṃ nirāhāro ahosi. taṃ anukampanto bhagavā tassa gharaṃ gantvā sokavinodanatthaṃ imaṃ suttamabhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^animatta^eb^nti kiriyākāranimittavirahitaṃ. yathā hi ``yadāhaṃ akkhiṃ vā nikhaṇissāmi, bhamukaṃ vā ukkhipissāmi, tena nimittena taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ avaharā''tiādīsu kiriyākāranimittamatthi, na evaṃ jīvite. na hi sakkā laddhuṃ ``yāvāhaṃ idaṃ vā idaṃ vā karomi, tāva tvaṃ jīva, mā mīyā''ti. ^b^anaññāta^eb^nti ato eva na sakkā ekaṃsena aññātuṃ ``ettakaṃ vā ettakaṃ vā kālaṃ iminā jīvitabba''nti gatiyā āyupariyantavasena vā. yathā hi cātumahārājikādīnaṃ parimitaṃ āyu, na tathā maccānaṃ, evampi ekaṃsena anaññātaṃ.

[03] ^b^kasira^eb^nti anekapaccayapaṭibaddhavuttibhāvato kicchaṃ na sukhayāpanīyaṃ. tathā hi taṃ assāsapaṭibaddhañca, passāsapaṭibaddhañca, mahābhūtapaṭibaddhañca, kabaḷīkārāhārapaṭibaddhañca, usmāpaṭibaddhañca, viññāṇapaṭibaddhañca. anassasantopi hi na jīvati apassasantopi. catūsu ca dhātūsu kaṭṭhamukhādiāsīvisadaṭṭho ^a^P2.0458^ea^ viya kāyo pathavīdhātuppakopena tāva thaddho hoti kaliṅgarasadiso. yathāha --
[21] ``patthaddho bhavatī kāyo, daṭṭho kaṭṭhamukhena vā.
[22] pathavīdhātuppakopena, hoti kaṭṭhamukheva so''ti.. (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 584).
[03] āpodhātuppakopena pūtibhāvaṃ āpajjitvā paggharitapubbamaṃsalohito aṭṭhicammāvaseso hoti. yathāha --
[21] ``pūtiko ^a^V2.0162^ea^ bhavatī kāyo, daṭṭho pūtimukhena vā.
[22] āpodhātuppakopena, hoti pūtimukheva so''ti.. (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 584).
[03] tejodhātuppakopena aṅgārakāsuyaṃ pakkhitto viya samantā pariḍayhati. yathāha --
[21] ``santatto ^a^M2.0179^ea^ bhavatī kāyo, daṭṭho aggimukhena vā.
[22] tejodhātuppakopena, hoti aggimukheva so''ti.. (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 584).
[03] vāyodhātuppakopena sañchijjamānasandhibandhano pāsāṇehi koṭṭetvā sañcuṇṇiyamānaṭṭhiko viya ca hoti. yathāha --
[21] ``sañchinno bhavatī kāyo, daṭṭho satthamukhena vā.
[22] vāyodhātuppakopena, hoti satthamukheva so''ti.. (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 584).

[03] dhātuppakopabyāpannakāyopi ca na jīvati. yadā pana tā dhātuyo aññamaññaṃ patiṭṭhānādikiccaṃ sādhentāpi samaṃ vahanti, tadā jīvitaṃ pavattati. evaṃ mahābhūtapaṭibaddhañca jīvitaṃ. dubbhikkhādīsu pana āhārupacchedena sattānaṃ jīvitakkhayo pākaṭo eva. evaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārapaṭibaddhañca jīvitaṃ. tathā asitapītādiparipāke kammajateje khīṇe sattā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇantāpi pākaṭā eva. evaṃ usmāpaṭibaddhañca jīvitaṃ. viññāṇe pana niruddhe niruddhato pabhuti sattānaṃ na hoti jīvitanti evampi loke pākaṭameva. evaṃ viññāṇapaṭibaddhañca jīvitaṃ. evaṃ anekapaccayapaṭibaddhavuttibhāvato kasiraṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^parittañcā^eb^ti appakaṃ, devānaṃ jīvitaṃ upanidhāya tiṇagge ussāvabindusadisaṃ, cittakkhaṇato uddhaṃ abhāvena vā parittaṃ. atidīghāyukopi hi satto atītena cittena jīvittha na jīvati na jīvissati, anāgatena ^a^P2.0459^ea^ jīvissati na jīvati na jīvittha, paccuppannena jīvati na jīvittha na jīvissati. vuttañcetaṃ --
[21] ``jīvitaṃ attabhāvo ca, sukhadukkhā ca kevalā.
[22] ekacittasamāyuttā, lahuso vattate khaṇo..
[21] ``cullāsītisahassāni ^a^V2.0163^ea^, kappā tiṭṭhanti ye marū.
[22] natveva tepi jīvanti, dvīhi cittehi saṃyutā''ti.. (mahāni0 10).

[03] ^b^tañca dukkhena saṃyuta^eb^nti tañca jīvitaṃ evaṃ animittamanaññātaṃ kasiraṃ parittañca samānampi sītuṇhaḍaṃsamakasādisamphassakhuppipāsāsaṅkhāradukkhavipariṇāmadukkhadukkhadukkhehi saṃyutaṃ. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? yasmā īdisaṃ maccānaṃ jīvitaṃ, tasmā ^a^M2.0180^ea^ tvaṃ yāva taṃ parikkhayaṃ na gacchati, tāva dhammacariyameva brūhaya, mā puttamanusocāti.

[03] 581^b^.^eb^ athāpi maññeyyāsi ``sabbūpakaraṇehi puttaṃ anurakkhantassāpi me so mato, tena socāmī''ti, evampi mā soci. ^b^na hi so upakkamo atthi, yena jātā na miyyare,^eb^ na hi sakkā kenaci upakkamena jātā sattā mā marantūti rakkhitunti vuttaṃ hoti. tato yasmā so ``jaraṃ patvā nāma, bhante, maraṇaṃ anurūpaṃ, atidaharo me putto mato''ti cintesi, tasmā āha ^b^``jarampi patvā maraṇaṃ, evaṃdhammā hi pāṇino''^eb^ti, jaraṃ patvāpi appatvāpi maraṇaṃ, natthi ettha niyamoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 582^b^.^eb^ idāni tamatthaṃ nidassanena sādhento ^b^``phalānamiva pakkāna''^eb^ntiādimāha. tassattho -- yathā phalānaṃ pakkānaṃ yasmā sūriyuggamanato pabhuti sūriyātapena santappamāne rukkhe pathaviraso ca āporaso ca pattato sākhaṃ sākhato khandhaṃ khandhato mūlanti evaṃ anukkamena mūlato pathavimeva pavisati, ogamanato pabhuti pana pathavito mūlaṃ mūlato khandhanti evaṃ anukkamena sākhāpattapallavādīni puna ārohati, evaṃ ārohanto ca paripākagate phale vaṇṭamūlaṃ na pavisati. atha sūriyātapena tappamāne vaṇṭamūle pariḷāho uppajjati. tena tāni phalāni pāto pāto niccakālaṃ patanti, nesaṃ pāto patanato bhayaṃ hoti, patanā bhayaṃ hotīti attho. evaṃ jātānaṃ maccānaṃ niccaṃ maraṇato bhayaṃ ^a^P2.0460^ea^. pakkaphalasadisā hi sattāti.

[03] 583-6^b^.^eb^ kiñca bhiyyo ^b^``yathāpi kumbhakārassa...pe0... jīvita''^eb^nti. tasmā ^b^``daharā ca...pe0... parāyaṇā''^eb^ti evaṃ gaṇha, evañca gahetvā ^b^``tesaṃ maccu...pe0... ñātī vā pana ñātake''^eb^ti evampi gaṇha. yasmā ca na pitā tāyate puttaṃ, ñātī vā pana ñātake, tasmā ^b^pekkhataṃyeva...pe0... nīyati^eb^.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0164^ea^ ayaṃ yojanā -- passamānānaṃyeva ñātīnaṃ ``amma, tātā''tiādinā nayena puthu anekappakārakaṃ lālapataṃyeva maccānaṃ ekameko ^a^M2.0181^ea^ macco yathā go vajjho evaṃ nīyati, evaṃ passa, upāsaka, yāva atāṇo lokoti.

[03] 587^b^.^eb^ tattha ye buddhapaccekabuddhādayo dhitisampannā, te ^b^``evamabbhāhato loko maccunā ca jarāya ca,^eb^ so na sakkā kenaci parittāṇaṃ kātu''nti yasmā jānanti, ^b^tasmā dhīrā na socanti viditvā lokapariyāyaṃ^eb^. imaṃ lokasabhāvaṃ ñatvā na socantīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 588^b^.^eb^ tvaṃ pana ^b^yassa maggaṃ...pe0... paridevasi^eb^. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? yassa mātukucchiṃ āgatassa āgatamaggaṃ vā ito cavitvā aññattha gatassa gatamaggaṃ vā na jānāsi, tassa ime ubho ante asampassaṃ niratthaṃ paridevasi. dhīrā pana te passantā viditvā lokapariyāyaṃ na socantīti.

[03] 589^b^.^eb^ idāni ``niratthaṃ paridevasī''ti ettha vuttaparidevanāya niratthakabhāvaṃ sādhento ^b^``paridevayamāno ce''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^udabbahe^eb^ti ubbaheyya dhāreyya, attani sañjaneyyāti attho. ^b^sammūḷho hiṃsamattāna^eb^nti sammūḷho hutvā attānaṃ bādhento. ^b^kayirā ce naṃ vicakkhaṇo^eb^ti yadi tādiso kañci atthaṃ udabbahe, vicakkhaṇopi naṃ paridevaṃ kareyya.

[03] 590^b^.^eb^ ^b^na hi ruṇṇenā^eb^ti etthāyaṃ yojanā -- na pana koci ^b^ruṇṇena^eb^ vā ^b^sokena^eb^ vā ^b^cetaso santiṃ pappoti,^eb^ apica kho pana rodato socato ca ^b^bhiyyo assa uppajjate dukkhaṃ, sarīrañca^eb^ dubbaṇṇiyādīhi ^b^upahaññatī^eb^ti.
[03] 591^b^.^eb^ ^b^na tena petā^eb^ti tena paridevanena kālakatā na pālenti na yāpenti, na taṃ tesaṃ upakārāya hoti. tasmā niratthā paridevanāti.

[03] 592^b^.^eb^ na kevalañca niratthā, anatthampi āvahati. kasmā? yasmā ^b^sokamappajahaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0461^ea^ ^b^...pe0... vasamanvagū^eb^. tattha ^b^anutthunanto^eb^ti anusocanto. ^b^vasamanvagū^eb^ti vasaṃ gato.

[03] 593^b^.^eb^ evampi ^a^M2.0182^ea^ niratthakattaṃ anatthāvahattañca sokassa dassetvā idāni sokavinayatthaṃ ovadanto ^a^V2.0165^ea^ ^b^``aññepi passā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^gamine^eb^ti gamike, paralokagamanasajje ṭhiteti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^phandantevidha pāṇino^eb^ti maraṇabhayena phandamāneyeva idha satte.

[03] 594^b^.^eb^ ^b^yena yenā^eb^ti yenākārena maññanti ``dīghāyuko bhavissati, arogo bhavissatī''ti. tato taṃ aññathāyeva hoti, so evaṃ maññito maratipi, rogīpi hoti. etādiso ayaṃ vinābhāvo maññitappaccanīkena hoti, passa, upāsaka, lokasabhāvanti evamettha adhippāyayojanā veditabbā.

[03] 596^b^.^eb^ ^b^arahato sutvā^eb^ti imaṃ evarūpaṃ arahato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā. ^b^neso labbhā mayā itī^eb^ti so peto ``idāni mayā puna jīvatū''ti na labbhā iti parijānanto, vineyya paridevitanti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 597^b^.^eb^ kiñca bhiyyo -- ^b^``yathā saraṇamādittaṃ...pe0... dhaṃsaye''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^dhīro^eb^ dhitisampadāya, ^b^sapañño^eb^ sābhāvikapaññāya, ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ bāhusaccapaññāya, ^b^kusalo^eb^ cintakajātikatāya veditabbo. cintāmayasutamayabhāvanāmayapaññāhi vā yojetabbaṃ.

[03] 598-9^b^.^eb^ na kevalañca sokameva, ^b^paridevaṃ...pe0... sallamattano. tattha pajappa^eb^nti^b^ taṇhaṃ. domanassa^eb^nti cetasikadukkhaṃ. ^b^abbahe^eb^ti uddhare. ^b^salla^eb^nti etameva tippakāraṃ dunnīharaṇaṭṭhena antovijjhanaṭṭhena ca sallaṃ. pubbe vuttaṃ sattavidhaṃ rāgādisallaṃ vā. etasmiñhi abbūḷhe salle abbūḷhasallo...pe0... nibbutoti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. tattha ^b^asito^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi anissito. ^b^pappuyyā^eb^ti pāpuṇitvā. sesaṃ idha ito pubbe vuttattā uttānatthameva, tasmā na vaṇṇitaṃ.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya sallasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0166^ea^ ^a^M2.0183^ea^ ^a^P2.0462^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti vāseṭṭhasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? ayameva yāssa nidāne vuttā atthavaṇṇanaṃ panassa vuttanayāni uttānatthāni ca padāni pariharantā karissāma. ^b^icchānaṅgalo^eb^ti gāmassa nāmaṃ. brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ ^b^caṅkī tārukkho todeyyo^eb^ti vohāranāmametaṃ. ^b^pokkharasāti jāṇussoṇī^eb^ti nemittikaṃ. tesu kira eko himavantapasse pokkharaṇiyā padume nibbatto, aññataro tāpaso taṃ padumaṃ gahetvā tattha sayitaṃ dārakaṃ disvā saṃvaḍḍhetvā rañño dassesi. pokkhare sayitattā ``pokkharasātī''ti cassa nāmamakāsi. ekassa ṭhānantare nemittikaṃ. tena kira jāṇussoṇināmakaṃ purohitaṭṭhānaṃ laddhaṃ, so teneva paññāyi.

[03] te sabbepi aññe ca abhiññātā abhiññātā brāhmaṇamahāsālā kasmā icchānaṅgale paṭivasantīti? vedasajjhāyanaparivīmaṃsanatthaṃ. tena kira samayena kosalajanapade vedakā brāhmaṇā vedānaṃ sajjhāyakaraṇatthañca atthūpaparikkhaṇatthañca tasmiṃyeva gāme sannipatanti. tena tepi antarantarā attano bhogagāmato āgamma tattha paṭivasanti.

[03] ^b^vāseṭṭhabhāradvājāna^eb^nti vāseṭṭhassa ca bhāradvājassa ca. ^b^ayamantarākathā^eb^ti yaṃ attano sahāyakabhāvānurūpaṃ kathaṃ kathentā anuvicariṃsu, tassā kathāya antarā vemajjheyeva ayaṃ aññā kathā udapādīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^saṃsuddhagahaṇiko^eb^ti saṃsuddhakucchiko, saṃsuddhāya brāhmaṇiyā eva kucchismiṃ nibbattoti adhippāyo. ``samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā''tiādīsu hi udaraggi ``gahaṇī''ti vuccati. idha pana mātukucchi. ^b^yāva sattamā^eb^ti mātu mātā, pitu pitāti evaṃ paṭilomena yāva satta jātiyo. ettha ca pitāmaho ca pitāmahī ca pitāmahā, tathā mātāmaho ca mātāmahī ca mātāmahā, pitāmahā ca mātāmahā ^a^P2.0463^ea^ ca pitāmahāyeva. pitāmahānaṃ yugaṃ ^b^pitāmahayugaṃ. yuga^eb^nti āyuppamāṇaṃ. abhilāpamattameva cetaṃ, atthato pana pitāmahāyeva pitāmahayugaṃ. ^b^akkhitto^eb^ti jātiṃ ārabbha ``kiṃ so''ti kenaci anavaññāto ^a^M2.0184^ea^. ^b^anupakkuṭṭho^eb^ti jātisandosavādena anupakkuṭṭhapubbo. ^b^vatasampanno^eb^ti ācārasampanno. ^b^saññāpetu^eb^nti ñāpetuṃ bodhetuṃ, nirantaraṃ kātunti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^āyāmā^eb^ti gacchāma.

[03] 600^b^.^eb^ ^b^anuññātapaṭiññātā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0167^ea^ ``tevijjā tumhe''ti evaṃ mayaṃ ācariyehi ca anuññātā attanā ca paṭijānimhāti attho. ^b^asmā^eb^ti bhavāma. ^b^ubho^eb^ti dvepi janā. ^b^ahaṃ pokkharasātissa, tārukkhassāyaṃ māṇavo^eb^ti ahaṃ pokkharasātissa jeṭṭhantevāsī aggasisso, ayaṃ tārukkhassāti adhippāyena bhaṇati ācariyasampattiṃ attano sampattiñca dīpento.

[03] 601^b^.^eb^ ^b^tevijjāna^eb^nti tivedānaṃ. ^b^kevalino^eb^ti niṭṭhaṅgatā. ^b^asmase^eb^ti amha bhavāma. idāni taṃ kevalibhāvaṃ vitthārento āha -- ^b^``padakasmā...pe0... sādisā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^jappe^eb^ti vede. ^b^kammunā^eb^ti dasavidhena kusalakammapathakammunā. ayañhi pubbe sattavidhaṃ kāyavacīkammaṃ sandhāya ``yato kho bho sīlavā hotī''ti āha. tividhaṃ manokammaṃ sandhāya ``vatasampanno''ti āha. tena samannāgato hi ācārasampanno hoti.

[03] 602-5^b^.^eb^ idāni taṃ vacanantarena dassento āha -- ^b^``ahañca kammunā brūmī''^eb^ti. ^b^khayātīta^eb^nti ūnabhāvaṃ atītaṃ, paripuṇṇanti attho. ^b^peccā^eb^ti upagantvā. ^b^namassantī^eb^ti namo karonti. ^b^cakkhuṃ loke samuppanna^eb^nti avijjandhakāre loke, taṃ andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā lokassa diṭṭhadhammikādiatthasandassanena cakkhu hutvā samuppannaṃ.

[03] 606^b^.^eb^ evaṃ abhitthavitvā vāseṭṭhena yācito bhagavā dvepi ^a^P2.0464^ea^ jane saṅgaṇhanto āha -- ^b^``tesaṃ vo ahaṃ byakkhissa''^eb^ntiādi. tattha ^b^byakkhissa^eb^nti byākarissāmi. ^b^anupubba^eb^nti tiṭṭhatu tāva brāhmaṇacintā, kīṭapaṭaṅgatiṇarukkhato pabhuti vo anupubbaṃ byakkhissanti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo, evaṃ vitthārakathāya vinetabbā hi te māṇavakā. ^b^jātivibhaṅga^eb^nti jātivitthāraṃ. ^b^aññamaññā hi jātiyo^eb^ti tesaṃ tesañhi pāṇānaṃ jātiyo aññā aññā nānappakārāti attho.

[03] 607^b^.^eb^ tato ^a^M2.0185^ea^ pāṇānaṃ jātivibhaṅge kathetabbe ^b^``tiṇarukkhepi jānāthā''^eb^ti anupādinnakānaṃ tāva kathetuṃ āraddho. taṃ kimatthamiti ce? upādinnesu sukhañāpanatthaṃ. anupādinnesu hi jātibhede gahite upādinnesu so pākaṭataro hoti. tattha ^b^tiṇāni^eb^ nāma antopheggūni bahisārāni. tasmā tālanāḷikerādayopi tiṇasaṅgahaṃ gacchanti. ^b^rukkhā^eb^ nāma bahipheggū antosārā. tiṇāni ca rukkhā ca tiṇarukkhā. te upayogabahuvacanena dassento āha -- ^b^``tiṇarukkhepi jānāthā''^eb^ti. ^b^na cāpi paṭijānare^eb^ti ``mayaṃ tiṇā, mayaṃ rukkhā''ti evampi na paṭijānanti. ^b^liṅgaṃ jātimaya^eb^nti apaṭijānantānampi ca tesaṃ jātimayameva saṇṭhānaṃ ^a^V2.0168^ea^ attano mūlabhūtatiṇādisadisameva hoti. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^aññamaññā hi jātiyo,^eb^ yasmā aññā tiṇajāti, aññā rukkhajāti; tiṇesupi aññā tālajāti, aññā nāḷikerajātīti evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03] tena kiṃ dīpeti? yaṃ jātivasena nānā hoti, taṃ attano paṭiññaṃ paresaṃ vā upadesaṃ vināpi aññajātito visesena gayhati. yadi ca jātiyā brāhmaṇo bhaveyya, sopi attano paṭiññaṃ paresaṃ vā upadesaṃ vinā khattiyato vessasuddato vā visesena gayheyya, na ca gayhati, tasmā na jātiyā brāhmaṇoti. parato pana ``yathā etāsu jātīsū''ti imāya gāthāya etamatthaṃ vacībhedeneva āvikarissati.

[03] 608^b^.^eb^ evaṃ anupādinnesu jātibhedaṃ dassetvā upādinnesu taṃ dassento ^b^``tato kīṭe''^eb^ti evamādimāha. tattha ^b^kīṭā^eb^ti kimayo. ^b^paṭaṅgā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0465^ea^ paṭaṅgāyeva. ^b^yāva kunthakipillike^eb^ti kunthakipillikaṃ pariyantaṃ katvāti attho.
[03] 609^b^.^eb^ ^b^khuddake^eb^ti kāḷakakaṇḍakādayo. ^b^mahallake^eb^ti sasabiḷārādayo. sabbe hi te anekavaṇṇā.

[03] 610^b^.^eb^ ^b^pādūdare^eb^ti udarapāde, udaraṃyeva yesaṃ pādāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^dīghapiṭṭhike^eb^ti sappānañhi sīsato yāva naṅguṭṭhā piṭṭhi eva hoti, tena te ``dīghapiṭṭhikā''ti vuccanti. tepi anekappakārā āsīvisādibhedena.
[03] 611^b^.^eb^ ^b^odake^eb^ti ^a^M2.0186^ea^ udakamhi jāte. macchāpi anekappakārā rohitamacchādibhedena.
[03] 612^b^.^eb^ ^b^pakkhī^eb^ti sakuṇe. te hi pakkhānaṃ atthitāya ``pakkhī''ti vuccanti. pattehi yantīti ^b^pattayānā^eb^. vehāse gacchantīti ^b^vihaṅgamā^eb^. tepi anekappakārā kākādibhedena.

[03] 613^b^.^eb^ evaṃ thalajalākāsagocarānaṃ pāṇānaṃ jātibhedaṃ dassetvā idāni yenādhippāyena taṃ dassesi, taṃ āvikaronto ^b^``yathā etāsū''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho saṅkhepato pubbe vuttādhippāyavaṇṇanāvaseneva veditabbo.

[03] 614-6^b^.^eb^ vitthārato ^a^V2.0169^ea^ panettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sayameva dassento ^b^``na kesehī''^eb^tiādimāha. tatrāyaṃ yojanā -- yaṃ vuttaṃ ``natthi manussesu liṅgaṃ jātimayaṃ puthū''ti, taṃ evaṃ natthīti veditabbaṃ. seyyathidaṃ, ^b^na kesehī^eb^ti. na hi ``brāhmaṇānaṃ īdisā kesā honti, khattiyānaṃ īdisā''ti niyamo atthi yathā hatthiassamigādīnanti iminā nayena sabbaṃ yojetabbaṃ. ^b^liṅgaṃ jātimayaṃ neva, yathā aññāsu jātisū^eb^ti idaṃ pana vuttassevatthassa nigamananti veditabbaṃ. tassa yojanā -- tadeva yasmā imehi kesādīhi natthi manussesu liṅgaṃ jātimayaṃ puthu, tasmā veditabbametaṃ ``brāhmaṇādibhedesu manussesu liṅgaṃ jātimayaṃ neva yathā aññāsu jātīsū''ti.

[03] 617^b^.^eb^ idāni evaṃ jātibhede asantepi brāhmaṇo khattiyoti idaṃ nānattaṃ yathā jātaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``paccatta''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tassattho -- etaṃ tiracchānānaṃ viya yonisiddhameva kesādisaṇṭhānānattaṃ manussesu ^a^P2.0466^ea^ brāhmaṇādīnaṃ attano attano sarīresu na vijjati. avijjamānepi pana etasmiṃ yadetaṃ brāhmaṇo khattiyoti nānattavidhānapariyāyaṃ vokāraṃ, taṃ vokārañca manussesu ^b^samaññāya pavuccati, vohāramattena^eb^ vuccatīti.

[03] 619-625^b^.^eb^ ettāvatā ^a^M2.0187^ea^ bhagavā bhāradvājassa vādaṃ niggahetvā idāni yadi jātiyā brāhmaṇo bhaveyya, ājīvasīlācāravipannopi brāhmaṇo bhaveyya. yasmā pana porāṇā brāhmaṇā tassa brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ na icchanti loke ca aññepi paṇḍitamanussā, tasmā vāseṭṭhassa vādapaggahaṇatthaṃ taṃ dassento ^b^``yo hi koci manussesū''^eb^tiādikā aṭṭha gāthāyo āha. tattha ^b^gorakkha^eb^nti khettarakkhaṃ, kasikammanti vuttaṃ hoti. pathavī hi ``go''ti vuccati, tappabhedo ca khettaṃ. ^b^puthusippenā^eb^ti tantavāyakammādinānāsippena. ^b^vohāra^eb^nti vaṇijjaṃ. ^b^parapessenā^eb^ti paresaṃ veyyāvaccena. ^b^issattha^eb^nti āvudhajīvikaṃ, usuñca sattiñcāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^porohiccenā^eb^ti purohitakammena.

[03] 626^b^.^eb^ evaṃ brāhmaṇasamayena ca lokavohārena ca ājīvasīlācāravipannassa abrāhmaṇabhāvaṃ sādhetvā evaṃ sante na jātiyā brāhmaṇo, guṇehi pana brāhmaṇo hoti. tasmā yattha yattha kule jāto yo guṇavā, so brāhmaṇo, ayamettha ñāyoti evametaṃ ñāyaṃ atthato āpādetvā puna tadeva ñāyaṃ vacībhedena pakāsento āha ^b^``na cāhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūmī''^eb^ti.
