[03] tassattho -- ahaṃ pana yvāyaṃ catūsu yonīsu yattha katthaci jāto, tatrāpi vā visesena yo ^a^V2.0170^ea^ brāhmaṇasamaññitāya mātari sambhūto, taṃ ^b^yonijaṃ mattisambhavaṃ^eb^ yā cāyaṃ ``ubhato sujāto''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 1.303; ma0 ni0 2.424) nayena brāhmaṇehi brāhmaṇassa parisuddhauppattimaggasaṅkhātā yoni kathīyati, ``saṃsuddhagahaṇiko''ti iminā ca mātusampatti, tatopi jātasambhūtattā ``yonijo mattisambhavo''ti ca vuccati, tampi yonijaṃ mattisambhavaṃ iminā ca yonijamattisambhavamattena ^b^brāhmaṇaṃ na brūmi^eb^ ^a^P2.0467^ea^. kasmā? yasmā ``bho bho''ti vacanamattena aññehi sakiñcanehi visiṭṭhattā ^b^bhovādī nāma so hoti, sace hoti sakiñcano^eb^. yo panāyaṃ yattha katthaci kule jātopi rāgādikiñcanābhāvena akiñcano, sabbagahaṇapaṭinissaggena ca anādāno, ^b^akiñcanaṃ anādānaṃ tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇaṃ^eb^. kasmā? yasmā bāhitapāpoti.

[03] 627^b^.^eb^ kiñca ^a^M2.0188^ea^ bhiyyo -- ^b^``sabbasaṃyojanaṃ chetvā''^eb^tiādikā sattavīsati gāthā. tattha ^b^sabbasaṃyojana^eb^nti dasavidhaṃ saṃyojanaṃ. ^b^na paritassatī^eb^ti taṇhāya na tassati. ^b^tamaha^eb^nti taṃ ahaṃ rāgādīnaṃ saṅgānaṃ atikkantattā ^b^saṅgātigaṃ,^eb^ catunnampi yogānaṃ abhāvena ^b^visaṃyuttaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ^eb^ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 628^b^.^eb^ ^b^naddhi^eb^nti nayhanabhāvena pavattaṃ kodhaṃ. ^b^varatta^eb^nti bandhanabhāvena pavattaṃ taṇhaṃ. ^b^sandānaṃ sahanukkama^eb^nti anusayānukkamasahitaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhisandānaṃ, idaṃ sabbampi chinditvā ṭhitaṃ avijjāpalighassa ukkhittattā ^b^ukkhittapalighaṃ^eb^ catunnaṃ saccānnaṃ buddhattā ^b^buddhaṃ^eb^ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 629^b^.^eb^ ^b^aduṭṭho^eb^ti evaṃ dasahi akkosavatthūhi ^b^akkosañca^eb^ pāṇiādīhi pothanañca andubandhanādīhi ^b^bandhanañca^eb^ yo akuddhamānaso hutvā adhivāsesi, khantibalena samannāgatattā ^b^khantībalaṃ,^eb^ punappunaṃ uppattiyā anīkabhūtena teneva khantībalānīkena samannāgatattā ^b^balānīkaṃ taṃ^eb^ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 630^b^.^eb^ ^b^vatanta^eb^nti dhutavatena samannāgataṃ, catupārisuddhisīlena ^b^sīlavantaṃ,^eb^ taṇhāussadābhāvena ^b^anussadaṃ,^eb^ chaḷindriyadamanena ^b^dantaṃ,^eb^ koṭiyaṃ ṭhitena attabhāvena ^b^antimasārīraṃ^eb^ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
[03] 631^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^V2.0171^ea^ ^b^na limpatī^eb^ti evameva yo abbhantare duvidhepi kāme na limpati, tasmiṃ kāme na saṇṭhāti, tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
[03] 632^b^.^eb^ ^b^dukkhassā^eb^ti khandhadukkhassa. ^b^pannabhāra^eb^nti ohitakkhandhabhāraṃ catūhi yogehi sabbakilesehi vā ^b^visaṃyuttaṃ^eb^ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti ^a^P2.0468^ea^ attho.

[03] 633^b^.^eb^ ^b^gambhīrapañña^eb^nti gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya paññāya samannāgataṃ, dhammojapaññāya ^b^medhāviṃ,^eb^ ``ayaṃ duggatiyā, ayaṃ sugatiyā, ayaṃ nibbānassa maggo, ayaṃ amaggo''ti evaṃ magge amagge ca chekatāya ^b^maggāmaggassa^eb^ ^a^M2.0189^ea^ ^b^kovidaṃ,^eb^ arahattasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^uttamatthamanuppattaṃ^eb^ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 634^b^.^eb^ ^b^asaṃsaṭṭha^eb^nti dassanasavanasamullāpaparibhogakāyasaṃsaggānaṃ abhāvena asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ. ^b^ubhaya^eb^nti gihīhi ca anagārehi cāti ubhayehipi asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ. ^b^anokasāri^eb^nti anālayacāriṃ, ^b^taṃ^eb^ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 635^b^.^eb^ ^b^nidhāyā^eb^ti nikkhipitvā oropetvā. ^b^tasesu thāvaresu cā^eb^ti taṇhātāsena tasesu taṇhābhāvena thiratāya thāvaresu. ^b^yo na hantī^eb^ti yo evaṃ sabbasattesu vigatapaṭighatāya nikkhittadaṇḍo neva kañci sayaṃ hanati, na aññena ghāteti, tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 636^b^.^eb^ ^b^aviruddha^eb^nti āghātavasena viruddhesupi lokiyamahājanesu āghātābhāvena aviruddhaṃ, hatthagate daṇḍe vā satthe vā avijjamānepi paresaṃ pahāradānato aviratattā ^b^attadaṇḍesu^eb^ janesu ^b^nibbutaṃ^eb^ nikkhittadaṇḍaṃ, pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ ``ahaṃ mama''nti gahitattā ^b^sādānesu,^eb^ tassa gahaṇassa abhāvena ^b^anādānaṃ taṃ^eb^ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 637^b^.^eb^ ^b^āraggā^eb^ti yassete rāgādayo ayañca paraguṇamakkhaṇalakkhaṇo makkho āraggā sāsapo viya papatito, yathā sāsapo āragge na santiṭṭhati, evaṃ citte na tiṭṭhati, tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 638^b^.^eb^ ^b^akakkasa^eb^nti apharusaṃ. ^b^viññāpani^eb^nti atthaviññāpaniṃ. ^b^sacca^eb^nti bhūtaṃ. ^b^nābhisaje^eb^ti ^a^V2.0172^ea^ yāya girāya aññaṃ kujjhāpanavasena na laggāpeyya. khīṇāsavo nāma evarūpameva giraṃ bhāseyya. tasmā tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 639^b^.^eb^ sāṭakābharaṇādīsu ^b^dīghaṃ vā rassaṃ vā,^eb^ maṇimuttādīsu ^b^aṇuṃ^eb^ vā ^b^thūlaṃ^eb^ vā mahagghāppagghavasena ^b^subhaṃ^eb^ vā ^b^asubhaṃ^eb^ vā yo puggalo imasmiṃ ^a^M2.0190^ea^ ^b^loke^eb^ parapariggahitaṃ ^b^nādiyati,^eb^ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ^a^P2.0469^ea^ vadāmīti attho.
[03] 640^b^.^eb^ ^b^nirāsāsa^eb^nti nittaṇhaṃ. ^b^visaṃyutta^eb^nti sabbakilesehi viyuttaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 641^b^.^eb^ ^b^ālayā^eb^ti taṇhā. ^b^aññāya akathaṃkathī^eb^ti aṭṭha vatthūni yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā aṭṭhavatthukāya vicikicchāya nibbicikiccho. ^b^amatogadhamanuppatta^eb^nti amataṃ nibbānaṃ ogahetvā anuppattaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 642^b^.^eb^ ^b^ubho^eb^ti dvepi puññāni pāpāni ca chaḍḍetvāti attho. ^b^saṅga^eb^nti rāgādibhedaṃ saṅgaṃ. ^b^upaccagā^eb^ti atikkanto. tamahaṃ vaṭṭamūlasokena ^b^asokaṃ,^eb^ abbhantare rāgarajādīnaṃ abhāvena ^b^virajaṃ,^eb^ nirupakkilesatāya ^b^suddhaṃ^eb^ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 643^b^.^eb^ ^b^vimala^eb^nti abbhādimalavirahitaṃ. ^b^suddha^eb^nti nirupakkilesaṃ. ^b^vippasanna^eb^nti pasannacittaṃ. ^b^anāvila^eb^nti kilesāvilattavirahitaṃ. ^b^nandībhavaparikkhīṇa^eb^nti tīsu bhavesu parikkhīṇataṇhaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 644^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo^eb^ bhikkhu ^b^imaṃ^eb^ ^b^rāgapalipatha^eb^ñceva kilesa^b^dugga^eb^ñca ^b^saṃsāra^eb^vaṭṭañca catunnaṃ saccānaṃ appaṭivijjhanaka^b^moha^eb^ñca atīto, cattāro oghe ^b^tiṇṇo^eb^ hutvā pāraṃ anuppatto, duvidhena jhānena ^b^jhāyī,^eb^ taṇhāya abhāvena ^b^anejo,^eb^ kathaṃkathāya abhāvena ^b^akathaṃkathī,^eb^ upādānānaṃ abhāvena anupādiyitvā kilesanibbānena ^b^nibbuto,^eb^ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
[03] 645^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo^eb^ puggalo, ^b^idha^eb^ loke, ubhopi ^b^kāme^eb^ hitvā ^b^anāgāro^eb^ hutvā paribbajati, taṃ parikkhīṇakāmañceva parikkhīṇabhavañca ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 646^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^V2.0173^ea^ ^a^M2.0191^ea^ ^b^idha^eb^ loke chadvārikaṃ ^b^taṇhaṃ^eb^ jahitvā gharāvāsena anatthiko ^b^anāgāro^eb^ hutvā paribbajati, taṇhāya ceva bhavassa ca parikkhīṇattā ^b^taṇhābhavaparikkhīṇaṃ^eb^ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 647^b^.^eb^ ^b^mānusakaṃ yoga^eb^nti mānusakaṃ āyuñceva pañcavidhakāmaguṇe ca. dibbayogepi eseva nayo. ^b^upaccagā^eb^ti yo mānusakaṃ yogaṃ hitvā dibbaṃ atikkanto, taṃ sabbehi catūhi yogehi visaṃyuttaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 648^b^.^eb^ ^b^rati^eb^nti pañcakāmaguṇaratiṃ. ^b^arati^eb^nti araññavāse ukkaṇṭhitattaṃ. ^b^sītibhūta^eb^nti ^a^P2.0470^ea^ nibbutaṃ, ^b^nirupadhi^eb^nti nirupakkilesaṃ, ^b^vīra^eb^nti taṃ evarūpaṃ sabbaṃ khandhalokaṃ abhibhavitvā ṭhitaṃ vīriyavantaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 649^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo vedī^eb^ti yo sattānaṃ sabbākārena cutiñca paṭisandhiñca pākaṭaṃ katvā jānāti, ^b^tamahaṃ^eb^ alaggatāya ^b^asattaṃ,^eb^ paṭipattiyā suṭṭhu gatattā ^b^sugataṃ,^eb^ catunnaṃ saccānaṃ buddhatāya ^b^buddhaṃ^eb^ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
[03] 650^b^.^eb^ ^b^yassā^eb^ti yassete devādayo gatiṃ na jānanti, ^b^tamahaṃ^eb^ āsavānaṃ khīṇatāya ^b^khīṇāsavaṃ,^eb^ kilesehi ārakattā ^b^arahantaṃ^eb^ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 651^b^.^eb^ ^b^pure^eb^ti atītakkhandhesu. ^b^pacchā^eb^ti anāgatesu. ^b^majjhe^eb^ti paccuppannesu. ^b^kiñcana^eb^nti yassetesu ṭhānesu taṇhāgāhasaṅkhātaṃ kiñcanaṃ natthi. ^b^tamahaṃ^eb^ rāgakiñcanādīhi ^b^akiñcanaṃ^eb^. kassaci gahaṇassa abhāvena ^b^anādānaṃ^eb^ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 652^b^.^eb^ acchambhitattena usabhasadisatāya ^b^usabhaṃ,^eb^ uttamaṭṭhena ^b^pavaraṃ,^eb^ vīriyasampattiyā ^b^vīraṃ,^eb^ mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esitattā ^b^mahesiṃ^eb^, tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ vijitattā ^b^vijitāvinaṃ^eb^, ninhātakilesatāya ^b^nhātakaṃ,^eb^ catusaccabuddhatāya ^b^buddhaṃ taṃ^eb^ evarūpaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 653^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo pubbenivāsaṃ^eb^ pākaṭaṃ katvā jānāti, chabbīsatidevalokabhedaṃ ^b^saggaṃ,^eb^ catubbidhaṃ ^b^apāyañca^eb^ dibbacakkhunā ^b^passati, atho jātikkhaya^eb^saṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ ^b^patto,^eb^ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.

[03] 654^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^V2.0174^ea^ ^a^M2.0192^ea^ bhagavā guṇato brāhmaṇaṃ vatvā ``ye `jātito brāhmaṇo'ti abhinivesaṃ karonti, te idaṃ vohāramattaṃ ajānantā, sā ca nesaṃ diṭṭhi duddiṭṭhī''ti dassento ^b^``samaññā hesā''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tassattho -- ``yadidaṃ brāhmaṇo khattiyo bhāradvājo vāseṭṭho''ti ^b^nāmagottaṃ pakappitaṃ, samaññā hesā lokasmiṃ,^eb^ paññattivohāramattanti veditabbaṃ. kasmā? yasmā ^b^sammuccā samudāgataṃ^eb^ samanuññāya ^a^P2.0471^ea^ āgataṃ. tañhi ^b^tattha tattha^eb^ jātakāleyevassa ñātisālohitehi ^b^pakappitaṃ^eb^ kataṃ. no cetaṃ evaṃ pakappeyyuṃ, na koci kañci disvā ``ayaṃ brāhmaṇo''ti vā ``bhāradvājo''ti vā jāneyya.

[03] 655^b^.^eb^ evaṃ pakappitañcetaṃ ^b^dīgharattamanusayitaṃ diṭṭhigatamajānataṃ,^eb^ ``pakappitaṃ nāmagottaṃ, nāmagottamattametaṃ saṃvohāratthaṃ pakappita''nti ajānantānaṃ sattānaṃ hadaye dīgharattaṃ diṭṭhigatamanusayitaṃ, tassa anusayitattā taṃ nāmagottaṃ ^b^ajānantā te pabruvanti ``jātiyā hoti brāhmaṇo''^eb^ti, ajānantāyeva evaṃ vadantīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 656-7^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ``ye `jātito brāhmaṇo'ti abhinivesaṃ karonti, te idaṃ vohāramattamajānantā, sā ca nesaṃ diṭṭhi duddiṭṭhī''ti dassetvā idāni nippariyāyameva jātivādaṃ paṭikkhipanto kammavādañca niropento ^b^``na jaccā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ``kammunā brāhmaṇo hoti, kammunā hoti abrāhmaṇo''ti imissā upaḍḍhagāthāya atthavitthāraṇatthaṃ ^b^``kassako kammunā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kammunā^eb^ti paccuppannena kasikammādinibbattakacetanākammunā.

[03] 659^b^.^eb^ ^b^paṭiccasamuppādadassā^eb^ti ``iminā paccayena evaṃ hotī''ti evaṃ paṭiccasamuppādadassāvino. ^b^kammavipākakovidā^eb^ti sammānāvamānārahe kule kammavasena uppatti hoti, aññāpi hīnapaṇītatā hīnapaṇīte kamme vipaccamāne hotīti evaṃ kammavipākakusalā.

[03] 660^b^.^eb^ ^b^``kammunāvattatī''^eb^ti gāthāya pana ^b^``loko''^eb^ti vā ^b^``pajā''^eb^ti vā ^b^``sattā''^eb^ti vā ekoyeva attho, vacanamattameva nānaṃ. purimapadena cettha ^a^M2.0193^ea^ ``atthi brahmā mahābrahmā...pe0... seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyāna''nti (dī0 ni0 1.42) imissā diṭṭhiyā ^a^P2.0472^ea^ nisedho veditabbo. kammunā hi vattati tāsu tāsu gatīsu uppajjati loko, tassa ko sajitāti? dutiyena ``evaṃ kammunā uppannopi ca pavattiyampi atītapaccuppannabhedena kammunā eva ^a^V2.0175^ea^ pavattati, sukhadukkhāni paccanubhonto hīnapaṇītādibhāvaṃ āpajjanto pavattatī''ti dasseti. tatiyena tamevatthaṃ nigameti ``evaṃ sabbathāpi kammanibandhanā sattā kammeneva baddhā hutvā pavattanti, na aññathā''ti. catutthena tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāveti ^b^rathassāṇīva yāyato^eb^ti. yathā rathassa yāyato āṇi nibandhanaṃ hoti, na tāya anibaddho yāti, evaṃ lokassa uppajjato ca pavattato ca kammaṃ nibandhanaṃ, na tena anibaddho uppajjati nappavattati.

[03] 661^b^.^eb^ idāni yasmā evaṃ kammanibandhano loko, tasmā seṭṭhena kammunā seṭṭhabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^``tapenā''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^tapenā^eb^ti indriyasaṃvarena. ^b^brahmacariyenā^eb^ti sikkhānissitena vuttāvasesaseṭṭhacariyena. ^b^saṃyamenā^eb^ti sīlena. ^b^damenā^eb^ti paññāya. ^b^etena^eb^ seṭṭhaṭṭhena brahmabhūtena kammunā ^b^brāhmaṇo hoti^eb^. kasmā? yasmā ^b^etaṃ brāhmaṇamuttamaṃ,^eb^ yasmā etaṃ kammaṃ uttamo brāhmaṇabhāvoti vuttaṃ hoti. ``brahmāna''ntipi pāṭho, tassattho -- brahmaṃ ānetīti brahmānaṃ, brahmabhāvaṃ āneti āvahati detīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 662^b^.^eb^ dutiyagāthāya ^b^santo^eb^ti santakileso. ^b^brahmā sakko^eb^ti brahmā ca sakko ca. yo evarūpo, so na kevalaṃ brāhmaṇo, apica kho brahmā ca sakko ca so vijānataṃ paṇḍitānaṃ, evaṃ vāseṭṭha jānāhīti vuttaṃ hoti. sesaṃ vuttanayamevāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya vāseṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0176^ea^ ^a^M2.0194^ea^ ^a^P2.0473^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti kokālikasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? imassa suttassa uppatti atthavaṇṇanāyameva āvi bhavissati. atthavaṇṇanāya cassa ^b^evaṃ me suta^eb^ntiādi vuttanayameva. ^b^atha kho kokāliko^eb^ti ettha pana ko ayaṃ kokāliko, kasmā ca upasaṅkamīti? vuccate -- ayaṃ kira kokālikaraṭṭhe kokālikanagare kokālikaseṭṭhissa putto pabbajitvā pitarā kārāpite vihāreyeva paṭivasati ``cūḷakokāliko''ti nāmena, na devadattassa sisso. so hi brāhmaṇaputto ``mahākokāliko''ti paññāyi.

[03] bhagavati kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante dve aggasāvakā pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ caramānā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya vivekavāsaṃ vasitukāmā te bhikkhū uyyojetvā attano pattacīvaramādāya tasmiṃ janapade taṃ nagaraṃ patvā taṃ vihāraṃ agamaṃsu. tattha te kokālikena saddhiṃ sammoditvā taṃ āhaṃsu -- ``āvuso, mayaṃ idha temāsaṃ vasissāma, mā kassaci āroceyyāsī''ti. so ``sādhū''ti paṭissuṇitvā temāse atīte itaradivasaṃ pageva nagaraṃ pavisitvā ārocesi -- ``tumhe aggasāvake idhāgantvā vasamāne na jānittha, na te koci paccayenāpi nimantetī''ti. nagaravāsino ``kasmā no, bhante, nārocayitthā''ti. kiṃ ārocitena, kiṃ nāddasatha dve bhikkhū vasante, nanu ete aggasāvakāti. te khippaṃ sannipatitvā sappiguḷavatthādīni ānetvā kokālikassa purato nikkhipiṃsu. so cintesi -- ``paramappicchā aggasāvakā `payuttavācāya uppanno lābho'ti ñatvā na sādiyissanti, asādiyantā addhā `āvāsikassa dethā'ti bhaṇissanti, handāhaṃ imaṃ lābhaṃ gāhāpetvā gacchāmī''ti ^a^P2.0474^ea^. so tathā akāsi, therā disvāva payuttavācāya uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā ``ime paccayā neva amhākaṃ na kokālikassa vaṭṭantī''ti cintetvā ``āvāsikassa dethā''ti avatvā paṭikkhipitvā pakkamiṃsu. tena kokāliko ``kathañhi nāma attanā aggaṇhantā mayhampi na dāpesu''nti domanassaṃ uppādesi.

[03] te ^a^M2.0195^ea^ bhagavato santikaṃ agamaṃsu. bhagavā ca pavāretvā sace attanā janapadacārikaṃ na gacchati, aggasāvake peseti -- ``caratha, bhikkhave, cārikaṃ bahujanahitāyā''tiādīni (mahāva0 32) vatvā ^a^V2.0177^ea^. idamāciṇṇaṃ tathāgatānaṃ. tena kho pana samayena attanā agantukāmo hoti. atha kho ime punadeva uyyojesi -- ``gacchatha, bhikkhave, caratha cārika''nti. te pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ cārikaṃ caramānā anupubbena tasmiṃ raṭṭhe tameva nagaraṃ agamaṃsu. nāgarā there sañjānitvā saha parikkhārehi dānaṃ sajjetvā nagaramajjhe maṇḍapaṃ katvā dānaṃ adaṃsu, therānañca parikkhāre upanāmesuṃ. therā gahetvā bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṃsu. taṃ disvā kokāliko cintesi -- ``ime pubbe appicchā ahesuṃ, idāni lobhābhibhūtā pāpicchā jātā, pubbepi appicchasantuṭṭhapavivittasadisā maññe, ime pāpicchā asantaguṇaparidīpakā pāpabhikkhū''ti. so there upasaṅkamitvā ``āvuso, tumhe pubbe appicchā santuṭṭhā pavivittā viya ahuvattha, idāni panattha pāpabhikkhū jātā''ti vatvā pattacīvaramādāya tāvadeva taramānarūpo nikkhamitvā gantvā ``bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocessāmī''ti sāvatthābhimukho gantvā anupubbena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami. ayamettha kokāliko, iminā kāraṇena upasaṅkami. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī''^eb^tiādi.

[03] bhagavā taṃ turitaturitaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvāva āvajjetvā aññāsi -- ``aggasāvake akkositukāmo āgato''ti. ``sakkā nu kho paṭisedhetu''nti ca āvajjento ``na sakkā, theresu aparajjhitvā ^a^P2.0475^ea^ āgato, ekaṃsena padumaniraye uppajjissatī''ti addasa. evaṃ disvāpi pana ``sāriputtamoggallānepi nāma garahantaṃ sutvā na nisedhetī''ti parūpavādamocanatthaṃ ariyūpavādassa mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthañca ^b^``mā heva''^eb^ntiādinā nayena tikkhattuṃ paṭisedhesi. tattha ^b^mā heva^eb^nti mā evamāha, mā evaṃ abhaṇīti attho. ^b^pesalā^eb^ti piyasīlā. ^b^saddhāyiko^eb^ti saddhāgamakaro, pasādāvahoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^paccayiko^eb^ti paccayakaro, ``evameta''nti sanniṭṭhāvahoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^acirapakkantassā^eb^ti pakkantassa sato na cireneva ^b^sabbo kāyo phuṭo ahosī^eb^ti kesaggamattampi okāsaṃ avajjetvā sakalasarīraṃ aṭṭhīni ^a^M2.0196^ea^ bhinditvā uggatāhi pīḷakāhi ajjhotthaṭaṃ ahosi. tattha yasmā buddhānubhāvena tathārūpaṃ kammaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve vipākaṃ na deti, dassanūpacāre pana vijahitamatte deti, tasmā tassa acirapakkantassa pīḷakā uṭṭhahiṃsu. teneva vuttaṃ ``acirapakkantassa ca kokālikassā''ti. atha kasmā tattheva na aṭṭhāsīti ce? kammānubhāvena. okāsakatañhi kammaṃ avassaṃ vipaccati, taṃ tassa tattha ṭhātuṃ na deti. so kammānubhāvena codiyamāno uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi. ^b^kaḷāyamattiyo^eb^ti caṇakamattiyo ^a^V2.0178^ea^. ^b^beluvasalāṭukamattiyo^eb^ti taruṇabeluvamattiyo. ^b^pabhijjiṃsū^eb^ti bhijjiṃsu. tāsu bhinnāsu sakalasarīraṃ panasapakkaṃ viya ahosi. so pakkena gattena anayabyasanaṃ patvā dukkhābhibhūto jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake sayi. atha dhammassavanatthaṃ āgatāgatā manussā taṃ disvā ``dhi kokālika, dhi kokālika, ayuttamakāsi, attanoyeva mukhaṃ nissāya anayabyasanaṃ pattosī''ti āhaṃsu. tesaṃ sutvā ārakkhadevatā ^a^P2.0476^ea^ dhikkāraṃ akaṃsu, ārakkhadevatānaṃ ākāsaṭṭhadevatāti iminā upāyena yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā ekadhikkāro udapādi.

[03] tadā ca turū nāma bhikkhu kokālikassa upajjhāyo anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā suddhāvāsesu nibbatto hoti. sopi samāpattiyā vuṭṭhito taṃ dhikkāraṃ sutvā āgamma kokālikaṃ ovadi sāriputtamoggallānesu cittappasādajananatthaṃ. so tassāpi vacanaṃ aggahetvā aññadatthu tameva aparādhetvā kālaṃ katvā padumaniraye uppajji. tenāha -- ^b^``atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu tenevābādhena...pe0... āghātetvā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^atha kho brahmā sahampatī^eb^ti ko ayaṃ brahmā, kasmā ca bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavocāti? ayaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma bhikkhu anāgāmī hutvā suddhāvāsesu uppanno, tattha naṃ ``sahampati brahmā''ti sañjānanti. so pana ``ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā padumanirayaṃ kittessāmi, tato bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ ārocessati. kathānusandhikusalā bhikkhū tatthāyuppamāṇaṃ pucchissanti, bhagavā ācikkhanto ariyūpavāde ādīnavaṃ pakāsessatī''ti iminā kāraṇena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ^a^M2.0197^ea^ etadavoca. bhagavā tatheva akāsi, aññataropi bhikkhu pucchi. tena ca puṭṭho ^b^``seyyathāpi bhikkhū''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^vīsatikhāriko^eb^ti māgadhakena patthena cattāro patthā kosalaraṭṭhe eko pattho hoti, tena patthena cattāro patthā āḷhakaṃ, cattāri āḷhakāni doṇaṃ, catudoṇā mānikā, catumānikā khārī, tāya khāriyā vīsatikhāriko. ^b^tilavāho^eb^ti tilasakaṭaṃ. ^b^abbudo nirayo^eb^ti abbudo nāma koci paccekanirayo natthi, avīcimhiyeva abbudagaṇanāya paccanokāso pana ``abbudo nirayo''ti vutto. esa nayo ^b^nirabbudā^eb^dīsu.

[03] tattha vassagaṇanāpi evaṃ veditabbā ^a^P2.0477^ea^ -- yatheva hi sataṃ satasahassāni koṭi hoti, evaṃ sataṃ satasahassakoṭiyo pakoṭi nāma hoti, sataṃ satasahassapakoṭiyo koṭippakoṭi nāma, sataṃ satasahassakoṭippakoṭiyo nahutaṃ, sataṃ satasahassanahutāni ninnahutaṃ, sataṃ satasahassaninnahutāni ^a^V2.0179^ea^ ekaṃ abbudaṃ, tato vīsatiguṇaṃ nirabbudaṃ. esa nayo sabbattha. keci pana ``tattha tattha paridevanānattenapi kammakaraṇanānattenapi imāni nāmāni laddhānī''ti vadanti, apare ``sītanarakā eva ete''ti.

[03] ^b^athāpara^eb^nti tadatthavisesatthadīpakaṃ gāthābandhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. pāṭhavasena vuttavīsatigāthāsu hi ettha ``sataṃ sahassāna''nti ayamekā eva gāthā vuttatthadīpikā, sesā visesatthadīpikā eva, avasāne gāthādvayameva pana mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vinicchitapāṭhe natthi. tenāvocumha ``vīsatigāthāsū''ti.
[03] 663^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^kuṭhārī^eb^ti attacchedakaṭṭhena kuṭhārisadisā pharusavācā. ^b^chindatī^eb^ti kusalamūlasaṅkhātaṃ attano mūlaṃyeva nikantati.

[03] 664^b^.^eb^ ^b^nindiya^eb^nti ninditabbaṃ. ^b^taṃ vā nindati yo pasaṃsiyo^eb^ti yo uttamaṭṭhena pasaṃsāraho puggalo, taṃ vā so pāpicchatādīni āropetvā garahati. ^b^vicinātī^eb^ti upacināti. ^b^kali^eb^nti aparādhaṃ.

[03] 665^b^.^eb^ ^b^ayaṃ kalī^eb^ti ayaṃ aparādho. ^b^akkhesū^eb^ti jūtakīḷanākkhesu. ^b^sabbassāpi sahāpi attanā^eb^ti sabbena attano dhanenapi attanāpi saddhiṃ. ^b^sugatesū^eb^pi ^a^M2.0198^ea^ suṭṭhu gatattā, sundarañca ṭhānaṃ gatattā sugatanāmakesu buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakesu. ^b^manaṃ padosaye^eb^ti yo manaṃ padūseyya. tassāyaṃ manopadoso eva mahattaro kalīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 666^b^.^eb^ kasmā? yasmā ^b^sataṃ sahassānaṃ...pe0... pāpakaṃ,^eb^ yasmā vassagaṇanāya ettako so kālo, ^b^yaṃ^eb^ kālaṃ ^b^ariyagarahī^eb^ ^a^P2.0478^ea^ ^b^vācaṃ manañca paṇidhāya pāpakaṃ nirayaṃ upeti,^eb^ tattha paccatīti vuttaṃ hoti. idañhi saṅkhepena padumaniraye āyuppamāṇaṃ.

[03] 667^b^.^eb^ idāni aparenapi nayena ``ayameva mahattaro kali, yo sugatesu manaṃ padūsaye''ti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento ^b^``abhūtavādī''^eb^ti ādimāha. tattha ^b^abhūtavādī^eb^ti ariyūpavādavasena alikavādī. ^b^niraya^eb^nti padumādiṃ. ^b^pecca samā bhavantī^eb^ti ito paṭigantvā nirayūpapattiyā samā bhavanti. ^b^paratthā^eb^ti paraloke.

[03] 668^b^.^eb^ kiñca ^a^V2.0180^ea^ bhiyyo -- ^b^yo appaduṭṭhassā^eb^ti. tattha manopadosābhāvena ^b^appaduṭṭho,^eb^ avijjāmalābhāvena ^b^suddho,^eb^ pāpicchābhāvena ^b^anaṅgaṇo^eb^ti veditabbo. appaduṭṭhattā vā suddhassa, suddhattā anaṅgaṇassāti evampettha yojetabbaṃ.

[03] 669^b^.^eb^ evaṃ sugatesu manopadosassa mahattarakalibhāvaṃ sādhetvā idāni vāritavatthugāthā nāma cuddasa gāthā āha. imā kira kokālikaṃ mīyamānameva ovadantenāyasmatā mahāmoggallānena vuttā, ``mahābrahmunā''ti eke. tāsaṃ iminā suttena saddhiṃ ekasaṅgahatthaṃ ayamuddeso ^b^``yo lobhaguṇe anuyutto''^eb^tiādi. tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva ``guṇo''ti niddiṭṭhattā anekakkhattuṃ pavattattā vā lobhoyeva ^b^lobhaguṇo,^eb^ taṇhāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^avadaññū^eb^ti avacanaññū buddhānampi ovādaṃ aggahaṇena. ^b^maccharī^eb^ti pañcavidhamacchariyena. ^b^pesuṇiyaṃ anuyutto^eb^ti aggasāvakānaṃ bhedakāmatāya. sesaṃ pākaṭameva. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yo, āvuso kokālika, tumhādiso anuyuttalobhataṇhāya lobhaguṇe anuyutto assaddho kadariyo avadaññū maccharī pesuṇiyaṃ anuyutto, so vacasā paribhāsati aññaṃ abhāsaneyyampi puggalaṃ. tena taṃ vadāmi ^a^P2.0479^ea^ ``mukhaduggā''ti gāthāttayaṃ.

[03] 670^b^.^eb^ tassāyaṃ ^a^M2.0199^ea^ anuttānapadattho -- ^b^mukhadugga^eb^ mukhavisama, ^b^vibhūta^eb^ vigatabhūta, alikavādi, ^b^anariya^eb^ asappurisa, ^b^bhūnahu^eb^ bhūtihanaka, vuḍḍhināsaka, ^b^purisanta^eb^ antimapurisa, ^b^kali^eb^ alakkhipurisa, ^b^avajāta^eb^ buddhassa avajātaputta.
[03] 671^b^.^eb^ ^b^rajamākirasī^eb^ti kilesarajaṃ attani pakkhipasi. ^b^papata^eb^nti sobbhaṃ. ``papāta''ntipi pāṭho, so evattho. ``papada''ntipi pāṭho, mahānirayanti attho.

[03] 672^b^.^eb^ ^b^eti hata^eb^nti ettha ^b^ha^eb^-iti nipāto, ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ kusalākusalakammaṃ. atha vā ^b^hata^eb^nti gataṃ paṭipannaṃ, upacitanti attho. ^b^suvāmī^eb^ti sāmi tassa kammassa katattā. so hi taṃ kammaṃ labhateva, nāssa taṃ nassatīti vuttaṃ hoti. yasmā ca labhati, tasmā ^b^dukkhaṃ mando...pe0... kibbisakārī^eb^.

[03] 673^b^.^eb^ idāni yaṃ dukkhaṃ mando passati, taṃ pakāsento ^b^``ayosaṅkusamāhataṭṭhāna''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha purimaupaḍḍhagāthāya tāva attho -- yaṃ taṃ ayosaṅkusamāhataṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā ``tamenaṃ, bhikkhave, nirayapālā pañcavidhabandhanaṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ ^a^V2.0181^ea^ karontī''ti (ma0 ni0 3.250; a0 ni0 3.36) vuttaṃ, taṃ upeti, evaṃ upento ca tattheva ādittāya lohapathaviyā nipajjāpetvā nirayapālehi pañcasu ṭhānesu ākoṭiyamānaṃ tattaṃ khilasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^tiṇhadhāramayasūlamupeti,^eb^ yaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā vuttaṃ ``tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamentī''tiādi. tato parā upaḍḍhagāthā anekāni vassasahassāni tattha paccitvā pakkāvasesānubhavanatthaṃ anupubbena khārodakanadītīraṃ gatassa yaṃ taṃ ``tattaṃ ayoguḷaṃ mukhe pakkhipanti, tattaṃ tambalohaṃ mukhe āsiñcantī''ti vuttaṃ, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ayo^eb^ti lohaṃ. ^b^guḷasannibha^eb^nti beluvasaṇṭhānaṃ. ayogahaṇena cettha tambalohaṃ, itarena ayoguḷaṃ ^a^P2.0480^ea^ veditabbaṃ. ^b^patirūpa^eb^nti katakammānurūpaṃ.

[03] 674^b^.^eb^ tato parāsu gāthāsu ^b^na hi vaggū^eb^ti ``gaṇhatha, paharathā''tiādīni vadantā nirayapālā madhuravācaṃ na vadanti. ^b^nābhijavantī^eb^ti na ^a^M2.0200^ea^ sumukhabhāvena abhimukhā javanti, na sumukhā upasaṅkamanti, anayabyasanamāvahantā eva upasaṅkamantīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^na tāṇamupentī^eb^ti tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ hutvā na upagacchanti, gaṇhantā hanantā eva upentīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^aṅgāre santhate sayantī^eb^ti aṅgārapabbataṃ āropitā samānā anekāni vassasahassāni santhate aṅgāre senti. ^b^ginisampajjalita^eb^nti samantato jalitaṃ sabbadisāsu ca sampajjalitaṃ aggiṃ. ^b^pavisantī^eb^ti mahāniraye pakkhittā samānā ogāhanti. mahānirayo nāma yo so ``catukkaṇṇo''ti (a0 ni0 3.36) vutto, naṃ yojanasate ṭhatvā passataṃ akkhīni bhijjanti.

[03] 675^b^.^eb^ ^b^jālena ca onahiyānā^eb^ti ayojālena paliveṭhetvā migaluddakā migaṃ viya hananti. idaṃ devadūte avuttakammakāraṇaṃ. ^b^andhaṃva timisamāyantī^eb^ti andhakaraṇena andhameva bahalandhakārattā ``timisa''nti saññitaṃ dhūmaroruvaṃ nāma narakaṃ gacchanti. tatra kira nesaṃ kharadhūmaṃ ghāyitvā akkhīni bhijjanti, tena ``andhaṃvā''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^taṃ vitatañhi yathā mahikāyo^eb^ti tañca andhatimisaṃ mahikāyo viya vitataṃ hotīti attho. ``vitthata''ntipi pāṭho. idampi devadūte avuttakammakāraṇameva.

[03] 676^b^.^eb^ ^b^atha lohamaya^eb^nti ayaṃ pana lohakumbhī pathavipariyantikā catunahutādhikāni dveyojanasatasahassāni gambhīrā samatittikā tatralohapūrā hoti. ^b^paccanti hi tāsu ciraratta^eb^nti tāsu kumbhīsu dīgharattaṃ paccanti. ^b^agginisamāsū^eb^ti aggisamāsu ^a^P2.0481^ea^. ^b^samuppilavāte^eb^ti samuppilavantā ^a^V2.0182^ea^, sakimpi uddhaṃ sakimpi adho gacchamānā pheṇuddehakaṃ paccantīti vuttaṃ hoti. devadūte vuttanayeneva taṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] 677^b^.^eb^ ^b^pubbalohitamisse^eb^ti pubbalohitamissāya lohakumbhiyā. ^b^tattha ki^eb^nti tattha. ^b^yaṃ yaṃ disaka^eb^nti disaṃ vidisaṃ. ^b^adhisetī^eb^ti gacchati. ``abhisetī''tipi pāṭho, tattha yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ allīyati apassayatīti attho. ^b^kilissatī^eb^ti bādhīyati. ``kilijjatī''tipi pāṭho, pūti hotīti attho. ^b^samphusamāno^eb^ti tena pubbalohitena phuṭṭho samāno. idampi devadūte avuttakammakāraṇaṃ.

[03] 678^b^.^eb^ ^b^puḷavāvasathe^eb^ti ^a^M2.0201^ea^ puḷavānaṃ āvāse. ayampi lohakumbhīyeva devadūte ``gūthanirayo''ti vuttā, tattha patitassa sūcimukhapāṇā chaviādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ khādanti. ^b^gantuṃ na hi tīramapatthī^eb^ti apagantuṃ na hi tīraṃ atthi. ``tīravamatthī''tipi pāṭho, soyevattho. tīrameva ettha ``tīrava''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^sabbasamā hi samantakapallā^eb^ti yasmā tassā kumbhiyā uparibhāgepi nikujjitattā sabbattha samā samantato kaṭāhā, tasmā apagantuṃ tīraṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 679^b^.^eb^ ^b^asipattavanaṃ^eb^ devadūte vuttanayameva. tañhi dūrato ramaṇīyaṃ ambavanaṃ viya dissati, athettha lobhena nerayikā pavisanti, tato nesaṃ vāteritāni pattāni patitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni chindanti. tenāha -- ^b^``taṃ pavisanti samucchidagattā''^eb^ti. taṃ pavisanti tato suṭṭhu chinnagattā hontīti. ^b^jivhaṃ baḷisena gahetvā ārajayārajayā vihanantī^eb^ti tattha asipattavane vegena dhāvitvā patitānaṃ musāvādīnaṃ nerayikānaṃ nirayapālā jivhaṃ baḷisena nikkaḍḍhitvā yathā manussā allacammaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pattharitvā khilehi ākoṭenti, evaṃ ākoṭetvā pharasūhi phāletvā phāletvā ekamekaṃ ^a^P2.0482^ea^ koṭiṃ chindetvā vihananti, chinnachinnā koṭi punappunaṃ samuṭṭhāti. ``āracayāracayā''tipi pāṭho, āviñchitvā āviñchitvāti attho. etampi devadūte avuttakammakāraṇaṃ.

[03] 680^b^.^eb^ ^b^vetaraṇi^eb^nti devadūte ``mahatī khārodakā nadī''ti (ma0 ni0 3.269) vuttanadiṃ. sā kira gaṅgā viya udakabharitā dissati. athettha nhāyissāma pivissāmāti nerayikā patanti. ^b^tiṇhadhārakhuradhāra^eb^nti tiṇhadhāraṃ khuradhāraṃ, tikkhadhārakhuradhāravatinti vuttaṃ hoti. tassā kira nadiyā uddhamadho ubhayatīresu ca tiṇhadhārā khurā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitā viya ^a^V2.0183^ea^ tiṭṭhanti, tena sā ``tiṇhadhārā khuradhārā''ti vuccati. taṃ tiṇhadhārakhuradhāraṃ udakāsāya upenti allīyantīti attho. evaṃ upentā ca pāpakammena coditā ^b^tattha mandā papatanti^eb^ bālāti attho.

[03] 681^b^.^eb^ ^b^sāmā sabalā^eb^ti etaṃ parato ``soṇā''ti iminā yojetabbaṃ. sāmavaṇṇā kammāsavaṇṇā ca soṇā khādantīti vuttaṃ hoti ^a^M2.0202^ea^. ^b^kākolagaṇā^eb^ti kaṇhakākagaṇā. ^b^paṭigiddhā^eb^ti suṭṭhu sañjātagedhā hutvā, ^b^``mahāgijjhā''^eb^ti eke. ^b^kulalā^eb^ti kulalapakkhino, ``senānametaṃ nāma''nti eke. ^b^vāyasā^eb^ti akaṇhakākā. idampi devadūte avuttakammakāraṇaṃ. tattha vuttānipi pana kānici idha na vuttāni, tāni etesaṃ purimapacchimabhāgattā vuttāneva hontīti veditabbāni.

[03] 682^b^.^eb^ idāni sabbamevetaṃ narakavuttiṃ dassetvā ovadanto ^b^``kicchā vatāya''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tassattho -- ^b^kicchā vata ayaṃ idha^eb^ narake nānappakārakammakaraṇabhedā ^b^vutti, yaṃ jano phusati kibbisakārī. tasmā idha jīvitasese^eb^ jīvitasantatiyā vijjamānāya idha loke ṭhitoyeva samāno saraṇagamanādikusaladhammānuṭṭhānena ^b^kiccakaro naro siyā^eb^ bhaveyya. kiccakaro bhavantopi ca sātaccakāritāvaseneva bhaveyya, ^b^na pamajje^eb^ muhuttampi na pamādamāpajjeyyāti ayamettha ^a^P2.0483^ea^ samuccayavaṇṇanā. yasmā pana vuttāvasesāni padāni pubbe vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca suviññeyyāneva, tasmā anupadavaṇṇanā na katāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya kokālikasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 685^b^.^eb^ ^b^ānandajāte^eb^ti ^a^V2.0184^ea^ nālakasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? padumuttarassa kira bhagavato sāvakaṃ moneyyapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannaṃ disvā tathattaṃ abhikaṅkhamāno tato pabhuti kappasatasahassaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā asitassa isino bhāgineyyo nālako nāma tāpaso bhagavantaṃ dhammacakkappavattitadivasato sattame divase ``aññātameta''ntiādīhi dvīhi gāthāhi moneyyapaṭipadaṃ pucchi. tassa bhagavā ``moneyyaṃ te upaññissa''ntiādinā nayena taṃ byākāsi. parinibbute pana bhagavati saṅgītiṃ karontenāyasmatā mahākassapena āyasmā ānando tameva moneyyapaṭipadaṃ puṭṭho yena yadā ca samādapito nālako bhagavantaṃ pucchi ^a^M2.0203^ea^. taṃ sabbaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetukāmo ``ānandajāte''tiādikā vīsati vatthugāthāyo vatvā abhāsi. taṃ sabbampi ``nālakasutta''nti vuccati.

[03] tattha ^b^ānandajāte^eb^ti samiddhijāte vuddhippatte. ^b^patīte^eb^ti tuṭṭhe. atha vā ^b^ānandajāte^eb^ti pamudite. ^b^patīte^eb^ti somanassajāte. ^b^sucivasane^eb^ti akiliṭṭhavasane. devānañhi kapparukkhanibbattāni vasanāni rajaṃ vā malaṃ vā na gaṇhanti. ^b^dussaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti idha dussasadisattā ``dussa''nti laddhavohāraṃ dibbavatthaṃ ukkhipitvā. ^b^asito isī^eb^ti kaṇhasarīravaṇṇattā evaṃladdhanāmo isi. ^b^divāvihāre^eb^ti divāvihāraṭṭhāne. sesaṃ padato uttānameva.

[03] sambandhato pana -- ayaṃ kira suddhodanassa pitu sīhahanurañño purohito suddhodanassapi anabhisittakāle sippācariyo hutvā abhisittakāle purohitoyeva ahosi. tassa sāyaṃ pātaṃ rājupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatassa rājā daharakāle viya nipaccakāraṃ akatvā añjalikammamattameva karoti. dhammatā kiresā ^a^P2.0484^ea^ pattābhisekānaṃ sakyarājūnaṃ. purohito tena nibbijjitvā ``pabbajjāmahaṃ mahārājā''ti āha. rājā tassa nicchayaṃ ñatvā ``tena hi, ācariya, mameva uyyāne vasitabbaṃ, yathā te ahaṃ abhiṇhaṃ passeyya''nti yāci. so ``evaṃ hotū''ti paṭissuṇitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā raññā upaṭṭhahiyamāno uyyāneyeva vasanto kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañcābhiññāyo ca nibbattesi. so tato pabhuti rājakule ^a^V2.0185^ea^ bhattakiccaṃ katvā himavantacātumahārājikabhavanādīnaṃ aññataraṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ karoti. athekadivasaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gantvā ratanavimānaṃ pavisitvā dibbaratanapallaṅke nisinno samādhisukhaṃ anubhavitvā sāyanhasamayaṃ vuṭṭhāya vimānadvāre ṭhatvā ito cito ca vilokento saṭṭhiyojanāya mahāvīthiyā celukkhepaṃ katvā bodhisattaguṇapasaṃsitāni thutivacanāni vatvā kīḷante sakkappamukhe deve addasa. tenāha āyasmā ānando -- ``ānandajāte...pe0... divāvihāre''ti.

[03] 686^b^.^eb^ tato so evaṃ ^b^disvāna deve...pe0... kiṃ paṭicca^eb^. tattha ^b^udagge^eb^ti abbhunnatakāye. ^b^cittiṃ karitvānā^eb^ti ādaraṃ katvā. ^b^kalyarūpo^eb^ti tuṭṭharūpo. sesaṃ uttānatthameva.
[03] 687^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^M2.0204^ea^ ^b^``yadāpi āsī''^eb^tiādigāthā uttānasambandhā eva. padattho pana paṭhamagāthāya tāva ^b^saṅgamo^eb^ti saṅgāmo. ^b^jayo surāna^eb^nti devānaṃ jayo.

[03] tassāvibhāvatthaṃ ayamanupubbikathā veditabbā -- sakko kira magadharaṭṭhe macalagāmavāsī tettiṃsamanussaseṭṭho magho nāma māṇavo hutvā satta vattapadāni pūretvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti saddhiṃ parisāya. tato pubbadevā ``āgantukadevaputtā āgatā, sakkāraṃ nesaṃ karissāmā''ti vatvā dibbapadumāni ^a^P2.0485^ea^ upanāmesuṃ, upaḍḍharajjena ca nimantesuṃ. sakko upaḍḍharajjena asantuṭṭho sakaparisaṃ saññāpetvā ekadivasaṃ surāmadamatte te pāde gahetvā sinerupabbatapāde khipi. tesaṃ sinerussa heṭṭhimatale dasasahassayojanaṃ asurabhavanaṃ nibbatti pāricchattakapaṭicchannabhūtāya citrapāṭaliyā upasobhitaṃ. tato te satiṃ paṭilabhitvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ apassantā ``aho re naṭṭhā mayaṃ pānamadadosena, na dāni mayaṃ suraṃ pivimhā, asuraṃ pivimhā, na dānimhā surā, asurā dāni jātamhā''ti. tato pabhuti ``asurā''icceva uppannasamaññā hutvā ``handa dāni devehi saddhiṃ saṅgāmemā''ti sineruṃ parito ārohiṃsu. tato sakko asure yuddhena abbhuggantvā punapi samudde pakkhipitvā catūsu dvāresu attanā sadisaṃ indapaṭimaṃ māpetvā ṭhapesi. tato asurā ``appamatto vatāyaṃ sakko niccaṃ rakkhanto tiṭṭhatī''ti cintetvā punadeva nagaraṃ agamiṃsu. tato devā attano jayaṃ ghosentā mahāvīthiyaṃ celukkhepaṃ karontā nakkhattaṃ kīḷiṃsu. atha asito atītānāgate cattālīsakappe anussarituṃ samatthatāya ``kiṃ nu kho imehi pubbepi evaṃ kīḷitapubba''nti āvajjento taṃ devāsurasaṅgāme devavijayaṃ disvā āha --
[21] ``yadāpi ^a^V2.0186^ea^ āsī asurehi saṅgamo,
[27] jayo surānaṃ asurā parājitā.
[22] tadāpi netādiso lomahaṃsano''ti..
[03] tasmimpi kāle etādiso lomahaṃsano pamodo na āsi. ^b^kimabbhutaṃ daṭṭhu marū pamoditā^eb^ti ajja pana kiṃ abbhutaṃ disvā evaṃ devā pamuditāti.

[03] 688^b^.^eb^ dutiyagāthāya ^a^M2.0205^ea^ ^b^seḷentī^eb^ti mukhena usseḷanasaddaṃ muñcanti. ^b^gāyanti^eb^ nānāvidhāni gītāni, ^b^vādayanti^eb^ aṭṭhasaṭṭhi tūriyasahassāni, ^b^phoṭentī^eb^ti apphoṭenti. ^b^pucchāmi voha^eb^nti attanā āvajjetvā ñātuṃ samatthopi tesaṃ vacanaṃ sotukāmatāya pucchati. ^b^merumuddhavāsine^eb^ti sinerumuddhani vasante. sinerussa hi heṭṭhimatale dasayojanasahassaṃ ^a^P2.0486^ea^ asurabhavanaṃ, majjhimatale dvisahassaparittadīpaparivārā cattāro mahādīpā, uparimatale dasayojanasahassaṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ. tasmā devā ``merumuddhavāsino''ti vuccanti. ^b^mārisā^eb^ti deve āmanteti, nidukkhā nirābādhāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 689^b^.^eb^ athassa tamatthaṃ ārocentehi devehi vuttāya tatiyagāthāya ^b^bodhisatto^eb^ti bujjhanakasatto, sammāsambodhiṃ gantuṃ araho satto ^b^ratanavaro^eb^ti vararatanabhūto. ^b^tenamha tuṭṭhā^eb^ti tena kāraṇena mayaṃ tuṭṭhā. so hi buddhattaṃ patvā tathā dhammaṃ desessati, yathā mayañca aññe ca devagaṇā sekkhāsekkhabhūmiṃ pāpuṇissāma. manussāpissa dhammaṃ sutvā ye na sakkhissanti parinibbātuṃ, te dānādīni katvā devaloke paripūressantīti ayaṃ kira nesaṃ adhippāyo. tattha ^b^``tuṭṭhā kalyarūpā''^eb^ti kiñcāpi idaṃ padadvayaṃ atthato abhinnaṃ, tathāpi ``kimabbhutaṃ daṭṭhu marū pamoditā, kiṃ devasaṅgho atiriva kalyarūpo''ti imassa pañhadvayassa vissajjanatthaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 690^b^.^eb^ idāni yena adhippāyena bodhisatte jāte tuṭṭhā ahesuṃ, taṃ āvikarontehi vuttāya catutthagāthāya sattaggahaṇena devamanussaggahaṇaṃ, pajāgahaṇena sesagatiggahaṇaṃ. evaṃ dvīhi padehi pañcasupi gatīsu seṭṭhabhāvaṃ dasseti. tiracchānāpi hi sīhādayo asantāsādiguṇayuttā, tepi ayameva atiseti. tasmā ^b^``pajānamuttamo''^eb^ti vutto. devamanussesu pana ye attahitāya paṭipannādayo cattāro puggalā, tesu ubhayahitapaṭipanno ^b^aggapuggalo^eb^ ^a^V2.0187^ea^ ayaṃ, naresu ca usabhasadisattā ^b^narāsabho^eb^. tenassa thutiṃ bhaṇantā idampi padadvayamāhaṃsu.
[03] 691^b^.^eb^ pañcamagāthāya ^a^M2.0206^ea^ ^b^taṃ sadda^eb^nti taṃ devehi vuttavacanasaddaṃ. ^b^avasarī^eb^ti otari. ^b^tada bhavana^eb^nti tadā bhavanaṃ.

[03] 692^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhagāthāya ^b^tato^eb^ti asitassa vacanato anantaraṃ. ^b^ukkāmukhevā^eb^ti ukkāmukhe eva, mūsāmukheti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^sukusalasampahaṭṭha^eb^nti sukusalena suvaṇṇakārena ^a^P2.0487^ea^ saṅghaṭṭitaṃ, saṅghaṭṭentena tāpitanti adhippāyo. ^b^daddallamāna^eb^nti vijjotamānaṃ. ^b^asitavhayassā^eb^ti asitanāmassa dutiyena nāmena kaṇhadevilassa isino.

[03] 693^b^.^eb^ sattamagāthāya ^b^tārāsabhaṃ vā^eb^ti tārānaṃ usabhasadisaṃ, candanti adhippāyo. ^b^visuddha^eb^nti abbhādiupakkilesarahitaṃ. ^b^saradarivā^eb^ti sarade iva. ^b^ānandajāto^eb^ti savanamatteneva uppannāya pītiyā pītijāto. ^b^alattha pīti^eb^nti disvā punapi pītiṃ labhi.

[03] 694^b^.^eb^ tato paraṃ bodhisattassa devehi sadā payujjamānasakkāradīpanatthaṃ vuttāṭṭhamagāthāya ^b^anekasākha^eb^nti anekasalākaṃ. ^b^sahassamaṇḍala^eb^nti rattasuvaṇṇamayasahassamaṇḍalayuttaṃ. ^b^chatta^eb^nti dibbasetacchattaṃ. ^b^vītipatantī^eb^ti sarīraṃ bījamānā patanuppatanaṃ karonti.

[03] 695^b^.^eb^ navamagāthāya ^b^jaṭī^eb^ti jaṭilo. ^b^kaṇhasirivhayo^eb^ti kaṇhasaddena ca sirisaddena ca avhayamāno. taṃ kira ``sirikaṇho''tipi avhayanti āmantenti, ālapantīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^paṇḍukambale^eb^ti rattakambale. adhikārato cettha ``kumāra''nti vattabbaṃ, pāṭhaseso vā kātabbo. purimagāthāya ca ahatthapāsagataṃ sandhāya ``disvā''ti vuttaṃ. idha pana hatthapāsagataṃ paṭiggahaṇatthaṃ upanītaṃ, tasmā puna vacanaṃ ``disvā''ti. purimaṃ vā dassanapītilābhāpekkhaṃ gāthāvasāne ``vipulamalattha pīti''nti vacanato, idaṃ paṭiggahāpekkhaṃ avasāne ``sumano paṭiggahe''ti vacanato. purimañca kumārasambandhameva, idaṃ setacchattasambandhampi. ^b^disvā^eb^ti satasahassagghanake gandhārarattakambale suvaṇṇanikkhaṃ viya kumāraṃ ``chattaṃ marū''ti ettha vuttappakāraṃ setacchattaṃ dhāriyantaṃ muddhani disvā. keci pana ``idaṃ mānusakaṃ chattaṃ sandhāya vutta''nti bhaṇanti. yatheva hi devā, evaṃ manussāpi chattacāmaramorahatthatālavaṇṭavāḷabījanihatthā mahāpurisaṃ upagacchantīti. evaṃ santepi ^a^M2.0207^ea^ na tassa ^a^P2.0488^ea^ vacanena kocipi atisayo atthi, tasmā yathāvuttameva ^a^V2.0188^ea^ sundaraṃ. ^b^paṭiggahe^eb^ti ubhohi hatthehi paṭiggahesi. isiṃ kira vandāpetuṃ kumāraṃ upanesuṃ. athassa pādā parivattitvā isissa matthake patiṭṭhahiṃsu. so tampi acchariyaṃ disvā udaggacitto sumano paṭiggahesi.

[03] 696^b^.^eb^ dasamagāthāyaṃ ^b^jigīsako^eb^ti jigīsanto magganto pariyesanto, upaparikkhantoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^lakkhaṇamantapāragū^eb^ti lakkhaṇānaṃ vedānañca pāraṃ gato. ^b^anuttarāya^eb^nti anuttaro ayaṃ. so kira attano abhimukhāgatesu mahāsattassa pādatalesu cakkāni disvā tadanusārena sesalakkhaṇāni jigīsanto sabbaṃ lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā ``addhāyaṃ buddho bhavissatī''ti ñatvā evamāha.

[03] 697^b^.^eb^ ekādasāyaṃ ^b^athattano gamana^eb^nti paṭisandhivasena arūpagamanaṃ. ^b^akalyarūpo gaḷayati assukānī^eb^ti taṃ attano arūpūpapattiṃ anussaritvā ``na dānāhaṃ assa dhammadesanaṃ sotuṃ lacchāmī''ti atuṭṭharūpo balavasokābhibhavena domanassajāto hutvā assūni pāteti gaḷayati. ``garayatī''tipi pāṭho. yadi panesa rūpabhave cittaṃ nameyya, kiṃ tattha na uppajjeyya, yenevaṃ rodatīti? na na uppajjeyya, akusalatāya panetaṃ vidhiṃ na jānāti. evaṃ santepi domanassuppattiyevassa ayuttā samāpattilābhena vikkhambhitattāti ce? na, vikkhambhitattā eva. maggabhāvanāya samucchinnā hi kilesā na uppajjanti, samāpattilābhīnaṃ pana balavapaccayena uppajjanti. uppanne kilese parihīnajjhānattā kutassa arūpagamananti ce? appakasirena punādhigamato. samāpattilābhino hi uppanne kilese balavavītikkamaṃ anāpajjantā vūpasantamatteyeva kilesavege puna taṃ visesaṃ appakasirenevādhigacchanti, ``parihīnavisesā ime''tipi duviññeyyā honti, tādiso ca eso. ^b^no ce kumāre bhavissati antarāyo^eb^ti na bhavissati nu kho imasmiṃ kumāre ^a^P2.0489^ea^ antarāyo.
[03] 698^b^.^eb^ dvādasāyaṃ ^b^na orakāya^eb^nti ayaṃ orako paritto na hoti. uttaragāthāya vattabbaṃ buddhabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha.

[03] 699^b^.^eb^ terasāyaṃ ^a^M2.0208^ea^ ^b^sambodhiyagga^eb^nti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. tañhi aviparītabhāvena sammā bujjhanato sambodhi, katthaci āvaraṇābhāvena sabbañāṇuttamato ``agga''nti vuccati. ^b^phusissatī^eb^ti pāpuṇissati. ^b^paramavisuddhadassī^eb^ti nibbānadassī. tañhi ekantavisuddhattā paramavisuddhaṃ. ^b^vitthārikassā^eb^ti vitthārikaṃ assa. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti sāsanaṃ.

[03] 700^b^.^eb^ cuddasāyaṃ ^a^V2.0189^ea^ ^b^athantarā^eb^ti antarāyeva assa, sambodhippattito orato evāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^na sossa^eb^nti na suṇissaṃ. ^b^asamadhurassā^eb^ti asamavīriyassa. ^b^aṭṭo^eb^ti āturo. ^b^byasanaṃ gato^eb^ti sukhavināsaṃ patto. ^b^aghāvī^eb^ti dukkhito, sabbaṃ domanassuppādameva sandhāyāha. domanassena hi so āturo. tañcassa sukhabyasanato byasanaṃ, sukhavināsanatoti vuttaṃ hoti. tena ca so cetasikāghabhūtena aghāvī.

[03] 701^b^.^eb^ pannarasāyaṃ ^b^vipulaṃ janetvānā^eb^ti vipulaṃ janetvā. ayameva vā pāṭho. ^b^niggamā^eb^ti niggato. evaṃ niggato ca ^b^so bhāgineyyaṃ saya^eb^nti sakaṃ bhāgineyyaṃ, attano bhaginiyā puttanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^samādapesī^eb^ti attano appāyukabhāvaṃ ñatvā kaniṭṭhabhaginiyā ca puttassa nālakassa māṇavakassa upacitapuññataṃ attano balena ñatvā ``vuḍḍhippatto pamādampi āpajjeyyā''ti naṃ anukampamāno bhaginiyā gharaṃ gantvā ``kahaṃ nālako''ti. ``bahi, bhante, kīḷatī''ti. ``ānetha na''nti āṇāpetvā taṅkhaṇaṃyeva tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbājetvā samādapesi ovadi anusāsi. kathaṃ? ^b^``buddhoti ghosaṃ...pe0... brahmacariya''^eb^nti soḷasamagāthamāha.

[03] 702^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^yada parato^eb^ti yadā parato. ^b^dhammamagga^eb^nti paramadhammassa nibbānassa maggaṃ, dhammaṃ vā aggaṃ saha paṭipadāya nibbānaṃ. ^b^tasmi^eb^nti tassa santike. ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti samaṇadhammaṃ.

[03] 703^b^.^eb^ sattarasāyaṃ ^b^tādinā^eb^ti tassaṇṭhitena, tasmiṃ samaye kilesavikkhambhane ^a^P2.0490^ea^ samādhilābhe ca sati vikkhambhitakilesena samāhitacittena cāti adhippāyo. ^b^anāgate paramavisuddhadassinā^eb^ti ``ayaṃ nālako anāgate kāle bhagavato santike paramavisuddhaṃ nibbānaṃ passissatī''ti ^a^M2.0209^ea^ evaṃ diṭṭhattā so isi iminā pariyāyena ``anāgate paramavisuddhadassī''ti vutto. tena anāgate paramavisuddhadassinā. ^b^upacitapuññasañcayo^eb^ti padumuttarato pabhuti katapuññasañcayo. ^b^patikkha^eb^nti āgamayamāno. ^b^parivasī^eb^ti pabbajitvā tāpasavesena vasi. ^b^rakkhitindriyo^eb^ti rakkhitasotindriyo hutvā. so kira tato pabhuti udake na nimujji ``udakaṃ pavisitvā sotindriyaṃ vināseyya, tato dhammassavanabāhiro bhaveyya''nti cintetvā.

[03] 704^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhārasāyaṃ ^b^sutvāna ghosa^eb^nti so nālako evaṃ parivasanto anupubbena bhagavatā sambodhiṃ patvā bārāṇasiyaṃ dhammacakke pavattite taṃ ``bhagavatā dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ, sammāsambuddho ^a^V2.0190^ea^ vata so bhagavā uppanno''tiādinā nayena ^b^jinavaracakkavattane^eb^ pavattaghosaṃ attano atthakāmāhi devatāhi āgantvā ārocitaṃ sutvā. ^b^gantvāna disvā isinisabha^eb^nti sattāhaṃ devatāhi moneyyakolāhale kayiramāne sattame divase isipatanaṃ gantvā ``nālako āgamissati, tassa dhammaṃ desessāmī''ti iminā ca abhisandhinā varabuddhāsane nisinnaṃ disvā nisabhasadisaṃ isinisabhaṃ bhagavantaṃ. ^b^pasanno^eb^ti saha dassaneneva pasannacitto hutvā. ^b^moneyyaseṭṭha^eb^nti ñāṇuttamaṃ, maggañāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^samāgate asitāvhayassa sāsane^eb^ti asitassa isino ovādakāle anuppatte. tena hi -- ``yadā vivarati dhammamaggaṃ, tadā gantvā samayaṃ paripucchamāno carassu tasmiṃ bhagavati brahmacariya''nti anusiṭṭho, ayañca so kālo. tena vuttaṃ -- ``samāgate asitāvhayassa sāsane''ti. sesamettha pākaṭameva.
[03] ayaṃ tāva vatthugāthāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 705^b^.^eb^ pucchāgāthādvaye ^b^aññātameta^eb^nti viditaṃ mayā etaṃ. ^b^yathātatha^eb^nti aviparītaṃ. ko adhippāyo? yaṃ asito ``sambodhiyaggaṃ phusissatāyaṃ kumāro''ti ñatvā ``buddhoti ^a^P2.0491^ea^ ghosaṃ yada parato suṇosi, sambodhippatto vivarati dhammamagga''nti maṃ avaca, tadetaṃ mayā asitassa vacanaṃ ajja bhagavantaṃ sakkhiṃ disvā ``yathātathamevā''ti aññātanti. ^b^taṃ ta^eb^nti tasmā taṃ. ^b^sabbadhammāna pāragu^eb^nti hemavatasutte vuttanayena chahi ākārehi. sabbadhammānaṃ pāragataṃ.

[03] 706^b^.^eb^ ^b^anagāriyupetassā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0210^ea^ anagāriyaṃ upetassa, pabbajitassāti attho. ^b^bhikkhācariyaṃ jigīsato^eb^ti ariyehi āciṇṇaṃ anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ bhikkhācariyaṃ pariyesamānassa. ^b^moneyya^eb^nti munīnaṃ santakaṃ. ^b^uttamaṃ pada^eb^nti uttamapaṭipadaṃ. sesamettha pākaṭameva.

[03] 707^b^.^eb^ athassa evaṃ puṭṭho bhagavā ^b^``moneyyaṃ te upaññissa''^eb^ntiādinā nayena moneyyapaṭipadaṃ byākāsi. tattha ^b^upaññissa^eb^nti upaññāpeyyaṃ, vivareyyaṃ paññāpeyyanti attho. ^b^dukkaraṃ durabhisambhava^eb^nti kātuñca dukkhaṃ kayiramānañca sambhavituṃ sahituṃ dukkhanti vuttaṃ hoti. ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo -- ahaṃ te moneyyaṃ paññāpeyyaṃ, yadi naṃ kātuṃ vā abhisambhotuṃ vā sukhaṃ bhaveyya, evaṃ pana dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavaṃ puthujjanakālato pabhuti kiliṭṭhacittaṃ anuppādetvā paṭipajjitabbato. tathā hi naṃ ekassa buddhassa ekova sāvako karoti ca sambhoti cāti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V2.0191^ea^ bhagavā moneyyassa dukkarabhāvaṃ durabhisambhavatañca dassento nālakassa ussāhaṃ janetvā tamassa vattukāmo āha ^b^``handa te naṃ pavakkhāmi, santhambhassu daḷho bhavā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^handā^eb^ti byavasāyatthe nipāto. ^b^te naṃ pavakkhāmī^eb^ti tuyhaṃ taṃ moneyyaṃ pavakkhāmi. ^b^santhambhassū^eb^ti dukkarakaraṇasamatthena vīriyūpatthambhena attānaṃ upatthambhaya. ^b^daḷho bhavā^eb^ti durabhisambhavasahanasamatthāya asithilaparakkamatāya thiro hoti. kiṃ vuttaṃ ^a^P2.0492^ea^ hoti? yasmā tvaṃ upacitapuññasambhāro, tasmāhaṃ ekantabyavasitova hutvā evaṃ dukkaraṃ durabhisambhavampi samānaṃ tuyhaṃ taṃ moneyyaṃ pavakkhāmi, santhambhassu daḷho bhavāti.

[03] 708^b^.^eb^ evaṃ paramasallekhaṃ moneyyavattaṃ vattukāmo nālakaṃ santhambhane daḷhībhāve ca niyojetvā paṭhamaṃ tāva gāmūpanibaddhakilesappahānaṃ dassento ^b^``samānabhāga''^eb^nti upaḍḍhagāthamāha. tattha ^b^samānabhāga^eb^nti samabhāgaṃ ekasadisaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ. ^b^akkuṭṭhavandita^eb^nti akkosañca vandanañca.

[03] idāni yathā taṃ samānabhāgaṃ kayirati, taṃ upāyaṃ dassento ^b^``manopadosa''^eb^nti upaḍḍhagāthamāha. tassattho -- akkuṭṭho ^b^manopadosaṃ rakkheyya,^eb^ vandito ^b^santo anuṇṇato care,^eb^ raññāpi vandito samāno ``maṃ vandatī''ti uddhaccaṃ nāpajjeyya.

[03] 709^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^M2.0211^ea^ araññūpanibaddhakilesappahānaṃ dassento ^b^``uccāvacā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- araññasaññite ^b^dāyepi^eb^ iṭṭhāniṭṭhavasena ^b^uccāvacā^eb^ nānappakārā ārammaṇā ^b^niccharanti,^eb^ cakkhādīnaṃ āpāthamāgacchanti, te ca kho ^b^aggisikhūpamā^eb^ pariḷāhajanakaṭṭhena. yathā vā ḍayhamāne vane aggisikhā nānappakāratāya uccāvacā niccharanti, sadhūmāpi, vidhūmāpi, nīlāpi, pītāpi, rattāpi, khuddakāpi, mahantāpi, evaṃ sīhabyagghamanussāmanussavividhavihaṅgavirutapupphaphalapallavādibhedavasena nānappakāratāya dāye uccāvacā ārammaṇā niccharanti bhiṃsanakāpi, rajanīyāpi, dosanīyāpi, mohanīyāpi. tenāha -- ``uccāvacā niccharanti, dāye aggisikhūpamā''ti. evaṃ niccharantesu ca uccāvacesu ārammaṇesu yā kāci uyyānavanacārikaṃ gatā samānā pakatiyā vā vanacāriniyo kaṭṭhahārikādayo rahogataṃ disvā hasitalapitaruditadunnivatthādīhi ^b^nāriyo muniṃ palobhenti, tā su taṃ mā palobhayuṃ,^eb^ tā nāriyo taṃ mā palobhayuṃ. yathā na palobhenti, tathā karohīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 710-11^b^.^eb^ evamassa ^a^P2.0493^ea^ bhagavā gāme ca araññe ca paṭipattividhiṃ dassetvā idāni sīlasaṃvaraṃ ^a^V2.0192^ea^ dassento ^b^``virato methunā dhammā''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^hitvā kāme paropare^eb^ti methunadhammato avasesepi sundare ca asundare ca pañca kāmaguṇe hitvā. tappahānena hi methunavirati susampannā hoti. tenāha -- ``hitvā kāme paropare''ti. ayamettha adhippāyo. ^b^``aviruddho''^eb^tiādīni pana padāni ``na haneyya, na ghātaye''ti ettha vuttāya pāṇātipātāveramaṇiyā sampattidassanatthaṃ vuttāni. tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā -- parapakkhiyesu ^b^pāṇesu aviruddho,^eb^ attapakkhiyesu ^b^asāratto,^eb^ sabbepi sataṇhanittaṇhatāya ^b^tasathāvare^eb^ pāṇe jīvitukāmatāya amaritukāmatāya sukhakāmatāya dukkhapaṭikūlatāya ca ^b^``yathā ahaṃ tathā ete''^eb^ti attasamānatāya tesu virodhaṃ vinento teneva pakārena ^b^``yathā ete tathā aha''^eb^nti paresaṃ samānatāya ca attani anurodhaṃ vinento evaṃ ubhayathāpi anurodhavirodhavippahīno hutvā maraṇapaṭikūlatāya ^b^attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā^eb^ pāṇesu ye keci tase vā thāvare vā pāṇe ^b^na haneyya^eb^ sāhatthikādīhi payogehi, ^b^na ghātaye^eb^ āṇattikādīhīti.

[03] 712^b^.^eb^ evamassa ^a^M2.0212^ea^ methunaviratipāṇātipātaviratimukhena saṅkhepato pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ vatvā ``hitvā kāme''tiādīhi indriyasaṃvarañca dassetvā idāni ājīvapārisuddhiṃ dassento ^b^``hitvā icchañcā''^eb^tiādimāha. tassattho -- yāyaṃ taṇhā ekaṃ laddhā dutiyaṃ icchati, dve laddhā tatiyaṃ, satasahassaṃ laddhā taduttarimpi icchatīti evaṃ appaṭiladdhavisayaṃ icchanato ^b^``icchā''^eb^ti vuccati, yo cāyaṃ paṭiladdhavisayalubbhano lobho. taṃ ^b^hitvā icchañca lobhañca yattha satto puthujjano,^eb^ yasmiṃ cīvarādipaccaye tehi icchālobhehi puthujjano satto laggo paṭibaddho tiṭṭhati, tattha taṃ ubhayampi hitvā paccayatthaṃ ^a^P2.0494^ea^ ājīvapārisuddhiṃ avirodhento ñāṇacakkhunā ^b^cakkhumā^eb^ hutvā imaṃ moneyyapaṭipadaṃ ^b^paṭipajjeyya^eb^. evañhi paṭipanno ^b^tareyya narakaṃ imaṃ,^eb^ duppūraṇaṭṭhena narakasaññitaṃ micchājīvahetubhūtaṃ imaṃ paccayataṇhaṃ tareyya, imāya vā paṭipadāya tareyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 713^b^.^eb^ evaṃ paccayataṇhāpahānamukhena ājīvapārisuddhiṃ dassetvā idāni bhojane mattaññutāmukhena paccayaparibhogasīlaṃ tadanusārena ca yāva arahattappatti, tāva paṭipadaṃ dassento ^b^``ūnūdaro''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- dhammena samena laddhesu itarītaracīvarādīsu paccayesu āhāraṃ tāva āhārento --
[21] ``cattāro pañca ālope, abhutvā udakaṃ pive.
[22] alaṃ phāsuvihārāya, pahitattassa bhikkhuno''ti.. (theragā0 983) --

[25] vuttanayena ^a^V2.0193^ea^ ^b^ūnaudaro^eb^ assa, na vātabharitabhastā viya uddhumātudaro, bhattasammadapaccayā thinamiddhaṃ parihareyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ūnūdaro hontopi ca ^b^mitāhāro^eb^ assa bhojane mattaññū, ``neva davāyā''tiādinā paccavekkhaṇena guṇato dosato ca paricchinnāhāro. evaṃ mitāhāro samānopi paccayadhutaṅgapariyattiadhigamavasena catubbidhāya appicchatāya ^b^appiccho assa^eb^. ekaṃsena hi moneyyapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannena bhikkhunā evaṃ appicchena bhavitabbaṃ. tattha ekekasmiṃ paccaye tīhi santosehi santussanā ^b^paccayappicchatā^eb^. dhutaṅgadharasseva sato ``dhutavāti maṃ pare jānantū''ti anicchanatā ^b^dhutaṅgappicchatā^eb^. bahussutasseva sato ``bahussutoti ^a^M2.0213^ea^ maṃ pare jānantū''ti anicchanatā ^b^pariyattiappicchatā^eb^ majjhantikattherassa viya. adhigamasampannasseva sato ``adhigato ayaṃ kusalaṃ dhammanti maṃ pare jānantū''ti anicchanatā ^b^adhigamappicchatā^eb^. sā ca arahattādhigamato oraṃ veditabbā. arahattādhigamatthañhi ayaṃ paṭipadāti. evaṃ appicchopi ca arahattamaggena ^a^P2.0495^ea^ taṇhāloluppaṃ hitvā ^b^alolupo^eb^ assa. evaṃ alolupo hi ^b^sadā icchāya nicchāto aniccho hoti nibbuto,^eb^ yāya icchāya chātā honti sattā khuppipāsāturā viya atittā, tāya icchāya aniccho hoti anicchattā ca nicchāto hoti anāturo paramatittippatto. evaṃ nicchātattā nibbuto hoti vūpasantasabbakilesapariḷāhoti evamettha uppaṭipāṭiyā yojanā veditabbā.

[03] 714^b^.^eb^ evaṃ yāva arahattappatti, tāvapaṭipadaṃ kathetvā idāni taṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipannassa bhikkhuno arahattappattiniṭṭhaṃ dhutaṅgasamādānaṃ senāsanavattañca kathento ^b^``sa piṇḍacāra''^eb^nti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^sa piṇḍacāraṃ caritvā^eb^ti so bhikkhu bhikkhaṃ caritvā bhattakiccaṃ vā katvā. ^b^vanantamabhihāraye^eb^ti apapañcito gihipapañcena vanaṃ eva gaccheyya. ^b^upaṭṭhito rukkhamūlasmi^eb^nti rukkhamūle ṭhito vā hutvā. ^b^āsanūpagato^eb^ti āsanaṃ upagato vā hutvā, nisinnoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^munī^eb^ti moneyyapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno. ettha ca ``piṇḍacāraṃ caritvā''ti iminā piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ vuttaṃ. yasmā pana ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātiko sapadānacārī ekāsaniko pattapiṇḍiko khalupacchābhattiko ca hotiyeva, tecīvarikapaṃsukūlampi ca samādiyateva, tasmā imānipi cha vuttāneva honti. ``vanantamabhihāraye''ti iminā pana āraññikaṅgaṃ vuttaṃ, ``upaṭṭhito rukkhamūlasmi''nti iminā rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ, ``āsanūpagato''ti iminā nesajjikaṅgaṃ. yathākkamaṃ pana etesaṃ anulomattā abbhokāsikayathāsanthatikasosānikaṅgāni vuttāniyeva hontīti evametāya gāthāya terasa dhutaṅgāni nālakattherassa kathesi.

[03] 715^b^.^eb^ ^b^sa jhānapasuto dhīro^eb^ti so anuppannassa jhānassa uppādanena uppannassa āvajjanasamāpajjanādhiṭṭhānavuṭṭhānapaccavekkhaṇehi ^a^V2.0194^ea^ ca jhānesu pasuto anuyutto. ^b^dhīro^eb^ti dhitisampanno. ^b^vanante ramito siyā^eb^ti vane ^a^M2.0214^ea^ abhirato siyā, gāmantasenāsane nābhirameyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^jhāyetha^eb^ ^a^P2.0496^ea^ ^b^rukkhamūlasmiṃ, attānamabhitosaya^eb^nti na kevalaṃ lokiyajjhānapasutoyeva siyā, apica kho tasmiṃyeva rukkhamūle sotāpattimaggādisampayuttena lokuttarajjhānenāpi attānaṃ atīva tosento jhāyetha. paramassāsappattiyā hi lokuttarajjhāneneva cittaṃ atīva tussati, na aññena. tenāha -- ``attānamabhitosaya''nti. evamimāya gāthāya jhānapasutatāya vanantasenāsanābhiratiṃ arahattañca kathesi.

[03] 716^b^.^eb^ idāni yasmā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā nālakatthero vanantamabhihāretvā nirāhāropi paṭipadāpūraṇe atīva ussukko ahosi, nirāhārena ca samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā. tathā karontassa hi jīvitaṃ nappavattati, kilese pana anuppādentena āhāro pariyesitabbo, ayamettha ñāyo. tasmā tassa bhagavā aparāparesupi divasesu piṇḍāya caritabbaṃ, kilesā pana na uppādetabbāti dassanatthaṃ arahattappattiniṭṭhaṃyeva bhikkhācāravattaṃ kathento ^b^``tato ratyā vivasāne''^eb^tiādikā cha gāthāyo abhāsi. tattha ^b^tato^eb^ti ``sa piṇḍacāraṃ caritvā, vanantamabhihāraye''ti ettha vuttapiṇḍacāravanantābhihārato uttaripi. ^b^ratyā vivasāne^eb^ti rattisamatikkame, dutiyadivaseti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^gāmantamabhihāraye^eb^ti ābhisamācārikavattaṃ katvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā, tāva vivekamanubrūhetvā gatapaccāgatavatte vuttanayena kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karonto gāmaṃ gaccheyya. ^b^avhānaṃ nābhinandeyyā^eb^ti ``bhante, amhākaṃ ghare bhuñjitabba''nti nimantanaṃ, ``deti nu kho na deti nu kho sundaraṃ nu kho deti asundaraṃ nu kho detī''ti evarūpaṃ vitakkaṃ bhojanañca paṭipadāpūrako bhikkhu nābhinandeyya, nappaṭiggaṇheyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. yadi pana balakkārena pattaṃ gahetvā pūretvā denti, paribhuñjitvā samaṇadhammo kātabbo, dhutaṅgaṃ na kuppati, tadupādāya pana taṃ gāmaṃ na pavisitabbaṃ. ^b^abhihārañca gāmato^eb^ti sace gāmaṃ paviṭṭhassa pātisatehipi bhattaṃ abhiharanti ^a^P2.0497^ea^, tampi nābhinandeyya, tato ekasitthampi nappaṭiggaṇheyya, aññadatthu gharapaṭipāṭiyā piṇḍapātameva careyyāti.

[03] 717^b^.^eb^ ^b^na^eb^ ^a^M2.0215^ea^ ^b^munī gāmamāgamma, kulesu sahasā care^eb^ti so ca monatthāya paṭipannako muni gāmaṃ gato samāno kulesu sahasā na care, sahasokitādiananulomikaṃ gihisaṃsaggaṃ na āpajjeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^ghāsesanaṃ chinnakatho, na vācaṃ payutaṃ bhaṇe^eb^ti chinnakatho viya hutvā obhāsaparikathānimittaviññattipayuttaṃ ghāsesanavācaṃ na bhaṇeyya. sace ākaṅkheyya, gilāno samāno ^a^V2.0195^ea^ gelaññapaṭibāhanatthāya bhaṇeyya. senāsanatthāya vā viññattiṃ ṭhapetvā obhāsaparikathānimittapayuttaṃ, avasesapaccayatthāya pana agilāno neva kiñci bhaṇeyyāti.

[03] 718-9^b^.^eb^ ^b^alatthaṃ yadida^eb^nti imissā pana gāthāya ayamattho -- gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭho appamattakepi kismiñci laddhe ^b^``alatthaṃ yaṃ idaṃ sādhū''^eb^ti cintetvā aladdhe ^b^``nālatthaṃ kusala''^eb^nti tampi ``sundara''nti cintetvā ^b^ubhayeneva^eb^ lābhālābhena ^b^so tādī^eb^ nibbikāro hutvā ^b^rukkhaṃvupanivattati,^eb^ yathāpi puriso phalagavesī rukkhaṃ upagamma phalaṃ laddhāpi aladdhāpi ananunīto appaṭihato majjhattoyeva hutvā gacchati, evaṃ kulaṃ upagamma lābhaṃ laddhāpi aladdhāpi majjhattova hutvā gacchatīti. ^b^sa pattapāṇī^eb^ ti gāthā uttānatthāva.

[03] 720^b^.^eb^ ^b^uccāvacā^eb^ti imissā gāthāya sambandho -- evaṃ bhikkhācāravattasampanno hutvāpi tāvatakeneva tuṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvā paṭipadaṃ ārodheyya. paṭipattisārañhi sāsanaṃ. sā cāyaṃ ^b^uccāvacā...pe0... muta^eb^nti. tassattho -- sā cāyaṃ maggapaṭipadā uttamanihīnabhedato ^b^uccāvacā buddhasamaṇena pakāsitā^eb^. sukhāpaṭipadā hi khippābhiññā uccā, dukkhāpaṭipadā dandhābhiññā avacā. itarā dve ekenaṅgena uccā, ekena avacā. paṭhamā eva vā uccā, itarā tissopi avacā. tāya cetāya uccāya avacāya vā paṭipadāya ^b^na pāraṃ diguṇaṃ yanti^eb^. ``duguṇa''nti vā pāṭho, ekamaggena ^a^P2.0498^ea^ dvikkhattuṃ nibbānaṃ na yantīti attho. kasmā? yena maggena ye kilesā pahīnā, tesaṃ puna appahātabbato. etena parihānadhammābhāvaṃ dīpeti. ^b^nayidaṃ ekaguṇaṃ muta^eb^nti tañca idaṃ pāraṃ ekakkhattuṃyeva phusanārahampi na hoti. kasmā? ekena maggena sabbakilesappahānābhāvato. etena ekamaggeneva arahattābhāvaṃ dīpeti.

[03] 721^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^M2.0216^ea^ paṭipadānisaṃsaṃ dassento ^b^``yassa ca visatā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- ^b^yassa ca^eb^ evaṃ paṭipannassa bhikkhuno tāya paṭipadāya pahīnattā aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritabhāvena visatattā ^b^visatā^eb^ taṇhā ^b^natthi,^eb^ tassa kilesasotacchedena ^b^chinnasotassa^eb^ kusalākusalappahānena ^b^kiccākiccappahīnassa^eb^ rāgajo vā dosajo vā appamattakopi ^b^pariḷāho na vijjatī^eb^ti.

[03] 722^b^.^eb^ idāni yasmā imā gāthāyo sutvā nālakattherassa cittaṃ udapādi -- ``yadi ettakaṃ moneyyaṃ sukaraṃ na dukkaraṃ, sakkā appakasirena pūretu''nti, tasmāssa bhagavā ``dukkarameva moneyya''nti dassento puna ^b^``moneyyaṃ te upaññissa''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^upaññissa^eb^nti upaññāpeyyaṃ, kathayissanti vuttaṃ hoti. khuradhārā upamā assāti ^b^khuradhārūpamo^eb^ ^a^V2.0196^ea^. ^b^bhave^eb^ti bhaveyya. ko adhippāyo? moneyyaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhu khuradhāraṃ upamaṃ katvā paccayesu vatteyya. yathā madhudiddhaṃ khuradhāraṃ lihanto, chedato, jivhaṃ rakkhati, evaṃ dhammena laddhe paccaye paribhuñjanto cittaṃ kilesuppattito rakkheyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. paccayā hi parisuddhena ñāyena laddhuñca anavajjaparibhogena paribhuñjituñca na sukhena sakkāti bhagavā paccayanissitameva bahuso bhaṇati. ^b^jivhāya tālumāhacca, udare saññato siyā^eb^ti jivhāya tāluṃ uppīḷetvāpi rasataṇhaṃ vinodento kiliṭṭhena maggena uppannapaccaye asevanto udare saṃyato siyā.

[03] 723^b^.^eb^ ^b^alīnacitto ca siyā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0499^ea^ niccaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya aṭṭhitakāritāya akusītacitto ca bhaveyya. ^b^na cāpi bahu cintaye^eb^ti ñātijanapadāmaravitakkavasena ca bahuṃ na cinteyya. ^b^nirāmagandho asito, brahmacariyaparāyaṇo^eb^ti nikkileso ca hutvā taṇhādiṭṭhīhi kismiñci bhave anissito sikkhāttayasakalasāsanabrahmacariyaparāyaṇo eva bhaveyya.

[03] 724-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekāsanassā^eb^ti vivittāsanassa. āsanamukhena cettha sabbairiyāpathā vuttā. yato sabbairiyāpathesu ekībhāvassa sikkheyyāti vuttaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. ekāsanassāti ca sampadānavacanametaṃ. ^b^samaṇūpāsanassa^eb^ ^a^M2.0217^ea^ ^b^cā^eb^ti samaṇehi upāsitabbassa aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇabhāvanānuyogassa, samaṇānaṃ vā upāsanabhūtassa aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇabhedasseva. idampi sampadānavacanameva, upāsanatthanti vuttaṃ hoti. ettha ca ekāsanena kāyaviveko, samaṇūpāsanena cittaviveko vutto hotīti veditabbo. ^b^ekattaṃ monamakkhāta^eb^nti evamidaṃ kāyacittavivekavasena ``ekattaṃ mona''nti akkhātaṃ. ^b^eko ce abhiramissasī^eb^ti idaṃ pana uttaragāthāpekkhaṃ padaṃ, ``atha bhāhisi dasadisā''ti iminā assa sambandho.

[03] ^b^bhāhisī^eb^ti bhāsissasi pakāsessasi. imaṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāvento sabbadisāsu kittiyā pākaṭo bhavissasīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^sutvā dhīrāna^eb^ntiādīnaṃ pana catunnaṃ padānaṃ ayamattho -- yena ca kittighosena bhāhisi dasadisā taṃ ^b^dhīrānaṃ jhāyīnaṃ kāmacāginaṃ nighosaṃ sutvā^eb^ atha tvaṃ tena uddhaccaṃ anāpajjitvā ^b^bhiyyo hiriñca saddhañca^eb^ kareyyāsi, tena ghosena harāyamāno ``niyyānikapaṭipadā aya''nti saddhaṃ uppādetvā uttari paṭipattimeva brūheyyāsi. ^b^māmako^eb^ti evañhi sante mama sāvako hotīti.

[03] 726^b^.^eb^ ^b^taṃ nadīhī^eb^ti yaṃ taṃ mayā ``hiriñca saddhañca bhiyyo kubbethā''ti vadatā ``uddhaccaṃ ^a^V2.0197^ea^ na kātabba''nti vuttaṃ, taṃ iminā nadīnidassanenāpi jānātha, tabbipariyāyañca ^b^sobbhesu^eb^ ca ^b^padaresu^eb^ca jānātha. ^b^sobbhesū^eb^ti mātikāsu ^a^P2.0500^ea^. ^b^padaresū^eb^ti darīsu. kathaṃ? ^b^saṇantā yanti kusobbhā, tuṇhī yanti mahodadhī^eb^ti. kusobbhā hi sobbhapadarādibhedā sabbāpi kunnadiyo saṇantā saddaṃ karontā uddhatā hutvā yanti, gaṅgādibhedā pana mahānadiyo tuṇhī yanti, evaṃ ``moneyyaṃ pūremī''ti uddhato hoti amāmako, māmako pana hiriñca saddhañca uppādetvā nīcacittova hoti.

[03] 727-9^b^.^eb^ kiñca bhiyyo -- ^b^yadūnakaṃ...pe0... paṇḍito^eb^ti. tattha siyā -- sace aḍḍhakumbhūpamo bālo saṇantatāya, rahado pūrova paṇḍito santatāya, atha kasmā buddhasamaṇo evaṃ dhammadesanābyāvaṭo hutvā bahuṃ bhāsatīti iminā sambandhena ^b^``yaṃ samaṇo''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- ^b^yaṃ buddhasamaṇo bahuṃ bhāsati upetaṃ atthasañhitaṃ,^eb^ atthupetaṃ ^a^M2.0218^ea^ dhammupetañca hitena ca saṃhitaṃ, taṃ na uddhaccena, apica kho ^b^jānaṃ so dhammaṃ deseti^eb^ divasampi desento nippapañcova hutvā. tassa hi sabbaṃ vacīkammaṃ ñāṇānuparivatti. evaṃ desento ca ``idamassa hitaṃ idamassa hita''nti nānappakārato ^b^jānaṃ so bahu bhāsati,^eb^ na kevalaṃ bahubhāṇitāya. avasānagāthāya sambandho -- evaṃ tāva sabbaññutaññāṇena samannāgato buddhasamaṇo jānaṃ so dhammaṃ deseti, jānaṃ so bahu bhāsati. tena desitaṃ pana dhammaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyeneva ñāṇena yo ca jānaṃ saṃyatatto, jānaṃ na bahu bhāsati, sa muni monamarahati, sa muni monamajjhagāti. tassattho -- taṃ dhammaṃ jānanto ^b^saṃyatatto^eb^ guttacitto hutvā yaṃ bhāsitaṃ sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ na hoti, taṃ ^b^jānaṃ na bahu bhāsati^eb^. so evaṃvidho monatthaṃ paṭipannako muni moneyyapaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṃ ^b^monaṃ arahati^eb^. na kevalañca arahatiyeva, apica kho pana ^b^sa muni^eb^ arahattamaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^monaṃ ajjhagā^eb^ icceva veditabboti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.

[03] taṃ sutvā nālakatthero tīsu ṭhānesu appiccho ahosi dassane savane pucchāyāti. so hi desanāpariyosāne pasannacitto ^a^P2.0501^ea^ bhagavantaṃ vanditvā vanaṃ paviṭṭho, puna ``aho vatāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ passeyya''nti lolabhāvaṃ na janesi. ayamassa dassane appicchatā. tathā ``aho vatāhaṃ puna dhammadesanaṃ suṇeyya''nti lolabhāvaṃ na janesi. ayamassa savane appicchatā. tathā ``aho vatāhaṃ puna moneyyapaṭipadaṃ puccheyya''nti lolabhāvaṃ na janesi. ayamassa pucchāya appicchatā.

[03] so evaṃ appiccho samāno pabbatapādaṃ pavisitvā ekavanasaṇḍe dve divasāni na vasi ^a^V2.0198^ea^, ekarukkhamūle dve divasāni na nisīdi, ekagāme dve divasāni piṇḍāya na pāvisi. iti vanato vanaṃ, rukkhato rukkhaṃ, gāmato gāmaṃ āhiṇḍanto anurūpapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjitvā aggaphale patiṭṭhāsi. atha yasmā moneyyapaṭipadaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ katvā pūrento bhikkhu satteva māsāni jīvati, majjhimaṃ katvā pūrento satta vassāni, mandaṃ katvā pūrento soḷasa vassāni. ayañca ukkaṭṭhaṃ katvā pūresi, tasmā satta māse ṭhatvā attano āyusaṅkhāraparikkhayaṃ ñatvā nhāyitvā nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā dasabalābhimukho pañcapatiṭṭhitaṃ vanditvā añjaliṃ ^a^M2.0219^ea^ paggahetvā hiṅgulakapabbataṃ nissāya ṭhitakova anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. tassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ tattha gantvā sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo gāhāpetvā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā agamāsīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya nālakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0199^ea^ ^b^me suta^eb^nti dvayatānupassanāsuttaṃ. kā uppatti? imassa suttassa attajjhāsayato uppatti. attajjhāsayena hi bhagavā imaṃ suttaṃ desesi. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro panassa atthavaṇṇanāyameva āvi bhavissati. tattha ^a^P2.0502^ea^ ^b^evaṃ me suta^eb^ntiādīni vuttanayāneva. ^b^pubbārāme^eb^ti sāvatthinagarassa puratthimadisāyaṃ ārāme. ^b^migāramātu pāsāde^eb^ti ettha visākhā upāsikā attano sasurena migārena seṭṭhinā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhapitattā ``migāramātā''ti vuccati. tāya migāramātuyā navakoṭiagghanakaṃ mahālatāpiḷandhanaṃ vissajjetvā kārāpito pāsādo heṭṭhā ca upari ca pañca pañca gabbhasatāni katvā sahassakūṭāgāragabbho, so ``migāramātupāsādo''ti vuccati. tasmiṃ migāramātu pāsāde.

[03] ^b^tena kho pana samayena bhagavā^eb^ti yaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiṃ nissāya pubbārāme migāramātu pāsāde viharati, tena samayena. ^b^tadahuposathe^eb^ti tasmiṃ ahu uposathe, uposathadivaseti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^pannarase^eb^ti idaṃ uposathaggahaṇena sampattāvasesuposathapaṭikkhepavacanaṃ. ^b^puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā^eb^ti pannarasadivasattā divasagaṇanāya abbhādiupakkilesavirahattā rattiguṇasampattiyā ca puṇṇattā puṇṇāya, paripuṇṇacandattā puṇṇamāya ca rattiyā. ^b^bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto^eb^ti bhikkhusaṅghena parivuto. ^b^abbhokāse nisinno hotī^eb^ti migāramātu ratanapāsādapariveṇe abbhokāse upari appaṭicchanne okāse paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno hoti. ^b^tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūta^eb^nti atīva tuṇhībhūtaṃ, yato yato vā anuviloketi ^a^M2.0220^ea^, tato tato tuṇhībhūtaṃ, tuṇhībhūtaṃ vācāya, puna tuṇhībhūtaṃ kāyena. ^b^bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anuviloketvā^eb^ti taṃ parivāretvā nisinnaṃ anekasahassabhikkhuparimāṇaṃ tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ``ettakā ettha sotāpannā, ettakā sakadāgāmino, ettakā anāgāmino ettakā āraddhavipassakā kalyāṇaputhujjanā, imassa bhikkhusaṅghassa kīdisī dhammadesanā sappāyā''ti sappāyadhammadesanāparicchedanatthaṃ ito cito ca viloketvā.

[03] ^b^ye^eb^ ^a^P2.0503^ea^ ^b^te, bhikkhave, kusalā dhammā^eb^ti ye te ārogyaṭṭhena anavajjaṭṭhena iṭṭhaphalaṭṭhena kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena ca kusalā sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammā, tajjotakā vā pariyattidhammā. ^b^ariyā^eb^ ^a^V2.0200^ea^ ^b^niyyānikā sambodhagāmino^eb^ti upagantabbaṭṭhena ariyā, lokato niyyānaṭṭhena niyyānikā, sambodhasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ gamanaṭṭhena sambodhagāmino. ^b^tesaṃ vo bhikkhave...pe0... savanāya,^eb^ tesaṃ bhikkhave kusalānaṃ...pe0... sambodhagāmīnaṃ kā upanisā, kiṃ kāraṇaṃ, kiṃ payojanaṃ tumhākaṃ savanāya, kimatthaṃ tumhe te dhamme suṇāthāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^yāvadeva dvayatānaṃ dhammānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇāyā^eb^ti ettha ^b^yāvadevā^eb^ti paricchedāvadhāraṇavacanaṃ. dve avayavā etesanti dvayā, dvayā eva dvayatā, tesaṃ dvayatānaṃ. ``dvayāna''ntipi pāṭho. ^b^yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇāyā^eb^ti aviparītañāṇāya. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? yadetaṃ lokiyalokuttarādibhedena dvidhā vavatthitānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipassanāsaṅkhātaṃ yathābhūtañāṇaṃ, etadatthāya na ito bhiyyoti, savanena hi ettakaṃ hoti, taduttari visesādhigamo bhāvanāyāti. ^b^kiñca dvayataṃ vadethā^eb^ti ettha pana sace, vo bhikkhave, siyā, kiñca tumhe, bhante, dvayataṃ vadethāti ayamadhippāyo. padattho pana ``kiñca dvayatābhāvaṃ vadethā''ti.

[03] (1) tato bhagavā dvayataṃ dassento ^b^``idaṃ dukkha''^eb^nti evamādimāha. tattha dvayatānaṃ catusaccadhammānaṃ ``idaṃ dukkhaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo''ti evaṃ lokiyassa ekassa avayavassa sahetukassa vā dukkhassa dassanena ^b^ayaṃ ekānupassanā,^eb^ itarā lokuttarassa dutiyassa avayavassa saupāyassa vā nirodhassa dassanena ^b^dutiyānupassanā^eb^. paṭhamā cettha tatiyacatutthavisuddhīhi hoti, dutiyā pañcamavisuddhiyā. ^b^evaṃ sammā dvayatānupassino^eb^ti iminā vuttanayena sammā dvayadhamme anupassantassa satiyā ^a^M2.0221^ea^ avippavāsena ^b^appamattassa,^eb^ kāyikacetasikavīriyātāpena ^b^ātāpino^eb^ kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhattā ^a^P2.0504^ea^, ^b^pahitattassa^eb^. ^b^pāṭikaṅkha^eb^nti icchitabbaṃ. ^b^diṭṭheva dhamme aññā^eb^ti asmiṃyeva attabhāve arahattaṃ. ^b^sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā^eb^ti ``upādisesa''nti punabbhavavasena upādātabbakkhandhasesaṃ vuccati, tasmiṃ vā sati anāgāmibhāvo paṭikaṅkhoti dasseti. tattha kiñcāpi heṭṭhimaphalānipi evaṃ dvayatānupassinova honti, uparimaphalesu pana ussāhaṃ janento evamāha.

[03] ^b^idamavocā^eb^tiādi saṅgītikārānaṃ vacanaṃ. tattha ^b^ida^eb^nti ``ye te, bhikkhave''tiādivuttanidassanaṃ. ^b^eta^eb^nti idāni ``ye dukkha''nti evamādivattabbagāthābandhanidassanaṃ. imā ca gāthā catusaccadīpakattā vuttatthadīpikā eva, evaṃ santepi gāthārucikānaṃ pacchā āgatānaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ asamatthatāya anuggahetvā ``idāni yadi vadeyya sundara''nti ākaṅkhantānaṃ vikkhittacittānañca atthāya vuttā. visesatthadīpikā vāti avipassake ^a^V2.0201^ea^ vipassake ca dassetvā tesaṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭadassanato, tasmā visesatthadassanatthameva vuttā. esa nayo ito parampi gāthāvacanesu.

[03] 730^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^yattha cā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ dasseti. nibbāne hi dukkhaṃ sabbaso uparujjhati, sabbappakāraṃ uparujjhati, sahetukaṃ uparujjhati, asesañca uparujjhati. ^b^tañca magga^eb^nti tañca aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ.

[03] 731-3^b^.^eb^ ^b^cetovimuttihīnā te, atho paññāvimuttiyā^eb^ti ettha arahattaphalasamādhi rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, arahattaphalapaññā avijjāvirāgā paññāvimuttīti veditabbā. taṇhācaritena vā appanājhānabalena kilese vikkhambhetvā adhigataṃ arahattaphalaṃ rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, diṭṭhicaritena upacārajjhānamattaṃ nibbattetvā vipassitvā adhigataṃ arahattaphalaṃ avijjāvirāgā paññāvimutti. anāgāmiphalaṃ vā kāmarāgaṃ sandhāya rāgavirāgā cetovimutti, arahattaphalaṃ sabbappakārato avijjāvirāgā paññāvimuttīti. ^b^antakiriyāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaraṇatthāya ^a^P2.0505^ea^. ^b^jātijarūpagā^eb^ti jātijaraṃ upagatā, jātijarāya vā upagatā, na parimuccanti jātijarāyāti evaṃ veditabbā. sesamettha ādito pabhuti pākaṭameva. gāthāpariyosāne ca saṭṭhimattā bhikkhū taṃ ^a^M2.0222^ea^ desanaṃ uggahetvā vipassitvā tasmiṃyeva āsane arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. yathā cettha, evaṃ sabbavāresu.

[03] (2) ato eva bhagavā ^b^``siyā aññenapi pariyāyenā''^eb^tiādinā nayena nānappakārato dvayatānupassanaṃ āha. tattha dutiyavāre ^b^upadhipaccayā^eb^ti sāsavakammapaccayā. sāsavakammañhi idha ``upadhī''ti adhippetaṃ. ^b^asesavirāganirodhā^eb^ti asesaṃ virāgena nirodhā, asesavirāgasaṅkhātā vā nirodhā.

[03] 734^b^.^eb^ ^b^upadhinidānā^eb^ti kammapaccayā. ^b^dukkhassa jātippabhavānupassī^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa jātikāraṇaṃ ``upadhī''ti anupassanto. sesamettha pākaṭameva. evaṃ ayampi vāro cattāri saccāni dīpetvā arahattanikūṭeneva vutto. yathā cāyaṃ, evaṃ sabbavārā.
[03] (3) tattha tatiyavāre ^b^avijjāpaccayā^eb^ti bhavagāmikammasambhārāvijjāpaccayā. dukkhaṃ pana sabbattha vaṭṭadukkhameva.

[03] 735^b^.^eb^ ^b^jātimaraṇasaṃsāra^eb^nti ^a^V2.0202^ea^ khandhanibbattiṃ jātiṃ khandhabhedaṃ maraṇaṃ khandhapaṭipāṭiṃ saṃsārañca. ^b^vajantī^eb^ti gacchanti upenti. ^b^itthabhāvaññathābhāva^eb^nti imaṃ manussabhāvaṃ ito avasesāññanikāyabhāvañca. ^b^gatī^eb^ti paccayabhāvo.
[03] 736^b^.^eb^ ^b^avijjā hāya^eb^nti avijjā hi ayaṃ. ^b^vijjāgatā ca ye sattā^eb^ti ye ca arahattamaggavijjāya kilese vijjhitvā gatā khīṇāsavasattā. sesamuttānatthameva.
[03] (4) catutthavāre ^b^saṅkhārapaccayā^eb^ti puññāpuññāneñjābhisaṅkhārapaccayā.

[03] 738-9^b^.^eb^ ^b^etamādīnavaṃ ñatvā^eb^ti yadidaṃ dukkhaṃ saṅkhārapaccayā, etaṃ ādīnavanti ñatvā. ^b^sabbasaṅkhārasamathā^eb^ti sabbesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ maggañāṇena samathā, upahatatāya phalasamatthatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^saññāna^eb^nti kāmasaññādīnaṃ maggeneva uparodhanā. ^b^etaṃ ñatvā yathātatha^eb^nti etaṃ ^a^P2.0506^ea^ dukkhakkhayaṃ aviparītaṃ ñatvā. ^b^sammaddasā^eb^ti sammādassanā. ^b^sammadaññāyā^eb^ti saṅkhataṃ aniccādito, asaṅkhatañca niccādito ñatvā. ^b^mārasaṃyoga^eb^nti tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ. sesamuttānatthameva.
[03] (5) pañcamavāre ^a^M2.0223^ea^ ^b^viññāṇapaccayā^eb^ti kammasahajātābhisaṅkhāraviññāṇapaccayā.
[03] 741^b^.^eb^ ^b^nicchāto^eb^ti nittaṇho. ^b^parinibbuto^eb^ti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto hoti. sesaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03] (6) chaṭṭhavāre ^b^phassapaccayā^eb^ti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇasampayuttaphassapaccayāti attho. evaṃ ettha padapaṭipāṭiyā vattabbāni nāmarūpasaḷāyatanāni avatvā phasso vutto. tāni hi rūpamissakattā kammasampayuttāneva na honti, idañca vaṭṭadukkhaṃ kammato vā sambhaveyya kammasampayuttadhammato vāti.

[03] 742-3^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhavasotānusārina^eb^nti taṇhānusārinaṃ. ^b^pariññāyā^eb^ti tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā. ^b^aññāyā^eb^ti arahattamaggapaññāya ñatvā. ^b^upasame ratā^eb^ti phalasamāpattivasena nibbāne ratā. ^b^phassābhisamayā^eb^ti phassanirodhā. sesaṃ pākaṭameva.
[03] (7) sattamavāre ^a^V2.0203^ea^ ^b^vedanāpaccayā^eb^ti kammasampayuttavedanāpaccayā.

[03] 744-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^adukkhamasukhaṃ sahā^eb^ti adukkhamasukhena saha. ^b^etaṃ dukkhanti ñatvānā^eb^ti etaṃ sabbaṃ vedayitaṃ ``dukkhakāraṇa''nti ñatvā, vipariṇāmaṭṭhitiaññāṇadukkhatāhi vā dukkhaṃ ñatvā. ^b^mosadhamma^eb^nti nassanadhammaṃ. ^b^palokina^eb^nti jarāmaraṇehi palujjanadhammaṃ. ^b^phussa phussā^eb^ti udayabbayañāṇena phusitvā phusitvā. ^b^vayaṃ passa^eb^nti ante bhaṅgameva passanto. ^b^evaṃ tattha vijānatī^eb^ti evaṃ tā vedanā vijānāti, tattha vā dukkhabhāvaṃ vijānāti. ^b^vedanānaṃ khayā^eb^ti tato paraṃ maggañāṇena kammasampayuttānaṃ vedanānaṃ khayā. sesamuttānameva.
[03] (8) aṭṭhamavāre ^b^taṇhāpaccayā^eb^ti kammasambhārataṇhāpaccayā ^a^P2.0507^ea^.
[03] 747^b^.^eb^ ^b^etamādīnavaṃ ñatvā, taṇhaṃ dukkhassa sambhava^eb^nti etaṃ dukkhassa sambhavaṃ taṇhāya ādīnavaṃ ñatvā. sesamuttānameva.

[03] 773^b^.^eb^ ^b^kāmaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0207^ea^ ^a^M2.0228^ea^ ^a^P2.0511^ea^ ^b^kāmayamānassā^eb^ti kāmasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? bhagavati kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante aññataro brāhmaṇo sāvatthiyā jetavanassa ca antare aciravatīnadītīre ``yavaṃ vapissāmī''ti khettaṃ kasati. bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto piṇḍāya pavisanto taṃ disvā āvajjento addasa -- ``assa brāhmaṇassa yavā vinassissantī''ti, puna upanissayasampattiṃ āvajjento cassa sotāpattiphalassa upanissayaṃ addasa. ``kadā pāpuṇeyyā''ti āvajjento ``sasse vinaṭṭhe sokābhibhūto dhammadesanaṃ sutvā''ti addasa. tato cintesi -- ``sacāhaṃ tadā eva brāhmaṇaṃ upasaṅkamissāmi, na me ovādaṃ sotabbaṃ maññissati. nānārucikā hi brāhmaṇā, handa, naṃ ito pabhutiyeva saṅgaṇhāmi, evaṃ mayi muducitto hutvā tadā ovādaṃ sossatī''ti brāhmaṇaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha -- ``kiṃ, brāhmaṇa, karosī''ti. brāhmaṇo ``evaṃ uccākulīno samaṇo gotamo mayā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karotī''ti tāvatakeneva bhagavati pasannacitto hutvā ``khettaṃ, bho gotama, kasāmi yavaṃ vapissāmī''ti āha. atha sāriputtatthero cintesi -- ``bhagavā brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ akāsi, na ca ahetu appaccayā tathāgatā evaṃ karonti, handāhampi tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karomī''ti brāhmaṇaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tatheva paṭisanthāramakāsi. evaṃ mahāmoggallānatthero sesā ca asīti mahāsāvakā. brāhmaṇo atīva attamano ahosi.

[03] atha bhagavā sampajjamānepi sasse ekadivasaṃ katabhattakicco sāvatthito jetavanaṃ gacchanto maggā okkamma brāhmaṇassa santikaṃ gantvā āha -- ``sundaraṃ te, brāhmaṇa, yavakkhetta''nti. ``evaṃ, bho gotama, sundaraṃ, sace sampajjissati, tumhākampi saṃvibhāgaṃ ^a^P2.0512^ea^ karissāmī''ti. athassa catumāsaccayena yavā nipphajjiṃsu. tassa ``ajja vā sve vā lāyissāmī''ti ussukkaṃ kurumānasseva mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā sabbarattiṃ vassi. aciravatī nadī pūrā āgantvā sabbaṃ yavaṃ vahi. brāhmaṇo sabbarattiṃ anattamano hutvā pabhāte nadītīraṃ gato sabbaṃ sassavipattiṃ disvā ``vinaṭṭhomhi, kathaṃ dāni jīvissāmī''ti balavasokaṃ uppādesi ^a^V2.0208^ea^. bhagavāpi tameva ^a^M2.0229^ea^ rattiṃ paccūsasamaye buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento ``ajja brāhmaṇassa dhammadesanākālo''ti ñatvā bhikkhācāravattena sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā brāhmaṇassa gharadvāre aṭṭhāsi. brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ disvā ``sokābhibhūtaṃ maṃ assāsetukāmo samaṇo gotamo āgato''ti cintetvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā pattaṃ gahetvā bhagavantaṃ nisīdāpesi. bhagavā jānantova brāhmaṇaṃ pucchi -- ``kiṃ brāhmaṇa paduṭṭhacitto vihāsī''ti? āma, bho gotama, sabbaṃ me yavakkhettaṃ udakena vūḷhanti. atha bhagavā ``na, brāhmaṇa, vipanne domanassaṃ, sampanne ca somanassaṃ kātabbaṃ. kāmā hi nāma sampajjantipi vipajjantipī''ti vatvā tassa brāhmaṇassa sappāyaṃ ñatvā dhammadesanāvasena imaṃ suttamabhāsi. tattha saṅkhepato padatthasambandhamattameva vaṇṇayissāma, vitthāro pana niddese (mahāni0 1) vuttanayeneva veditabbo. yathā ca imasmiṃ sutte, evaṃ ito paraṃ sabbasuttesu.

[03] tattha ^b^kāma^eb^nti manāpiyarūpāditebhūmakadhammasaṅkhātaṃ vatthukāmaṃ, ^b^kāmayamānassā^eb^ti icchamānassa. ^b^tassa ce taṃ samijjhatī^eb^ti tassa kāmayamānassa sattassa taṃ kāmasaṅkhātaṃ vatthu samijjhati ce, sace so taṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^addhā pītimano hotī^eb^ti ekaṃsaṃ tuṭṭhacitto hoti. ^b^laddhā^eb^ti labhitvā. ^b^macco^eb^ti satto. ^b^yadicchatī^eb^ti yaṃ icchati.

[03] 776-8^b^.^eb^ tato ^a^M2.0230^ea^ parāsaṃ tissannaṃ gāthānaṃ ayaṃ saṅkhepattho -- ^b^yo^eb^ etaṃ sālikkhettādiṃ ^b^khettaṃ^eb^ vā gharavatthādiṃ ^b^vatthuṃ^eb^ vā kahāpaṇasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^hiraññaṃ^eb^ vā goassabhedaṃ ^b^gavāssaṃ^eb^ vā itthisaññikā ^b^thiyo^eb^ vā ñātibandhavādī ^b^bandhū^eb^ vā aññe vā manāpiyarūpādī ^b^puthu kāme anugijjhati,^eb^ taṃ puggalaṃ ^b^abala^eb^saṅkhātā kilesā ^b^balīyanti^eb^ sahanti maddanti, saddhābalādivirahena vā abalaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ abalā kilesā balīyanti, abalattā balīyantīti attho. atha taṃ kāmagiddhaṃ kāme rakkhantaṃ ^a^V2.0209^ea^ pariyesantañca sīhādayo ca pākaṭa^b^parissayā^eb^ kāyaduccaritādayo ca apākaṭa^b^parissayā maddanti, tato^eb^ apākaṭaparissayehi abhibhūtaṃ ^b^taṃ^eb^ puggalaṃ jātiādi^b^dukkhaṃ bhinnaṃ nāvaṃ udakaṃ viya anveti. tasmā^eb^ kāyagatāsatiādibhāvanāya ^b^jantu sadā sato^eb^ hutvā vikkhambhanasamucchedavasena rūpādīsu vatthukāmesu sabbappakārampi kilesakāmaṃ parivajjento ^b^kāmāni parivajjaye^eb^. evaṃ ^b^te^eb^ kāme ^b^pahāya^eb^ tappahānakaramaggeneva catubbidhampi ^b^tare oghaṃ^eb^ tareyya tarituṃ sakkuṇeyya. tato yathā puriso udakagarukaṃ ^b^nāvaṃ siñcitvā^eb^ lahukāya nāvāya appakasireneva ^b^pāragū^eb^ bhaveyya, pāraṃ gaccheyya, evameva attabhāvanāvaṃ kilesūdakagarukaṃ siñcitvā lahukena attabhāvena pāragū bhaveyya, sabbadhammapāraṃ nibbānaṃ gato bhaveyya, arahattappattiyā gaccheyya ca, anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbātīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. desanāpariyosāne ^a^P2.0514^ea^ brāhmaṇo ca brāhmaṇī ca sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.

[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya kāmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 779^b^.^eb^ ^b^satto^eb^ ^a^V2.0210^ea^ ^a^M2.0231^ea^ ^b^guhāya^eb^nti guhaṭṭhakasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? bhagavati kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante āyasmā piṇḍolabhāradvājo kosambiyaṃ gaṃṅgātīre āvaṭṭakaṃ nāma utenassa uyyānaṃ, tattha agamāsi sītale padese divāvihāraṃ nisīditukāmo. aññadāpi cāyaṃ gacchateva tattha pubbāsevanena yathā gavampatitthero tāvatiṃsabhavananti vuttanayametaṃ vaṅgīsasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ. so tattha gaṅgātīre sītale rukkhamūle samāpattiṃ appetvā divāvihāraṃ nisīdi. rājāpi kho uteno taṃ divasaṃyeva uyyānakīḷikaṃ gantvā bahudeva divasabhāgaṃ naccagītādīhi uyyāne kīḷitvā pānamadamatto ekissā itthiyā aṅke sīsaṃ katvā sayi. sesitthiyo ``sutto rājā''ti uṭṭhahitvā uyyāne pupphaphalādīni gaṇhantiyo theraṃ disvā hirottappaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā ``mā saddaṃ akatthā''ti aññamaññaṃ nivāretvā appasaddā upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā theraṃ samparivāretvā nisīdiṃsu. thero samāpattito vuṭṭhāya tāsaṃ dhammaṃ desesi, tā tuṭṭhā ``sādhu sādhū''ti vatvā suṇanti.

[03] rañño sīsaṃ aṅkenādāya nisinnitthī ``imā maṃ ohāya kīḷantī''ti tāsu issāpakatā ūruṃ cāletvā rājānaṃ pabodhesi. rājā paṭibujjhitvā itthāgāraṃ apassanto ``kuhiṃ imā vasaliyo''ti āha. sā āha -- ``tumhesu abahukatā `samaṇaṃ ramayissāmā'ti gatā''ti. so kuddho therābhimukho agamāsi. tā itthiyo rājānaṃ disvā ekaccā uṭṭhahiṃsu, ekaccā ``mahārāja, pabbajitassa santike dhammaṃ suṇāmā''ti na uṭṭhahiṃsu. so tena bhiyyosomattāya ^a^P2.0515^ea^ kuddho theraṃ avanditvāva ``kimatthaṃ āgatosī''ti āha. ``vivekatthaṃ mahārājā''ti. so ``vivekatthāya āgatā evaṃ itthāgāraparivutā nisīdantī''ti vatvā ``tava vivekaṃ kathehī''ti āha. thero visāradopi vivekakathāya ``nāyaṃ aññātukāmo pucchatī''ti tuṇhī ahosi. rājā ``sace na kathesi, tambakipillikehi taṃ khādāpessāmī''ti aññatarasmiṃ asokarukkhe tambakipillikapuṭaṃ gaṇhanto attanova upari vikiri. so sarīraṃ puñchitvā aññaṃ puṭaṃ gahetvā therābhimukho agamāsi. thero ``sacāyaṃ rājā mayi aparajjheyya ^a^M2.0232^ea^, apāyābhimukho bhaveyyā''ti taṃ anukampamāno iddhiyā ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā gato.

[03] tato ^a^V2.0211^ea^ itthiyo āhaṃsu -- ``mahārāja, aññe rājāno īdisaṃ pabbajitaṃ disvā pupphagandhādīhi pūjenti, tvaṃ tambakipillikapuṭena āsādetuṃ āraddho ahosi, kulavaṃsaṃ nāsetuṃ uṭṭhito''ti. so attano dosaṃ ñatvā tuṇhī hutvā uyyānapālaṃ pucchi -- ``aññampi divasaṃ thero idhāgacchatī''ti? ``āma, mahārājā''ti. tena hi yadā āgacchati, tadā me āroceyyāsīti. so ekadivasaṃ there āgate ārocesi. rājāpi theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā pāṇehi saraṇaṃ gato ahosi. tambakipillikapuṭena āsāditadivase pana thero ākāsenāgantvā puna pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā bhagavato gandhakuṭiyaṃ ummujji. bhagavāpi kho dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ kappayamāno theraṃ disvā ``kiṃ, bhāradvāja, akāle āgatosī''ti āha. thero ``āma bhagavā''ti vatvā sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. taṃ sutvā bhagavā ``kiṃ karissati tassa vivekakathā kāmaguṇagiddhassā''ti vatvā dakkhiṇena passena nipanno eva therassa dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ suttamabhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^satto^eb^ti laggo. ^b^guhāya^eb^nti kāye. kāyo hi rāgādīnaṃ vāḷānaṃ vasanokāsato ``guhā''ti vuccati. ^b^bahunābhichanno^eb^ti bahunā rāgādikilesajālena abhicchanno. etena ajjhattabandhanaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^tiṭṭha^eb^nti rāgādivasena tiṭṭhanto. ^b^naro^eb^ti satto. ^b^mohanasmiṃ pagāḷho^eb^ti mohanaṃ vuccati kāmaguṇā. ettha hi devamanussā muyhanti, tesu ajjhogāḷho hutvā ^a^P2.0516^ea^. etena bahiddhābandhanaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^dūre vivekā hi tathāvidho so^eb^ti so tathārūpo naro tividhāpi kāyavivekādikā vivekā dūre anāsanne. kiṃkāraṇā? ^b^kāmā hi loke na hi suppahāyā,^eb^ yasmā loke kāmā suppahāyā na hontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
