[03] 780^b^.^eb^ evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya ``dūre vivekā tathāvidho''ti sādhetvā puna tathāvidhānaṃ sattānaṃ dhammataṃ āvikaronto ^b^``icchānidānā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^icchānidānā^eb^ti taṇhāhetukā. ^b^bhavasātabaddhā^eb^ti sukhavedanādimhi bhavasāte baddhā. ^b^te duppamuñcā^eb^ti te bhavasātavatthubhūtā ^a^M2.0233^ea^ dhammā, te vā tattha baddhā icchānidānā sattā duppamocayā. ^b^na hi aññamokkhā^eb^ti aññena ca mocetuṃ na sakkonti. kāraṇavacanaṃ vā etaṃ, te sattā duppamuñcā. kasmā? yasmā aññena mocetabbā na honti. yadi pana muñceyyuṃ, sakena thāmena muñceyyunti ayamassa attho. ^b^pacchā pure vāpi apekkhamānā^eb^ti anāgate atīte vā kāme apekkhamānā. ^b^imeva kāme purimeva jappanti^eb^ ime vā paccuppanne kāme purime vā duvidhepi atītānāgate balavataṇhāya patthayamānā. imesañca dvinnaṃ padānaṃ ``te duppamuñcā na hi aññamokkhā''ti iminā saha sambandho ^a^V2.0212^ea^ veditabbo, itarathā ``apekkhamānā jappaṃ kiṃ karonti kiṃ vā katā''ti na paññāyeyyuṃ.

[03] 781-2^b^.^eb^ evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya ``dūre vivekā tathāvidho''ti sādhetvā dutiyagāthāya ca tathāvidhānaṃ sattānaṃ dhammataṃ āvikatvā idāni nesaṃ pāpakammakaraṇaṃ āvikaronto ^b^``kāmesu giddhā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- ^b^te^eb^ sattā ^b^kāmesu^eb^ paribhogataṇhāya ^b^giddhā^eb^ pariyesanādimanuyuttattā ^b^pasutā^eb^ sammohamāpannattā ^b^pamūḷhā^eb^ avagamanatāya maccharitāya buddhādīnaṃ vacanaṃ anādiyanatāya ca ^b^avadāniyā^eb^. kāyavisamādimhi ^b^visame niviṭṭhā^eb^ antakāle ^b^maraṇadukkhūpanītā ``kiṃsū bhavissāma ito cutāse''^eb^ti ^b^paridevayantī^eb^ti. yasmā etadeva, ^b^tasmā hi sikkhetha...pe0... māhu dhīrā^eb^ti. tattha ^b^sikkhethā^eb^ti tisso sikkhā āpajjeyya. ^b^idhevā^eb^ti ^a^P2.0517^ea^ imasmiṃyeva sāsane. sesamuttānameva.

[03] 783^b^.^eb^ idāni ye tathā na karonti, tesaṃ byasanappattiṃ dassento ^b^``passāmī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^passāmī^eb^ti maṃsacakkhuādīhi pekkhāmi. ^b^loke^eb^ti apāyādimhi. ^b^pariphandamāna^eb^nti ito cito ca phandamānaṃ. ^b^pajaṃ ima^eb^nti imaṃ sattakāyaṃ. ^b^taṇhagata^eb^nti taṇhāya gataṃ abhibhūtaṃ, nipātitanti adhippāyo. ^b^bhavesū^eb^ti kāmabhavādīsu. ^b^hīnā narā^eb^ti hīnakammantā narā. ^b^maccumukhe lapantī^eb^ti antakāle sampatte maraṇamukhe paridevanti. ^b^avītataṇhāse^eb^ti avigatataṇhā. ^b^bhavābhavesū^eb^ti kāmabhavādīsu. atha vā ^b^bhavābhavesū^eb^ti bhavabhavesu, punappunabhavesūti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 784^b^.^eb^ idāni yasmā avītataṇhā evaṃ phandanti ca lapanti ca, tasmā taṇhāvinaye samādapento ^b^``mamāyite''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^mamāyite^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhimamattehi ``mama''nti pariggahite vatthusmiṃ. ^b^passathā^eb^ti sotāre ^a^M2.0234^ea^ ālapanto āha. ^b^etampī^eb^ti etampi ādīnavaṃ. sesaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03] 785^b^.^eb^ evamettha paṭhamagāthāya assādaṃ, tato parāhi catūhi ādīnavañca dassetvā idāni saupāyaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nissaraṇānisaṃsañca dassetuṃ sabbāhi vā etāhi kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesañca dassetvā idāni nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ubhosu antesū''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^ubhosu^eb^ antesūti phassaphassasamudayādīsu dvīsu paricchedesu. ^b^vineyya chanda^eb^nti chandarāgaṃ vinetvā. ^b^phassaṃ pariññāyā^eb^ti cakkhusamphassādiphassaṃ, phassānusārena vā ^a^V2.0213^ea^ taṃsampayutte sabbepi arūpadhamme, tesaṃ vatthudvārārammaṇavasena rūpadhamme cāti sakalampi nāmarūpaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā. ^b^anānugiddho^eb^ti rūpādīsu sabbadhammesu agiddho. ^b^yadattagarahī tadakubbamāno^eb^ti yaṃ attanā garahati, taṃ akurumāno. ^b^nalippatī diṭṭhasutesu dhīro^eb^ti so evarūpo dhitisampanno dhīro diṭṭhesu ca sutesu ca dhammesu dvinnaṃ lepānaṃ ekenapi lepena na lippati. ākāsamiva nirupalitto accantavodānappatto hoti.

[03] 786^b^.^eb^ ^b^saññaṃ pariññā^eb^ti gāthāya pana ayaṃ saṅkhepattho -- na kevalañca ^a^P2.0518^ea^ phassameva, apica kho pana kāmasaññādibhedaṃ ^b^saññampi,^eb^ saññānusārena vā pubbe vuttanayeneva nāmarūpaṃ tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā imāya paṭipadāya catubbidhampi ^b^vitareyya oghaṃ,^eb^ tato so tiṇṇogho taṇhādiṭṭhi^b^pariggahesu^eb^ taṇhādiṭṭhilepappahānena ^b^nopalitto^eb^ khīṇāsava^b^muni^eb^ rāgādisallānaṃ abbūḷhattā ^b^abbūḷhasallo^eb^ sativepullappattiyā ^b^appamatto caraṃ,^eb^ pubbabhāge vā appamatto caraṃ tena appamādacārena abbūḷhasallo hutvā sakaparattabhāvādibhedaṃ ^b^nāsīsatī lokamimaṃ parañca,^eb^ aññadatthu carimacittanirodhā nirupādāno jātavedova parinibbātīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi dhammanettiṭṭhapanameva karonto, na uttariṃ imāya desanāya maggaṃ vā phalaṃ vā uppādesi khīṇāsavassa desitattāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya guhaṭṭhakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 787^b^.^eb^ ^b^vadanti^eb^ ^a^V2.0214^ea^ ^a^M2.0235^ea^ ^b^ve duṭṭhamanāpī^eb^ti duṭṭhaṭṭhakasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? ādigāthāya tāva uppatti -- munisuttanayena bhagavato bhikkhusaṅghassa ca uppannalābhasakkāraṃ asahamānā titthiyā sundariṃ paribbājikaṃ uyyojesuṃ. sā kira janapadakalyāṇī setavatthaparibbājikāva ahosi. sā sunhātā sunivatthā mālāgandhavilepanavibhūsitā bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā sāvatthivāsīnaṃ jetavanato nikkhamanavelāya sāvatthito nikkhamitvā jetavanābhimukhī gacchati. manussehi ca ``kuhiṃ gacchasī''ti pucchitā ``samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ sāvake cassa ramayituṃ gacchāmī''ti vatvā jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake vicaritvā jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake pidahite nagaraṃ pavisitvā pabhāte puna jetavanaṃ gantvā gandhakuṭisamīpe pupphāni vicinantī viya carati ^a^P2.0519^ea^. buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatehi ca manussehi ``kimatthaṃ āgatāsī''ti pucchitā yaṃkiñcideva bhaṇati. evaṃ aḍḍhamāsamatte vītikkante titthiyā taṃ jīvitā voropetvā parikhātaṭe nikkhipitvā pabhāte ``sundariṃ na passāmā''ti kolāhalaṃ katvā rañño ca ārocetvā tena anuññātā jetavanaṃ pavisitvā vicinantā viya taṃ nikkhittaṭṭhānā uddharitvā mañcakaṃ āropetvā nagaraṃ abhiharitvā upakkosaṃ akaṃsu. sabbaṃ pāḷiyaṃ (udā0 38) āgatanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] bhagavā taṃ divasaṃ paccūsasamaye buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento ``titthiyā ajja ayasaṃ uppādessantī''ti ñatvā ``tesaṃ saddahitvā mādise cittaṃ pakopetvā mahājano apāyābhimukho mā ahosī''ti gandhakuṭidvāraṃ pidahitvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃyeva acchi, na nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. bhikkhū pana dvāraṃ pidahitaṃ disvā pubbasadisameva pavisiṃsu. manussā bhikkhū disvā nānappakārehi akkosiṃsu. atha āyasmā ānando bhagavato taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā ``titthiyehi, bhante, mahāayaso uppādito, na sakkā idha vasituṃ, vipulo jambudīpo, aññattha gacchāmā''ti āha. tatthapi ayase uṭṭhite kuhiṃ gamissasi ānandāti? ``aññaṃ nagaraṃ bhagavā''ti. atha bhagavā ``āgamehi, ānanda, sattāhamevāyaṃ saddo bhavissati, sattāhaccayena yehi ayaso ^a^M2.0236^ea^ kato, tesaṃyeva upari patissatī''ti vatvā ānandattherassa dhammadesanatthaṃ ^b^``vadanti ve''^eb^ti imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0215^ea^ ^b^vadantī^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghañca upavadanti. ^b^duṭṭhamanāpi eke athopi ve saccamanā^eb^ti ekacce duṭṭhacittā, ekacce tathasaññinopi hutvā, titthiyā duṭṭhacittā, ye tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā saddahiṃsu, te saccamanāti adhippāyo. ^b^vādañca jāta^eb^nti etaṃ akkosavādaṃ ^a^P2.0520^ea^ uppannaṃ. ^b^muni no upetī^eb^ti akārakatāya ca akuppanatāya ca buddhamuni na upeti. ^b^tasmā munī natthi khilo kuhiñcī^eb^ti tena kāraṇena ayaṃ muni rāgādikhilehi natthi khilo kuhiñcīti veditabbo.

[03] 788^b^.^eb^ imañca gāthaṃ vatvā bhagavā ānandattheraṃ pucchi, ``evaṃ khuṃsetvā vambhetvā vuccamānā bhikkhū, ānanda, kiṃ vadantī''ti. na kiñci bhagavāti. ``na, ānanda, `ahaṃ sīlavā'ti sabbattha tuṇhī bhavitabbaṃ, loke hi nābhāsamānaṃ jānanti missaṃ bālehi paṇḍita''nti vatvā, ``bhikkhū, ānanda, te manusse evaṃ paṭicodentū''ti dhammadesanatthāya ``abhūtavādī nirayaṃ upetī''ti imaṃ gāthamabhāsi. thero taṃ uggahetvā bhikkhū āha -- ``manussā tumhehi imāya gāthāya paṭicodetabbā''ti. bhikkhū tathā akaṃsu. paṇḍitamanussā tuṇhī ahesuṃ. rājāpi rājapurise sabbato pesetvā yesaṃ dhuttānaṃ lañjaṃ datvā titthiyā taṃ mārāpesuṃ, te gahetvā niggayha taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā titthiye paribhāsi. manussāpi titthiye disvā leḍḍunā paharanti, paṃsunā okiranti ``bhagavato ayasaṃ uppādesu''nti. ānandatthero taṃ disvā bhagavato ārocesi, bhagavā therassa imaṃ gāthamabhāsi ^b^``sakañhi diṭṭhiṃ...pe0... vadeyyā''^eb^ti.

[03] tassattho -- yāyaṃ diṭṭhi titthiyajanassa ``sundariṃ māretvā samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ avaṇṇaṃ pakāsetvā etenupāyena laddhaṃ sakkāraṃ sādiyissāmā''ti, so taṃ diṭṭhiṃ kathaṃ atikkameyya, atha kho so ayaso tameva titthiyajanaṃ paccāgato taṃ diṭṭhiṃ accetuṃ asakkontaṃ. yo vā sassatādivādī, sopi ^b^sakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ kathaṃ accayeyya^eb^ tena ^b^diṭṭhicchandena anunīto^eb^ tāya ca ^b^diṭṭhiruciyā niviṭṭho,^eb^ apica kho pana ^b^sayaṃ samattāni^eb^ ^a^M2.0237^ea^ ^b^pakubbamāno^eb^ attanāva paripuṇṇāni tāni diṭṭhigatāni karonto ^b^yathā jāneyya, tatheva vadeyyā^eb^ti.

[03] 789^b^.^eb^ atha rājā sattāhaccayena taṃ kuṇapaṃ chaḍḍāpetvā sāyanhasamayaṃ ^a^P2.0521^ea^ vihāraṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā āha -- ``nanu, bhante, īdise ayase uppanne mayhampi ārocetabbaṃ siyā''ti. evaṃ vutte bhagavā, ``na, mahārāja, `ahaṃ sīlavā guṇasampanno'ti paresaṃ ārocetuṃ ^a^V2.0216^ea^ ariyānaṃ patirūpa''nti vatvā tassā aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ ^b^``yo attano sīlavatānī''^eb^ti avasesagāthāyo abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^sīlavatānī^eb^ti pātimokkhādīni sīlāni āraññikādīni dhutaṅgavatāni ca. ^b^anānupuṭṭho^eb^ti apucchito. ^b^pāvā^eb^ti vadati. ^b^anariyadhammaṃ kusalā tamāhu, yo ātumānaṃ sayameva pāvā^eb^ti yo evaṃ attānaṃ sayameva vadati, tassa taṃ vādaṃ ``anariyadhammo eso''ti kusalā evaṃ kathenti.

[03] 790^b^.^eb^ ^b^santo^eb^ti rāgādikilesavūpasamena santo, tathā ^b^abhinibbutatto. itihanti sīlesu akatthamāno^eb^ti ``ahamasmi sīlasampanno''tiādinā nayena iti sīlesu akatthamāno, sīlanimittaṃ attūpanāyikaṃ vācaṃ abhāsamānoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^tamariyadhammaṃ kusalā vadantī^eb^ti tassa taṃ akatthanaṃ ``ariyadhammo eso''ti buddhādayo khandhādikusalā vadanti. ^b^yassussadā natthi kuhiñci loke^eb^ti yassa khīṇāsavassa rāgādayo satta ussadā kuhiñci loke natthi, tassa taṃ akatthanaṃ ``ariyadhammo eso''ti evaṃ kusalā vadantīti sambandho.

[03] 791^b^.^eb^ evaṃ khīṇāsavapaṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni diṭṭhigatikānaṃ titthiyānaṃ paṭipattiṃ rañño dassento āha -- ^b^``pakappitā saṅkhatā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^pakappitā^eb^ti parikappitā. ^b^saṅkhatā^eb^ti paccayābhisaṅkhatā. ^b^yassā^eb^ti yassa kassaci diṭṭhigatikassa. ^b^dhammā^eb^ti diṭṭhiyo. ^b^purakkhatā^eb^ti purato katā. ^b^santī^eb^ti saṃvijjanti. ^b^avīvadātā^eb^ti avodātā. ^b^yadattani passati ānisaṃsaṃ, taṃ nissito kuppapaṭiccasanti^eb^nti yassete diṭṭhidhammā purakkhatā avodātā santi, so evaṃvidho yasmā attani tassā diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhidhammikañca ^a^M2.0238^ea^ ^a^P2.0522^ea^ sakkārādiṃ, samparāyikañca gativisesādiṃ ānisaṃsaṃ passati, tasmā tañca ānisaṃsaṃ, tañca kuppatāya ca paṭiccasamuppannatāya ca sammutisantitāya ca kuppapaṭiccasantisaṅkhātaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissitova hoti, so tannissitattā attānaṃ vā ukkaṃseyya pare vā vambheyya abhūtehipi guṇadosehi.

[03] 792^b^.^eb^ evaṃ nissitena ca ^b^diṭṭhīnivesā...pe0... ādiyatī ca dhamma^eb^nti. tattha ^b^diṭṭhīnivesā^eb^ti idaṃsaccābhinivesasaṅkhātāni diṭṭhinivesanāni. ^b^na hi svātivattā^eb^ti sukhena ativattitabbā na honti. ^b^dhammesu niccheyya samuggahīta^eb^nti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhidhammesu taṃ taṃ samuggahitaṃ abhiniviṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ nicchinitvā pavattattā diṭṭhinivesā na hi svātivattāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^tasmā naro tesu nivesanesu, nirassatī ādiyatī ca dhamma^eb^nti yasmā na hi svātivattā ^a^V2.0217^ea^, tasmā naro tesuyeva diṭṭhinivesanesu ajasīlagosīlakukkurasīlapañcātapamaruppapātaukkuṭikappadhānakaṇṭakāpassayādibhedaṃ satthāradhammakkhānagaṇādibhedañca taṃ taṃ dhammaṃ nirassati ca ādiyati ca jahati ca gaṇhāti ca vanamakkaṭo viya taṃ taṃ sākhanti vuttaṃ hoti. evaṃ nirassanto ca ādiyanto ca anavaṭṭhitacittattā asantehipi guṇadosehi attano vā parassa vā yasāyasaṃ uppādeyya.

[03] 793^b^.^eb^ yo panāyaṃ sabbadiṭṭhigatādidosadhunanāya paññāya samannāgatattā dhono, tassa ^b^dhonassa hi...pe0... anūpayo so^eb^. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? dhonadhammasamannāgamā ^b^dhonassa^eb^ dhutasabbapāpassa arahato ^b^katthaci loke^eb^ tesu tesu ^b^bhavesu pakappitā diṭṭhi natthi,^eb^ so tassā diṭṭhiyā abhāvena, yāya ca attanā kataṃ pāpakammaṃ paṭicchādentā titthiyā māyāya mānena vā etaṃ agatiṃ gacchanti, tampi ^b^māyañca mānañca pahāya dhono^eb^ rāgādīnaṃ dosānaṃ ^b^kena gaccheyya,^eb^ diṭṭhadhamme samparāye vā nirayādīsu gativisesesu kena saṅkhaṃ gaccheyya, ^b^anūpayo so,^eb^ so hi taṇhādiṭṭhiupayānaṃ dvinnaṃ abhāvena anūpayoti.

[03] 794^b^.^eb^ yo pana tesaṃ ^a^P2.0523^ea^ dvinnaṃ bhāvena upayo hoti, so ^b^upayo hi...pe0... diṭṭhimidheva sabba^eb^nti. tattha ^b^upayo^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhinissito. ^b^dhammesu upeti vāda^eb^nti ``ratto''ti vā ``duṭṭho''ti vā evaṃ tesu ^a^M2.0239^ea^ tesu dhammesu upeti vādaṃ. ^b^anūpayaṃ kena kathaṃ vadeyyā^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhipahānena anūpayaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ kena rāgena vā dosena vā kathaṃ ``ratto''ti vā ``duṭṭho''ti vā vadeyya, evaṃ anupavajjo ca so kiṃ titthiyā viya katapaṭicchādako bhavissatīti adhippāyo. ^b^attā nirattā na hi tassa atthī^eb^ti tassa hi attadiṭṭhi vā ucchedadiṭṭhi vā natthi, gahaṇaṃ muñcanaṃ vāpi attanirattasaññitaṃ natthi. kiṃkāraṇā natthīti ce? ^b^adhosi so diṭṭhimidheva sabbaṃ,^eb^ yasmā so idheva attabhāve ñāṇavātena sabbaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ adhosi, pajahi, vinodesīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. taṃ sutvā rājā attamano bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā pakkāmīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya duṭṭhaṭṭhakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 795^b^.^eb^ ^b^passāmi^eb^ ^a^V2.0218^ea^ ^b^suddha^eb^nti suddhaṭṭhakasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? atīte kira kassapassa bhagavato kāle bārāṇasivāsī aññataro kuṭumbiko pañcahi sakaṭasatehi paccantajanapadaṃ agamāsi bhaṇḍaggahaṇatthaṃ. tattha vanacarakena saddhiṃ mittaṃ katvā tassa paṇṇākāraṃ datvā pucchi -- ``kacci, te samma, candanasāraṃ diṭṭhapubba''nti? ``āma sāmī''ti ca vutte teneva saddhiṃ candanavanaṃ pavisitvā sabbasakaṭāni candanasārassa pūretvā tampi vanacarakaṃ ``yadā, samma, bārāṇasiṃ āgacchasi, tadā candanasāraṃ gahetvā āgaccheyyāsī''ti vatvā bārāṇasiṃyeva agamāsi. athāparena samayena sopi vanacarako candanasāraṃ gahetvā tassa gharaṃ agamāsi. so taṃ disvā sabbaṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye candanasāraṃ pisāpetvā samuggaṃ pūretvā ``gaccha, samma, nhāyitvā āgacchā''ti attano purisena saddhiṃ nhānatitthaṃ ^a^P2.0524^ea^ pesesi. tena ca samayena bārāṇasiyaṃ ussavo hoti. atha bārāṇasivāsino pātova dānaṃ ^a^M2.0240^ea^ datvā sāyaṃ suddhavatthanivatthā mālāgandhādīni gahetvā kassapassa bhagavato mahācetiyaṃ vandituṃ gacchanti. so vanacarako te disvā ``mahājano kuhiṃ gacchatī''ti pucchi. ``vihāraṃ cetiyavandanatthāyā''ti ca sutvā sayampi agamāsi. tattha manusse haritālamanosilādīhi nānappakārehi cetiye pūjaṃ karonte disvā kiñci citraṃ kātuṃ ajānanto taṃ candanaṃ gahetvā mahācetiye suvaṇṇiṭṭhakānaṃ. upari kaṃsapātimattaṃ maṇḍalaṃ akāsi. atha tattha sūriyuggamanavelāyaṃ sūriyarasmiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu. so taṃ disvā pasīdi, patthanañca akāsi ``yattha yattha nibbattāmi, īdisā me rasmiyo ure uṭṭhahantū''ti. so kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsesu nibbatti. tassa ure rasmiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu, candamaṇḍalaṃ viyassa uramaṇḍalaṃ virocati, ``candābho devaputto''tveva ca naṃ sañjāniṃsu.

[03] so tāya sampattiyā chasu devalokesu anulomapaṭilomato ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ khepetvā amhākaṃ bhagavati uppanne sāvatthiyaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti, tathevassa ure candamaṇḍalasadisaṃ rasmimaṇḍalaṃ ahosi. nāmakaraṇadivase cassa maṅgalaṃ katvā brāhmaṇā taṃ maṇḍalaṃ disvā ``dhaññapuññalakkhaṇo ayaṃ kumāro''ti vimhitā ``candābho'' tveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. taṃ vayappattaṃ brāhmaṇā gahetvā alaṅkaritvā rattakañcukaṃ pārupāpetvā rathe āropetvā ``mahābrahmā ^a^V2.0219^ea^ aya''nti pūjetvā ``yo candābhaṃ passati, so yasadhanādīni labhati, samparāyañca saggaṃ gacchatī''ti ugghosentā gāmanigamarājadhānīsu āhiṇḍanti. gatagataṭṭhāne manussā ``esa kira bho ^a^P2.0525^ea^ candābho nāma, yo etaṃ passati, so yasadhanasaggādīni labhatī''ti uparūpari āgacchanti, sakalajambudīpo cali. brāhmaṇā tucchahatthakānaṃ āgatānaṃ na dassenti, sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā gahetvā āgatānameva dassenti. evaṃ candābhaṃ gahetvā anuvicarantā brāhmaṇā kamena sāvatthiṃ anuppattā.

[03] tena ca samayena bhagavā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena sāvatthiṃ āgantvā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane bahujanahitāya dhammaṃ desento. atha candābho sāvatthiṃ patvā samuddapakkhantakunnadī viya apākaṭo ahosi, candābhoti bhaṇantopi natthi. so sāyanhasamaye mahājanakāyaṃ ^a^M2.0241^ea^ mālāgandhādīni ādāya jetavanābhimukhaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā ``kuhiṃ gacchathā''ti pucchi. ``buddho loke uppanno, so bahujanahitāya dhammaṃ deseti, taṃ sotuṃ jetavanaṃ gacchāmā''ti ca tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā sopi brāhmaṇagaṇaparivuto tattheva agamāsi. bhagavā ca tasmiṃ samaye dhammasabhāyaṃ varabuddhāsane nisinnova hoti. candābho bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamma madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi, tāvadeva cassa so āloko antarahito. buddhālokassa hi samīpe asītihatthabbhantare añño āloko nābhibhoti. so ``āloko me naṭṭho''ti nisīditvāva uṭṭhāsi, uṭṭhahitvā ca gantumāraddho. atha naṃ aññataro puriso āha -- ``kiṃ bho candābha, samaṇassa gotamassa bhīto gacchasī''ti. nāhaṃ bhīto gacchāmi, apica me imassa tejena āloko na sampajjatīti punadeva bhagavato purato nisīditvā pādatalā paṭṭhāya yāva kesaggā rūparaṃsilakkhaṇādisampattiṃ disvā ``mahesakkho samaṇo gotamo, mama ure appamattako āloko uṭṭhito, tāvatakenapi maṃ gahetvā brāhmaṇā sakalajambudīpaṃ vicaranti. evaṃ varalakkhaṇasampattisamannāgatassa samaṇassa gotamassa neva māno uppanno, addhā ayaṃ anomaguṇasamannāgato bhavissati satthā devamanussāna''nti ativiya pasannacitto bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ^a^P2.0526^ea^ pabbajjaṃ yāci. bhagavā aññataraṃ theraṃ āṇāpesi -- ``pabbājehi na''nti. so taṃ pabbājetvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi. so vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā na cireneva arahattaṃ patvā ``candābhatthero''ti vissuto ahosi. taṃ ārabbha bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ ``kiṃ nu kho, āvuso, ye candābhaṃ addasaṃsu. te yasaṃ vā dhanaṃ vā labhiṃsu, saggaṃ vā gacchiṃsu, visuddhiṃ vā pāpuṇiṃsu tena cakkhudvārikarūpadassanenā''ti. bhagavā tassaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ imaṃ suttamabhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0220^ea^ paṭhamagāthāya tāvattho -- na, bhikkhave, evarūpena dassanena suddhi hoti. apica kho kilesamalinattā asuddhaṃ, kilesarogānaṃ avigamā sarogameva candābhaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ aññaṃ vā evarūpaṃ disvā diṭṭhigatiko bālo abhijānāti ^b^``passāmi suddhaṃ paramaṃ arogaṃ,^eb^ tena ca diṭṭhisaṅkhātena dassanena ^b^saṃsuddhi narassa hotī''^eb^ti, so evaṃ abhijānanto taṃ dassanaṃ ^b^``parama''nti ñatvā^eb^ tasmiṃ dassane ^b^suddhānupassī^eb^ samāno ^a^M2.0242^ea^ taṃ dassanaṃ ``maggañāṇa''nti ^b^pacceti^eb^. taṃ pana maggañāṇaṃ na hoti. tenāha -- ^b^``diṭṭhena ce suddhī''^eb^ti dutiyagāthaṃ.

[03] 796^b^.^eb^ tassattho -- tena rūpadassanasaṅkhātena ^b^diṭṭhena^eb^ yadi kilesa^b^suddhi narassa hoti^eb^. tena vā ^b^ñāṇena so^eb^ yadi jātiādi^b^dukkhaṃ pajahāti^eb^. evaṃ sante ariyamaggato ^b^aññena^eb^ asuddhimaggeneva ^b^so sujjhati,^eb^ rāgādīhi upadhīhi saupadhiko eva samāno sujjhatīti āpannaṃ hoti, na ca evaṃvidho sujjhati. tasmā ^b^diṭṭhī hi naṃ pāva tathā vadānaṃ,^eb^ sā naṃ diṭṭhiyeva ``micchādiṭṭhiko aya''nti katheti diṭṭhianurūpaṃ ``sassato loko''tiādinā nayena tathā tathā vadanti.

[03] 797^b^.^eb^ ^b^na brāhmaṇo^eb^ti tatiyagāthā. tassattho -- yo pana bāhitapāpattā ^b^brāhmaṇo^eb^ hoti, so maggena adhigatāsavakkhayo khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo ariyamaggañāṇato aññena abhimaṅgalasammatarūpasaṅkhāte ^a^P2.0527^ea^ ^b^diṭṭhe^eb^ tathāvidhasaddasaṅkhāte ^b^sute^eb^ avītikkamasaṅkhāte ^b^sīle^eb^ hatthivatādibhede ^b^vate^eb^ pathaviādibhede ^b^mute^eb^ ca uppannena micchāñāṇena ^b^suddhiṃ na āha^eb^. sesamassa brāhmaṇassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. so hi tedhātuka^b^puññe^eb^ sabbasmiñca ^b^pāpe anūpalitto,^eb^ tassa pahīnattā attadiṭṭhiyā yassa kassaci vā gahaṇassa pahīnattā ^b^attañjaho,^eb^ puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ akaraṇato ^b^nayidha pakubbamāno^eb^ti vuccati. tasmā naṃ evaṃ pasaṃsanto āha. sabbasseva cassa purimapādena sambandho veditabbo -- puññe ca pāpe ca anūpalitto, attañjaho nayidha pakubbamāno, na brāhmaṇo aññato suddhimāhāti.

[03] 798^b^.^eb^ evaṃ na brāhmaṇo aññato suddhimāhāti vatvā idāni ye diṭṭhigatikā aññato suddhiṃ bruvanti, tesaṃ tassā diṭṭhiyā anibbāhakabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^``purimaṃ pahāyā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- te hi aññato suddhivādā samānāpi yassā diṭṭhiyā appahīnattā gahaṇamuñcanaṃ hoti. tāya ^b^purimaṃ^eb^ satthārādiṃ ^b^pahāya aparaṃ^eb^ nissitā ^b^ejā^eb^saṅkhātāya taṇhāya ^b^anugatā^eb^ abhibhūtā rāgādibhedaṃ ^b^na taranti saṅgaṃ,^eb^ tañca atarantā taṃ taṃ dhammaṃ uggaṇhanti ca ^b^nirassajanti^eb^ ca makkaṭova ^b^sākha^eb^nti.

[03] 799^b^.^eb^ pañcamagāthāya ^a^V2.0221^ea^ ^a^M2.0243^ea^ sambandho -- yo ca so ``diṭṭhī hi naṃ pāva tathā vadāna''nti vutto, so sayaṃ samādāyāti. tattha ^b^saya^eb^nti sāmaṃ. ^b^samādāyā^eb^ti gahetvā. ^b^vatānī^eb^ti hatthivatādīni. ^b^uccāvaca^eb^nti aparāparaṃ hīnapaṇītaṃ vā satthārato satthārādiṃ. ^b^saññasatto^eb^ti kāmasaññādīsu laggo. ^b^vidvā ca vedehi samecca dhamma^eb^nti paramatthavidvā ca arahā catūhi maggañāṇavedehi catusaccadhammaṃ abhisameccāti. sesaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03] 800^b^.^eb^ ^b^sa sabbadhammesu visenibhūto, yaṃ^eb^ ^a^P2.0528^ea^ ^b^kiñci diṭṭhaṃva sutaṃ mutaṃ vā^eb^ti so bhūripañño khīṇāsavo yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃ vā sutaṃ vā mutaṃ vā tesu sabbadhammesu mārasenaṃ vināsetvā ṭhitabhāvena visenibhūto. ^b^tamevadassi^eb^nti taṃ evaṃ visuddhadassiṃ.^b^ vivaṭaṃ caranta^eb^nti^b^ ^eb^taṇhacchadanādivigamena vivaṭaṃ hutvā carantaṃ. ^b^kenīdha lokasmiṃ vikappayeyyā^eb^ti kena idha loke taṇhākappena vā diṭṭhikappena vā koci vikappeyya, tesaṃ vā pahīnattā rāgādinā pubbe vuttenāti.

[03] 801^b^.^eb^ ^b^na kappayantī^eb^ti gāthāya sambandho attho ca -- kiñca bhiyyo? te hi tādisā santo dvinnaṃ kappānaṃ purekkhārānañca kenaci ^b^na kappayanti na purekkharonti,^eb^ paramatthāccantasuddhiadhigatattā anaccantasuddhiṃyeva akiriyasassatadiṭṭhiṃ ^b^accanta suddhīti na te vadanti. ādānaganthaṃ gathitaṃ visajjā^eb^ti catubbidhampi rūpādīnaṃ ādāyakattā ādānaganthaṃ attano cittasantāne gathitaṃ baddhaṃ ariyamaggasatthena visajja chinditvā. sesaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03] 802^b^.^eb^ ^b^sīmātigo^eb^ti gāthā ekapuggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya vuttā. pubbasadiso eva panassā sambandho, so evaṃ atthavaṇṇanāya saddhiṃ veditabbo -- kiñca bhiyyo so īdiso bhūripañño catunnaṃ kilesasīmānaṃ atītattā ^b^sīmātigo^eb^ bāhitapāpattā ca ^b^brāhmaṇo,^eb^ itthambhūtassa ca ^b^tassa natthi^eb^ paracittapubbenivāsañāṇehi ^b^ñatvā vā^eb^ maṃsacakkhudibbacakkhūhi ^b^disvā vā^eb^ kiñci ^b^samuggahītaṃ,^eb^ abhiniviṭṭhanti vuttaṃ hoti. so ca kāmarāgābhāvato ^b^na rāgarāgī,^eb^ rūpārūparāgābhāvato ^b^na virāgaratto^eb^ ^a^M2.0244^ea^. yato evaṃvidhassa ``idaṃ para''nti kiñci ^b^idha uggahitaṃ natthī^eb^ti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya suddhaṭṭhakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 803^b^.^eb^ ^b^paramanti^eb^ ^a^V2.0222^ea^ ^a^P2.0529^ea^ ^b^diṭṭhīsū^eb^ti paramaṭṭhakasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? bhagavati kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante nānātitthiyā sannipatitvā attano attano diṭṭhiṃ dīpentā ``idaṃ paramaṃ, idaṃ parama''nti kalahaṃ katvā rañño ārocesuṃ. rājā sambahule jaccandhe sannipātāpetvā ``imesaṃ hatthiṃ dassethā''ti āṇāpesi. rājapurisā andhe sannipātāpetvā hatthiṃ purato sayāpetvā ``passathā''ti āhaṃsu. te hatthissa ekamekaṃ aṅgaṃ parāmasiṃsu. tato raññā ``kīdiso, bhaṇe, hatthī''ti puṭṭho yo soṇḍaṃ parāmasi, so ``seyyathāpi, mahārāja, naṅgalīsā''ti bhaṇi. ye dantādīni parāmasiṃsu, te itaraṃ ``mā bho rañño purato musā bhaṇī''ti paribhāsitvā ``seyyathāpi, mahārāja, bhittikhilo''tiādīni āhaṃsu. rājā taṃ sabbaṃ sutvā ``īdiso tumhākaṃ samayo''ti titthiye uyyojesi. aññataro piṇḍacāriko taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā bhagavato ārocesi. bhagavā tassaṃ aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ bhikkhū āmantetvā ``yathā, bhikkhave, jaccandhā hatthiṃ ajānantā taṃ taṃ aṅgaṃ parāmasitvā vivadiṃsu, evaṃ titthiyā vimokkhantikadhammaṃ ajānantā taṃ taṃ diṭṭhiṃ parāmasitvā vivadantī''ti vatvā dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ suttamabhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^parama^eb^nti ^b^diṭṭhīsu paribbasāno^eb^ti ``idaṃ parama''nti gahetvā sakāya sakāya diṭṭhiyā vasamāno. ^b^yaduttari kurute^eb^ti yaṃ attano satthārādiṃ seṭṭhaṃ karoti. ^b^hīnāti aññe tato sabbamāhā^eb^ti taṃ attano satthārādiṃ ṭhapetvā tato aññe sabbe ``hīnā ime''ti āha. ^b^tasmā vivādāni avītivatto^eb^ti tena kāraṇena so diṭṭhikalahe avītivattova hoti.

[03] 804^b^.^eb^ dutiyagāthāya ^a^M2.0245^ea^ attho -- evaṃ avītivatto ca yaṃ ^b^diṭṭhe sute sīlavate mute^eb^ti etesu vatthūsu uppannadiṭṭhisaṅkhāte ^b^attani^eb^ pubbe vuttappakāraṃ ^b^ānisaṃsaṃ passati^eb^. tadeva so tattha sakāya diṭṭhiyā ānisaṃsaṃ ``idaṃ seṭṭha''nti ^a^P2.0530^ea^ abhinivisitvā ^b^aññaṃ sabbaṃ^eb^ parasatthārādikaṃ ^b^nihīnato passati^eb^.

[03] 805^b^.^eb^ tatiyagāthāya attho -- evaṃ passato cassa ^b^yaṃ^eb^ attano satthārādiṃ ^b^nissito aññaṃ^eb^ parasatthārādiṃ ^b^hīnaṃ passati taṃ^eb^ pana dassanaṃ ^b^ganthameva kusalā vadanti,^eb^ bandhananti vuttaṃ hoti ^a^V2.0223^ea^. yasmā etadeva, ^b^tasmā hi diṭṭhaṃva sutaṃ mutaṃ vā sīlabbataṃ bhikkhu na nissayeyya,^eb^ nābhiniveseyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 806^b^.^eb^ catutthagāthāya attho -- na kevalaṃ diṭṭhasutādiṃ na nissayeyya, apica kho pana asañjātaṃ uparūpari ^b^diṭṭhimpi lokasmiṃ na kappayeyya,^eb^ na janeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. kīdisaṃ? ^b^ñāṇena vā sīlavatena vāpi,^eb^ samāpattiñāṇādinā ñāṇena vā sīlavatena vā yā kappiyati, etaṃ diṭṭhiṃ na kappeyya. na kevalañca diṭṭhiṃ na kappayeyya, apica kho pana mānenapi jātiādīhi vatthūhi ^b^samoti attānamanūpaneyya, hīno na maññetha visesi vāpī^eb^ti.

[03] 807^b^.^eb^ pañcamagāthāya attho -- evañhi diṭṭhiṃ akappento amaññamāno ca ^b^attaṃ pahāya anupādiyāno^eb^ idha vā yaṃ pubbe gahitaṃ, taṃ pahāya aparaṃ aggaṇhanto tasmimpi vuttappakāre ^b^ñāṇe^eb^ duvidhaṃ ^b^nissayaṃ no karoti^eb^. akaronto ca ^b^sa ve viyattesu^eb^ nānādiṭṭhivasena bhinnesu sattesu ^b^na vaggasārī^eb^ chandādivasena agacchanadhammo hutvā dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhīsu ^b^kiñcipi diṭṭhiṃ na pacceti,^eb^ na paccāgacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 808-10^b^.^eb^ idāni yo so imāya gāthāya vutto khīṇāsavo, tassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ ^b^``yassūbhayante''^eb^tiādikā tisso gāthāyo āha. tattha ^b^ubhayante^eb^ti pubbe vuttaphassādibhede. ^b^paṇidhī^eb^ti taṇhā. ^b^bhavābhavāyā^eb^ti punappunabhavāya. ^b^idha vā huraṃ vā^eb^ti sakattabhāvādibhede idha vā parattabhāvādibhede parattha vā. ^b^diṭṭhe vā^eb^ti diṭṭhasuddhiyā vā. esa nayo ^a^M2.0246^ea^ sutādīsu. ^b^saññā^eb^ti saññāsamuṭṭhāpikā diṭṭhi. ^b^dhammāpi^eb^ ^a^P2.0531^ea^ ^b^tesaṃ na paṭicchitāse^eb^ti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatadhammāpi tesaṃ ``idameva saccaṃ moghamañña''nti evaṃ na paṭicchitā. ^b^pāraṅgato na pacceti tādī^eb^ti nibbānapāraṃ gato tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna nāgacchati, pañcahi ca ākārehi tādī hotīti. sesaṃ pākaṭamevāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya paramaṭṭhakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 811^b^.^eb^ ^b^appaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0224^ea^ ^b^vata jīvita^eb^nti jarāsuttaṃ. kā uppatti? ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ vassaṃ vasitvā yāni tāni buddhānaṃ sarīrārogyasampādanaṃ anuppannasikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ veneyyadamanaṃ tathārūpāya aṭṭhuppattiyā jātakādikathanantiādīni janapadacārikānimittāni, tāni samavekkhitvā janapadacārikaṃ pakkāmi. anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno sāyaṃ sāketaṃ anuppatto añjanavanaṃ pāvisi. sāketavāsino sutvā ``akālo idāni bhagavantaṃ dassanāyā''ti vibhātāya rattiyā mālāgandhādīni gahetvā bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā pūjanavandanasammodanādīni katvā parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu yāva bhagavato gāmappavesanavelā, atha bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto piṇḍāya pāvisi. taṃ aññataro sāketako brāhmaṇamahāsālo nagarā nikkhanto nagaradvāre addasa. disvā puttasinehaṃ uppādetvā ``ciradiṭṭhosi, putta, mayā''ti paridevayamāno abhimukho agamāsi. bhagavā bhikkhū saññāpesi -- ``ayaṃ, bhikkhave, brāhmaṇo yaṃ icchati, taṃ karotu, na vāretabbo''ti.

[01] brāhmaṇopi vacchagiddhinīva gāvī āgantvā bhagavato ^a^P2.0532^ea^ kāyaṃ purato ca pacchato ca dakkhiṇato ca vāmato cāti samantā āliṅgi ``ciradiṭṭhosi, putta, ciraṃ vinā ahosī''ti bhaṇanto. yadi pana so tathā kātuṃ na labheyya, hadayaṃ phāletvā mareyya. so bhagavantaṃ avoca -- ``bhagavā tumhehi saddhiṃ āgatabhikkhūnaṃ ahameva bhikkhaṃ dātuṃ samattho, mameva ^a^M2.0247^ea^ anuggahaṃ karothā''ti. adhivāsesi bhagavā tuṇhībhāvena. brāhmaṇo bhagavato pattaṃ gahetvā purato gacchanto brāhmaṇiyā pesesi -- ``putto me āgato, āsanaṃ paññāpetabba''nti. sā tathā katvā āgamanaṃ passantī ṭhitā bhagavantaṃ antaravīthiyaṃyeva disvā puttasinehaṃ uppādetvā ``ciradiṭṭhosi, putta, mayā''ti pādesu gahetvā roditvā gharaṃ atinetvā sakkaccaṃ bhojesi. bhuttāvino brāhmaṇo pattaṃ apanāmesi. bhagavā tesaṃ sappāyaṃ viditvā dhammaṃ desesi, desanāpariyosāne ubhopi sotāpannā ahesuṃ. atha bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu -- ``yāva, bhante, bhagavā imaṃ nagaraṃ upanissāya viharati, amhākaṃyeva ghare bhikkhā gahetabbā''ti. bhagavā ``na buddhā evaṃ ekaṃ nibaddhaṭṭhānaṃyeva gacchantī''ti paṭikkhipi. te āhaṃsu -- ``tena hi, bhante, bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya caritvāpi tumhe idheva bhattakiccaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desetvā vihāraṃ gacchathā''ti. bhagavā tesaṃ anuggahatthāya ^a^V2.0225^ea^ tathā akāsi. manussā brāhmaṇañca brāhmaṇiñca ``buddhapitā buddhamātā'' tveva vohariṃsu. tampi kulaṃ ``buddhakula''nti nāmaṃ labhi.

[01] ānandatthero bhagavantaṃ pucchi -- ``ahaṃ bhagavato mātāpitaro jānāmi, ime pana kasmā vadanti `ahaṃ buddhamātā ahaṃ buddhapitā'''ti. bhagavā āha -- ``nirantaraṃ me, ānanda, brāhmaṇī ca brāhmaṇo ca pañca jātisatāni mātāpitaro ahesuṃ, pañca jātisatāni mātāpitūnaṃ jeṭṭhakā, pañca jātisatāni kaniṭṭhakā. te pubbasineheneva kathentī''ti imañca gāthamabhāsi --
[21] ``pubbeva ^a^P2.0533^ea^ sannivāsena, paccuppannahitena vā.
[22] evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃva yathodake''ti.. (jā0 1.2.174).

[03] tato bhagavā sākete yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā puna cārikaṃ caramāno sāvatthimeva agamāsi. sopi brāhmaṇo ca brāhmaṇī ca bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā patirūpaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sesamagge pāpuṇitvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyiṃsu. nagare brāhmaṇā sannipatiṃsu ``amhākaṃ ^a^M2.0248^ea^ ñātake sakkarissāmā''ti. sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmino upāsakāpi sannipatiṃsu upāsikāyo ca ``amhākaṃ sahadhammike sakkarissāmā''ti. te sabbepi kambalakūṭāgāraṃ āropetvā mālāgandhādīhi pūjentā nagarā nikkhāmesuṃ.

[03] bhagavāpi taṃ divasaṃ paccūsasamaye buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento tesaṃ parinibbānabhāvaṃ ñatvā ``tattha mayi gate dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bahujanassa dhammābhisamayo bhavissatī''ti ñatvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthito āgantvā āḷāhanameva pāvisi. manussā disvā ``mātāpitūnaṃ sarīrakiccaṃ kātukāmo bhagavā āgato''ti vanditvā aṭṭhaṃsu. nāgarāpi kūṭāgāraṃ pūjentā āḷāhanaṃ ānetvā bhagavantaṃ pucchiṃsu -- ``gahaṭṭhāriyasāvakā kathaṃ pūjetabbā''ti. bhagavā ``yathā asekkhā pūjiyanti, tathā pūjetabbā ime''ti adhippāyena tesaṃ asekkhamunibhāvaṃ dīpento imaṃ gāthamāha --
[21] ``ahiṃsakā ye munayo, niccaṃ kāyena saṃvutā.
[22] te yanti accutaṃ ṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare''ti.. (dha0 pa0 225).
[03] tañca parisaṃ oloketvā taṅkhaṇānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desento imaṃ suttamabhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0226^ea^ ^b^appaṃ vata jīvitaṃ ida^eb^nti ``idaṃ vata manussānaṃ jīvitaṃ appaṃ parittaṃ ṭhitiparittatāya sarasaparittatāyā''ti sallasuttepi vuttanayametaṃ. ^b^oraṃ vassasatāpi miyyatī^eb^ti vassasatā oraṃ kalalādikālepi miyyati. ^b^aticcā^eb^ti vassasataṃ atikkamitvā. ^b^jarasāpi miyyatī^eb^ti jarāyapi miyyati.

[03] 812-6^b^.^eb^ ^b^mamāyite^eb^ti mamāyitavatthukāraṇā. ^b^vinābhāvasantamevida^eb^nti ^a^P2.0534^ea^ santavinābhāvaṃ vijjamānavinābhāvameva idaṃ, na sakkā avinābhāvena bhavitunti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^māmako^eb^ti mama upāsako bhikkhu vāti saṅkhaṃ gato, buddhādīni vā vatthūni mamāyamāno. ^b^saṅgata^eb^nti samāgataṃ diṭṭhapubbaṃ vā. ^b^piyāyita^eb^nti piyaṃ kataṃ. ^b^nāmaṃyevāvasissati akkheyya^eb^nti sabbaṃ rūpādidhammajātaṃ pahīyati, nāmamattameva tu avasissati ``buddharakkhito, dhammarakkhito''ti evaṃ saṅkhātuṃ kathetuṃ. ^b^munayo^eb^ti khīṇāsavamunayo. ^b^khemadassino^eb^ti nibbānadassino.

[03] 817^b^.^eb^ sattamagāthā ^a^M2.0249^ea^ evaṃ maraṇabbhāhate loke anurūpapaṭipattidassanatthaṃ vuttā. tattha ^b^patilīnacarassā^eb^ti tato tato patilīnaṃ cittaṃ katvā carantassa. ^b^bhikkhuno^eb^ti kalyāṇaputhujjanassa sekkhassa vā. ^b^sāmaggiyamāhu tassa^eb^ ^b^taṃ,^eb^ ^b^yo attānaṃ bhavane na dassaye^eb^ti tassetaṃ patirūpamāhu, yo evaṃpaṭipanno nirayādibhede bhavane attānaṃ na dasseyya. evañhi so imamhā maraṇā mucceyyāti adhippāyo.

[03] 818-20^b^.^eb^ idāni yo ``attānaṃ bhavane na dassaye''ti evaṃ khīṇāsavo vibhāvito, tassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ ito parā tisso gāthāyo āha. tattha ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti dvādasasu āyatanesu. ^b^yadidaṃ diṭṭhasutaṃ mutesu vā^eb^ti ettha pana yadidaṃ diṭṭhasutaṃ, ettha vā mutesu vā dhammesu evaṃ muni na upalimpatīti evaṃ sambandho veditabbo. ^b^dhono na hi tena maññati, yadidaṃ diṭṭhasutaṃ mutesu vā^eb^ti atrāpi yadidaṃ diṭṭhasuttaṃ, tena vatthunā na maññati, mutesu vā dhammesu na maññatīti evameva sambandho veditabbo. ^b^na hi so rajjati no virajjatī^eb^ti. bālaputhujjanā viya na rajjati, kalyāṇaputhujjanasekkhā viya na virajjati, rāgassa pana khīṇattā ``virāgo''tveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭamevāti. desanāpariyosāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya jarāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 821^b^.^eb^ ^b^methunamanuyuttassā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0227^ea^ ^a^P2.0535^ea^ tissametteyyasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? bhagavati kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante tissametteyyā nāma dve sahāyā sāvatthiṃ agamaṃsu. te sāyanhasamayaṃ mahājanaṃ jetavanābhimukhaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā ``kuhiṃ gacchathā''ti pucchiṃsu. tato tehi ``buddho loke uppanno, bahujanahitāya dhammaṃ deseti, taṃ sotuṃ jetavanaṃ gacchāmā''ti vutte ^a^M2.0250^ea^ ``mayampi sossāmā''ti agamaṃsu. te avañjhadhammadesakassa bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā parisantare nisinnāva cintesuṃ -- ``na sakkā agāramajjhe ṭhitenāyaṃ dhammo paripūretu''nti. atha pakkante mahājane bhagavantaṃ pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu. bhagavā ``ime pabbājehī''ti aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āṇāpesi. so te pabbājetvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā araññavāsaṃ gantumāraddho. metteyyo tissaṃ āha -- ``āvuso, upajjhāyo araññaṃ gacchati, mayampi gacchāmā''ti. tisso ``alaṃ āvuso, bhagavato dassanaṃ dhammassavanañca ahaṃ pihemi, gaccha tva''nti vatvā na agamāsi. metteyyo upajjhāyena saha gantvā araññe samaṇadhammaṃ karonto na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi saddhiṃ ācariyupajjhāyehi. tissassāpi jeṭṭhabhātā byādhinā kālamakāsi. so taṃ sutvā attano gāmaṃ agamāsi, tatra naṃ ñātakā palobhetvā uppabbājesuṃ. metteyyopi ācariyupajjhāyehi saddhiṃ sāvatthiṃ āgato. atha bhagavā vutthavasso janapadacārikaṃ caramāno anupubbena taṃ gāmaṃ pāpuṇi. tattha metteyyo bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ``imasmiṃ, bhante, gāme mama gihisahāyo atthi, muhuttaṃ tāva āgametha anukampaṃ upādāyā''ti vatvā gāmaṃ pavisitvā taṃ bhagavato santikaṃ ānetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito tassatthāya ādigāthāya bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ ^a^P2.0536^ea^ pucchi. tassa bhagavā byākaronto avasesagāthāyo abhāsi. ayamassa suttassa uppatti.

[03] tattha ^b^methunamanuyuttassā^eb^ti methunadhammasamāyuttassa. ^b^itī^eb^ti evamāha. ^b^āyasmā^eb^ti piyavacanametaṃ, ^b^tisso^eb^ti nāmaṃ tassa therassa. so hi tissoti nāmena. ^b^metteyyo^eb^ti gottaṃ, gottavaseneva cesa pākaṭo ahosi. tasmā aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ vuttaṃ ``tissametteyyā nāma dve sahāyā''ti. ^b^vighāta^eb^nti upaghātaṃ. ^b^brūhī^eb^ti ācikkha. ^b^mārisā^eb^ti piyavacanametaṃ, nidukkhāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^sutvāna tava sāsana^eb^nti tava vacanaṃ sutvā. ^b^viveke sikkhissāmase^eb^ti sahāyaṃ ārabbha dhammadesanaṃ yācanto bhaṇati. so pana sikkhitasikkhoyeva.

[03] 822^b^.^eb^ ^b^mussate^eb^ ^a^V2.0228^ea^ ^b^vāpi sāsana^eb^nti pariyattipaṭipattito duvidhampi sāsanaṃ nassati. ^b^vāpī^eb^ti padapūraṇamattaṃ. ^b^etaṃ tasmiṃ anāriya^eb^nti tasmiṃ puggale etaṃ anariyaṃ, yadidaṃ micchāpaṭipadā.

[03] 823^b^.^eb^ ^b^eko^eb^ ^a^M2.0251^ea^ ^b^pubbe caritvānā^eb^ti pabbajjāsaṅkhātena vā gaṇavossaggaṭṭhena vā pubbe eko viharitvā. ^b^yānaṃ bhantaṃva taṃ loke, hīnamāhu puthujjana^eb^nti taṃ vibbhantakaṃ puggalaṃ yathā hatthiyānādiyānaṃ adantaṃ visamaṃ ārohati, ārohakampi bhañjati, papātepi papatati. evaṃ kāyaduccaritādivisamārohanena narakādīsu, atthabhañjanena jātipapātādīsu papatanena ca yānaṃ bhantaṃva āhu hīnaṃ puthujjanañca āhūti.

[03] 824-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaso kitti cā^eb^ti lābhasakkāro pasaṃsā ca. ^b^pubbe^eb^ti pabbajitabhāve. ^b^hāyate vāpi tassa sā^eb^ti tassa vibbhantakassa sato so ca yaso sā ca kitti hāyati. ^b^etampi disvā^eb^ti etampi pubbe yasakittīnaṃ bhāvaṃ pacchā ca hāniṃ disvā. ^b^sikkhetha methunaṃ vippahātave^eb^ti tisso sikkhā sikkhetha. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^methunaṃ vippahātave,^eb^ methunappahānatthāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. yo hi methunaṃ na vippajahati, ^b^saṅkappehi...pe0... tathāvidho^eb^ ^a^P2.0537^ea^. tattha ^b^pareto^eb^ti samannāgato. ^b^paresaṃ nigghosa^eb^nti upajjhāyādīnaṃ nindāvacanaṃ. ^b^maṅku hotī^eb^ti dummano hoti.

[03] 826^b^.^eb^ ito parā gāthā pākaṭasambandhā eva. tāsu ^b^satthānī^eb^ti kāyaduccaritādīni. tāni hi attano paresañca chedanaṭṭhena ``satthānī''ti vuccanti. tesu cāyaṃ visesato codito musāvacanasatthāneva karoti -- ``iminā kāraṇenāhaṃ vibbhanto''ti bhaṇanto. tenevāha -- ^b^``esa khvassa mahāgedho, mosavajjaṃ pagāhatī''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^esa khvassā^eb^ti esa kho assa. ^b^mahāgedho^eb^ti mahābandhanaṃ. katamoti ce? yadidaṃ mosavajjaṃ pagāhati, svāssa musāvādajjhogāho mahāgedhoti veditabbo.
[03] 827^b^.^eb^ ^b^mandova parikissatī^eb^ti pāṇavadhādīni karonto tatonidānañca dukkhamanubhonto bhogapariyesanarakkhanāni ca karonto momūho viya parikilissati.

[03] 828-9^b^.^eb^ ^b^``etamādīnavaṃ ñatvā, muni pubbāpare idhā''^eb^ti etaṃ ``yaso kitti ca yā pubbe, hāyatevāpi tassa sā''ti ito pabhuti vutte pubbāpare idha imasmiṃ sāsane pubbato apare samaṇabhāvato vibbhantakabhāve ^a^M2.0252^ea^ ādīnavaṃ muni ñatvā. ^b^etadariyānamuttama^eb^nti yadidaṃ vivekacariyā ^a^V2.0229^ea^, etaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ uttamaṃ, tasmā vivekaññeva sikkhethāti adhippāyo. ^b^na tena seṭṭho maññethā^eb^ti tena ca vivekena na attānaṃ ``seṭṭho aha''nti maññeyya, tena thaddho na bhaveyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 830^b^.^eb^ ^b^rittassā^eb^ti vivittassa kāyaduccaritādīhi virahitassa. ^b^oghatiṇṇassa pihayanti, kāmesu gadhitā pajā^eb^ti vatthukāmesu laggā sattā tassa caturoghatiṇṇassa pihayanti iṇāyikā viya āṇaṇyassāti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. desanāpariyosāne tisso sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā pacchā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ sacchākāsīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya tissametteyyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 831^b^.^eb^ ^b^idheva^eb^ ^a^V2.0230^ea^ ^a^P2.0538^ea^ ^b^suddhī^eb^ti pasūrasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? bhagavati kira sāvatthiyaṃ viharante pasūro nāma paribbājako mahāvādī, so ``ahamasmi sakalajambudīpe vādena aggo, tasmā yathā jambudīpassa jambupaññāṇaṃ, evaṃ mamāpi bhavituṃ arahatī''ti jambusākhaṃ dhajaṃ katvā sakalajambudīpe paṭivādaṃ anāsādento anupubbena sāvatthiṃ āgantvā nagaradvāre vālikatthalaṃ katvā tattha sākhaṃ ussāpetvā ``yo mayā saddhiṃ vādaṃ kātuṃ samattho, so imaṃ sākhaṃ bhañjatū''ti vatvā nagaraṃ pāvisi. taṃ ṭhānaṃ mahājano parivāretvā aṭṭhāsi. tena ca samayena āyasmā sāriputto bhattakiccaṃ katvā sāvatthito nikkhamati. so taṃ disvā sambahule gāmadārake pucchi -- ``kiṃ etaṃ dārakā''ti, te sabbaṃ ācikkhiṃsu. ``tena hi naṃ tumhe uddharitvā pādehi bhañjatha, `vādatthiko vihāraṃ āgacchatū'ti ca bhaṇathā''ti vatvā pakkāmi.

[03] paribbājako ^a^M2.0253^ea^ piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco āgantvā uddharitvā bhaggaṃ sākhaṃ disvā ``kenidaṃ kārita''nti pucchi. ``buddhasāvakena sāriputtenā''ti ca vutte pamudito hutvā ``ajja mama jayaṃ samaṇassa ca parājayaṃ paṇḍitā passantū''ti pañhavīmaṃsake kāraṇike ānetuṃ sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā vīthisiṅghāṭakacaccaresu vicaranto ``samaṇassa gotamassa aggasāvakena saha vāde paññāpaṭibhānaṃ sotukāmā bhonto nikkhamantū''ti ugghosesi. ``paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ sossāmā''ti sāsane pasannāpi appasannāpi bahū manussā nikkhamiṃsu. tato pasūro mahājanaparivuto ``evaṃ vutte evaṃ bhaṇissāmī''tiādīni vitakkento vihāraṃ agamāsi. thero ``vihāre uccāsaddamahāsaddo janabyākulañca mā ahosī''ti jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake āsanaṃ paññāpetvā nisīdi.

[03] paribbājako theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``tvaṃ, bho, pabbajita, mayhaṃ jambudhajaṃ bhañjāpesī''ti āha. ``āma paribbājakā''ti ca vutte ``hotu no, bho, kāci kathāpavattī''ti āha. ``hotu paribbājakā''ti ca therena sampaṭicchite ``tvaṃ, samaṇa, puccha, ahaṃ vissajjessāmī''ti ^a^P2.0539^ea^ āha. tato naṃ thero avaca ``kiṃ, paribbājaka, dukkaraṃ pucchā, udāhu ^a^V2.0231^ea^ vissajjana''nti. vissajjanaṃ bho, pabbajita, pucchāya kiṃ dukkaraṃ. taṃ yo hi koci yaṃkiñci pucchatīti. ``tena hi, paribbājaka, tvaṃ puccha, ahaṃ vissajjessāmī''ti evaṃ vutte paribbājako ``sādhurūpo bhikkhu ṭhāne sākhaṃ bhañjāpesī''ti vimhitacitto hutvā theraṃ pucchi -- ``ko purisassa kāmo''ti. ``saṅkapparāgo purisassa kāmo''ti (a0 ni0 6.63) thero āha. so taṃ sutvā there viruddhasaññī hutvā parājayaṃ āropetukāmo āha -- ``citravicitrārammaṇaṃ pana bho, pabbajita, purisassa kāmaṃ na vadesī''ti? ``āma, paribbājaka, na vademī''ti. tato naṃ paribbājako yāva tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ kārāpetvā ``suṇantu bhonto samaṇassa vāde dosa''nti pañhavīmaṃsake ālapitvā āha -- ``bho, pabbajita, tumhākaṃ sabrahmacārino araññe viharantī''ti? ``āma, paribbājaka, viharantī''ti. ``te tattha viharantā kāmavitakkādayo vitakke vitakkentī''ti? ``āma, paribbājaka, puthujjanā sahasā vitakkentī''ti. ``yadi evaṃ tesaṃ samaṇabhāvo kuto? nanu te agārikā kāmabhogino hontī''ti evañca pana vatvā athāparaṃ etadavoca --
[21] ``na ^a^M2.0254^ea^ te ve kāmā yāni citrāni loke,
[27] saṅkapparāgañca vadesi kāmaṃ.
[26] saṅkappayaṃ akusale vitakke,
[22] bhikkhupi te hessati kāmabhogī''ti.. (saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.34).

[03] atha thero paribbājakassa vāde dosaṃ dassento āha -- ``kiṃ, paribbājaka, saṅkapparāgaṃ purisassa kāmaṃ na vadesi, citravicitrārammaṇaṃ vadesī''ti? ``āma, bho, pabbajitā''ti. tato naṃ thero yāva tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ kārāpetvā ``suṇātha, āvuso, paribbājakassa vāde dosa''nti pañhavīmaṃsake ālapitvā āha -- ``āvuso pasūra, tava satthā atthī''ti? ``āma, pabbajita, atthī''ti. ``so cakkhuviññeyyaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ passati saddārammaṇādīni ^a^P2.0540^ea^ vā sevatī''ti? ``āma, pabbajita, sevatī''ti. ``yadi evaṃ tassa satthubhāvo kuto, nanu so agāriko kāmabhogī hotī''ti evañca pana vatvā athāparaṃ etadavoca --
[21] ``te ve kāmā yāni citrāni loke,
[27] saṅkapparāgaṃ na vadesi kāmaṃ.
[26] passanto ^a^V2.0232^ea^ rūpāni manoramāni,
[22] suṇanto saddāni manoramāni..
[21] ``ghāyanto gandhāni manoramāni,
[27] sāyanto rasāni manoramāni.
[26] phusanto phassāni manoramāni,
[22] satthāpi te hessati kāmabhogī''ti..

[03] evaṃ vutte nippaṭibhāno paribbājako ``ayaṃ pabbajito mahāvādī, imassa santike pabbajitvā vādasatthaṃ sikkhissāmī''ti sāvatthiṃ pavisitvā pattacīvaraṃ pariyesitvā jetavanaṃ paviṭṭho tattha lāludāyiṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ kāyūpapannaṃ sarīrākārākappesu samantapāsādikaṃ disvā ``ayaṃ bhikkhu mahāpañño mahāvādī''ti mantvā tassa santike pabbajitvā taṃ vādena niggahetvā saliṅgena taṃyeva titthāyatanaṃ pakkamitvā puna ``samaṇena gotamena saddhiṃ vādaṃ karissāmī''ti sāvatthiyaṃ purimanayeneva ugghosetvā mahājanaparivuto ``evaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ niggahessāmī''tiādīni vadanto ^a^M2.0255^ea^ jetavanaṃ agamāsi. jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake adhivatthā devatā ``ayaṃ abhājanabhūto''ti mukhabandhamassa akāsi. so bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mūgo viya nisīdi. manussā ``idāni pucchissati, idāni pucchissatī''ti tassa mukhaṃ ulloketvā ``vadehi, bho pasūra, vadehi, bho pasūrā''ti uccāsaddamahāsaddā ahesuṃ. atha bhagavā ``kiṃ pasūro vadissatī''ti vatvā tattha sampattaparisāya dhammadesanatthaṃ imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāva ayaṃ saṅkhepo -- ime diṭṭhigatikā attano diṭṭhiṃ sandhāya ^b^idheva suddhī iti vādayanti nāññesu dhammesu visuddhimāhu^eb^. evaṃ sante attano satthārādīni ^a^P2.0541^ea^ ^b^nissitā^eb^ tattheva ``esa vādo subho''ti evaṃ ^b^subhaṃ vadānā^eb^ hutvā ^b^puthū^eb^ samaṇabrāhmaṇā ``sassato loko''tiādīsu ^b^paccekasaccesu niviṭṭhā^eb^.

[03] 832^b^.^eb^ evaṃ niviṭṭhā ca -- ^b^te vādakāmā^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^bālaṃ dahantī mithu aññamañña^eb^nti ``ayaṃ bālo ayaṃ bālo''ti evaṃ dvepi janā aññamaññaṃ bālaṃ dahanti, bālato passanti. ^b^vadanti te aññasitā kathojja^eb^nti te aññamaññaṃ satthārādiṃ nissitā kalahaṃ vadanti. ^b^pasaṃsakāmā kusalā vadānā^eb^ti pasaṃsatthikā ubhopi ``mayaṃ kusalavādā paṇḍitavādā''ti evaṃsaññino hutvā.

[03] 833^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^V2.0233^ea^ vadānesu ca tesu eko niyamato eva -- ^b^yutto kathāya^eb^nti gāthā. tattha ^b^yutto kathāya^eb^nti vivādakathāya ussukko. ^b^pasaṃsamicchaṃ vinighāti hotī^eb^ti attano pasaṃsaṃ icchanto ``kathaṃ nu kho niggahessāmī''tiādinā nayena pubbeva sallāpā kathaṃkathī vinighātī hoti. ^b^apāhatasmi^eb^nti pañhavīmaṃsakehi ``atthāpagataṃ te bhaṇitaṃ, byañjanāpagataṃ te bhaṇita''ntiādinā nayena apahārite vāde. ^b^nindāya so kuppatī^eb^ti evaṃ apāhatasmiñca vāde uppannāya nindāya so kuppati. ^b^randhamesī^eb^ti parassa randhameva gavesanto.

[03] 834^b^.^eb^ na ^a^M2.0256^ea^ kevalañca kuppati, apica kho pana ^b^yamassa vāda^eb^nti gāthā. tattha ^b^parihīnamāhu apāhata^eb^nti atthabyañjanādito apāhataṃ parihīnaṃ vadanti. ^b^paridevatī^eb^ti tato nimittaṃ so ``aññaṃ mayā āvajjita''ntiādīhi vippalapati. ^b^socatī^eb^ti ``tassa jayo''tiādīni ārabbha socati. ^b^upaccagā manti anutthunātī^eb^ti ``so maṃ vādena vādaṃ atikkanto''tiādinā nayena suṭṭhutaraṃ vippalapati.

[03] 835^b^.^eb^ ^b^ete vivādā samaṇesū^eb^ti ettha pana ^b^samaṇā^eb^ vuccanti bāhiraparibbājakā. ^b^etesu ugghāti nighāti hotī^eb^ti etesu vādesu jayaparājayādivasena cittassa ugghātaṃ nighātañca pāpuṇanto ugghātī nighātī ca hoti. ^b^virame kathojja^eb^nti pajaheyya kalahaṃ. ^b^na haññadatthatthi pasaṃsalābhā^eb^ti na hi ettha pasaṃsalābhato añño attho atthi.

[03] 836-7^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhagāthāya attho -- yasmā ca na haññadatthatthi pasaṃsalābhā, tasmā paramaṃ lābhaṃ labhantopi ``sundaro aya''nti ^b^tattha^eb^ diṭṭhiyā ^b^pasaṃsito vā^eb^ ^a^P2.0542^ea^ ^b^pana hoti^eb^ taṃ ^b^vādaṃ parisāya majjhe^eb^ dīpetvā, tato ^b^so tena^eb^ jayatthena tuṭṭhiṃ vā dantavidaṃsakaṃ vā āpajjanto ^b^hasati,^eb^ mānena ca ^b^uṇṇamati^eb^. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? yasmā ^b^taṃ^eb^ jayatthaṃ ^b^pappuyya yathāmāno^eb^ jāto, evaṃ uṇṇamato ca ^b^yā uṇṇatī^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^mānātimānaṃ vadate paneso^eb^ti eso pana taṃ uṇṇatiṃ ``vighātabhūmī''ti abujjhamāno mānañca atimānañca vadatiyeva.

[03] 838^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vāde dosaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa vādaṃ asampaṭicchanto ^b^``sūro''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^rājakhādāyā^eb^ti rājakhādanīyena, bhattavetanenāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^abhigajjameti paṭisūramiccha^eb^nti yathā so paṭisūraṃ icchanto abhigajjanto eti, evaṃ diṭṭhigatiko diṭṭhigatikanti dasseti. ^b^yeneva so, tena palehī^eb^ti yena so tuyhaṃ paṭisūro, tena gaccha. ^b^pubbeva^eb^ ^a^V2.0234^ea^ ^b^natthi yadidaṃ yudhāyā^eb^ti yaṃ pana idaṃ kilesajātaṃ yuddhāya siyā, taṃ etaṃ pubbeva natthi, bodhimūleyeva pahīnanti dasseti. sesagāthā pākaṭasambandhāyeva.

[03] 839-40^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^vivādayantī^eb^ti vivadanti. ^b^paṭisenikattā^eb^ti paṭilomakārako. ^b^visenikatvā^eb^ti kilesasenaṃ vināsetvā. ^b^kiṃ labhetho^eb^ti ^a^M2.0257^ea^ paṭimallaṃ kiṃ labhissasi. ^b^pasūrā^eb^ti taṃ paribbājakaṃ ālapati. ^b^yesīdha natthī^eb^ti yesaṃ idha natthi.

[03] 841^b^.^eb^ ^b^pavitakka^eb^nti ``jayo nu kho me bhavissatī''ti ādīni vitakkento. ^b^dhonena yugaṃ samāgamā^eb^ti dhutakilesena buddhena saddhiṃ yugaggāhaṃ samāpanno. ^b^na hi tvaṃ sakkhasi sampayātave^eb^ti kotthukādayo viya sīhādīhi, dhonena saha yugaṃ gahetvā ekapadampi sampayātuṃ yugaggāhameva vā sampādetuṃ na sakkhissasīti. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭamevāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya pasūrasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 842^b^.^eb^ ^b^disvāna^eb^ ^a^V2.0235^ea^ ^b^taṇha^eb^nti māgaṇḍiyasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto paccūsasamaye ^a^P2.0543^ea^ buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento kurūsu kammāsadhammanigamavāsino māgaṇḍiyassa nāma brāhmaṇassa sapajāpatikassa arahattūpanissayaṃ disvā tāvadeva sāvatthito tattha gantvā kammāsadhammassa avidūre aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe nisīdi suvaṇṇobhāsaṃ muñcamāno. māgaṇḍiyopi taṅkhaṇaṃ tattha mukhadhovanatthaṃ gato suvaṇṇobhāsaṃ disvā ``kiṃ ida''nti ito cito ca pekkhamāno bhagavantaṃ disvā attamano ahosi. tassa kira dhītā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā, taṃ bahū khattiyakumārādayo vārayantā na labhanti. brāhmaṇo evaṃladdhiko hoti ``samaṇasseva naṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇassa dassāmī''ti. so bhagavantaṃ disvā ``ayaṃ me dhītāya samānavaṇṇo, imassa naṃ dassāmī''ti cittaṃ uppādesi. tasmā disvāva attamano ahosi. so vegena gharaṃ gantvā brāhmaṇiṃ āha -- ``bhoti bhoti mayā dhītāya samānavaṇṇo puriso diṭṭho, alaṅkarohi dārikaṃ, tassa naṃ dassāmā''ti. brāhmaṇiyā ^a^M2.0258^ea^ dārikaṃ gandhodakena nhāpetvā vatthapupphālaṅkārādīhi alaṅkarontiyā eva bhagavato bhikkhācāravelā sampattā. atha bhagavā kammāsadhammaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.

[03] tepi kho dhītaraṃ gahetvā bhagavato nisinnokāsaṃ agamaṃsu. tattha bhagavantaṃ adisvā brāhmaṇī ito cito ca vilokentī bhagavato nisajjaṭṭhānaṃ tiṇasanthārakaṃ addasa. buddhānañca adhiṭṭhānabalena nisinnokāso padanikkhepo ca abyākulā honti. sā brāhmaṇaṃ āha -- ``esa, brāhmaṇa, tassa tiṇasanthāro''ti? ``āma, bhotī''ti. ``tena hi, brāhmaṇa, amhākaṃ āgamanakammaṃ na sampajjissatī''ti. ``kasmā bhotī''ti? ``passa, brāhmaṇa, abyākulo tiṇasanthāro, neso kāmabhogino paribhutto''ti. brāhmaṇo ``mā, bhoti maṅgale pariyesiyamāne avamaṅgalaṃ abhaṇī''ti āha. punapi brāhmaṇī ito cito ca vicarantī bhagavato padanikkhepaṃ disvā brāhmaṇaṃ āha ``ayaṃ tassa padanikkhepo''ti? ``āma, bhotī''ti. ``passa, brāhmaṇa, padanikkhepaṃ, nāyaṃ satto kāmesu gadhito''ti. ``kathaṃ tvaṃ bhoti jānāsī''ti ca vuttā attano ñāṇabalaṃ dassentī āha --
[21] ``rattassa ^a^V2.0236^ea^ ^a^P2.0544^ea^ hi ukkuṭikaṃ padaṃ bhave,
[27] duṭṭhassa hoti anukaḍḍhitaṃ padaṃ.
[26] mūḷhassa hoti sahasānupīḷitaṃ,
[22] vivaṭṭacchadassa idamīdisaṃ pada''nti.. (a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.260-261; dha0 pa0 aṭṭha0 1.2 sāmāvatīvatthu; visuddhi0 1.45).

[03] ayañcarahi tesaṃ kathā vippakatā, atha bhagavā katabhattakicco tameva vanasaṇḍaṃ āgato. brāhmaṇī bhagavato varalakkhaṇakhacitaṃ byāmappabhāparikkhittaṃ rūpaṃ disvā brāhmaṇaṃ āha -- ``esa tayā, brāhmaṇa, diṭṭho''ti? ``āma bhotī''ti. ``āgatakammaṃ na sampajjissateva, evarūpo nāma kāme paribhuñjissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī''ti. tesaṃ evaṃ vadantānaññeva bhagavā tiṇasanthārake nisīdi. atha brāhmaṇo dhītaraṃ vāmena hatthena gahetvā kamaṇḍaluṃ dakkhiṇena hatthena gahetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``bho, pabbajita, tvañca suvaṇṇavaṇṇo ayañca dārikā, anucchavikā esā tava, imāhaṃ bhoto bhariyaṃ posāvanatthāya dammī''ti ^a^M2.0259^ea^ vatvā bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā dātukāmo aṭṭhāsi. bhagavā brāhmaṇaṃ anālapitvā aññena saddhiṃ sallapamāno viya ^b^``disvāna taṇha''^eb^nti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tassattho -- ajapālanigrodhamūle nānārūpāni nimminitvā abhikāmamāgataṃ māradhītaraṃ ^b^disvāna taṇhaṃ aratiṃ ragañca^eb^ chandamattampi me ^b^methunasmiṃ nāhosi, kimevidaṃ^eb^ imissā dārikāya ^b^muttakarīsapuṇṇaṃ^eb^ rūpaṃ disvā bhavissati sabbathā ^b^pādāpi naṃ samphusituṃ na icche,^eb^ kutonena saṃvasitunti.

[03] 843^b^.^eb^ tato māgaṇḍiyo ``pabbajitā nāma mānusake kāme pahāya dibbakāmatthāya pabbajanti, ayañca dibbepi kāme na icchati, idampi itthiratanaṃ, kā nu assa diṭṭhī''ti pucchituṃ dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^etādisaṃ ce ratana^eb^nti dibbitthiratanaṃ sandhāya bhaṇati, ^b^nāri^eb^nti attano dhītaraṃ sandhāya. ^b^diṭṭhigataṃ sīlavataṃ nu jīvita^eb^nti diṭṭhiñca sīlañca ^a^P2.0545^ea^ vatañca jīvitañca. ^b^bhavūpapattiñca vadesi kīdisa^eb^nti attano bhavūpapattiñca kīdisaṃ vadasīti.

[03] 844^b^.^eb^ ito parā dve gāthā visajjanapucchānayena pavattattā pākaṭasambandhāyeva. tāsu paṭhamagāthāya saṅkhepattho -- ^b^tassa^eb^ mayhaṃ, māgaṇḍiya, dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigata^b^dhammesu^eb^ nicchinitvā ``idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña''nti evaṃ ^b^idaṃ vadāmīti samuggahitaṃ na hoti^eb^ natthi na vijjati. kiṃkāraṇā ^a^V2.0237^ea^? ahañhi passanto ^b^diṭṭhīsu^eb^ ādīnavaṃ kañci diṭṭhiṃ aggahetvā saccāni pavicinanto ajjhattaṃ rāgādīnaṃ santibhāvena ^b^ajjhattasanti^eb^saṅkhātaṃ nibbānameva addasanti.

[03] 845^b^.^eb^ dutiyagāthāya saṅkhepattho -- ^b^yāni^eb^māni diṭṭhigatāni tehi tehi sattehi vinicchinitvā gahitattā ^b^vinicchayā^eb^ti ca attano paccayehi abhisaṅkhatabhāvādinā nayena ^b^pakappitāni^eb^ cāti vuccanti. ^b^te tvaṃ muni^eb^ diṭṭhigatadhamme aggahetvā ^b^ajjhattasantīti yametamatthaṃ brūsi,^eb^ ācikkha me, ^b^kathaṃ nu dhīrehi paveditaṃ^eb^ kathaṃ pakāsitaṃ dhīrehi taṃ padanti.

[03] 846^b^.^eb^ athassa ^a^M2.0260^ea^ bhagavā yathā yena upāyena taṃ padaṃ dhīrehi pakāsitaṃ, taṃ upāyaṃ sapaṭipakkhaṃ dassento ^b^``na diṭṭhiyā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ``na diṭṭhiyā''tiādīhi diṭṭhisutiaṭṭhasamāpattiñāṇabāhirasīlabbatāni paṭikkhipati. ^b^``suddhimāhā''^eb^ti ettha vuttaṃ ^b^āha^eb^-saddaṃ sabbattha nakārena saddhiṃ yojetvā purisabyattayaṃ katvā ``diṭṭhiyā suddhiṃ nāhaṃ kathemī''ti evamattho veditabbo. yathā cettha, evaṃ uttarapadesupi. tattha ca ^b^adiṭṭhiyā nāhā^eb^ti dasavatthukaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ vinā na kathemi. tathā ^b^assutiyā^eb^ti navaṅgaṃ savanaṃ vinā. ^b^añāṇā^eb^ti kammassa katasaccānulomikañāṇaṃ vinā. ^b^asīlatā^eb^ti pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ vinā. ^b^abbatā^eb^ti dhutaṅgavataṃ vinā. ^b^nopi tenā^eb^ti tesu ekamekena diṭṭhiādimattenāpi no kathemīti evamattho veditabbo. ^b^ete ca nissajja anuggahāyā^eb^ti ete ca purime diṭṭhiādibhede kaṇhapakkhiye dhamme samugghātakaraṇena nissajja, pacchime adiṭṭhiādibhede sukkapakkhiye atammayatāpajjanena anuggahāya. ^b^santo anissāya bhavaṃ na^eb^ ^a^P2.0546^ea^ ^b^jappe^eb^ti imāya paṭipattiyā rāgādivūpasamena santo cakkhādīsu kañci dhammaṃ anissāya ekampi bhavaṃ apihetuṃ apatthetuṃ samattho siyā, ayamassa ajjhattasantīti adhippāyo.

[03] 847^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vutte vacanatthaṃ asallakkhento māgaṇḍiyo ^b^``no ce kirā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha diṭṭhādīni vuttanayāneva. kaṇhapakkhiyāniyeva pana sandhāya ubhayatrāpi āha. āha-saddaṃ pana nocekira-saddena yojetvā ^b^``no ce kirāha^eb^ no ce kira kathesī''ti evaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^momuha^eb^nti atimūḷhaṃ, mohanaṃ vā. ^b^paccentī^eb^ti jānanti.

[03] 848^b^.^eb^ athassa bhagavā taṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya pucchaṃ paṭikkhipanto ^b^``diṭṭhiñca nissāyā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- tvaṃ, māgaṇḍiya, ^b^diṭṭhiṃ nissāya^eb^ punappunaṃ pucchamāno yāni te diṭṭhigatāni samuggahitāni, tesveva ^b^samuggahītesu^eb^ evaṃ ^b^pamohaṃ^eb^ āgato, ^b^ito ca^eb^ mayā vuttājjhattasantito ^a^V2.0238^ea^ paṭipattito dhammadesanato vā ^b^aṇumpi^eb^ yuttasaññaṃ na passasi, tena kāraṇena tvaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ ^b^momuhato^eb^ passasīti.

[03] 849^b^.^eb^ evaṃ samuggahitesu pamohena māgaṇḍiyassa vivādāpattiṃ dassetvā idāni tesu aññesu ca dhammesu vigatappamohassa attano nibbivādataṃ dassento ^b^``samo visesī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho ^a^M2.0261^ea^ -- ^b^yo^eb^ evaṃ tividhamānena vā diṭṭhiyā vā ^b^maññati, so tena^eb^ mānena tāya diṭṭhiyā tena vā puggalena vivadeyya. yo pana amhādiso imāsu ^b^tīsu vidhāsu avikampamāno, samo visesīti na tassa hoti,^eb^ na ca hīnoti pāṭhaseso.

[03] 850^b^.^eb^ kiñca bhiyyo -- ^b^saccanti so^eb^ti gāthā. tassattho -- ^b^so^eb^ evarūpo pahīnamānadiṭṭhiko mādiso bāhitapāpattādinā nayena ^b^brāhmaṇo^eb^ ``idameva sacca''nti ^b^kiṃ vadeyya^eb^ kiṃ vatthuṃ bhaṇeyya, kena vā kāraṇena bhaṇeyya, ``mayhaṃ saccaṃ, tuyhaṃ musā''ti vā ^b^kena^eb^ mānena diṭṭhiyā puggalena vā vivadeyya? ^b^yasmiṃ^eb^ mādise khīṇāsave ``sadisohamasmī''ti pavattiyā ^b^samaṃ^eb^ vā, itaradvayabhāvena pavattiyā ^b^visamaṃ vā^eb^ maññitaṃ ^b^natthi, so^eb^ samānādīsu ^b^kena vādaṃ paṭisaṃyujeyya^eb^ paṭipphareyyāti. nanu ekaṃseneva evarūpo puggalo -- ^b^okaṃ pahāyā^eb^ti gāthā?

[03] 851^b^.^eb^ tattha ^a^P2.0547^ea^ ^b^okaṃ pahāyā^eb^ti rūpavatthādiviññāṇassa okāsaṃ tatra chandarāgappahānena chaḍḍetvā. ^b^aniketasārī^eb^ti rūpanimittaniketādīni taṇhāvasena asaranto. ^b^gāme akubbaṃ muni santhavānī^eb^ti gāme gihisanthavāni akaronto. ^b^kāmehi ritto^eb^ti kāmesu chandarāgābhāvena sabbakāmehi puthubhūto. ^b^apurekkharāno^eb^ti āyatiṃ attabhāvaṃ anabhinibbattento. ^b^kathaṃ na viggayha janena kayirā^eb^ti janena saddhiṃ viggāhikakathaṃ na katheyya. so evarūpo -- ^b^yehi vivitto^eb^ti gāthā.

[03] 852^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^yehī^eb^ti yehi diṭṭhigatehi. ^b^vivitto vicareyyā^eb^ti ritto careyya. ^b^na tāni uggayha vadeyya nāgo^eb^ti ``āguṃ na karotī''tiādinā (cūḷani0 bhadrāvudhamāṇavapucchāniddesa 70; pārāyanānugītigāthāniddesa 102) nayena nāgo tāni diṭṭhigatāni uggahetvā na vadeyya. ^b^jalambuja^eb^nti jalasaññite ambumhi jātaṃ kaṇṭakanāḷaṃ vārijaṃ, padumanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^yathā jalena paṅkena ca nūpalitta^eb^nti taṃ padumaṃ yathā jalena ca paṅkena ca anupalittaṃ hoti, ^b^evaṃ muni santivādo agiddho^eb^ti evaṃ ajjhattasantivādo muni gedhābhāvena agiddho. ^b^kāme^eb^ ^a^V2.0239^ea^ ^b^ca loke ca^eb^ ^a^M2.0262^ea^ ^b^anūpalitto^eb^ti duvidhepi kāme apāyādike ca loke dvīhipi lepehi anupalitto hoti.

[03] 853^b^.^eb^ kiñca bhiyyo -- ^b^na vedagū^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^na vedagū diṭṭhiyāyako^eb^ti catumaggavedagū mādiso diṭṭhiyāyako na hoti, diṭṭhiyā gacchanto vā, taṃ sārato paccento vā na hoti. tattha vacanattho -- yāyatīti yāyako, karaṇavacanena diṭṭhiyā yātīti diṭṭhiyāyako. upayogatthe sāmivacanena diṭṭhiyā yātītipi diṭṭhiyāyako. ^b^na mutiyā sa mānametī^eb^ti mutarūpādibhedāya mutiyāpi so mānaṃ na eti. ^b^na hi tammayo so^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena tammayo hoti tapparāyaṇo, ayaṃ pana na tādiso. ^b^na kammunā nopi sutena neyyoti^eb^ puññābhisaṅkhārādinā kammunā vā sutasuddhiādinā sutena vā so netabbo na hoti. ^b^anūpanīto sa nivesanesū^eb^ti so dvinnampi upayānaṃ pahīnattā sabbesu taṇhādiṭṭhinivesanesu anūpanīto. tassa ca evaṃvidhassa -- ^b^saññāvirattassā^eb^ti gāthā.

[03] 854^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^saññāvirattassā^eb^ti nekkhammasaññāpubbaṅgamāya bhāvanāya pahīnakāmādisaññassa. iminā padena ubhatobhāgavimutto samathayāniko adhippeto. ^b^paññāvimuttassā^eb^ti vipassanāpubbaṅgamāya bhāvanāya sabbakilesehi ^a^P2.0548^ea^ vimuttassa. iminā sukkhavipassako adhippeto. ^b^saññañca diṭṭhiñca ye aggahesuṃ, te ghaṭṭayantā vicaranti loke^eb^ti ye kāmasaññādikaṃ saññaṃ aggahesuṃ, te visesato gahaṭṭhā kāmādhikaraṇaṃ, ye ca diṭṭhiṃ aggahesuṃ, te visesato pabbajitā dhammādhikaraṇaṃ aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭentā vicarantīti. sesamettha yaṃ avuttaṃ, taṃ vuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ. desanāpariyosāne brāhmaṇo ca brāhmaṇī ca pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya māgaṇḍiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 855^b^.^eb^ ^b^kathaṃdassī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0240^ea^ ^a^M2.0263^ea^ purābhedasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? imassa suttassa ito paresañca pañcannaṃ kalahavivādacūḷabyūhamahābyūhatuvaṭakāttadaṇḍasuttānaṃ sammāparibbājanīyassa uppattiyaṃ vuttanayeneva sāmaññato uppatti vuttā. visesato pana yatheva tasmiṃ mahāsamaye rāgacaritadevatānaṃ sappāyavasena dhammaṃ desetuṃ nimmitabuddhena attānaṃ pucchāpetvā sammāparibbājanīyasuttamabhāsi, evaṃ tasmiṃyeva mahāsamaye ``kiṃ nu kho purā sarīrabhedā kattabba''nti uppannacittānaṃ devatānaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā tāsaṃ anuggahatthaṃ aḍḍhateḷasabhikkhusataparivāraṃ nimmitabuddhaṃ ākāsena ānetvā tena attānaṃ pucchāpetvā imaṃ suttamabhāsi.
[03] tattha pucchāya tāva so nimmito ^b^kathaṃdassī^eb^ti adhipaññaṃ ^b^kathaṃsīlo^eb^ti adhisīlaṃ, ^b^upasanto^eb^ti adhicittaṃ pucchati. sesaṃ pākaṭameva.

[03] 856^b^.^eb^ vissajjane pana bhagavā sarūpena adhipaññādīni avissajjetvāva adhipaññādippabhāvena yesaṃ kilesānaṃ upasamā ``upasanto''ti vuccati, nānādevatānaṃ āsayānulomena tesaṃ upasamameva dīpento ^b^``vītataṇho''^eb^tiādikā gāthāyo abhāsi. tattha ādito aṭṭhannaṃ gāthānaṃ ``taṃ brūmi upasanto''ti imāya gāthāya sambandho veditabbo. tato parāsaṃ ``sa ve santoti vuccatī''ti iminā sabbapacchimena padena.

[03] anupadavaṇṇanānayena ^a^P2.0549^ea^ ca -- ^b^vītataṇho purā bhedā^eb^ti yo sarīrabhedā pubbameva pahīnataṇho. ^b^pubbamantamanissito^eb^ti atītaddhādibhedaṃ pubbantamanissito. ^b^vemajjhenupasaṅkheyyo^eb^ti paccuppannepi addhani ``ratto''tiādinā nayena na upasaṅkhātabbo. ^b^tassa natthi purakkhata^eb^nti tassa arahato dvinnaṃ purekkhārānaṃ abhāvā anāgate addhani purakkhatampi natthi, taṃ brūmi upasantoti evamettha yojanā veditabbā. esa nayo sabbattha. ito paraṃ pana yojanaṃ adassetvā anuttānapadavaṇṇanaṃyeva karissāma.

[03] 857^b^.^eb^ ^b^asantāsī^eb^ti tena tena alābhakena asantasanto. ^b^avikatthī^eb^ti sīlādīhi avikatthanasīlo ^a^V2.0241^ea^. ^b^akukkuco^eb^ti hatthakukkucādivirahito ^a^M2.0264^ea^. ^b^mantabhāṇīti^eb^ mantāya pariggahetvā vācaṃ bhāsitā. ^b^anuddhato^eb^ti uddhaccavirahito. ^b^sa ve vācāyato^eb^ti so vācāya yato saṃyato catudosavirahitaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitā hoti.

[03] 858^b^.^eb^ ^b^nirāsattī^eb^ti nittaṇho. ^b^vivekadassī phassesū^eb^ti paccuppannesu cakkhusamphassādīsu attādibhāvavivekaṃ passati. ^b^diṭṭhīsu ca na nīyatī^eb^ti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhīsu kāyaci diṭṭhiyā na nīyati.

[03] 859^b^.^eb^ ^b^patilīno^eb^ti rāgādīnaṃ pahīnattā tato apagato. ^b^akuhako^eb^ti avimhāpako tīhi kuhanavatthūhi. ^b^apihālū^eb^ti apihanasīlo, patthanātaṇhāya rahitoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^amaccharī^eb^ti pañcamaccheravirahito. ^b^appagabbho^eb^ti kāyapāgabbhiyādivirahito. ^b^ajeguccho^eb^ti sampannasīlāditāya ajegucchanīyo asecanako manāpo. ^b^pesuṇeyye ca no yuto^eb^ti dvīhi ākārehi upasaṃharitabbe pisuṇakamme ayutto.

[03] 860^b^.^eb^ ^b^sātiyesu anassāvī^eb^ti sātavatthūsu kāmaguṇesu taṇhāsanthavavirahito. ^b^saṇho^eb^ti saṇhehi kāyakammādīhi samannāgato. ^b^paṭibhānavā^eb^ti pariyattiparipucchādhigamapaṭibhānehi samannāgato. ^b^na saddho^eb^ti sāmaṃ adhigatadhammaṃ na kassaci saddahati. ^b^na virajjatī^eb^ti khayā rāgassa virattattā idāni na virajjati.

[03] 861^b^.^eb^ ^b^lābhakamyā na sikkhatī^eb^ti na lābhapatthanāya suttantādīni sikkhati. ^b^aviruddho ca taṇhāya, rasesu nānugijjhatī^eb^ti virodhābhāvena ca aviruddho hutvā taṇhāya mūlarasādīsu gedhaṃ ^a^P2.0550^ea^ nāpajjati.
[03] 862^b^.^eb^ ^b^upekkhako^eb^ti chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgato. ^b^sato^eb^ti kāyānupassanādisatiyutto.

[03] 863^b^.^eb^ ^b^nissayanā^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhinissayā. ^b^ñatvā dhamma^eb^nti aniccādīhi ākārehi dhammaṃ jānitvā. ^b^anissito^eb^ti evaṃ tehi nissayehi anissito. tena aññatra dhammañāṇā natthi nissayānaṃ abhāvoti dīpeti ^b^bhavāya vibhavāya vā^eb^ti sassatāya ucchedāya vā.

[03] 864^b^.^eb^ ^b^taṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0242^ea^ ^a^M2.0265^ea^ ^b^brūmi upasanto^eb^ti taṃ evarūpaṃ ekekagāthāya vuttaṃ upasantoti kathemi. ^b^atarī so visattika^eb^nti so imaṃ visatādibhāvena visattikāsaṅkhātaṃ mahātaṇhaṃ atari.

[03] 865^b^.^eb^ idāni tameva upasantaṃ pasaṃsanto āha ^b^``na tassa puttā''^eb^ti evamādi. tattha puttā atrajādayo cattāro. ettha ca puttapariggahādayo puttādināmena vuttāti veditabbā. te hissa na vijjanti, tesaṃ vā abhāvena puttādayo na vijjantīti.

[03] 866^b^.^eb^ ^b^yena naṃ vajjuṃ puthujjanā, atho samaṇabrāhmaṇā^eb^ti yena taṃ rāgādinā vajjena puthujjanā sabbepi devamanussā ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca ratto vā duṭṭho vāti, vadeyyuṃ. ^b^taṃ tassa apurakkhata^eb^nti taṃ rāgādivajjaṃ tassa arahato apurakkhataṃ ^b^tasmā vādesu nejatī^eb^ti taṃ kāraṇā nindāvacanesu na kampati.

[03] 867^b^.^eb^ ^b^na ussesu vadate^eb^ti visiṭṭhesu attānaṃ antokatvā ``ahaṃ visiṭṭho''ti atimānavasena na vadati. esa nayo itaresu dvīsu. ^b^kappaṃ neti akappiyo^eb^ti so evarūpo duvidhampi kappaṃ na eti. kasmā? yasmā akappiyo, pahīnakappoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 868^b^.^eb^ ^b^saka^eb^nti mayhanti pariggahitaṃ. ^b^asatā ca na socatī^eb^ti avijjamānādinā asatā ca na socati. ^b^dhammesu ca na gacchatī^eb^ti sabbesu dhammesu chandādivasena na gacchati. ^b^sa ve santoti vuccatī^eb^ti so evarūpo naruttamo ``santo''ti vuccatīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. desanāpariyosāne koṭisatasahassadevatānaṃ arahattappatti ahosi, sotāpannādīnaṃ gaṇanā natthīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya purābhedasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 869^b^.^eb^ ^b^kuto^eb^ ^a^V2.0243^ea^ ^a^M2.0266^ea^ ^a^P2.0551^ea^ ^b^pahūtā kalahā vivādā^eb^ti kalahavivādasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? idampi tasmiṃyeva mahāsamaye ``kuto nu, kho, kalahādayo aṭṭha dhammā pavattantī''ti uppannacittānaṃ ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ te dhamme āvikātuṃ purimanayeneva nimmitabuddhena attānaṃ pucchāpetvā vuttaṃ tattha pucchāvissajjanakkamena ṭhitattā sabbagāthā pākaṭasambandhāyeva.

[03] anuttānapadavaṇṇanā panetāsaṃ evaṃ veditabbā -- ^b^kutopahūtā kalahā vivādā^eb^ti kalaho ca tassa pubbabhāgo vivādo cāti ime kuto jātā. ^b^paridevasokā sahamaccharā cā^eb^ti paridevasokā ca maccharā ca kutopahūtā. ^b^mānātimānā sahapesuṇā cā^eb^ti mānā ca atimānā ca pesuṇā ca kutopahūtā. ^b^te^eb^ti te sabbepi aṭṭha kilesadhammā. ^b^tadiṅgha brūhī^eb^ti taṃ mayā pucchitamatthaṃ brūhi yācāmi taṃ ahanti. yācanattho hi ^b^iṅghā^eb^ti nipāto.

[03] 870^b^.^eb^ ^b^piyappahūtā^eb^ti piyavatthuto jātā. yutti panettha niddese (mahāni0 98) vuttā eva. ^b^maccherayuttā kalahā vivādā^eb^ti iminā kalahavivādādīnaṃ na kevalaṃ piyavatthumeva, macchariyampi paccayaṃ dasseti. kalahavivādasīsena cettha sabbepi te dhammā vuttāti veditabbā. yathā ca etesaṃ macchariyaṃ, tathā pesuṇānañca vivādaṃ. tenāha -- ``^b^vivādajātesu ca pesuṇānī''^eb^ti.

[03] 871^b^.^eb^ ^b^piyāsu lokasmiṃ kutonidānā ye cāpi lobhā vicaranti loke^eb^ti ``piyā pahūtā kalahā''ti ye ettha vuttā. te piyā lokasmiṃ kutonidānā, na kevalañca piyā, ye cāpi khattiyādayo lobhā vicaranti lobhahetukā lobhenābhibhūtā vicaranti, tesaṃ so lobho ca kutonidānoti dve atthe ekāya pucchāya pucchati. ^b^āsā ca niṭṭhā cā^eb^ti āsā ca tassā āsāya samiddhi ca. ^b^ye samparāyāya narassa hontī^eb^ti ye narassa samparāyāya honti, parāyanā hontīti vuttaṃ hoti. ekā evāyampi pucchā.

[03] 872^b^.^eb^ ^b^chandānidānānī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0267^ea^ kāmacchandādichandanidānāni. ^b^ye cāpi lobhā vicarantī^eb^ti ye cāpi ^a^V2.0244^ea^ khattiyādayo lobhā vicaranti tesaṃ lobhopi chandanidānoti dvepi atthe ekato vissajjeti. ^b^itonidānā^eb^ti chandanidānā evāti vuttaṃ hoti. ``kutonidānā kutonidānā''ti (su0 ni0 273) etesu ca saddasiddhi sūcilomasutte vuttanayeneva ^a^P2.0552^ea^ veditabbā.

[03] 873^b^.^eb^ ^b^vinicchayā^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhivinicchayā. ^b^ye vāpi dhammā samaṇena vuttā^eb^ti ye ca aññepi kodhādīhi sampayuttā, tathārūpā vā akusalā dhammā buddhasamaṇena vuttā, te kutopahūtāti.

[03] 874^b^.^eb^ ^b^tamūpanissāya pahoti chando^eb^ti taṃ sukhadukkhavedanaṃ. tadubhayavatthusaṅkhātaṃ sātāsātaṃ upanissāya saṃyogaviyogapatthanāvasena chando pahoti. ettāvatā ``chando nu lokasmiṃ kutonidāno''ti ayaṃ pañho vissajjito hoti. ^b^rūpesu disvā vibhavaṃ bhavañcā^eb^ti rūpesu vayañca uppādañca disvā. ^b^vinicchayaṃ kubbati jantu loke^eb^ti apāyādike loke ayaṃ jantu bhogādhigamanatthaṃ taṇhāvinicchayaṃ ``attā me uppanno''tiādinā nayena diṭṭhivinicchayañca kurute. yutti panettha niddese (mahāni0 102) vuttā eva. ettāvatā ``vinicchayā cāpi kutopahūtā''ti ayaṃ pañho vissajjito hoti.

[03] 875^b^.^eb^ ^b^etepi dhammā dvayameva sante^eb^ti etepi kodhādayo dhammā sātāsātadvaye sante eva pahonti uppajjanti. uppatti ca nesaṃ niddese (mahāni0 103) vuttāyeva. ettāvatā tatiyapañhopi vissajjito hoti. idāni yo evaṃ vissajjitesu etesu pañhesu kathaṃkathī bhaveyya, tassa kathaṃkathāpahānūpāyaṃ dassento āha -- ^b^``kathaṃkathī ñāṇapathāya sikkhe''^eb^ti, ñāṇadassanañāṇādhigamanatthaṃ tisso sikkhā sikkheyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^ñatvā pavuttā samaṇena dhammā^eb^. buddhasamaṇena hi ñatvāva dhammā vuttā, natthi tassa dhammesu aññāṇaṃ. attano pana ñāṇābhāvena te ajānanto na jāneyya, na desanā dosena, tasmā kathaṃkathī ñāṇapathāya sikkhe, ñatvā pavuttā samaṇena dhammāti.

[03] 876-7^b^.^eb^ ^b^sātaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0268^ea^ ^b^asātañca kutonidānā^eb^ti ettha sātaṃ asātanti sukhadukkhavedanā eva adhippetā. ^b^na bhavanti hete^eb^ti na bhavanti ete. ^b^vibhavaṃ bhavañcāpi yametamatthaṃ etaṃ me pabrūhi yatonidāna^eb^nti sātāsātānaṃ vibhavaṃ bhavañca etampi yaṃ atthaṃ. liṅgabyattayo ettha kato. idaṃ pana vuttaṃ hoti -- sātāsātānaṃ vibhavo bhavo cāti yo esa attho, evaṃ me pabrūhi yatonidānanti. ^a^V2.0245^ea^ ettha ca sātāsātānaṃ vibhavabhavavatthukā vibhavabhavadiṭṭhiyo eva vibhavabhavāti ^a^P2.0553^ea^ atthato veditabbā. tathā hi imassa pañhassa vissajjanapakkhe ``bhavadiṭṭhipi phassanidānā, vibhavadiṭṭhipi phassanidānā''ti niddese (mahāni0 105) vuttaṃ. ^b^itonidāna^eb^nti phassanidānaṃ.
[03] 878^b^.^eb^ ^b^kismiṃ vibhūte na phusanti phassā^eb^ti kismiṃ vītivatte cakkhusamphassādayo pañca phassā na phusanti.
[03] 879^b^.^eb^ ^b^nāmañca rūpañca paṭiccā^eb^ti sampayuttakanāmaṃ vatthārammaṇarūpañca paṭicca. ^b^rūpe vibhūte na phusanti phassā^eb^ti rūpe vītivatte pañca phassā na phusanti.
[03] 880^b^.^eb^ ^b^kathaṃ sametassā^eb^ti kathaṃ paṭipannassa. ^b^vibhoti rūpa^eb^nti rūpa vibhavati, na bhaveyya vā. ^b^sukhaṃ dukhañcā^eb^ti iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ rūpameva pucchati.

[03] 881^b^.^eb^ ^b^na saññasaññī^eb^ti yathā sametassa vibhoti rūpaṃ, so pakatisaññāya saññīpi na hoti. ^b^na visaññasaññī^eb^ti visaññāyapi virūpāya saññāya saññī na hoti ummattako vā khittacitto vā. ^b^nopi asaññī^eb^ti saññāvirahitopi na hoti nirodhasamāpanno vā asaññasatto vā. ^b^na vibhūtasaññī^eb^ti ``sabbaso rūpasaññāna''ntiādinā (dha sa0 265; vibha0 602) nayena samatikkantasaññīpi na hoti arūpajjhānalābhī. ^b^evaṃ sametassa vibhoti rūpa^eb^nti etasmiṃ saññasaññitādibhāve aṭṭhatvā yadetaṃ vuttaṃ ``so evaṃ samāhite citte...pe0... ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattipaṭilābhatthāya cittaṃ abhinīharatī''ti. evaṃ sametassa arūpamaggasamaṅgino vibhoti rūpaṃ. ^b^saññānidānā hi papañcasaṅkhā^eb^ti evaṃ paṭipannassāpi yā saññā, tannidānā taṇhādiṭṭhipapañcā appahīnā eva hontīti dasseti.

[03] 882-3^b^.^eb^ ^b^ettāvataggaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0269^ea^ ^b^nu vadanti, heke yakkhassa suddhiṃ idha paṇḍitāse^eb^. ^b^udāhu aññampi vadanti^eb^ ^b^etto^eb^ti ettāvatā nu idha paṇḍitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā aggaṃ suddhiṃ sattassa vadanti, udāhu aññampi etto arūpasamāpattito adhikaṃ vadantīti pucchati. ^b^ettāvataggampi vadanti heke^eb^ti eke sassatavādā samaṇabrāhmaṇā paṇḍitamānino ettāvatāpi aggaṃ suddhiṃ vadanti. ^b^tesaṃ paneke samayaṃ vadantī^eb^ti tesaṃyeva eke ucchedavādā samayaṃ ucchedaṃ vadanti. ^b^anupādisese kusalā vadānā^eb^ti anupādisese kusalavādā samānā.

[03] 884^b^.^eb^ ^b^ete^eb^ ^a^V2.0246^ea^ ^b^ca ñatvā upanissitā^eb^ti ete ca diṭṭhigatike ^a^P2.0554^ea^ sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo nissitāti ñatvā. ^b^ñatvā munī nissaye so vimaṃsī^eb^ti nissaye ca ñatvā so vīmaṃsī paṇḍito buddhamuni. ^b^ñatvā vimutto^eb^ti dukkhāniccādito dhamme ñatvā vimutto. ^b^bhavābhavāya na sametī^eb^ti punappunaṃ upapattiyā na samāgacchatīti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. desanāpariyosāne purābhedasutte vuttasadisoyevābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya kalahavivādasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 885-6^b^.^eb^ ^b^sakaṃsakaṃdiṭṭhiparibbasānā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0247^ea^ cūḷabyūhasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? idampi tasmiṃyeva mahāsamaye ``sabbepi ime diṭṭhigatikā `sādhurūpamhā'ti bhaṇanti, kiṃ nu kho sādhurūpāva ime attanoyeva diṭṭhiyā patiṭṭhahanti, udāhu aññampi diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhantī''ti uppannacittānaṃ ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ purimanayeneva nimmitabuddhena attānaṃ pucchāpetvā vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ādito dvepi gāthā pucchāgāthāyeva. tāsu ^b^sakaṃsakaṃdiṭṭhiparibbasānā^eb^ti attano attano diṭṭhiyā vasamānā. ^b^viggayha nānā kusalā vadantī^eb^ti diṭṭhibalaggāhaṃ gahetvā, tattha ``kusalāmhā''ti paṭijānamānā ^a^M2.0270^ea^ puthu puthu vadanti ekaṃ na vadanti. ^b^yo evaṃ jānāti sa vedi dhammaṃ idaṃ paṭikosamakevalī so^eb^ti tañca diṭṭhiṃ sandhāya yo evaṃ jānāti, so dhammaṃ vedi. idaṃ pana paṭikkosanto hīno hotīti vadanti. ^b^bālo^eb^ti hīno. ^b^akkusalo^eb^ti avidvā.

[03] 887-8^b^.^eb^ idāni tisso vissajjanagāthā honti. tā purimaḍḍhena vuttamatthaṃ pacchimaḍḍhena paṭibyūhitvā ṭhitā. tena byūhena uttarasuttato ca appakattā idaṃ suttaṃ ``cūḷabyūha''nti nāmaṃ labhati. tattha ^b^parassa ce dhamma^eb^nti parassa diṭṭhiṃ. ^b^sabbeva bālā^eb^ti evaṃ sante sabbeva ime bālā hontīti adhippāyo. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^sabbevime diṭṭhiparibbasānāti sandiṭṭhiyā ceva na vīvadātā. saṃsuddhapaññā kusalā mutīmā^eb^ti sakāya diṭṭhiyā na vivadātā na vodātā saṃkiliṭṭhāva samānā ^a^P2.0555^ea^ saṃsuddhapaññā ca kusalā ca mutimanto ca te honti ce. atha vā ``sandiṭṭhiyā ce pana vīvadātā'' tipi pāṭho. tassattho -- sakāya pana diṭṭhiyā vodātā saṃsuddhapaññā kusalā mutimanto honti ce. ^b^na tesaṃ kocī^eb^ti evaṃ sante tesaṃ ekopi hīnapañño na hoti. kiṃkāraṇā? ^b^diṭṭhī hi tesampi tathā samattā,^eb^ yathā itaresanti.

[03] 889^b^.^eb^ ^b^na vāhameta^eb^nti gāthāya saṅkhepattho -- ^b^yaṃ^eb^ te ^b^mithu^eb^ dve dve janā ^b^aññamaññaṃ^eb^ ``bālo''ti āhu, ahaṃ ^b^etaṃ tathiyaṃ^eb^ tacchanti ^b^neva brūmi^eb^. kiṃkāraṇā? yasmā sabbe te ^b^sakaṃ sakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ^eb^ ``idameva ^b^saccaṃ^eb^ moghamañña''nti ^b^akaṃsu^eb^. tena ca kāraṇena ^b^paraṃ ``bālo''ti dahanti^eb^. ettha ca ``tathiya''nti ``kathiva''nti dvepi pāṭhā.
[03] 890^b^.^eb^ ^b^yamāhūti^eb^ ^a^V2.0248^ea^ pucchāgāthāya ^b^yaṃ diṭṭhisaccaṃ tathiyanti eke āhu^eb^.

[03] 891^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekañhi sacca^eb^nti vissajjanagāthāya ekaṃ saccaṃ nirodho maggo vā. ^b^yasmiṃ pajā no vivade pajāna^eb^nti yamhi sacce pajānanto pajā no vivadeyya. ^b^sayaṃ thunantī^eb^ti attanā vadanti.
[03] 892^b^.^eb^ ^b^kasmā nū^eb^ti pucchāgāthāya ^b^pavādiyāse^eb^ti vādino. ^b^udāhu te takkamanussarantī^eb^ti te vādino udāhu attano takkamattaṃ anugacchanti.

[03] 893^b^.^eb^ ^b^na^eb^ ^a^M2.0271^ea^ ^b^hevā^eb^ti vissajjanagāthāya ^b^aññatra saññāya niccānī^eb^ti ṭhapetvā saññāmattena niccanti gahitaggahaṇāni. ^b^takkañca diṭṭhīsu pakappayitvā^eb^ti attano micchāsaṅkappamattaṃ diṭṭhīsu janetvā. yasmā pana diṭṭhīsu vitakkaṃ janentā diṭṭhiyopi janenti, tasmā niddese vuttaṃ ``diṭṭhigatāni janenti sañjanentī''tiādi (mahāni0 121).

[03] 894-5^b^.^eb^ idāni evaṃ nānāsaccesu asantesu takkamattamanussarantānaṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vippaṭipattiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``diṭṭhe sute''^eb^tiādikā gāthāyo abhāsi. tattha ^b^diṭṭhe^eb^ti diṭṭhaṃ, diṭṭhasuddhinti adhippāyo. esa nayo sutādīsu. ^b^ete ca nissāya vimānadassī^eb^ti ete diṭṭhidhamme nissayitvā suddhibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ vimānaṃ asammānaṃ passantopi. ^b^vinicchaye ṭhatvā pahassamāno, bālo paro akkusaloti cāhā^eb^ti evaṃ vimānadassīpi tasmiṃ diṭṭhivinicchaye ṭhatvā tuṭṭhijāto hāsajāto hutvā ``paro hīno ca avidvā cā''ti evaṃ vadatiyeva. evaṃ ^a^P2.0556^ea^ sante ^b^yenevā^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^sayamattanā^eb^ti sayameva attānaṃ. ^b^vimānetī^eb^ti garahati. ^b^tadeva pāvā^eb^ti tadeva vacanaṃ diṭṭhiṃ vadati, taṃ vā puggalaṃ.

[03] 896^b^.^eb^ ^b^atisāradiṭṭhiyā^eb^ti gāthāyattho -- ^b^so^eb^ evaṃ tāya lakkhaṇātisāriniyā ^b^atisāradiṭṭhiyā samatto^eb^ puṇṇo uddhumāto, tena ca diṭṭhimānena matto ``paripuṇṇo ahaṃ kevalī''ti evaṃ ^b^paripuṇṇamānī sayameva^eb^ attānaṃ ^b^manasā^eb^ ``ahaṃ paṇḍito''ti abhisiñcati. kiṃkāraṇā? ^b^diṭṭhī hi sā tassa tathā samattā^eb^ti.

[03] 897^b^.^eb^ ^b^parassa ce^eb^ti gāthāya sambandho attho ca -- kiñca bhiyyo? yo so vinicchaye ṭhatvā pahassamāno ``bālo paro akkusalo''ti cāha. tassa ^b^parassa ce hi vacasā^eb^ so tena vuccamāno ^a^V2.0249^ea^ ^b^nihīno^eb^ hoti. ^b^tumo sahā hoti nihīnapañño,^eb^ sopi teneva saha nihīnapañño hoti. sopi hi naṃ ``bālo''ti vadati. athassa vacanaṃ appamāṇaṃ, so pana ^b^sayameva vedagū ca dhīro ca hoti^eb^. evaṃ sante ^b^na koci bālo samaṇesu atthi^eb^. sabbepi hi te attano icchāya paṇḍitā.

[03] 898^b^.^eb^ ^b^aññaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0272^ea^ ^b^ito^eb^ti gāthāya sambandho attho ca -- ``atha ce sayaṃ vedagū hoti dhīro, na koci bālo samaṇesu atthī''ti evañhi vuttepi siyā kassaci ``kasmā''ti. tattha vuccate -- yasmā ^b^aññaṃ ito yābhivadanti dhammaṃ aparaddhā suddhimakevalī te, evampi titthiyā puthuso vadanti,^eb^ ye ito aññaṃ diṭṭhiṃ abhivadanti, ye aparaddhā viraddhā suddhimaggaṃ, akevalino ca teti evaṃ puthutitthiyā yasmā vadantīti vuttaṃ hoti. kasmā panevaṃ vadantīti ce? ^b^sandiṭṭhirāgena hi te bhirattā,^eb^ yasmā sakena diṭṭhirāgena abhirattāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 899-900^b^.^eb^ evaṃ abhirattā ca -- ^b^idheva suddhi^eb^nti gāthā. tattha ^b^sakāyane^eb^ti sakamagge ^b^daḷhaṃ vadānā^eb^ti daḷhavādā. evañca daḷhavādesu tesu yo koci titthiyo sakāyane vāpi daḷhaṃ vadāno ^b^kamettha bāloti paraṃ daheyya,^eb^ saṅkhepato tattha sassatucchedasaṅkhāte vitthārato vā natthikaissarakāraṇaniyatādibhede sake āyatane ``idameva sacca''nti daḷhaṃ vadāno kaṃ paraṃ ettha diṭṭhigate ``bālo''ti saha dhammena ^a^P2.0557^ea^ passeyya, nanu sabbopi tassa matena paṇḍito eva suppaṭipanno eva ca. evaṃ sante ca ^b^sayameva so medhagamāvaheyya paraṃ vadaṃ bālamasuddhidhammaṃ,^eb^ sopi paraṃ ``bālo ca asuddhidhammo ca aya''nti vadanto attanāva kalahaṃ āvaheyya. kasmā? yasmā sabbopi tassa matena paṇḍito eva suppaṭipanno eva ca.

[03] 901^b^.^eb^ evaṃ sabbathāpi ^b^vinicchaye ṭhatvā sayaṃ pamāya uddhaṃsa lokasmiṃ vivādameti,^eb^ diṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhatvā sayañca satthārādīni minitvā so bhiyyo vivādametīti. evaṃ pana vinicchayesu ādīnavaṃ ñatvā ariyamaggena ^b^hitvāna sabbāni vinicchayāni na medhagaṃ kubbati jantu loke^eb^ti arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. desanāpariyosāne purābhedasutte vuttasadiso evābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya cūḷabyūhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 902^b^.^eb^ ^b^ye^eb^ ^a^V2.0250^ea^ ^a^M2.0273^ea^ ^b^kecime^eb^ti mahābyūhasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? idampi tasmiṃyeva mahāsamaye ``kiṃ nu kho ime diṭṭhiparibbasānā viññūnaṃ santikā nindameva labhanti, udāhu pasaṃsampī''ti uppannacittānaṃ ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ tamatthaṃ āvikātuṃ purimanayena nimmitabuddhena attānaṃ pucchāpetvā vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^anvānayantī^eb^ti anu ānayanti, punappunaṃ āharanti.

[03] 903^b^.^eb^ idāni yasmā te ``idameva sacca''nti vadantā diṭṭhigatikā vādino kadāci katthaci pasaṃsampi labhanti, yaṃ etaṃ pasaṃsāsaṅkhātaṃ vādaphalaṃ, taṃ appaṃ rāgādīnaṃ samāya samatthaṃ na hoti, ko pana vādo dutiye nindāphale, tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento imaṃ tāva vissajjanagāthamāha. ^b^``appañhi etaṃ na alaṃ samāya, duve vivādassa phalāni brūmī''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^duve vivādassa phalānī^eb^ti nindā pasaṃsā ca, jayaparājayādīni vā taṃsabhāgāni. ^b^etampi disvā^eb^ti ``nindā aniṭṭhā eva, pasaṃsā nālaṃ samāyā''ti etampi vivādaphale ādīnavaṃ disvā. ^b^khemābhipassaṃ avivādabhūmi^eb^nti avivādabhūmiṃ ^a^P2.0558^ea^ nibbānaṃ ``khema''nti passamāno.

[03] 904^b^.^eb^ evañhi avivadamāno -- ^b^yā kācimā^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^sammutiyo^eb^ti diṭṭhiyo. ^b^puthujjā^eb^ti puthujjanasambhavā. ^b^so upayaṃ kimeyyā^eb^ti so upagantabbaṭṭhena upayaṃ rūpādīsu ekampi dhammaṃ kiṃ upeyya, kena vā kāraṇena upeyya. ^b^diṭṭhe sute khantimakubbamāno^eb^ti diṭṭhasutasuddhīsu pemaṃ akaronto.

[03] 905^b^.^eb^ ito bāhirā pana -- ^b^sīluttamā^eb^ti gāthā. tassattho -- sīlaṃyeva ``uttama''nti maññamānā ^b^sīluttamā^eb^ eke bhonto saṃyamamattena ^b^suddhiṃ^eb^ vadanti, hatthivatādiñca ^b^vataṃ samādāya upaṭṭhitā, idheva^eb^ diṭṭhiyaṃ ^b^assa^eb^ satthuno ^b^suddhi^eb^nti ^b^bhavūpanītā^eb^ bhavajjhositā samānā vadanti, apica te ^b^kusalā vadānā^eb^ ``kusalā maya''nti evaṃ vādā.

[03] 906^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^M2.0274^ea^ sīluttamesu ca tesu tathā paṭipanno yo koci -- ^b^sace cuto^eb^ti gāthā. tassattho -- ^b^sace^eb^ tato ^b^sīlavatato^eb^ paravicchandanena vā anabhisambhuṇanto vā ^b^cuto hoti,^eb^ so taṃ ^a^V2.0251^ea^ sīlabbatādikammaṃ puññābhisaṅkhārādikammaṃ vā ^b^virādhayitvā pavedhatī^eb^. na kevalañca vedhati, apica kho taṃ sīlabbatasuddhiṃ ^b^pajappatī^eb^ ca vippalapati ^b^patthayatī^eb^ ca. kimiva? ^b^satthāva hīno pavasaṃ gharamhā^eb^. gharamhā pavasanto satthato hīno yathā taṃ gharaṃ vā satthaṃ vā pattheyyāti.

[03] 907^b^.^eb^ evaṃ pana sīluttamānaṃ vedhakāraṇaṃ ariyasāvako -- ^b^sīlabbataṃ vāpi pahāya sabba^eb^nti gāthā. tattha ^b^sāvajjanavajja^eb^nti sabbākusalaṃ lokiyakusalañca. ^b^etaṃ suddhiṃ asuddhinti apatthayāno^eb^ti pañcakāmaguṇādibhedaṃ etaṃ suddhiṃ, akusalādibhedaṃ asuddhiñca apatthayamāno. ^b^virato care^eb^ti suddhiyā asuddhiyā ca virato careyya. ^b^santimanuggahāyā^eb^ti diṭṭhiṃ agahetvā.

[03] 908^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ito bāhirake sīluttame saṃyamena visuddhivāde tesaṃ vighātaṃ sīlabbatappahāyino arahato ca paṭipattiṃ dassetvā idāni aññathāpi suddhivāde bāhirake dassento ^b^``tamūpanissāyā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- santaññepi samaṇabrāhmaṇā, te ^b^jigucchitaṃ^eb^ amarantapaṃ vā diṭṭhasuddhiādīsu vā aññataraññataraṃ ^b^upanissāya^eb^ akiriyadiṭṭhiyā vā ^b^uddhaṃsarā^eb^ hutvā ^b^bhavābhavesu avītataṇhāse^eb^ ^a^P2.0559^ea^ ^b^suddhimanutthunanti^eb^ vadanti kathentīti.
