[03] 909^b^.^eb^ evaṃ tesaṃ avītataṇhānaṃ suddhiṃ anutthunantānaṃ yopi suddhippattameva attānaṃ maññeyya, tassapi avītataṇhattā bhavābhavesu taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ ^b^patthayamānassa hi jappitāni^eb^ punappunaṃ hontiyevāti adhippāyo. taṇhā hi āsevitā taṇhaṃ vaḍḍhayateva. na kevalañca jappitāni, ^b^pavedhitaṃ vāpi pakappitesu,^eb^ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi cassa pakappitesu vatthūsu pavedhitampi hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. bhavābhavesu pana vītataṇhattā āyatiṃ ^b^cutūpapāto idha yassa natthi, sakena vedheyya kuhiṃva jappe^eb^ti ayametissā gāthāya sambandho. sesaṃ niddese vuttanayameva.

[03] 910-11^b^.^eb^ ^b^yamāhū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0275^ea^ pucchāgāthā. idāni yasmā ekopi ettha vādo sacco natthi, kevalaṃ diṭṭhimattakena hi te vadanti, tasmā tamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``sakañhī''^eb^ti imaṃ tāva vissajjanagāthamāha. tattha ^b^sammuti^eb^nti diṭṭhiṃ.

[03] 912^b^.^eb^ evametesu sakaṃ dhammaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ bruvantesu aññassa pana dhammaṃ ``hīna''nti vadantesu yassa kassaci -- ^b^parassa ce vambhayitena hīno^eb^ti gāthā. tassattho -- yadi ^b^parassa^eb^ ninditakāraṇā ^b^hīno^eb^ bhaveyya, ^b^na koci dhammesu visesi^eb^ aggo bhaveyya. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^puthū hi^eb^ ^a^V2.0252^ea^ ^b^aññassa vadanti dhammaṃ, nihīnato^eb^ sabbeva te ^b^samhi daḷhaṃ vadānā^eb^ sakadhamme daḷhavādā eva.

[03] 913^b^.^eb^ kiñca bhiyyo -- ^b^saddhammapūjā^eb^ti gāthā. tassattho -- te ca titthiyā ^b^yathā pasaṃsanti sakāyanāni, saddhammapūjāpi nesaṃ tatheva^eb^ vattati. te hi ativiya satthārādīni sakkaronti. tattha yadi te pamāṇā siyuṃ, evaṃ sante ^b^sabbeva vādā tathiyā bhaveyyuṃ^eb^. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^suddhī hi nesaṃ paccattameva,^eb^ na sā aññatra sijjhati, nāpi paramatthato. attani diṭṭhigāhamattameva hi taṃ tesaṃ parapaccayaneyyabuddhīnaṃ.

[03] 914^b^.^eb^ yo vā pana viparīto bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇo, tassa -- ^b^na brāhmaṇassa paraneyyamatthī^eb^ti gāthā. tassattho -- ^b^brāhmaṇassa^eb^ ^a^P2.0560^ea^ hi ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''tiādinā (dha0 pa0 277; netti0 5) nayena sudiṭṭhattā parena netabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ natthi, diṭṭhi^b^dhammesu^eb^ ``idameva sacca''nti nicchinitvā ^b^samuggahīta^eb^mpi natthi. taṃkāraṇā so diṭṭhikalahāni atīto, na ca so ^b^seṭṭhato passati dhammamaññaṃ^eb^ aññatra satipaṭṭhānādīhi.

[03] 915^b^.^eb^ ^b^jānāmī^eb^ti gāthāya sambandho attho ca -- evaṃ tāva paramatthabrāhmaṇo na hi seṭṭhato passati dhammamaññaṃ, aññe pana titthiyā paracittañāṇādīhi jānantā passantāpi ^b^``jānāmi passāmi tatheva eta''^eb^nti evaṃ vadantāpi ca ^b^diṭṭhiyā suddhiṃ paccenti^eb^. kasmā? yasmā tesu ekopi ^b^addakkhi ce^eb^ addasa cepi ^b^tena^eb^ paracittañāṇādinā yathābhūtaṃ atthaṃ, ^b^kiñhi tumassa tena^eb^ tassa tena dassanena kiṃ kataṃ, kiṃ dukkhapariññā sādhitā, udāhu samudayapahānādīnaṃ ^a^M2.0276^ea^ aññataraṃ, yato sabbathāpi atikkamitvā ariyamaggaṃ te titthiyā aññeneva ^b^vadanti suddhiṃ,^eb^ atikkamitvā vā te titthiye buddhādayo aññeneva vadanti suddhinti.

[03] 916^b^.^eb^ ^b^passaṃ naro^eb^ti gāthāya sambandho attho ca. kiñca bhiyyo? yvāyaṃ paracittañāṇādīhi addakkhi, so ^b^passaṃ naro dakkhati nāmarūpaṃ,^eb^ na tato paraṃ ^b^disvāna vā ñassati tānimeva^eb^ nāmarūpāni niccato sukhato vā na aññathā. so evaṃ passanto ^b^kāmaṃ bahuṃ passatu appakaṃ vā^eb^ nāmarūpaṃ niccato sukhato ca, athassa evarūpena dassanena ^b^na hi tena suddhiṃ kusalā vadantī^eb^ti.

[03] 917^b^.^eb^ ^b^nivissavādī^eb^ti gāthāya sambandho attho ca -- tena ca dassanena suddhiyā asatiyāpi ^a^V2.0253^ea^ yo ``jānāmi passāmi tatheva eta''nti evaṃ nivissavādī, etaṃ vā dassanaṃ paṭicca diṭṭhiyā suddhiṃ paccento ``idameva sacca''nti evaṃ nivissavādī, so ^b^subbinayo^eb^ na hoti taṃ tathā ^b^pakappitaṃ^eb^ abhisaṅkhataṃ ^b^diṭṭhiṃ purekkharāno^eb^. so hi yaṃ satthārādiṃ ^b^nissito, tattheva subhaṃ vadāno suddhiṃ vado,^eb^ ``parisuddhavādo ^a^P2.0561^ea^ parisuddhadassano vā aha''nti attānaṃ maññamāno tattha tathaddasā so, tattha sakāya diṭṭhiyā aviparītameva so addasa. yathā sā diṭṭhi pavattati, tatheva naṃ addasa, na aññathā passituṃ icchatīti adhippāyo.

[03] 918^b^.^eb^ evaṃ pakappitaṃ diṭṭhiṃ purekkharānesu titthiyesu -- ^b^na brāhmaṇo kappamupeti saṅkhā^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^saṅkhā^eb^ti saṅkhāya, jānitvāti attho. ^b^napi ñāṇabandhū^eb^ti samāpattiñāṇādinā akatataṇhādiṭṭhibandhu. tattha viggaho -- nāpi assa ñāṇena kato bandhu atthīti napi ñāṇabandhu. ^b^sammutiyo^eb^ti diṭṭhisammutiyo. ^b^puthujjā^eb^ti puthujjanasambhavā. ^b^uggahaṇanti maññe^eb^ti uggahaṇanti aññe, aññe tā sammutiyo uggaṇhantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
[03] 919^b^.^eb^ kiñca bhiyyo -- ^b^vissajja ganthānī^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^anuggaho^eb^ti uggahaṇavirahito, sopi nāssa uggahoti anuggaho, na vā uggaṇhātīti anuggaho.

[03] 920^b^.^eb^ kiñca ^a^M2.0277^ea^ bhiyyo -- so evarūpo -- ^b^pubbāsave^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^pubbāsave^eb^ti atītarūpādīni ārabbha uppajjamānadhamme kilese. ^b^nave^eb^ti paccuppannarūpādīni ārabbha uppajjamānadhamme. ^b^na chandagū^eb^ti chandādivasena na gacchati. ^b^anattagarahī^eb^ti katākatavasena attānaṃ agarahanto.

[03] 921^b^.^eb^ evaṃ anattagarahī ca -- ^b^sa sabbadhammesū^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^sabbadhammesū^eb^ti dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhidhammesu ``yaṃ kiñci diṭṭhaṃ vā''ti evaṃpabhedesu. ^b^pannabhāro^eb^ti patitabhāro. na kappetīti ^b^na kappiyo,^eb^ duvidhampi kappaṃ na karotīti attho. ^b^nūparato^eb^ti puthujjanakalyāṇakasekkhā viya uparatisamaṅgīpi na hoti. ^b^na patthiyo^eb^ti nittaṇho. taṇhā hi patthiyatīti patthiyā, nāssa patthiyāti na patthiyoti. sesaṃ tattha tattha pākaṭamevāti na vuttaṃ. evaṃ arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi, desanāpariyosāne purābhedasutte vuttasadiso evābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya mahābyūhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 922^b^.^eb^ ^b^pucchāmi^eb^ ^a^V2.0254^ea^ ^a^P2.0562^ea^ ^b^ta^eb^nti tuvaṭakasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? idampi tasmiṃyeva mahāsamaye ``kā nu kho arahattappattiyā paṭipattī''ti uppannacittānaṃ ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ purimanayeneva nimmitabuddhena attānaṃ pucchāpetvā vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ādigāthāya tāva ^b^pucchāmī^eb^ti ettha adiṭṭhajotanādivasena pucchā vibhajitā. ^b^ādiccabandhu^eb^nti ādiccassa gottabandhuṃ. ^b^vivekaṃ santipadañcā^eb^ti vivekañca santipadañca. ^b^kathaṃ disvā^eb^ti kena kāraṇena disvā, kathaṃ pavattadassano hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 923^b^.^eb^ atha bhagavā yasmā yathā passanto kilese uparundhati, tathā pavattadassano hutvā parinibbāti, tasmā tamatthaṃ āvikaronto nānappakārena ^a^M2.0278^ea^ taṃ devaparisaṃ kilesappahāne niyojento ^b^``mūlaṃ papañcasaṅkhāyā''^eb^ti ārabhitvā pañca gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ādigāthāya tāva saṅkhepattho -- papañcāti saṅkhātattā papañcā eva papañcasaṅkhā. tassā avijjādayo kilesā mūlaṃ, taṃ papañcasaṅkhāya mūlaṃ ^b^asmī^eb^ti pavattamānañca ^b^sabbaṃ^eb^ mantāya ^b^uparundhe. yā kāci ajjhattaṃ taṇhā^eb^ upajjeyyuṃ, ^b^tāsaṃ vinayā sadā sato sikkhe^eb^ upaṭṭhitassati hutvā sikkheyyāti.

[03] 924^b^.^eb^ evaṃ tāva paṭhamagāthāya eva tisikkhāyuttaṃ desanaṃ arahattanikūṭena desetvā puna mānappahānavasena desetuṃ ^b^``yaṃ kiñcī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^yaṃ kiñci dhammamabhijaññā ajjhatta^eb^nti yaṃ kiñci uccākulīnatādikaṃ attano guṇaṃ jāneyya ^b^atha vāpi bahiddhā^eb^ti atha vā bahiddhāpi ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vā guṇaṃ jāneyya. ^b^na tena thāmaṃ kubbethā^eb^ti tena guṇena thāmaṃ na kareyya.

[03] 925^b^.^eb^ idānissa akaraṇavidhiṃ dassento ^b^``seyyo na tenā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- ^b^tena^eb^ ca mānena ``seyyoha''nti ^a^P2.0563^ea^ vā ``nīcoha''nti vā ``sarikkhoha''nti vāpi ^b^na maññeyya,^eb^ tehi ^a^V2.0255^ea^ ca uccākulīnatādīhi guṇehi ^b^phuṭṭho anekarūpehi^eb^ ``ahaṃ uccākulā pabbajito''tiādinā nayena ^b^attānaṃ vikappento na tiṭṭheyya^eb^.

[03] 926^b^.^eb^ evaṃ mānappahānavasenapi desetvā idāni sabbakilesūpasamavasenapi desetuṃ ^b^``ajjhattamevā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^ajjhattamevupasame^eb^ti attani eva rāgādisabbakilese upasameyya. ^b^na aññato bhikkhu santimeseyyā^eb^ti ṭhapetvā ca satipaṭṭhānādīni aññena upāyena santiṃ na pariyeseyya. ^b^kuto nirattā vā^eb^ti nirattā kuto eva.

[03] 927^b^.^eb^ idāni ajjhattaṃ upasantassa khīṇāsavassa tādibhāvaṃ dassento ^b^``majjhe yathā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- ^b^yathā mahāsamuddassa^eb^ uparimaheṭṭhimabhāgānaṃ vemajjhasaṅkhāte catuyojanasahassappamāṇe ^b^majjhe^eb^ pabbatantare ṭhitassa vā majjhe samuddassa ^b^ūmi na jāyati, ṭhitova^eb^ so ^b^hoti^eb^ ^a^M2.0279^ea^ avikampamāno, ^b^evaṃ^eb^ anejo khīṇāsavo lābhādīsu ^b^ṭhito^eb^ assa avikampamāno, so tādiso rāgādi^b^ussadaṃ bhikkhu na kareyya kuhiñcī^eb^ti.

[03] 928^b^.^eb^ idāni etaṃ arahattanikūṭena desitaṃ dhammadesanaṃ abbhanumodanto tassa ca arahattassa ādipaṭipadaṃ pucchanto nimmitabuddho ^b^``akittayī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^akittayī^eb^ti ācikkhi. ^b^vivaṭacakkhū^eb^ti vivaṭehi anāvaraṇehi pañcahi cakkhūhi samannāgato. ^b^sakkhidhamma^eb^nti sayaṃ abhiññātaṃ attapaccakkhaṃ dhammaṃ. ^b^parissayavinaya^eb^nti parissayavinayanaṃ. ^b^paṭipadaṃ vadehī^eb^ti idāni paṭipattiṃ vadehi. ^b^bhaddante^eb^ti ``bhaddaṃ tava atthū''ti bhagavantaṃ ālapanto āha. atha vā bhaddaṃ sundaraṃ tava paṭipadaṃ vadehīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^pātimokkhaṃ atha vāpi samādhi^eb^nti tameva paṭipadaṃ bhinditvā pucchati. paṭipadanti etena vā maggaṃ pucchati. itarehi sīlaṃ samādhiñca pucchati.

[03] 929-30^b^.^eb^ athassa bhagavā yasmā indriyasaṃvaro sīlassa rakkhā ^a^P2.0564^ea^, yasmā vā iminā anukkamena desiyamānā ayaṃ desanā tāsaṃ devatānaṃ sappāyā, tasmā indriyasaṃvarato pabhuti paṭipadaṃ dassento ^b^``cakkhūhī''^eb^tiādimāraddho. tattha ^b^cakkhūhi neva lolassā^eb^ti adiṭṭhadakkhitabbādivasena cakkhūhi lolo nevassa. ^b^gāmakathāya āvaraye sota^eb^nti tiracchānakathāto sotaṃ āvareyya. ^b^phassenāti^eb^ rogaphassena. ^b^bhavañca^eb^ ^b^nābhijappeyyā^eb^ti tassa phassassa vinodanatthāya kāmabhavādibhavañca na pattheyya. ^b^bheravesu ca na sampavedheyyā^eb^ti tassa phassassa paccayabhūtesu sīhabyagghādīsu bheravesu ca na sampavedheyya, avasesesu vā ghānindriyamanindriyavisayesu ^a^V2.0256^ea^ nappavedheyya. evaṃ paripūro indriyasaṃvaro vutto hoti. purimehi vā indriyasaṃvaraṃ dassetvā iminā ``araññe vasatā bheravaṃ disvā vā sutvā vā na vedhitabba''nti dasseti.
[03] 931^b^.^eb^ ^b^laddhā na sannidhiṃ kayirā^eb^ti etesaṃ annādīnaṃ yaṃkiñci dhammena labhitvā ``araññe ca senāsane vasatā sadā dullabha''nti cintetvā sannidhiṃ na kareyya.

[03] 932^b^.^eb^ ^b^jhāyī^eb^ ^a^M2.0280^ea^ ^b^na pādalolassā^eb^ti jhānābhirato ca na pādalolo assa. ^b^virame kukkuccā nappamajjeyyā^eb^ti hatthakukkuccādikukkuccaṃ vinodeyya. sakkaccakāritāya cettha nappamajjeyya.
[03] 933^b^.^eb^ ^b^tandiṃ māyaṃ hassaṃ khiḍḍa^eb^nti ālasiyañca māyañca hassañca kāyikacetasikakhiḍḍañca. ^b^savibhūsa^eb^nti saddhiṃ vibhūsāya.

[03] 934-7^b^.^eb^ ^b^āthabbaṇa^eb^nti āthabbaṇikamantappayogaṃ. ^b^supina^eb^nti supinasatthaṃ. ^b^lakkhaṇa^eb^nti maṇilakkhaṇādiṃ. ^b^no vidahe^eb^ti nappayojeyya. ^b^viruta^eb^nti migādīnaṃ vassitaṃ. ^b^pesuṇiya^eb^nti pesuññaṃ. ^b^kayavikkaye^eb^ti pañcahi sahadhammikehi saddhiṃ vañcanāvasena vā udayapatthanāvasena vā na tiṭṭheyya. ^b^upavādaṃ bhikkhu na kareyyā^eb^ti upavādakare kilese anibbattento attani parehi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi upavādaṃ na janeyya. ^b^gāme ca nābhisajjeyyā^eb^ti gāme ca gihisaṃsaggādīhi nābhisajjeyya. ^b^lābhakamyā janaṃ na lapayeyyā^eb^ti lābhakāmatāya janaṃ nālapayeyya. ^b^payutta^eb^nti cīvarādīhi sampayuttaṃ ^a^P2.0565^ea^, tadatthaṃ vā payojitaṃ.

[03] 938-9^b^.^eb^ ^b^mosavajje na nīyethā^eb^ti musāvāde na nīyetha. ^b^jīvitenā^eb^ti jīvikāya. ^b^sutvā rusito bahuṃ vācaṃ, samaṇānaṃ vā puthujanāna^eb^nti rusito ghaṭṭito parehi tesa samaṇānaṃ vā khattiyādibhedānaṃ vā aññesaṃ puthujanānaṃ bahumpi aniṭṭhavācaṃ sutvā. ^b^na paṭivajjā^eb^ti na paṭivadeyya. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^na hi santo paṭisenikaronti^eb^.
[03] 940^b^.^eb^ ^b^etañca dhammamaññāyā^eb^ti sabbametaṃ yathāvuttaṃ dhammaṃ ñatvā. ^b^vicina^eb^nti vicinanto. ^b^santīti nibbutiṃ ñatvā^eb^ti nibbutiṃ rāgādīnaṃ santīti ñatvā.

[03] 941^b^.^eb^ kiṃkāraṇā ^a^V2.0257^ea^ nappamajjeiti ce -- ^b^abhibhū hi so^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^abhibhū^eb^ti rūpādīnaṃ abhibhavitā. ^b^anabhibhūto^eb^ti tehi anabhibhūto. ^b^sakkhidhammamanītihamadassī^eb^ti paccakkhameva anītihaṃ dhammamaddakkhi. ^b^sadā namassamanusikkhe^eb^ti sadā namassanto tisso sikkhāyo sikkheyya. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.

[03] kevalaṃ ^a^M2.0281^ea^ pana ettha ``cakkhūhi neva lolo''tiādīhi indriyasaṃvaro, ``annānamatho pānāna''ntiādīhi sannidhipaṭikkhepamukhena paccayapaṭisevanasīlaṃ, methunamosavajjapesuṇiyādīhi pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ, ``āthabbaṇaṃ supinaṃ lakkhaṇa''ntiādīhi ājīvapārisuddhisīlaṃ, ``jhāyī assā''ti iminā samādhi, ``vicinaṃ bhikkhū''ti iminā paññā, ``sadā sato sikkhe''ti iminā puna saṅkhepato tissopi sikkhā, ``atha āsanesu sayanesu, appasaddesu bhikkhu vihareyya, niddaṃ na bahulīkareyyā''tiādīhi sīlasamādhipaññānaṃ upakārāpakārasaṅgaṇhanavinodanāni vuttānīti. evaṃ bhagavā nimmitassa paripuṇṇapaṭipadaṃ vatvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi, desanāpariyosāne purābhedasutte vuttasadisoyevābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya tuvaṭakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 942^b^.^eb^ ^b^attadaṇḍā^eb^ ^a^V2.0258^ea^ ^a^P2.0566^ea^ ^b^bhayaṃ jāta^eb^nti attadaṇḍasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? yo so sammāparibbājanīyasuttassa uppattiyaṃ vuccamānāya sākiyakoliyānaṃ udakaṃ paṭicca kalaho vaṇṇito, taṃ ñatvā bhagavā ``ñātakā kalahaṃ karonti, handa ne vāressāmī''ti dvinnaṃ senānaṃ majjhe ṭhatvā imaṃ suttamabhāsi.

[03] tattha paṭhamagāthāyattho -- yaṃ lokassa diṭṭhadhammikaṃ vā samparāyikaṃ vā bhayaṃ jātaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ ^b^attadaṇḍā bhayaṃ jātaṃ^eb^ attano duccaritakāraṇā jātaṃ, evaṃ santepi ^b^janaṃ passatha medhagaṃ^eb^, imaṃ sākiyādijanaṃ passatha aññamaññaṃ medhagaṃ hiṃsakaṃ bādhakanti. evaṃ taṃ paṭiviruddhaṃ vippaṭipannaṃ janaṃ paribhāsitvā attano sammāpaṭipattidassanena tassa saṃvegaṃ janetuṃ āha ^a^M2.0282^ea^ ^b^``saṃvegaṃ kittayissāmi, yathā saṃvijitaṃ mayā''^eb^ti, pubbe bodhisatteneva satāti adhippāyo.

[03] 943^b^.^eb^ idāni yathānena saṃvijitaṃ, taṃ pakāraṃ dassento ^b^``phandamāna''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^phandamāna^eb^nti taṇhādīhi kampamānaṃ. ^b^appodake^eb^ti appaudake. ^b^aññamaññehi byāruddhe disvā^eb^ti nānāsatte ca aññamaññehi saddhiṃ viruddhe disvā. ^b^maṃ bhayamāvisī^eb^ti maṃ bhayaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ.

[03] 944^b^.^eb^ ^b^samantamasāro loko^eb^ti nirayaṃ ādiṃ katvā samantato loko asāro niccasārādirahito. ^b^disā sabbā sameritā^eb^ti sabbā disā aniccatāya kampitā. ^b^icchaṃ bhavanamattano^eb^ti attano tāṇaṃ icchanto. ^b^nāddasāsiṃ anosita^eb^nti kiñci ṭhānaṃ jarādīhi anajjhāvutthaṃ nāddakkhiṃ.

[03] 945^b^.^eb^ ^b^osānetveva byāruddhe, disvā me aratī ahū^eb^ti yobbaññādīnaṃ osāne eva antagamake eva vināsake eva jarādīhi byāruddhe āhatacitte satte disvā arati me ahosi. ^b^athettha salla^eb^nti atha ^a^P2.0567^ea^ etesu sattesu rāgādisallaṃ. ^b^hadayanissita^eb^nti cittanissitaṃ.

[03] 946^b^.^eb^ ``kathaṃānubhāvaṃ ^a^V2.0259^ea^ salla''nti ce -- ^b^yena sallena otiṇṇo^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^disā sabbā vidhāvatī^eb^ti sabbā duccaritadisāpi puratthimādidisāvidisāpi dhāvati. ^b^tameva sallamabbuyha, na dhāvati na sīdatī^eb^ti tameva sallaṃ uddharitvā tā ca disā na dhāvati, caturoghe ca na sīdatīti.

[03] 947^b^.^eb^ evaṃmahānubhāvena sallena otiṇṇesvapi ca sattesu -- ^b^tattha sikkhānugīyanti, yāni loke gadhitānī^eb^ti gāthā. tassattho -- ye ^b^loke^eb^ pañca kāmaguṇā paṭilābhāya gijjhantīti katvā ``gadhitānī''ti vuccanti, cirakālāsevitattā vā ``gadhitānī''ti vuccanti, ^b^tattha^eb^ taṃ nimittaṃ hatthisikkhādikā anekā ^b^sikkhā^eb^ kathīyanti uggayhanti vā. passatha yāva pamatto vāyaṃ loko, yato paṇḍito kulaputto ^b^tesu^eb^ vā gadhitesu tāsu vā sikkhāsu adhimutto ^b^na siyā,^eb^ aññadatthu aniccādidassanena ^b^nibbijjha sabbaso kāme attano nibbānameva sikkhe^eb^ti.

[03] 948^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^M2.0283^ea^ yathā nibbānāya sikkhitabbaṃ, taṃ dassento ^b^``sacco siyā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sacco^eb^ti vācāsaccena ñāṇasaccena maggasaccena ca samannāgato. ^b^rittapesuṇo^eb^ti pahīnapesuṇo. ^b^veviccha^eb^nti macchariyaṃ.
[03] 949^b^.^eb^ ^b^niddaṃ tandiṃ sahe thīna^eb^nti pacalāyikañca kāyālasiyañca cittālasiyañcāti ime tayo dhamme abhibhaveyya. ^b^nibbānamanaso^eb^ti nibbānaninnacitto.

[03] 950-51^b^.^eb^ ^b^sāhasā^eb^ti rattassa rāgacariyādibhedā sāhasakaraṇā. ^b^purāṇaṃ nābhinandeyyā^eb^ti atītarūpādiṃ nābhinandeyya. ^b^nave^eb^ti paccuppanne. ^b^hiyyamāne^eb^ti vinassamāne. ^b^ākāsaṃ na sito siyā^eb^ti taṇhānissito na bhaveyya. taṇhā hi rūpādīnaṃ ākāsanato ``ākāso''ti vuccati.

[03] 952^b^.^eb^ ``kiṃkāraṇā ākāsaṃ na sito siyā''ti ce -- ``^b^gedhaṃ brūmī^eb^''ti gāthā. tassattho -- ahañhi imaṃ ākāsasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhaṃ rūpādīsu gijjhanato ^b^gedhaṃ brūmi^eb^ ``gedho''ti vadāmi. kiñca bhiyyo -- avahananaṭṭhena ^b^``ogho''^eb^ti ca ājavanaṭṭhena ^b^``ājava''^eb^nti ca ``idaṃ mayhaṃ, idaṃ mayha''nti jappakāraṇato ^b^``jappana''^eb^nti ca dummuñcanaṭṭhena ^b^``ārammaṇa''^eb^nti ^a^P2.0568^ea^ ca kampakaraṇena ^b^``pakampana''^eb^nti ca brūmi, esā ca lokassa palibodhaṭṭhena duratikkamanīyaṭṭhena ca ^a^V2.0260^ea^ ^b^kāmapaṅko duraccayo^eb^ti. ``ākāsaṃ na sito siyā''ti evaṃ vutte vā ``kimetaṃ ākāsa''nti ce? ^b^gedhaṃ brūmī^eb^ti. evampi tassā gāthāya sambandho veditabbo. tattha padayojanā -- ākāsanti gedhaṃ brūmīti. tathā yvāyaṃ mahoghoti vuccati. taṃ brūmi, ājavaṃ brūmi, jappanaṃ brūmi, pakampanaṃ brūmi, yvāyaṃ sadevake loke kāmapaṅko duraccayo, taṃ brūmīti.

[03] 953^b^.^eb^ evametaṃ gedhādipariyāyaṃ ākāsaṃ anissito -- ^b^saccā avokkammā^eb^ti gāthā. tassattho -- pubbe vuttā tividhāpi ^b^saccā avokkamma^eb^ moneyyappattiyā ^b^munī^eb^ti saṅkhyaṃ gato nibbānatthale ^b^tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo,^eb^ sa ve evarūpo sabbāni āyatanāni nissajjitvā ^b^``santo''^eb^ti vuccatīti.

[03] 954^b^.^eb^ kiñca ^a^M2.0284^ea^ bhiyyo -- ^b^sa ve vidvā^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^ñatvā dhamma^eb^nti aniccādinayena saṅkhatadhammaṃ ñatvā. ^b^sammā so loke iriyāno^eb^ti asammāiriyanakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ pahānā sammā so loke iriyamāno.
[03] 955^b^.^eb^ evaṃ apihento ca -- ^b^yodha kāme^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^saṅga^eb^nti sattavidhaṃ saṅgañca yo accatari ^b^nājjhetī^eb^ti nābhijjhāyati.

[03] 956^b^.^eb^ tasmā tumhesupi yo evarūpo hotumicchati, taṃ vadāmi -- ^b^yaṃ pubbe^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^yaṃ pubbe^eb^ti atīte saṅkhāre ārabbha uppajjanadhammaṃ kilesajātaṃ atītakammañca. ^b^pacchā te māhu kiñcana^eb^nti anāgatepi saṅkhāre ārabbha uppajjanadhammaṃ rāgādikiñcanaṃ māhu. ^b^majjhe ce no gahessasī^eb^ti paccuppanne rūpādidhammepi na gahessasi ce.

[03] 957^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ``upasanto carissasī''ti arahattappattiṃ dassetvā idāni arahato thutivasena ito parā gāthāyo abhāsi. tattha ^b^sabbaso^eb^ti gāthāya ^b^mamāyita^eb^nti mamattakaraṇaṃ, ``mama ida''nti gahitaṃ vā vatthu. ^b^asatā ca na socatī^eb^ti avijjamānakāraṇā asantakāraṇā na socati. ^b^na jīyatī^eb^ti jānimpi na gacchati.

[03] 958-9^b^.^eb^ kiñca bhiyyo -- ^b^yassa natthī^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^a^P2.0569^ea^ ^b^kiñcana^eb^nti kiñci rūpādidhammajātaṃ. kiñca bhiyyo -- ^b^aniṭṭhurī^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^aniṭṭhurī^eb^ti anissukī. ``aniddhurī''tipi keci paṭhanti. ^b^sabbadhī samo^eb^ti sabbattha samo, upekkhakoti adhippāyo. kiṃ ^a^V2.0261^ea^ vuttaṃ hoti? yo so ``natthi me''ti na socati, tamahaṃ avikampinaṃ puggalaṃ puṭṭho samāno aniṭṭhurī ananugiddho anejo sabbadhi samoti imaṃ tasmiṃ puggale catubbidhamānisaṃsaṃ brūmīti.

[03] 960^b^.^eb^ kiñca bhiyyo -- ^b^anejassā^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^nisaṅkhatī^eb^ti puññābhisaṅkhārādīsu yo koci saṅkhāro. so hi yasmā nisaṅkhariyati nisaṅkharoti vā, tasmā ``nisaṅkhatī''ti vuccati. ^b^viyārambhā^eb^ti vividhā puññābhisaṅkhārādikā ^a^M2.0285^ea^ ārambhā. ^b^khemaṃ passati sabbadhī^eb^ti sabbattha abhayameva passati.

[03] 961^b^.^eb^ evaṃ passanto ^b^na samesū^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^na vadate^eb^ti ``sadisohamasmī''tiādinā mānavasena samesupi attānaṃ na vadati omesupi ussesupi. ^b^nādeti na nirassatī^eb^ti rūpādīsu kañci dhammaṃ na gaṇhāti; na nissajjati. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva. evaṃ arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi, desanāpariyosāne pañcasatā sākiyakumārā ca koliyakumārā ca ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitā, te gahetvā bhagavā mahāvanaṃ pāvisīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya attadaṇḍasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 962^b^.^eb^ ^b^na^eb^ ^a^V2.0262^ea^ ^b^me diṭṭho^eb^ti sāriputtasuttaṃ, ``therapañhasutta''ntipi vuccati. kā uppatti? imassa suttassa uppatti -- rājagahakassa ^a^P2.0570^ea^ seṭṭhissa candanaghaṭikāya paṭilābhaṃ ādiṃ katvā tāya candanaghaṭikāya katassa pattassa ākāse ussāpanaṃ āyasmato piṇḍolabhāradvājassa iddhiyā pattaggahaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ sāvakānaṃ iddhipaṭikkhepo, titthiyānaṃ bhagavatā saddhiṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kattukāmatā, pāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ, bhagavato sāvatthigamanaṃ, titthiyānubandhanaṃ, sāvatthiyaṃ pasenadino buddhūpagamanaṃ kaṇḍambapātubhāvo, catunnaṃ parisānaṃ titthiyajayatthaṃ pāṭihāriyakaraṇussukkanivāraṇaṃ, yamakapāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ, katapāṭihāriyassa bhagavato tāvatiṃsabhavanagamanaṃ, tattha temāsaṃ dhammadesanā, āyasmatā mahāmoggallānattherena yācitassa devalokato saṅkassanagare orohaṇanti imāni vatthūni antarantare ca jātakāni vitthāretvā yāva dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi pūjiyamāno bhagavā majjhe maṇimayena sopānena saṅkassanagare oruyha sopānakaḷevare aṭṭhāsi --
[21] ``ye ^a^M2.0286^ea^ jhānappasutā dhīrā, nekkhammūpasame ratā.
[22] devāpi tesaṃ pihayanti, sambuddhānaṃ satīmata''nti.. (dha0 pa0 181) --

[25] imissā dhammapadagāthāya vuccamānāya vuttā. sopānakaḷevare ṭhitaṃ pana bhagavantaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ āyasmā sāriputto vandi, tato uppalavaṇṇā bhikkhunī, athāparo janakāyo. tatra bhagavā cintesi -- ``imissaṃ parisati moggallāno iddhiyā aggoti pākaṭo, anuruddho dibbacakkhunā, puṇṇo dhammakathikattena, sāriputtaṃ panāyaṃ parisā na kenaci guṇena evaṃ aggoti jānāti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ sāriputtaṃ paññāguṇena pakāseyya''nti. atha theraṃ pañhaṃ pucchi. thero bhagavatā pucchitaṃ pucchitaṃ puthujjanapañhaṃ, sekkhapañhaṃ, asekkhapañhañca, sabbaṃ vissajjesi. tadā naṃ jano ``paññāya aggo''ti aññāsi ^a^P2.0571^ea^. atha bhagavā ``sāriputto na idāneva paññāya aggo, atītepi paññāya aggo''ti jātakaṃ ānesi.

[03] atīte parosahassā isayo vanamūlaphalāhārā pabbatapāde vasanti. tesaṃ ācariyassa ābādho ^a^V2.0263^ea^ uppajji, upaṭṭhānāni vattanti. jeṭṭhantevāsī ``sappāyabhesajjaṃ āharissāmi, ācariyaṃ appamattā upaṭṭhahathā''ti vatvā manussapathaṃ agamāsi. tasmiṃ anāgateyeva ācariyo kālamakāsi. taṃ ``idāni kālaṃ karissatī''ti antevāsikā samāpattimārabbha pucchiṃsu. so ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ sandhāyāha -- ``natthi kiñcī''ti, antevāsino ``natthi ācariyassa adhigamo''ti aggahesuṃ. atha jeṭṭhantevāsī bhesajjaṃ ādāya āgantvā taṃ kālakataṃ disvā ācariyaṃ ``kiñci pucchitthā''ti āha. āma pucchimhā, ``natthi kiñcī''ti āha, na kiñci ācariyena adhigatanti. natthi kiñcīti vadanto ācariyo ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ pavedesi, sakkātabbo ācariyoti.
[21] ``parosahassampi samāgatānaṃ,
[27] kandeyyuṃ te vassasataṃ apaññā.
[26] ekopi seyyo puriso sapañño,
[22] yo bhāsitassa vijānāti attha''nti.. (jā0 1.1.99).

[03] kathite ^a^M2.0287^ea^ ca pana bhagavatā jātake āyasmā sāriputto attano saddhivihārikānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānamatthāya sappāyasenāsanagocarasīlavatādīni pucchituṃ ^b^``na me diṭṭho ito pubbe''^eb^ti imaṃ thutigāthaṃ ādiṃ katvā aṭṭha gāthāyo abhāsi. tamatthaṃ vissajjento bhagavā tato parā sesagāthāti.

[03] tattha ^b^ito pubbe^eb^ti ito saṅkassanagare otaraṇato pubbe. ^b^vagguvado^eb^ti sundaravado. ^b^tusitā gaṇimāgato^eb^ti tusitakāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṃ āgatattā tusitā āgato, gaṇācariyattā gaṇī. santuṭṭhaṭṭhena vā tusitasaṅkhātā devalokā gaṇiṃ āgato tusitānaṃ vā arahantānaṃ gaṇiṃ āgatoti.

[03] 963^b^.^eb^ dutiyagāthāya ^b^sadevakassa lokassa yathā dissatīti^eb^ sadevakassa lokassa viya manussānampi dissati. yathā vā dissatīti ^a^P2.0572^ea^ tacchato aviparītato dissati ^b^cakkhumā^eb^ti uttamacakkhu. ^b^eko^eb^ti pabbajjāsaṅkhātādīhi eko. ^b^rati^eb^nti nekkhammaratiādiṃ.

[03] 964^b^.^eb^ tatiyagāthāya ^b^bahūnamidha baddhāna^eb^nti idha bahūnaṃ khattiyādīnaṃ sissānaṃ. sissā hi ^a^V2.0264^ea^ ācariye paṭibaddhavuttittā ``baddhā''ti vuccanti ^b^atthi pañhena āgama^eb^nti atthiko pañhena āgatomhi, atthikānaṃ vā pañhena āgamanaṃ, pañhena atthi āgamanaṃ vāti.

[03] 965^b^.^eb^ catutthagāthāya ^b^vijigucchato^eb^ti jātiādīhi aṭṭīyato ^b^rittamāsana^eb^nti vivittaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ. ^b^pabbatānaṃ guhāsu vā^eb^ti pabbataguhāsu vā rittamāsanaṃ bhajatoti sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03] 966^b^.^eb^ pañcamagāthāya ^b^uccāvacesū^eb^ti hīnapaṇītesu. ^b^sayanesū^eb^ti vihārādīsu senāsanesu. ^b^kīvanto tattha bheravā^eb^ti kittakā tattha bhayakāraṇā. ``kuvanto''tipi pāṭho, kūjantoti cassa attho. na pana pubbenāparaṃ sandhiyati.

[03] 967^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhagāthāya ^b^katī parissayā^eb^ti kittakā upaddavā. ^b^agataṃ disa^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. tañhi agatapubbattā agataṃ tathā niddisitabbato disā cāti ^a^M2.0288^ea^. tena vuttaṃ ``agataṃ disa''nti. ^b^abhisambhave^eb^ti abhibhaveyya. ^b^pantamhī^eb^ti pariyante.
[03] 968-9^b^.^eb^ sattamagāthāya ^b^kyāssa byappathayo assū^eb^ti kīdisāni tassa vacanāni assu. aṭṭhamagāthāya ^b^ekodi nipako^eb^ti ekaggacitto paṇḍito.

[03] 970^b^.^eb^ evaṃ āyasmatā sāriputtena tīhi gāthāhi bhagavantaṃ thometvā pañcahi gāthāhi -- pañcasatānaṃ sissānamatthāya senāsanagocarasīlavatādīni pucchito bhagavā tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ ^b^``vijigucchamānassā''^eb^tiādinā nayena vissajjanamāraddho. tattha paṭhamagāthāya tāvattho -- jātiādīhi ^b^vijigucchamānassa rittāsanaṃ sayanaṃ sevato ce sambodhikāmassa^eb^ sāriputta, bhikkhuno ^b^yadidaṃ phāsu^eb^ yo phāsuvihāro ^b^yathānudhammaṃ^eb^ yo ca anudhammo, ^b^taṃ te pavakkhāmi yathā pajānaṃ^eb^ yathā pajānanto vadeyya, evaṃ vadāmīti.

[03] 971^b^.^eb^ dutiyagāthāya ^b^pariyantacārī^eb^ti sīlādīsu catūsu pariyantesu caramāno. ^b^ḍaṃsādhipātāna^eb^nti piṅgalamakkhikānañca sesamakkhikānañca. sesamakkhikā hi tato tato adhipatitvā khādanti, tasmā ``adhipātā''ti vuccanti. ^b^manussaphassāna^eb^nti ^a^P2.0573^ea^ corādiphassānaṃ.
[03] 972^b^.^eb^ tatiyagāthāya ^b^paradhammikā^eb^ nāma satta sahadhammikavajjā sabbepi bāhirakā. ^b^kusalānuesī^eb^ti kusaladhamme anvesamāno.

[03] 973^b^.^eb^ catutthagāthāya ^a^V2.0265^ea^ ^b^ātaṅkaphassenā^eb^ti rogaphassena. ^b^sītaṃ atuṇha^eb^nti sītañca uṇhañca. ^b^so tehi phuṭṭho bahudhā^eb^ti so tehi ātaṅkādīhi anekehi ākārehi phuṭṭho samānopi. ^b^anoko^eb^ti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇādīnaṃ anokāsabhūto.

[03] 974^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ``bhikkhuno vijigucchato''tiādīhi tīhi gāthāhi puṭṭhamatthaṃ vissajjetvā idāni ``kyāssa byappathayo''tiādinā nayena puṭṭhaṃ vissajjento ^b^``theyyaṃ na kāre''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^phasse^eb^ti phareyya ^a^M2.0289^ea^. ^b^yadāvilattaṃ manaso vijaññā^eb^ti yaṃ cittassa āvilattaṃ vijāneyya, taṃ sabbaṃ ^b^``kaṇhassa pakkho''^eb^ti vinodayeyya.

[03] 975^b^.^eb^ ^b^mūlampi tesaṃ palikhañña tiṭṭhe^eb^ti tesaṃ kodhātimānānaṃ yaṃ avijjādikaṃ mūlaṃ, tampi palikhaṇitvā tiṭṭheyya. ^b^addhā bhavanto abhisambhaveyyā^eb^ti evaṃ piyappiyaṃ abhibhavanto ekaṃseneva abhibhaveyya, na tatra sithilaṃ parakkameyyāti adhippāyo.

[03] 976^b^.^eb^ ^b^paññaṃ purakkhatvā^eb^ti paññaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā. ^b^kalyāṇapītī^eb^ti kalyāṇāya pītiyā samannāgato. ^b^caturo sahetha paridevadhamme^eb^ti anantaragāthāya vuccamāne paridevanīyadhamme saheyya.

[03] 977^b^.^eb^ ^b^kiṃsū asissāmī^eb^ti kiṃ bhuñjissāmi. ^b^kuvaṃ vā asissa^eb^nti kuhiṃ vā asissāmi. ^b^dukkhaṃ vata settha kvajja sessa^eb^nti imaṃ rattiṃ dukkhaṃ sayiṃ, ajja āgamanarattiṃ kattha sayissaṃ. ^b^ete vitakke^eb^ti ete piṇḍapātanissite dve, senāsananissite dveti cattāro vitakke. ^b^aniketacārī^eb^ti apalibodhacārī nittaṇhacārī.

[03] 978^b^.^eb^ ^b^kāle^eb^ti piṇḍapātakāle piṇḍapātasaṅkhātaṃ annaṃ vā cīvarakāle cīvarasaṅkhātaṃ vasanaṃ vā laddhā dhammena samenāti adhippāyo. ^b^mattaṃ so jaññā^eb^ti paṭiggahaṇe ca paribhoge ca so pamāṇaṃ jāneyya. ^b^idhā^eb^ti sāsane, nipātamattameva vā etaṃ. ^b^tosanattha^eb^nti santosatthaṃ, etadatthaṃ mattaṃ jāneyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^so tesu gutto^eb^ti so bhikkhu tesu paccayesu gutto. ^b^yatacārī^eb^ti saṃyatavihāro ^a^P2.0574^ea^, rakkhitiriyāpatho rakkhitakāyavacīmanodvāro cāti vuttaṃ hoti. ``yaticārī''tipi pāṭho, soyevattho. ^b^rusito^eb^ti rosito, ghaṭṭitoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 979^b^.^eb^ ^b^jhānānuyutto^eb^ti anupannuppādanena uppannāsevanena ca jhāne anuyutto. ^b^upekkhamārabbha samāhitatto^eb^ti catutthajjhānupekkhaṃ uppādetvā samāhitacitto. ^b^takkāsayaṃ kukkucciyūpachinde^eb^ti ^a^V2.0266^ea^ kāmavitakkādiṃ takkañca ^a^M2.0290^ea^, kāmasaññādiṃ tassa takkassa āsayañca, hatthakukkuccādiṃ kukkucciyañca upacchindeyya.

[03] 980^b^.^eb^ ^b^cudito vacībhi satimābhinande^eb^ti upajjhāyādīhi vācāhi codito samāno satimā hutvā taṃ codanaṃ abhinandeyya. ^b^vācaṃ pamuñce kusala^eb^nti ñāṇasamuṭṭhitaṃ vācaṃ pamuñceyya. ^b^nātivela^eb^nti ativelaṃ pana vācaṃ kālavelañca sīlavelañca atikkantaṃ nappamuñceyya. ^b^janavādadhammāyā^eb^ti janavādakathāya. ^b^na cetayeyyā^eb^ti cetanaṃ na uppādeyya.

[03] 981^b^.^eb^ ^b^athāpara^eb^nti atha idāni ito parampi. ^b^pañca rajānī^eb^ti rūparāgādīni pañca rajāni. ^b^yesaṃ satīmā vinayāya sikkhe^eb^ti yesaṃ upaṭṭhitassati hutvā vinayanatthaṃ tisso sikkhā sikkheyya. evaṃ sikkhanto hi ^b^rūpesu...pe0... phassesu sahetha rāgaṃ,^eb^ na aññeti.

[03] 982^b^.^eb^ tato so tesaṃ vinayāya sikkhanto anukkamena -- ^b^etesu dhammesū^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^etesū^eb^ti rūpādīsu. ^b^kālena so sammā dhammaṃ parivīmaṃsamāno^eb^ti so bhikkhu yvāyaṃ ``uddhate citte samādhissa kālo''tiādinā nayena kālo vutto, tena kālena sabbaṃ saṅkhatadhammaṃ aniccādinayena parivīmaṃsamāno. ^b^ekodibhūto vihane tamaṃ so^eb^ti so ekaggacitto sabbaṃ mohāditamaṃ vihaneyya. natthi ettha saṃsayo. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
[03] evaṃ bhagavā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. desanāpariyosāne pañcasatā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattā, tiṃsakoṭisaṅkhyānañca devamanussānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya sāriputtasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] niṭṭhito ca catuttho vaggo atthavaṇṇanānayato, nāmena
[03] aṭṭhakavaggoti.

[03] 983^b^.^eb^ ^b^kosalānaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0267^ea^ ^a^M2.0291^ea^ ^a^P2.0575^ea^ ^b^purā rammā^eb^ti pārāyanavaggassa vatthugāthā. tāsaṃ uppatti -- atīte kira bārāṇasivāsī eko rukkhavaḍḍhakī sake ācariyake adutiyo, tassa soḷasa sissā, ekamekassa sahassaṃ antevāsikā. evaṃ te sattarasādhikasoḷasasahassā ācariyantevāsino sabbepi bārāṇasiṃ upanissāya jīvikaṃ kappentā pabbatasamīpaṃ gantvā rukkhe gahetvā tattheva nānāpāsādavikatiyo niṭṭhāpetvā kullaṃ bandhitvā gaṅgāya bārāṇasiṃ ānetvā sace rājā atthiko hoti, rañño, ekabhūmikaṃ vā...pe0... sattabhūmikaṃ vā pāsādaṃ yojetvā denti. no ce, aññesampi vikiṇitvā puttadāraṃ posenti. atha nesaṃ ekadivasaṃ ācariyo ``na sakkā vaḍḍhakikammena niccaṃ jīvikaṃ kappetuṃ, dukkarañhi jarākāle etaṃ kamma''nti cintetvā antevāsike āmantesi -- ``tātā, udumbarādayo, appasārarukkhe ānethā''ti. te ``sādhū''ti paṭissuṇitvā ānayiṃsu. so tehi kaṭṭhasakuṇaṃ katvā tassa abbhantaraṃ pavisitvā yantaṃ pūresi. kaṭṭhasakuṇo supaṇṇarājā viya ākāsaṃ laṅghitvā vanassa upari caritvā antevāsīnaṃ purato oruhi. atha ācariyo sisse āha -- ``tātā, īdisāni kaṭṭhavāhanāni katvā sakkā sakalajambudīpe rajjaṃ gahetuṃ, tumhepi, tātā, etāni karotha, rajjaṃ gahetvā jīvissāma, dukkhaṃ vaḍḍhakisippena jīvitu''nti. te tathā katvā ācariyassa paṭivedesuṃ. tato ne ācariyo āha -- ``katamaṃ, tātā, rajjaṃ gaṇhāmā''ti? ``bārāṇasirajjaṃ ācariyā''ti. ``alaṃ, tātā, mā etaṃ rucci, mayañhi taṃ gahetvāpi `vaḍḍhakirājā vaḍḍhakiyuvarājā'ti vaḍḍhakivādā na muccissāma, mahanto jambudīpo, aññattha gacchāmā''ti.

[03] tato saputtadārā kaṭṭhavāhanāni ^a^P2.0576^ea^, abhiruhitvā sajjāvudhā hutvā himavantābhimukhā gantvā himavati aññataraṃ nagaraṃ pavisitvā rañño nivesaneyeva paccuṭṭhahaṃsu. te tattha rajjaṃ gahetvā ācariyaṃ rajje abhisiñciṃsu. so ``kaṭṭhavāhano rājā''ti pākaṭo ahosi. tampi nagaraṃ ^a^V2.0268^ea^ tena gahitattā ``kaṭṭhavāhananagara''ntveva nāmaṃ labhi, tathā sakalaraṭṭhampi ^a^M2.0292^ea^. kaṭṭhavāhano rājā dhammiko ahosi, tathā yuvarājā amaccaṭṭhānesu ca ṭhapitā soḷasa sissā. taṃ raṭṭhaṃ raññā catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgayhamānaṃ ativiya iddhaṃ phītaṃ nirupaddavañca ahosi. nāgarā jānapadā rājānañca rājaparisañca ativiya mamāyiṃsu ``bhaddako no rājā laddho, bhaddikā rājaparisā''ti.

[03] athekadivasaṃ majjhimadesato vāṇijā bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā kaṭṭhavāhananagaraṃ āgamaṃsu paṇṇākārañca gahetvā rājānaṃ passiṃsu. rājā ``kuto āgatatthā''ti sabbaṃ pucchi. ``bārāṇasito devā''ti. so tattha sabbaṃ pavattiṃ pucchitvā -- ``tumhākaṃ raññā saddhiṃ mama mittabhāvaṃ karothā''ti āha. te ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchiṃsu. so tesaṃ paribbayaṃ datvā gamanakāle sampatte puna ādarena vatvā vissajjesi. te bārāṇasiṃ gantvā tassa rañño ārocesuṃ. rājā ``kaṭṭhavāhanaraṭṭhā āgatānaṃ vāṇijakānaṃ ajjatagge suṅkaṃ muñcāmī''ti bheriṃ carāpetvā ``atthu me kaṭṭhavāhano mitto''ti dvepi adiṭṭhamittā ahesuṃ. kaṭṭhavāhanopi ca sakanagare bheriṃ carāpesi -- ``ajjatagge bārāṇasito āgatānaṃ vāṇijakānaṃ suṅkaṃ muñcāmi, paribbayo ca nesaṃ dātabbo''ti. tato bārāṇasirājā kaṭṭhavāhanassa lekhaṃ pesesi ``sace tasmiṃ janapade daṭṭhuṃ vā sotuṃ vā araharūpaṃ kiñci acchariyaṃ uppajjati, amhepi dakkhāpetu ca sāvetu cā''ti. sopissa tatheva paṭilekhaṃ pesesi. evaṃ ^a^P2.0577^ea^ tesaṃ katikaṃ katvā vasantānaṃ kadāci kaṭṭhavāhanassa atimahagghā accantasukhumā kambalā uppajjiṃsu bālasūriyarasmisadisā vaṇṇena. te disvā rājā ``mama sahāyassa pesemī''ti dantakārehi aṭṭha dantakaraṇḍake likhāpetvā tesu karaṇḍakesu te kambale pakkhipitvā lākhācariyehi bahi lākhāgoḷakasadise kārāpetvā aṭṭhapi lākhāgoḷake samugge pakkhipitvā vatthena veṭhetvā rājamuddikāya lañchetvā ``bārāṇasirañño dethā''ti amacce pesesi. lekhañca adāsi ``ayaṃ paṇṇākāro nagaramajjhe amaccaparivutena pekkhitabbo''ti.

[03] te gantvā bārāṇasirañño adaṃsu. so lekhaṃ vācetvā amacce sannipātetvā nagaramajjhe rājaṅgaṇe lañchanaṃ bhinditvā paliveṭhanaṃ apanetvā samuggaṃ vivaritvā aṭṭha lākhāgoḷake disvā ``mama sahāyo lākhāgoḷakehi kīḷanakabālakānaṃ viya mayhaṃ lākhāgoḷake pesesī''ti maṅku ^a^M2.0293^ea^ hutvā ekaṃ lākhāgoḷakaṃ attano nisinnāsane pahari. tāvadeva lākhā paripati, dantakaraṇḍako vivaraṃ datvā dvebhāgo ahosi. so abbhantare kambalaṃ disvā itarepi vivari sabbattha tatheva ahosi. ekameko kambalo dīghato soḷasahattho vitthārato aṭṭhahattho. pasārite kambale ^a^V2.0269^ea^ rājaṅgaṇaṃ sūriyappabhāya obhāsitamiva ahosi. taṃ disvā mahājano aṅguliyo vidhuni, celukkhepañca akāsi, ``amhākaṃ rañño adiṭṭhasahāyo kaṭṭhavāhanarājā evarūpaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ pesesi, yuttaṃ evarūpaṃ mittaṃ kātu''nti attamano ahosi. rājā vohārike pakkosāpetvā ekamekaṃ kambalaṃ agghāpesi, sabbepi anagghā ahesuṃ. tato cintesi -- ``pacchā pesentena paṭhamaṃ pesitapaṇṇākārato atirekaṃ pesetuṃ vaṭṭati, sahāyena ca me anaggho paṇṇākāro pesito, kiṃ nu, kho, ahaṃ sahāyassa peseyya''nti? tena ca ^a^P2.0578^ea^ samayena kassapo bhagavā uppajjitvā bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati. atha rañño etadahosi -- ``vatthuttayaratanato aññaṃ uttamaratanaṃ natthi, handāhaṃ vatthuttayaratanassa uppannabhāvaṃ sahāyassa pesemī''ti. so --
[21] ``buddho loke samuppanno, hitāya sabbapāṇinaṃ.
[27] dhammo loke samuppanno, sukhāya sabbapāṇinaṃ.
[22] saṅgho loke samuppanno, puññakkhettaṃ anuttara''nti.. --

[25] imaṃ gāthaṃ, yāva arahattaṃ, tāva ekabhikkhussa paṭipattiñca suvaṇṇapaṭṭe jātihiṅgulakena likhāpetvā sattaratanamaye samugge pakkhipitvā taṃ samuggaṃ maṇimaye samugge, maṇimayaṃ masāragallamaye, masāragallamayaṃ lohitaṅgamaye, lohitaṅgamayaṃ, suvaṇṇamaye, suvaṇṇamayaṃ rajatamaye, rajatamayaṃ dantamaye, dantamayaṃ sāramaye, sāramayaṃ samuggaṃ peḷāya pakkhipitvā peḷaṃ dussena veṭhetvā lañchetvā mattavaravāraṇaṃ sovaṇṇaddhajaṃ sovaṇṇālaṅkāra hemajālasañchannaṃ kāretvā tassupari pallaṅkaṃ paññāpetvā pallaṅke peḷaṃ āropetvā setacchattena dhāriyamānena sabbagandhapupphādīhi pūjāya kariyamānāya sabbatāḷāvacarehi thutisatāni gāyamānehi yāva attano rajjasīmā, tāva maggaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā sayameva nesi. tatra ca ṭhatvā sāmantarājūnaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ pesesi -- ``evaṃ sakkarontehi ayaṃ paṇṇākāro pesetabbo''ti ^a^M2.0294^ea^. taṃ sutvā te te rājāno paṭimaggaṃ āgantvā yāva kaṭṭhavāhanassa rajjasīmā, tāva nayiṃsu.

[03] kaṭṭhavāhanopi sutvā paṭimaggaṃ āgantvā tatheva pūjento nagaraṃ pavesetvā amacce ca nāgare ca sannipātāpetvā rājaṅgaṇe paliveṭhanadussaṃ apanetvā peḷaṃ vivaritvā peḷāya samuggaṃ passitvā anupubbena sabbasamugge vivaritvā suvaṇṇapaṭṭe lekhaṃ passitvā ``kappasatasahassehi atidullabhaṃ mama sahāyo paṇṇākāraratanaṃ pesesī''ti attamano hutvā ``asutapubbaṃ vata suṇimhā `buddho loke uppanno'ti, yaṃnūnāhaṃ gantvā buddhañca passeyyaṃ dhammañca suṇeyya''nti cintetvā amacce āmantesi -- ``buddhadhammasaṅgharatanāni kira loke ^a^P2.0579^ea^ uppannāni, kiṃ kātabbaṃ maññathā''ti ^a^V2.0270^ea^. te āhaṃsu -- ``idheva tumhe, mahārāja, hotha, mayaṃ gantvā pavattiṃ jānissāmā''ti.

[03] tato soḷasasahassaparivārā soḷasa amaccā rājānaṃ abhivādetvā ``yadi buddho loke uppanno puna dassanaṃ natthi, yadi na uppanno, āgamissāmā''ti niggatā. rañño pana bhāgineyyo pacchā rājānaṃ vanditvā ``ahampi gacchāmī''ti āha. tāta, tvaṃ tattha buddhuppādaṃ ñatvā puna āgantvā mama ārocehīti. so ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchitvā agamāsi. te sabbepi sabbattha ekarattivāsena gantvā bārāṇasiṃ pattā. asampattesveva ca tesu bhagavā parinibbāyi. te ``ko buddho, kuhiṃ buddho''ti sakalavihāraṃ āhiṇḍantā sammukhasāvake disvā pucchiṃsu. te nesaṃ ``buddho parinibbuto''ti ācikkhiṃsu. te ``aho dūraddhānaṃ āgantvā dassanamattampi na labhimhā''ti paridevamānā ``kiṃ, bhante, koci bhagavatā dinnaovādo atthī''ti pucchiṃsu. āma, upāsakā atthi, saraṇattaye patiṭṭhātabbaṃ, pañcasīlāni samādātabbāni, aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato uposatho upavasitabbo, dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, pabbajitabbanti. te sutvā taṃ bhāgineyyaṃ amaccaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbe pabbajiṃsu. bhāgineyyo paribhogadhātuṃ gahetvā kaṭṭhavāhanaraṭṭhābhimukho pakkāmi. paribhogadhātu nāma bodhirukkhapattacīvarādīni. ayaṃ pana bhagavato dhammakaraṇaṃ dhammadharaṃ vinayadharamekaṃ therañca gahetvā pakkāmi, anupubbena ca nagaraṃ gantvā ``buddho loke uppanno ca parinibbutto cā''ti rañño ārocetvā bhagavatā dinnovādaṃ ācikkhi. rājā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā dhammaṃ sutvā vihāraṃ kārāpetvā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā ^a^M2.0295^ea^ bodhirukkhaṃ ropetvā saraṇattaye pañcasu ca niccasīlesu patiṭṭhāya aṭṭhaṅgupetaṃ uposathaṃ upavasanto dānādīni dento yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbatti. tepi soḷasasahassā pabbajitvā puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ katvā tasseva rañño parivārā sampajjiṃsu.

[03] te ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke khepetvā amhākaṃ bhagavati ^a^P2.0580^ea^ anuppanneyeva devalokato cavitvā ācariyo pasenadirañño pitu purohitassa putto jāto nāmena ``bāvarī''ti, tīhi mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgato tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū, pituno ca accayena purohitaṭṭhāne aṭṭhāsi. avasesāpi soḷasādhikasoḷasasahassā tattheva sāvatthiyā brāhmaṇakule nibbattā. tesu soḷasa jeṭṭhantevāsino bāvarissa santike sippaṃ uggahesuṃ, itare soḷasasahassā tesaṃyeva santiketi evaṃ te punapi sabbe samāgacchiṃsu. mahākosalarājāpi kālamakāsi, tato pasenadiṃ rajje abhisiñciṃsu. bāvarī tassāpi purohito ahosi. rājā pitarā dinnañca aññañca ^a^V2.0271^ea^ bhogaṃ bāvarissa adāsi. so hi daharakāle tasseva santike sippaṃ uggahesi. tato bāvarī rañño ārocesi -- ``pabbajissāmahaṃ, mahārājā''ti. ``ācariya, tumhesu ṭhitesu mama pitā ṭhito viya hoti, mā pabbajitthā''ti. ``alaṃ, mahārāja, pabbajissāmī''ti. rājā vāretuṃ asakkonto ``sāyaṃ pātaṃ mama dassanaṭṭhāne rājuyyāne pabbajathā''ti yāci. ācariyo soḷasasahassaparivārehi soḷasahi sissehi saddhiṃ tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā rājuyyāne vasi, rājā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahati. sāyaṃ pātañcassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.

[03] athekadivasaṃ antevāsino ācariyaṃ āhaṃsu -- ``nagarasamīpe vāso nāma mahāpalibodho, vijanasampātaṃ ācariya okāsaṃ gacchāma, pantasenāsanavāso nāma bahūpakāro pabbajitāna''nti. ācariyo ``sādhū''ti sampaṭicchitvā rañño ārocesi. rājā tikkhattuṃ vāretvā vāretuṃ asakkonto dvesatasahassāni kahāpaṇāni datvā dve amacce āṇāpesi ``yattha isigaṇo vāsaṃ icchati, tattha assamaṃ katvā dethā''ti. tato ācariyo soḷasādhikasoḷasasahassajaṭilaparivuto amaccehi anuggahamāno uttarajanapadā dakkhiṇajanapadābhimukho ^a^M2.0296^ea^ agamāsi. tamatthaṃ gahetvā āyasmā ānando saṅgītikāle pārāyanavaggassa nidānaṃ āropento imā gāthāyo abhāsi.
[03] tattha ^b^kosalānaṃ purā^eb^ti kosalaraṭṭhassa nagarā, sāvatthitoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^ākiñcañña^eb^nti akiñcanabhāvaṃ, pariggahūpakaraṇavivekanti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 984^b^.^eb^ ^b^so assakassa visaye^eb^ ^a^P2.0581^ea^, ^b^aḷakassa samāsane^eb^ti so brāhmaṇo assakassa ca aḷakassa cāti dvinnampi rājūnaṃ samāsanne visaye āsanne raṭṭhe, dvinnampi raṭṭhānaṃ majjheti adhippāyo. ^b^godhāvarī kūle^eb^ti godhāvariyā nadiyā kūle. yattha godhāvarī dvidhā bhijjitvā tiyojanappamāṇaṃ antaradīpamakāsi sabbaṃ kapiṭṭhavanasañchannaṃ, yattha pubbesarabhaṅgādayo vasiṃsu, tasmiṃ deseti adhippāyo. so kira taṃ padesaṃ disvā ``ayaṃ pubbasamaṇālayo pabbajitasāruppa''nti amaccānaṃ nivedesi. amaccā bhūmiggahaṇatthaṃ assakarañño satasahassaṃ, aḷakarañño satasahassaṃ adaṃsu. te tañca padesaṃ aññañca dviyojanamattanti sabbampi pañcayojanamattaṃ padesaṃ adaṃsu. tesaṃ kira rajjasīmantare so padeso hoti. amaccā tattha assamaṃ kāretvā sāvatthito ca aññampi dhanaṃ āharāpetvā gocaragāmaṃ nivesetvā agamaṃsu. ^b^uñche^eb^ ^a^V2.0272^ea^ ^b^na ca phalena cā^eb^ti uñchācariyāya ca vanamūlaphalena ca. tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``tasseva upanissāya, gāmo ca vipulo ahū''^eb^ti.

[03] 985^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^tassā^eb^ti tassa godhāvarīkūlassa, tassa vā brāhmaṇassa upayogatthe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, taṃ upanissāyāti attho. ^b^tato jātena āyena, mahāyaññamakappayī^eb^ti tasmiṃ gāme kasikammādinā satasahassaṃ āyo uppajji, taṃ gahetvā kuṭumbikā rañño assakassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu ``sādiyatu devo āya''nti. so ``nāhaṃ sādiyāmi, ācariyasseva upanethā''ti āha. ācariyopi taṃ attano aggahetvā dānayaññaṃ akappayi. evaṃ so saṃvacchare saṃvacchare dānamadāsi.

[03] 986^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahāyañña^eb^nti ^a^M2.0297^ea^ gāthāyattho -- so evaṃ saṃvacchare saṃvacchare dānayaññaṃ yajanto ekasmiṃ saṃvacchare taṃ ^b^mahāyaññaṃ^eb^ yajitvā tato gāmā nikkhamma ^b^puna pāvisi assamaṃ^eb^. paviṭṭho ^a^P2.0582^ea^ ca paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā ``suṭṭhu dinna''nti dānaṃ anumajjanto nisīdi. evaṃ ^b^tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi^eb^ taruṇāya brāhmaṇiyā ghare kammaṃ akātukāmāya ``eso, brāhmaṇa, bāvarī godhāvarītīre anusaṃvaccharaṃ satasahassaṃ vissajjeti, gaccha tato pañcasatāni yācitvā dāsiṃ me ānehī''ti pesito ^b^añño āgañchi brāhmaṇo^eb^ti.

[03] 987-8^b^.^eb^ ^b^ugghaṭṭapādo^eb^ti maggagamanena ghaṭṭapādatalo, paṇhikāya vā paṇhikaṃ, gopphakena vā gopphakaṃ, jaṇṇukena vā jaṇṇukaṃ āhacca ghaṭṭapādo. ^b^sukhañca kusalaṃ pucchī^eb^ti sukhañca kusalañca pucchi ``kacci te, brāhmaṇa, sukhaṃ, kacci kusala''nti.

[03] 989-91^b^.^eb^ ^b^anujānāhī^eb^ti anumaññāhi saddahāhi. ^b^sattadhā^eb^ti sattavidhena. ^b^abhisaṅkharitvā^eb^ti gomayavanapupphakusatiṇādīni ādāya sīghaṃ sīghaṃ bāvarissa assamadvāraṃ gantvā gomayena bhūmiṃ upalimpitvā pupphāni vikiritvā tiṇāni santharitvā vāmapādaṃ kamaṇḍalūdakena dhovitvā sattapādamattaṃ gantvā attano pādatale parāmasanto evarūpaṃ kuhanaṃ katvāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^bheravaṃ so akittayī^eb^ti bhayajanakaṃ vacanaṃ akittayi, ``sace me yācamānassā''ti imaṃ gāthamabhāsīti adhippāyo. ^b^dukkhito^eb^ti domanassajāto.

[03] 992-4^b^.^eb^ ^b^ussussatī^eb^ti tassa taṃ vacanaṃ kadāci saccaṃ bhaveyyāti maññamāno sussati ^a^V2.0273^ea^. ^b^devatā^eb^ti assame adhivatthā devatā eva. ^b^muddhani muddhapāte vā^eb^ti muddhe vā muddhapāte vā.
[03] 995-6^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhotī carahi jānātī^eb^ti bhotī ce jānāti. ^b^muddhādhipātañcā^eb^ti muddhapātañca. ^b^ñāṇametthā^eb^ti ñāṇaṃ me ettha.
[03] 998^b^.^eb^ ^b^purā^eb^ti ekūnatiṃsavassavayakāle. bāvaribrāhmaṇe pana godhāvarītīre vasamāne aṭṭhannaṃ vassānaṃ accayena buddho loke udapādi. ^b^apacco^eb^ti anuvaṃso.
[03] 999^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbābhiññābalappatto^eb^ti ^a^M2.0298^ea^ sabbābhiññāya balappatto, sabbā vā abhiññāyo ca balāni ca patto. ^b^vimutto^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ ^a^P2.0583^ea^ katvā pavattiyā vimuttacitto.

[03] 1001-3^b^.^eb^ ^b^sokassā^eb^ti soko assa. ^b^pahūtapañño^eb^ti mahāpañño. ^b^varabhūrimedhaso^eb^ti uttamavipulapañño bhūte abhiratavarapañño vā. ^b^vidhuro^eb^ti vigatadhuro, appaṭimoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 1004-9^b^.^eb^ ^b^mantapārage^eb^ti vedapārage. ^b^passavho^eb^ti passatha ^b^ajānata^eb^nti ajānantānaṃ. ^b^lakkhaṇā^eb^ti lakkhaṇāni. ^b^byākkhātā^eb^ti kathitāni, vitthāritānīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^samattā^eb^ti samattāni, paripuṇṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^dhammena manusāsatī^eb^ti dhammena anusāsati.

[03] 1011^b^.^eb^ ^b^jātiṃ gottañca lakkhaṇa^eb^nti ``kīva ciraṃ jāto''ti mama jātiñca gottañca lakkhaṇañca. ^b^mante sisse^eb^ti mayā paricitavede ca mama sisse ca. ^b^manasāyeva pucchathā^eb^ti ime satta pañhe citteneva pucchatha.

[03] 1013-8^b^.^eb^ ^b^tissametteyyo^eb^ti ekoyeva esa nāmagottavasena vutto. ^b^dubhayo^eb^ti ubho. ^b^paccekagaṇino^eb^ti visuṃ visuṃ gaṇavanto. ^b^pubbavāsanavāsitā^eb^ti pubbe kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā. gatapaccāgatavattapuññavāsanāya vāsitacittā. ^b^puramāhissati^eb^nti māhissatināmikaṃ puraṃ, nagaranti vuttaṃ hoti. tañca nagaraṃ paviṭṭhāti adhippāyo, evaṃ sabbattha. ^b^gonaddha^eb^nti godhapurassa nāmaṃ. ^b^vanasavhaya^eb^nti pavananagaraṃ vuccati, ``vanasāvatthi''nti eke. evaṃ vanasāvatthito kosambiṃ, kosambito ca sāketaṃ anuppattānaṃ kira tesaṃ soḷasannaṃ jaṭilānaṃ chayojanamattā parisā ahosi.

[03] 1019^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V2.0274^ea^ bhagavā ``bāvarissa jaṭilā mahājanaṃ saṃvaḍḍhentā āgacchanti, na ca tāva nesaṃ indriyāni paripākaṃ gacchanti, nāpi ayaṃ deso sappāyo, magadhakhette pana tesaṃ pāsāṇakacetiyaṃ sappāyaṃ. tatra ^a^M2.0299^ea^ hi mayi dhammaṃ desente mahājanassa dhammābhisamayo bhavissati, sabbanagarāni ca pavisitvā āgacchantā bahutarena janena āgamissantī''ti bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto sāvatthito rājagahābhimukho ^a^P2.0584^ea^ agamāsi. tepi jaṭilā sāvatthiṃ āgantvā vihāraṃ pavisitvā ``ko buddho, kuhiṃ buddho''ti vicinantā gandhakuṭimūlaṃ gantvā bhagavato padanikkhepaṃ disvā ``rattassa hi ukkuṭikaṃ padaṃ bhave...pe0... vivaṭṭacchadassa idamīdisaṃ pada''nti (a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.260-261; dha0 pa0 aṭṭha0 1.20 sāmāvatīvatthu; visuddhi0 1.45) ``sabbaññu buddho''ti niṭṭhaṃ gatā. bhagavāpi anupubbena setabyakapilavatthuādīni nagarāni pavisitvā mahājanaṃ saṃvaḍḍhento pāsāṇakacetiyaṃ gato. jaṭilāpi tāvadeva sāvatthito nikkhamitvā sabbāni tāni nagarāni pavisitvā pāsāṇakacetiyameva agamaṃsu. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``kosambiñcāpi sāketaṃ, sāvatthiñca puruttamaṃ. setabyaṃ kapilavatthu''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] 1020^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^māgadhaṃ pura^eb^nti magadhapuraṃ rājagahanti adhippāyo. ^b^pāsāṇakaṃ cetiya^eb^nti mahato pāsāṇassa upari pubbe devaṭṭhānaṃ ahosi. uppanne pana bhagavati vihāro jāto. so teneva purimavohārena ``pāsāṇakaṃ cetiya''nti vuccati.

[03] 1021^b^.^eb^ ^b^tasitovudaka^eb^nti te hi jaṭilā vegasā bhagavantaṃ anubandhamānā sāyaṃ gatamaggaṃ pāto, pāto gatamaggañca sāyaṃ gacchantā ``ettha bhagavā''ti sutvā ativiya pītipāmojjajātā taṃ cetiyaṃ abhiruhiṃsu. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``turitā pabbatamāruhu''^eb^nti.

[03] 1024^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekamantaṃ ṭhito haṭṭho^eb^ti tasmiṃ pāsāṇake cetiye sakkena māpitamahāmaṇḍape nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā ``kacci isayo khamanīya''ntiādinā nayena bhagavatā paṭisammodanīye kate ``khamanīyaṃ bho gotamā''tiādīhi sayampi paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ajito jeṭṭhantevāsī ekamantaṃ ṭhito haṭṭhacitto hutvā manopañhe pucchi.
[03] 1025^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^ādissā^eb^ti ``kativasso''ti evaṃ uddissa. ^b^jammana^eb^nti ``amhākaṃ ācariyassa jātiṃ brūhī''ti pucchati. ^b^pārami^eb^nti niṭṭhāgamanaṃ.

[03] 1026-7^b^.^eb^ ^b^vīsaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0275^ea^ ^b^vassasata^eb^nti vīsativassādhikaṃ vassasataṃ. ^b^lakkhaṇe^eb^ti mahāpurisalakkhaṇe. etasmiṃ ito paresu ca itihāsādīsu anavayoti ^a^M2.0300^ea^ adhippāyo parapadaṃ vā ^a^P2.0585^ea^ ānetvā tesu pāramiṃ gatoti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^pañcasatāni vācetī^eb^ti pakatialasadummedhamāṇavakānaṃ pañcasatāni sayaṃ mante vāceti. ^b^sadhamme^eb^ti eke brāhmaṇadhamme, tevijjake pāvacaneti vuttaṃ hoti.
[03] 1028^b^.^eb^ ^b^lakkhaṇānaṃ pavicaya^eb^nti lakkhaṇānaṃ vitthāraṃ, ``katamāni tānissa gatte tīṇi lakkhaṇānī''ti pucchati.
[03] 1030-31^b^.^eb^ ^b^pucchañhī^eb^ti pucchamānaṃ ^b^kametaṃ paṭibhāsatī^eb^ti devādīsu kaṃ puggalaṃ etaṃ pañhavacanaṃ paṭibhāsatīti.

[03] 1032-33^b^.^eb^ evaṃ brāhmaṇo pañcannaṃ pañhānaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ sutvā avasese dve pucchanto ^b^``muddhaṃ muddhādhipātañcā''^eb^ti āha. athassa bhagavā te byākaronto ^b^``avijjā muddhā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha yasmā catūsu saccesu aññāṇabhūtā avijjā saṃsārassa sīsaṃ, tasmā ``avijjā muddhā''ti āha. yasmā ca arahattamaggavijjā attanā sahajātehi saddhāsatisamādhikattukamyatāchandavīriyehi samannāgatā indriyānaṃ ekarasaṭṭhabhāvamupagatattā taṃ muddhaṃ adhipāteti, tasmā ^b^``dhijjā muddhādhipātinī''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] 1034-8^b^.^eb^ ^b^tato vedena mahatā^eb^ti atha imaṃ pañhaveyyākaraṇaṃ sutvā uppannāya mahāpītiyā santhambhitvā alīnabhāvaṃ, kāyacittānaṃ udaggaṃ patvāti attho. patitvā ca ^b^``bāvarī''^eb^ti imaṃ gāthamāha. atha naṃ anukampamāno bhagavā ^b^``sukhito''^eb^ti gāthamāha. vatvā ca ^b^``bāvarissa cā''^eb^ti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi. tattha ^b^sabbesa^eb^nti anavasesānaṃ soḷasasahassānaṃ. ^b^tattha pucchi tathāgata^eb^nti tattha pāsāṇake cetiye, tattha vā parisāya, tesu vā pavāritesu ajito paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ pucchīti. sesaṃ sabbagāthāsu pākaṭamevāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya vatthugāthāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 1039^b^.^eb^ tasmiṃ ^a^V2.0276^ea^ ^a^M2.0301^ea^ ^a^P2.0586^ea^ pana pañhe ^b^nivuto^eb^ti paṭicchādito. ^b^kissābhilepanaṃ brūsī^eb^ti kiṃ assa lokassa abhilepanaṃ vadesi.

[03] 1040^b^.^eb^ ^b^vevicchā pamādā nappakāsatī^eb^ti macchariyahetu ca pamādahetu ca nappakāsati. macchariyaṃ hissa dānādiguṇehi pakāsituṃ na deti, pamādo sīlādīhi. ^b^jappābhilepana^eb^nti taṇhā assa lokassa makkaṭalepo viya makkaṭassa abhilepanaṃ. ^b^dukkha^eb^nti jātiādikaṃ dukkhaṃ.

[03] 1041^b^.^eb^ ^b^savanti sabbadhi sotā^eb^ti sabbesu rūpādiāyatanesu taṇhādikā sotā sandanti. ^b^kiṃ nivāraṇa^eb^nti tesaṃ kiṃ āvaraṇaṃ kā rakkhāti? ^b^saṃvaraṃ brūhī^eb^ti taṃ tesaṃ nivāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūhi. etena sāvasesappahānaṃ pucchati. ^b^kena sotā pidhiyyare^eb^ti kena dhammena ete sotā pidhiyyanti pacchijjanti. etena anavasesappahānaṃ pucchati.

[03] 1042^b^.^eb^ ^b^sati tesaṃ nivāraṇa^eb^nti vipassanāyuttā. kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samannesamānā sati tesaṃ sotānaṃ nivāraṇaṃ. ^b^sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmī^eb^ti tamevāhaṃ satiṃ sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmīti adhippāyo. ^b^paññāyete pidhiyyare^eb^ti rūpādīsu pana aniccatādipaṭivedhasādhikāya maggapaññāya ete sotā sabbaso pidhiyyantīti.

[03] 1043^b^.^eb^ ^b^paññā cevā^eb^ti pañhagāthāya, yā cāyaṃ tayā vuttā paññā yā ca ^b^sati,^eb^ yañca tadavasesaṃ ^b^nāmarūpaṃ, etaṃ^eb^ sabbampi ^b^kattha^eb^ nirujjhati, ^b^etaṃ me^eb^ pañhaṃ ^b^puṭṭho brūhī^eb^ti evaṃ saṅkhepattho veditabbo.

[03] 1044^b^.^eb^ vissajjanagāthāya panassa yasmā paññāsatiyo nāmeneva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti, tasmā tā visuṃ na vuttā. ayamettha saṅkhepattho -- ^b^yaṃ maṃ^eb^ tvaṃ, ^b^ajita, etaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi^eb^ ``katthetaṃ uparujjhatī''ti, taṃ te ^b^yattha nāmañca rūpañca asesaṃ uparujjhati,^eb^ taṃ ^a^P2.0587^ea^ vadanto ^b^vadāmi^eb^ ^a^V2.0277^ea^, tassa, tassa hi ^b^viññāṇassa nirodhena^eb^ saheva apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ^b^etthetaṃ uparujjhati^eb^. ettheva viññāṇanirodhe nirujjhati etaṃ, viññāṇanirodhā tassa nirodho hoti. taṃ nātivattatīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 1045^b^.^eb^ ettāvatā ^a^M2.0302^ea^ ca ``dukkhamassa mahabbhaya''nti iminā pakāsitaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, ``yāni sotānī''ti iminā samudayasaccaṃ paññāyete pidhiyyareti iminā maggasaccaṃ, ``asesaṃ uparujjhatī''ti iminā nirodhasaccanti evaṃ cattāri saccāni sutvāpi ariyabhūmiṃ anadhigato puna sekhāsekhapaṭipadaṃ pucchanto ^b^``ye ca saṅkhātadhammāse''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^saṅkhātadhammā^eb^ti aniccādivasena parivīmaṃsitadhammā, arahataṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^sekhā^eb^ti sīlādīni sikkhamānā avasesā ariyapuggalā. ^b^puthū^eb^ti bahū sattajanā. ^b^tesaṃ me nipako iriyaṃ puṭṭho pabrūhī^eb^ti tesaṃ me sekhāsekhānaṃ nipako paṇḍito tvaṃ puṭṭho paṭipattiṃ brūhīti.

[03] 1046^b^.^eb^ athassa bhagavā yasmā sekhena kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbakilesā pahātabbā eva, tasmā ^b^``kāmesū''^eb^ti upaḍḍhagāthāya sekhapaṭipadaṃ dasseti. tassattho -- vatthu ^b^``kāmesu''^eb^ kilesakāmena ^b^nābhigijjheyya^eb^ kāyaduccaritādayo ca manaso āvilabhāvakare dhamme pajahanto ^b^manasā nāvilo siyā^eb^ti. yasmā pana asekho aniccādivasena sabbasaṅkhārādīnaṃ paritulitattā kusalo sabbadhammesu kāyānupassanāsatiādīhi ca sato sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīnaṃ bhinnattā bhikkhubhāvaṃ patto ca hutvā sabbiriyāpathesu ^b^paribbajati,^eb^ tasmā ^b^``kusalo''^eb^ti upaḍḍhagāthāya asekhapaṭipadaṃ dasseti. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.

[03] evaṃ bhagavā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi, desanāpariyosāne ajito arahatte patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ antevāsisahassena, aññesañca anekasahassānaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi. saha arahattappattiyā ca āyasmato ajitassa ^a^P2.0588^ea^ antevāsisahassassa ca ajinajaṭāvākacīrādīni antaradhāyiṃsu. sabbeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā, dvaṅgulakesā ehibhikkhū hutvā bhagavantaṃ namassamānā pañjalikā nisīdiṃsūti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya ajitasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1047^b^.^eb^ ^b^kodha^eb^ ^a^V2.0278^ea^ ^a^M2.0303^ea^ ^b^santussito^eb^ti tissametteyyasuttaṃ. kā uppatti? sabbasuttānaṃ pucchāvasikā eva uppatti. te hi brāhmaṇā ``katāvakāsā pucchavho''ti bhagavatā pavāritattā attano attano saṃsayaṃ pucchiṃsu. puṭṭho puṭṭho ca tesaṃ bhagavā byākāsi. evaṃ pucchāvasikānevetāni suttānīti veditabbāni.

[03] niṭṭhite pana ajitapañhe ``kathaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passatī''ti (su0 ni0 1124; cūḷani0 piṅgiyamāṇavapucchā 144) evaṃ mogharājā pucchituṃ ārabhi. taṃ ``na tāvassa indriyāni paripākaṃ gatānī''ti ñatvā bhagavā ``tiṭṭha tvaṃ, mogharāja, añño pucchatū''ti paṭikkhipi. tato tissametteyyo attano saṃsayaṃ pucchanto ^b^``kodhā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^kodha santussito^eb^ti ko idha tuṭṭho. ^b^iñjitā^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhivipphanditāni. ^b^ubhantamabhiññāyā^eb^ti ubho ante abhijānitvā. ^b^mantā na lippatī^eb^ti paññāya na lippati.

[03] 1048-9^b^.^eb^ tassetamatthaṃ byākaronto bhagavā ^b^``kāmesū''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^kāmesu brahmacariyavā^eb^ti kāmanimittaṃ brahmacariyavā, kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā maggabrahmacariyena samannāgatoti vuttaṃ hoti. ettāvatā santusitaṃ dasseti, ``vītataṇho''tiādīhi aniñjitaṃ ^a^P2.0589^ea^. tattha ^b^saṅkhāya nibbuto^eb^ti aniccādivasena dhamme vīmaṃsitvā rāgādinibbānena nibbuto. sesaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayattā pākaṭameva.

[03] evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. desanāpariyosāne ayampi brāhmaṇo arahatte patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ antevāsisahassena, aññesañca anekasahassānaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi. sesaṃ pubbasadisamevāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya tissametteyyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1050^b^.^eb^ ^b^aneja^eb^nti ^a^V2.0279^ea^ ^a^M2.0304^ea^ puṇṇakasuttaṃ. imampi purimanayeneva mogharājānaṃ paṭikkhipitvā vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^mūladassāvi^eb^nti akusalamūlādidassāviṃ. ^b^isayo^eb^ti isināmakā jaṭilā. ^b^yañña^eb^nti deyyadhammaṃ. ^b^akappayiṃsū^eb^ti pariyesanti.

[03] 1051^b^.^eb^ ^b^āsīsamānā^eb^ti rūpādīni patthayamānā. ^b^itthatta^eb^nti itthabhāvañca patthayamānā, manussādibhāvaṃ icchantāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^jaraṃ sitā^eb^ti jaraṃ nissitā. jarāmukhena cettha sabbavaṭṭadukkhaṃ vuttaṃ. tena vaṭṭadukkhanissitā tato aparimuccamānā eva kappayiṃsūti dīpeti.

[03] 1052^b^.^eb^ ^b^kaccissu te bhagavā yaññapathe appamattā, atāruṃ jātiñca jarañca mārisā^eb^ti ettha yaññoyeva yaññapatho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- kacci te yaññe appamattā hutvā yaññaṃ kappayantā vaṭṭadukkhamatariṃsūti.

[03] 1053^b^.^eb^ ^b^āsīsantī^eb^ti rūpapaṭilābhādayo patthenti. ^b^thomayantī^eb^ti ``suyiṭṭhaṃ suci dinna''ntiādinā nayena yaññādīni pasaṃsanti. ^b^abhijappantī^eb^ti rūpādipaṭilābhāya vācaṃ bhindanti. ^b^juhantī^eb^ti denti. ^b^kāmābhijappanti paṭicca lābha^eb^nti rūpādipaṭilābhaṃ paṭicca punappunaṃ kāme eva abhijappanti, ``aho vata amhākaṃ siyu''nti vadanti, taṇhañca tattha vaḍḍhentīti vuttaṃ ^a^P2.0590^ea^ hoti. ^b^yājayogā^eb^ti yāgādhimuttā. ^b^bhavarāgarattā^eb^ti evamimehi āsīsanādīhi bhavarāgeneva rattā, bhavarāgarattā vā hutvā etāni āsīsanādīni karontā ^b^nātariṃsu^eb^ jātiādivaṭṭadukkhaṃ na uttariṃsūti.

[03] 1054-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^athakocarahī^eb^ti atha idāni ko añño atārīti. ^b^saṅkhāyā^eb^ti ñāṇena vīmaṃsitvā. ^b^paroparānī^eb^ti parāni ca orāni ca, parattabhāvasakattabhāvādīni parāni ca orāni cāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^vidhūmo^eb^ti kāyaduccaritādidhūmavirahito. ^b^anīgho^eb^ti rāgādīighavirahito ^a^V2.0280^ea^. ^b^atāri so^eb^ti so evarūpo arahā jātijaraṃ atāri. sesamettha pākaṭameva.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M2.0305^ea^ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. desanāpariyosāne ayampi brāhmaṇo arahatte patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ antevāsisahassena, aññesañca anekasatānaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi. sesaṃ vuttasadisamevāti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya puṇṇakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03] 1056^b^.^eb^ ^b^pucchāmi^eb^ ^a^V2.0281^ea^ ^b^ta^eb^nti mettagusuttaṃ. tattha ^b^maññāmi taṃ vedaguṃ bhāvitatta^eb^nti ``ayaṃ vedagū''ti ca ``bhāvitatto''ti ca evaṃ taṃ maññāmi.

[03] 1057^b^.^eb^ ^b^apucchasī^eb^ti ettha ^b^a^eb^-iti padapūraṇamatte nipāto, pucchasicceva attho. ^b^pavakkhāmi yathā pajāna^eb^nti yathā pajānanto ācikkhati, evaṃ ācikkhissāmi. ^b^upadhinidānā pabhavanti dukkhā^eb^ti taṇhādiupadhinidānā jātiādidukkhavisesā pabhavanti.

[03] 1058^b^.^eb^ evaṃ upadhinidānato pabhavantesu dukkhesu -- ^b^yo ve avidvā^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^pajāna^eb^nti saṅkhāre aniccādivasena jānanto. ^b^dukkhassa^eb^ ^b^jātippabhavānupassī^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa jātikāraṇaṃ ``upadhī''ti anupassanto.
[03] 1059^b^.^eb^ ^b^sokapariddavañcā^eb^ti sokañca paridevañca. ^b^tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo^eb^ti yathā yathā sattā jānanti, tathā tathā paññāpanavasena vidito esa dhammoti.

[03] 1060-61^b^.^eb^ ^b^kittayissāmi te dhamma^eb^nti ^a^P2.0591^ea^ nibbānadhammaṃ nibbānagāminipaṭipadādhammañca te desayissāmi. ^b^diṭṭhe dhamme^eb^ti diṭṭhe dukkhādidhamme, imasmiṃyeva vā attabhāve. ^b^anītiha^eb^nti attapaccakkhaṃ. ^b^yaṃ viditvā^eb^ti yaṃ dhammaṃ ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''tiādinā nayena sammasanto viditvā. ^b^tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmī^eb^ti taṃ vuttapakāradhammajotakaṃ tava vacanaṃ ahaṃ patthayāmi. ^b^dhammamuttama^eb^nti tañca dhammamuttamaṃ abhinandāmīti.

[03] 1062^b^.^eb^ ^b^uddhaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0306^ea^ ^b^adho tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti ettha ^b^uddha^eb^nti anāgataddhā vuccati, ^b^adho^eb^ti atītaddhā, ^b^tiriyañcāpi majjhe^eb^ti paccuppannaddhā. ^b^etesu nandiñca nivesanañca, panujja viññāṇa^eb^nti etesu uddhādīsu taṇhañca diṭṭhinivesanañca abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇañca panudehi, panuditvā ca ^b^bhave na tiṭṭhe,^eb^ evaṃ sante duvidhepi bhave na tiṭṭheyya. evaṃ tāva panujjasaddassa panudehīti imasmiṃ atthavikappe sambandho, panuditvāti etasmiṃ pana atthavikappe bhave na tiṭṭheti ^a^V2.0282^ea^ ayameva sambandho. etāni nandinivesanaviññāṇāni panuditvā duvidhepi bhave na tiṭṭheyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 1063-4^b^.^eb^ etāni vinodetvā bhave atiṭṭhanto eso -- ^b^evaṃvihārī^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^idhevā^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva sāsane, imasmiṃyeva vā attabhāve. ^b^sukittitaṃ gotamanūpadhīka^eb^nti ettha ^b^anupadhika^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. taṃ sandhāya bhagavantaṃ ālapanto āha -- ``sukittitaṃ gotamanūpadhīka''nti.

[03] 1065^b^.^eb^ na kevalaṃ dukkhameva pahāsi -- ^b^te cāpī^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^aṭṭhita^eb^nti sakkaccaṃ, sadā vā. ^b^taṃ taṃ namassāmī^eb^ti tasmā taṃ namassāmi. ^b^sameccā^eb^ti upagantvā. ^b^nāgā^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ ālapanto āha.

[03] 1066^b^.^eb^ idāni taṃ bhagavā ``addhā hi bhagavā pahāsi ^a^P2.0592^ea^ dukkha''nti evaṃ tena brāhmaṇena viditopi attānaṃ anupanetvāva pahīnadukkhena puggalena ovadanto ^b^``yaṃ brāhmaṇa''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tassattho -- ^b^yaṃ^eb^ tvaṃ abhijānanto ``ayaṃ bāhitapāpattā ^b^brāhmaṇo,^eb^ vedehi gatattā ^b^vedagū,^eb^ kiñcanābhāvena ^b^akiñcano,^eb^ kāmesu ca bhavesu ca asattattā ^b^kāmabhave asatto''^eb^ti jaññā jāneyyāsi. ^b^addhā hi so imaṃ oghaṃ atāri, tiṇṇo ca pāraṃ akhilo akaṅkho^eb^.
[03] 1067^b^.^eb^ kiñca bhiyyo -- ^b^vidvā ca yo^eb^ti gāthā. tattha ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane, attabhāve vā. ^b^visajjā^eb^ti vossajjitvā. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
[03] evaṃ ^a^M2.0307^ea^ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. desanāpariyosāne ca vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya mettagūsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1068-9^b^.^eb^ ^b^pucchāmi^eb^ ^a^V2.0283^ea^ ^b^ta^eb^nti dhotakasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^vācābhikaṅkhāmī^eb^ti vācaṃ abhikaṅkhāmi. ^b^sikkhe nibbānamattano^eb^ti attano rāgādīnaṃ nibbānatthāya adhisīlādīni sikkheyya. ^b^ito^eb^ti mama mukhato.

[03] 1070^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vutte attamano dhotako bhagavantaṃ abhitthavamāno kathaṃkathāpamokkhaṃ yācanto ^b^``passāmaha''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^passāmahaṃ devamanussaloke^eb^ti passāmi ahaṃ devamanussaloke. ^b^taṃ taṃ namassāmī^eb^ti taṃ evarūpaṃ namassāmi. ^b^pamuñcā^eb^ti pamocehi.

[03] 1071^b^.^eb^ athassa bhagavā attādhīnameva kathaṃkathāpamokkhaṃ oghataraṇamukhena dassento ^b^``nāha''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^nāhaṃ sahissāmī^eb^ti ahaṃ na sahissāmi na sakkhissāmi, na vāyamissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^pamocanāyā^eb^ti pamācetuṃ. ^b^kathaṃkathi^eb^nti sakaṅkhaṃ. ^b^taresī^eb^ti tareyyāsi.

[03] 1072-5^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vutte attamanataro dhotako bhagavantaṃ abhitthavamāno anusāsaniṃ yācanto ^b^``anusāsa brahme''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^brahmā^eb^ti seṭṭhavacanametaṃ. tena bhagavantaṃ āmantayamāno āha -- ``anusāsa brahme''ti ^a^P2.0593^ea^. ^b^vivekadhamma^eb^nti sabbasaṅkhāravivekanibbānadhammaṃ. ^b^abyāpajjamāno^eb^ti nānappakārataṃ anāpajjamāno. ^b^idheva santo^eb^ti idheva samāno. ^b^asito^eb^ti anissito. ito parā dve gāthā mettagusutte vuttanayā eva. kevalañhi tattha dhammaṃ, idha santinti ayaṃ viseso. tatiyagāthāyapi ^a^M2.0308^ea^ pubbaḍḍhaṃ tattha vutanayameva aparaḍḍhe ^b^saṅgo^eb^ti sajjanaṭṭhānaṃ, laggananti vuttaṃ hoti. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
[01] evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. desanāpariyosāne ca vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya dhotakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1076^b^.^eb^ ^b^eko^eb^ ^a^V2.0284^ea^ ^b^aha^eb^nti upasīvasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^mahantamogha^eb^nti mahantaṃ oghaṃ. ^b^anissito^eb^ti puggalaṃ vā dhammaṃ vā anissito. ^b^no visahāmī^eb^ti na sakkomi. ^b^ārammaṇa^eb^nti nissayaṃ. ^b^yaṃ nissito^eb^ti yaṃ puggalaṃ vā dhammaṃ vā nissito.

[03] 1077^b^.^eb^ idāni yasmā so brāhmaṇo ākiñcaññāyatanalābhī tañca santampi nissayaṃ na jānāti, tenassa bhagavā tañca nissayaṃ uttari ca niyyānapathaṃ dassento ^b^``ākiñcañña''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^pekkhamāno^eb^ti taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ sato samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhahitvā ca aniccādivasena passamāno. ^b^natthīti nissāyā^eb^ti taṃ ``natthi kiñcī''ti pavattasamāpattiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā. ^b^tarassu ogha^eb^nti tato pabhuti pavattāya vipassanāya yathānurūpaṃ catubbidhampi oghaṃ tarassu. ^b^kathāhī^eb^ti kathaṃkathāhi. ^b^taṇhakkhayaṃ nattamahābhipassā^eb^ti rattindivaṃ nibbānaṃ vibhūtaṃ katvā passa. etenassa diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṃ katheti.

[03] 1078-9^b^.^eb^ idāni ``kāme pahāyā''ti sutvā vikkhambhanavasena attanā pahīne kāme sampassamāno ^b^``sabbesū''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^hitvā mañña^eb^nti aññaṃ tato heṭṭhā chabbidhampi samāpattiṃ ^a^P2.0594^ea^ hitvā. ^b^saññāvimokkhe parame^eb^ti sattasu saññāvimokkhesu uttame ākiñcaññāyatane. ^b^tiṭṭhe nu^eb^ ^a^M2.0309^ea^ ^b^so tattha anānuyāyī^eb^ti so puggalo tattha ākiñcaññāyatanabrahmaloke avigacchamāno tiṭṭheyya nūti pucchati. athassa bhagavā saṭṭhikappasahassamattaṃyeva ṭhānaṃ anujānanto tatiyagāthamāha.

[03] 1080^b^.^eb^ evaṃ tassa tattha ṭhānaṃ sutvā idānissa sassatucchedabhāvaṃ pucchanto ^b^``tiṭṭhe ce''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^pūgampi vassāna^eb^nti anekasaṅkhyampi vassānaṃ, gaṇarāsinti attho. ``pūgampi vassānī''tipi pāṭho, tattha vibhattibyattayena sāmivacanassa paccattavacanaṃ kattabbaṃ, pūganti vā etassa bahūnīti attho vattabbo. ``pūgānī''ti vāpi paṭhanti, purimapāṭhoyeva sabbasundaro. ^b^tattheva so sīti siyā vimutto^eb^ti so puggalo tatthevākiñcaññāyatane nānādukkhehi ^a^V2.0285^ea^ vimutto sītibhāvappatto bhaveyya, nibbānappatto sassato hutvā tiṭṭheyyāti adhippāyo. ^b^cavetha viññāṇaṃ tathāvidhassā^eb^ti udāhu tathāvidhassa viññāṇaṃ anupādāya parinibbāyeyyāti ucchedaṃ pucchati, paṭisandhiggahaṇatthaṃ vāpi bhaveyyāti paṭisandhimpi tassa pucchati.

[03] 1081^b^.^eb^ athassa bhagavā ucchedasassataṃ anupagamma tattha uppannassa ariyasāvakassa anupādāya parinibbānaṃ dassento ^b^``accī yathā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^atthaṃ paletī^eb^ti atthaṃ gacchati. ^b^na upeti saṅkha^eb^nti ``asukaṃ nāma disaṃ gato''ti vohāraṃ na gacchati. ^b^evaṃ munī nāmakāyā vimutto^eb^ti evaṃ tattha uppanno sekkhamuni pakatiyā pubbeva rūpakāyā vimutto tattha catutthamaggaṃ nibbattetvā dhammakāyassa pariññātattā puna nāmakāyāpi vimutto ubhatobhāgavimutto khīṇāsavo hutvā anupādāparinibbānasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ paleti, na upeti saṅkhaṃ ``khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā''ti evamādikaṃ.

[03] 1082^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^P2.0595^ea^ ``atthaṃ paletī''ti sutvā tassa yoniso atthaṃ asallakkhento ^b^``atthaṅgato so''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tassattho -- so atthaṅgato udāhu natthi, udāhu ve sassatiyā sassatabhāvena ^b^arogo^eb^ avipariṇāmadhammo soti evaṃ taṃ me munī sādhu viyākarohi. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? ^b^tathā hi te vidito esa dhammo^eb^ti.

[03] 1083^b^.^eb^ athassa ^a^M2.0310^ea^ bhagavā tathā avattabbataṃ dassento ^b^``atthaṅgatassā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^atthaṅgatassā^eb^ti anupādāparinibbutassa. ^b^na pamāṇamatthī^eb^ti rūpādippamāṇaṃ natthi. ^b^yena naṃ vajju^eb^nti yena rāgādinā naṃ vadeyyuṃ. ^b^sabbesu dhammesū^eb^ti sabbesu khandhādidhammesu. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
[03] evaṃ bhagavā imaṃ suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. desanāpariyosāne ca vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya upasīvasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1084-5^b^.^eb^ ^b^santi^eb^ ^a^V2.0286^ea^ ^b^loke^eb^ti nandasuttaṃ. tattha paṭhamagāthāya attho -- ^b^loke^eb^ khattiyādayo ^b^janā^eb^ ājīvakanigaṇṭhādike sandhāya ``santi munayo''ti vadanti, ^b^tayidaṃ kathaṃsū^eb^ti kiṃ nu kho te samāpattiñāṇādinā ñāṇena uppannattā ñāṇūpapannaṃ ^b^no muniṃ vadanti,^eb^ evaṃvidhaṃ nu vadanti, ^b^udāhu^eb^ ve nānappakārakena lūkhajīvitasaṅkhātena ^b^jīvitenūpapanna^eb^nti athassa bhagavā tadubhayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā muniṃ dassento ^b^``na diṭṭhiyā''^eb^ti gāthamāha.

[03] 1086-7^b^.^eb^ idāni ``diṭṭhādīhi suddhī''ti vadantānaṃ vāde kaṅkhāpahānatthaṃ ^b^``ye kecime''^eb^ti pucchati. tattha ^b^anekarūpenā^eb^ti kotūhalamaṅgalādinā. ^b^tattha yatā carantā^eb^ti tattha sakāya diṭṭhiyā guttā viharantā. athassa tathā suddhiabhāvaṃ dīpento bhagavā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.

[03] 1088-90^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ``nātariṃsū''ti sutvā idāni yo atari, taṃ sotukāmo ^b^``ye kecime''^eb^ti pucchati. athassa bhagavā oghatiṇṇamukhena ^a^P2.0596^ea^ jātijarātiṇṇe dassento tatiyaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^nivutā^eb^ti ovuṭā pariyonaddhā. ^b^yesīdhā^eb^ti yesu idha. ettha ca ^b^su^eb^-iti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^taṇhaṃ pariññāyā^eb^ti tīhi pariññāhi taṇhaṃ parijānitvā. sesaṃ sabbattha pubbe vuttanayattā pākaṭameva.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M2.0311^ea^ bhagavā arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi, desanāpariyosāne pana nando bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandamāno ^b^``etābhinandāmī''^eb^ti gāthamāha. idhāpi ca pubbe vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya nandasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1091-4^b^.^eb^ ^b^ye^eb^ ^a^V2.0287^ea^ ^b^me pubbe^eb^ti hemakasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ye me pubbe viyākaṃsū^eb^ti ye bāvariādayo pubbe mayhaṃ sakaṃ laddhiṃ viyākaṃsu. ^b^huraṃ gotamasāsanā^eb^ti gotamasāsanā pubbataraṃ. ^b^sabbaṃ taṃ takkavaḍḍhana^eb^nti sabbaṃ taṃ kāmavitakkādivaḍḍhanaṃ. ^b^taṇhānigghātana^eb^nti taṇhāvināsanaṃ. athassa bhagavā taṃ dhammaṃ ācikkhanto ^b^``idhā''^eb^ti gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^etadaññāya ye satā^eb^ti etaṃ nibbānapadamaccutaṃ ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''tiādinā nayena vipassantā anupubbena jānitvā ye kāyānupassanāsatiādīhi satā. ^b^diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutā^eb^ti viditadhammattā, diṭṭhadhammattā, rāgādinibbānena ca abhinibbutā. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
[03] evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya hemakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1095^b^.^eb^ ^b^yasmiṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0288^ea^ ^a^M2.0312^ea^ ^b^kāmā^eb^ti todeyyasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^vimokkho tassa kīdiso^eb^ti tassa kīdiso vimokkho icchitabboti pucchati ^a^P2.0597^ea^. idāni tassa aññavimokkhābhāvaṃ dassento bhagavā dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^vimokkho tassa nāparo^eb^ti tassa añño vimokkho natthi.

[03] 1097-8^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ``taṇhakkhayo eva vimokkho''ti vuttepi tamatthaṃ asallakkhento ^b^``nirāsaso so uda āsasāno''^eb^ti puna pucchati. tattha ^b^uda paññakappī^eb^ti udāhu samāpattiñāṇādinā ñāṇena taṇhākappaṃ vā diṭṭhikappaṃ vā kappayati. athassa bhagavā taṃ ācikkhanto dutiyaṃ gāthamāha. tattha ^b^kāmabhave^eb^ti kāme ca bhave ca. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
[03] evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya todeyyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1099^b^.^eb^ ^b^majjhe^eb^ ^a^V2.0289^ea^ ^b^sarasmi^eb^nti kappasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^majjhe sarasmi^eb^nti purimapacchimakoṭipaññāṇābhāvato majjhabhūte saṃsāreti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^tiṭṭhata^eb^nti tiṭṭhamānānaṃ. ^b^yathāyidaṃ nāparaṃ siyā^eb^ti yathā idaṃ dukkhaṃ puna na bhaveyya.

[03] 1101-2^b^.^eb^ athassa bhagavā tamatthaṃ byākaronto tisso gāthāyo abhāsi. tattha ^b^akiñcana^eb^nti kiñcanapaṭipakkhaṃ. ^b^anādāna^eb^nti ādānapaṭipakkhaṃ, kiñcanādānavūpasamanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^anāpara^eb^nti aparapaṭibhāgadīpavirahitaṃ, seṭṭhanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^na te mārassa paddhagū^eb^ti te ^a^M2.0313^ea^ mārassa paddhacarā paricārakā sissā na honti. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
[03] evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya kappasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1103-4^b^.^eb^ ^b^sutvānaha^eb^nti ^a^V2.0290^ea^ ^a^P2.0598^ea^ jatukaṇṇisuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sutvānahaṃ vīramakāmakāmi^eb^nti ahaṃ ``itipi so bhagavā''tiādinā nayena vīraṃ kāmānaṃ akāmanato akāmakāmiṃ buddhaṃ sutvā. ^b^akāmamāgama^eb^nti nikkāmaṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchituṃ āgatomhi. ^b^sahajanettā^eb^ti sahajātasabbaññutaññāṇacakkhu. ^b^yathātaccha^eb^nti yathātathaṃ. ^b^brūhi me^eb^ti puna yācanto bhaṇati. yācanto hi sahassakkhattumpi bhaṇeyya, ko pana vādo dvikkhattuṃ. ^b^tejī tejasā^eb^ti tejena samannāgato tejasā abhibhuyya. ^b^yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ jātijarāya idha vippahāna^eb^nti yamahaṃ jātijarānaṃ pahānabhūtaṃ dhammaṃ idheva jāneyyaṃ.

[03] 1105-7^b^.^eb^ athassa bhagavā taṃ dhammamācikkhanto tisso gāthāyo abhāsi. tattha ^b^nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khemato^eb^ti nibbānañca nibbānagāminiñca paṭipadaṃ ``khema''nti disvā. ^b^uggahita^eb^nti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena gahitaṃ. ^b^nirattaṃ vā^eb^ti nirassitabbaṃ vā, muñcitabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^mā te vijjitthā^eb^ti mā te ahosi. ^b^kiñcana^eb^nti rāgādikiñcanaṃ vāpi te mā vijjittha. ^b^pubbe^eb^ti atīte saṅkhāre ārabbha uppannakilesā. ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ti bhagavā jatukaṇṇiṃ ālapati. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
[03] evaṃ ^a^M2.0314^ea^ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya jatukaṇṇisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1108-9^b^.^eb^ ^b^okañjaha^eb^nti ^a^V2.0291^ea^ bhadrāvudhasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^okañjaha^eb^nti ālayaṃ jahaṃ. ^b^taṇhacchida^eb^nti chataṇhākāyacchidaṃ. ^b^aneja^eb^nti lokadhammesu nikkampaṃ. ^b^nandiñjaha^eb^nti anāgatarūpādipatthanājahaṃ. ekā eva hi taṇhā thutivasena ^a^P2.0599^ea^ idha nānappakārato vuttā. ^b^kappañjaha^eb^nti duvidhakappajahaṃ. ^b^abhiyāce^eb^ti ativiya yācāmi. ^b^sutvāna nāgassa apanamissanti ito^eb^ti nāgassa tava bhagavā vacanaṃ sutvā ito pāsāṇakacetiyato bahū janā pakkamissantīti adhippāyo. ^b^janapadehi saṅgatā^eb^ti aṅgādīhi janapadehi idha samāgatā. ^b^viyākarohī^eb^ti dhammaṃ desehi.

[03] 1110^b^.^eb^ athassa āsayānulomena dhammaṃ desento bhagavā dve gāthāyo abhāsi. tattha ^b^ādānataṇha^eb^nti rūpādīnaṃ ādāyikaṃ gahaṇataṇhaṃ, taṇhupādānanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^yaṃ yañhi lokasmimupādiyantī^eb^ti etesu uddhādibhedesu yaṃ yaṃ gaṇhanti. ^b^teneva māro anveti jantu^eb^nti teneva upādānapaccayanibbattakammābhisaṅkhāranibbattavasena paṭisandhikkhandhamāro taṃ sattaṃ anugacchati.

[03] 1111^b^.^eb^ ^b^tasmā pajāna^eb^nti tasmā etamādīnavaṃ aniccādivasena vā saṅkhāre jānanto. ^b^ādānasatte iti pekkhamāno, pajaṃ imaṃ maccudheyye visatta^eb^nti ādātabbaṭṭhena ādānesu rūpādīsu satte sabbaloke imaṃ pajaṃ maccudheyye laggaṃ pekkhamāno. ādānasatte vā ādānābhiniviṭṭhe puggale ādānasaṅgahetuñca imaṃ pajaṃ maccudheyye laggaṃ tato vītikkamituṃ asamatthaṃ ^a^M2.0315^ea^ iti pekkhamāno kiñcanaṃ sabbaloke na uppādiyethāti sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
[03] evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya bhadrāvudhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1112-3^b^.^eb^ ^b^jhāyi^eb^nti ^a^V2.0292^ea^ udayasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^aññāvimokkha^eb^nti paññānubhāvanijjhātaṃ vimokkhaṃ pucchati. atha bhagavā yasmā udayo catutthajjhānalābhī, tasmāssa paṭiladdhajjhānavasena nānappakārato aññāvimokkhaṃ dassento ^a^P2.0600^ea^ gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^pahānaṃ kāmacchandāna^eb^nti yamidaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattentassa kāmacchandappahānaṃ, tampi aññāvimokkhaṃ pabrūmi. evaṃ sabbapadāni yojetabbāni.

[03] 1114^b^.^eb^ ^b^upekkhāsatisaṃsuddha^eb^nti catutthajjhānaupekkhāsatīhi saṃsuddhaṃ. ^b^dhammatakkapurejava^eb^nti iminā tasmiṃ catutthajjhānavimokkhe ṭhatvā jhānaṅgāni vipassitvā adhigataṃ arahattavimokkhaṃ vadati. arahattavimokkhassa hi maggasampayuttasammāsaṅkappādibhedo dhammatakko purejavo hoti. tenāha -- ``dhammatakkapurejava''nti. ^b^avijjāya pabhedana^eb^nti etameva ca aññāvimokkhaṃ avijjāpabhedanasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ nissāya jātattā kāraṇopacārena ``avijjāya pabhedana''nti pabrūmīti.

[03] 1115-6^b^.^eb^ evaṃ avijjāpabhedanavacanena vuttaṃ nibbānaṃ sutvā ``taṃ kissa vippahānena vuccatī''ti pucchanto ^b^``kiṃsu saṃyojano''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^kiṃsu saṃyojano^eb^ti kiṃ saṃyojano. ^b^vicāraṇa^eb^nti vicaraṇakāraṇaṃ. ^b^kissassa vippahānenā^eb^ti kiṃ nāmakassa assa dhammassa vippahānena. athassa ^a^M2.0316^ea^ bhagavā tamatthaṃ byākaronto ^b^``nandisaṃyojano''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^vitakkassā^eb^ti kāmavitakkādiko vitakko assa.

[03] 1117-8^b^.^eb^ idāni tassa nibbānassa maggaṃ pucchanto ^b^``kathaṃ satassā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^viññāṇa^eb^nti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ. athassa maggaṃ kathento bhagavā ^b^``ajjhattañcā''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^evaṃ satassā^eb^ti evaṃ satassa sampajānassa. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
[01] evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya udayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1119-20^b^.^eb^ ^b^yo^eb^ ^a^V2.0293^ea^ ^b^atīta^eb^nti posālasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^yo atītaṃ ādisatī^eb^ti yo bhagavā attano ca paresañca ``ekampi jāti''ntiādibhedaṃ atītaṃ ādisati. ^b^vibhūtarūpasaññissā^eb^ti samatikkantarūpasaññissa. ^b^sabbakāyappahāyino^eb^ti tadaṅgavikkhambhanavasena sabbarūpakāyappahāyino, pahīnarūpabhavapaṭisandhikassāti ^a^P2.0601^ea^ adhippāyo. ^b^natthi kiñcīti passato^eb^ti viññāṇābhāvavipassanena ``natthi kiñcī''ti passato, ākiñcaññāyatanalābhinoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^ñāṇaṃ sakkānupucchāmī^eb^ti sakkāti bhagavantaṃ ālapanto āha. tassa puggalassa ñāṇaṃ pucchāmi, kīdisaṃ pucchitabbanti. ^b^kathaṃ neyyo^eb^ti kathaṃ so netabbo, kathamassa uttariñāṇaṃ uppādetabbanti.

[03] 1121^b^.^eb^ athassa bhagavā tādise puggale attano appaṭihatañāṇataṃ pakāsetvā taṃ ñāṇaṃ byākātuṃ gāthādvayamāha. tattha ^b^viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo sabbā, abhijānaṃ tathāgato^eb^ti abhisaṅkhāravasena catasso paṭisandhivasena sattāti evaṃ sabbā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo abhijānanto tathāgato. ^b^tiṭṭhantamenaṃ jānātī^eb^ti kammābhisaṅkhāravasena tiṭṭhantaṃ ^a^M2.0317^ea^ etaṃ puggalaṃ jānāti ``āyatiṃ ayaṃ evaṃgatiko bhavissatī''ti. ^b^vimutta^eb^nti ākiñcaññāyatanādīsu adhimuttaṃ. ^b^tapparāyaṇa^eb^nti tammayaṃ.

[03] 1122^b^.^eb^ ^b^ākiñcaññasambhavaṃ ñatvā^eb^ti ākiñcaññāyatanajanakaṃ kammābhisaṅkhāraṃ ñatvā ``kinti palibodho aya''nti. ^b^nandī saṃyojanaṃ itī^eb^ti yā ca tattha arūparāgasaṅkhātā nandī, tañca saṃyojanaṃ iti ñatvā. ^b^tato tattha vipassatī^eb^ti tato ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā taṃ samāpattiṃ aniccādivasena vipassati. ^b^etaṃ ñāṇaṃ tathaṃ tassā^eb^ti etaṃ tassa puggalassa evaṃ vipassato anukkameneva uppannaṃ arahattañāṇaṃ aviparītaṃ. ^b^vusīmato^eb^ti vusitavantassa. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
[01] evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. desanāpariyosāne ca pubbasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya posālasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1123^b^.^eb^ ^b^dvāhaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0294^ea^ ^b^sakka^eb^nti mogharājasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^dvāha^eb^nti dve vāre ahaṃ. so hi pubbe ajitasuttassa ca tissametteyyasuttassa ca avasāne dvikkhattuṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchi. bhagavā ^a^P2.0602^ea^ panassa indriyaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno na byākāsi. tenāha -- ``dvāhaṃ sakkaṃ apucchissa''nti. ^b^yāvatatiyañca devīsi, byākarotīti me suta^eb^nti yāvatatiyañca sahadhammikaṃ puṭṭho visuddhidevabhūto isi bhagavā sammāsambuddho byākarotīti evaṃ me sutaṃ. godhāvarītīreyeva kira so evamassosi. tenāha -- ``byākarotīti me suta''nti.

[03] 1124^b^.^eb^ ^b^ayaṃ loko^eb^ti manussaloko. ^b^paro loko^eb^ti taṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso. ^b^sadevako^eb^ti brahmalokaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso ^a^M2.0318^ea^ upapattidevasammutidevayutto, ``brahmaloko sadevako''ti etaṃ vā ``sadevake loke''tiādinayanidassanamattaṃ, tena sabbopi tathāvuttappakāro loko veditabbo.
[03] 1125^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^b^abhikkantadassāvi^eb^nti evaṃ aggadassāviṃ, sadevakassa lokassa ajjhāsayādhimuttigatiparāyaṇādīni passituṃ samatthanti dasseti.

[03] 1126^b^.^eb^ ^b^suññato lokaṃ avekkhassū^eb^ti avasiyapavattasallakkhaṇavasena vā tucchasaṅkhārasamanupassanāvasena vāti dvīhi kāraṇehi suññato lokaṃ passa. ^b^attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhaccā^eb^ti sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ uddharitvā. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.
[03] evaṃ bhagavā imampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. desanāpariyosāne ca vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya mogharājasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 1127^b^.^eb^ ^b^jiṇṇohamasmī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0295^ea^ piṅgiyasuttaṃ. tattha ^b^jiṇṇohamasmi abalo vītavaṇṇo^eb^ti so kira brāhmaṇo jarābhibhūto vīsavassasatiko jātiyā, dubbalo ca ``idha padaṃ karissāmī''ti aññattheva karoti, vinaṭṭhapurimacchavivaṇṇo ca ^a^P2.0603^ea^. tenāha -- ``jiṇṇohamasmi abalo vītavaṇṇo''ti. ^b^māhaṃ nassaṃ momuho antarāvā^eb^ti māhaṃ tuyhaṃ dhammaṃ asacchikatvā antarāyeva avidvā hutvā anassiṃ. ^b^jātijarāya idha vippahāna^eb^nti idheva tava pādamūle pāsāṇake vā cetiya jātijarāya vippahānaṃ nibbānadhammaṃ yamahaṃ vijaññaṃ, taṃ me ācikkha.

[03] 1128^b^.^eb^ idāni yasmā piṅgiyo kāye sāpekkhatāya ``jiṇṇohamasmī''ti gāthamāha tenassa bhagavā kāye sinehappahānatthaṃ ^b^``disvāna^eb^ ^a^M2.0319^ea^ ^b^rūpesu vihaññamāne''^eb^ti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^rūpesū^eb^ti rūpahetu rūpapaccayā. ^b^vihaññamāne^eb^ti kammakāraṇādīhi upahaññamāne. ^b^ruppanti rūpesū^eb^ti cakkhurogādīhi ca rūpahetuyeva janā ruppanti bādhīyanti.

[03] 1129-30^b^.^eb^ evaṃ bhagavatā yāva arahattaṃ tāva kathitaṃ paṭipattiṃ sutvāpi piṅgiyo jarādubbalatāya visesaṃ anadhigantvāva puna ^b^``disā catasso''^eb^ti imāya gāthāya bhagavantaṃ thomento desanaṃ yācati. athassa bhagavā punapi yāva arahattaṃ, tāva paṭipadaṃ dassento ^b^``taṇhādhipanne''^eb^ti gāthamāha. sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva.

[01] imampi suttaṃ bhagavā arahattanikūṭeneva desesi. desanāpariyosāne ca piṅgiyo anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāsi. so kira antarantarā cintesi -- ``evaṃ vicitrapaṭibhānaṃ nāma desanaṃ na labhi mayhaṃ mātulo bāvarī savanāyā''ti. tena sinehavikkhepena arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi. antevāsino panassa sahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. sabbeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā ehibhikkhavo ahesunti.
[06] paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya piṅgiyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
