[03] ito ^a^V2.0296^ea^ paraṃ saṅgītikārā desanaṃ thomentā ^b^``idamavoca bhagavā''^eb^tiādimāhaṃsu. tattha ^b^idamavocā^eb^ti idaṃ parāyanaṃ avoca. ^b^paricārakasoḷasāna^eb^nti bāvarissa paricārakena piṅgiyena saha soḷasannaṃ buddhassa vā bhagavato paricārakānaṃ soḷasannanti paricārakasoḷasannaṃ. te eva ^a^P2.0604^ea^ ca ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^. tattha soḷasaparisā pana purato ca pacchato ca vāmapassato ca dakkhiṇapassato ca cha cha yojanāni nisinnā ujukena dvādasayojanikā ahosi. ^b^ajjhiṭṭho^eb^ti yācito ^b^atthamaññāyā^eb^ti pāḷiatthamaññāya. ^b^dhammamaññāyā^eb^ti pāḷimaññāya. ^b^pārāyana^eb^nti evaṃ imassa dhammapariyāyassa adhivacanaṃ āropetvā tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ ^a^M2.0320^ea^ nāmāni kittayantā ^b^``ajito tissametteyyo...pe0... buddhaseṭṭhaṃ upāgamu''^eb^nti āhaṃsu.

[03] 1131-7^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sampannacaraṇa^eb^nti nibbānapadaṭṭhānabhūtena pātimokkhasīlādinā sampannaṃ. ^b^isi^eb^nti mahesiṃ. sesaṃ pākaṭameva. tato paraṃ ^b^brahmacariyamacariṃsū^eb^ti maggabrahmacariyaṃ acariṃsu. ^b^tasmā pārāyana^eb^nti tassa pārabhūtassa nibbānassa ayananti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 1138^b^.^eb^ ^b^pārāyanamanugāyissa^eb^nti assa ayaṃ sambandho -- bhagavatā hi pārāyane desite soḷasasahassā jaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, avasesānañca cuddasakoṭisaṅkhānaṃ devamanussānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. vuttañhetaṃ porāṇehi --
[21] ``tato pāsāṇake ramme, pārāyanasamāgame.
[22] amataṃ pāpayī buddho, cuddasa pāṇakoṭiyo''ti..

[03] niṭṭhitāya pana dhammadesanāya tato tato āgatā manussā bhagavato ānubhāvena attano attano gāmanigamādīsveva pāturahesuṃ. bhagavāpi sāvatthimeva agamāsi paricārakasoḷasādīhi anekehi bhikkhusahassehi parivuto. tattha piṅgiyo bhagavantaṃ vanditvā āha -- ``gacchāmahaṃ, bhante, bāvarissa buddhuppādaṃ ārocetuṃ, paṭissutañhi tassa mayā''ti. atha bhagavatā anuññāto ñāṇagamaneneva godhāvarītīraṃ gantvā pādagamanena assamābhimukho agamāsi. tamenaṃ ^a^V2.0297^ea^ bāvarī brāhmaṇo maggaṃ olokento nisinno dūratova khārijaṭādivirahitaṃ bhikkhuvesena āgacchantaṃ disvā ``buddho loke ^a^P2.0605^ea^ uppanno''ti niṭṭhaṃ agamāsi. sampattañcāpi naṃ pucchi -- ``kiṃ, piṅgiya, buddho loke uppanno''ti. ``āma, brāhmaṇa, uppanno, pāsāṇake cetiye nisinno amhākaṃ dhammaṃ desesi, tamahaṃ tuyhaṃ desessāmī''ti. tato bāvarī mahatā sakkārena sapariso taṃ pūjetvā āsanaṃ paññāpesi. tattha nisīditvā piṅgiyo ^b^``pārāyanamanugāyissa''^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^anugāyissa^eb^nti bhagavatā gītaṃ anugāyissaṃ. ^b^yathāddakkhī^eb^ti yathā sāmaṃ saccābhisambodhena asādhāraṇañāṇena ca addakkhi. ^b^nikkāmo^eb^ti pahīnakāmo ^a^M2.0321^ea^. ``nikkamo''tipi pāṭho, vīriyavāti attho nikkhanto vā akusalapakkhā. ^b^nibbano^eb^ti kilesavanavirahito, taṇhāvirahito eva vā. ^b^kissa hetu musā bhaṇe^eb^ti yehi kilesehi musā bhaṇeyya, ete tassa pahīnāti dasseti. etena brāhmaṇassa savane ussāhaṃ janeti.

[03] 1139-41^b^.^eb^ ^b^vaṇṇūpasañhita^eb^nti guṇūpasañhitaṃ. ^b^saccavhayo^eb^ti ``buddho''ti sacceneva avhānena nāmena yutto. ^b^brahmeti^eb^ taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ālapati. ^b^kubbanaka^eb^nti parittavanaṃ. ^b^bahupphalaṃ kānanamāvaseyyā^eb^ti anekaphalādivikatibharitaṃ kānanaṃ āgamma vaseyya. ^b^appadasse^eb^ti bāvaripabhutike parittapaññe. ^b^mahodadhi^eb^nti anotattādiṃ mahantaṃ udakarāsiṃ.

[03] 1142-4^b^.^eb^ ^b^yeme pubbe^eb^ti ye ime pubbe. ^b^tamanudāsino^eb^ti tamonudo āsino. ^b^bhūripaññāṇo^eb^ti ñāṇadhajo. ^b^bhūrimedhaso^eb^ti vipulapañño. ^b^sandiṭṭhikamakālika^eb^nti sāmaṃ passitabbaphalaṃ, na ca kālantare pattabbaphalaṃ. ^b^anītika^eb^nti kilesaītivirahitaṃ.

[03] 1145-50^b^.^eb^ atha naṃ bāvarī āha ^b^``kiṃ nu tamhā''^eb^ti dve gāthā. tato piṅgiyo bhagavato santikā avippavāsameva dīpento ^b^``nāhaṃ tamhā''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^passāmi naṃ manasā cakkhunāvā^eb^ti taṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ cakkhunā viya manasā passāmi ^a^P2.0606^ea^. ^b^namassamāno vivasemi ratti^eb^nti namassamānova rattiṃ atināmemi. ^b^tena teneva nato^eb^ti yena disābhāgena buddho, tena tenevāhampi nato tanninno tappoṇoti dasseti.

[03] 1151^b^.^eb^ ^b^dubbalathāmakassā^eb^ti appathāmakassa, atha vā dubbalassa dutthāmakassa ca balavīriyahīnassāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^teneva kāyo na paletī^eb^ti teneva dubbalathāmakattena kāyo na ^a^V2.0298^ea^ gacchati, yena vā buddho, tena na gacchati. ``na paretī''tipi pāṭho, so evattho. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti buddhassa santike. ^b^saṅkappayantāyā^eb^ti saṅkappagamanena. ^b^tena yutto^eb^ti yena buddho, tena yutto payutto anuyuttoti dasseti.

[03] 1152^b^.^eb^ ^b^paṅke^eb^ ^a^M2.0322^ea^ ^b^sayāno^eb^ti kāmakaddame sayamāno. ^b^dīpā dīpaṃ upaplavi^eb^nti satthārādito satthārādiṃ abhigacchiṃ. ^b^athaddasāsiṃ sambuddha^eb^nti sohaṃ evaṃ duddiṭṭhiṃ gahetvā anvāhiṇḍanto atha pāsāṇake cetiye buddhamaddakkhiṃ.

[03] 1153^b^.^eb^ imissā gāthāya avasāne piṅgiyassa ca bāvarissa ca indriyaparipākaṃ viditvā bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ ṭhitoyeva suvaṇṇobhāsaṃ muñci. piṅgiyo bāvarissa buddhaguṇe vaṇṇayanto nisinno eva taṃ obhāsaṃ disvā ``kiṃ ida''nti vilokento bhagavantaṃ attano purato ṭhitaṃ viya disvā bāvaribrāhmaṇassa ``buddho āgato''ti ārocesi, brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā añjaliṃ paggahetvā aṭṭhāsi. bhagavāpi obhāsaṃ pharitvā brāhmaṇassa attānaṃ dassento ubhinnampi sappāyaṃ viditvā piṅgiyameva ālapamāno ^b^``yathā ahū vakkalī''^eb^ti imaṃ gāthamabhāsi.

[03] tassattho -- ^b^yathā vakkali^eb^tthero saddhādhimutto ahosi, saddhādhurena ca arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. yathā ca soḷasannaṃ eko ^b^bhadrāvudho^eb^ nāma yathā ca ^b^āḷavi gotamo, evameva tvampi pamuñcassu saddhaṃ^eb^. tato saddhāya adhimuccanto ``sabbe ^a^P2.0607^ea^ saṅkhārā aniccā''tiādinā nayena vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā ^b^maccudheyyassa pāraṃ^eb^ nibbānaṃ gamissasīti arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. desanāpariyosāne piṅgiyo arahatte bāvarī anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahi. bāvaribrāhmaṇassa sissā pana pañcasatā sotāpannā ahesuṃ.

[03] 1154-5^b^.^eb^ idāni piṅgiyo attano pasādaṃ pavedento ^b^``esa bhiyyo''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^paṭibhānavā^eb^ti paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya upeto. ^b^adhideve abhiññāyā^eb^ti adhidevakare dhamme ñatvā. ^b^parovara^eb^nti hīnapaṇītaṃ, attano ca parassa ca adhidevattakaraṃ sabbaṃ dhammajātaṃ vedīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^kaṅkhīnaṃ paṭijānata^eb^nti kaṅkhīnaṃyeva sataṃ ``nikkaṅkhamhā''ti paṭijānantānaṃ.

[03] 1156^b^.^eb^ ^b^asaṃhīra^eb^nti rāgādīhi asaṃhāriyaṃ. ^b^asaṃkuppa^eb^nti akuppaṃ avipariṇāmadhammaṃ. dvīhipi padehi nibbānaṃ bhaṇati. ^b^addhā gamissāmī^eb^ti ekaṃseneva taṃ anupādisesaṃ nibbānadhātuṃ ^a^V2.0299^ea^ gamissāmi. ^b^na mettha kaṅkhā^eb^ti natthi me ^a^M2.0323^ea^ ettha nibbāne kaṅkhā. ^b^evaṃ maṃ dhārehi adhimuttacitta^eb^nti piṅgiyo ``evameva tvampi pamuñcassu saddha''nti. iminā bhagavato ovādena attani saddhaṃ uppādetvā saddhādhureneva ca vimuñcitvā taṃ saddhādhimuttataṃ pakāsento bhagavantaṃ āha -- ``evaṃ maṃ dhārehi adhimuttacitta''nti. ayamettha adhippāyo ``yathā maṃ tvaṃ avaca, evameva adhimuttaṃ dhārehī''ti.
[06] iti paramatthajotikāya khuddaka-aṭṭhakathāya
[06] suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathāya soḷasabrāhmaṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] niṭṭhito ca pañcamo vaggo atthavaṇṇanānayato, nāmena
[03] pārāyanavaggoti.
[03] ettāvatā ca yaṃ vuttaṃ --
[21] ``uttamaṃ vandaneyyānaṃ, vanditvā ratanattayaṃ.
[22] yo khuddakanikāyamhi, khuddācārappahāyinā..
[21] ``desito lokanāthena, lokanittharaṇesinā.
[22] tassa suttanipātassa, karissāmatthavaṇṇana''nti..
[03] ettha uragavaggādipañcavaggasaṅgahitassa uragasuttādisattatisuttappabhedassa ^a^P2.0608^ea^ suttanipātassa atthavaṇṇanā katā hoti. tenetaṃ vuccati --
[21] ``imaṃ suttanipātassa, karontenatthavaṇṇanaṃ.
[22] saddhammaṭṭhitikāmena, yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ mayā..
[21] ``tassānubhāvato ^a^V2.0300^ea^ khippaṃ, dhamme ariyappavedite.
[22] vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ, pāpuṇātu ayaṃ jano''ti..
[03] (pariyattippamāṇato catucattālīsamattā bhāṇavārā.)

[03] paramavisuddhasaddhābuddhivīriyappaṭimaṇḍitena ^a^M2.0324^ea^ sīlācārajjavamaddavādiguṇasamudayasamuditena sakasamayasamayantaragahanajjhogāhaṇasamatthena paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatena tipiṭakapariyattippabhede sāṭṭhakathe satthusāsane appaṭihatañāṇappabhāvena mahāveyyākaraṇena karaṇasampattijanitasukhaviniggatamadhurodāravacanalāvaṇṇayuttena yuttamuttavādinā vādīvarena mahākavinā chaḷabhiññāpaṭisambhidādippabhedaguṇapaṭimaṇḍite uttarimanussadhamme suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā ^b^buddhaghoso^eb^ti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katā ayaṃ ^b^paramatthajotikā^eb^ nāma suttanipāta-aṭṭhakathā --
[21] tāva tiṭṭhatu lokasmiṃ, lokanittharaṇesinaṃ.
[22] dassentī kulaputtānaṃ, nayaṃ paññāvisuddhiyā..
[21] yāva buddhoti nāmampi, suddhacittassa tādino.
[22] lokamhi lokajeṭṭhassa, pavattati mahesinoti..
[06] suttanipāta-atthavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
